record.Creator: UDOO
record.Title: UDOO KEY: The Flexible AI Platform, From $4
record.Text: Today, AI is all about algorithms running on remote servers. But it can be so much more. AI could be embedded in our everyday objects and truly change our daily life.That’s where the UDOO KEY comes in. The UDOO KEY is a fully programmable Raspberry Pi RP2040 + ESP32 microcontroller with Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and Bluetooth Low Energy. It’s more than just a piece of hardware: it also gives you access to our AI platform, Clea, with pre-trained AI models to deploy your AI app in minutes.And all this at a once-in-a-lifetime starting price of $4. In short, it gives you access to a new era of micro-computing. Not so long ago, microcontrollers were single-purpose devices. Not anymore with UDOO KEY! Physical programming and do-it-yourself electronics. Fleet management. IoT analytics, over-the-air updates. Telemetry. AI. Just imagine.The UDOO KEY allows you to use either RP2040, ESP32, or both, building your AI projects on your own terms. And most importantly, both MCUs are of the highest quality.The best part about it? Breadth of choice. The Pico-compatible part is built upon a Raspberry Pi RP2040 dual ARM Cortex-M0, with a QSPI 8MB Flash, a 133MHz clock and 264KB of on-chip SRAM. The UDOO KEY’s ESP32, an ESP32-WROVER-E, is based on a dual-core Xtensa 32-bit LX6, with a 16MB flash memory, an 8MB PSRAM, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and BLE.Mind you: the ESP32 on board is not just a Wi-Fi, BT & BLE module. On the contrary, it gives you full access to the firmware of ESP32 and you can program it as you please. The two microcontrollers can talk to each other via serial port. And that's not all. The two modules can also communicate via SWD interface.You can program the board via USB-C and decide whether to talk with Raspberry Pi or ESP32 via jumper. Since the ESP32 does not naturally mount a USB port, we implemented a UART-to-USB bridge. Both microcontrollers can be programmed using different environments, such as TinyML, TensorFlow Lite, MicroPython, C/C++, and many more, giving you plenty of options to streamline your AI application.From the ground up, the UDOO KEY is designed by developers for developers, and it comes built-in with all the tools to make development as smooth as possible. The microcontroller comes with a dedicated, fully open-source firmware based on Free RTOS and with ready to use SDKs to make it as simple as possible to build your next big thing.UDOO KEY is designed to natively support Clea.Clea is an extensible AI & IoT platform.It allows to gather and manage data from connected devices and create flows tailored to the user's needs. It also provides visualization tools to turn IoT data into actionable insights.The platform is based on apps and an SDK that allow developer to quickly embed models pre-built by SECO Mind. Each model is optimized for UDOO KEY and Edge devices, either Arm or x86, with a tuned interface engine depending on the hardware.Clea is built on top of two open-source projects we maintain: Astarte and Edgehog. Astarte allows the developers to manage and process IoT data: from collection to processing up to data orchestration. It features a full-fledged SDK for ESP32 based on the Espressif IoT Development Framework (ESP-IDF), so you can be productive with UDOO KEY and Clea in a matter of minutes and with just a few lines of code.Edgehog enables fleet device management and OTA updates, enhancing ESP32's firmware with a full-fledged device lifecycle solution. We're in the process of making Edgehog available entirely Open Source, so watch this page for updates!We believe that the key to unlock the power of Edge AI is the app model. The smartphone is so easy to use because of the multitouch user interface. But what made it so powerful was the possibility to download an app for every task. The very same model can be replicated with AI.Let’s say you need a face recognition application. That very same app has probably been written countless times before by thousands of developers worldwide.Imagine now being able to deploy a pre-built hardware-optimized version of this app on your devices - your UDOO KEYs, for instance.That’s what we are building. No need to reinvent the wheel every time. Finally, AI becomes a platform.Predictive maintenance is the capability to measure the lifetime of an object and detect a malfunction before it happens. It does so by analyzing data from connected devices through machine learning algorithms.In the video, a predictive maintenance AI model is used to predict a possible malfunction of the fork due to excessive strength.This project employs two UDOO KEY components:Mind you: the smart bike is just an example of predictive maintenance with UDOO KEY.A predictive maintenance AI model can be used in countless industrial and non-industrial scenarios for LCA and to reduce downtime.Sound recognition is the capability to identify a specific sound. In the video, sound recognition is used to identify a bird from the noise it makes.This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:Remember: this is just an example of a sound recognition application. You can use UDOO KEY to test your sound recognition AI model in several industrial and non industrial scenarios or use our own. Have you ever desired to get a coffee just with the power of your voice? Now, you can.This voice-activated coffee machine is the evolution of an old project of ours, UDOO Coffee Machine, and also takes inspiration from several Arduino Coffee Machines you can find online.The concept is simple: you activate the coffee machine by spelling a command word - in this example, “Hey UDOO.” After that, the coffee machine asks a scripted question to confirm that you really want a coffee. If you confirm, coffee is coming!This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:Please note that this voice-activated coffee machine is just an example of keyword recognition with UDOO KEY.Clea and UDOO KEY gives you everything you need to test your own keyword recognition AI model or use our own, which you can apply to hundreds of industrial and everyday scenarios.Here is an example of object detection & classification made with UDOO KEY.In this scenario, UDOO KEY gives your trash bins superpowers. Thanks to UDOO KEY, your trash bin can:Basically, this is a combination of several open-source projects. Specifically:This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:Gesture recognition is the capability to detect a specific gesture.In the video, a UDOO KEY is inserted inside a toy to turn it into a magic wand, giving it new abilities, such as:All of these abilities are gesture-activated thanks to UDOO KEY’s 9-axis IMU.This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:Note: this is just an example of gesture recognition with UDOO KEY. Thanks to UDOO KEY, you can easily run your gesture recognition AI model or use our own.Face recognition is the capability to detect and identify a face in a stream. Although UDOO KEY does not feature a camera, it mounts a camera connector and is compatible with Arducam.There are several face recognition projects you can make with UDOO KEY, both in industrial and non-industrial scenarios, using our own AI model or one made by you. We built the UDOO KEY to empower you.If you are a developer that wants full control with no bells and whistles, then the UDOO KEY Basic is for you: it mounts no sensors, so as to let you expand it with your favorite modules. Otherwise, pick the UDOO KEY PRO.The UDOO KEY PRO mounts two powerful sensors: a 9-axis IMU and a digital microphone. It is ready to let you start with your AI project right away.The 9-axis IMU sensor combines an accelerometer, a magnetometer and a gyroscope in a single module to streamline a wide array of projects, from robotics and RC cars up to smart bikes and automation. It is connected to the ESP32 via I2C bus. You can decide whether to access the I2C bus via ESP32 or RP2040 through the jumper switch.The digital microphone, on the other hand, is designed for AI-powered sound & voice recognition as well as audio control a-la Alexa. It is connected to the ESP32 via I2S bus.The UDOO KEY gives you plenty of options when it comes to interfaces.First thing first, it features three LEDs - one blue, one yellow and one green. The blue one signals a successful connection to Clea, the second one is for Wi-Fi/BT activities, and it's managed by ESP32's IO33 (pin #9). The green one is connected to RP2040's GPIO25. All LEDs are fully programmable.In terms of interfaces, you can use UDOO KEY the very same way you'd use Raspberry Pi Pico and ESP32.Last but not least, the UEXT connector is accessible from the ESP32, which exposes the I2C, UART and SPI interfaces.We built the UDOO KEY to empower you. If you are an embedded developer that wants full control and a minimal set of sensors, then the UDOO KEY Basic is for you: it mounts no sensors, so as to let you expand it with your favorite module. Otherwise, pick the UDOO KEY PRO.In terms of pinout, the UDOO KEY is 100% compatible with Raspberry Pi Pico, both hardware and software-wise.Mind you: all interfaces have ESD protection and are designed to be used not just by hobbyists, but also in industrial environments.Thanks to the ESP32 on board, you get full WiFi 802.11b/g/n connectivity, Bluetooth® and BLE v4.2.The UDOO KEY needs 5V of power via USB-C and consumes very little.The cool thing is, the board can go into deep sleep, reducing the power consumption to a minimum. In this state it only awakes if triggered by a specific event, enabling scenarios where you need the board to function for several years.The UDOO KEY can be powered via battery pack.In fact, it also supports a battery!The UDOO KEY is compatible with Raspberry Pi Pico, both hardware and software-wise. This means that each and any expansion hardware as well as each and any software built for Raspberry Pi Pico will work out of the box on UDOO KEY.ESP32 is an incredibly versatile platform for Edge AI applications. It gives you lots of tools, demos and projects to start - and that's why we chose it.The UDOO KEY opens the doors to Edge AI. Python, MicroPython, TinyML, TensorFlow Lite and much more: the sky's the limit.We love Arduino. In fact, we made UDOO KEY 100% compatible with Arduino software-wise.Yes: UDOO KEY’s Arduino IDE runs the Arduino IDE natively.This means that each and any project that runs on Arduino Nano you can also run on UDOO KEY.We are strong believers and supporters of open-source technologies. Because of this, we are going to release the BOM and schematics of UDOO KEY as soon as we start shipping.This is not an empty promise. We have already released the BOM and schematics of each and every UDOO board - have a look at our website.On top of this, the core components of Clea are already open source:Last but not least, we commit to open-source more Clea components in the future.To make UDOO KEY even more flexible we are making available three special kits.The first one is Early Bird UDOO KEY PRO Cam Kit + Clea.Made in collaboration with Arducam, it includes:The second kit is Early Bird UDOO KEY PRO Grove Kit + Clea.Made in collaboration with SeeedStudio, it includes:The third kit is Early Bird UDOO KEY PRO AI VISION KIT.Made in collaboration with Arducam, it includes:UDOO VISION X5 is the perfect companion for UDOO KEY.It’s a powerful x86 single-board computer based on an Intel® Atom® X5-E3940 Quad Core. The board is built upon a Pico-ITX pocket-size form factor, the ideal platform for computer vision projects. It features a 32-bit Quad-Channel LPDDR4 soldered on-board, 4GB of RAM and 32GB of eMMC.What’s more, UDOO KEY is natively compatible with Clea and unlike other development boards, UDOO VISION X5 natively runs OpenVINO™, a toolkit by Intel to quickly deploy computer vision and AI/ML apps at the edge.This is not our first rodeo.We’ve already launched 4 successful Kickstarter campaigns - UDOO, UDOO NEO, UDOO X86, UDOO BOLT - raising over 2 million dollars from thousands of backers worldwide.Since the very first UDOO board we’ve shipped over 100,000 single-board computers.With UDOO DUAL/QUAD, our first single board computer launched on Kickstarter in 2013, we created a new playground for students to learn the basics of coding, electronics and physical computing with an all-in-one solution.With UDOO NEO, our second single board computer launched on Kickstarter in 2015, we empowered makers, designers, startups and research groups all over the world with an IoT-ready all-in-one device for applications using motion sensors (rovers, drones, robots, automation).With UDOO X86, launched on Kickstarter in 2016, we created the most powerful single board computer of the time. UDOO X86 addresses the needs of the average consumer that is looking for a very good, affordable media player, but also speaks to developers, makers and startups who want to invent today the world of tomorrow. With UDOO BOLT, launched on Kickstarter in 2018, we created a portable and powerful computer featuring an AMD Ryzen™️ Embedded V1000 SoC and an Arduino™️-compatible platform, all wrapped into one.UDOO is a joint effort of SECO Edge and SECO Mind, both daughter companies of SECO.SECO is a public company and a leading international player in the B2B embedded market. It has over 40 years of experience in the design and production of electronic embedded solutions.Our community is a strong point of the UDOO world. It's based on Open Source values, where makers, developers, students, companies and privates share their ideas and problems. Our forum is daily updated, while our blog reports the news from the UDOO and embedded domains. Our social world is spreading as well: from Facebook to Twitter, YouTube, Github and Instagram. You can find all UDOO-based projects on Hackster on our dedicated page. On our website we also have all the resources you need (3D files, schematics, BOM, etcetera) available for free. All our products are available in our shop and distributors.Corporate social responsibility is one of the key pillars of our approach to business. We base our work on passion and innovation. On commitment and the development of skills. On the value of each person, recognizing diversity as a resource and making respect, openness and participation the fundamental drivers of the Group.For several years the SECO Group has been committed to reducing its environmental impact by monitoring emissions, transitioning to forms of renewable energy and reducing the volume of non-recyclable and non-renewable waste produced.Since 2019 we've published an ESG (environmental, social, governance) report.For more information, please read our Sustainability Report 2020.To make UDOO KEY even more special we partnered with a few equally special companies.The Espressif solution is one of the two cores of the UDOO KEY and provides, among several other features, wireless connectivity. Espressif gave us their support in working with their products.We collaborated with Arducam to create a brand-new kit for computer vision AI projects. Arducam is a professional company dedicated to open-source hardware and software, designed and manufactured in China specifically for Arduino and Raspberry Pi camera solutions.We collaborated with Seeed Studio to create a starter kit for UDOO KEY. Seeed has been serving the global developer community since 2008, by providing open technology and agile manufacturing services, with the mission to make hardware more accessible and lower the threshold for hardware innovation.We'd like thank CUBIT for making this possible and Università di Siena for supporting us.

record.Creator: foolography GmbH
record.Title: UNLEASHED '22: Timelapse, Long Exposure, Remote & Geotagging
record.Text: The Unleashed is the swiss army knife of camera accessories: It’s tiny, but packed with features. So much more than just a camera remote, it unleashes the full potential of your camera with expert level timelapse features, long exposure capabilities, geotagging and more - in a tiny Bluetooth module and an intuitive app that simply works.Since our last Kickstarter campaign, we've shipped the Unleashed ’18 to thousands of happy customers all over the world. Now, by popular demand, we're launching the new Unleashed ’22, finally supporting nearly all mirrorless cameras as well as DSLRs: Sony, Fujifilm, Panasonic, Canon and Nikon! We designed the Unleashed to be incredibly smart in the tiniest package. With its low profile design, it's never in your way and you can leave it on your camera at all times - even when packing it in your bag. Thanks to Bluetooth Low Energy, initial pairing takes less than 10 seconds and reconnection is almost instant when you turn on the camera or open the app. It only uses a minimal amount of power from your camera battery, so you don't need to charge it, and it's always ready when you need it! Our beautiful app is just the user interface for the Unleashed, whereas the brains are in the tiny device itself. This means it will keep controlling the camera to finish your shot, even if you close the app, you walk out of range or your phone battery dies.The Unleashed gives you full control over your camera from the palm of your hand and adds a ton of features to your camera – easy to use from our app.The Unleashed enables you to easily take pro-level selfies, breathtaking astro photos, creative light-paintings and epic "holy grail" timelapses.The Unleashed ‘18 is already loved by thousands of customers, achieving beautiful results that continue to blow us away. This gave us a solid foundation to build on, and we took all your feedback and wishes to heart.So for the new Unleashed ‘22, we reworked every aspect of our firmware and much of our app, further improving speed and reliability. And of course we added some great new features to make it the perfect all-round tool for any photographer!IN OUR CUSTOMERS’ WORDS“Unleashed has changed my life. I have two, one for each Z7, use them to about 10% of their potential and they’re still game-changing.” - Josh H.“I have been taking pictures for about 50 years and have seen and tried many technical solutions for remote control of cameras. This solution from Germany is so far the most sophisticated, elegant and at an unbeatable price I have found.” - Blue Reef“This technology for camera control is amazing and so small. It puts all others practically out of the picture (no pun intended).” - Dr. Stephen L.Because it can always stay on your camera and is never out of battery, the Unleashed is the perfect remote control, be it for simple triggering of tripod shots, family photos or selfies. Or use it to remotely start & stop video recording - when your camera is mounted on a gimbal or you want to start multiple cameras at once. The Unleashed app can handle up to 6 cameras with ease.But it’s so much more than just a remote - with the Unleashed you can change all the important settings of your camera, without having to touch your camera or dig through daunting menus.We’ve all come to love geotagged photos on our smartphones, where you can easily find photos on a map in the “places” album, as well as check the exact location of individual shots. The Unleashed enables direct in-camera geotagging for your mirrorless camera or DSLR, using either your smartphone’s location or a dedicated Bluetooth GPS receiver.Astrophotography, lightpainting and moreOur long exposure feature helps you take perfectly timed exposures up to 4.5 hours. When the camera is set to bulb mode, the Unleashed will hold the trigger down for you for the exact time you want it to. Or you can press once to start and press again to stop a long exposure of any length. We decided on continuing the scale of 1/3rd stop steps from the camera instead of you having to set hours, minutes and seconds separately. While it’s unconventional, this makes it much easier to work with the other exposure settings in the camera: Take test shots with high ISO to nail exposure, then decrease ISO and easily increase exposure time by an equal number of stops to keep the same exposure level.  ND filter photographyWe also added a setting that will adjust the shutter speed for you by the right number of stops when adding or removing ND filters, making ND filter calculators obsolete! The Unleashed makes setting up any timelapse a breeze, whether simple or requiring expert features. And we implemented lots of them!Just use our default settings and hit start or choose your interval and shooting time - it’s that easy! We’ll show you the number of photos it’ll take, as well as the resulting clip length at your chosen frame rate. You can also decide to choose the number of photos to take, and we’ll calculate the shooting time for you instead.Real exposure ramping The Unleashed brings “holy grail” timelapses within reach for everyone. During these day-to-night transition timelapses, the Unleashed will adjust exposure settings automatically, using one of several algorithms to choose from. We’re not limited to bulb-ramping, but can actually ramp the camera’s shutterspeed, aperture and ISO for daylight to milkyway transitions. Minimized dark-timeAll normal intervalometers have unnecessarily long autofocussing and hold times. The former is how long the shutter button is half-pressed before the interval, the latter how long it is fully pressed and held on each interval. These times need to be long enough to ensure a photo is taken, with or without AF. So to be on the safe side, intervalometers usually half-press, then press and hold for way too long. This results in unwanted “dark-time” between shots where nothing useful happens, but you also can’t view the photos. Some more advanced intervalometers allow you to change the hold time, but this puts the burden on you to find the shortest possible but longest necessary time that will consistently work with your camera. The Unleashed knows whether the camera is set to autofocus, and on most cameras it gets the info exactly when the shutter opens. So it will only half-press when necessary and can stop holding the shutter button the instant we know the camera started the shot, leading to the absolute minimal dark-time for every camera, with no configuration necessary. Flexible intervalsSo you don’t miss any shots when exposure times get longer, the Unleashed can optionally start increasing the interval. This is perfect for day-to-night timelapses as it enables you to have a nice short interval during the day, but still allows ramping down to 30s exposures for starry nights.Month-long durationsYou can now set intervals of up to 24h and shooting times up to 365 days! External intervalometer supportOur autoramping will optionally work with external intervalometers, even sliders and other motion controllers.Sync timelapses with the movement of motion controllersBecause the Unleashed knows exactly when a shot ends, it can tell motion controllers to move with perfect timing, in order to maximise the time until the next shot and therefore minimize vibrations. This will work wirelessly with selected manufacturers. We have already implemented support for the Black Forest Motion PINE controllers and are currently working on Syrp compatibility, with more to follow. With most cameras it will also work with a wired shutter cable from any other motion controller and the Unleashed set to external intervalometer.Foolproof and fail-safeAll basic and advanced features are implemented in the Unleashed firmware, and the app just provides the user interface to configure them. Once started, the Unleashed keeps controlling the camera with precision and without missing a beat, even if you lose Bluetooth connectivity. Precise timing, complex "holy grail" calculations and camera adjustments are handled by the Unleashed itself, not the app! Even the Bluetooth connection to a motion controller is direct and independent from the smartphone. Of course you can open the app and reconnect at any time to see the current progress or make manual adjustments.Gallery and photo review - now in HDThe new Unleashed got 10x faster. So you can now transfer high-resolution preview images to your phone! You can enable automatic downloading for quick review after each shot you take, and you can browse all photos in our new gallery view. The Unleashed quickly loads all thumbnails and you can choose to download your favorites in higher resolutions individually. To get the most out of the Bluetooth bandwidth, we added smart comparison algorithms to avoid unnecessary data transfers. We even implemented complex methods to add the EXIF data of the original image to the high-resolution previews you’re downloading! Because your GPS metadata along with all other shooting info is in the preview images when you save those to your camera roll, you’ll be able to see and search for those photos conveniently on a map in your “Places” album.Share on locationEasily share your favorite shots taken with your camera right from our app. The new high resolution previews are perfect for sharing on Social Media or with your family and friends right on the spot.We have a loooong wish list of our customers’ feature wishes for the Unleashed and our app. Reaching the following funding goals will enable us to develop some of these requests. So spread the news, tell your friends and together we’ll make these cool features become a reality!Note that the last two stretch goals don’t guarantee we will be able to provide full support for all features on these camera brands! We still have too much R&D ahead of us to promise this. Also, as already written elsewhere, we only have a chance to support these Olympus cameras: OM-D E-M1 III, E-M5 III, E-M1X and E-M1 Mark II and these Pentax cameras: 645Z, K1, K1 Mark II and maybe the K3, KP and K3 Mark II. You can read the reasoning behind that in our FAQs.Extended exposure bracketing.When we say extended, we mean it. With the Unleashed, you can take exposure bracketed shots with up to 55 images and any EV stepsize: 0.3, 0.7, 1.0, 2.0… you name it. Set up your starting exposure, and select whether you want symmetric bracketing, only darker exposures, or just brighter exposures. Choose whether to bracket exposure by changing shutterspeed, aperture or ISO - or any combination thereof, in the order you choose! Set maximum and minimum for each of these settings, to keep your bracketed shots shorter, avoid noise or limit depth of field variation and diffraction. You have full control!Capture scenes with high dynamic range to create HDR photos with tone mapping or exposure fusion. Or use it for image-based lighting of 3D renderings to realistically place 3D objects into the real world.The new Unleashed '22 is compatible with 144 camera models. To fit all those different cameras, there will be 7 different Unleashed models, as well as 7 different cables to perfectly and snugly fit on your camera. Each Unleashed model is a mere 14x16x5.5mm in size (0.54 x 0.63 x 0.20 in, w x h x d, without the plug) and weighs less than 5g. The cables are custom made with extremely flexible wires and the smallest possible right-angled plugs to make sure they never get in your way.To make it easier, all we need to know is which camera you want the Unleashed for, and we’ll make sure you get the right Unleashed + cable combination. Just back this project and pledge to support us today, and a few weeks before shipping we’ll send you a survey through our pledge manager where you can specify your camera along with shipping details to get your reward. The following cameras are supported. Having covered all bases, we’re sure one of our Unleashed models will fit any new camera coming to market.Sony Alpha: α7 IV, ZV-E10, α1, α7S III, ZV-1, α9 II, α6100, α6600, RX100 VII, α7R IV, RX0 II, α6400, RX100 VA, RX100 VI, α7 III, α7R III, RX10 IV, RX0, α9, α6500, α99 IIFujifilm: GFX 100S, X-S10, X-T4, GFX 100, X-T3, X-H1, GFX 50S, X-T2, X-T1 IR, X-T1, IS Pro, S5 ProPanasonic Lumix: DC-GH6, DC-GH5 II, DC-S5, DC-S1H, DC-S1, DC-S1R, DC-GH5S, DC-G9, DC-GH5Canon EOS: R3, R5, R6, 850D / Rebel T8i, 1D X Mark III, Ra, 90D, M6 Mark II, 250D / Rebel SL3 / Kiss X10, RP, R, 2000D / 1500D / Rebel T7 / Kiss X90, 4000D, 6D Mark II, 200D / Rebel SL2 / Kiss X9, 77D / 9000D, 800D / Rebel T7i / Kiss X9i, 5D Mark IV, 1300D / Rebel T6, 80D, 1D X Mark II, 5Ds, 5Ds R, 760D / Rebel T6s / 8000D, 750D / Rebel T6i / Kiss X8i, 7D Mark II, 1200D / Rebel T5 / Kiss X70, 70D, 100D / Rebel SL1, 700D / Rebel T5i / Kiss X7i, 6D, 650D / Rebel T4i / Kiss X6i, 1D C, 60Da, 5D Mark III, 1D X, 600D / Rebel T3i / Kiss X5, 1100D / Rebel T3 / Kiss X50, 60D, 550D / Rebel T2i / Kiss X4, 1D Mark IV, 7D, 500D / Rebel T1i / Kiss X3, 5D Mark II, 50DNikon: Z9, Z fc, Z7 II, Z6 II, Z5, D780, Z50, D6, D3500, Z7, Z6, D850, D7500, D5600, D3400, D5, D500, D7200, D810A, D5500, D750, D810, D4s, D3300, Df, D5300 , D610, D7100, D5200, D600, D3200, D800, D800E, D4, D5100, D7000, D3100, D3S, D300S, D5000, D3X, D90, D700, D3, D300, D2Xs, D200, D2Hs, D2X, D2H. With reduced features: D1X, D1H, D1, Coolpix P1000, Coolpix P950, Coolpix A, P7700, P7800, F6, F100, F5, F90X/N90s, F90/N90 - That’s right, we even support 5 different film or "analogue" cameras!Please check the full compatibility table here, to see which features are supported on your camera.There are some notable exceptions of cameras we don’t officially support. Check our FAQs for the reasons why.Yes, we know each one of those manufacturers has their own app ... but have you ever used one - and then used it a second time? From our own experience and for the vast majority of people we have talked to, the manufacturers apps are so frustrating to use, that few people will bother making a second attempt of getting the apps to work, let alone use them productively in the field. The biggest gripes everyone has with these apps is getting them to connect to the camera reliably. The Unleashed is the complete opposite: Even initial pairing only takes seconds, and reconnection in every day use happens instantly when you open the app. Check out a real-time comparison between the Unleashed versus the manufacturers' native apps from initial connection to first photo."I've used a lot of remote triggers, but the Unleashed is by far my favorite. It's so small and unobtrusive that it nests inside my camera's L-bracket and I love the fact it needs no batteries or charging. The app has an intuitive, modern, well-designed interface. With the latest updates, it's a dream to use for low light remote triggering and complex timelapse. I’m really looking forward to all the features of the new Unleashed.""Shutter release remotes are one of the essential components to sharp night sky images, so naturally I have used a lot of them. Some would call me a destroyer of equipment on the many trips I drag it through, so I’ve jumped from remote to remote for years. Well, since I’ve had the Unleashed that’s changed. Ever since I’ve had it, I haven’t used another remote at all, honestly. The thing just lives on my camera, I don’t think it has left my camera body even once since the day I got it. The greatest part about it is that I no longer have to constantly worry about forgetting to bring a shutter remote, or losing it along the way. I remember the constant stress of bringing batteries or forgetting them on multi day backpacking trips for other remotes. What is great about this remote is it uses your camera’s battery (which I have not noticed any difference in battery life) and now I can just focus on bringing camera batteries and keeping my phone charged which I would be doing anyway! I’ve also used a lot of the standard camera bluetooth apps like nikon's snap bridge and would go as far as to say that I am not alone in disliking them. The interface of the Unleashed app is easy to use and very effective. It’s also so nice to finally have an app that has real usable timelapse functions.""For me, the thing I like about the Unleashed the most might be different than one would think. I love how easily I can use my camera remotely from my phone. I can control/change almost all settings from the palm of my hand. Since I do a lot of astrophotography and long exposure stuff, it really makes that so much easier for me. A lot of times I need to be able to start my camera and do light painting. I can set up a 2 or 10 second delay on my phone, hit start, put my phone in my pocket, wait for it to start taking the picture and do my light painting. It helps a lot more than one would think.It's also very nice to be able to take "selfies" with something other than a cell phone when there's not generally people around that can run the camera for you. I have taken many family pictures with it remotely that don't look like they were set up on a tripod. I love the timelapse and holy grail timelapse features as well. I really like that I can see visually what multiple cameras are doing at any time throughout the timelapse too. I think my favorite "moments" I have with using them is taking my own astroselfies or self-family pictures. I don't always get the opportunity to be in the pictures because I'm usually the one with the camera taking the pictures. But with The Unleashed I can remotely control them, from a decent distance and even view the images if need be. It makes getting in front of the camera much easier and be part of the memories I'm creating.""Hey all my name is Josh Morgan and I’m a rural electrician from New Zealand with a keen interest on Astro Photography and Timelapse. So I took a punt on the Unleashed in early 2020 to hopefully assist me with my timelapse work. After a long Covid wait it arrived and I couldn’t be more happy with it. Really transformed my D750 into a more modern machine, gave me extended long shutter durations for crazy long exposures, GPS tagging and more importantly full time exposure ramping shutter/aperture/iso for full time holy grail timelapse work which had been a sore point for me as I had to manually ramp every setting during sunset/sunrise which has its own problems if I was tryna run 2 cameras. But also more importantly it runs off Bluetooth which was critical to me as any wifi related systems absolutely chewed up battery life on the camera. So a very welcomed bonus and so far a hell of a product.My favourite moment so far with the Unleashed is it finally allowed me to capture amazing holy grail timelapse work coming into our prime Astro season at my holiday destination of choice Great Barrier Island. What I managed to capture was some of the most intense levels of airglow I’ve ever encountered. I have family/time constraints there so having the Unleashed work hands off was really amazing."Foolography GmbH, founded in 2009, is an international team located in Berlin, Germany, making use of the city’s great network and drive for technological innovation. Being engineers and photographers ourselves, we live and breathe our products. The Unleashed is not just another commercial product, it's our baby! We use it all the time and have devoted countless hours refining every detail for the smoothest operation in all edge cases. To do so, we reverse engineered protocols and learned to control every possible bit of the cameras! This translates to a hassle-free user experience which really sets the Unleashed apart. In an update we'll do a tech deep dive with the founder to highlight a few of those. Stay tuned!The Unleashed is made in Germany and is the product of some serious German engineering! Of course some components are sourced abroad, but the Unleashed is designed, developed and manufactured in Germany. We’ve actively been working toward this new Unleashed for the better part of the last two years. In fact, to pave the way for the new features of the Unleashed ‘22, we refactored so much code that we found and fixed quite a few bugs in rare edge cases and made huge improvements to nearly all features of the Unleashed ‘18 along the way. After a long beta testing phase, we just released all these in a major 2.0.0 update of our Apps for iOS and Android including the 2.0.0 Firmware. So not only does the new Unleashed benefit hugely from all the R&D we did on the Unleashed ‘18, the reverse is true as well.One of the most important things we learned from the last campaign: no matter how well you plan, you’ll always need more time! So we're only starting this campaign now that we got the Unleashed fully functional on all new brands. The current lead times for components are making it virtually impossible to promise a shorter delivery time, so we have not just included some buffers into our timeline - basically our entire timeline is buffer! So while we gear up for production and wait for components to arrive, we’ll have all that time to really polish all the new features.After the campaign, a few weeks before we ship the Unleashed, you will get access to our pledge management system (via email) where you can pay for optional express shipping, buy additional Unleasheds or other accessories. Shipping costs are: Germany: 8€, Rest of World: 15€, express shipping can be added optionally.We really appreciate your help in getting word out about the new Unleashed, be it to your photography buddies, your followers on Social Media or a media outlet you happen to work for 😉. Feel free to reach out to press@foolography.com or come have a look at www.foolography.com/press.

record.Creator: Rotolight
record.Title: Rotolight NEO 3 and AEOS 2 LED Camera Lights
record.Text: Welcome to our campaign for the most advanced LED lighting in the world: the brand new Rotolight NEO 3 and AEOS 2. Designed and manufactured in the UK for photographers, videographers and filmmakers, the latest products from our design team are amongst the most powerful around.Jason Lanier puts the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 through their creative paces while shooting at the amazing Laredo Western Town in the UK Check out this awesome video of the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 in action on a recent shoot at Laredo Western Town in the UK.We have been busy creating the latest video instalment for our #AskRotolight video series which highlights all of the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 features, check it out below.   We recently held a live event with Jason Lanier so that we could answer any questions you might have about the new NEO 3 and AEOS 2 - you can watch it again below and see just how amazing the lights perform.Nothing beats seeing results - While on one of Jason Lanier's shoots, he captured this incredible shot of the beautiful Andrada using the AEOS 2 in continuous mode. Jason said "It's a MONSTER, and has already become my favorite light" Settings: Sony A9, f/1.4, 1/5000 sec, 50mm, ISO 100. Shot in continuous mode on the AEOS 2.Here at Rotolight, we’ve been widely recognised and consistently awarded as one of the leading manufacturers in our field. Our goal has always been to offer innovative, revolutionary lighting that no one has ever seen before. This is your chance to be among the first to own the latest in Rotolight technology.Packed with more world-firsts than any other light, the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 are LED lights that have been built to lift your content to another level. Each light packs a serious punch with its best-in-class output and features never-before seen technology that we are incredibly proud and excited to share in this campaign.With both the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 available for backing in this campaign, let’s look at each one more closely so you can see the extraordinary impact these 2 British-made lights will have on your photography and videography.A pocket-sized powerhouse, boasting a jaw-dropping 4541 LUX at 1m, NEO 3 is the brightest LED on-camera light ever made, so much so that it has almost twice the power of its nearest competitor. Experience unrivalled power and industry-first innovations in a compact form that you can take anywhere. Powerful and portable, this light is a hero for hybrid shooters - if you can dream it, you can shoot it.This enormous leap in power output follows on from the game-changing NEO 2 back in 2017. Amateur Photographer had this to say about the NEO 2 on launch and we believe the NEO 3 will follow suit! For portrait photographers, the NEO 3 combines the shoot what you see benefits of continuous light with the world’s first High-Speed Sync RGB flash (1/8000th). With a powerful output of 10,700 LUX at 1m and zero recycle time, you can get up to 100,000 full-power flashes on a single battery. Shoot at any colour temperature from 3000-10,000K for a significant boost over continuous light performance. For the first time, you can also shoot in any one of NEO 3’s 16.7 million colours or 2,500 digital filters for ultimate creative lighting effects. NEO 3 can be wirelessly triggered at up to 656ft (200m) with the integrated Elinchrom Skyport flash receiver with Skyport transmitters, available as an add-on when selecting your pledge. Alternatively, you can use your existing triggers using the 3.5mm flash sync socket.Featuring state-of-the-art RGBWW chips, NEO 3 offers endless possibilities to enhance your creativity. For the first time, you can flash in any one of 16.7 million colours or 2,500 of your favourite digital filters from brands such as LEE - never before has a light so compact packed such a colourful punch.Revolutionise your workflow and save time on set with Rotolight’s industry-first intuitive, full-colour touchscreen. Navigate through menus, effortlessly access and adjust key features and recall your favourite settings at a moment’s notice, perfect for when creativity can’t wait. In fact, the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 are so advanced, you can switch the fans into "stealth mode" straight from the touchscreen menu so that when you are shooting video, there is no sound from the fans. With battery performance like this, you’ll never be left in the dark. With a bespoke, high-performance, USB-C rechargeable lithium battery, the NEO 3 is the creative companion you can always rely on. This unique battery can be charged via the USB-C port located on the bottom of the battery or with our brand-new fast charger which is included in the NEO 3 – Ultimate Bundle, or you can purchase it as an add-on when selecting your pledge.The NEO 3 is packed with our award-winning suite of CineSFX™ (Fire, Lightning, TV, Gunshot, Paparazzi and much more), so you can add extra drama to a scene at the touch of a button. Our advanced technology allows you to customise, save and instantly recall your favourite settings, reducing time on set to make your shoot as smooth as possible. Designed in conjunction with Stefan Lange, visual FX veteran (Batman, James Bond Skyfall, Tomb Raider), CineSFX™ utilises NEO 3’s RGBWW engine to deliver realistic full-colour lighting effects.Get the shots you need first time with Rotolight’s award-winning colour engine. With outstanding colour reproduction and a TLCI of 99, the NEO 3 reduces editing time by ensuring beautiful skin tones that give you fantastic results. You can even eliminate shadows and add a sparkle to your subject’s eye with Rotolight’s signature catchlight effect for perfect portraits.With the AEOS 2, the world is your studio. The most portable 1x1 light ever made, this innovative LED light offers unmatched versatility for photographers and filmmakers.When you need power and portability, there’s the AEOS 2. Weighing only 1.4kg, this category-leading, lightweight and ultra-thin design is the ultimate location light, giving you the versatility you need to easily achieve the results you’re searching for.In fact, visual FX veteran Stefan Lange, had this to say about our original AEOS design.For professional studio and portrait photographers, AEOS 2 combines the shoot what you see benefits of continuous light with the world’s first High-Speed Sync RGB flash (1/8000th). With a powerful output of 17,800 LUX at 1m and zero recycle time, you can get up to 100,000 full-power flashes on a single battery.Shoot at any colour temperature from 3000-10,000K for a significant boost over continuous light performance. Alternatively, shoot in any one of AEOS 2’s 16.7 million colours for the ultimate creative lighting effects. AEOS 2 can be wirelessly triggered at up to 656ft (200m) with the integrated Elinchrom Skyport flash receiver with Skyport transmitters, available as an add-on when selecting your pledge.Featuring state-of-the-art RGBWW chips, AEOS 2 gives you the opportunity to light and flash your subject in 16.7 million colours and 2,500 digital filters from brands such as LEE, unlocking unlimited creative possibilities.If you’re looking for reliable battery performance with a low power draw, AEOS 2 is the creative companion for you. Its superior output uses only ⅓ of the power draw of its closest competitors, reducing your running costs but doubling your light output.As well as the option to power the AEOS 2 from a PSU cable, you have the added benefit of fitting V-Mount batteries for combined portability and long-lasting use. Choose from 95 Wh, 155 Wh and 310 Wh batteries in our add-on menu when confirming your pledge.In addition to V-Mount batteries, you can also add a conversion plate so you can use our brand-new NEO 3 custom batteries, also available in the add-on section.Streamline your workflow even further with Rotolight’s industry-first intuitive, full-colour touchscreen. You can save time on set by effortlessly navigating through menus, accessing and adjusting key features, and recalling your favourite settings at a moment’s notice. Ideal for working to tight schedules and lighting safely and efficiently on location, the AEOS 2 gives you the speed to control features on the fly.In fact, the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 are so advanced, you can switch the fans into "stealth mode" straight from the touchscreen menu so that when you are shooting video, there is no sound from the fans. The AEOS 2 is packed with our award-winning suite of CineSFX™ (Fire, Lightning, TV, Gunshot, Paparazzi and much more), so you can add extra drama to a scene at the touch of a button. Our advanced technology allows you to customise, save and instantly recall your favourite settings, reducing time on set to make your shoot as smooth as possible. Designed in conjunction with Stefan Lange, Visual FX veteran (Batman, James Bond Skyfall, Tomb Raider), CineSFX™ utilises the AEOS 2 RGBWW engine to deliver realistic full-colour lighting effects.Rotolight’s award-winning colour engine has outstanding colour reproduction and a TLCI of 99, with the skin tone accuracy reducing editing time, giving you realistic, impressive results. You can even produce perfect portraits with Rotolight’s signature catchlight effect, eliminating shadows and bringing a sparkle to your subject’s eye. We’re fortunate enough to be partnering with some of the industry’s best world-renowned photographers and videographers, including an extraordinary group of photographers known as ‘Masters of Light’. Not only do they skilfully portray just how beautiful each subject is when shot using Rotolight products, but they also help us shape the next generation of technology, much of which you will see in the NEO 3 and AEOS 2. Rotolight LED lights are used by thousands of photographers and videographers around the world. It’s their feedback, reviews and content that help drive us to achieve new heights with our technological breakthroughs. Take a look at some of their video reviews and content below.SmartSoft™ technology was first introduced in our flagship lights, the Titan™ X2 & X1. This unique features software will be pre-installed in the AEOS 2 and will allow you to electronically adjust your light’s diffusion via an electric diffusion panel which is purchasable separately and will be available in the add-ons soon, focus and spread without the need for gels. Like a 216 diffusion on an adjustable dial, SmartSoft™ provides the flexibility of a beautiful soft output and a harder light source all-in-one, a technology we’ve integrated into our latest designs.Rotolight Bowens S Mount Adapter RRP: $69 (£49.99 ex tax) Campaign Price: $55 (£39)Rotolight Universal Speedring Adapter RRP: $69 (£49.99 ex tax) Campaign Price: $55 (£39)Rotolight Speedring Light Stand Adapter RRP: $69 (£49.99 ex tax) Campaign Price: $55 (£39)Rotolight Speedring Light Mount Adapter and Universal Speedring Adapter BUNDLE: RRP: $129.99 (£95 ex tax) Campaign Price: $103.99 (£75 ex tax)What better way to future proof the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 than to include integrated Wi-Fi and Bluetooth® technology. Not only will you be able to wirelessly control the functions of your NEO 3 and AEOS 2, but you will also be able to update each lights firmware using the integrated USB port featured in both lights when we launch new performance improvements, available from Rotolight's website, free of charge!With the new Rotolight app, easily switch between lighting modes to adjust the colour, power, flash settings and much more right from the palm of your hand. You can create custom groups and projects on up to 20 lights - the perfect solution for staying on top of your setup.To say thank you for supporting our campaign, and for being the first to own this new technology, we’ve put together several exciting pledges that you can select from. Not only will you be accessing amazing discounts from RRP, but we will also be shipping ALL pledges for FREE**Note: Please scroll to Shipping, Taxes and Duties for further detailsNow that you have been dazzled by the Rotolight NEO 3 and AEOS 2 and realise you must own one, it's time to choose a reward. We have included this handy table so you can see exactly what comes in each pledge on offer. DESKTOP1. On a desktop, simply hover your mouse over the chosen reward and click "Select this reward" 2. Select your shipping country3. The pledge amount will automatically appear in the box, select continue 4. On the next screen you can configure your reward and add optional add-on accessories to complement your reward at discounted prices5. Once you have selected your add-ons, double-check your amount and click continue. 6. Enter your card information or use a pre-existing card, tick the box to accept Kickstarter T&C's and finally, click on PledgeMOBILE1. Simply tap on "back this project"  2. Choose the correct reward level and tap on "Select this reward"3. Change shipping location to match which country you live in4. Configure your reward and add optional add-on accessories to complement your reward at discounted prices5. Enter your card information or use a pre existing card and then click on PledgeHow do I cancel or change my pledge?While a project is still live you can cancel your pledge by visiting the project page and clicking the "Manage your pledge” button on the right-hand side. From there, click "Cancel Pledge" next to the "Change your pledge" link.Remember, a pledge can only be cancelled while a project is live. If the project has ended and pledge collection has started it is no longer possible to cancel.Note: It is not possible to decrease or cancel a pledge during the last 24 hours of the campaign if doing so would drop the project below its funding goal.Keeping our unique look and trademark form factor was integral to our campaign when designing the NEO 3 & AEOS 2 lights. Our current users of the NEO, NEO 2 & AEOS LED lights can use many of their current accessories with the NEO 3 and AEOS 2. What’s more, new-to-brand backers in this campaign will have immediate access to over 30 accessories at discounted prices in our add-on menu, further advancing the versatility and capabilities of the NEO 3 and AEOS 2.That's right, worldwide FREE Shipping - During our continued research, we are fully aware of the temporary rise in global shipping costs, delays at ports and reduced container availability. This had originally placed a lot of constraints on the team, however with a lot of hard work and determination over the last 6 months and to show all our customers and backers our appreciation for the continued support, we will be committing to shipping all pledges and add-ons for FREE* worldwide!*VAT, GST, Taxes & Duty – As we will be shipping pledges from locations within the US and UK, these pledges will not be liable for importation taxes and duty. Any pledges received from within the EU and other locations outside of the US and UK will be liable for local duty, taxes or GST and any other importation costs and will be the responsibility of the backerRotolight is a pioneering British technology company specialising in creating award-winning LED lighting products for photographers and filmmakers. Known for constantly pushing the boundaries of innovation, Rotolight strives to create products that provide unique tools to image makers, allowing them to realise their creative vision and aspirations with ease.Leading where others follow, Rotolight has developed countless industry-first features and has been widely recognised with numerous global awards and accolades for its innovation, technical excellence, and product quality. As a family business, Rotolight has a unique long-term outlook that allows us to focus on continually investing in delivering outstanding quality products and a totally unique customer experience.Ever since the launch of our NEO 2 and AEOS around 4 years ago, we’ve been working closely with our customers, Masters of Light and independent lighting specialists to bring you a whole new line-up of products brimming with technology. We knew that the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 had to be ground-breaking. We set about reviewing all the feedback we received, as well as reading through online customer reviews, to better understand what changes you wanted to see.Rotolight TitanWe also decided to take a closer look at our $5000 Titan technology - what if we could fit some of that incredible technology into a consumer light? With our award-winning team behind the wheel, we were able to do just that with the NEO 3 and the AEOS 2, future-proofing them for our backers and customers.Creating an app simple enough to use, yet intuitive. The Rotolight app truly did start out as a sketch that brought to life the first Wi-Fi and Bluetooth® controllable on-camera lights from Rotollight.  After all the design and hard work, there is nothing more exciting than witnessing new products being switched on for the first time! We get the same buzz every time and it never gets old. Here we share that memory with our backers in these raw and candid videos where you get to see the features of the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 come to life.We love content, pure and simple. Below you’ll find all the links to our social channels - head on over today and join our community of creative followers. We update our pages regularly with videos, offers, workshops and tips and tricks for using Rotolight products. We especially love to see the creativity and quality our customers produce when using our products, so don’t hesitate to share your work with us.If you are looking for our latest press folder, follow the link below which contains images, logo’s, PR release and product information for the NEO 3 and AEOS 2This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: UFactory
record.Title: UFACTORY Lite 6 – Most Affordable Collaborative Robot Arm
record.Text: Nowadays, robots are widely used in big factories. They are expensive, large and heavy, they mainly work on heavy-duty tasks. However, few of them are designed for light and budget-friendly tasks. This raises a real challenge in keeping quick ROI in these tasks by using robots. A durable and affordable robot arm with industrial-grade accessories is key.Designed with six axes, Lite 6 is perfect for simple, repetitive and monotonous tasks. It provides the speed and precision manufacturers require, meanwhile ensures quality and accuracy. The flexibility of Lite 6 allows manufacturers to optimize workflow, increase productivity, reduce floor space utilization, lower production costs. Lite 6 helps researchers automate manual tasks and free up time to focus on more significant or pressing tasks. By using Lite 6 in lab automation, accidents and human error can be prevented. And above all, it can be customized easily to meet a lab’s needs.By taking advantage of open source SDKs, robotics research will be much easier. Moreover, in order to make robot integration relatively intuitive and smooth, we are working on ROS/ROS2 seriously.Lite 6 is extremely versatile, it is able to gently test any type of touchscreen without leaving any traces or damage, and helps our clients to provide consumers with flawless products.Lite 6 is lightweight and small, which is perfectly fit for space-saving applications such as robot bar, coffee machine. With a 500mm/s max speed and 1kg payload, it balances the efficiency and cost, especially for commercial applications.Compared with manual loading and unloading, Lite 6 drastically improves uptime. In addition, it's more accurate and repeatable, which increases the quality of parts produced, reduces the amount of human error in the machining process, maximizes throughput, and minimizes wasted materials and time. All new cost-effective actuators. The harmonic drive is a must to guarantee the repeatability of the robot, but it is also very expensive. So Lite 6 has hybrid actuators design to balance the cost and performance. In our design, the harmonic drives are for the high torque joints and direct drive motors are for the rest.Moreover, crafted with carbon fiber, Lite 6 is 50% much lighter than other robots, which significantly helps to increase the payload up to 1kg.Lite 6 is designed for 24/7 continually working. Combined with industrial-grade harmonic drive, actuators can execute the commands day and night without stopping.The built-in 16-bit absolute encoder and FOC control algorithm, the customized brushless motor creates smooth movement, high torque capability, and delivers excellent repeatability.No need to spend additional money on training and software, Lite 6 offers users free software - UFACTORY Studio, even non-specialists can run it in 2 hours. Users can simply drag and drop to program and control it by a graphical user interface, which saves training cost and operation time. Users can teach the robot motions and positions easily and quickly, greatly simplifying robot programming, users can also program Lite 6 with Python, ROS, and C++. In addition, UFACTORY offers a free Simulator, users can try Lite 6 for free before they buy it.Taking advantage of the built-in pump design, the pneumatic gripper works perfectly without external air tubes outside. Equipped with a linear bearing, it provides a stable and smooth grasp all the time.Built-in pump design makes the internal wiring possible. And brushless pump motor enables the long-term lifetime for 24/7 continually working. Moreover, the air pressure sensor gives real-time feedback of pressure which makes drop-off detection possible.Thanks to a variety of I/O and communication interfaces, Lite 6 has excellent compatibility and extensibility, it can be integrated into various applications.Lite 6 is user-friendly and pre-calibrated, which enables users to apply it to any process and in a different setting without professional training.Lite 6 is a slave component rather than a master, thus it can be integrated easily via any computer or PLCCompared to other robot arms in the market, Lite 6 is not only economical but also very excellent in performance.You can also know the differences between Lite 6 and xArm 6. Lite 6 SDK includes Python SDK, ROS/ROS2 SDK, and C++ SDK. A fully upgradable software platform that can grow in capabilities to make it a lasting and worthy long-term investment.Lite 6 Studio supports multiple platforms that enable you to control it not only with PC but also with your iPad or Android devices.We are a group of makers who make cool robots. Back in 2014, we created the world's first desktop robot arm, the uArm, and successfully funded it on Kickstarter. Last year, we made the uArm Swift campaign on Indiegogo and it becomes the most funded robot campaign in history. In 2018, we created xArm and successfully founded it on Kickstarter.Our mission is to boost the digital fabrication industry, help human labor released from repetitive tasks, and focus on creative & more important work to create a better world to live in. And, we can have more time to enjoy wonderful life :)This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.

record.Creator: Makeblock
record.Title: xTool M1 - Mini but Powerful Hybrid Laser & Blade Cutter
record.Text: Normally, a laser cutter can perform very well on many materials such as wood, metal and glass. However, for some soft materials such as vinyl, which can be used for DIY T-shirts, sign making, logos and more, a blade cutter is preferable to avoid the burnt edge, discoloration and toxic fumes generated by laser cutting.With xTool M1 which has both the laser and blade heads, you don’t have to waver between a laser cutter or a blade cutter (or breaking the bank to buy both). Your ideas can be realized on just one machine.To achieve adequately strong laser cutting and engraving power at an affordable price, we chose a diode laser instead of CO2 laser.For xTool offical materials, xTool M1 software auto-recognizes materials and recommends default parameters for cutting and engraving accordingly.Now, during our Kickstarter campaign, we are offering the best-ever price of xTool M1 starting from only $699. That is less than 1/5 of Glowforge's price, but still gives you about 80% of the functions of Glowforge Plus + Cricut Maker 3.The Rotary Attachment unlocks 360° engraving for cylindrical objects from 3mm to 70mm in diameter (with the raisers provided), with which you can customize a wide range of cylindrical materials.*If you keep raising the machine, you can engrave objects in larger diameter.Currently, due to worldwide supply chain issues, shipping prices are heavily inflated. To ensure you get the best possible rate, we will charge the shipping fee AFTER the campaign, closer to the shipping date.Our current estimate is that shipping will be around 10%~18% of the order price, including tax & duties for most regions (Around 15%~25% for Australia, New Zealand and Norway). We can promise that the shipping fee we charge will be no more than 18% of most regions (no more than 25% for Australia, New Zealand and Norway), we will cover the excess part if it costs more. Note:The safety class of xTool M1 is Class I (FDA Certified). We are on track to receive FDA/FCC/CE-LVD/EMC certifications before March 2022, which are necessary for delivering our products to the US, EU and most areas in the world.Makeblock got its humble beginnings eight years ago. We launched our first project on Kickstarter, and thanks to the amazing Kickstarter community and our backers, we've been able to grow our business to where it is today - a company with over 300 employees...From "one robot per child", our mission never altered. We continue to empower kids to enjoy the fun of creating.This time around, with xTool M1, we want to bring powerful tools to everyone who enjoys doing things themselves. This first-of-its-kind machine is low-barrier, compact, and affordable.The most important thing is not that we're presenting the world's first desktop hybrid laser & blade cutter and engraver, but that we always aimed to "WOW" our backers with our products.We’re so grateful for all of your support along the way. Thanks for helping us bring xTool M1 to life.What is xTool?xTool is part of Makeblock, a world-renowned coding robot manufacturer & education solution provider. Our brand’s story started with a lot of love and a little inspiration (“How can we make it easier and safer for kids to enjoy creating?”). The brand concept of xTool was born in 2018 and we launched the first xTool LaserBox in 2019. From there, our mission has been to help people turn their creativity into reality (and have fun doing it)!We are also proud of our industrial design and have won numerous awards.We do not brag about ourselves but enjoy a word-of-mouth reputation.We were named one of  ProductHype's  Best Kickstarter Projects of 2021.This project is boosted by BackerCrew.

record.Creator: Oumua Inc
record.Title: Oumua: AI Powered Personal Breathing Trainer
record.Text:
This is Oumua!Your lightweight and portable breathing trainer designed to increase your endurance, lung performance, and improve your overall well-being in under 10 minutes a day.To preorder and make this breathing perfection a reality, click Back This Project — or read on!Do you also find yourself running out of breath?
  It might be from a trip up the stairs… an intense workout… or even getting up too fast! No matter our fitness levels, breathing is always one of the biggest factors holding us back. And while traditional breathing practices do work, sessions can be long and may take years to master. On the other hand, the current breathing trainers all share similar problems:Until now… Oumua was born out of the search for the perfect respiratory muscle training device for everyday use.We want you to also benefit from breathing exercises — not just the pro athletes and yoga gurus!Oumua combines a healthy breathing habit, with a perfectly balanced user experience and AI-powered technology - with stunning space-inspired aesthetics. Breathing perfection — at your fingertips.Oumua's separated airflow channels allow for faster-exercising results while helping you avoid common mistakes and respiratory imbalances.Current sports science agrees with breathing practices and traditions dating back thousands of years, that inhalation and exhalation resistance training should be separated, as inspiration and expiration are commonly perceived as two different processes.

   Exercising both inhalation and exhalation at the same time is likely to exacerbate the existing imbalances, causing training overlaps and rollbacks. Oumua was designed with this in mind. 
   Oumua has two separate airflow channels that allow you to perform the inhalation and exhalation movements separately. By gradually tailoring the resistance levels, you’ll progress faster, and avoid common exercising mistakes from other practices.All it takes to gain control of your breathing are 5 to 7 mins of inhalation training in the morning, and 5 to 7 mins of exhalation resistance training in the evening. Experience a noticeable increase in your breathing performance with just these 10 to 15 minutes of daily exercising.Oumua's patent-pending Gradient resistance system guides you through 6 resistance levels, based on your goals, from general well-being to athletic improvement.Nothing should hold you back from strengthening your breathing experience. That’s why a slight recess in the center makes it easy to switch between the resistance levels, even in the dark, for people with low muscle tone, and if you have compromised fine motor skills. Oumua also “clicks” every time you change the resistance level — an intuitive and user-friendly feature for seniors and users with poor eyesight.Oumua provides resistance levels tailored for both general well-being and athletic improvement, starting from moderately low 8 сm (3.14 inches) of H2O resistance - all the way up to really hard-to-crack 60 сm (23.6 inches), something even trained athletes will find challenging.Oumua Pro is the world’s first personal breathing trainer with a dedicated app powered by Artificial Intelligence. By analyzing your parameters such as age, weight, and athletic condition, the app guides you through each training session, giving live suggestions, exercise compliance, and tracking progress online.With Oumua App, you can measure your lung capacity, adjust training sessions based on compliance, get new training programs, and compete with other users during similar training sessions.It tailors resistance levels and gets performance guidance, helping you avoid respiratory imbalances, overlaps, and pullbacks.The breathing training sessions are built on several core principles like periodization (micro/meso/macro cycles), dynamic resistance increase, and AI-guided conditioning. You can choose (and switch) between 3 main areas:Ready to level up your breathing?Pre-order Oumua Pro, and select the color (Belize, Rosewood, Azure, Onyx, Pearl, Shamrock, Indigo and add-on colors Blush and Charcoal) via a backer survey after the campaign ends.Click Back This Project and select your Pledge Tier.Pre-order now and pay when the campaign ends.Oumua exterior is a reference to nature’s phenomenon, the Nautilus Pompilius, whose shell is a perfect representation of the golden spiral.Its minimalist exterior reduces undue attention, and there are no added vibrations, sounds, or sensations — it's handily sized, user-friendly, intuitive and discrete.The name is inspired by Oumuamua — Hawaiian for “first distant messenger” — and the name given to the first known interstellar object to make it into our Solar System. What can we say, we love space :)Resistance modes "1" and "2" are optimal for the breathing practice novices, seniors, and users with compromised respiratory function; "3" and "4" offer a moderately challenging training experience that will fit most users; "5" and "6" are suitable for trained breathing practitioners and athletes.Oumua height is 4.9 inches, the switcher is 1.6 inches wide, the mouthpieces are 0.4 inch; the depth is 0.9 inch. Oumua Pro weighs 2.9 oz.Oumua is engineering and user experience, perfected — it is hand-sized, lightweight, intuitive, user-friendly, and durable. The assembly process is quick and completely fault-proof.

record.Creator: Pivo
record.Title: Pivo Pod X: Your pocket-sized cameraman
record.Text: Upgrade your Auto Tracking with smart real-time adjustments of your videos made by your Pod X.With Cinematic AI, Pivo will automatically zoom in and out so you're always in frame, while also adjusting your lighting for the perfect transitions no matter where you shoot. Inject Deep Color Fusion into your content. Never settle for less-than-vibrant colors for your videos with Pod X.Set up your Pod X to track ANY target you want. With expertly engineered motion stabilization and faster tracking speed capabilities, Pod X smooths out shaky footage for guaranteed high quality videos.All-new Composition AI automatically analyzes the environment to capture the right lighting, colors, angles and focus for your photos. Get the perfect shot every time.Pod X just knows how to get you in frame and your lighting just right. With Composition AI, you'll be able to take your own shots independently and without worry. Awesome shots guaranteed. With facial & emotional recognition, Pod X will learn the environment and determine when to snap candid images. Go ahead, enjoy yourself. Authentic moments look great on you.Move & groove during your video calls by bringing Auto Tracking to them with the ultimate device to make you and your caller feel more connected at a distance than ever before.Multiply yourself on the move with Clone Trail or jump into another dimension with Magic Edge. Your content never looked cooler!See your world through Pod X's eyes with an all-new extended vertical and horizontal range for the ultimate capturing results.The tiny but mighty Pivo Microphone allows handsfree amazing sound recording up to 60 meters from the Pod. Clip and go! It works with/without the Pod.Check out all the ways our users are already getting creative with the previous Pivo generation.We aim to recognize the diverse need to create and communicate, and make sure this is not limited by the capabilities of the technology at hand. We work hard to make things easy for everyone to capture, share & connect their real world experiences to the digital world.

record.Creator: VONMÄHLEN
record.Title: High Six - The Most Compact 6in1 Fast Charging Cable
record.Text: The smallest and most portable charging cable you could ever have. The 6 in 1 charging cable has all the standard connectors to charge whatever device you are using to whatever power source you have available. The connectors and adapters slip nicely into it’s stylish metal casing to protect them on your key chain.There are magnets as a holding place for your adapters when the other connectors are in use. The main cable is USB-C to USB-C to support fast charging and data transfer. All of these features wrapped into an elegant accessory for your keychain.High Six is available in four stylish colors: Black, All Black, Silver and Rose GoldMaking on-the-go charging easier with one compact accessory on your key chain.The new design is even smaller than High Five. Lighter, smaller, and more secure. It is the direct successor of High Five. During the design process, we incorporated the feedback we received from the user experience.For example: The cap for High Five, proved it was not capable of surviving the daily wear and tear on a key chain and often got lost. That is why High Six has a sleek metal case to secure the adapters in place as you go about your day.

record.Creator: Clemens
record.Title: The Solar System in a Sphere - True to Scale
record.Text: Another representation of our Solar System? There are hundreds of books/websites about it and everybody knows our 9 planets and how they are arranged, right? After all, we should have learned that in school...Many of us still remember the mnemonic: "My Very Educated Mother Just Served Us Nine Pizzas" or as we say here in Germany: "Mein Vater Erklärt Mir Jeden Sonntag Unsere Neun Planeten".   With this help, many of us can at least list the planets correctly...Mars, Venus, Earth, Mercury, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto, right? Almost! Pluto was assumed to be a planet but does not identify itself as such anymore and Mercury comes before Mars,  but the most crucial fact is:That most of us never understood the true differences in size and distances between the planets, because most representations are not true to scale.With a strong laser, we shoot tiny cracks into the glass. We laser our Sun + 9 Planets: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, Uranus, and the hypothetical Planet 9 into our famous Spheres. We also want to picture the 9 Moons: Ganymede, Callisto, Io, Europa, Rhea, Titan, Iapetus, Triton, and our Moon Moon (Luna).The Sun in our Sphere will be 4cm, the largest Planet 4mm, and the smallest Moon 0.1mm, which is barely visible to the naked eye and even more difficult for our camera.Not everyone might be a fan of our scaled representation of the Solar System, so we consider offering different versions of it We also want to offer a 9 Planet Cube Set, containing a planet each with a size of 3x3x3cm.You can try to place these small cubes at the right distances to the Solar Sphere, but this might be more difficult than thought. Why?Because although they are so small in our Sphere you can barely see Earth, they would be ridiculously far away. There is probably no one in the world who could throw our Neptune regarding our Sphere onto its Orbit.  Even Saturn is challenging but doable. Challenge accepted? After what felt like eons of searching for a good LED base that is stylish, functional, and affordable, we finally found one. Of course, the bases we've offered so far work flawlessly and even wirelessly, but they lack some features and don't completely light up our models the way I want them to.With the new LED bar, our spheres and small cubes can be illuminated perfectly. You can control it via smartphone and create your own color schemes. You can even pair the LED with any TV so that the colors match the TV program.  I am very delighted.As in our previous campaigns, we would like to present many interesting facts about our models in our updates. Maybe we will also make a small booklet again.For example: Did you know that the ice giants Neptune and Uranus are not cold at all? The atmosphere consists of a hydrogen-methane mixture that becomes a hot fluid due to the enormous pressure. Further inside, phenomena like hail and even whole icebergs of Diamonds are suspected. But then why are they called ice giants?  Find out in our updates!But we also want to write about the habitable zones, the moons, and the immense distance the planets are apart.Within the campaign, we will explain the differences between our planned models and the different shapes and sizes of our products. Even though our Star Constellation Sphere with its 5068 stars and 88 constellations already fits really nicely into the series......the Solar System Sphere with its Sun, Planets, and Moons truly completes our Universe Sphere series. Thus, the individual lasered points symbolize either planets or Moons, Stars, or entire Galaxies, depending on the Sphere.We will design Solar System Coasters and hand them out to our first 1000 backers for free. There will be a set of 2x10 coasters - Our Sun + 9 Planets,  so you can also play memory.  We got some more ideas, so stay tuned!All products can also be added and purchased via our add-on store, such as old and new products, LED Bases, and the Early Bird Planet Coasters. In campaigns from other creators, we have seen that shipping fees are often collected after the campaign. This has several advantages for you and us and therefore we decided to do the same. But don't worry, because of the many previous campaigns we made, we can estimate the maximum costs very well, so there are no nasty surprises waiting for you.Advantages: Meanwhile, we have a professional fulfillment partner, but in the beginning, I still packed 4000 packages by hand with my father and my brother. It all started with me, Clemens, and my wedding actually. I had just graduated as a mechanical engineer when I pitched the idea of my Universe Sphere on Kickstarter to earn some money for my wedding. The campaign was a complete success and motivated me to design more such models. From this, the company CinkS labs was born and meanwhile, we have a couple of employees who support me with my projects.Our first priority is our scientific approach. We´re conducting adequate research, we enlist the help of relevant scientists and try to figure out what will work best for our glass pieces. For the planets as an example, the difficulty is to not just laser a white ball into the glass but to make the structure visible.We design and model our 3D images to laser-etch them into the glass with the highest precision. You can hardly see the microscopic dots with the naked eye. The dots are in fact not air bubbles, as many people think, but tiny cracks that reflect light differently at varying angles due to their elongated shape. These are created by heat pulses emitted by a focused laser several thousand times per second.We made a short video of our laser process for a previous campaign, "The Microcosm in a Sphere".Unfortunately, we do have copycats, but with stark differences in quality.Our original Spheres offer solid optical grade glass with high resolution, scientifically accurate models and are available in 8cm as well as an unreached above average size of 15cm.  Made in - and shipped from Germany.This timeline represents something like the bad case.
