We know that worldwide shipments have been and will continue to be severely delayed due to various circumstances (Covid, Evergreen, Christmas etc.), thus we would rather make a conservative estimate so that you will be pleasantly surprised if we deliver sooner rather than disappointed if your spheres won't arrive in a couple of months. 2021/11/08 2021/11/01We are proud to support a former employee. He is starting his own journey soon, with the board game he worked on for four years now together with a friend: AUREA - Legacy of the Yatary.  It´s a race for the resources of an entire Galaxy. Diplomacy, Trade, Research, War...how will you play, how will you shine and how will you perish? Join his campaign and find out. We want to add a game segment to every order. Keep it to support the campaign and get a discount... or use it as a glass coaster, it´s up to you. But most important:Follow them: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/strgaltentf/aurea-legacy-of-the-yataryMore Infos:https://www.huginn-muninn.games/

record.Creator: SPEEDIANCE
record.Title: Speediance: Personal All-In-One Home Gym & Workout Coach
record.Text: Speediance is an all-in-one AI-powered home gym with four power modes, 21.5-inch touch screen, and smart accessories to target different muscle groups. This space-saving, foldable home gym eliminates costly, bulky equipment and helps you efficiently achieve your fitness goals!Thank you for all the support you've been giving us! We are upgrading the subscription from 3-year free to Lifetime FREE for all Kickstarter backers!!!If you have any questions regarding the product, how to buy it, or anything else, please click the buttons below to message us or send us an email.👇 We're always here to help! We randomly invited people in a gym to try our product.Real-life trial scenarios during Guangzhou International Fitness Expo 2021 & The 10th Personal Trainer Festival of South China held from Nov. 15th to 17th, 2021.No installation or wall mounting is required, Speediance is ready to use right out of the box. Its compact, foldable design takes up only 3.2 ft² when folded and not in use. This space-saving design fits in any home for fast, effective workouts.A full set of smart accessories allow you to get a full-body workout without the hassle of changing machines. Simply add the preferred accessory to target specific muscle groups.With Speediance, you can lift up to 220 pounds of digital weights and the weight can be easily adjusted in 1 pound increments to optimize resistance for different exercises.Looking for a new total-body fitness routine? Try a workout which exercises up to 86% of your muscles at once. Speediance has a specially designed NEW accessory for you! You don't have to be a competitive athlete to reap the benefits of rowing. Thanks to the rowing bench accessory, Speediance can easily transform into a rowing machine for the ultimate workout.Speediance is a money saving solution to home fitness that combines the effects of multiple workout machines into one compact easy to use design.And SPEEDIANCE comes with four attachment loops so you can use it with your own favorite workout accessories!Speediance is not limited to strength training. The system includes a variety of workout programs developed by experts including shaping, weight loss, yoga, stretching and more for specialized full-body fitness. Find the program that works best for you.To help you optimize your training plan, Speediance automatically tracks every rep, set, range of motion, power and time under tension. You can track the data in real time and see your progress and the results of your workouts at a glance.Speediance intelligently records and analyzes your exercise performance and recommends training tips and workout programs led by experts to help you meet your fitness goals more efficiently and scientifically. Save time and get in shape faster!Say goodbye to sports injuries! Our patented Spotter Mode will automatically reduce the weight resistance when it detects that you reach your limit. This safety feature can prevent serious injury and is perfect for working out alone.Speediance cares for each member of your family. Switch between different accounts to access personal training records, tips, courses and exercise programs for different family members or other people in the household.Noise complaints from your neighbors caused by free weights hitting the ground or noisy exercise machines are a thing of the past. Speediance knows how to keep the noise down.The story starts with a retrofitted hub motor solution and a group of youngsters who want to use the power of technology to help everyone keep fit and healthy. To realize this goal, we have gathered fitness, hardware, and software experts with years of experience in the industry. Our mission is to create a way for people to get fit at home without going to the gym or investing in expensive and redundant exercise gear. Instead, people can start strength training in a simple and effective way at home whenever they choose with our innovative all-in-one fitness solution.After four iterations and countless hours of testing and optimization, we have achieved success. We proudly present to you the final result of our efforts, the Speediance Gym Monster. Thank you for your support. Early Concept Drawings of the Speediance All-In-One Fitness System Earlier versions of the Speediance All-In-One Fitness SystemY Factors InnoTech Co., Ltd is a company that supports the global marketing of innovative brand products. As a Speediance partner, We are in charge of marketing and promotion of Speediance Gym Monster.

record.Creator: Seesaw
record.Title: DOCKCASE: The World's First USB-C High Speed Smart Hub
record.Text: Compared with the previous generation DOCKCASE Visual Dock, the user interface of the new generation DOCKCASE Smart Hub(8 in 1) is newly upgraded to the DockOS operating system, which is the world's first hub operating system. The previous Visual Dock can only display real-time data information of the connected peripherals. On the new Smart Hub with DockOS, you can also choose the working mode of different interfaces, customize the working parameters, etc. to realize human-machine interaction. The DockOS is upgradable to make it compatible with more devices.The newly added D-Key button is used for DockOS system operation to bring a more user-friendly experience, which is more convenient for personalized use and parameter settings than the previous pinhole. The previous Visual Dock used traditional heat insulation methods to prevent the internal temperature of the chip from being conducted to the outside as much as possible, which may cause loss of the internal chip after a long time of use. The new Smart Hub has a built-in full-chip cooling system and is equipped with a high-performance silent fan, which can preset different values to turn on the heat dissipation to ensure stable work.The product size upgrade brings a larger screen, you can read data more easily and clearly.Compared with the previous Visual Dock(7 in 1), two USB 3.2 ports are added to meet the people's demand for USB-A ports on the new Smart Hub. Meanwhile, as customer demand for USB-C port increases, we upgrade the card reader slot to a data USB-C port to take care of both card reader and other USB-C port equipment.One button, multiple identities. D-Key, which allows you to control various functions, switch operation modes and rotate the screen intelligently to adapt to different working scenarios.No longer worry about the visual experience. The innovation of HDMI technology brings a revolutionary change, two switchable HDMI modes redefines how real 4K@60Hz can be.The DockCase Smart Hub can convert 4K@30Hz host to 4K@60Hz output in the Extreme Mode, which the 4K@60Hz compatibility improved by 92% compared with traditional hubs, bringing you a smooth and extreme HD experience.You can also choose the Balance Mode to realize the coexistence of 4K@60Hz and 10Gbps USB data transmission. In addition, 0-8 signal levels are available to stabilize HDMI output when screen flicking, black screen or other situations.Occupied Power of Hub: 5-25W can be selected to adapt to different power requirements, 5W can make the computer charge at the fastest speed (95W), and 25W can be connected to high-power devices such as external HDD and portable SSD. The built-in 24V CC high voltage protection protects the motherboard from burnt out,  so you can use it with confidence.What's more, the NS-Switch option allows you to enjoy an immersive experience whenever you want to play games on a bigger screen.Five stable data USB ports including the data USB-C port are adequate to the simultaneous use of multiple peripherals. Three USB3.2 Gen 2 ports transferring data at blazing speeds up to 10Gbps in no time.It only takes 2 seconds to transfer a 2G movie in the High-Load Mode，Each data USB port can supply power up to 7.5W, which provides stable fast charging and data transmission at the same time.Two additional USBA 2.0 ports make it easy to use traditional peripherals such as keyboard, mouse to save energy in the Eco Mode(the Eco Mode is available for subsequent upgrades).Exclusive algorithm control, intelligent display of network connection speed. Gigabit Ethernet port supports 10/100/1000Mbps network speeds, which can provide a full play to the performance of the network, ensure connection instantly and smoothly for you to online gaming, working, video streaming, anywhere in a flash.When using an ordinary hub, it is easy to heat up, which will cause unstable data transmission, performance degradation, even security risks, etc.When using the Smart Hub, you don't have to worry about these problems. The full-chip turbo cooling system equipped with a high-performance silent fan, 65-85℃ optional fan control allows the system to automatically start the fan to cool down to ensure that the internal temperature is within the safer range for healthy work. Upgradable firmware optimizes your Smart Hub continuously and is compatible with more devices. DOCKCASE has been paying attention to provide you with a more user-friendly experience so that you will always be in a beautiful mood every day! The detachable cable is convenient for you to change cables in different usage scenarios, and it also solves the problem that the hub cannot be used due to the damage of the cable, saving unnecessary expenses.The unibody design with the zinc alloy shield provides better protection for the internal components, and at the same time, you can feel the ultimate sleek and ice-cold texture when held in your hand.This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.If the backer fails to pay the customs clearance fee incurred in receiving the goods, resulting in the return of the goods, we will deduct it from the backer's crowdfunding amount.The following video demonstrated a fully functional pre-production DockCase Smart Hub with all ports working. DockCase by Seesaw was founded in 2016 and by a team of excellent engineers and designers motivated by making the lives of USB-C device users easier and hassle-free. We have successfully launched three campaigns from August 2017 to January 2021, over 4,000 backers on Kickstarter were delivered. Influential media, including CNET, Business Insider, and Unbox Therapy, highly recommended our products.   The concept of “making things easier and improving your efficiency” leads us to the release of the Smart Hub to show all the detailed info of the connections that allows you to master ahead and achieve the best possible performance.

record.Creator: Oliver New
record.Title: Pinsta Instant Camera - Micro Darkroom and Negative Enlarger
record.Text: Pinsta is a camera which can shoot directly onto positive 4x5 inch photographic paper. It develops internally, and can be used on the go, wherever you are and whenever you like for creating and sharing real analogue prints! Pinsta is also a mini-enlarger! For those already shooting film and wanting to get into analogue printing without the expense or need for a darkroom, Pinsta is here to help! Simply load your negatives into the internal enlargement slide and you can enlarge them onto 4x5 inch paper. You can even create prints with fun and creative frames and overlays using Pinsta's ingenious internal slide system.Anyone can use Pinsta to produce photographic prints of their own, at home or out and about and without any further investment in darkroom equipment besides a dark bag for loading your next shot. Nothing beats the feeling of mounting your very own real photographic prints around your home.The sense of wonder you get upon revealing your first perfectly exposed photographic print can't be matched! You will learn from the prints you get wrong, and you will treasure the prints that you get right. This is raw photography, it's really good fun, it draws a crowd and it's a little bit of magic! Find out what Mike Padua thinks of Pinsta Camera:Loading paper, taking photos and developing your Prints:Loading your Pinsta camera couldn't be easier, simply put your camera and your photographic paper into the dark/changing bag to load a new piece of paper into the camera back. To take a shot simply position your camera and open the shutter. Typical exposure on a sunny day is 2 minutes.Your prints are developed with regular photographic chemistry and it is inserted and extracted with syringes.  When you are developing the camera body is your darkroom and your camera back becomes your developing tray!Developing of black and white paper is a simple process so you can't really get it wrong. Develop for 1 minute, fix for 30 seconds to 4 minutes (depending on the paper) and add water to wash before revealing your amazing photographic print. A set of syringes will develop around 4-5 shots depending on which photographic paper you are using. The syringes are then replenished with your own chemistry once it is exhausted. Enlarging negatives:Enlarging negatives with Pinsta is very much like taking a photo except that you position the negative inside the camera in-between the pinhole and the photographic paper using Pinsta's unique negative enlargement slide.You then rotate the shutter disc to position the diffuser spot over the pinhole. Illuminating this spot with a bright light source transposes your negative onto the photographic paper inside. Your enlargement is then developed as if you had taken a photo. Using the Light Baffle/Filter slide to customize images:The internal light baffle prevents light from bouncing off the camera walls and fogging your image but it can also be used as a filter slide and for customising your photos or enlargements with overlays, textures, double exposures or shaped exposures..  There is a huge amount of creative potential with this slide. Available add-ons/accessories:£30K - Laser cut Pinsta keyring: UNLOCKED!If we reach £30,000 we will include a Pinsta laser cut keyring with each Pinsta Kit£50K - Laser cut Pinsta keyring with print removal suction cup:  UNLOCKED!If we reach £50k then the keyring add on becomes a handy print removal tool! This makes removing your developed prints much easier!£100K - 4x5 Magnetic frame included for each backer!If we reach £100k we will include a free 4x5 Magnetic Display/Drying frame with each Pinsta Kit.£200K - Pinsta community forum will be created:If we reach £200k we will create an online forum for people to share their works, ideas and techniques. We expect many people will invent new ways of using Pinsta and we think a forum would be a nice melting pot for creators to get together. We may even hold annual awards events later on.£N/A - Interchangeable pinhole system: NOW INCLUDED!at £300k we can add an interchangeable pinhole system, this will make Pinsta much more versatile going into the future. We believe we can vastly improve the enlarging quality of Pinsta if the Pinhole is modular and it will also enable us to potentially make larger backs for Pinsta such as 5x7 or 10x8 as Pinsta's current pinhole would be too small for these formats.£500K - Company dedicated focus on Pinsta: £500k would mean we can dedicate a large amount of our resources onto Pinsta and related upgrades in the future. We may even decide to focus the company on Pinsta entirely.We have lots of plans for Pinsta and our hope is that it becomes a mainstay in the photography world. We see Pinsta not only as great fun for the hobbyist and an excellent tool for artistic creators but also as a brilliant learning tool. Our hope is that Pinsta cameras will be used all over the world in education and in recreational photography workshops alike. Future accessories for Pinsta might include:We also expect that we can improve the enlarging sharpness of Pinsta in the future by offering a body extension section and a smaller pinhole.I don't know about traditional processes and I'm a bit confused!? How exactly does it work?Don't worry, Pinsta couldn't be easier to use. We will be providing full detailed instructions in nice and easy to understand videos which start at the very basics of taking photos with Pinsta. Some of the more advanced features can then be learned over time which is what makes Pinsta a wonderful learning tool.How does Pinsta achieve a positive image?Pinsta can be used with HARMAN direct positive paper which is available in 4x5 size. Using this paper means that your prints come out positive with a normal develop and fix process. Magic!What do I need to use Pinsta?In order to take photographs with Pinsta all you need is one of our kits and a film changing bag which are available as an add on. For paper and chemistry we recommend and have tested HARMAN 4x5 direct positive paper, ILFORD multigrade developer and ILFORD rapid fixer. If you wish to enlarge negatives with Pinsta you will also need the negative enlargement slide (available as an add on) and we recommend and have tested ILFORD 4x5 multigrade RC delux (negative) paper. In addition you will need a nice bright light source, almost any light source will do but we recommend something like an ultra bright LED torch that can be positioned closely to the diffuser spot as this will reduce exposure times. Ideally it should be plugged-in to the mains since this gives more consistent results than relying on battery power. Most rechargeable units can remain plugged in whilst in use. Paper and chemistry are available as a kit at a discounted price for Pinsta backers at www.firstcallphotographic.com. We will provide backers with a discount code once the campaign has ended. Can I use different processes in Pinsta?You can. Pinsta can be used however you want. If you have a different chemical process or medium you would like to use then Pinsta should be compatible with most things. Extra syringes are available if you have additional processes such as chemical reversal etc. We are very excited to see how people use Pinsta in different creative ways!How does Pinsta extract chemistry through that hole?The chemistry hole in the side of Pinsta leads to a tube which goes down to the tray. The chemistry is delivered and picked up right next to your photographic paper, it doesn't squirt in opposite the hole on the outer body..Do I have to keep buying chemistry syringes?No you refill the syringes that come with the kit. This also saves on plastic waste associated with instant camera cartridge systems. They should last indefinitely and will be provided with coloured stickers so that you can identify which syringe is for which chemistry. Is there much cleaning in-between each use?There is a little wiping required but not much. ABS is quite water repellent and most of the liquids are extracted by syringe. We recommend taking out a towel with you. A quick wipe of the bottom 20mm's of the camera body and the tray and it's ready to go again. Agitation is a gentle process and chemistry doesn't splash around inside if you are doing it correctly.Can I shoot film in Pinsta?You can shoot 4x5 film no problems! It is possible for more advanced users to shoot 35mm or 120 film by cutting it and putting it into the internal enlargement slide. This would probably require a darkroom though as it would prove fiddly in a dark bag. We do plan to release film backs for Pinsta at a later date along with many other accessories and add-ons.What are typical Exposure times of Pinsta?Pinsta is rated at F266 and Ilford direct positive paper is ISO 1-3. Typical exposure times are: Very sunny 1-2 minutes, Sunny 2-4 minutes, Sunny with clouds 4-12 minutes, Cloudy 12-30 minutes, Dull daylight conditions 40min-4hours. Indoor conditions can vary massively depending on lighting etc.Enlargement exposure times vary depending on your light source and the particular type of negatives you are using between 1 minute and 60 minutes. Black and white negative enlarge much faster than colour negatives.Is Pinsta expensive to use?The cost of the chemistry will come in at pennies per shot. Ilford direct positive paper rrp is £1 or $1.39 per sheet. Ilford Multigrade (negative) paper rrp is £0.53p or $0.73 per sheet. Polariod 600's rrp by comparison is £2.50 or $3.47 per shot and provides much smaller photos. (costs based on UK prices and may vary depending on your location/availability).Paper and chemistry are available as a kit at a discounted price for Pinsta backers at www.firstcallphotographic.com. We will provide backers with a discount code once the campaign has ended. Are my negatives safe inside Pinsta?The internal negative slide has been designed to protect your negatives from any splashing that may occur during the developing process. If you would prefer you can actually remove the negative slide from the camera using the dark bag after exposure and before developing. This means your negatives are not at any risk at all.How good is the enlarging quality?The enlarging quality from 120 negatives is surprisingly good considering that it is a lenseless system and certainly good enough for putting 4x5 pictures around your home, the larger the negatives the sharper the image for various reasons. The 35mm enlargements are a little softer and we recommend they are most useful for portraits and images that have less small details in them. Please see the examples section below for examples of each type of image.Pinhole:Pinholes have infinite focal length, so everything is in focus which is what makes many of the features of Pinsta possible. Pinsta camera includes a pinhole carefully selected at the right diameter (0.3mm's) and is manufactured using a special process called double etching, which ensures the absolute highest quality images possible are produced.The quality of the pinhole is crucial to image quality. Professional quality double chemically etched pinholes aren't cheap and many other pinhole camera kits come with drilled or laser cut pinholes to save money.. Not Pinsta.Shutter:Pinsta's shutter is different to any other camera on the market. It includes 3 photo settings for full frame and round and oval vignetted crop shots.This rotates on a clicker which locks each setting into place. The lever allows you to switch to another setting quickly and easily.The shutter disc also houses the white diffuser spot which is used for enlarging negatives. The diffuser spot is positioned over the pinhole and is illuminated using any external light source. This light passes through the negative and projects the negative  onto your photographic paper.Body:The Pinsta body is made from thick 'pinseal' ABS and has a nice weight and high quality feel to it with landscape and portrait bubble levels. It has a number of cool features, the most significant of which is the ability to add and extract chemistry through a special light tight cavity using syringes. This means when developing your images your camera body is actually also your darkroom. The body also includes 2 tripod mounts for portrait and landscape shots, 2 bubble levels and gun sights to ensure you're getting the correct framing.Camera Back/Tray:The back of your camera is also your developing tray. It includes magnets which fix it to the camera body and ensure perfect light tightness. This accommodates 4x5 inch photo paper or film. The photographic paper is sandwiched between the camera back and the camera body which holds it flat and in place when shooting and developing. The paper also acts as a gasket which prevents the chemistry from leaking.Enlargement Slide: (available as an add-on)The enlargement slide can accommodate 35mm, 645, 6x6 and 6x7 negatives (6x7 size will be cropped to 6x6). There are different mounting positions inside the camera body depending on which negative size you are using.The possibilities are quite literally endless with the internal slide system and we're really excited to see what our backers do with this innovation. Advanced users can even shoot film using these slides, or double expose a new shot with an existing negative..Internal Light Baffle/Filter Slide: (included in all kits)The internal light baffle/filter slide is similar to the enlargement slide but it is used to prevent unwanted light from bouncing around inside the camera and fogging your prints. This is one of the reasons that Pinsta gives excellent image quality.This slide can also be used for attaching filters or for customising your images with custom shaped exposures when you are shooting or enlarging. It is designed to be left in the camera at all times when shooting in the slide position closest to the pinhole. Dark Bag: (available as an add-on)The dark bag is a light tight bag used to load your next shot into the camera. It keeps your paper or film from being exposed to light during its journey between the paper box and the camera. Our dark bags are bigger than some others on the market which makes loading your Pinsta camera a little easier. Drying/Display Frames: (available as an add-on)Our magnetized drying frames are used for keeping your print relatively flat whilst it dries. Fiber based papers can bend quite a lot whilst drying so if you intend to shoot mostly fiber based papers such as Harman direct positive paper then we suggest adding on a few drying frames. These ensure that your prints dry evenly and remain flat whilst they dry.These frames can also be used to display your photographs around the house and are great for displaying your work as fridge magnets!Contact Plate/Print Press: (available as an add-on)More advanced users may like our magnetized contact plate add on. The contact plate means that you can produce 'false' positive images using negative paper. This plate produces a perfect positive replica of your negative by sandwiching it with a fresh piece of negative paper and then exposing it to light. You can then transfer the exposed false positive to your Pinsta inside a dark bag for developing as normal.It can also be used as a print press! Leave them in here for a day or two and they'll be perfectly flat.Syringe:Each kit comes with 3 or more syringes, these syringes are used for inserting and extracting your chemistry. They come with coloured stickers for identifying which syringe is for which chemistry. Additional syringes are available as an add-on.Syringe Dock: (available as an add-on)The syringe dock is used to store your syringes. This keeps them safe and secure during transit and also makes them easier to organize when developing prints. The syringe dock also has a handy strap mount so they can be mounted onto the strap of your camera bagBottle Kit: (available as an add-on)The bottle kit includes 3 chemistry bottles and one larger dump bottle.  The bottles have sealed lids. These come in very useful especially if you plan on taking lots of photos whilst you're out or are going on a longer excursion. The larger tops allow easy access for your syringes.You must always dispose of your exhausted chemistry in a responsible manner so even if you don't add our bottle kit you will need to carry storage for your spent chemistry.Here are some examples of photos and enlargements made with Pinsta Camera. Find more images and video examples on our instagram page:My name is Oliver, I am 35 years old and have been a keen photographer and inventor my life so far, taking after my Dad Harry New who invented the Nova Vertical slot print processor back in the 1980's.Sitting on a stool next to my dad in his darkroom is one of my most distinct memories as a small child. The combination of sounds, smells and the wonder of watching images illuminated by the red glow of the safelight magically appear in front of my eyes is something I will never forget. He would often shoot weddings and show jumping events and would occasionally let me sit in on his darkroom sessions.My first proper camera was a Pentax ME and I had a fascination with long exposures and used to go into the garden at night experimenting, setting my camera up with a fixed open shutter and shining my torch on the plants and trees. I'd take the film up to the local photography shop to have it developed for collection the next day. The anticipation all part of the enjoyment of the process. Something lost with the instant gratification lifestyles we all live in now..Years on and in a small factory in rural Warwickshire our family company had been hand making pinhole cameras for one of the biggest names in the industry when one day it occurred to me that there was an opportunity for us to produce something more accessible to people without a darkroom. Something that could hopefully introduce new people into the magic of traditional photography, and to help advanced photographers learn even more about the origins their trade. From this idea Pinsta was born...The development of Pinsta:Product prototyping is one of the things our company does, which is fortunate as it has saved us a lot of costs which we can actually pass on to you! Overall we've spent around a year developing Pinsta to the complete product it is now. We have produced around 15 different designs of various types. Continual improvements have been made to the designs of the shutter disc, chemistry/ventilation system, sights, pinhole, tray/back and internal slide system.Pinsta at the Photography Show:We thoroughly enjoyed exhibiting at the photography show and received nothing but amazing comments and feedback on Pinsta. We felt it was important to show that Pinsta was a serious and fully developed product and what better way to do this than demonstrate it to thousands of people at the show. I did many demonstrations and interviews for various magazines and publications. Thankyou to everyone who showed up and gave their support, some people even came just to see Pinsta!Amateur Photographer Magazine recorded this live negative enlargement demonstration for their social media platforms (poor sound): Sunny 16 Podcast also popped over and made a video and we should be featuring on their podcast soon: Jon Bentley from the Gadget show even paid a visit:There is no doubt that photography in all its forms can have a huge impact on mental health. The combination of elements that involve the process make it an inherently therapeutic pass time. Getting out somewhere you might not otherwise go, meeting people, engaging in an art form, joining a community, the enjoyment of taking beautiful images and the continual pursuit of learning (because there is always more to learn) are just some of the reasons why photography brings so many people so much happiness.We believe that analogue photography in particular encourages a state of mindfulness and the slower processes are in themselves a meditation. In a world where everything is fast and on demand it's a wonderful liberation to rediscover the joy of taking your time and enjoying a real tactile and thought provoking process.A big thankyou:Lastly I'd like to give a big thankyou to Mark Anthony Galluzzo and his company Mabinogi who not only produced our campaign video for us but did a great deal of testing with Pinsta. We couldn't have been more happy with them and the genuinely personal service that they provided.https://www.mabinogi.co.uk/crowdfunding/ If you would like further updates on new Pinsta products/accessories after the campaign then please join our mailing list at www.pinstacamera.com

record.Creator: Amonito
record.Title: Amonito - The Lightest All-In-One Guitar Amplifier
record.Text:
Ever tried to carry a big heavy combo amp to a gig, and then transport it back home at 1 am, all in an effort to impress the audience with a great sound?Did you buy countless expensive pedals, because you cannot play a gig with the amp giving you just one sound?Ever tried to achieve a perfect sound with a modeling amp, but can never shake the feeling that it could be better if you maybe just spent a few more days tweaking the sound?We tried all of that.All of the hardship of those problems manifested into creating a truly unique solution, a guitar amp that is light and versatile, and sounds incredible with every setting you have it set to.You no longer need to make a choice between the quality, warmth, and ease of use of a tube amplifier and the versatility and lightness of modern guitar systems.Amonito is a guitar amplification system that brings together boutique guitar effects, an incredible sounding tube analog circuit, instant switching between presets, and a quality loud sound monitoring system all in one extremely light package.Three main segments are responsible for Amonito sounding as good as it does.Each of these is a novelty on the guitar amp market, but together they make for one of the most incredible pieces of guitar gear that the world has ever seen.At the heart of Amonito is the main analog compact circuit, that responds and sounds like a full tube amp. A combination of two vacuum tubes, 12AX7 and 12AU7, and MOSFETS are all running on high voltage to give the guitarist ultimate dynamic range and feel that no digital processing could accomplish. Dozens of strategically placed little electronic switches make this one of the most versatile tube circuits on the market today.And because almost every player needs effects like reverb, chorus, delay, and others, we added a special chip - one of the most powerful SHARC® DSPs that is responsible for all of the effects that complete the sound coming out of the analog circuit.We could have stopped there, but there was one thing bothering us.What many guitarists that have played tube amps know is that they don’t sound amazing on just any setting - they have a sweet spot. A certain setting that sounds the best, but this makes the amp less versatile and you can’t always have it as loud as necessary to get to it.And since we have that SHARC® power, we put the DSP before and after the analog circuit!This is how we achieved total control of the sound and made one sweet spot a thing of the past! The amp has now become interconnected with thousands of parameters, many of them helping to prepare the sound for its journey in the high voltage analog world, and the rest applying finishing touches after it transitions back into the digital. No other analog amp has ever had such flexibility!Playing and creating music is a deeply intimate process and with our product, we want the guitarists to spend their time in the creative zone and to enjoy the experience instead of tweaking every single parameter while reading the manual.To address this, instead of offering an off-the-shelf LCD and a thick manual on how to use it, we designed custom touchscreen displays like you haven’t seen before. There are no pixels, it feels and looks analog.Each knob on these displays is smartly connected to many parameters and intertwined with other knobs so that you get a beautifully simple experience while the system in the background does all the hard work to keep the sound great no matter what you do.Combined with extremely reliable optical footswitches, to which the user can assign their own personal settings, you are now in instant control of not just the effects, but also the whole analog tube amp structure, with just a push of a single button.Amonito features a wireless access point, so when we upgrade the software, you would just have to use the app to upload the latest release. No need for a cable, all of the software updates will be available wirelessly through the app, so uploading the latest released firmware on Amonito will be made as simple as possible.To make it as light and sturdy as possible, we moved away from wood for the construction material and chose - aluminum for the more affordable Classic version and carbon fiber for the premium, Carbon version.With a ported design to give you a deep, full sound, and a power amplifier that delivers 200W RMS this cabinet is truly something different. The sound of a high-quality 8” neodymium speaker is being further enhanced by our processing and is firing into a specially constructed wave deflector to give you a smooth top end and wide coverage with high frequencies. It doesn’t sound like a guitar speaker, but like a guitar speaker that has been professionally miked up in the studio, and with different amps you also hear different speakers! You haven’t heard an 8” speaker that sounds like this.But we went one step further! We completely changed the way you hear this speaker system on stage and moved it from the usual position in the back to the front where the guitarist can hear it much better. This way the sound spill from the stage is greatly reduced - sound guys will absolutely love it! And with dedicated XLR outputs for the PA, it means that the audience will get to enjoy great sound too.We paired Amonito with some of the most popular electric guitars, played by guitarists with their unique style. While many modern amplifiers sound similar with different guitars and players, Amonito really lets the character of the guitar and guitarist's technique shine through.Andy is a London-based guitar player influenced by Eric Clapton, Albert Collins, and other guitar legends. Andy has toured with James Bay for many years and has also played with one of the blues greats, Buddy Guy. He was a founding member of the band Cortes and is now also creating his original work under his name, Andy Cortes.Oz has played with members of Judas Priest, Alice Cooper, Cradle of Filth, and has Manowar guitarist David Snake, as well as many others, guesting on the new CD of his band Snake Eyes.
   He also has a YouTube channel "Guitar Safari" where he does gear reviews.Both of our products feature the same analog tube circuit, the same amplifier and speaker, and the same user interface. But, there are differences between them that make the Carbon version a more premium model.Both versions of Amonito offer the same functionality, which is comprised of 5 main stages:The PRE section includes guitar effects that are used in front of an amplifier by most guitarists. Just like normal pedals, these effects have a lot of control, but most of it is hidden away in our smart processing. Only one of these effects can be on at the same time.There are four types of amplifiers to choose from, two base models and two variants of them. Each one has a different sound and feel, thanks to the extensive physical switching of the analog circuit.Everyone is probably familiar with EQ settings, but while simple to use, on Amonito, these are much more powerful than it seems at first glance.With the help of smart processing, the whole amplifier is reacting to these settings so that is not simply an EQ after the amplifier section, but it is modifying the signal so that you “get what you wish for”.For example, if you would like to have the sound from a bright clean vintage amplifier (assuming a vintage clean model is selected on the AMP section), simply increase the treble and possibly reduce the bass and the whole amp will shift around these parameters to provide you with a sound that would be produced by a typical bright vintage tube amp. Even effects before the amplifier will adjust to these settings.(Almost) no guitar sound is perfect without some kind of reverb, delay, or other modulation effects - or even all together.The last thing every amplifier needs is a way to turn it on and off and to be able to mute all of the outputs with just one button. Both of these have been incorporated into our displays.Amonito offers all the main connections you need in a live or a studio environment. First, the signal is received by a high impedance FET input that preserves its original clarity and definition and is sent to the rest of the circuitry via a low noise balanced connection.Since many guitarists will never part with their own choice of pedals and effects, Amonito offers a send/return loop that is positioned after the analog tube circuit and can be switched on or off via a button on the displays. This allows the user to turn the send/return loop on or off using the footswitches on Amonito.Since the built-in speaker is intended to be used as a personal stage guitar monitoring system, Amonito features two other main outputs to be used either in the studio or in a live performance. Line outputs are carrying a raw signal, that can either be processed by software plugins in a studio environment or plugged into another power amp on stage. The XLR outputs carry a signal that has been optimized for live, PA applications. A high-quality IR cabinet simulation makes sure that even the most nit-picking live sound technicians will be satisfied with the sound. And of course, these outputs can be used in a studio recording for a very quick and effortless setup.Amonito Carbon comes with stereo Send/return, line, and XLR output connections, while ALL the connections on Amonito Classic are mono. We believe that a high-quality product such as Amonito should never be carried around without protection. Therefore, we will be shipping every product with a corresponding padded bag.Currently, we only have one prototype for the bag ready, and it will take some trial and error to get it just the way we want it. But, we can tell you that the final bag will be light, padded on all sides, and equipped with a carrying handle and backpack straps! This way, you will be able to easily take Amonito everywhere you go and will not have to worry about damaging the surface or hardware.For even more reliable transportation, we will be offering a hard case made from fiberglass. It will be available for purchase as an add-on, but later on, once the project has been successfully funded.We are Marko and Andraž and we come from Slovenia, Europe. Both electrical engineers and both musicians. Our journey of building guitar amplifiers began about 6 years ago when we decided to build our first unique tube amp. Since then we have designed and built many guitar amplifiers, bass and guitar effects, and other audio products. During this time we were actively involved in our bands, playing all sorts of big and small venues, meeting all sorts of musicians, especially guitarists, and getting to know their musical styles, habits, problems, and wishes. We discovered that a lot of them were unhappy with their gear, may it be the weight, sound, limitations, and even complexity of the modern guitar equipment.That's where the idea of creating our innovative guitar amplifier came in.We discovered that with our knowledge of electrical engineering, programming, and amp building we could make a difference by providing guitarists with an amplifier that sounds just as good as the old tube amps, but is extremely lighter, includes all the must-have modern effects, offers the choice of completely restructuring the analog tube circuit with a flick of a preset switch, but still remains as easy and intuitive to use as the old amps were. No more back hurting at 3 AM after a concert. No more confusing connections between pieces of gear. No more spending weeks or even months in your studio, trying to find that perfect sound. Just lighter, smarter, and intuitive. The vision for the AMONITO guitar amplifier was born.After more than a year of prototyping and validating the concept of innovative weight reduction techniques we pitched this idea to the start-up incentive program P2 at the Slovene enterprise fund and got the grant. This enabled us to assemble a small team and continue working on the project. Since then it has almost been two years, and during this time the whole team worked very hard to make this project a reality.We can't tell you how excited we are to finally be able to offer Amonito to guitarists all over the world!Marko and Andraž, founders and lead developers of the AMONITO guitar amplifier

record.Creator: QingYing E&T LLC
record.Title: iMicro Q2p: An 800x Polarizing Fingertip Microscope
record.Text: From 2018 to 2020, we took Kickstarter by storm with the Fingertip Microscopes - iMicro Q, iMicro C, and iMicro Q2, earning 20K pledges from the community over 40K iMicros delivered to our backers in over 70 countries. It is a breakthrough in portable microscopy - we're pretty proud, and thank you all for your support.We keep improving and polishing the iMicros, and we never stop - now we've taken our effort one step further and are pleased to bring you the new fingertip microscope - iMicro Q2p, the first smartphone microscope with polarizing function.Since Antony van Leeuwenhoek invented his microscope in the 17th century, microscope technology has progressed tremendously. Microscopes with excellent performance are usually bulky, heavy, and expensive, even for portable ones. With our years of effort, what we introduced in 2018 - the fingertip microscope iMicro Q - is a real breakthrough in mobile microscopy. It has comparable optical performance to a professional desktop microscope and enables you to carry it with you as easily as you bring your phone. In addition to the iMicro Q's excellent optical performance and portability, we launched iMicro Q2 in 2020 with enhanced compatibility to work with any smartphone.Polarized light is a contrast-enhancing technique that improves the quality of the image obtained with birefringent materials, such as crystals, minerals, liquid crystals, and plastics. The polarized light microscope (polarizing microscope) is designed to observe and photograph specimens primarily due to its optically anisotropic character. Usually, a polarized light microscope is much more expensive and only available for professionals. Now with iMicro Q2p, in addition to the function of a typical biology microscope, we bring you this tiny Fingertip Microscope with the fantastic polarizing function.Here are some micrographs took with iMicro Q2p (using an iPhone 11):Here are more example micrographs with polarizers and without polarizers - solid proof that the polarizing function dramatically enhanced the contrast with rich colors.To our knowledge, iMicro Q2p is the first smartphone microscope with the polarizing function integrated with such a small profile.  Our previous backers queried a lot on a focusing stand/support to the fingertip microscopes. We listen to our backers, and we have worked hard on designing a convenient, flexible, intuitive stand to allow precision focusing. Finally, we have a satisfactory solution.  It works very well and is also simple to use. It has the same high magnification as iMicro Q and Q2. Here are the micrographs of the fiber from one dental floss. If you don't have a microscope, you don't know it has such a fine structure on this fiber. It is amazing!Resolution is more important than magnification when speaking about the performance of a microscope. The USAF 1951 resolution test chart was used to test the resolution of iMicro Q2p on an iPhone 11. The intervals between the finest test bars are 2.19 micrometers. The finest test bars on the 7th group are clearly seen, indicating its resolution is far beyond that.We used a grid calibration target to test the distortion. Even in full view at the edge of the visual field, no noticeable distortion was observed.It is about the size of a fingertip and weighs only 0.5g (~1/60 oz). It is very thin, only 3.2mm (1/8 inch). No parts extrude beyond the edge of your phone when it is installed. Also, the focusing stand has not increased the profile regarding the whole pack - still in the card size and easily fit in a wallet.We are very proud of the Fingertip Microscope and would like everyone to be able to afford it. With a polarizing function, we can still keep it at a low cost. With the money you would need to buy a traditional desktop microscope, you could purchase many Fingertip Microscopes, making this a great option for children and students.As iMicro Q2 lens and iMicro C lens, we design iMicro Q2p in a tiny round style to fit any phone with a camera. They will be coupled to your smartphone by an innovative, re-useable, nano-suction pad. Whether your phone has a single back camera or multiple back cameras, a flat camera(s), or extruded camera(s), these tiny round lenses will fit well with them. The magnification mainly relies on its complex optical system for traditional compound microscopes, including objective and eyepiece. Its total magnification is a combination of the magnification of objective and eyepiece.For our fingertip microscope, three stages of magnification are combined to achieve the total magnification. First, the lens provides optical magnification to generate the image on the smartphone camera's sensor; second, the image on the sensor is displayed on the much larger screen via the electronic process and magnification; third, digital zoom provides further magnification as a digital magnification to the image. The total magnification is a combination of these three.The traditional polarizing microscope has a complex structure. Especially a polarizer and another polarizer (analyzer) are added before and after the specimen in the optical system. For iMicro Q2p, we mimic this polarizing structure but keep it in a small profile.We have walked a long way to develop these smartphone-based microscopic tools since registering the first patent in 2012. We have already successfully built a series of smartphone microscope products, including iMICROSCOPE, iMICROSCOPE R, and the μRuler, iMicro Q, iMicro C, iMicro Q2, as well as this new version iMicro Q2p.We have shaped and polished our Fingertip Microscope idea according to previous backers' and customers' suggestions and comments based on our previous successful projects. We have optimized the optics and the overall design, and each step was tested and refined using prototypes to achieve the best performance possible.The lens is a crucial component of the system. A small ball lens (van Leeuwenhoek) is a straightforward approach. But it is well known to suffer from a very limited usable field of view due to severe field curvature effects, spherical and other aberrations. The iMicro Q2p uses a more complex multi-aspherical lens design and integrated polarizer to achieve high magnification performance and low aberration with polarizing function.In iMicro Q2p, we incorporated a new reflection/polarizing/transmission lighting. The thin PP case is not only used to pack and protect the product but also used as a light-reflective illumination box. The light from the flashlight and ambient light goes to the bottom of the lighting box and is reflected from the thin PP case's bottom wall to illuminate the sample after being polarized. Unlike conventional adhesive, the nano suction pad mimics gecko's footpads: it has thousands of micro air pockets functioning like micro-suction cups to hold the device to the phone.Every on and off application will leave nothing on the phone. This newly developed "nano suction pad" is residue-free, non-tacky, and repeatable. The use of a nano suction pad has been proved in our previous product, and it is repeatable and easily cleaned by a PSA tape (such as Scotch tape).We believe you will like this focusing stand - it works very well and keeps a low profile. It is made of engineering plastic (PMMA, acrylic resin) and is strong enough with durability. It is also very simple and easy to set up to use. After using it, you can disassembly it and store it in the thin PP case.A high-quality μRuler M (stage micrometer) will be provided with iMicro Q2p to calibrate the scale-bar in our App, i-Seeing, and enable you to measure size accurately. Please see our previous campaign, μRuler- A micro-ruler to measure micro-objects, for more information. μRuler Q will be available as an add-on.iMicro Q2p actually works with any camera App which can control the flashlight when shooting or you provide illumination with an extra torch. In some cases, it is crucial to have a scale-bar and ensure its accuracy on the micrograph. The dedicated App, i-Seeing, was designed to take micrographs to meet professional demand. The scale-bar on the micrograph can be toggled on/off to enable you to embed a scale-bar on the image if required.It is super portable, and you don't need complicated settings, so you can immediately take images, use them for reporting and transferring images to your colleagues. Plus, you can use it with any smartphone. It can be used in many professions where you need accurate images and easily accessible research photographs in the field. Many of our previous backers shared their application with beautiful and unique pictures when using the fingertip microscopes. Here are a few examples. Many of them are from our previous backers' photos with the iMicro Q2 and iMicro C on their phones; Some of them are our test photos for the polarizing function. With the polarizing function, you will have more power for its application.This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Vissles
record.Title: Vissles LP85: Ultra-Thin 75% Optical-Mechanical Keyboard
record.Text: Keyboard is the tool in which we interact with the world wide web. It's what we use for an online battle and performing tasks. Having an outperformed keyboard makes huge differences in efficiency and responsiveness.Introducing Vissles LP85,  a 75% ultra-slim optical-mechanical keyboard crafted for speed, precision, and comfort. The LP85 strives a perfect balance between a conventional and a mechanical keyboard, its low-profile optical switches give you the type feel of a mechanical keyboard but in an ergonomic way, and it helps prevent fatigue from long hours of typing. Low-profile optical keyboards bring numerous advantages to users, simply put, due to the unique pre-travel distance, optical switches are highly responsive with a subtle crisp sound, which makes LP85 deliver a better gaming and typing experience that is far beyond membrane keyboards. Without constant contact under the hook, the life expectancy of LP85 is beyond doubt, not to mention its ergonomic and lightweight design.Besides the N-key rollover technology with 50g actuation force, 0.2ms speedy response, and 1.2mm pre-travel, LP85 also features 19 dynamic RGB for both Mac & Windows usersProviding a perfect combination of aesthetics and durability, LP85 is constructed with a solid aluminum frame. To be crowned as the world’s slimmest 85-key low-profile keyboard, LP85 shrinks its size by 0.47 inches, making it thinner than peer products. Its low-profile design makes it more comfortable to type and easier to move around with.LP85 is built for excellence and novelty, the premium X-optical switches deliver a light beam of 0.2ms, pair with the short actuation distance of 1.2mm pre-travel and 2.5mm total travel, a perfect option for gaming enthusiasts who demand instant actuation, satisfying clicky feedback, and rapid-fire inputs.Traditionally, optical switches have been used by a small handful of gaming laptops like the 2019 Razer Blade 15. However, due to its high price, users are often hesitant to give it a try. Vissles is eager to share an equally unparalleled typing experience with mechanical keyboard enthusiasts at a reasonable price, your satisfaction drives us to go further. LP85's clicky optical switches are lightweight, easy on the fingers. By utilizing a light beam instead of metallic contact for signals, generating the fastest response time than ever. With fewer physical moving parts, it’s clear that optical keyboards last longer, with the ultimate stability and responsiveness, the LP8 is perfect for gamers who opt for an insane speed.RGB backlit under each keycap, allowing you to choose from unique 19 dynamics and 8 monochrome backlit modes, matching your battle intensity during gameplay,  or reflecting the art of calm in the middle of the night.If you are looking for a new keyboard to partner with your MacBook Pro or Mac Mini, LP85 is one of your best choices. Featuring a similar spacing mode and keycap layout to Magic Keyboard, it also supports Mac functions keys. Get the comfort and ease of desktop-style typing on your MacBook, iPhone, and iPad.If you are a Windows user, LP85 also got you covered, we also offer a black and white scheme for you to choose from.The high-quality ABS keycaps are lined with a fingerprint-resistant, soft-touch coating, which is extremely comfortable to use. High-end printing makes characters clear and not easy to fade, providing an unrivaled typing experience.LP 85 might be compact, but it doesn't compromise. It can be paired with up to 3 Bluetooth devices via Bluetooth 5.0, allowing you to seamlessly switch between desktops, laptops, and mobile phones with just a tap.LP85 supports macOS®,  Windows®, Chrome OS®, Android™, Linux®, and iOS systems. It also comes with USB Type-C for wired connection and charging.When work-from-home has become a new normal in the face of a pandemic, mobility and flexibility are more important than ever.  Weighed only 547g, LP85 is easy to carry and outfitted with Bluetooth so you can multitask at home, on the go, or at your favorite cafe.Vissles LP85 Gaming Real Test Vissles was founded in 2018 with a mission of presenting integrated services for the production and marketing of high-quality portable products. With excellence in both product design and production, high-impact digital marketing strategies, and operations, Vissles delivers an unprecedented and innovative shopping experience through online channels. Our in-house designs and direct supply chain allow customers to purchase from the portable monitor, wireless charger, earbuds, and keyboard so that they can save tons without sacrificing the quality.As a passionate techy brand that manifests designer's dreams with top-notch products, Vissles uses only the highest quality materials, adhering to the principles of 'simplicity and efficiency. Vissles wants to give everyone access to technology and rewrite the definition of modern living with innovative products.We hope to establish the most sought-after brand and produce trendsetting portable products. Poppin your life with ease creates a win-win situation for individuals, enterprises, and society.Why We Come to KickstarterThings happen for a reason, and the reason why we like to launch our products on Kickstarter is that its inclusiveness and flexibility. Kickstarter allows us to operate our business in the way we want and enables us to raise capital without the need for external investors. We always believe that DTC is a trend in the future, we are eager to stay close to our supporters and listen to their voices and comments to consolidate our team and community, while enriching our product lines. We can’t wait to deliver our designs to your hands.

record.Creator: Clifton Roozeboom
record.Title: PocketLab G-Force: A science lab on wheels
record.Text: PocketLab is trying to improve science learning around the world through our hardware products, apps, science lessons, and our community called Science Is Cool. Since the start of the COVID pandemic, PocketLab has been putting on free virtual conferences to bring science to everyone. Check out the video below to see what it's all about!PocketLab G-Force is a toy-sized technology-packed sensorized car that empowers you to measure speed, acceleration, g-forces, and much more. You can create speed contests, design science experiments, and learn about engineering and physics. G-Force packs cutting edge technology in a rugged car chassis for tons of science fun.It’s for every kid that grew up reading about science and wished more people would love the thrill of it. It’s for those collectors of endlessly cool tech gadgets. And it’s for those technophiles and inventors out there who know that supporting projects like these is to be part of something bigger. It’s science with the fun built in. Speed Racer: How fast are you going? PocketLab G-Force has a miniaturized odometer and speedometer that works just like a real car. The speedometer data transmits wirelessly to your phone, tablet, or computer in real-time.Plays Well with Others: PocketLab G-Force can race through many types of HotWheels™ and other toy tracks for loops, roller coasters, and high-banked curves.Cool Data: Crash cars together and measure the g-forces of a collision. PocketLab G-Force has an onboard inertial measurement unit (IMU) for advanced measurements, the same kind of technology used for autonomous driving.Sparks Creativity: You can attach bumpers, parachutes, and pirate sails to the G-Force car to be creative with how you explore science.Smooth Ride: Equipped with micro-ball-bearings, precision machined stainless steel axles, and fine-tuned mechanics- this is a lot more than a diecast toy car.Love Learning: Science + Play = Life-long LearningGet Nerdy: PocketLab G-Force is capable enough to investigate college-level science concepts in approachable ways. Who thought you could experiment with simple harmonic motion or three-dimensional kinematics with something that looks like a toy car?PocketLab G-Force connects to the PocketLab App (called PocketLab Notebook) using Bluetooth for real-time data transmission. PocketLab Notebook enables you to control what the car is measuring and all the dials and gauges that show data like speed or g-forces. PocketLab Notebook also has hundreds of activities, lessons, and videos for exploring science and engineering. The activities are developed by a team of experienced educators and scientists and include collaborations with StarTalk with Neil deGrasse Tyson and other professional scientists and engineers working in the field. See some of the highlights below.PocketLab G-Force, measures and transmits data for:PocketLab Notebook, the all-in-one platform for: G-Force joins a growing family of PocketLab sensors used in hundreds of classrooms, labs, and homes across 60 countries around the world. G-Force joins our other award-winning products that enable anyone to be a scientist and explore the world around them.Picking out colors is the most fun part of buying a new car! PocketLab G-Force will be available in the classic color combination of white and orange plus other color schemes, and we want our Kickstarter backers to help us choose the other colors. During and after the campaign we will let all of our backers vote on the additional color options. You can see some of the ideas we’ve tried so far. We'll also include cool decals so that you can trick out your ride and make it your own. Get ready for some ghost flames, racing stripes, and maybe an F = ma bumper sticker!?The journey to making PocketLab G-Force started in 2016 with our Need for Speed (Measurements)! Speed is a science concept that almost everyone understands, but it is actually really difficult to measure. We’ve been building roller coasters out of HotWheels™ track, K’Nex™, and anything else we can think of and using our sensors to turn them into science experiments. But it never quite worked well enough, so that’s why we built G-Force. Here’s an epic classroom roller coasters from some intrepid PocketLab physics teachers.For the last year, we’ve been designing the hardware and mechanical systems that make up PocketLab G-Force. We have gone through many prototypes and we’re finally ready for production. The funding we raise on Kickstarter will go to the production costs of the product plus the up front costs for the machining and tooling needed for injection molding and circuit board assembly.Here’s a raw, uncut video of the PocketLab G-Force prototype connecting to our Notebook app and streaming data in real-time. The PocketLab Team is a small group of engineers and teachers that believe in the joy of science. We believe that it is important for everyone to understand science and explore the world around them. We love our customers and users around the world and we hope you will join us.PocketLab enables everyone to discover the joy of science and explore the world around them. The company started in October 2013 when inventor Clifton Roozeboom was developing new wireless sensor technology for his PhD. He was searching for a way to bring advanced sensor technology to science education. Now PocketLab is used by hundreds of thousands of people in 63 different countries.By supporting our Kickstarter campaign, you are helping bring PocketLab G-Force to life, a product that we hope will inspire thousands of users to discover the joys of STEM education and citizen science.Thank you!This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: The BLOK Team
record.Title: BLOK: Smart Cutting Board & Virtual Cooking Classes 🧑🍳
record.Text: With BLOK’s embedded digital display and beautiful wood prep surface, you’ll learn how to cook delicious meals via live and on-demand cooking classes led by expert chefs. It’s a high-energy, engaging way to connect with friends and family all over the world....and it’s all from the comfort of your own kitchen!Choose from a future library of fun, high-energy live and on-demand cooking classes led by expert chefs that fit your nutrition and dietary needs.You’re going to love our super sleek digital display where you can watch video content, interact with friends and family socially, and follow along with recipes.Even when BLOK is turned off, its chic design will make you want to leave it out on your counter for all to see.Worried about getting it messy and wet? No problem. BLOK’s digital display is waterproof and scratch-resistant.Prep your ingredients on the high-quality dark walnut wood cutting board while streaming cooking classes. When you’re done cooking, simply remove the digital display from the cutting board for easy cleaning.The docking station includes speakers to stream the audio portion of your cooking classes, and a camera and a microphone to share and engage with your family and friends.Once you’ve prepped all your ingredients, put BLOK on the dock so you can move throughout the kitchen while following the chef’s instructions and engaging with family and friends.Plus, it has a wireless charger to ensure your BLOK is always fully charged!All of the digital components in BLOK’s cutting board and docking station are controlled by our future app that will be compatible with both iOS and Android!Plus, if you’re too busy to hit the grocery store before your class, you can order all of the ingredients in our future app and get your groceries delivered right to your home with a variety of delivery services.High-energy, engaging live and on-demand cooking classes so you can prepare delicious meals in just 30 minutes! Here’s a sneak peek of what you can look forward to: * Please note, we're able to confidently estimate shipping to the U.S. and Canada during this campaign. We will charge international shipping for all other backers after the campaign ends. International shipping will cost approximately $99. * Please note, the above images are an early working prototype. The unit delivered to backers will look like and function like the images in the marketing video.👋 Hi, we’re Tony and Alissa, creators of BLOK!As husband and wife co-founders, it goes without saying, BLOK is a true partnership. Tony describes himself as a "reformed" lawyer who has spent the last decade of his professional life leading healthcare, wellness, and technology companies. Alissa has spent her entire career in digital media and television production. She also has two Emmys for her work sitting on the couple's mantle (Tony has no Emmys, but Alissa let him hold them once). Together, while working our separate day jobs and raising our three young children, we run BLOK from our home in the suburbs just outside of Philadelphia.We spent a lot of time this past year cooking together at home. We quickly realized there were no fun and contemporary cooking classes that we could realistically stream with our family members in different locations throughout the country.That’s when the idea for BLOK was born! We put pen to paper and started working on developing BLOK. We came up with an attractive custom-designed piece of hardware that creates a virtual experience for friends and family where they can learn to prepare delicious and healthy meals in a fun and engaging way. BLOK is so much more than a smart cutting board, it’s a community of foodies all over the world!As the most trusted product launch company in the world, Enventys Partners has helped launch over 2,000 innovations with global sales of over $1 Billion dollars for our clients.By utilizing 20 years of experience in:Got an idea? We would love to help you launch it.BLOK’s founding principle is to cultivate a community in the kitchen-- to provide consumers access to real, relatable chefs while cooking delicious meals with friends and family. Without that community, and passionate, inspiring chefs, BLOK wouldn’t exist— and that’s why BLOK is committed to giving back. If BLOK reaches its Kickstarter funding goal, co-founders Tony and Alissa will make a personal donation of $2,000 to Careers through Culinary Arts Program. C-CAP is a workforce development nonprofit that provides underserved teens a pathway to success in the culinary arts in Philadelphia and across the country. As the BLOK community grows, Tony and Alissa look forward to growing their support for C-CAP. For more information about C-CAP, visit: ccapinc.org We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make BLOK a reality.We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a BLOK, if you’re a supporter of BLOK, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

record.Creator: Fanttik
record.Title: X8 APEX Tire Inflator, Inflate Anything, Anytime, Anywhere!
record.Text: Meet X8 APEX, a powerful, compact, and versatile tire inflator that provides super-fast inflation anytime, anywhere! Our new generation makes tire inflation more effective and easier than ever. With 150 PSI and 5 preset modes, it satisfies all your inflation needs such as car tires, motorbikes, bicycles, recreational inflatables, and all kinds of sports balls. If it can be inflated, X8 APEX can do it!Maximum Pressure of 150 PSI is able to fulfill all your inflation needs. X8 APEX, your ultimate portable air compressor!Utilizing advanced technology, X8 APEX optimizes the inflation process by speeding it up 45% faster than before! Making tire inflation quick and easy. For example, a typical SUV tire can be fully inflated from 0 to 100% in less than 10 minutes!With a built-in 7,800mAh rechargeable high capacity Li-ion battery, X8 APEX has a stronger battery capacity that makes it more practical. Imagine one charge lasting for up to 300 days standby!With a maximum of 150 PSI pressure, X8 APEX provides 5 smart modes for specialized inflation of different items such as car tires, motorbike tires, bike tires, balls and also includes one customized mode. It also comes with an air tube and two adaptors, a schrader-presta valve, and a needle valve which make it compatible with any inflatable. X8 APEX - Your ultimate air compressor!Once it detects the tire is fully inflated, it will automatically stop inflating to protect the item. No need to worry about over-inflating anything!Adopting a cordless design, X8 APEX has only 5 touch buttons, one power key, one mode key, one light button, and a pair of +/- keys to adjust pressure values. It's so simple and easy to use that you won’t even need a manual to operate it.X8 APEX has a large LCD Display that provides essential real-time information including tire pressure, battery life, and inflation modes. Even at night, the screen can be seen clearly.At night or under extreme conditions, it can make tire inflation or tire change easier and safer.If your phone battery is dead, it can also be your emergency power bank that charges your phone right away.X8 APEX is incredibly portable and easy to store. Keep one in your car for emergencies or take it along in your bag for outdoor adventures.This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.

record.Creator: Matt Chang
record.Title: IVYCable - Self-Folding Magnetic Cable & Power Bank
record.Text: We designed IVYCable to solve these common charging cable hassles. With magnetic sections and built-in batteries, IVYCable is an auto-folding charging cable & power bank with an on-board power-storage system. Say goodbye to messy cables and bulky power banks, IVYCable is here to free your hands and simplify your life. Here is the unboxing video:IVYCable instantly organizes itself as the magnetic sections join together into a neat compact shape. The automatic folding system turns the long cable into a non-deforming and non-tangling self-organizing unit, which is the perfect solution for eliminating desktop clutter.Sorting out tangled cables for your smartphone is always annoying. But with IVYCable, this will never happen. Simply take it out, and plug it in. Power up your phone anywhere and anytime.Cables tangle because they have redundant length that is not always needed. With IVYCable, you use just the length that you need and organize the rest of the cable via magnets so that it stays neat and tidy.Supporting pass-through-charging, IVYCable automatically recharges itself while being used as a charging cable.  It stores power in advance to avoid the frustration that results from dead power banks. The only thing you need to do is grab it and go.IVYCable’s 3200 mAh capacity is perfect for all your daily needs and emergency use. With its small size and light weight, IVYCable is the best replacement for bulky power banks and goes with you anywhere.Power banks are inconvenient to carry. They require extra cables and extra space in your bag. But with IVYCable, you can easily fit it in any pocket along with your phone.To give IVYCable at-a-glance power level convenience, we designed an indicator light to show the battery status.With IVYCable, you only need one cable to charge all your devices.You can choose from 2 input types: USB-A / Type-C. Each IVYCable comes with three adapters: lighting, Type-C, Micro USB. IVYCable is MFi certified. The special section whip module design makes it not only the most useful workstation setup but also the coolest desktop toy. IVYCable is a must-have EDC for everyone.Built with TPE, IvyCable is durable enough for more than 3000 folds with excellent flexibility and strength. It’s also compatible for all environments with wear-resistant, high temperature-resistant, cold-resistant, and aging-resistant.We are an experienced and passionate team from the Azurbit Company with 10 years of experience in the field of mobile device power accessories.Matt Chang has been devoted to product innovation & design and obtained a number of personal patents and PTC reports.Louis Tong has been focusing on production management and operations.Mike Yan and Peter Guo are also engaged in OEM project management and R & D respectively.IVYCable is the latest innovative product of the Azurbit team. Founded in 2011, Azurbit has been devoted to the research and development of consumer electronics, communication accessories, and smart hardware. We have cooperated with many global companies and have gotten more than 20 patents. Not only do we produce reliable products, but we also aim to innovate to offer customers a better way of living. We believe your life can be simplified with IVYCable’s self-folding and auto-power-storage system.  This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them. This project is boosted by BackerCrew

record.Creator: PURRIT
record.Title: PURRAIR,  Filterless Odor Killer
record.Text: How clean is your home really? Does it smell or feel stuffy sometimes? You've probably experienced bad odours at some point in your house. PURRAIR has been created to solve those problems most effectively and efficiently. Discover the life-changing magic of PURRAIR!Why choose PURRAIR over other products in the market? Unlike the other existing air purifiers, PURRAIR is permanent, convenient, simple, and most importantly, different. Regardless of the environment or situation, PURRAIR will get the job done and outperform competitors.Periodic Spraying - the spray type air fresheners we are so familiar with, for example, Febreeze, do not have a long-lasting effect.  The effects dissipate a few minutes after spraying and bad odors return. PURRAIR is different from those temporary relief sprays. PURRAIR will refresh the air by eliminating harmful substances floating in the air. One of the most impressive features of PURRAIR is that it barely makes any noise. While it has an impeccable performance, the fan embedded in the device allows for a soundless performance. Individuals or pets sensitive to noise will feel at ease while PURRAIR is doing its job.PURRAIR does not require any replacement. Therefore there's no additional or hidden cost.  PURRAIR's plasma unit is permanent, so you won't need any replacement filters. Improve your air quality and let your savings grow.PURRAIR's compact size and flat design make it portable. You can drop it into your backpack and take it anywhere with you. Bring the heavy performance with you while keeping your backpack light. Make your work desk an air-safe zone or board a flight without any worries about cross-contamination.  Conventional air purifiers cannot reach hidden corners such as shoe cupboards and pantries. PURRAIR's magnetic installation and high-capacity internal battery make it ideal for taking control of these difficult to reach spaces. Let PURRAIR work behind doors and improve the air quality everywhere. PURRAIR's simple and minimal aesthetics are designed to fit all interior spaces, from mid-century to victorian style. We have prepared six beautiful colors so that you can choose the right fit for your home and office. The hidden LED indicator shows the battery status. You can use it with the USB adapter connected or disconnected. The internal high-capacity battery will provide up to 20 hours of disconnected use. It only takes two and a half hours to charge fully.Simply touch and enjoy clean air. If odors are severe then touch one more time for the boost mode. The fan will increase its speed up to 8,500 rpm and complete the difficult task of severe odor removal.No need to replace anything and no need to wash anything.
