You just need to swab the plasma pins every three weeks, which only takes 30 seconds. A cotton swab and 30 seconds every three weeks are all you need for maintenance. Chemical residue can be harmful to self-grooming pets and curious children. Unlike spray-type odor removers, PURRAIR leaves no residue while cleansing the air. The Ozone occurrence rate is only 0.008 ppm, significantly lower than the FDA's requirement of "No more than 0.05".Due to COVID-19, problems such as shipping and logistics around the world continue to grow. Due to the shipping crisis, customers' parcels are often lost or delayed, and some of them are not being tracked. Purrit has negotiated with several carriers to resolve this issue. Finally, we have decided to ship all packages via air transport. To all customers who purchase PURRAIR on Kickstarter, we ship the product by air courier to all regions of the world. This shipping method is one of the fastest. It takes 2-5 days for these flights to arrive at the customer's destination. It also provides accurate tracking information until the customer receives the product. Customers will be able to receive the product within a week after the production of the PURRAIR production is completed.  All staff will do their best to not only deliver but also advance the announced production schedule.  PURRIT is made up of engineers with extensive experience in development, design, software, production, and delivery.

record.Creator: Omar
record.Title: tether - Projecting safe zones around bikes
record.Text: A bike safety device that projects a safe zone around your bike, responds to road users around you, identifying safe and unsafe roads in your city. We believe cycling is the best way to travel around a city. It can also be really dangerous and stressful. Close passes by overtaking cars are the biggest cause of fatal or serious accidents involving cyclists. Road rage is on the rise as communication between cyclists and motorists is limited, and we have little understanding of the safest route to cycle across our city. tether was invented to solve this problem and connect to a new community that create safer roads for everyone the more they use it.tether has been designed to attach to any handlebars, top stem or down stem giving a clear line of sight for the sensors and allowing the projection to display around the bike. Current functionality and experience:The final refinements will include: Our pre production prototype is fully functional and being road tested to iron out the final kinks, we have established relationships with component suppliers, with PCBs and casings being manufacured right here in London. Our assembly is also done in our workshop in Bethnal Green. We have spent a year developing prototypes, testing out different technologies, approaches and incorporating feedback from our early adopters. Narrowing down to a prototype that is easy to attach and universal to all handlebars. tether is designed, assembled and manufactured in the U.K. between our design studio in Peckham and our manufacturing shop in Shoreditch, good for product quality, ethically manufactured and good for our carbon footprint too.tether is designed to connect you to a community to create safe cycling routes for one another. The more people have and use tether the more we learn about which areas of your city are safe or unsafe to ride through.The sensors are the clever part, they are similar to the parking sensors in cars, they detect passing vehicles on either side and in front. Readings are taken and the distances of overtakes recorded (up to 2.5m) and sent in real time to the app.  We've even figured out a way to distinguish between people, cars, lamposts buses and even dogs... The app records the GPS location of where overtakes are happening, based on how safe (or unsafe) those overtakes are we can analyse and display routes for you to travel on safer and stress free. We found that there are lots of different types of handlebars out there, by working with our early adopters and attaching and testing it to multiple bikes we are confident tether can attach to any bike and any handlebar.Our pre production prototype is being road tested with everyday cyclists, couriers, and commuters with folding bikes. "WOW, there you go (when turning it on for the first time" C.O. Commuter, rides an old school road bike“I spend so much money on bike tech, and this would actually make me safer and help me be on the front foot with letting drivers know, this is my space. All the drivers in London hate couriers like me.” Jeremy, courier, rides an ebike"I think the projection of cyclist safe space is great but the idea of the community creating safe cycling routes for one another is something I've not seen before." J.K commuter and weekend warrior We are currently in testing with our early adopters and aiming to fund the 1st production run of 200 with the funds raised on Kickstarter. We have chosen to limit the first run to 200 to keep quality high, ensure manufacturing and assembly can stay in the UK and most importantly to ensure that the team can be dedicated to service and support our early backers, before moving onto the next stages of our roadmap.We hope this first stage will prove the demand for a product like this and provide us with enough data to identify problematic or dangerous areas of the cities where our users are riding. In the long run we are interested in developing tether for other forms of micromobility from skateboards to scooters, and that the patterns we uncover can be used by courier fleets or planning better cycling infrastructure for cities.www.tether.bikeIn March of 2020 - ether emerged as a skunkworks project from goya design studio with a small team of engineers and designers from Loughborough University (where Omar graduated from). Starting as an idea to help people socially distance during their outdoor exercise during lockdown we quickly uncovered the dangers cyclists face by closely overtaking cars. Omar the founder of goya was himself knocked off his bike in a similar way 20 years earlier, suffering a bad head injury.Working remotely the team developed the initial prototypes, testing behind closed doors until we successfully applied for a patent protection which is currently pending.

record.Creator: Deeper Network
record.Title: Deeper Connect Pico
record.Text: Deeper Connect Pico is the world’s thinnest, lightest, smallest, and yet the most unique and powerful cybersecurity hardware device, which integrates a 7-layer enterprise-grade firewall and the world’s one and only Decentralized VPN (DPN).Pico continues the legacy of the Deeper Connect family of products with the same plug-and-play setup and all the familiar features, providing convenience for people who travel frequently. With an included Wi-Fi Adapter, you can enjoy a safe and fast private network anytime and anywhere whether you are at home or on the go.Coming fully loaded with DPN (Decentralized VPN), Ad blocking, and Cybersecurity features, the Deeper Connect Pico can save you over US$ 600 a year compared to subscribing to similar individual services. Deeper Connect Pico is a truly all-in-one solution requiring minimal configuration to connect to all your devices, with the included Wi-Fi Adapter simply set up the Pico at home or on the go to enjoy all of its amazing features.Access to Unrestricted & Secure Internet Anytime, AnywhereIt is not VPN, it is the better DPNThe worldwide network of Deeper Connect devices enables a fully decentralized VPN experience (DPN) with Multi-Routing, Smart Routing and unrestricted access to content from any country without sacrificing Internet speed. DPN is not VPN, DPN has no centralized servers, ultimate control over your own encrypted data, censorship free providing a democratic internet with no speed dropping.*To learn more about DPN, please refer to this article "A 101 on DPN".  In the Decentralized Private Network (DPN), each device serves as both client and server and their IP address will be automatically changed based on their routing rules. Deeper Connect can establish up to 16 tunnels to other nodes all over the world. By default, they will be established in the US, Europe, Singapore, and China.Deeper Connect Pico comes with a fully-featured suite of enterprise-grade security functions to keep you safe while online and protect all your IoT devices. Never again worry about your and your family’s safety while browsing online and rest easy knowing that every device in your network is secure.The lock-free operating system running on the Pico, AtomOS, provides a 7-layer firewall with deep packet inspection, anti-tracking, intrusion prevention and more. These features are typically found in enterprise-grade products costing several times more than the Pico.Deeper Connect Pico grants peace of mind and prevents malicious actors from gaining access to your personal information, IoT devices, personal computers, and anything else connected to your network. There is no configuration necessary, once the device is powered on your network will be secure.Deeper Connect has been designed by top-level network security and distributed systems experts. The company's core technical team are veterans from Google, Palo Alto Networks, VMware, and other industry-leading companies.Deeper Connect Pico is capable of blocking ALL ads, even including pesky YouTube ads (save $144/year). Never again deal with annoying interruptions while you are browsing or watching videos.Pop up ads, banner ads, suggested products, embedded ads; these all intrude on the content you really want to access and are targeted based on information about you. After blocking those ads by Pico,  you can enjoy a fast and undisturbed browsing experience. Deeper Connect Pico offers simple and effective parental control.  Keep your children safe from inappropriate or dangerous content on the internet with a single click. Enable filtering to block those undesirable websites and even set up your own custom lists to control what content can be accessed.Deeper Connect offers simple and effective parental control, by which a single click from you will enable/disable a filter for pornography and violence-containing websites.We do not own any centralized servers as every Deeper Connect is in essence a server and a client. All these devices distribute around the world to communicate and share bandwidth with each other.Every user can set a limit to the amount of bandwidth he/she wants to share with other users. One advantage is that users can receive credits for sharing their bandwidth to later exchange them for Deeper Network services, which include monthly software updates.This form of sharing economy has the advantage to benefit the users who contribute to the sharing, without the need of a middle man mediating the transactions or charging fees.Deeper Network represents the world's first decentralized blockchain network for building a truly private, secure, and fair Internet.Deeper Network Inc. was founded in Silicon Valley in 2019 with the vision of leveraging blockchain technology to empower the real users of the internet and building both the Web 3.0 infrastructure of the future and an accessible gateway for everyone to join the revolution. We have world-class talent working on the project. Most of our team members used to hold important positions in Google, IBM, Alibaba, etc. Our technical core team members are from Palo Alto, Fortinet, and other companies that are world leaders in cybersecurity. *Shipping is currently unavailable for Mainland China*CUSTOM DUTIES are to be paid by the recipient. Duties levied differ across regions. Deeper Network is not responsible for any duty charges.*Please fill in your SHIPPING ADDRESS in English. Please also avoid using any special characters such as "Nº; º C".  *Please find the USER MANUALs at http://deepernetwork.cc*Deeper Connect Pico comes with a 5V2A USB-C POWER SUPPLY with US plug. Users located in certain countries and regions, please consider the need for an adaptor. *According to Kickstarter's Return Policy, a pledge will not be returned once the project is ended.*If you have any further questions, please contact: SUPPORT@DEEPER.NETWORK

record.Creator: Shortcut Labs
record.Title: Flic Twist: The Wireless Dial for your Smart Home
record.Text:
We have made smart buttons for over seven years. A common problem we see with smart home setups is that family members often don't understand how to control it.  Flic Twist is our dream of a perfect smart home controller. It bridges the gap between advanced users and tech-averse family members.Push and Rotate are easy to use and understand. Unlock advanced modes by pushing and rotating at the same time. Flic Twist introduces four functions never before seen in Smart Home: Smart Dimming, Advanced Dimming, Scene Blender and Selector. The Flic Hub Mini is a tiny yet powerful computer that takes your Flic Twist input and creates magic with your smart home devices. The optimized long range communication works on distances of up to 50m (150ft), makes the battery of Twist last for over 2 years, and has a ultrafast latency of less than 0.1 second. A blink of an eye takes 0.1 to 0.4 seconds.We are part of the unifying smart home standard Matter that will bring all ecosystems and devices together when it rolls out in 2022. With Matter allowing products to work seamlessly with each other, you can focus on building a smarter home and Flic Twist will allow your family to enjoy it. Matter is however not a requirement for using Flic Twist with your favorite brands.Our last three products Flic 1, Flic Hub, and Flic 2, were created thanks to you and people like you. We invented the Smart Button and now we’re back again with a new innovation for smart home control!Smart Dimming just works. You can apply it to any existing setup in two simple steps: select the parameter (like brightness, volume, or window blind position) and the devices you want to control. Smart Dimming adjusts each parameter individually, maintaining the relative differences between devices. Even if you go all the way up or down, you will always be able to get back to where you were.It also plays along nicely with other means of control, like voice commands or other apps. If something changes, Smart Dimming will observe and adapt to be ready for making smooth adjustments the next time you use it.Advanced Dimming works the same way as Smart Dimming but with much more options. When rotating you can adjust brightness, color, or saturation simultaneously. Sequence the lights and even add events.Advanced Dimming Example 1: Adjust brightness and color temperature simultaneouslyAdvanced Dimming Example 2: SequencingAdvanced Dimming Example 3: Combine Sequencing with brightness and color temperature Flic Twist's innovative Scene Blender mode allows you to preset up to 4 different light scenes. It fades smoothly between your scenes so you can select just the level in between that fits your mood for the moment. Scene Blender Example 1: Blend Scenes and Adjust BrightnessUse Smart Dimming on Rotate and Scene Blender on Push-Rotate. This allows you to blend between your scenes and then Rotate to fine-tune the brightness of your scene to perfection. Scene Blender Example 2: Shift Music between rooms or to the entire houseOn each of the 4 scenes you can set each speaker volume to 25%. Push-Rotate to blend between the scenes which will shift the music from one room to another or to the entire house. Use rotate to adjust the volume of the selected speakers.The Selector allows you to select up to 12 custom things to Activate or Adjust. Each position is referred to as clock positions in the app, 1 to 12 o'clock.Things you can AdjustThis allows you to select and adjust the settings of a specific room, the entire house or just a specific device that you want to adjust with Smart Dimming.For example, Push-Rotate to:Things you can ActivateYou predefine your actions and simply execute them. For example, Push-Rotate to:For even more advanced things you can also Activate custom internet requests, Zapier or IFTTT actions and more.
 Adaptive fieldsDepending on the number of actions you set the indicator lights will adapt accordingly. Selecting only two fields will be referred to as Left and Right. Selecting up to four fields will be referred to according to the image below.When using the Scene Blender or Selector it can be helpful to visualize the scenes or functions that have been set to the different positions. The icon sticker-pack add-on comes with a wide variety of different icons to help visualize your scenes.  Flic 2 buttons are included in some of the rewards and can be added as add-ons. Flic 2 was successfully launched here on Kickstarter in 2019 and has since then been continuously improved. Flic 2 can trigger anything that Flic Twist can trigger, but it's just a button without the rotation of Flic Twist. You can assign 3 different triggers to Push, Double Push and Hold. It's really small, wireless and comes with an adhesive that allows you to place it anywhere. Flic 2 runs on a replaceable and included coincell battery, CR2032, that lasts up to two years. Flic Twist and the Flic Hub Mini are fully backwards compatible with Flic Hub and Flic 2. Both Flic Hub LR and Flic 2 buttons will continue to be sold and maintained.Flic Hub Comparison tableThe Flic App for iOS and Android is only required when you set up your Flic Twist for the first time, and if you want to change your settings later. All settings that you make in the app are stored locally in the Flic Hub. Step by Step In the below video we demonstrate the simplicity of adding a Flic Hub and a Flic Twist to the Flic app to start configuring it. In the below video we demonstrate how your existing smart home products, in this case, a Philips Hue lightbulb, are added to the Flic app to be controlled with the Flic Twist. In the below video we show our test bench walking through the setup process step by step and demo the current state of the app and development. As a hacker, you never settle with the features that come out of the box. Flic has always been about empowering customers and provide a way to integrate our product into your personal projects. With HTTP integrations you can add smooth controls to just about anything that runs an HTTP server like your Raspberry Pi-controlled nerf gun turret. Twist to aim and push to shoot with unmatched precision. The one thing we knew before starting the design journey was that Flic Twist needed the ability to rotate. The majority of smart dimmers on the market have Up and Down buttons which are not user-friendly if you’re for example increasing the brightness from 10 to 100%.We evaluated and tested different designs and realized that separating the button and rotation gives the best user experience.We tested a variety of different sizes, from small knobs that you twist with your fingertips to large pucks that you rotate with your entire hand. After more than 10 design iterations we finally settled on the perfect size for the button and the rotating dial which is convenient to use for the entire family.Flic TwistThe Flic Twist is designed with the same Nordic Semiconductor chipset as the Flic 2 button which has Long Range features that give an indoor range of up to 50m. It comes with two replaceable AAA batteries that last up to 2 years. Flic Hub MiniThe new Flic Hub Mini is a very optimized design of our already existing product Flic Hub LR. It uses Bluetooth 5 Low Energy Long Range to communicate with Flic Twist or with other Flic products. One Flic Hub Mini can handle over 60 simultaneous connections to Flic products such as Flic Twist and Flic buttons over a range of up to 50m (150ft). Flic Hub Mini then communicates with your smart home devices using WiFi. There are no limits in how many devices a Flic Hub can control using WiFi. A Flic Hub Mini or a Flic Hub LR are required, even if you use Flic Twist with Matter. The interaction is in the twist, and the brains and logic are in the hub. This setup allows Flic products to be extremely fast and battery efficient, while offering functions that no other products have, still with full privacy. Everything you need to get started is included. Each Flic Twist comes with 2x AAA batteries and wall mount included. The Flic Hub Mini comes with the USB cable included. Below you'll find a list of all the available rewards.Shortcut Labs is a dedicated team of 14 with many years of experience in hardware and software development and with multiple products launched. The strong community that supports us in our mission by using our products day by day proved that our products bring value to the life of people. We'd love to invite you to join our community in the Flic Family. If you share our mission and what we are doing, back our product and help us to bring simplicity to the tech scene.MissionShortcut Labs has been developing the Flic product for 8 years now. Our goal is to bring simplicity to the life of all tech users, from geeks to toddlers. Using your voice or various devices to control your smart home can become frustrating, tiresome, and anti-social. Voice is an excellent tool, but it does not work in all situations. With Flic Twist, we add more options to your hands yet retain the simplicity of the original Flic button. In addition, with Flic Twist, we hope that we can engage all your family members and guests to interact with your smart home while giving you more options to control your smart home.Our JourneyJoacim, one of the Co-Founders of Flic, looked for a simpler way to track his nicotine consumption, so he decided to bring Flic to life. Shortcut Labs was founded in 2013 to create a simple interface - the world's first smart button. The first version of Flic was a great success, as almost ten thousand people backed its campaign.Since the first Flic, we have completed two other successful crowdfunding campaigns. We have shipped over half a million Flic products to 85 countries around the world. Flic integrates with hundreds of technologies we all use daily. Every Flic user has a story to tell about how they use their button. From helping them start their morning routines to be the guardian that keeps their home safe, there are thousands of innovative and imaginative ways Flic is used. But underneath all of them, one thing always remains the same - Flic makes life simple. A shortcut and a life hack that brings smiles to millions of faces every day. Help us make Flic Twist a part of this journey and spread simplicity to even more people worldwide.Privacy PolicyWe take your privacy very seriously. This mindset is also relevant for Flic products. Our products do not have microphones, nor cameras. You can read our current Privacy Policy here.The global supply chain is still recovering after the pandemic, and the prices right now are unusually high and unreliable. To avoid the current shipping costs we will not charge you for shipping now but instead wait until we are ready to ship your rewards.  Shipping Costs will be charged upon shipping, there will be low cost postal and faster express options in the post-campaign survey.Taxes and CustomsYour reward will be shipped either from the EU or the US depending on where you are. For EU and US, all taxes and duties are included in the rewards. For all other countries, taxes and duties may apply.We can ship to over 100+ countries, except the countries and territories listed below

record.Creator: SUNLU OFFICIAL
record.Title: SUNLU FilaDryer S2: Effective Support 3D Printer Creation
record.Text: Because of the printing effect, the dampened filaments are unsatisfactory. Therefore, as we expected, SUNLU created New Filament Dryer S2.  Compare to the first generation, S2 has a round inner box that has 360 ° constant temperature and uniform heatingMoreover, the design of upper and lower double heating plates increased 30% heating efficiency, so the heating temperature was from a standard 50° C to 70°C which is 20° C higher than similar products on the market. Because the heating speed is more complete and fast, the limitation does not restrict the filament surface. Also, S2 can accept more kinds of filaments and is not limited to several common types. Also, S2 not only can shorten the length of drying consumables into two hours but also dry high-end filaments such as PA/PC.3.42*2.87inch smart touch screen within 0.1-second touch feedback. It can be accurately set even under poor lighting conditions. You can set up the temperature, duration, consumable type, and lighting as well.After the test, the best drying time and temperature are summarized, like PLA, TPU, and PETG, etc. Which reduced the workload of searching consumables setting dates. Cutimazize temperature and times at the touch of a button through the touchscreen.Increasing the bottom-supported by adding four feet in the bottom can improve the function of anti-skid.The four feet in the bottom does not only improve the functionality of anti-skid but also avoids the heat conduction to other objects by adding more space between product and surface.S2 has even more accomplishments. I'm keeping it a secret as long as crowdfunding develops. We are very welcome your perspective, suggestions, and comments. Also, your advice motivates us to improve!To prevent moisture, each 3D printing filament is dried and vacuumed before shipping. Because of the printing effect, the dampened filaments are unsatisfactory. However, we cannot predict if the filaments can be finished at once, so the rest of the filaments will be dampened.───── "Hi, Kickstarter! This is SUNLU official group. As a good supporter of the 3D printing industry, SUNLU strongly recommends all 3D fans join our New FilaDryer S2 crowdfunding because we try our best to bring high-quality machines to everyone as the vision of SUNLU“Technology Enabling Creation Easier.”SUNLU appreciates all people who accompany us growing up on the 3D road together. As the development in the 3D industry, SUNLU has more than 30 warehouses across the countries. We try to reach every 3D lover from the whole world by setting up the website: www. sunlu.com. Also, we expand social media into Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Twitter, Tiktok, Reddit, and Snapchat as well. You can find us by searching @SUNLUOFFICIAL. Please join SUNLU's big family!         SUNLU has its own proprietary intellectual property patent formula and its own professionally developed production line. It has a wide range of applications. The product has successfully passed RoHS and other test certifications. Through independent innovation, it has obtained several national technology patent certificates and awards in the 3D printing industry at an international leading level. Moreover, SUNLU has over 30 warehouses across the countries. It continues to expand the business area.

record.Creator: Glenn Fleishman
record.Title: Monotype Electro Type Matrix: 3D Model and 3D Print
record.Text: This small campaign is focused on a single type artifact: the Monotype Electro Display Matrix, developed by the Monotype Company in the early 1900s to cast large multiples of individual pieces of type. The funds raised by the campaign cover the cost of producing an accurate 3D model of a single matrix, suitable for 3D output, and making 3D prints to fulfill campaign rewards.Understanding the past often requires the means to study it. In my research over the last several years into the history of printing and typefounding and typesetting, I’ve collected many artifacts that give me insight into how things were made and how that affected publishing, design, and the spread of information.Many printing artifacts are in short supply, as they haven’t been manufactured in several decades or much longer. To gain access to limited tools, you can make fresh copies of them—and 3D scanning, modeling, and printing is a fantastic modern technique that can bring the past back to life. I need your help to produce and refine a model of the Electro Display Matrix and release it in the world. When the campaign concludes, you can follow updates both posted here and at the Tiny Type Blog.Campaign backers will receive the 3D file first. But to further cultural and technological understanding, six months after backers get access, I will distribute the file under a Creative Commons CC-BY 4.0 license, which permits any use with attribution, allowing its wide distribution. This will allow others with the interest to have a perfected model to reproduce or build from without starting from scratch.Reward tiers include:This project is the first foray into what I hope will be a future series of 3D models of printing artifacts. I drew inspiration for this project from the 3Dhotbed teaching tools developed as a collaboration of the Texas A&M University Book History Workshop, Cushing Memorial Library, and Texas A&M University.Because I don’t yet have the model made, I can’t show you what they would look like. However, I can show an example of something comparable, the type punch from the 3Dhotbed project. In the image below, this is how the model appears in 3D-printer preparation software, as a print in PLA material, and as a 3D print in metal.The Electro Display Matrix is one of several kinds of molds (or matrices) used to create type by casting it in a liquid lead alloy, which fills the mold and quickly cools and hardens. The size and type of mold varied with the point size of the type. The Electro Display Matrix was used for display type, from 14 to 36 points.A type-foundry worker would mount the Electro Display Matrix into a holder and place it in a specialized typecasting machine. They could then monitor the machine as it produced hundreds to thousands identical pieces of metal type per hour. Each piece would emerge in its nearly finished condition, ready to be added to a font—a set of metal type at a specific size in one style—and shipped off to a printer or put in storage for future orders.The Electro Display Matrix is a thing of beauty, containing two types of metal and involving machining, stamping, and an electrochemical deposition process called electrotyping.In electrotyping, a model of what the finished piece of metal type should look like is inserted into a cavity in a piece of machined and stamped bronze. The process deposits copper onto the model, forming the mold when the model is removed. See images for illustrations of this process.Each number on the mold refers to the font of which it is part, its width, its size, and other technical characteristics. The finished matrix’s dimensions are 1.125 by .75 by 0.094 inches. Beveled edges allowed it to be locked into place in the casting machine.Electrotyping allowed a massive increase in the variety and production of type in the latter half of the 19th century and Monotype and other companies further accelerated that by creating a standardized mold to cast type.Some modern experimenters have replicated the process on a very limited scale, as producing these molds in quantity required industrial operations.This campaign will pay for the cost of 3D scanning, modeling, and prototyping a copy of a single matrix. I am working with two established 3D modeling firms that have produced work of similar complexity from original objects and provided binding estimates. (Because the project hit its goal early, the matrices are already off for scanning and at two different companies for comparison and to improve the odds of an initial positive outcome.)Part of your pledge supports releasing the 3D model for broad use without fee or restriction.The commitment of this campaign is that the matrix will be 3D-printed in PLA (polylactic acid), a hard plastic-like material. However, depending on the final costs of production and the volume of items ordered, I hope to be able to upgrade that to 3D printing in some form of metal. All backers who pledge for a 3D-printed matrix will receive the upgrade if the budget allows for it.Many Monotype matrices remain in use at active type foundries around the world, such as M&H Type in San Francisco (part of the non-profit Grabhorn Institute) and the Bixler Press & Letterfoundry in New York. However, I regularly come across small sets of Electro Display Matrices that are not in the right condition for typecasting. A cleaned-up matrix from a recovered set is part of the higher-tier rewards, like the one shown below. (My intent is never to remove material from circulation that could be used by active letterpress printers or type foundries.) This campaign will help preserve the past, spread knowledge about the technology, and give backers a unique replica or actual piece of printing history.Backers at the top tier will receive two 3D-printed and two historic Electro Display Type matrices and one Super Caster master, of the kind shown below.Shipments within the United States: This project’s reward prices include sales tax for shipments made to addresses within Washington State in the United States.Shipments outside the United States: I do not collect GST, VAT, or import duties for items shipped outside the United States. You may be required to pay the delivery company taxes or duties when physical items arrive in your country. These often range from between 10% to 25%, depending on the country.

record.Creator: Dan Pastusek
record.Title: PiBox: A Modular Raspberry Pi Storage Server
record.Text: PiBox is a purpose built storage server (NAS) designed for running self-hosted applications at your home & office, runs 24/7, and uses very little power. Storage is modular, and allows you to add any two SATA compatible SSDs.Powered by Raspberry PiThe Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 is at the core of PiBox. Our standard bundle includes 8GB of RAM, 8GB of built-in storage, and WiFi. If you pick the hacker bundle reward (i.e. carrier boards only), you will need to supply your own CM4, which is available in 32 variants, with a range of RAM, eMMC Flash, and WiFi options. A Micro SD card slot is present on the PiBox boards, so you are able to use the "Lite" variants without onboard storage.Hacker FriendlyWith a Raspberry Pi at the core, PiBox is the most hackable NAS on the market. We broke out the GPIO pins so you can wire up sensors and Pi HATs, and even included a header for 2 extra USB ports in case you want to install it in a larger case. On the front panel, there's a user-controllable RGB LED and a 1.3" LCD that you can use for displaying any information you want.Better than the CloudReplace expensive cloud bills with PiBox. PiBox lets you easily migrate from Google Photos to PhotoPrism, or from DropBox to Nextcloud, and many more. Pibox runs new self-hosted applications at the click of a button.This video shows how you can install PhotoPrism on your PiBox:Powered by KubeSailKubeSail is optional software that helps youWe built KubeSail in order to make it easy to self-host apps, wherever they live. We ship KubeSail software with PiBox and hope you enjoy it, but you are never locked in or forced to use it. PiBox is deeply rooted in an open ecosystem and we have instructions on how to flash your PiBox from scratch if you enjoy tinkering!Customizable LCD Display and LEDsBy default, the front of PiBox shows important stats about your PiBox. You can customize the screen to show anything else, such as the Weather, Tweets, or even your favorite cat GIFs. The top indicator is a tri-color RGB LED, wired to three separate GPIO pins of the Raspberry Pi, so its easy to customize. Install some software that takes advantage of these features, or write your own!Silent OperationThe PiBox emits a PWM control signal so the fan only spins as fast as necessary. This makes it quieter than even the Official Raspberry Pi Case fan, and keeps the CPU from experiencing large temperature swings, which should lead to longer CPU life for your Pi. Typically this is done via a dedicated controller chip that is impossible to buy currently, due to the ongoing chip shortage. But thanks to some clever code from alwynallan on GitHub, we are able to ship a silent PiBox now, with no delays.Open, Hackable, and UpgradableThe PiBox is designed to be opened. All the components are modular and upgradable, including the backplane and carrier board. For example, this means that you can continue to use the expensive Raspberry Pi Compute Module and SSDs, even if you later decide you need a PiBox with more ports, or a larger front display.DIY Edition (Hacker Bundle) - 10 Minute Assembly VideoThis video shows the assembly instructions for the DIY edition of PiBox. In this reward tier, we provide the carrier and backplane boards, and the rest is up to you. You will need to provide your own Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4, Cooling Fan, 15W+ USB-C Power Supply, CM4 WiFi Antenna,  1.3" LCD Display, Case (3D Printed or Metal), and one or two SSD drives.Meet the CreatorsHi there! We're Dan and Seandon. After becoming friends while working and scaling up servers at Imgur, we founded the startup KubeSail with a goal of making home-hosting awesome. The most common complaint we kept hearing is that it was a hassle to get good home server hardware (existing options were too small and slow, or too big and loud). We designed a fits-in-the-palm-of-your-hand server based on the latest Raspberry Pi CM4 and ultra-fast SSDs, and you can customize it! - Buy the stand-alone hardware or combine it with KubeSail.com for apps, dynamic DNS, web-forwarding, backups and more!

record.Creator: Personomic
record.Title: Personomic — Custom-made bike grips with high durability
record.Text:
The bike grip from Personomic is the last grip you will ever need: 3D printed to fit your hand, made of 100% silicone to prevent stickiness and customized by you according to your design preferences.Hand discomfort will be a thing of the past with your own custom-made bike grip.During the development of the grips, we took advantage of our network of people specialized in ergonomics as well as people with a medical background.Independent studies have shown that Personomic grips excel at reducing the pressure load on the hands, thus preventing and reducing common cycling-related hand issues. The grips fit on almost any handlebar because they are standardized and to top it off, they are 100% made in Germany as a guarantee for their quality.As a cyclist, the problem is all too familiar: whether it's the saddle or the bike handle, you often have to deal with numbness, tingling or pain that can really ruin the cycling experience.Until now, bicycle grips have only been offered in standard sizes, developed with an average-sized hand in mind. Therefore, these grips only constitute a compromise. For many people it is mostly a bad one, because every hand is different.In addition, the vast majority of bicycle grips are made of rubber and start to become sticky after a short time. This is caused by the plasticizers contained in the material, which dissolve from the handle due to UV radiation and sweat.Our solution turns the bicycle grip market on its head: a bike grip that is 3D printed to fit the individual cyclist with just a photo of the hand, therefore providing optimum support. The grip is made of silicone, which contains no plasticizers, therefore it will never become sticky and will last for many years.The bike grip from Personomic is custom-made for your hands. We take the individual characteristics of your hand into account, such as the width and length of your fingers and your palm. This allows for a perfect fit. The force is distributed evenly across your hand and there are no pressure peaks that compress the nerves — similar to an orthopaedic insole.The enlarged surface with the wing also supports your wrist and prevents hyperextension, one of the main reasons for numb or tingling fingers.Regular bike grips made of rubber quickly start to become sticky because of the plasticizers they contain.We have recognized this problem and therefore use silicone, because it is extremely abrasion-resistant and guaranteed not to become sticky – you will be able to enjoy your grips for years.We specify the shape of the grip and you design it. You can let your creativity run wild with the design and choose from over 350 design combinations. Choose the color, texture and lock rings. You can even have the handle engraved, making your dream grip unique to you. We use only the best materials and manufacture in Germany to offer a premium grip. With the company Rapid Shape, we have gained one of the world's leading manufacturers of 3D printing systems as a partner to guarantee the best possible quality in production.— These reviews have been translated from German to English —From the outset, we have developed the bike grips with passionate cyclists and have incorporated their feedback into the development. This allowed us to develop a grip that is tailored precisely to the needs of cyclists.I have now tested the bike grips extensively and their shape is just incredible. I've never experienced such a pleasant grip before and I've run through lots in the past. I tore a ligament in my left hand 2 months ago due to a fall. With the bike grips there are no issues whatsoever. They support the injured hand really well. — Hjalmar P. from BochumI didn't feel any tingling or numbness in my hands. My problems stem from my thumb basal joint because of arthritis, but that also became much, much better. On longer tours they have always hurt a lot, but with the new grips there was a lot of improvement. — Silvia A. from KirfThe different surfaces (asphalt, gravel) did not lead to any (negative) changes in my hands ... the bike grips simply "swallowed" the vibrations, which I personally find important.... Conclusion: if the grips are positioned correctly, they bring (me) noticeable relief. The problems with my hands have become significantly better, even on long-distance tours. — Susanne K. from MuensterOn Facebook, the young start-up Personomic was looking for testers for their custom-made and ergonomic bicycle grips. With a bit of luck, I was chosen as a tester due to my history of rheumatism and have now been testing these grips for 4 weeks and about 400 km. I am absolutely thrilled how these grips have improved my "cycling life". — Andreas K. from SchwalbachThe reviews of our testers are confirmed by pressure analyses. In a study conducted by the University of Stuttgart, our custom-made bicycle grips were compared with six other ergonomic grips available on the market.Force measurements showed that compared to conventional bicycle grips, our grips are the best at reducing both the pressure peaks on the palm as well as the surface pressure.In addition to the grips, you can order end plugs and lock rings as add-ons to use them as spare parts if needed. This is how you get your grips:Before your grips go into production, we will ask you to scan your hands on our website. All you need is a smartphone with which you can take a photo of each hand on a sheet of paper. The photos will then be sent to us.We are compatible with both DIN-A4 and US letter formats.After you have successfully scanned your hands, you can design the grip according to your own design preferences in the configurator.  We can measure your hand with just one photo. The sheet of paper serves as a reference object whose exact dimensions we know. With your hand measurements, we then create a freely movable 3D model of your hand.Similar to orthopaedic insoles, our software creates a virtual imprint of your hand including the palm rest and grip recesses.
 We then print a mold that has the shape of your hand and cast it with silicone. The result is a bike grip that fits your hand perfectly and will never become sticky.* Handlebars are standardized. You can measure yours if you are unsure.** We plan to offer shortened grips for grip shifters in 2022.Please note that you will be responsible for any potential import duties, taxes and customs fees after the shipment arrives in your country (not valid if you reside in the EU).After the end of the crowdfunding campaign and before the start of production, you will be asked to scan your hands as well as choose the design of your grips. During this process, you will also be able to set your delivery address.Do you want to give your loved ones a really unique present for christmas or their birthday? In this case, we provide you with a printable voucher in a design suitable for the occasion.You will receive the download link in time by e-mail.We love cycling and believe that bikes as a means of transport can contribute to climate protection and make our cities more livable. However, common cycling-related hand discomfort is a problem because it limits people's ability to ride their bikes. That's why we use high-tech 3D printers to enable people to ride their bikes without any discomfort.When we met in 2020 just when the COVID-19 pandemic started, we were faced with the question of how to proceed in our lives. Due to the uncertainty, it was obvious that we should use the crisis to start our own company.We created the first prototype of the bicycle grip using impression material that is usually used by dentists. Through these experiments, a rough shape for the bicycle grip emerged quickly. Finally, we set the final design after many iterations.We were already on German national TV with our grips. Moreover, we were able to present our grips to thousands of cyclists at the VELOFrankfurt and Eurobike bike fairs. The feedback we received was overwhelming.With your help, we now want to make the bicycle grips available to as many people as possible!Der Fahrradgriff von Personomic ist der letzte Griff, den du brauchen wirst: im 3D-Druck individuell auf deine Hand angepasst, gefertigt aus 100 % Silikon gegen lästiges Verkleben und außerdem von dir nach deinen Vorlieben designbar.Mit deinem eigenen maßgefertigten Fahrradgriff gehören Handbeschwerden der Vergangenheit an.Während der Entwicklung der Griffe konnten wir auf unser Netzwerk, bestehend aus Ergonomiespezialisten sowie Personen mit medizinischem Hintergrund, zurückgreifen.Unabhängige Studien haben gezeigt, dass Personomic-Griffe die Druckbelastung auf die Hände hervorragend reduzieren und damit Handproblemen, die beim Radfahren häufig auftreten, vorbeugen bzw. diese reduzieren.Die Griffe passen auf fast alle Lenkerstangen, da diese standardisiert sind. Außerdem sind sie zu 100 % in Deutschland hergestellt, was für ihre Qualität bürgt.Bekannt aus: Als Fahrradfahrer kennt man das Problem. Ob beim Sattel oder beim Fahrradgriff, oft hat man es mit Taubheitsgefühlen, Kribbeln oder Schmerzen zu tun, die einem das Fahrradfahren richtig vermiesen können.Fahrradgriffe werden bisher nur in Standardgrößen angeboten, die im Hinblick auf eine Durchschnittshand entwickelt wurden. Dadurch stellen sie nur einen Kompromiss dar. Für viele Leute meistens einen Schlechten, weil jede Hand anders ist.Darüber hinaus wird die große Mehrheit der Fahrradgriffe aus Gummi hergestellt und fängt nach kurzer Zeit an, klebrig zu werden. Das liegt an den enthaltenen Weichmachern, die sich aufgrund der UV-Strahlung und Schweiß aus dem Griff lösen. Unsere Lösung stellt den Markt für Fahrradgriffe auf den Kopf: Ein Fahrradgriff, der mit nur einem Foto der Hand im 3D-Druck auf den jeweiligen Fahrer angepasst wird und die Hand optimal entlastet. Durch das Aufgießen mit Silikon, welches keine Weichmacher enthält, wird der Griff nie verkleben und viele Jahre halten. Der Fahrradgriff von Personomic wird für deine Hände maßgefertigt. Wir berücksichtigen dabei die individuellen Merkmale deiner Hand, wie z. B. die Breite und Länge deiner Finger und deines Handtellers. Dadurch entsteht ein perfekter Fit.Die Kraft wird gleichmäßig auf deine Hand verteilt, und es kommt zu keinen Belastungsspitzen, die die Nerven in deiner Hand komprimieren — ähnlich wie bei einer orthopädischen Schuheinlage.Der Entlastungsflügel stützt außerdem dein Handgelenk und verhindert so ein Abknicken, einer der Hauptgründe für taube oder kribbelnde Finger.Normale Fahrradgriffe aus Gummi fangen aufgrund der darin enthaltenen Weichmacher schnell an, klebrig zu werden.Wir haben dieses Problem erkannt und verwenden deshalb Silikon, weil es extrem abriebfest ist und garantiert nicht verklebt — du hast jahrelang Freude daran.Wir geben die Form des Griffs vor und du designst ihn. Du kannst deiner Kreativität beim Design freien Lauf lassen und aus über 350 Designkombinationen wählen. Ob Farbe, Klemmring oder Textur — am Ende kommt ein einzigartiger Griff heraus. Dafür garantiert auch eine Gravur, die du wählen kannst. Wir verwenden nur die besten Materialien und produzieren selbst in Deutschland, um einen wirklichen Premium-Griff anzubieten. Mit der Firma Rapid Shape haben wir einen der weltweit führenden Anbieter für 3D-Druck-Systeme als Partner gewonnen, um die bestmögliche Qualität in der Produktion zu garantieren.Wir haben die Fahrradgriffe von Anfang an mit leidenschaftlichen Radfahrern entwickelt und haben deren Feedback mit in die Entwicklung einfließen lassen. Dadurch konnten wir einen Griff entwickeln, der exakt auf die Bedürfnisse von Fahrradfahrern abgestimmt ist. Ich habe die Griffe jetzt ausführlich getestet und die Form ist einfach mega. So angenehm war noch kein Griff und ich habe einige durch. Ich hatte vor 2 Monaten durch einen Sturz einen Bänderabriss an der linken Problemhand. Mit den Griffen habe ich null Probleme. Die verletzte Hand ist richtig gut gestützt. — Hjalmar P. aus BochumIch hatte keinerlei Kribbeln oder Taubheitsgefühl in meinen Händen. Mein Hauptproblem sind aber immer meine Daumengrundgelenke wegen Arthrose, aber auch das war viel, viel besser. Bei längeren Touren haben die schon immer sehr geschmerzt, aber mit den neuen Griffen war das wirklich deutlich besser. — Silvia A. aus KirfDie unterschiedlichen Untergründe (Asphalt, Schotter) führten zu keiner (negativen) Veränderung meiner Hände … die Griffe haben das einfach „geschluckt“, was ich persönlich wichtig finde. ... Fazit: Wenn die Handgriffe richtig positioniert sind, bringen sie (mir) eine spürbare Erleichterung, so dass meine Handprobleme deutlich weniger sind — auch über eine längere Strecke. — Susanne K. aus MünsterBei Facebook wurden von dem jungen Start-Up Unternehmen Personomic Tester für ihre maßgefertigten und ergonomischen Fahrradgriffe gesucht. Mit etwas Glück wurde ich mit meiner Rheuma-Vorgeschichte als Tester ausgesucht und teste diese Griffe jetzt seit 4 Wochen und ca. 400 km. Ich bin absolut begeistert, wie diese Griffe mir mein „Fahrradleben“ wieder verbessert haben. — Andreas K. aus SchwalbachDie Erfahrungsberichte unserer Tester werden von Druckanalysen bestätigt. In einer Studie der Universität Stuttgart wurden unsere maßgefertigten Fahrradgriffe mit sechs weiteren am Markt erhältlichen ergonomischen Griffen verglichen.Motorische Kraftmessungen ergaben, dass unsere Griffe sowohl die Kraftspitzen auf die Handfläche als auch die Flächenpressung am besten reduzieren.Zusätzlich zu den Griffen kannst du als Add-ons noch weitere Endstopfen und Klemmringe als Ersatz oder farbliche Ergänzung bestellen. So kommst du zu deinem Griff:Bevor deine Griffe in Produktion gehen, scannst du deine Hände auf unserer Webseite. Du brauchst dafür nur ein Smartphone, mit dem du ein Foto jeder Hand auf einem DIN-A4-Blatt machst. Die Fotos werden im Anschluss an uns übermittelt. Nachdem du deine Hände erfolgreich gescannt hast, kannst du im Konfigurator den Griff ganz nach deinen Wünschen designen. 
 Mit dem Foto deiner Hand können wir deine Hand millimetergenau vermessen. Das DIN-A4-Blatt dient uns dabei als Referenzobjekt, dessen Maße wir kennen. Mit deinen Handmaßen erstellen wir ein frei bewegliches 3D-Modell deiner Hand.Ähnlich wie bei orthopädischen Schuheinlagen erstellt unsere Software einen virtuellen Abdruck deiner Hand samt Handballenauflage und Griffmulden.Wir drucken im Anschluss eine Gussform, die die Form deiner Hand hat, und gießen sie mit Silikon auf. Das Ergebnis ist ein Fahrradgriff, der perfekt zu deiner Hand passt und nie verkleben wird.* Lenkerstangen sind standardisiert. Miss gerne nach, falls du unsicher bist.** Wir planen, nach dem Crowdfunding im regulären Verkauf verkürzte Griffe für Drehgriffschaltungen anzubieten. Bitte beachte, dass du für eventuell anfallende Zollgebühren oder erhobene Mehrwertsteuer verantwortlich bist (gilt nicht mit Wohnsitz in der EU). Nach Ablauf der Kampagne und vor Start der Produktion wirst du nach dem Scannen deiner Hände und Konfigurieren deiner Griffe die Möglichkeit haben, deine Lieferanschrift zu hinterlegen. Willst du einem dir lieben Menschen zu Weihnachten oder zum Geburtstag ein wirklich einzigartiges Geschenk machen? Für diesen Fall stellen wir dir einen ausdruckbaren Gutschein im passenden Design zur Verfügung.Den Link zum Download erhältst du rechtzeitig per E-Mail.Wir lieben Fahrradfahren und glauben, dass das Fahrrad als Fortbewegungsmittel einen Teil zum Klimaschutz beitragen und unsere Städte lebenswerter machen kann. Weitverbreitete Handbeschwerden sind da natürlich ein Problem, weil sie die Fahrer unnötig einschränken. Wir benutzen deshalb High-Tech, um Menschen beschwerdefreies Fahrradfahren zu ermöglichen.Als wir uns 2020 kennenlernten, standen wir pünktlich zum Beginn der Coronapandemie vor der Frage, wie es beruflich bei uns weitergehen soll. Aufgrund der Unsicherheit war nichts naheliegender, als die Krise zu nutzen, um ein eigenes Unternehmen zu gründen.Den ersten Prototypen des Fahrradgriffs erstellten wir noch mit Abformmasse, wie sie bei Zahnärzten Verwendung findet. Durch diese Versuche kristallisierte sich schnell eine grobe Form für den Fahrradgriff heraus. In vielen Iterationsstufen kamen wir dann zum finalen Design des Griffs.Mit unseren Griffen waren wir drei Mal im Fernsehen zu sehen, u. a. in der SWR Landesschau und bei „Einfach genial“ im MDR. Auf der VELOFrankfurt und Eurobike konnten wir außerdem tausenden Fahrradfahrern vor Ort unsere Griffe präsentieren. Das Feedback war überwältigend.Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir jetzt die Fahrradgriffe einer breiten Masse an Menschen zur Verfügung stellen!This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Gareth Owen
record.Title: Redkey USB V4: Data Wipe PCs, Cell Phones & More.
record.Text: If you own a computer, tablet, or smartphone, you need the Redkey USB. It's simply the easiest way to permanently and completely wipe your digital assets, quickly and safely, without damaging them in any way. Before you consider donating, gifting, or selling your personal electronic devices, let the Redkey USB clean them up for you.Redkey is a sophisticated, military-grade, permanent information disposal device. This one convenient key-chain sized tool contains everything needed to wipe your PC, Mac, and new for V4 Ultimate - Tablets and Smartphones. Yes! it has the ability to wipe the ever-popular Apple iPhone, as well as Android-based mobile devices, better than you can do from the devices themselves. Using the Redkey couldn't be easier. Simply activate the device with a working PC, which gives you access to free lifetime updates, and loads it with the latest software. Then, insert your Redkey into the target computer. Power up the computer and hit F10, F12, or whatever key gets you into the 'Boot Menu'. Select the Redkey USB, and follow the on-screen instructions. Redkey goes through every Sector, Bit, and Byte, scrubbing and cleaning it with a completely irreversible algorithm designed to protect your privacy and security. Once complete, even the most sophisticated hacker or computer technician will be unable to recover your data - guaranteed. For our V4 product launch, Redkey is offering several premium rewards for our backers: Redkey comes in 3 variants. Home, Professional and Ultimate editions, depending on your needs. Our entry-level USB key is still the most cost-effective and affordable way to wipe PC's. Our newly designed USB-C keys are for professionals and advanced consumers who want the ability and flexibility to wipe newer devices that may only have USB-C ports. Ideal when occasionally selling or recycling a computer. Redkey Home edition software provides access to all our essential data wipe functions, including 20+ built-in data wipe standards. Let our new Wipe Wizard™ guide you through the wipe process step-by-step. Little to no technical know-how is required. View a basic data wipe report on-screen at the end of the process, and then double-check your drives are clear with our built-in data viewer. Gets the job done to military standards. Available in both entry level standard or Dual USB-C construction. Suitable for the more familiar computer user - Redkey professional builds on all of the features of the Home edition by adding several more advanced features that are of benefit to those that work and play with computers. View more detailed data wipe reports on-screen, then save them as a useful PDF that can be later emailed or printed. Add your own company logo to the wipe reports to improve your professional image. View detailed system information on the screen, and include this within your reports to provide reassurance and certainty to those in receipt of your services. Access advanced menu settings, then create and run your own customized data wipe process. View Smart disk information. Customize the look and feel of the software by importing your images and audio into our built-in screensaver/media function. Why not start a data wiping service / business with Redkey Professional? Feature loaded & great value. Dual USB-C construction. Ideal for computer experts or businesses and organizations with technical resources. Redkey Ultimate provides complete access to all the expert features and benefits that Redkey offers, including the ability to wipe Mobile Devices, and save certified data erasure reports. Save time when processing batches of similar computers with our scripting feature, which allows you to deploy a custom, automated wiping process on sets of similar computers. Automate auditing tasks by pre-filling and importing technician information into your reports. Redkey Ultimate has everything you need to phase out your expensive existing data wipe solution while helping you to remain compliant with current data sanitization regulations. Reduce your overheads with Redkey Ultimate. Dual USB-C construction. Our data wipe kits are available in 3 different versions. Stainless steel Platinum, USB-C, and LED - three key sets. These are a complete three step system for backing up, wiping, and re-installing your devices. Our new Alloy LED illuminated keys are a sophisticated and durable option for those that want the highest quality we offer. All data wipe kits come with an Ultimate edition Redkey, along with the new smart device data wiping ability. We're excited about the new technology that will be included in this new product and some aspects of the design will change with time as we move forward on development. In addition to demonstrating what's possible now (and giving reassurance before buying), we've provided an introduction to our newest features below so you can see how much work goes into creating this innovative product. New features already developed: All editions of Redkey can now be used to wipe other computers connected over a local area network. A suitable LAN network connection is required, and minimal system requirements apply. Be careful - Redkey is a powerful tool. This new user-friendly mode guides you through a wipe process step-by-step, thereby eliminating any guesswork. Redkey will never leave you wondering whether a wipe has been successful or not. Get the results you need in the easiest way possible with our helpful new Wipe Wizard™.For Ultimate users, Redkey can now wipe a range of both Apple and Android - Tablets and Smart Phones. All you need is a suitable data cable and a little patience to prepare the device. Our new menu layout guides you through the process step by step. Redkey works in combination with your device's existing functions to bring you an additional layer of security that is better than a factory reset alone. New features currently under development: We've listened to our customers' feedback over the last few years although we already have a working prototype for V4, we are overhauling our system interface for the V4 product launch. An improved menu structure will make navigation more logical and intuitive, while our new light / dark mode will make things easier on the eye. It's a win-win situation all around.This new 'Set & Forget' wipe mode is for wiping everything quickly and efficiently. Professional edition & above users will be able to access a unique animated sci-fi style 'auto-destruction' sequence - complete with audio. This campaign ships worldwide. All rewards will be sent fully tracked & insured. **EUROPEAN UNION ONLY - IMPORTANT** Due to the recent exit of the UK from the EU all items to the EU must be sent "DDU" - Delivery Duty Unpaid. All EU recipients will be liable for any import / customs duties / charges that your country will impose. These rates vary within the EU but roughly equate to Approx. 20-25% of the combined value of the goods & shipping + handling fees - typically of around €15. We are sorry for this unfortunate situation and will do our best to ship all reward 'gifts' in a way that minimizes recipient costs. For some regions (e.g., Brazil) we may need you to supply additional information, e.g., CNPJ / CPF numbers. We will contact you directly in due course if this applies to your pledge.Redkey works on most Windows™ compatible Desktops & Laptop computers made since 2000, and most Intel-processor-based Apple computers made between 2006 and 2019. Redkey is not compatible with 'Apple silicon' computers. Specifically - any 'non-Intel processor' based systems such as power PC and proprietary M1 architectures. Redkey 'Ultimate' works on most Apple Cell Phones and Tablets, and has been tested successfully on most models. Redkey Ultimate also works on most Android Cell Phones and tablets, made by various manufacturers, running Android software versions ranging from 3-12. Exact processes may vary. Access to compatible USB ports is required as well as a genuine data cable. Some devices will require system configuration before use. Exceptions apply. Minimal computer system requirements apply X86/X64 & min. 1GB RAM. Min. 4GB system RAM is needed to utilize the remote wipe mode. Redkey is not rated for specific specialist / commercial equipment such as servers, data center hardware, network disk arrays & virtual computers (although we are working on it). Redkey works on internally and externally connected storage devices, including HDD, SSD, M.2, NVME, USB, SD, and eMMC drives. Individual drives may be selected from within the Wipe Wizard & advanced menu functions. Redkey can wipe a remotely connected system connected over a Local Area Network through a suitable connection. Typically this involves a LAN connection through an appropriate router, through a direct connection using a special 'crossover' network cable, or directly through a Cat-8 or above LAN cable. Access the advanced menu to adjust wipe settings if required. Warning: Redkey permanently destroys all data including partitions, operating systems and hidden disk areas. By using our products, you agree that you want all data to be destroyed. If you do not agree to this, do not use our products. Redkey must be kept attached during use. Software End-user license agreement & terms & conditions of use apply. During 2020 Redkey software was independently certified (scientifically proven) to erase all user data from HDD and SSD devices by the Asset Disposal and Information Security Alliance. ADISA is a certification body for companies who provide IT Asset Disposal services and to manufacturers and developers of software and hardware data sanitization solutions. All third party trademarks (including logos and icons) referenced by Redkey remain the property of their respective owners. Unless specifically identified as such, our use of third party trademarks does not indicate any relationship, sponsorship, or endorsement between Redkey and the owners of these trademarks. All references by Redkey to third party trademarks are to identify the corresponding third party goods and/or services and intended to constitute nominative fair use under applicable trademark laws.'The Net Guy" an experienced computer technician and talented YouTube influencer from the USA who produced an amazing review video on Redkey a few months back all at his own accord. This video was so informative & entertaining, we just had to ask him to help us launch our new V4 product! We've really enjoyed working with the Net Guy, and if your into all things tech. related, we would totally recommend you subscribe to his up-and-coming YouTube channel and help give him a well-deserved boost. A link to his original Redkey video is provided below, along with some links to other notable Redkey reviews from over the past few years. Please note, all of these videos in the links below contain content based on current or older versions of the Redkey software, so do not fully represent whats on offer with this campaign. With that in mind, remember to like and subscribe to these channels!Redkey is a proud finalist in the UK 2021 Computing Security Awards. Our nomination is for Secure Data & Asset Disposal Company of the Year. If you run a business, would you be willing to help Redkey attain this prestigious award? All it takes is a mere vote! If your in, please cast a vote for us using the following link: 2021 Computing Security Awards Voting closes 19th November 2021. Vote now! Thank you.The Redkey system is designed to be future-proof: Redkey is a one-time investment that will save you money and so pay for itself quickly compared to other products. All Redkey's include access to free software updates for the life of the product, backed by a two-year workmanship warranty. Our software provides unlimited use with no ongoing costs. For enterprise consumers, the Redkey USB helps you with PCI, HIPAA, GDPR, and CCPA compliance, with access to over 20 erasing algorithms, and the ability to brand reports and customize the user interface to your company. We've picked up numerous positive reviews from various platforms over the past few years. Here's a brief extract of but a few:You're getting our years of ingenuity and expertise, which you can use to support your IT teams and enforce security standards. Give yourself the peace of mind that comes with knowing your data is safely erased, and protect yourself with the Redkey USB today.

record.Creator: Crystal Allen
record.Title: Explore Galore: Discover The World's Hidden Treasures
record.Text: Have you ever had a friend ask if you’ve seen a certain natural feature on a trail near your hometown, or if you knew where such and such a place got its name? Maybe you've heard them talking about this amazing place they visited and what they experienced there, but you were never able to find that place on your own.  I have experienced all of the above.  It can be frustrating and discouraging.  But, it doesn’t have to be.  You will no longer be getting lost, missing out, be left wondering, have to turn back, or break the bank paying for a guide.Explore Galore is a free downloadable app that helps individuals and agencies create fun, informative, and educational audio tours recorded by professional voice actors. GPS recognizes where you are on the trail and prompts the next audio clip.  It also uses QR codes on trail markers that can prompt content.  We want to create trails all over the world, in every community, and encourage people to get out and explore the world around them.In Phase 1 we will create a community of users that can build their own pacing guides, act as virtual hiking partners, and obtain followers and passive income.  All users will be able to track progress, complete challenges, earn badges and rewards and view leaderboards.   It will also provide the opportunity for individuals to create their own personal family history tours to preserve important memories.  Phase 2 includes the official audio tours and the TRAILS Initiative (Teaching Responsibility And Independent Learning Skills).  During this phase of development, we will reach out to municipalities, agencies, schools and other interested parties to collaborate and build official audio tours for their respective communities.  Explore Galore will provide physical signs (trail markers) for hiking trails and work with agencies and local professionals to include quality content about wildlife, plants, historic events, etc.  Contributors for these tours will earn a fixed percentage of every download!  These official audio tours may be hiking trails, city tours, river rafting expeditions, snowshoe or nordic ski areas, ATV trail rides, or aviation tours with pre-planned flight paths.The idea is simple.  The app will be simple and easy to use and this service is not available anywhere else.  You want to hike the Appalachian Trail and learn about everything along the way, but there’s no audio tour yet?  That’s ridiculous!  Explore Galore audio tours will be everywhere you want to go and others will be sharing their trail experiences for those that choose to subscribe to the additional material.Explore Galore will be like the Peloton of the hiking community.  You can learn things for the first time that you would never know going alone, or we can be your built-in fitness tracker, fitness guide, and virtual hiking partner for an enhanced experience. The trails and history already exist. With outdoor recreation on the rise and people wanting more information, we need Explore Galore to provide this quality service that no one else is providing.  Everyone needs a hiking partner, whether for education, entertainment or just encouragement. Explore Galore can provide all three. There are 118 million hikers worldwide and a world of people feeling isolated, lonely, disconnected, and trapped in a small life.  We want to free people from the stress, fear, and loneliness by providing opportunity to explore the world around them and discover it's hidden treasures.Through well planned and creative initiatives we can further our reach quickly while promoting community service through our initiatives like HIKE (Hikers Investing In Kindness Everywhere) where local volunteers will be able to share VR tours of actual trails with other, less abled individuals.  With the expertise and ongoing support of esteemed app designers, we can provide the most comprehensive audio tour app on the market.Our mission is to help create a world where people seek a greater understanding of one another and the value of life by encouraging people to explore the diversity of the world, learn, and develop an appreciation through understanding, compassion, and connection. In order to fulfill this mission, we need funding for the app development.We are currently in the discovery phase of development with Algoworks, a company full of technology experts.  Algoworks has been recognized among the best technology companies by Deloitte & Silicon India, ranking in the top ten for 2021!  They have developed over 500 apps for startups and Fortune 500 companies and have outlined a detailed statement of work for this project spanning a period of 5 months. We intend to release the beta version of the app in the summer of 2022 for input to  our Diamond sponsors. Finally, I want to thank  Mr. Brant Pinvidic, author of "The 3 Minute Rule" who has been very helpful in supporting our vision. Brant has been a great resource and support to continue in our endeavor but we need your help. Transcend The Trail with us!

record.Creator: Almonzer Assad
record.Title: Flip Electric Bicycles
record.Text: History/Story.My name is Almonzer Assad from Sudan, African and I’m an Electrical Engineer at the University Of Sudan with an interest/passion for building and designing EV (Electrical Vehicles). For as long as I could remember I loved Bicycles. I loved how they look, the joy it brings people, the community it creates, and the peace that comes with riding bicycles. Growing up Bicycles were the main means of transportation. So I remember how peaceful and quiet it was growing up as the only noises you’d hear are either birds or the familiar bicycle bell ring. Now you can’t even hear the birds as the loud car and motorbike engines took over as the means of transportation.The name of my company is Flip. What I make is Electric Bicycles. The million dollar question is why bicycles? This idea came after the tragic events that happened/happening in Sudan since 2018. As a massive petroleum/gas shortage hit the country the prices for this good skyrocketed. This led to many people losing their jobs as means of transportation became almost non-existent. Not only were jobs impacted even worse, kids could not go to school as well. The country was shut down and life stopped all because there were no alternatives.  Then people started using bicycles as means of transportation which worked for some and for some it was almost impossible because of the distance they would have to cover.These events are what led me to this point right now. I decided if I could make electric bicycles that could be affordable for the average household that would not only lead to a cleaner country, it will also mean life would not have to stop if such tragedies occur again The world is evolving at a fast rate and the sad truth is Africa is behind, and so has been the case for decades now. When I watch people like Elon Musk take on the industry and lead the way for a cleaner world I ask myself why can’t I? The world needs change, especially Africa.The Budget:As seen in the video I already have a functioning prototype. Most of the money will go into purchasing more bicycles and developing better prototypes.Cost Category Description Phase Expected TotalIncludes buying new bicycles and development of better prototypesMaking$8,000.00_______________________________________________________________Making$500.00_______________________________________________________________This is the shipping cost for the bicycles as I plan to buy in large quantityMaking$3,000_______________________________________________________________This is the time I plan to put in to assemble the bicyclesOther$200.00TOTAL with taxes = $14,300.00Timeline1. Working Prototype (10/15/2021) - done2. License the company (11/06/2021)3. Hire an assembly team (11/29/20214. Order Bicycles to start show casing the first patch (12/15/2021)

record.Creator: BOCOOLIFE
record.Title: BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner with Irrigation System
record.Text: #New Review Video UpdatedWe all know that there’s just no good and safe enough way to keep our ears as clean as they should be—earwax buildup is a serious concern. Q-tips, ear picks, and other accessories may help, but they may also cause some pain and be less than effective.Healthy ears need to be clean and cleared from accumulated earwax. However, scheduling an appointment with a doctor to have your ears cleaned is not always easy—your busy schedule doesn’t help, or sometimes your family budget will just refuse to stretch.  With BOCOOLIFE, you can simply use a device with lukewarm water that will clean your ears, making them healthier, without having to waste time and money on appointments you don’t really want to schedule. It also allows you to make sure that your ear won’t be exposed to devices that medical doctors may use on other patients.  BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner works exclusively through its irrigation system that is designed to deliver a safe and effective electrically powered stable water flow. BOCOOLIFE simply uses the volume and pressure of water to push extremely deep and tenacious wax out of your ears. There’s no pressure against the tympanic membrane and no risk to your ears.      The safe, pain-free, and extremely effective ear cleaner and irrigation system that keeps your family’s ears clean  Basically, the person whose ears are being cleaned will feel as if a water stream is flowing into her ear and coming right out. A very mild sensation of discomfort could be experienced—just because the cerumen is being pushed away from the ear through partial dilution and water pressure. The  Q-tip will push the ear wax back into the ear canal which might hurt the eardrum and cause infection.Different requirements and preferences call for different pressure levels, which is why BOCOOLIFE features four modes that you can choose from based on your needs.   With 4 LED lights and a transparent acrylic water barrier with zoom function, let you observe the ear canal more clearly, and prevent splash. Your ears are delicate and exposing them directly to equipment used by others is not a sterile and recommended way to clean them. That's why the BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner and Irrigation System comes with multiple single-use soft ear tips to ensure that each ear tip belongs to you alone and to avoid cross-contamination. Using BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner causes mostly no pain whatsoever. Its design and way of working are made for a perfectly safe ear cleaning operation that even unskilled users can quickly master. No side effects are to be expected from an ear cleaning intervention with BOCOOLIFE because this device uses only lukewarm water to effectively clean your ears.Providing an ergonomic water container that fits well on the shoulders and you could place it on your shoulders to hold the water leftover from the ear washing. You will have a better experience if your friend or family could help you with this!When designing BOCOOLIFE, we wanted to make sure that the battery was one of its strengths. That’s why we equipped it with a 2000mAh rechargeable lithium battery that charges quickly, ensuring lasting charge cycles for multiple cleaning operations. Once full charge can use for up to 8 hours!Your BOCOOLIFE’s battery is here to help you keep your family’s ears—and yours—clean for a long time!The Conventional need to constantly repeat the squeezing operation and it might take a long time to clean your earwax. Moreover, it is difficult to clean stubborn earwax effectively. It would be dangerous, the ear tip needs to be inserted into the ear canal and is easily dislodged.BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner works exclusively through its irrigation system that is designed to deliver a safe and effective electrically powered stable water flow. BOCOOLIFE simply uses the volume and pressure of water to push extremely deep and tenacious wax out of your ears. There’s no pressure against the tympanic membrane and no risk to your ears—unlike damage that could be caused by other devices, which require an inefficient and harsh manual squeeze and rinse operation.However, if there's a history of ear perforations, ear surgeries, or ear-related pain recently experienced, then BOCOOLIFE should not be used, and you should consult a medical doctor to have your ears cleaned in a clinically recommended way. The story of BOCOOLIFE began in 2016 when founders Sam(an Audiologist) and Alex( a Design Engineer) met. Their first venture was the BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner with Irrigation System, and they started with the mission that  " easy and effective ear care solution" This mission hasn't changed to this day, despite the brand's global success and wide range of ear care products offerings.
