BOCOOLIFE has believed that ear irrigation or ear syringing is a much better solution than cotton swabs, it's true, clean with cotton swabs merely pushes the wax deeper into the ear canal, causing a blockage. So, it should be cleaned in an easy and efficient way. After long-term market research, BOCOOLIFE team decided to develop an innovative and unique ear irrigation kit -  BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner with Irrigation System. It's powerful, durable, easy, and comfortable without hurting to clean ear blockage at home for all ages. The core concept remains the same: A breakthrough in-ear health - cleaning alone is not enough!Factory ImageThis project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.

record.Creator: Johnny Farman
record.Title: Adventure Group Finder
record.Text: I am raising funds to start an app that will allow table top gamers to find others in their area to start gaming groups for games such as Dungeons & Dragons, Magic: The Gathering, Munchkin, etc. I am very passionate about getting this app made because it's also an app I need for myself. Last year I lost two brothers and needed something to help me cope. Unfortunately I am not good at meeting new people physically outside work and home. That's when I got the idea for this app. I even worked out specific details on how it should look and operate. I plan on getting this app developed via outsourcing to a developer company. Unfortunately it costs a lot of money to do this hence why I am here. Keep in mind I am raising money for phase 1 and 2 of development.

record.Creator: Sheldon Thom
record.Title: A Community based service providing App
record.Text: We are a Community based online service provider, and receiver marketplace App, that works like uber. Someone who wants to receive a service (eg) housekeeping would send a ping out saying I want this service done, and another user would answer and say yes I can do it, and provide the service.  Users can switch between being a service provider or a receiver and provide or receive services from each other(eg) Housekeeping, Pet care, Car washing, Barbering, Power wash your drive way, mount a TV etc, and get these done immediately on demand or scheduled 24 hrs a day 7 days a week.  Our product is a hyper local community service provider marketplace, we help our customers get their household jobs done quickly by assigning them to interested ready to work close by service providers within the community. This benefits the homeowners, landlords and residents by facilitating them to earn fulltime or extra money.  Currently in the absence of this platform it's harder for young people, unskilled or skilled professionals of any age to find part-time work on the go, with fixed and negotiable pricing, and with a be your own boss business model. There is no such marketplace dedicated to physical jobs tasks on a contractual basis such as ServeIT (eg) handyman, housekeeping, babysitting etc, an all in one App Which "assigns" jobs to its service providers continuously.Landlords, real-estate investors or homeowners associations can also benefit from ServeIT they can create a profile with us and endorse or platform to their residents, for percentage of our transaction feeOnce we have completed the build which is 95% complete, ServeIT will be ready to launch within few weeks, and then we can move to the next phase of our marketing campaign and have people using, providing and receiving services, in the fast convenient way we facilitate.

record.Creator: Francis Chu
record.Title: Blincc Hex : Super Bright, 360, Dynamic, Light and Modular
record.Text: We know how important it is to be seen when cycling in the dark. Blincc Hex is a 360 degree and dynamic reflector that installs on virtually any bike. Blincc Hex will dynamically spin and always be there reflecting headlights. It gets you noticed while still being sleek!But... Isn't reflective decal already normal? So why Blincc Hex? Good question. Let's take a look at it.1. Super durable with an enhanced protective layer.2. Thin & flexible to follow complex profiles and edges. 3. Customised 3M micro prismatic brightness.4. Modular design.5. Most importantly, simply awesome.Previously we were using glass beads technology which is flexible. However, after more and more tests we managed to find a better option. We are all familiar with the 3M micro prismatic performance. Blincc Hex is made of customized 3M micro prismatic which is super bright yet it is extremely malleable. Normally micro prismatic will crack on sharp bent. However, Blincc Hex custom prismatic can even be folded! it is the best of both worlds :)We know outdoor can be rough due to particles such as carbon, dust, gravel, debris, and more. So, Blincc Hex is enhanced with an extra engineered protective layer to shield it from potential harm. Would you look at that!We love curves. So does Blincc Hex. Have a sharp aero curve and edges? Don't worry, Blincc Hex will fit in.As mentioned, It will even follow folds!Due to the shape, Blincc Hex will appear different just by pasting it slightly differently. your style your move. Additionally, due to the modularity, any broken pcs during use can easily be changed without replacing the whole set. Decided to go off-road for a shortcut on a muddy path? no worries, it is easy to clean.Whether you are rocking on normal brakes or advanced disc brakes, Blincc Hex won't discriminate. Its size allows pasting on tight spaces easily.Worry less about fitting and sizes, We have designed Blincc Hex to fit virtually any bike due to its size and shape. You can still get Blincclip in this campaign as a bundle.No Early Bird Price? Fortunately no. Here is why:Early birds create a perception of urgency. It may be great for creators' sales but we do not want to trigger your impulsive buying for our advantage. We believe in our product as we truly believe in you. So back us only if you find it useful to you :)Stretch Goal.However, early backers and support will definitely help us to reach further goals. In turn, it will open up more exclusive stretch goals (free upgrades) that will benefit you as our Kickstarter supporter. Small Hex. 51 x 18 mm at 0.3 grams.Long Hex 94 x 18mm at 0.6 grams.Universal size for rims.Note: For extra small rim, Blincc Hex can be easily cut and trimmed.We have created our Hex and it is ready for production. With your help, we can start mass-producing it early and ship it to you before Christmas Day.However please be mindful of delays as world shipment is affected by Covid-19.The Self Blinking Super Bright Bicycle Reflector.We had a successful first run with Blincclip with over 450% funded with a lot of happy users. Blincclip was the first self-blinking reflector that hangs on your saddle or virtually any bag with the included universal string."I got mine today as well and I'm in London so well done on possibly the fastest delivery ever! Nice product" - T Rez"Germany here. A very fast delivery. The fastest ever. 😊 Nice product. For what are the bigger reflective stickers?" Thx - Martin Lutz"Got mine today as well! Lovely little doohickey in a nice packet,& at a fair price! Good luck Blincclip" - TimoWe are a Singapore cycling brand grown from the local community. Product made by the Community for communities. In today’s car-centric cities, cycling safety is always on top of our minds. That’s why we are dedicated to creating a safer commute. Initially, We started our first product named Blincclip that was successfully funded on Kickstarter in just 10 hours with a total of 450% funding goal during the one-month campaign. At Blincc Cycling, we will keep inventing, reinventing, and requisitioning how to make cycling safer and more enjoyable.Blincc community of cycling commuters is growing. Each of you is part of a movement for a better neighborhood. Join us now and be part of that positive change towards society. Feel free to reach us on every social media platform.Should you need a direct support, you can contact us through our live whatsapp chat.Click here to download our press kit and media assets.Related articles : Cycling Tips Blincclip is an emergency backup for your light, and it fits in your walletTechbuzzireland Blincc Cycling introduces Blincc clip and Blincc HexGadget Explained Blincclip Review 3M Diamond Frade Self Blinking Bicycle ReflectorGadgets Magazine Blincc Cycling crowdfunds on KickstarterGeeky Gadgets Blincclip super-bright blinking bicycle reflector needs no batteriesCircular Connection “Blincclip: The first blinking super-bright reflector” specially designed for all cyclists!This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Kevin Hedges, CEO & Co-Founder, NannyPod
record.Title: NannyPod - The 'Uber of Childcare'
record.Text: Why We CareWe had family and friends who were continuously stranded at home... with the kids. Every single day of the week. Our parent-friends were always stuck! Date-night, events, parties, dinners... you name it, they couldn't come.So, we built the 'Uber of childcare'... the super-fast low fee NannyPod app. Our GoalNannyPod's number one goal is to help EVERY parent in the USA instantly access childcare, whether it's for 1 hour or 10 hours! We make it super easy to make requests with family members, friends, neighbors, babysitters, nannies and infant care specialists. In addition, we help childcare providers pick up jobs at their convenience. Be part of our journey and mission!(If we do not reach our target amount you don't pay a penny)Who We AreWe care deeply about this industry and our objective is to market the NannyPod app nationwide to parents and childcare providers. We are a team of 5 experienced business people, moms and marketers. Check us out: https://www.nannypod.com/teamWhat We Have BuiltCompetitor platforms and apps are slow, massively overpriced and some even charge childcare providers exorbitant fees for background checks. Not us!Why We Are Raising FundsIn order to make the NannyPod app #1 in the industry for parents, we need to market it in a variety of ways to childcare providers. We use social media influencers, college career websites, sororities, strategic partnerships, Google, Facebook, SnapChat, TikTok and more. Our mission is to grow our user-base and help every parent in the USA access childcare in minutes, in every town. If you are a mom, dad, parent, aunt, uncle, grandparent, teacher, nurse or childcare provider, you'll love NannyPod! Anyone can help us reach our fundraising goal. Think of it as everyone helping parents, a few dollars at a time. (Remember, if we do not reach our target amount you don't pay a penny)RewardsWe're offering FREE SUBSCRIPTIONS in exchange for backing our Kickstarter campaign. We greatly appreciate anyone who contributes to our mission. We can't wait to market the new super-fast NannyPod app across the USA!Which is the Best Value Reward? The best value reward is the FREE LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTION. If 2000 people choose this reward, we will exceed our target. Thank you for your support. The more backers we have, the more parents we can help. Our CampaignThis campaign project is about helping EVERYONE who has children. It's about helping the parenting community. Let's shake up the industry and make NannyPod the leading childcare app in the USA. Thank you.Hello... the 'Uber of childcare' is here. Welcome to NannyPod! With love 💛 ,The NannyPod Team 🙂NannyPod USA Incorporated. All Rights Reserved. NannyPod™.

record.Creator: Vickie McHugh
record.Title: The Craft Exchange – Buy, Sell, Destash
record.Text: Help back this pioneering project….  Are any of you avid crafters? Does anyone (like myself) hoard craft supplies? With the success of some well-known marketplaces online, there is nothing out there solely to buy, sell and destash craft supplies. Research suggests there are a large number of different social media platforms, groups, pages and marketplaces where you can buy, sell and destash craft supplies, but no stand alone “one stop shop” designed specifically.  I would like to change that and create The Craft Exchange. It would be the only marketplace specifically where you can buy, sell and destash craft supplies and not only that, I want to create the Craft Exchange community. A community where like-minded crafters can meet up online and chat about anything craft related, share ideas and tutorials as well as access a selection of exclusive videos/tutorials made by craft influencers and professionals to draw attention to the Craft Exchange brand.  The Craft Exchange would be a peer 2 peer marketplace where users can sign up and create their “Craft Room”. From here they will be able to upload their own items they no longer use or need and also purchase second hand/pre loved items from other users “Craft Rooms”.  As a user of The Craft Exchange, you will be able to like listings, follow accounts, add ratings and reviews and chat with other accounts about items in their “Craft Room”. There would also be competitions and give always where you can win a number of the paid functions or supplies.   Phase 2 - With the upcoming success of The Craft Exchange, going forward with a phase 2, there will be 4 extra paid functions:  The Craft Exhibit – This would boost a user’s “craft room” and increase visibility within The Craft Exchange. It will be visible to more users based on their search/filters/craft. “Nudge” This boosts the visibility of single items and would appear in more users item feed/search results making it visible to the right users. Star Crafter and The Craft Exchange newsletter – This will give crafters the opportunity to promote their craft/and or business. This would appear on the main page of The Craft Exchange and on the newsletter Craft Business Ads – This would give crafters the opportunity to promote their craft business within peoples search engines.  Also as part of phase 2, The Craft Exchange would also include a member’s area which would have a small £2 per month subscription fee where users can join the community and access exclusive content, crafting forums and offers available to Craft Exchange members only. There will also be a newsletter which will be created on a monthly business.  The Future –   I have enjoyed thinking about the future of The Craft Exchange and I have a great list of ideas going forward so here are some ideas: The 5 year goal for The Craft Exchange would include a wide range of add on’s to the system including a bespoke Craft Exchange App as well as merchandise.  Franchise opportunities – The Craft Exchange sales  - selling craft supplies and items at one of The Craft Exchange sales  The employment of staff to support this amazing project and idea  Taking The Craft Exchange GLOBAL!  To promote the Craft Exchange, marketing will be done via various online and social media platforms which will include paid ads. Leaflets and door to door drops Stalls at craft fairs and shows, Word of mouth and craft influences.If you decide to back this amazing and pioneering project, your money will go towards, the build and design of the marketplace as well as marketing The Craft Exchange over various mediums, as listed above. It will also help pay for The Craft Exchanges first years insurance because I want its users to have trust in the business and feel secure using it.  If I am successful in raising the funds for this project, the plan going forward would be first and foremost to raise a social media presence. This will be done via crafting influencers in the UK, paid adds, words of mouth and contacting various crafting businesses asking for collaborations to promote foot traffic to The Craft Exchange on social media. Whilst doing this, I will be having a logo created for The Craft Exchange. Last but not least, I will start developing and designing the marketplace with the help of specialist designers ready to go live. The aim would be to get The Craft Exchange live within 6 months.  If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to drop me a message, I would be happy to discuss this great venture with you.

record.Creator: Mike Bachman
record.Title: Nucleus -A Unique Analog-Hybrid Monophonic Synthesizer
record.Text:
In this day when it seems like so many are just resurrecting the past, we, at Artisan Electronic Instruments think art and technology have moved forward. And we want to bring something new into the world of synthesis.  NUCLEUS is a unique and powerful monophonic Synthesizer that combines the sound design of East and West Coast ideas, blends Analog and Digital technologies, and packs a vast sound palette into an intuitive user aesthetic.Don’t be fooled by its compact size. The NUCLEUS is anything but a classic remake or just a “more of the same” Synthesizer. There is a lot of sonic synthesis power hidden behind that 60hp panel, an extraordinary amount for such a small instrument.NUCLEUS fills any harmonic space with its complex 3 Oscillator block. Its analog and digital circuits churn out some serious walls of sound.  This little machine ROARS!Oscillator 1 is based on an analog discrete Saw-core circuit providing those classic Saw, Triangle, and variable pulse/PWM waveforms. Tied into it is a modulate-able 4 stage wavefolder for awesome metallic tones. The Sub-Oscillator has its own variable filter producing smooth pounding sine waves or all the way through a rich square.Oscillator 2 is also a fully discrete analog design with Saw, Variable Pulse/PWM, and PWM with Sub-Octave. But that’s just the start. It also has a selectable 2 or 3 stage Digital Ring Modulator. The DRM combines the waveforms of all three Oscillators for some amazing tones heard nowhere else. If that were not enough, Oscillator 2 can Hard-Sync to a separately controlled digital 4th oscillator.  Wait, there's more, when not in Hard Sync, it can be Frequency Modulated by Oscillator 3 through a dedicated VCA controlling the FM depth in real-time. Phew! I need to take a breath.Oscillator 3 is digital, why? To provide those unique sounds only found in the digital world. It still provides some clean anti-aliased standard shapes, like Sine and PWM but adds a few tricks, such as a variable slope Saw to Triangle wave, an adjustable width Swarm wave, and String tones using the Karplus-Strong physical model.  There are ten slots for custom waveforms and a noise source. Oscillator 3 also has a bit-crusher/sample reducer effect to get into some dirty digital color.And you can modulation just about anything! From pitch, wave-shape, and mix levels and the oscillator “special effects” of sub-shape, hard-sync frequency, FM depth, and bit crusher strength.There is so much to NUCLEUS before ever reaching the filter. But that bad boy does not want to be outdone. It is awesome in its own right. First off it offers a unique cascade multi-mode design. The filter runs in 2 pole Low Pass, Bandpass, and High Pass modes, as well as 4 pole versions of each. It’s the Dual-path Regeneration and 8-pole design that really give a unique character to the Bandpass modes, providing variable and modulate-able bandwidth and dual peak resonance. Since the filter can track over a wide range you can “play” these peaks and get a 5-oscillator sound or chord!
  The filter has modulation inputs for cutoff, resonance, and filter shape. And after all that, the asymmetrical soft clipping circuits can bring in some much loved “dirt”. Just crank that Overdrive knob.With all this sonic power, the Artisan NUCLEUS Synthesizer controls it all with a deep and powerful modulation matrix. There are 50+ modulation sources and 30+ destinations that are all available simultaneously. An impressive amount for such a compact mono synth. There are 4 six-stage Envelope Generators (delay, attack, hold, decay, sustain, release), with looping, linear, and expo shapes and time and sustain modulation. 3 LFOs provide 9 waveshapes, key-sync, delay, and rate modulation. 2 external CVs and 4 modulation paths from the keyboard add more real-time modulation control. And now it gets wild. You can take those modulations sources and Add, Multiply, Average, Lag, Quantize, Switch, Sync knobs, contour, and route MIDI CC to create new modulation effects.  A modulation engine that has far more on offer than a classic mono synth.When you find that perfect sound, everything, all 200+ parameters per patch, can be stored and recalled instantly, from the front panel or by MIDI. Since we know you will love building your own sound library with the awesome NUCLEUS, there is enough space for 200 patches!Oh yeah, let’s not forget MIDI in and out with 2 assignable CV Outs and trigger.OK, that’s already too much reading. We have several demo videos on YouTube and will continue to add more as we go along.It's awesome to consider exceeding our goals...This mono synth is just the beginning. It is the building block, the “sound engine” for something bigger. With a successful campaign, the NUCLEUS family will be expanded to a 4-voice desktop and 6-8 voice flagship polysynth. And when these come out, you can trade in your mono desktop or Eurorack module for a discount on a poly… How? Because that powerful synth engine card in your Nucleus can be removed and inserted into the internal rack of voice cards that make up these new beasts. But we doubt you will want to part with your Nucleus once you have it integrated into your studio!But to make any of this a reality, we need your help bringing the NUCLEUS, and this new synth ecosphere, to life. We have a great couple of prototypes and most of the hardware, software, and mechanicals have been worked out. We have experience in low volume production with our previous Ottava synth, But to go to the next stage, we need volume.  We need volume to procure parts, PCBs, and mechanical components and reach any reasonable pricing and secure parts sourcing. We need to volume setup production runs and assembly. Artisan Electronic Instruments will always and wants to stay a boutique developer and producer, but the cost of building 1 or 10 units means so many of you would not be able to afford Nucleus, and we love it too much to keep it to just a select few!Many of you may already be following us on our Facebook page, Instagram, or YouTube channel. We will continue to post there and here, on this Kickstarter page, keeping you up to date each step of the way.

record.Creator: Nicholas Seawater
record.Title: AR & VR Viewer Design Update
record.Text: Hi everyone, this is Nick! From my early years, I took a great interest in the entrepreneurial spirit,  graphic design, and virtual reality. I found myself quietly captivated by the diverse industrial worlds of portable sawmills, Kinkos, California craft fairs, and trade shows. I was drawn to digital creation tools such as Kid Pix, HyperStudio, PowerPoint, and Macromedia Flash early on. I found myself mystified with visual storytelling of early 3D video games such as Wolfenstein and Red Alert 2, carefully researching every issue of game magazines like GamePro as games evolved  into the massive modern marvels enjoyed today.I’ve noticed that all sorts of useful things are starting to feel outdated by the exponential evolution of touch-screen mobile devices, for business or even home application. The time has come for pocket computers to uplift the iconic timeless business tools that business people have always relied on while bringing technology into the current age. It’s a lot easier to understand the modern relevance of these essential tools when seen through the lens of the augmented reality app. That’s how I’ve come up with an idea of making one place where vast numbers of unique business cards can be crafted and experienced coming to life telling their owners' unique stories, and providing options to also present game-like 3D graphics. I chose 3 major mobile device business tools that are vital for any business, based on various business books, studies, and online articles.The rest is history - I researched thousands of educational programming sources looking for coding techniques, concise, and useful info! I have followed the trail to some really hard-to-find corners of the web that had only been engaged in single digits, and of course, used lots of popular online channels and communities where people share the information on a diverse range of coding topics.To ensure it’s easy to explore the collection of business cards, I consulted with over a hundred AR platforms and applications, and collaborated with a team of talented people who got inspired by the idea, and created AR Tool projects of various cool types of printed marketing materials in different styles.The AR & VR Viewer accumulated knowledge of many people of the past and present, and is energized by popular novels, 3D games and movies, resulting in the unique artefact beyond time and space. But this is just the beginning.

record.Creator: Shelby Stephenson
record.Title: Multi-Terrain Monopod for Camping Gas Canisters
record.Text: We are a small team working in the North East of England, we specialise in making bespoke products  (generally out of plastic).Our goal is to eliminate single use plastics by utilising the properties of our plastics to provide long term solutions for every day problems. Our camping monopod is made from High Density Polyethylene (HDPE) which is 100% recyclable, this means if you no longer need this product it can go straight in your recycling bin to become another useful item.Our work family love nature and one of their biggest complaints whilst out camping is when you've finally sat down for some food or a hot beverage, your kettle or stove falls over. Finding even and stable ground for standard tripods can be challenging itself and when you're out in the wilderness, you don't need the extra hassle.We have tried and tested these monopods and they are a game-changer, the only thing we need help with is getting our product out there for all of you to enjoy.Reaching our target goal means that we can create and distribute our monopods across the globe, hopefully, it will be the last stove stand you ever want to buy.This is one more step in being sustainable and taking care of our planet.

record.Creator: Vinoth kumar
record.Title: ABL-ify Asia - Everyone can speak
record.Text: What is AAC? Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) is the formal title for non-verbal/speech communication. AAC can be classified into aided vs. un-aided communication tools. Sign Language and Gestures are unaided communication. A Ipad application, pen, and paper are aided communicationsWho can use AAC?Any non-verbal child or adult who has an intention to express and has personal preferences can use AAC.How is ABL-ify related to AAC?ABL- ify is a digital AAC app that can be used with an Ipad. The App is highly customizable and very affordable, and culturally sensitive to the Asian market.How does ABL-ify actually work?Imagine a non-verbal child. He is angry and wants to sleep but cannot communicate with his parents. He takes Ipad, uses ABL-ify, and taps on the Ipad that says "I want to sleep". This simple communication is a huge relief for parents who have children with autism. AAC apps like ABL-ify assist parents in managing such communication barriers.Why are you fundraising?The App was bootstrapped by the founder and co-founder and was only made available in Singaporean English in the Apple store. We need funds to develop the App for the android market, and we intend to make the App available in Mandarin, Malay, Tamil, and Hindi languages. We need funding for translators, coders, and language specialists in our team.What do I get if I Pledge?$25- The Insider trackShow your support. You'll get updates about our App and you'll get access to the early backers list which lets you vote on features, languages, and more.$50-Early access to the app for the whole duration of beta testing. Signed thank you card from children with Autism.What's the timeline?If we get funding as desired, we would be creating an android version and completing it by March 2022. We intend to make the app available in Tamil, Mandarin, Malay and Hindi by the end of December 2022.

record.Creator: bluetium
record.Title: LitZERO: Couch Potato to The ALMIGHTY 0 to 100 REAL Quick
record.Text: Our fingerprints are always present on the screens when using our smartphones, no matter how clean we keep them. When we try to wipe them away, they get even more dirty and foggy. Our arms get tired when using our smartphones with our most comfortable poses. And we always had to zoom in and touch our smartphones when trying something new. Finally, I bet you had your fingers and wrists ache from using your smartphone too long.The smart controllers, currently sold in the market, are still helpful. But, they have to be used after a little break to use while driving or working out. Also, a mouse or a presentation remote is not very portable. Its clicking noises would get annoying in quiet places. LitZERO has solved all these inconveniences of smart controllers with just a touch of a button.LitZERO is a controller that can be used with all smart devices with a Bluetooth system installed. Get your job done by swiping and touching LitZERO, instead of your smartphone. The soft-touch and response time it's not going to let you down.You can move around like a mouse cursor and select, run, scroll front/back, etc. It would be just like using a laptop's touchpad.Put the Mouse Cursor on hold, and you can drag top/bottom, left/right, drag, select, scroll back/forward, etc. When you push the button on the left or move to your desired spot, touch the center, and hold for 3 seconds, you can put the pointer on hold. (When using on the mouse mode)We upgraded the select/run function and the scroll function to provide a smoother utilization of LitZERO. By doing so, it gives the users the exact same feeling of controlling with a mouse. Also, with the pointer holding mode, LitZERO was upgraded to handle tasks like scrolling through webcomics and pages with a single gesture.This mode is most adequate for users when listening to music while camping or trying to listen to music, or answer a phone call while driving or working out. Take control of your music with simple gestures while moving or working out. Just simply attach LitZERO to your car, bike, or backpack.LitZERO can also be used as a shutter for a camera, other than just enjoying a movie or some music.LitZERO would be phenomenal for those that enjoy watching Netflix or YouTube. Skipping back to the previous screen, fast forward, volume control, they are just the beginning of what LitZEROcan does. Now, enjoy your music/ movie while you are entirely laid back.While reading your books (webcomics, stories) digitally, flip through your pages hassle-free. You can flip through your pages with LitZERO sensing your gestures instead of you having to physically go up and touch your device's screen. Which wouldn't limit the users from watching online courses, Netflix, and YouTube.When presenting your PowerPoint during a lecture or a meeting, all you need is LitZERO. You can control your PowerPoint with simple gestures, without a bulky mouse or a pointer. It's because, LitZERO is programmed for Keynotes, PDFs, documents, memos, other apps, and etc.This mode is mapped with the directional key and a mouse. You can move and run the apps, visible on Android OS, and control videos. The Experiment mode will allow users to start mapping their keys via an app shortly.To sense the user's fingers, LitZEROis equipped with high-sensitivity static touchpads. These static touchpads can sense over 80 touches a second to instantly respond to user inputs. When a user inputs a touch pattern, a signal intaking algorithm allows LitZERO to output 12 different touch gestures or different coordinates.We went through countless challenges and tried to bring extremely sensitive and precise skills to life. And finally, it was able to be completed up to perfectionLitZERO's wireless Bluetooth connection can last up to 15M max. So even though the user might be distant from their smart device, its phenomenal connectivity allows you to take control. Not only  LitZERO can control your wireless earbuds' volumes, but it also enables users to leave their remote controllers behind when taking pictures.If your smart device is equipped with standard Bluetooth technology, all of your devices are good to go with this multi-controller. Allowing up to pair with 8 smart devices is an even more crucial gadget for smartphone lovers like you! (Bluetooth enabled devices with Android 5.0 & up, MacOS, IOS 13 & up, Window 10 & up)Smartphones are gadgets that we just can't live without. Well, the critical functions of smartphones and LitZERO are very closely connected. Users can answer a phone call by double touching LitZERO. If they are not in the right time to respond, they can swipe down on the touchpad.If you left your smartphone in your car, or if you dropped it and walked away from it then, LitZERO would ring its alarm. With LitZERO's anti-theft functions, keep your smart devices nearby without the fear of losing them. Now you might think, what if I lost LitZERO? Well, if you lost your LitZERO, you can look up where its signal was lost on the LitAPP!LitZERO is also designed with braille on its main body to allow the visually challenged to efficiently use the device. These were all made possible thanks to the constructive feedback we received from our visually impaired customers of our previous model. (Which they truly enjoyed listening to music and watching dramas). This design was applied in the hopes that every individual can enjoy using LitZERO. And it also functions as directional guidance for people without any disabilities.If LitZERO is running low on battery, then its red LED lights will flash. Or if it is fully charged then, the LED lights will turn blue. By upgrading LitZERO by installing USB C-Type plug-ins, it can fully charge within an hour and provides up to 3 days of use with a single charge. Also, if the users turn the On/Off only when they use the device, it can last up to 3 days. (Based on 100 touches an hour/ If the device is turned off, it would last up to 30 days.)For an even stabilized grip, LitZERO decreased its size and added the O-ring to use as a key ring for extra portability. Live and enjoy your life with the even smaller and portable LitZERO!1. Hold the button for more than 3 seconds. Then, a blue LED light will start blinking2. Turn on Bluetooth, search Litsero2_xxx, and pair.Please switch according to the 4 different gesture modes. Press the side of the button to switch modes.The LitAPP provides functions to allow users to use LitZERO to the next level. With your smartphone, please download the 'LitAPP' on the Google PlayStore or the AppStore.- Pairable with Android, iOS, etc.- Provide firmware updates and set our goals based on our Backers' constructive feedback- Display remaining battery levels and Bluetooth signal connectivity- Other extra functionsAll of these specs are subject to change. But they are significantly less likely to.* Due to an internal error, we initially said the plate was steel, not aluminum.  We're genuinely sorry for the mixupAs we absolutely needed our remote controllers when we couldn't live without watching our TVs, smartphones are now our life essentials. And to use smartphones, tablets, laptops, and other smart devices was the sole purpose for the development of LitZERO. LitZERO can wirelessly control via Bluetooth, not like other regular controllers, and it can control apps by simply touching. It is designed like a key ring for more convenience and portability. Its Velcro allows users to attach LitZERO to backpacks or other clothing. We need our Backers' love and attention in our revolutionary leap.*We are currently all set to develop an even better product based on our backers' constructive love and feedback*Bluetium had been developing wearable smart wireless controllers since its incorporation back in 2017. Starting from 2019, we began B2C selling on our online stores. From 2020, we have started developing our own products and carried out various collaborations with different online cartoons and fashion brands and are broadening our product line-up. We hope to develop further and come up with even more awesome smart devices on the market. As the most trusted product launch company in the world, Enventys Partners has helped launch over 2,000 innovations with global sales of over $1 Billion dollars for our clients.By utilizing 20 years of experience in:Got an idea? We would love to help you launch it.This project is boosted by BackerCrew- This device is internally equipped with a battery so, it may cause injuries or product malfunctions from explosions.- Do not apply pressure or damage the product- Keep away dust, liquid, metal, or other debris from the bottom charging port.- If it starts to smoke or smell like it's burning, stop using immediately and contact customer service- Watch out for children or pets may bite or chew on them.-The adequate operating temperature is 0~35C. Suppose it is located in an area with temperatures lower or higher than 0~35C. In that case, the device may malfunction, or the battery life might decrease.For questions regarding customer service, please email info@bluetium.com. We will make sure our backers use LitZero till the end.After establishing a corporation in New York, we developed LitZERO with numerous designing and developing prototypes. We have signed a contract with a local warehouse in the States to provide time and cost-efficient shipping for our backers.LitZERO, for sure, is a device at the completion stage after countless testing. It is ready to begin production as soon as our Kickstarter campaign comes to a close successfully. We promise that we will complete our production and shipping by the promised time frame to our backers, showing us their unfailing love and support.

record.Creator: Rony
record.Title: RONY flashlight - an innovative fusion of metal and light
record.Text: There are many advantages to using Rony with a bike. First, the front LED is as powerful as a motorcycle headlamp. Second, the back LED creates a spot of light on the full area you are moving in. At night, while on the road, you will be completely visible to other vehicles.Rony is all about putting you in control, giving you six separate modes that start from the lowest setting of just 20 lumens to the highest at 1500 lumens. A simple touch switches you between the modes, making it easy and quick to adjust.Rony can be recharged with any power source; just use the USB cable in the kit. The charging starts automatically after connecting. Rony knows when the battery is fully charged and automatically stops charging to prevent battery overheating and overcharging.Totally ergonomic shape, small weight, and no useless details make Rony the most comfortable and enjoyable flashlight available. It doesn't take much space in your backpack, pocket, or purse.Branded flashlights are durable but high priced thanks to smart marketing. We offer the same quality with many more advantages and a reasonable price.It’s estimated that an astonishing 80% of all metal ever produced is still in use today. Due to the intrinsic value of metal, once made it is rarely wasted; and with good recovery systems in place, it’s possible to achieve recycling rates of 90%. The entire body is made from aluminum, which is infinite in usage. When the lifecycles of both plastic and aluminum are considered, it becomes clear that aluminum is by far, the most environmentally friendly option. Sometimes you don’t get to choose the environment you will be faced with and when things get wet, you will be glad that you have Rony with you. Rony is armored in premium aircraft-quality aluminum and there is no chance that moisture will penetrate inside and damage the inner components. Snow, rain, showers, or storms won’t take Rony out of service. Rony’s light will lead you through those dark and wet situations.It started with an idea—the idea of a hi-tech and modern flashlight. After countless discussions, we finally realized how the Rony flashlight should be designed and what functions it had to have. At this stage, our industrial designer started to make the first prototype design for Rony. The first model was very angular, hardly ergonomic, and looked ordinary, like most flashlights on the market. However, by trial and error, we finally integrated the design and made the flashlight more laconic, smooth shaped, stylish, and comfortable to carry. The final prototype was better than we could have imagined and now you can see it for yourself. What’s Inside?As for transparency, we follow the example of Elon Musk. İt is well-known that the Tesla company offers its findings in the open access.We also don't keep our prototype components a secret. To produce Rony, we use durable and premium quality materials. İt can be described as a technical construction with an eye-catchingl design. We hope that this way, you will feel part of the team and see the birth of a unique item with your own eyes.Our passion is creating the gadgets everyone will love. With the help of an amazing team of young and creative minds, we build unique gadgets for the community that appreciates innovations and exclusive design. By supporting our passion, you’re helping us as we approach our goal - release the best-designed flashlight. Plus, you get to enjoy the results of our development and innovation first. Thank you!1. Whether the bike mount is included in the scope of delivery. - Universal bike light holder is included in the basic Rony kit. It is suitable for all types of bikes as it has a universal attachment. 2. How water resistant is the Rony. Can I dive with it?- In our experience, no matter how many tests we have done, we have never been able to "sink" the Rony. At least the flashlight meets the basic requirements of IP67 waterproofing. Theoretically Rony should be able to withstand deep diving, but no such tests were conducted 3. Rony uses two LEDs, does this mean the battery life will be significantly lower than in a classic flashlight with one LED? - We use a sufficiently large 4200mAh battery which gives the torch a high power reserve. In addition the rear LED "biom g4 5v" has a very low power consumption. So overall the runtime of the torch is comparable to top manufacturers like Nitecore or Fenix.4. Can the battery be replaced with another battery? - Rony is a flashlight with a built-in battery. The flashlight can be disassembled into components if you wish, but we do not advise you to do so. Your battery will last a very long time, we use high quality Samsung batteries in the design.5. Why don't you use replacement batteries? - For your convenience. To charge a 18650 battery, you need a separate charger. Thanks to the battery built in the Rony is a battery charger in its own right. Therefore you only need a UCB-C cord and a power supply to power the flashlight. 6. Will my phone charge if I connect it with a Rony.- Yes, the flashlight has such a function. Its battery capacity is enough to recharge your phone and not to charge it several times in a row.7. How long does it take to fully charge the roni?- It takes approximately 3 hours to fully charge a fully discharged battery.8. Is there a warranty on the roni? - A full one-year warranty is provided on all components.                                                     The warranty does not cover breakage and physical damage to the lantern.9. Can I use Rony on my bike in the rain? Is it water resistant? The lantern is protected against splashing water and dust from any direction

record.Creator: Pozio
record.Title: Pozio: Privacy Control for Smart Devices
record.Text: If you’ve given a smart assistant or an app permission to access your microphone, your device is listening. Not a big deal? What if you were talking about your banking,  a serious health issues, or any other type of extremely personal data.  In the wrong hands, that could be devastating. Pozio gives you complete control over when your devices can and can’t hear you. Our patented technology works in the background and blocks your devices’ microphone from recording, storing, or sharing your data. If you want your device to hear you, just say “Pozio stop” and it turns blocking off. Pozio devices don’t have a hard drive and aren’t connected to the internet, so your data is safe. Enjoy the power of smart technology, while keeping what matters most, private. That's Pozio.Bringing a revolutionary product like Pozio to market is no easy feat. Our team includes experts in the world of cybersecurity, consumer electronics and audio signal processing who put their collective experience together to create a suite of devices that are extraordinarily easy to use and give you the peace of mind that your privacy is protected. Pozio is launching at a critical time when people rely more than ever on the benefits that AI, machine learning and IoT brings, but have good reason to be concerned for their privacy, security and controlling third parties’ access to personal data. June 2015: Privacy problem identified. Start solving the problem! March 2020: Engineering begins... May 2020: First significant proof of concept achieved. We are blocking!    October 2020: Fully functioning prototype of Pozio Shield. January 2021: Design patent filed for Cradle (USA), non-provisional patent application.  Pozio trademark filedJune - August 2021: Manufacturing vendors and electronic parts secured and ordered.November 2021: Kickstarter Campaign begins. December 2021: Cradle production begins. February 2022: All Cradle models begin shipping.March 2022: All Shield models begin shipping.Pozio leaders have solid track records in start-ups, consumer electronics, privacy and cybersecurity, manufacturing and operations.Our objective is to help people embrace technology without having to compromise privacy.  People want control of their privacy so they can keep themselves and their personal information safe. We’re here to help do just that.

record.Creator: Leon Story
record.Title: FoCul
record.Text: FoCul                              Today’s plethora of social media apps lack one thing, culture. FoCul aims to change that. Now we love memes as much as the next person and can look at them for some time, however once we’re done, we leave feeling empty handed. FoCul will aim to focus more on the culture side of social media, not only do we want to celebrate the individual, but we also want to celebrate their culture. Food, music, dance, art, and locations will be focused upon. The app will work like this; instead of searching for people you will search for places, so let’s travel to the South of France. Once you do so on our interactive maps you will be able to see the people who are there, you’ll be able to view their pictures of said attraction, talk to them while they’re there, and some facts about the location. Want to explore the music scene? No problem, just attractions by music and get a list of local musicians, their history, pictures, work, and if you like them, when you’ll be able to see them playing around the town.Our goal is to bring a more interactive way to explore the world we live in. Unfortunately, most of us will never get to explore the planet to our content, however, with the help of this app we can see how these places are brought to life by the people living in them. You’ll get to interact with people you’d never otherwise knew existed, see places only the locals know about, and travel the world from the convenience of your phone.

record.Creator: Adeeb
record.Title: Chargepuck: Charge More Carry Less
record.Text: Chargepuck eliminates the need for multiple wires, allowing you to charge all your favorite gadgets in one place. Your phone, your watch, your airpods, they all need a charge. So instead of juggling multiple charge cables check out our latest project: ChargepuckPerfect for convenient, on-the-go charging with its retractable cable and built-in 360 degree ring gives you a phone stand with a Magsafe compatible grip.Eliminate multiple cords and charge your phone, your watch, and your airpods all in one place, at the same time!  Finally, you don't have to keep track of all your different charging equipment or pack it all up in your bag (only to get lost at the bottom)! We have created an extremely portable solution that allows you to take your charging solution anywhere you go.Slim enough to slide into your pocket, you now can charge on-the-go without the hassle of handfuls of cords and plugs.The 3ft  type-C cable comes out of the puck and retracts easily. Plug it into a wall charger cube or anywhere there is a USB-A or type-C socket, such as a wall, laptop, TV, car, airport, airplanes, hotels, and more! The phone, watch and airpods all charge wirelessly. The adapter in the photos come with the puck and sits in the center. A total of two adapters will be included, the adapter is a USB-C to USB-A adapterAs if a three-in-one charger weren't enough, we've added some convenient bonus features that make Chargepuck the easiest purchase you'll make all year! Chargepuck has a built-in phone grip and phone stand with a fully functional 360 degree ring.With strong neodymium magnets, Chargepuck is Magsafe compatible! For non-magsafe phones we've included a magnetic metal ring to attach Chargepuck with easy. With strong Nano-suction technology, Chargepuck is even more versatile. Simply stick to your device or case without doing any damage. You can take it off, change its position, and stick it back on as many times as you like! Personalize your Chargepuck by selecting a color combination that fits your style. Select your favorite in a survey that will be sent to you after our Kickstarter campaign ends.

record.Creator: WalTech
record.Title: WalTech Smart RV Thermostat: All-In-One Device for RV Owners
record.Text:
My family and I spent many vacations in campgrounds during hot summers and freezing winters.  We would often leave the RV to go site-seeing, and we would set our thermostat to an energy-saving temperature while we were away.  I always thought, "how convenient would it be if I could control my thermostat remotely (like I can do with my home)?"Given my 30 years of expertise in the HVAC industry, I was able to complete my own DIY project to remotely control the system in my camper, but I realized there wasn’t anything available for my fellow RVers to do the same.  Thus the idea of the RV Smart Thermostat was born!With the experience of my co-founder and collaborative team of software and hardware experts, we have spent the last 2 years and countless hours designing and innovating an All-In-One smart device for  RV owners around the world. Dan WalsdorfFounder and PresidentWalTech International, Inc.Please view the video on full screen to better understand the device featuresSince it's a smaller space, your rig can quickly get to extreme hot and cold temperatures which are highly unsafe for your pets.  This year alone hundreds of pets have been rescued and many pet owners have lost their loved ones.WalTech Smart RV Thermostat monitors the temperature & humidity inside your RV and quickly alerts you if it goes beyond the acceptable limit.  WalTech Smart RV Thermostat is both Wi-Fi and Sim card enabled. As an RVer, we understand how unreliable campground Wi-Fi can be.  Even when you are boondocking we want your thermostat to be connected to the cloud so that you can control it from anywhere in the world. We want you to have complete control.  So to help you understand better. We have 2 connectivity options that will enable WalTech thermostat to stay connected to the internet so that you can control your thermostat from anywhere in the world using your mobile app.Option 1: WalTech is Wi-Fi enabled. So if you have good Wi-Fi coverage inside your rig it connects to the Wi-Fi and stays online.What if I do not have reliable Wi-Fi inside my RV?
Option 2: WalTech has a built-in sim card inside the device. So if you are not in a place where you have Wi-Fi coverage it uses the best available network around that area and helps the device to stay connected always to the internet.Is it connected to my personal sim card?
No, It is a separate global sim card that can connect to any available cell tower to help the device connect to the internet.What are my monthly charges?
First, You can activate and deactivate the sim card using your mobile app. So you are only paying for the months that you use a sim card internet.
For the months that you use a sim card, there will be an extra charge of approximately $5 per month per sim card. Be it home or RV, HVAC systems contribute to more than 50% of energy usage.  You can save energy and money by analyzing and controlling your system while you are traveling and having fun. There’s nothing worse than coming back to your RV after enjoying a day out, only to find that someone has stolen all of your belongings.  Be it an RV park, storage facility, or your driveway these incidents are incredibly common. WalTech Smart RV Thermostat comes with a built-in PIR motion sensor so you don't have to pay extra for security systems.  It will alert you during any suspicious activity so that you can take immediate action to protect your investment.  WalTech Smart RV Thermostat can be connected to one cooling unit and two heating units.  If you have two ACs--one in your living room and one in your bedroom--you can install two separate thermostats and accurately measure humidity and temperature. You can connect both thermostats to the same mobile app and control the environment inside your RV from anywhere in the world.  Wiring details are mentioned below.Later, check out our two-pack thermostat pricing offers.Regular Smart Home Thermostats like Google Nest and Ecoobee works on 24V AC only. RVs operate on a 12V DC current so thermostats made for an RV should also work on 12V DC. There are a few old RV thermostats out there that work on a 7.5V DC current as well.WalTech is the only smart RV Thermostat in the industry with patent-pending technology that can operate from the lowest power input of  7.5 to the highest of 32V in both DC & AC.The comparison chart on voltage and other smart featuresThe biggest problem in crowdfunding after the prototype is manufacturing and bringing the product to the market as promised and What is your guarantee as a backer that you will get the value for your money?Team WalTech is 100% confident about the production and delivery to its backers. If we are not able to manufacture and bring the product to the market as promised, we will refund 100% money to our backer. We have spent countless hours researching and designing these features to make this thermostat truly an All-In-One device so that you don't have to spend money on multiple RV gadgets.  WalTech is the most Kickass investment for your RV.Shipping and fulfillment will be handled by Easyship Collect.  Due to the current volatility of shipping costs, shipping payments will be collected well after the end of the campaign, close to our ship date.  This will allow us to present the most accurate and up-to-date prices to pass savings on to you, our valued backers.  Currently, the approximate shipping charges within the USA are between $9 to $15 depending on your shipping preference.In that survey you will be able to:This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Kathryn Troy
record.Title: ZEAL Remote App - Elevating Remote Working & Living
record.Text:
ZEAL is an App focused on connecting today’s remote workers, avid travelers, and digital nomads with the everything they need to navigate travel for an extended time. ZEAL harnesses the power of community collaboration to share everything from the best local shops, sights, and adventures to real-time and relevant knowledge, resources, local events and discussions from global travelers. Add in experience from other Nomads about how to best utilize your time abroad, what tools and software to use, and how to Zoom like a pro so you have more time to experience the local attractions. Together we are elevating the experience and standards as global citizens to enable and empower tourism while working from some of the best locations in the world.

For those traveling with ZEAL, you’ll gain access to approved hotels with all the amenities needed to work productively and connect with like-minded travelers. Members will receive substantial discounts to our hotel partners and unique ways to leverage and rent out their homes and car to subsidize this quality of life and even stay at top hotels. The ZEAL App enables special pricing for reservations and partner products and services through our online shopping features.The pandemic has turned everything upside down and forced the world to go remote. Fortunately, we are seeing many benefits from this digitally connected workforce. Many workers are now able to work when and where they want as long as they have a reliable Internet connection. THIS is a great opportunity for remote workers to live and work in exotic and exciting locations.However, currently the vast majority of “remote workers” find themselves stuck working from home because they lack the knowledge and connections to make it happen. There are just so many questions… - Is it possible? Is it legal? Is it safe? Are there Internet and hotel facilities conducive for remote working? Who would I spend time together with? What about language barriers?Today’s digital nomads often experience two major frustrations. One, they grapple with loneliness, without a community to connect with, but enjoy the destination. Or two, they struggle with taking time from work, both physically and financially, to live the lifestyle they desire.Yet, the interest in ‘Remote Work’ is greater than ever!With a multitude of emerging programs, groups, and retreats developing there is just one major issue - where does everyone go to connect? There is no united Community & No Seamless Experience for Travelers to Remote Work.Until Now... Luckily, you now have the choice to go remote. You now have the chance to ...We need your help to build the ZEAL App & the world’s largest online community for remote working. We are bringing together the knowledge, regional information, and needed products and services for remote workers to remove all their guesswork and uncertainty.Imagine working remotely with the same comforts of home ... and adventure waiting just around the ... lobby!ZEAL Remote is developing an App that is uniting the largest remote working community of brands, destinations, seasoned digital nomads... everything a Remote Worker needs from A to Z to live this active lifestyle, wherever desired.Imagine a social platform for ALL things remote - living, working, and lifestyle. Where you could connect with like-minded people around the world with similar interests and hobbies.Imagine having all the checklists and resources to seamlessly know how to take the leap, whether it be for a month... or a year!As seasoned remote workers having worked intimately in the hospitality and travel sector, we know that not all hotels are well-suited for an extended stay. The needs and demands of long-term travel coupled with the demands of working remotely require different amenities for this type of traveler. ZEAL is collaborating and offering hotels that cater to this extended stay audience where we can curate a community among like-minded travelers.Imagine making reservations via the App and then walking into ZEAL-Approved properties that are perfectly suited for the needs of remote workers at a fraction of the cost. Better yet, what if ZEAL could show you how to rent your car and home safely to subsidize an even better hotel for you to adventure from?Imagine being connected to and even purchasing all the products and brands employees and employers alike need to work productively, remotely WHILE having time and money to enjoy the destination. Better yet, what if you could get access to explore the best attractions and experiences of a destination and even get rewarded for sharing your own?With a background in hospitality and traveling, and a passion to connect people and experiences, we are elevating remote living and making it more accessible to all.Having visited a combined 247 countries for some 28.5 years our team has navigated nearly all of the pitfalls, issues, concerns, and awesome adventures a new digital nomad may face. We are translating our missed connections, incomplete paperwork, missing luggage, and lonely overnighters into the communities’ guides for seamlessly and effortlessly navigating how to best travel, work, and play to enjoy our new home away from home.It is a big endeavor. However, the timing is perfect, the technology is ready, and the benefits are huge. With your help, we can create the perfect symbiotic App and Online Community of remote workers who want more from life while helping tourist-based economies that were devastated by the pandemic.Support the ZEAL App as a Founding Member and receive lifetime benefits and discounts at our growing network of partner hotels, brands, sponsors, and more. 
  Don't be jealous of those living this life... Be ZEALous and take charge of your remote working and living lifestyle.While much of the infrastructure exists for this experience in our web-based platform we need to allocate Kickstarter funds to a few areas that will greatly improve the user experience. With the addition of travel features and filters that are built specifically for remote workers by remote workers. The platform will receive a new facelift that makes the experience easy and seamless while also developing an App, NEW Desktop and Mobile-friendly experience across devices domestic and international.Where we plan on using the funds that are raised, include:Watch this!Our members will benefit from the Kickstarter as some of those resources will be used to add additional infrastructure that is more travel and hospitality-oriented. Based on some 28.5 years of remote working and traveling we are adding filters and functionality to inform members about the quality and variety of options they have to best suit their personal needs.UI / UX Facelift  -   In adding the new travel-related features it is advantageous to overhaul the entire design and user experience of the desktop and mobile experience. The ZEAL brand aesthetics, simplicity, and flow will be translated into the new platform design. With agency experience and season development partners we will create an incredible user experience that elevates remote working.Creation of Resources & PDFs & Videos  -   Consolidating and translating all of the experiences, pitfalls, and successes we are documenting everything that an interested remote worker needs from A to Z. From even exploring where to go, how to get there, regional information, remote working tips for employees and employers, productivity hacks, local gym and event information we are set out to create the ultimate knowledge base for remote workers.
 Currently, the platform has this functionality:Navigating the trials and tribulations of traveling in remote locations among our community and connections of other seasoned remote workers, ZEAL’s founders have a breadth of experience and recommendations to make this process easier for our members. Members can navigate or search specifically for the information they want as well. A snapshot of some of the resources ZEAL will create include:At ZEAL we know that everyone’s desired experience and appetite for travel is unique. So, we are creating the go-to platform for all remote travel, work, and living. Our members can live their ideal lifestyle and personalize the timing, pace, and price tag to their liking.Within ZEAL there is a place for everyone. We are uniting all individuals, groups, organizations, associations, brands, destinations, and governments for a more seamless and connected travel experience.Our perspective is that collaboration by leveraging our connected strengths is far more effective than the competition. While each of the evolving communities, remote working hotels, and shared spaces have their benefits, target market, and experience, we know that each of those is just right for the right individual. Providing the hub to access and choose the ideal experience for each ensures that everyone benefits from this overarching community and infrastructure.Thus, we are taking a different approach here in how we compare ourselves to similar communities and programs. We leverage the strengths that each has while providing the community and platform to educate travelers.Simply, ZEAL is connecting like-minded people, brands, and destinations for an effortless remote living!Our experience building communities, communication, and engagement channels for local brands, municipalities, and global travel companies gives our members the ideal platform via an app to engage actively and often.  Within ZEAL we foster communities around like-minded interests, experiences, and regions so that our members can connect, support, and play online and off.At ZEAL, we are:While we typically are attracting 25- 55-year-olds that are seeking this flexible lifestyle we alternatively are seeing those that aren’t looking to work but to play and enjoy their life, test, and explore the world, and the next place or even places to stay for their retirement can be tricky. Troubleshooting multiple types of technology, social platforms, and apps to get the information and confidence needed to travel for retirees, ex-pats, and empty nesters can be daunting and often hinder them from making the trip at all.At ZEAL we are not solely uniting members, we are connecting and supporting them by bridging governments, media outlets, brands, and influential leaders. Partnering with governments and regional municipalities wanting exposure to remote workers to come to enjoy their destination, ZEAL is driving travelers for extended stays to bolster regional economies.ZEAL will be a global community connected to elevate remote living and working experiences. First, we have to start regionally and develop the community online as well as onsite. As we develop and grow the online community we will be launching our first location for ZEAL members to work together around the island of Barbados. From there, ZEAL will expand throughout the more prominent, in-demand, and tourist-friendly countries throughout Central America and the Caribbean. 

  Following the trends of where remote workers want to live and those that have the current infrastructure to effectively do so, we seek to expand throughout Europe and Southeast Asia thereafter. Initially focusing on the hospitality industry and supporting its return following the detrimental impact from COVID, we also see many benefits to fostering community through events, dinners, and music at the hotels. From there, we will expand to other villas, homes, condos, chalets, and bungalows around the world among other accommodations that allow them for extended stays.Equally, we see a large opportunity to enable remote working domestically. Many drive-to destinations have a variety of activities that a digital nomad could enjoy while having the flexibility to drive or fly somewhere else, even home to regroup, and live this adventurous lifestyle. From Moab to Jackson Hole, San Diego to Key West, people could spend a month or a season from coast to coast.Having experience supporting the hospitality and tourism industry from marketing to revenue management, tour operator experience to remote working programs, the Founders of ZEAL united through COVID to make remote working simpler and safer. The team at Social Capital Agency left their downtown office in Denver to work remotely in Tulum and support the leaders in travelers’ rebound. Working under lockdown, connecting virtually, and eager to push the boundaries of the industry to be more customer-centric, more valuable, more connected. They recognized the ability for the world to stay connected and productive outside the normal walls of their offices. Working virtually and leveraging technology for communication, we have seen organizations normalize remote working and the benefits are huge. Remote workers are more productive and happier than their counterparts and these are not the seasoned digital nomads that have years of experience.So, why were we not seeing more remote working? 

  Many people were still traveling, and the trends speak for themselves. Airbnb reported that 26% of their bookings for the first quarter of 2021 were for over 4 weeks at a time. We saw companies like Inspirato have limited inventory and be booked out for months. People were still actively paying for travel for extended periods. Yet, the adoption of remote working for a month or a year is not that common. Many have an interest in it but when asking any network of people, there are typically only one or two people that have worked abroad for any significant time.What is the missing link?Traveling for shorter periods is easy. People eat out almost every meal and bring enough clothes for their stay. For longer durations, the lifestyle and habits are very different as a traveler immerses themselves into local culture. The nuances and pitfalls are many and it takes a lot of courage to navigate these uncharted territories.To us, it seemed natural, effortless. With our experience and network within the industry, we saw a chance for everyone to benefit. Thus, the concept of ZEAL was born. With one simple question in mind, how do we share what this lifestyle is like to make it easier for others?We’ve found many have had the create it and they’ll come mentality. While traveling for less than two weeks maybe that way it takes showing people what the experience of remote working is like and what to expect. Collectively, we decided we had the knowledge, connections, and experience to normalize remote working anywhere that has a stable internet connection.As we pursue a traveling series around the world’s best remote working destinations, we decided we wanted to get our community involved and supporting us, provided feedback, and engaging to co-create the best and largest remote working community.Our seasoned team is composed of some of the industry’s best and most innovative businesses in their respective sectors. Covering expertise from marketing and tourism promotion to tour and hotel partnerships for discounts and community managers with a passion for giving back to the local community, we are eager and excited to elevate remote living for all. We are:Kathryn has been in the hospitality industry since she was 16. She has held various positions in banquets, restaurants and hotels, and resorts. You could easily say that hospitality is in her blood. She believes the world is a big place and enjoys exploring all types of new places as well as revisiting her favorites. Traveling by plane, boat, train, or car she loves it all! So far, Kathryn has traveled to just under 70 countries. Meeting with people from different cultures and sampling different cuisines rate at the top of her must-do’s while traveling. She is obsessed with travel planning and is known amongst her friends for always finding the very best things to do in every area. With a bucket list that grows every day, she is trying to reach 100 countries in the next few years. She has been working remotely for twenty years and loves the flexibility it provides and the opportunities to travel.
 Trevor learned that hospitality was his passion when he was 16, working at a restaurant in the Canadian Rockies. He then moved into the cruise industry, where he traveled all around the world with the sole purpose of ensuring that all his guests were cared for and having the time of their lives. He later went to work for hotels and resorts and learned and loved it just as much. When not working, Trevor loves to travel. He is a pilot and can often be found landing at new and exciting destinations. His father planted the travel seed early on, leading by example his dad has traveled to over 130 countries! Trevor has traveled to just over half as much as his Dad and is eager to beat the family record. Trevor has been working remotely for fifteen years and is often seen combining business and pleasure during his travels.Eric and Devon founded Social Capital Agency was founded with the concept of quality of work-life balance, even integration was important. That’s why our motto is 2 Parts Fun and 1 Part Business and we believe that people can be even more productive, healthy, happy, connected, and inspired when they are passionate about the impact they are leaving. With our passion being to empower people to travel and experience the world more easily we work with hotels and destinations to support local tourism economies. As Covid hit and we retreated to Tulum for a month to work remotely we recognized how tough it can be for most to navigate traveling for extended periods and balancing working remotely. 

  We saw an opportunity to share our knowledge, insights, connections, and partners to make remote working more accessible. Supporting hotels and local communities by connecting people and experiences in a seamless way that benefits all may be what our agency does but we are all avid travelers and love connecting with people ourselves. From backcountry snowboarding to scuba diving, climbing and wakeboarding we love supporting the brands that fuel our passion while bringing together communities to support them.
 Travis and Jason are avid travelers with a passion for remote work and community building. They met as early employees at Remote Year, a venture-backed travel startup redefining how remote workers live and travel.
 During their time at Remote Year, they worked together to build and manage 60+ communities of remote workers, owned internal and external initiatives to build remote culture and planned and executed a series of offsite events. Most importantly, they met thousands of remote workers and learned what made for successful remote companies.Bringing a combined 10+ years of remote work experience along with their record of accomplishment of assisting 1,000's of individuals in their transition to remote work, they decided to create Sprawl Consulting to help usher in the new generation of remote-friendly companies, full of long-term, happy and productive employees.

record.Creator: Sportneer
record.Title: The World's First Smart Ankle Weights.
record.Text: The Sportneer TrainNTrack Ankle Weights, a first-of-its-kind product for the fitness industry, are integrated with a motion sensor and heart rate chip to monitor workout intensity and performance level, helping everyone from the beginner to the fitness professional train smarter and more intentionally.The Sportneer TrainNTrack Ankle Weights are the industry’s first smart ankle weights to help people of all fitness levels train more intentionally.Heart rate monitors and a 6 axis gyroscope sensor, equipped with 3 axes to measure the rate of turn and 3 axes to measure acceleration, enable data collection and track the movements of a workout with high precision.The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights have a mega database with a high level of AI learning. The greater the user’s base, the better at analyzing the result of the exercise.Soft iron stuffing is not only comfortable on the skin, but it's able to hold its shape without being shifted, providing durability, versatility, and comfort for every training session.In the current smart fitness market, most systems have a relatively high barrier to entry, especially for the amateur or beginner athlete, with costs ranging from $1,500 to $4,500, not including monthly membership fees for access to classes. The Sportneer TrainNTrack Ankle Weights fulfill the gap of the beginner-friendly smart fitness market and break the high barrier of entry by offering the most accessible and cost-effective equipment and tutorials for amateurs and beginner athletes.The Sportneer App has 8 different training lessons and offers over 71 exercises. The app is free for every Sportneer user and new lessons are updated monthly.To motivate users to improve, a scoring system is used to provide value to each workout. The higher the accuracy, the higher the score, encouraging users to surpass themselves with each training session through results that are visual and easily understandable.A built-in heart rate monitor helps users be more aware of their overall state, performance, and workout fatigue and helps prevent arrhythmia, a sudden cardiac death caused by abnormal heart rhythms. When the heart rate is over the normal interval, the TrainNTrack Ankle Weights will vibrate non-stop reminding the users to take a break, helping them understand when to turn up or turn down the intensity of a workout.The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights were originally designed to last more than 25 hours, meeting daily exercise needs for more than a month. In the new version, we've upgraded the battery life to 35 hours, an increase of 10 hours over the previous version. Further extend the battery life, freeing you from recharging after each training session.Unlike conventional ankle weights, the TrainNTrack Ankle Weights are constructed with innovative materials like soft iron stuffing that hold its shape without being shifted, providing durability, versatility, and comfort for any workout. The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights were designed with the science of sports engineering and have been developed and tested by Sportneer’s resident personal trainer.The technology that supports the scoring system within the Sportneer App is the 6-Axis Gyroscope, which is a sensor with 6 degrees of freedom: 3 axes to measure the rate of turn and another 3 axes to measure the acceleration. To be more specific, it combines the 3 Cartesian coordinate axis accelerometers with a sensor that takes gyroscopic measurements along these 3 axes: pitch, roll, and yaw. Since they are capable of measuring acceleration forces and speed, as well as the orientation of gravity, these sensors are widely used in modern technology, such as in aircraft, digital cameras, unmanned vehicles, and navigation systems.The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights have a mega database with a high level of AI learning. The greater the user’s base, the better at analyzing the result of the exercise.Users receive a detailed summary of each workout, including statistics on training education, calories burned, and how accurately the exercises were performed.Product size, colors, and tutorial on how to measure your wrist and ankle and choose the right size.Sportneer has been serving professionals and amateurs of all ages who love sports, fitness, and the outdoors. Just like the compound word “Sportneer”, we successfully blend sports and engineering. In the spirit of healthy living and the pursuit of perfection, we aim to provide the best products and services that enable a stronger, healthier, and happier you! Our brand is rapidly growing thanks to our steadfast commitment to these values. Athletic professionals even agree that Sportneer is a reliable, professional sports brand.

record.Creator: Vladislav
record.Title: SMALT: The World's First Interactive Centerpiece
