record.Text: SMALT is the perfect complement to any meal and a great way to shake up the night! Play your favorite music through SMALT’s impressive Bluetooth speakers and set the mood with multi-colored lighting.  Plus you can track your salt intake for a healthier dining experience. Get a pinch or exact measurement of salt directly from SMALT or with our easy-to-use app. SMALT can also be used with Alexa, so upgrading your health and smarthome is easy!SMALT is primed and ready to entertain and delight your guests anywhere you choose to dine. It's easy to stream music, switch up the mood lighting, or dispense salt using the device or get advanced features with the app. SMALT can be use with iOS and Android and is compatible with Alexa, so there's more than one way to have fun and interact with this versatile centerpiece.SMALT features everything you need to enhance your dining experience and add flavor to your meal!SMALT dispenses salt with a shake/pinch of your smartphone screen or simply turning the dial manually, allowing you to be in control of the amount of salt you serve. Simply choose the amount of salt you desire and it will dispense into a small, removable tray. It's easy and SMALT does all the measuring for you!Turn it up a notch with one of the best performing portable bluetooth speakers. Stream your favorite music to get the party started or relax at dinner with your favorite Jazz music. Want to take it outdoors? Sure, it’s meant to go wherever you go.Enhance your dining ambiance with color-changing mood lighting.  Transform your everyday dining into an extraordinary experience.1 in 3 Americans have high blood pressure and many more are at risk. Because of this, many Americans have to control their salt consumption. SMALT offers an easy and fun way to monitor and control your consumption using smart tech. Whether it’s a pinch or an exact measured amount, SMALT can be an entertaining way to keep you on track towards a healthier heart.Clean and modern, SMALT is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in one hand. Place SMALT on the dining table, kitchen counter, patio area, rooftop, or take it camping.SMALT is easy to use with or without the app. Featuring intuitive design, SMALT makes setting the mood with light and sound an easy way to maximize your dining experience.Use the app for advanced features, as well as a fun way to get the right amount of salt!You can also dispense salt virtually with intuitive hand gestures! Simply shake your phone to shake out salt or pinch the screen of the smartphone to dispense a pinch of salt. There’s also a function if you just want to “eyeball” the amount.Get ready to rock or mellow out with your favorite tunes streamed right through your SMALT!One of the most basic human needs is the need for belongingness. For centuries, one of the ways we have fulfilled this need is by gathering around the dinner table, a place where we connect, appreciate and feel appreciated. SMALT is our effort to further enhance this experience - all with the important benefit of watching your salt intake. Our goal is to entertain and engage you, your friends, and family with an enhanced dining experience that let’s you set the mood and monitor your sodium intakeQ: How is salt dispensed from SMALT?A: Simply use the button and dial system on the device to choose and dispense the desired amount of salt or use the app for more advanced functions. Once the salt is dispensed into the tray below, simply remove it and add salt to your dish or pick up the SMALT itself and sprinkle on your plate.Q: How is SMALT different from Amazon Alexa?A: Alexa is a voice interface for connected home devices. Using a simple voice command you can ask Alexa to dispense salt from your SMALT.  SMALT has a built in mood- light and SMALT measures and dispenses salt. Alexa does not have these functions.Q: Can I put pepper in SMALT?A: Yes, you can.Q: How do I change the mood light color?A: You can control the mood light directly from the SMALT unit by turning the dial or from your smartphone via the SMALT App, which gives you the freedom to choose the desired color and set the perfect ambiance for any occasion.Q: Do I have to have the SMALT App to operate SMALT?A: No, all standard functions are available on the SMALT unit itself.  You can change the mood light color, control the speaker, and dispense salt easily with the touch of a button.Q: Do I need the SMALT app?A: All standard functions are available on the SMALT unit itself,  but you need the SMALT App to access other additional features such as  the Shake, pinch, and pour feature, mood light programming,  and salt tracking .Q: How long is the battery life?A: SMALT comes with a 9.6V rechargeable battery. Normally it takes around an hour to charge the battery and when fully charged, the battery lasts up to 16 hours.Q: How can I stream music from SMALT?A:  You can pair SMALT with your phone to stream music through SMALT’s Bluetooth speaker.Q: How much is the shipping cost?A: The shipping is free. We will cover all the shipping costs wherever you are.Q: How can I clean my SMALT?A: The Best way to clean your SMALT is with a damp cloth.Q: Can I really shake salt from my Smartphone?A: Yes, you can!  Using the SMALT app, you can shake your phone or pinch the screen to dispense salt.  With these simple actions  the desired amount of salt gets dispensed in a small removable tray at the bottom of your SMALT.Q: What different types of salt can I use with SMALT?​A: SMALT is designed to be used with common table salt.Q: Can I use SMALT to grind sea salt or other coarser salts like Himalayan salt?A: SMALT does not grind salt.  You can use any pre-ground with a consistency similar to the table salt with SMALT.Q: How do I know what setting to use when I am preparing different foods?A: You can dispense salt in amounts as low as a pinch or as high as one tablespoon with several denominations in between.  The amount you pick is dependent on your taste or dietary restrictions.Q: How can I track my sodium with the SMALT App?A:  Every time you dispense salt, the amount of sodium gets logged.  Each serving of sodium is tracked by the app.  You can track each family member’s consumption separately.Q: How can SMALT help me if I am on a restricted sodium diet?A: Excessive salt consumption is becoming a big health problem worldwide. Most Americans consume twice as much salt than what’s recommended by the American Heart Association.  When cooking with SMALT, you can choose the low sodium meal setting from your SMALT App.  This setting helps with preparing low sodium meals conveniently as recommended by the AHA guideline.

record.Creator: Black Blossom Games
record.Title: Possibly Cool Dice Towers II
record.Text: Welcome, welcome !! Cool packs are back!Possibly Cool Dice Towers II includes high quality models of dice towers, dice cases, coasters & mugs with easy printing! Get everything for your collection and your game nights.All Dice Tower models are pre-supported, splitted into parts for easy printing and can be glued. We will try to split the files in a way that uses the least material for the supports. All Dice Towers will be printed and tested to ensure the sculpt's dice blocking.Don’t have a printer and want to get the items printed? This is why we offer Merchant licenses that allow the sale of all the items in physical printed form. For the Dice Towers our packs include:Let us know in the comments if you would like us to provide the parts in any extra way. All dice cases and coasters can be printed in one print.

record.Creator: George Agapiou
record.Title: Samurai by JetProd - Electric Surf
record.Text: The Samurai has been something we have been dreaming before we knew what that would be. Windsurfing has been our summer hobby which we did every day! We rarely missed a sunrise without the cool wind in our hair and the sea in our grasp while we glided through the waves. We thought to ourselves; is there something more to it? Then we started experimenting and researching different ways to make the simple surfboard, something which would revolutionize the industry but as always having in mind the reason we try to tame the waves, have fun!We at Jet Prod. Want to create a jet-powered wakeboard which doesn't require wind, is easier to control but harder to master. Creating and designing it isn't an easy task, considering the amount of jet-powered wakeboards out there in the market who have a lot more than 2 people making their dreams come true. Our primary focus is the price, speed of the wakeboard and the weight it can carry. Due to the demand of the wakeboards by the surfing community, our designer and engineer is being extremely cautious in to what kind of materials we will use and the cost of said materials. The Samurai will be efficient, capable of *by approximation* no more than 120kgs/264lbs and keep its retail price lower than the industry average.Features of the productThe Samurai board will be equipped with:● A carbon fiber impeller● Electronic flaps which will be controlled by the rider on hand and deploy the e-brake (will go into more detail below)● Hydrodynamically shaped slim wakeboard for optimum maneuvers (will go into more detail below)● Maximum Velocity 35 knots (64km/h) 200kgs (440lbs) of force● Jet drive diameter 90mmJet prod offers a cozy environment and conducive atmosphere for a great business. We set and maintain the highest standard of quality and ethics in everything we do. We will provide perfect, excellent, and reliable services to our customers. We will work hard in order to earn the trust of our customers, employees, partners, and our community and keep developing our products with the utmost attention to detail. Under the cooperation of a determined and united team of management staff; we are expertly led by an open-minded individual whose dedication to helping others achieve their goals in this extremely important passion.With many years working hands-on with the technology and components used, at Jet Prod, even with the constant and consistent change in the jet-powered wakeboard sphere, we ascertain that our customers will be provided with best tools to have the fun they are promised when trusting our product. Providing our products at a reasonable price, way lower than our high end competitors, is our paramount goal.A key factor of business we shall not handle with levity is customer satisfaction. We will ensure the highest quality of services at all time to meet or surpass our customer's expectation. We will ensure that every customer’s needs and requests are duly and properly noted to offer our services to the high standard they should receive. All our services will be customer-tailored and specifically designed to meet & exceed expectations. Up-to-the-minute and workable jet-powered wakeboard production plan will be laid down as elementary as possible for customers to easily comprehend and implement for the company’s success and growth.Paramount marketing strategies proven to boost business publicity and awareness will be carried out to ensure the necessary awareness and advertisement is achieved for our company both locally and nationally. Social media platforms will be fully utilized; such as Instagram & Facebook as well as the word of mouth which is a powerful marketing strategy even in times like these.Mission StatementThe electric waterjet industry is filled with various types in many different price points. The wakeboard which we will supply to our customers may not have the same appeal to enthusiasts as already established wakeboard companies have the market cornered. By utilizing the technological knowledge we possess, we will create a product which will have a price depicted by today’s economy but at the same time be of the highest quality. Since, 3D printing has been made available to everyday users, Jet Prod will invest in this revolutionary method in order to create the small items needed to operate the wakeboard Samurai.We will create the mold for manufacturing the wakeboard and create the water jet by using the 3D printer therefore the cost will be as low as we can possibly so can everybody have access to this experience. The water jets have been made with great success and one of the wake board’s features is the E-brake. Since, not everyone is a professional rider, we will create a mechanism which halts the board the moment the rider loses his balance and falls into the water, the board will be up to 5 meters away from the rider. In addition, the E-brake methodology includes a flap creating a camber line larger than the jet surf axis, increasing the lift factor on the back edge of the surf to minimize the time it takes surfs to start planing in the water.The wakeboard itself has been designed to be thin and weigh less than 10kgs and the battery less than 15kgs. The weight is the most competitive aspect in retrospect to other wakeboards in the industry. The electric motor which will be used will be 22kw and will produce 12Nm of torque at 6000rpm. The power of the water jet in static mode (This is the mode when the wakeboard is fully stopped, when it’s speeding the power is increasing above the numbers mentioned above) and the water jet’s motor thrusting force will be almost 200kgs.This has been made possible due to the exceptional design of the water jet.Lastly, this product will be competitive in the market for these three reasons below,In the following video we present some footage of testing the first prototype electric surfboard. Everything its our design and creation except electric motor, battery pack and wireless controller.Target MarketOur company aims to grow in the thriving market of water sports. The water sports market has a steady upward trend and analysts predict that it will keep its upward trend until 2025. The most popular water sports consist of windsurfing, kite surfing and puddle surfing between ages 15 to 50 years old. The puddle surfing's popularity increased due to the global pandemic which came into effect by the shopping boom worldwide. Although, the past year it is slowly began to not be as trending as the early pandemic days. We aim in making the motorized surfing the leading water sports industry. By creating innovative and new surfboard models but also low prices, we are directly competing with the companies which have a large customer list. The demand for this specific water sport is not that great, due to not being as popular as other ones, which we at JetProd have a big inclination to change that. Creating advertising campaigns which main purpose will be to make the customer keen to try this new mode of entertainment, to accomplish that we will sell the board as a mode of "renting" on touristic attracted areas and make in known both in Greece and other countries.Sales forecastAccording to our research, in the first year the sales will be only from professional water sports rentals in many well-known beaches in Greece. We estimate that in the first year we will have 240 orders at the price of 6.5k€. In the third year we will present a second model SAMURAI II, to increase the number of sales, and recognition by the public. The second model will be sold with a price increase of 9.5k€. SAMURAI II will be high – end board with key features of the automotive industry. At last, the third model will reveal at the end of the fourth year and will be named Aris Pro. Aris Pro will be the first model in the world, with self-charger. With our experience we will include a photo voltaic system on the board, where will powered up the board. Aris Pro price will begin from 10.5k€. In the fifth year the old models’ price will be discounted.Cash FlowObserved below is the IRR of five years being operational is 20% and also 29% exponential increasing profit over the five year plan is the Compound Annual Growth Rate. Lastly, we analyzed the risk of having a drop in sales of 30% from year one up to year five the IRR index is still at 10% in the specific five-year span.Management Team & OrganizationA clear mission gives purpose and direction to every team, in order to reach its goals and overcome every barrier and obstacle. JetProd’s team has a clear mission, to produce an innovative solution and an immense service in the field of water sports fun. Furthermore, our vision is to build a product, which has a great value proposition for the customer and gives him/her a unique sea experience, by using our jet board technology. In addition to that, we want to create something new, smart and differentiated from what is on the market, something that will make us innovators. When you are accompanied by individuals, who have the same purpose with you it is more likely to succeed.George (CEO/ CTO): George has an Integrated MSc in Aeronautical Engineering and a BSc in Mechanical Engineering by the National Technical University of Athens. He has been working for 6 years in his business of Household machines service and is specialized in Technical Research and Business Development. George is the CEO and CTO of JetProd.Nikos (CFO): Nikos has a BSc in Shipping from Business College of Athens. He has been working in his own business with Space Parfums located in Athens. He is specialized in Financial and Marketing Research. Nikos is extremely interested in technology with an innovative mindset. He is going to be CFO of JetProd and head of R&D.Nefeli (CMO): Nefeli has a Certificate of Music Production / Music Therapy, and a certificate of Yoga Instructor. She has been working for 6 years in a company of Tourism activity and for 4 years until now she has been working in a Telecommunication company in Athens as a CFO. She is very analytical and has the necessary marketing skills. She is going to be the CMO of JetProd.This is our team... so far.TimelineThe following two months will strongly focus on making a friendly workstation for employees and start to design a perfect board. Our target is as long as we design and manufacture the board, we will check it instantly for functionality and about safeties for the rider. At the end of the third month, we will have a tested prototype board where we will start to manufacture this in mass production, and by the time we will start to advertising in social media and in some places with touristic population.With the functional design already laid out, all there is left to do is build the prototype to test and double check to see if any last-minute items should be added or changed. Your investments in the Samurai will make that possible and bring this project to life!Creating new designs of hardware and technology can be expensive the first time around, and generate high initial costs for things like tooling, prototyping, sourcing of material and labor costs.That is where your contributions take action. Your pledge will be used towards creating the JetProd prototype, for research and development, and eliminating those obstacles of upfront fees.Once the prototype is created, the tests will involve various  tests that will be documented before the official release date.Once the Samurai has been tested, tried and proven, the goal is to have it available for ordering online from our website as a final product for all to enjoy on all coasts of the world.Our overall goal is to source all materials completely from Greece, which will give opportunities to small local shops. Your contribution will help with that as well.Your pledge will also give us a chance to effectively advertise through social media, businesses, online, and through our local beach stores right here in Athens!Not only will your contributions help bring the best out of ourselves but you will also give this project and my small business the chance to be seen and heard by others who love to build and create.

record.Creator: RE:BALLS
record.Title: Wooden Mobile Coffee House
record.Text: Why choose a wooden structure as the main material for a mobile café?  In total, Finnish forests grow more than they are utilized each year.  Wood is a truly ecological option because it is the only completely 100% renewable natural material.Finland is one of the best tree growing areas in the world.  The growing season is quite short, only 100 days a year.  The growth of a tree from a small seedling to an adult log takes about 60-120 years.  Slow growth produces high-quality raw material;  low and small-branched, straight-stemmed, symmetrical, dense, and straight-grained wood.The RE: BALLS hospitality unit is made up of a two-level unit where the main floor is used as an entrance hall and bar service with a large terrace. The upper floor has four areas: two offices, a meeting room for 10 people and an open space with three tables and a living room. The awning attached to the truck has approximately 120 square meter and a capacity for 100 people, next to a terrace and a bar area where all kinds of drinks and  cocktails are served.This hospitality is a very versatile mobile unit, since it can be built only with the main unit for smaller events and the complete assembly, mobile unit with the awning, for events where they invite hundreds of people.A great way to bring a product or event directly to the customer.  In one shipment, the 45-foot container unit is converted into an almost triple event space with a total of about four 40-foot containers.  It is equipped with air conditioning, LED lighting and other technical features, offering a lavish 120 square meters of space for customers at festivals, markets, fairs and events.

record.Creator: Xavian Romeu
record.Title: The Latin Resistance
record.Text: My dream was always to be able to study Computer Science, thanks to personal effort and the help of my family, a year ago I managed to start studying for this degree. As soon as I started, I realized that many concepts were difficult to understand. The reason is that I grew up in a Spanish-speaking Caribbean country. Many of the terms were difficult for me despite having lived in the United States for almost twelve years and speaking fluent English. I immediately thought the solution is to start looking for documentation in Spanish. I spent almost a week researching different articles and sources from Universities, however, the more I read, the more confusing it became for me. I realized that I understood less in Spanish than in English. The reason is that many immigrants learn to think in English and forget some words and concepts in Spanish. Another reason is that we are mostly exposed to English in everyday activities, such as listening to music, watching TV, spending time with friends, etc. Then I began to learn these terms in Spanish and English and I realized that my brain absorbed the contents faster. Unfortunately, in this school year I have been able to observe many of my classmate's struggle with the same problems, many, although they are very intelligent and disciplined, do not manage to do well in classes due to the language barrier.That is why I would like to open a YouTube channel, a website, and a podcast where I can do tutorials, and write blogs where I help Spanish-speaking students to better understand classes such as Mathematics, Computer Science, Philosophy, etc.

record.Creator: Walter Dulnigg
record.Title: Hallotag Multi-Media Sticker
record.Text: Surprise your loved ones like you have never done before. 🎁 With the brand new Hallotag-Technology©️ you can let your gift speak for you 😮 You heard right, your gift speaks for you !!! But how does it work? A simple sticker with a NFC Chip on it makes the magic possible. Simply stick the Hallotag sticker on your gift and record your personal congratulations with the free Hallotag App on it. 🎉 Your loved ones can view and play your multi-media CONGRATULATIONS WITHOUT OPENING AN APP. Let your loved ones experience special moments and you will stay unforgettable.Our ambitious vision: Make your gift memorable!Everybody loves to look for gifts for loved ones, for relatives and friends. We believe that there are many people who have the same problem like us,  it is often difficult to find something suitable that doesn't  just stand around somewhere gathering dust.But what does it mean to give gifts?From our point of view, it's about· Giving a real and lasting memory to them· Surprising them· Touching them· Make them laugh andBeing very close to your loved ones and thus to remain memorable.And that was exactly the trigger for our innovation, namely to enhance gifts with touching emotions (whether it is vouchers or household aids, billets, etc.) .In order to realize this vision, HALLOTAG developed an overall solution consisting of· A free Hallotag app and· A system conforming to an NFC Hallotag stickerWith the help of the free app, emotional videos, audios, images and texts can be easily recorded contactless.The one for whom the gift is meant· DOES NOT need to download an app· DOES NOT need to start any appThey simply hold the back of his mobile phone to the sticker and the fabulous winter video or the grandchildeb songs are automatically displayed and played.At this moment the gift is connected to the touching emotions of the winter video, the lovely child's songs. The gift remains memorable.The development was based on the KISS principle (Keep It Simple, Stupid) and is therefore very easy to use for EVERY age group.From the beginning it was very important for us that we rely on 100% Austrian added value, from conception and development, graphic design and marketing to production. In the fabrication of the sticker, we work together with Austrian social institutions who manufacture the stickers with enthusiasm.The development of the Hallotag system started in 2017. In 2019, a number of test phases were executed in the market to make the system ready for the market. At the beginning of 2020 Hallotag was ready for the market and we started online sales in Austria, UK, BRD, DK.For business partners we developed additional features that are useful for the business partner. We cooperate with, among others, ÖsterreichischenPost AG and wellness gift provider Wellcard.The company, based in Graz, Austria, has set itself the goal of making Hallotag the global market leader in the field of multimedia stickers.With a team of 15 experienced engineers, graphic artists, social media experts, social institutions and in close cooperation with the Technical University of Graz, we are already working on future innovations for our vision: "Make your gift memorable"What are the advantages of Hallotag over other scanning technologies?o No app needs to be installed or started to read the Hallotag sticker.o The Hallotag sticker cannot be duplicated by simply photo copying it.o The Hallotag sticker can be "privatized / encrypted" and only be played back by the person for who the sticker is intended.o Optical scanning technologies cannot read the scan area anymore due to e.g. dirt, scratches or vandalism.o The Hallotag sticker can be graphically designed with impressive designs, depending on the customer's wishes.o Data can be stored directly on the Hallotag stickerDo I need to register to download the Hallotag app?NO, the app can be "downloaded" for free from the App Store without entering registration data.Can the sticker be scanned without an app?YES, practically all Android smart phones support NFC. Android devices are delivered with an activated NFC interface by default. You can activate or deactivate the interface in the settings / connections.On iPhone models newer than iPhone 6, the NFC interface is activated by default and cannot be deactivated. For older iPhone models (7,8,X), please install the Hallotag app to scan the sticker and start the VIEW function to view the multimedia elements.For iPhone models (Xs, 11, 12,…..) there is not app needed the scan the sticker.Do you need an Internet connection to play or scan?YES.How many multimedia elements can be added to the sticker?Currently 6 images, 1 video, 1 audio and a text message can be added to the sticker.Can the sticker be used a second time?When creating the sticker, you have the option of replacing selected multimedia elements with new ones. As soon as the sticker has been created with the final elements and you press the "FINALIZE" button, changes are no longer possible.Can the sticker be privatized/encrypted for a specific person?YES, the sticker can be encrypted for a specific person using the "PRIVATE" function so that only that specific person can scan the sticker. The function "PRIVATE" can be found in the menu on the top right corner ⁞ when creating the sticker.Can the sticker be applied to all materials?YES, except on metallic surfaces.Can I answer the "Creator" of the sticker directly when the sticker is scanned?YES, you can use the “ANSWER” function to reply directly to the “creator” of the sticker.How do I find the appropriate NFC scanning position on the rear side of my phone?On iPhone models, the scanning position is on the upper edge of the rear side of your phone.For Samsung devices, depending on the model the scanning position is located either on the upper edge or in the middle area of the rear side of your phone.On Huawei devices, the scanning position is on the upper edge of the rear side of your phone.What is the required scanning distance?You should hold the appropriate scan position at the rear side of your phone at a distance of less than 1 cm to the sticker.Can multimedia elements from the gallery be used?Yes, you either use multimedia elements from the gallery or the elements are recorded live when you add them to the sticker using the Hallotag app.How do I get a sticker?The stickers are available in all Austrian post offices or in the webshop (www.hallotag.com).Where are the stickers made?In Austria with the help of social institutions. We rely on local value creation.or birthday, wedding, christmas, valentines day, mothers day, and much more...

record.Creator: Laurence Svekis
record.Title: Modern Web Design Course learn HTML CSS and JavaScript
record.Text:
My name is Laurence Svekis I'm a professional course creator - having taught over 1 Million Students Globally both online and in person.I often get asked by students about how to get started to create websites.   I wanted to launch an all new modern website design course which is fast paced and easy to get started with for students to start creating websites.  It will cover all the basics of HTML CSS and JavaScript with coding examples and links to top resources saving time.Learn how toHow to create web pages with HTML and CSS
Create interactive web content with JavaScript
Basics of coding JavaScript
Bring your web pages to life with Code
Modern Responsive WebSites
Interactive and Dynamic Web PagesEach section will include a PDF guide with source code and resourcesLearn HTML - how to create an HTML file and structure your HTML code in a modern format ready to be styled. Lessons of this section cover how to get started with coding and creating web pages.Setup your Editor and create HTML filesDebug your codeHTML tags for page structureWhat makes up an HTML elementWhat are Self closing TagsHow to use Element AttributesLinking pages together with HyperlinksAdding Images to your web pageLists and Tables for readable contentSemantic Page elementsHow to create a simple webpageGo live with a Github page and your HTML siteLearning HTML covers the following code.Learn CSSWhat CSS is and how you can style your web pages with Cascading Style Sheets. HTML provides structure for your webpage, CSS allows you to style your page. Design the page with your style, setup page layouts, add colors, fonts, and more. Present your web pages as you want them to look, independent of the HTML you can make your web content look and style as you imagine it should.Explore how to add CSS to your HTML pageHow to add colors to page element backgrounds and textWhat the box model is and how you can apply borders, margins, and padding to any page element.Style the text, update the font and customize your text output.Update you links, adding Pseudo classes to your page elementsHow to apply display properties, position and floats to set up your page layout.Really useful CSS properties exploredCSS combinators for selection of elements.How to build a responsive webpage with CSS float, CSS grid and CSS flexbox.Use CSS  Cascading Style Sheets common syntax covered in this section.Learn JavaScript BasicsJavaScript code runs your browser as your html page loads. Adding JavaScript to your code can improve the user experience of the web page. Go from a static webpage to an interactive one with JavaScript. This section will cover the basics of getting started with JavaScript and the code syntax to write JavaScript code. JavaScript is a set of instructions you can add in your code to let the browser know what to do next.Variables are at the heart of codingThe different data types of JavaScript and how JavaScript can set the data type.The power of Objects and Arrays and how you can use them to store multiple values in one variable.Operators to provide calculations within your codeFunctions to run predefined blocks of code as needed.Conditions for logic within your codeLoops to save time and iterate over blocks of codeLearn JavaScript to make your webpages more interactive.Learn JavaScript DOMJavaScript and the DOMDocument Object Model (DOM) is a programming interface for HTML documents, that is the logical structure of a page and how the page content can be accessed and manipulated.  Bring your web pages to life with JavaScript and connect to the web page elements.  Create fully interactive content that responds to the user.  Create Dynamic web page content that can change without page refresh and present new elements and updated content to the user.  Improve your web users experience with JavaScript and the DOM.What is the DOM Document Object ModelHow to select elements from your webpage with JavaScriptManipulate and change your page elements with JavaScriptHow to set styling attributes for elementsMake them interactive with Event listenersDOM events and Page events with JavaScriptHow to create elements with code and add them to your webpageMoving elements and animation of elements.
