record.Creator: Ollie Smeenk
record.Title: SODAQ AIR - The Portable Air Quality Monitor
record.Text: Air quality has continued to decline over the last decade.  As a result,  you probably already know some facts about air quality like... It tends to be worse in the city than in the country,  a lot of the air pollution we experience are emissions from things like cars and factories, and that an increasing number of diseases and deaths are being traced back to air pollution. The curious thing about the problem is that a lot of people don't know what in the air is causing this. So it begs the question, do you know what is in your air?Chances are information about air pollution specific to your location isn't exactly easy to access. That's because air is primarily measured, through big, static air quality monitors (AQM). And while those AQM’s are great for providing city-wide averages, they really aren't telling you all too much about the air you are moving through.You had access to your own portable air quality sensor,  that gave you real-time, air quality readings?That question was the foundation on which the AIR was built.The SODAQ AIR, allows you to understand what you're coming in contact with on a daily basis. By collecting data wherever you go, you'll be able to monitor personal exposure to air pollution, avoid those heavily polluted areas, and choose the healthiest routes.You'll also be contributing to a worldwide collection of data points that will be instrumental for governments and organizations in understanding air quality trends and building solutions for them.In 2015, we created the first version of the AIR and with it reimagined how air quality was collected.  The idea was to give everyone the “keys'' to understanding their air because we figured that the best way to work on air quality for the people, was with the people.  All of the collected AIR quality data was freely accessible to governments and other organizations aiming to build solutions to improve the quality of the air.In 2017,  as part of a collaboration with the Dutch Province of Utrecht and company Civity, the AIR became part of the Sniffer Bike project. When the project came to completion in January 2021, the Dutch National Institute for Public Health and Environment (RIVM) validated the air quality data collected by the Sniffer Bikes. With the official green light from the RIVM, the AIR's and their data were considered to be valuable additions to the existing network of fixed air monitoring stations. Now 7 years, 2 prototypes, thousands of cycled kilometers, and 20 million air quality measurements later - we are back with the new and improved SODAQ AIR.We made sure the AIR is ready to go, as soon as you are!The air on your trip- Each trip you take tells a unique story about the air quality.  Whether it's in the morning or the evening, the sun or the rain all affect the air quality. The AIR keeps track of it all and monitors the PM levels, temperature, and the exact location at which the readings were taken. You can access all of your journey data by inputting your AIR's unique identifier into the map.Know Your AIR Map- The aggregation of all the data in a 100x100 meter area, is averaged on an hourly basis and added to the global map as open data. This creates a network of detailed air measurements across the globe while making sure that you, your journey, and your data contribution all remain completely anonymous.Can our data tell us more?Our collective data will create an intricate, and complex network of air quality measurements that spans as far as you can cycle.  It will provide you with day-to-day insights allowing you to avoid areas with high PM levels and minimize exposure.When enough of us become part of the community, our data can tell us about so much more than just the air.  For instance, it can show temperature patterns in cities, allowing heat islands to be detected and potentially indicating areas that cause heat stress. The limiting factor becomes what the governments and organizations using the data can imagine. Working on the AIR We Breathe - Together!The AIR is a highly intuitive device, which tells you everything you do and don't want to know about the air you breathe.The AIR is fitted with several sensors which will give you an accurate picture of the air you’re moving through.PM sensor - Measures the particulate matter (PM) floating around in the air. Its primary focus is picking up PM 2.5, but it also monitors PM1.0 & 10.Temperature sensor - Was it hot or cold? We need to know! The temperature has a tremendous influence on the behavior of air, making temperature insights incredibly useful when trying to discern patterns in PM concentrations.Humidity sensor - Like temperature, the amount of water in the air also plays a large role in PM levels and how it behaves.GPS Antenna - Keeps track of the exact location at which data points are collected.Accelerometer - Monitors motion of the device, signaling the device when it needs to turn on and off.Designed to give you a quick rundown of the quality of the air as you're cycling, the LED strip positioned on top of the AIR shines in one of 3 colors.Green - The levels of PM in the air are low. So that breeze you feel flowing through your hair is a-okay! Yellow - There is a moderate amount of PM floating around in the air. No need to worry but you might want to tie up your hair.Red - The levels of PM floating around in the air are quite high. Even without the sensor, you'll probably be able to tell you don't want this breeze in your hair.The AIR comes with a simple turn-lock mount that allows you to quickly attach it to the handlebars of your bicycle or any other non-motor vehicle or object.When you're on the move all you need to do is mount the AIR and go. But if you want to know about the air quality in one place over an extended period of time, the AIR can also be used as a static monitoring device!0 to 100 in 2 hours - The AIR is powered by a supercapacitor, our alternative to regular batteries. It'll take 2 hours to charge from 0-100%, and then gives you 8 hours of functionality.Capacity stays at 100 - The supercapacitor doesn’t decay over time, which means the AIR will keep giving you those 8 hours until the end of time. The AIR is designed to use its energy as efficiently as possible, and for that reason, it communicates over LTE-M & NB-IoT networks. As these networks are fairly new technologies, they aren't yet accessible everywhere in the world.LTE-M & NB-IoT networks will be coming to everyone in the near future, rest assured that this is not a matter of if, but of when!Color of the AIR Over the last few months, we have been rigorously testing the white prototype model of the AIR which you've seen through our Kickstarter. The model which will go to production will be identical to the one to the prototype, except that it will be in the blue you see below. DimensionsMade to follow you wherever you go, because keeping tabs on the air shouldn't be hard. The AIR is small enough to fit into the palm of your hand, making it easy to pack away when you’re not cycling.Air is free and so it seems only fitting that access to the information on air is too!The Hardware  -  we’ve shared the complete blueprints of the device using a CC license. That means everyone, everywhere, has access to the information to build and repair their own AIR (either as we designed it, or with their own adjustments), and will be able to share their data into the AIR map.Open-source data: Through the CC license the data is just as accessible as the hardware.  Any individual, university, or non-profit organization can utilize the anonymized data, download it to CSV or access it via our API, entirely free of charge.For commercial usage - refer to the FAQ section We see a world without batteries.SODAQ stands for Solar Powered Data Acquisition and was founded by father and son Jan Willem & Ollie Smeenk back in 2013, while creating solar-powered weather stations for farmers in rural Africa. By harvesting energy from the environment, and working as efficiently as possible with the energy they had at their disposal, the weather stations set the foundation for all subsequent SODAQ products. With our solutions, we aspire to create a better world, for people but also for the environment. This community project came to be because at SODAQ we believe that when it comes to global challenges like air pollution, the collective strength of the people will be the determining factor to creating a better world.  Together, we can use IoT as a force for change.

record.Creator: Donovan
record.Title: The Complete SwiftUI Development Course
record.Text:
How about learning a skill that could help launch your career as a developer. This is a course that is perfect for those wanting to begin their journey in coding and for those with some programming experience who are looking to explore IOS development. You will learn to make beautiful apps in a way that fits into your busy schedule. We are in the information age, and there is high demand for programmers. This is a course designed to help you meet that need. No prior programming experience is required. We will start from the absolute basics, and we will walk together through the process of understanding the basics of swift programming in general before we dive into app development with SwiftUI. We will build 4 fully functioning apps as part of this course, and if we reach our stretch goals, we will build even more.Things that you will learnBasics of ProgrammingApp Development
         1) RockPaperScissors - A game against your phone 
         2) Quizzer - A quiz app that lets you study or have a game of trivia with your friends. 
         3) InvestmentCalculator-Calculate predicted compound interest growth and view current stock and currency values.  
         4) Contect - The Contact Manager for making connectionsThings that you will receive as part of the courseWhen I was about 14, my dad began trying to persuade me to learn to write iPhone apps. There was an obvious need for young people that knew how to code. I got really excited about the idea, but I didn’t connect with a way to start the learning process, and so the idea fizzled, and several years passed. When I was 21, I was again introduced to the idea of learning app making. I jumped on the opportunity, and I have spent the last two years working on various apps every day.I started learning to program in Swift, and while studying Physics and Computer Science in university, I was exposed to several other languages including C++, Python, Wolfram, Matlab, Javascript, HTML, and CSS. I have spent hundreds of hours writing thousands of lines of code. I have written dozens of IOS applications with varying degrees of complexity, and I am working on bringing my first app to the app store within the next year.I have more recently fallen in love with SwiftUI, Apple’s sleek, declarative language for building native applications. Building apps has never been simpler. I look forward to helping you to learn how to use this powerful tool to bring your development to the next level.$1,000$2,500$5,000$7,500$10,000Firstly, I have been in your shoes. I have recently been in your shoes, learning how to program, and I have learned from searching through hours of other online sources to learn the things that I have learned. I was often frustrated with tutorials and classes that assumed that I had a lot of background knowledge that I did not have. I felt lost for much of my early experience coding. I want to be able to pass on to you the experience that I have gained from hundreds of hours of learning this material.  I am excited to make your journey into Swift programming as smooth as possible.Secondly, although I have not been involved in tutoring for Computer Science before, I do have experience tutoring in other technical subjects: primarily Physics. I believe firmly in teaching for understanding, and I will do my best to help you understand not just what the code is doing, but also why the code behaves as it does. I care deeply that you understand the material in this course. You will learn by following along line by line, building the sample applications for yourself, and having opportunities to be creative on your own.

record.Creator: Neil Townend
record.Title: SOMBRILL
record.Text: THE ULTIMATE LEISURE ACCESSORYIf you are anything like me, you will have suffered while enjoying the sunshine in your garden or on holiday, not being able to easily shade your face. I tried everything from hats to sunbeds with canopies and carefully positioned trees or buildings...I kept saying to myself: 'I just want something to block the sun from my head, that is simple, inexpensive and easy to adjust as the sun moves'So I mashed together a bracket and a cardboard disc which kind of did the job - but when using my mobile or Kindle, thought: 'What if I could attach my device to the back of the disc?' That's when the SOMBRILL was conceived.Three months of samples, testing and discussing the design and we now have the finished, high-quality prototype, poised for production in a reputable Chinese factory. SOMBRILL is robust, flexible, attractive and versatile. It can be fixed to almost any sunbed, table or armrest and can hold any device up to a small tablet. It protects your face from the harmful sun, while allowing you hands-free viewing of your screen.We just need the funding for the first order of 1000 units - and by this time next year, Rodney... (you know the rest).You can be among the first people in the world to own this exciting invention, while helping us on our journey to bring an improved leisure experience for all. Thank you in advance for your interest and faith in SOMBRILL.Pre-order yours through this Kickstarter campaign for just £25 (inc UK postage). Retail price will be £30 plus postage...The following series of pictures follows the story of the SOMBRILL sunshade device holder, from initial idea, through testing, to the finished prototype (above), which we are very proud of.Thank you for your interest and faith in SOMBRILL THE ULTIMATE LEISURE ACCESSORY!

record.Creator: Manan Rajdeep Ghai
record.Title: Uhane - Mental Health for Teens
record.Text:
Why do 1 in 5 kids have a mental health disorder?
Why is suicide the second leading cause of death for people aged 15-29?
Why do 86% of teens with mental health disorders not tell anyone?I was 17 when I was first diagnosed with OCD. It got so bad to the point that I wasn't even able to look at my own face in the mirror. I felt alone, isolated, and scared, and I decided to make sure that nobody else had to go through what I did. This is why I started Uhane.Uhane is many things. We are a startup. We are a non-profit. We are a community. We are here to help. Uhane provides resources, apps, and a community to help address the mental health issue in teens.One of the main features of Uhane upon launch was its community forum. This was created to give teens a space to share their struggles and experiences with a supportive community of peers that could provide advice, encouragement, and comfort in tough times. Uhane's community is divided into several categories, each corresponding to an important aspect of mental health so that users can get the information most relevant to them.Another key output of Uhane is its apps. Uhane's first app was VENT, which allowed teens going through a crisis to anonymously connect with another user and let out their feelings without fear of exposure or backlash. We also intend to launch another app called Diversion Games. These are intended for when people find themselves overwhelmed by their emotions and are unable to manage them. This collection of simple, engaging, and entertaining games will allow people to divert from their overpowering emotions into a healthier state.Uhane's first published book is called Serenity: A Beginner's Guide to OCD. This is a collection of anecdotes related to Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder detailing a journey of growth and acceptance through a mental and emotional crucible. The intention of this book is to help clear up misunderstandings surrounding mental health and this disorder, to raise awareness of this issue in teens, and to encourage teens struggling with something similar to seek professional help and to remind them that they are not alone. This book is set to launch in March 2022.When talking to parents about mental health, we realized that many don't understand how to discuss such issues with their children. We decided to create Conversation Cards that show conversation starters, important questions to ask, good practices, topics to avoid, and disorder-specific information to encourage and facilitate healthy and informative conversations between parents and teens. The conversation cards are set to launch in January 2022.We understand that a lot of people don't want to read. A lot of articles on mental health are long and tedious, and while we have done our best to keep ours short and sweet, we recognize that we can explore such concepts through other media as well. Our podcast aims to reiterate critical information surrounding mental health issues as well as provide listeners with additional insight into relevant concepts.Building on what we learned from the podcast, we are also planning on launching a monthly comic for Uhane that depicts the struggles of someone going through a mental health condition. The purpose of this is to create a set of relatable characters with whom readers can identify and use them to inspire growth and recovery. This would also help parents understand more clearly what their child is going through.Wait, I thought this was a non-profit? Well, yes, it is indeed. All proceeds from our store go straight to raising awareness for mental health through the production of content and resources under Uhane.1. We need help with publishing Serenity and getting it out as far and wide as possible so that we can raise awareness and help as many people as we can2. We need to develop 3 Diversion Games scientifically proven to calm the mind3. We want to develop 2 apps to help teens feel better about themselves and get help quickly4. We need to design and develop our Conversation Cards and get them into production to get them in the hands of as many parents as possible5. We want to translate Uhane into 7 different languages to make it accessible around the world6. We need to publish the first run of our Uhane comic7. We need to produce the first run of Uhane merchandise We hope that you believe in this cause just as we do, and we look forward to making a difference.Thanks :)

record.Creator: KindBuys
record.Title: KindBuys
record.Text: How do you know if a product you're buying was ethically made (i.e. employees were paid fair wages, there was no animal or human cruelty, there was no forced labor) and sustainably sourced (i.e. no harm was done to the planet in gathering materials, no dangerous materials were used)?  The answer?  IT'S REALLY HARD.When you see an "all natural" symbol on a product, what does that mean?!  Is it real?  Who verified it?  Is it just a marketing ploy?  These are really important considerations, and they are also extremely difficult to navigate and decipher. Our thoughts? It shouldn't be this hard!! It should be simple to know that what you are buying is causing harm to neither creature nor planet.  Our goal is to make this completely transparent.  KindBuys' ultimate mission is to display to consumers the verified certifications a product has, no matter how they are viewing it. In addition, we make it super easy to understand what those certifications actually mean.

record.Creator: Djiraffe
record.Title: Djiraffe - Enjoy Every Car Ride

record.Creator: Boris
record.Title: Fireflies: lightning vest
record.Text:
Thousands of people died on roads all over the world. Someone was riding a bicycle, someone was going along a road, someone had gotten out of a car. Everyone of these poor people could be rescued. They just had to be more visible on the road. Drivers of cars were not able to see them in the dark. Even the brightest clothes are visible in the semi-darkness of the road only when the distance is really short.  Braking distance of many cars is more than the driver's vision capabilities.Development of modern technologies lets us change the problem cardinally. Until nowadays, every vest, which is recommended for being visible at the road, is based on the principle of a reflecting light, which is a low-performance solution. Our solution was spied from nature. A miracle, which is created by evolution, is fireflies. They have an ultra-small size of their bodies, but they are visible even in a dark deep forest. These small, but smart creatures are able to attract attention everywhere. As soon as fireflies have appeared at a field, everyone knows it. Firefly is sort of a progressive lighthouse of evolution.Our Vest is made of special fabric, which is developed specially for bright illumination in the darkness. Thousands of light-conducting fibers transmit the LEDs’ light, therefore the whole vest turns into one big firefly, into a big flashlight, which is impossible not to notice either it’s dark or just cloudy weather. And if several people, who are standing together, will wear the vest, they turn into one big bright spot of light, which is visible at the distance of several hundreds meters in all weather.The development of these vests is a breakthrough in the sphere of road security.  Vest “Fireflies” works perfectly in any weather, in any temperature. Everything is easy: Dress it up and turn it on and you will be wondered how bright you are and how much attention you have attracted!Built-in pocket small high-power batteries could be charged as easily as your phone, just connect the charger to USB. The vest is assembled reliably. It lets you take  long extreme bicycle trips or other types of trips. Our vest “Fireflies” is also useful for  children, who will not get lost in a forest. A bicycle trip with children also becomes safe.The production of vests of new generation is our family business.  Making income is not our first purpose. The biggest award for us would be hundreds of children and bicyclists, who will be lighting up their road in the darkness of the evening like lighthouses. Our mission is creating a safe environment for everyone, who needs to be more visible in the park , in a country, on the road. My children like to ride a bike, scooter, skateboard and they will do it only with vest “fireflies”. Another direction is electric scooters, they have a small size and high speed unlike bicycles. they are less visible therefore riding an electric scooter without the lightning vest is madness. Let the advances of technology protect the safety of your rest.Your donations are necessary for the acceleration of engineering for the benefits of all humanity. We will purchase a special fabric, make devices for cutting and creating a luminous cloth. We will assemble, pack and ship the finished product. We will create a quality control structure at all stages of our production.
 Our inventions and developments will not leave you unnoticed.The first vest that produces light.All other vests are designed on the principle of “returning” of reflected light, our vest is the source of light. It’s designed specially for bicyclists and people, who are on the road at night. The vest is made of luminous fabric. The fabric is made from a variety of intertwined glass fibers, through which low-voltage current flows from the battery, which lies in the inner pocket. The cloth of fabric replaces hundreds of small LEDs connected in one continuous carpet of fire. The battery is securely attached in the pocket. The microswitch allows you to instantly turn on the bright light source. The vest is perfectly visible from a few hundred meters away. The built-in battery will surely last for 6-8 hours of walking. It is possible to increase the working time. To do this, you just need to put another battery. The batteries are charged via the USB connector. The vest is not afraid of moisture, precipitation. It works confidently in a large temperature range. A huge time resource of glowing elements. Three sizes are available for ordering: S, M, XL; adjustment straps are provided on the side.Take care of the safety of yourself and your loved ones. In the vest "fireflies" you will become more noticeable, you are perfectly visible, even in the worst weather. "fireflies" - a lighthouse in the sea of madness of darkness. The vest is reliably protected and is not subject to shaking and vibration during long walks on a bicycle, scooter, moped. A great innovative replacement for the well-served, but still rapidly losing its position, classic, good old reflective vest.
 Modern technologies will take under their wing the protection of your security.The new reality requires new solutions.Our site in the web: http://firefliesvest.tilda.ws/eng

record.Creator: Yeechan
record.Title: YeeChan: Professional Photography Lens For Your Smartphone
record.Text: With ever-improving technology, mobile photography is quickly catching up. We believe that the future of photography is in your pocket. The best camera is the one you have with you, and that camera is your phone. YeeChan has created a Depth of Field（DOF） lens specifically designed for Smartphone: the 50 mm  F/1.7  Capture vibrant image quality, superb bokeh, shallow depth-of-field and film-style look and the ability to pull focus manually like on professional cinema cameras. The F/1.7 aperture lets more light into the lens, which could effectively reduce the ISO sensitivity and obtain a low-noise transparent to improve your image quality. The circular aperture formed by 11 aperture blades  bring a large foreground and background blur, make the subject more prominent, and can bring a soft picture effect. So you can comfortably shoot in low-light, complex environment or night conditions.Achieve the perfect portrait with the 50 mm  F/1.7 provided by YeeChan lens, highlighting your subject's features with shallow depth of field to create an intimate visual perspective. The 50 mm focal length has a field of view close to what the human eye sees, and can be used for composition shooting with a more familiar visual experience. Although imaging does not have the distinctive personality of wide-angle or telephoto lenses, as long as you actively adjust the distance to the subject to change the composition, you can also get refreshing effects. It is precisely because of this that the 50 mm focal length can be adapted to shooting in a wide range of fields such as portraits, street photography, scenery, pets, and food.YeeChan uses a durable alloy bayonet and the matte metal silver design is used on manual aperture  the with the camera, it looks magnificent and has a high degree of recognition.The optical structure of the YeeChan is 11 elements in 11 groups. YeeChan also uses multi-layer coating with good anti-reflection effect, which can increase the transmittance of the lens, effectively suppress the glare and ghost caused by the light source in the picture, and reduce the influence of backlight on imaging. Brings a clear and transparent photo effect.The Minimum Focusing Distance of the lens has been shortened to about 0.15-0.2 meters. You can get closer to the subject during shooting, and take small objects larger to achieve a macro-like effect. Coupled with the natural perspective of the 50 mm standard lens, it can provide an effect close to the human visual experience, which is very suitable for shooting food, snacks, small objects and commodities.Because it is designed to be your most frequently used lens, we made it compact. Now you can enjoy advanced optical performance in a compact size  with a total length of only about 119 mm （4.7in）and a weight of only about  360g. It is good to take it with you when you go out, or hold it for a long time, which contributes to the stability of shooting. Making it easier to use.YeeChan allowing videographers to make smooth aperture changes while retaining traditional aperture stop for stills photographers. The manual focus ring is incredibly smooth and perfectly damped, allowing for smooth and accurate focus results across the 180 degrees of focus travel.In order to solve the mechanical challenge of the precise bayonet interface with the space constraints around the iPhone camera. YeeChan employs a threaded connection for a firm, easy to use the connection.The Moisture-Resistant and dust-proof structure is adopted, and the bayonet, focus ring, switch panel and switch of the lens are sealed to improve the reliability of the lens. In addition, by improving the strength of the lens barrel and redesigning the structure of the part connection, a highly robust lens body structure is realized without increasing the weight as much as possible.YeeChan compatible with iPhone X and above and Samsung Galaxy S10/S10+ /S20/ S20+.The YeeChan lens projects the image upside down. For this reason, we recommend using a third-party app to flip the image back to the normal orientation, such as FiLMiC Pro (Video - iOS and Android), ProCamera (Photo and Video - iOS), Filmakr (Video - iOS), MAVIS (Video - iOS), ProMovie (Video - iOS), Camera 645 Pro Mk 3 (Photo and Video - iOS) or Open Camera (Photo/Video - Android). You can also use the YeeChan in your smartphone’s stock/native camera app with the image flipped upside down if you prefer.

record.Creator: OBELAB
record.Title: REPACE: The Revolutionary Scientific Workout Solution
record.Text: Running is a workout that uses all of the major muscles of our body and develops our physical and mental fitness. People have always believed that going on long, intense runs would upgrade their physical abilities. But, intense/ exhausting workouts only tire our muscles and diminishes our passion for working out.There are times when we cannot figure out if our workouts are effectively done the right way. If we choose to leave it to our instincts to decide, our physical health might be at risk. And we would need to empty our pockets to check our bodies with professional medical equipment. Now, this is why we need a smart fitness device at times.But the current fitness devices sold in the market can only calculate our heart rates and burnt calories. The fitness devices we usually attach to our arms or wrists cannot accurately calculate our activity levels as if they were to be attached to our thighs. (As thighs are where the actual active muscles are located). So we fully developed and applied the world's first muscle oxygen saturation calculating technology by attaching the devices to our thighs.Devices utilizing oxygen saturation levels were initially made for athletes. Still, we wanted to provide the general public access to a workout solution in a more convenient, simple, and professional way.As REPACE was developed after over 8 years of research, REPACE not only measures the muscle oxygen saturation levels. But, it can provide the users with a personalized running plan based on scientific algorithms and data.Stop running your longest and fastest miles. With REPACE, get your workout solution to fit your endurance and health levels based on scientific algorithms and data. You will be able to feel the change in your performance like a professional athlete.To measure the lactate threshold, runners needed special equipment, sports medicine experts, additional expenses, and must visit specific facilities. (And draw blood)But just with REPACE, it can all be done. Just simply fasten it on your thighs, and the users can measure their lactate threshold without having to draw blood and comprehensively analyze their current workout performance capacities.We realized that our workout performance tests and simple heartbeat monitoring were not enough. With REPACE's very own technological advancements, we developed an algorithm to make constant adjustments to provide more effective workout solutions.Based on the LT TEST, REPACE will provide you with the workout instructions in 3 different types based on individual workout levels and purposes.REPACE is more than just a simple running/ testing/ analyzing app. It can measure and provide a workout solution based on its previous records.REPACE is the world's first workout solution program providing an objective scientific way of working out. We will constantly develop REPACE to support Cycling, Mountain Climbing, and even strength trainings like Pilates and Weight Training based on our backers' feedback and internal system upgrades.Start working out according to your physical condition and choosing the appropriate workout intensity. You will become more fit and healthy through running. It is not easy for us to objectively figure out if we are working out the right way at the moment. But REPACE monitors the users' workout sessions in real-time. Based on this data, it provides vocal coaching guides to work out with.The compelling voice guides allow (to assist runners in reaching their goals) users to run at a steady speed to upgrade their physical abilities and motivate them to keep running.With the application of the BLE 5.0 technology, REPACE can save its collected data on to the application without any transmission errors. REPACE also allows users to instantly visualize their upgrading/degrading workout capacities by providing daily, monthly, and yearly statistical reports.The more you use REPACE, your workout skills will elevate, and you will always have your flawless personal trainer by your side.We all know that your favorite workouts will burn you out someday. So REPACE rewards the users with medals each time they workout to provide them a sense of new accomplishments. We are planned.It would feel nice to enhance our physical fitness but, wouldn't it be more exciting to find someone to workout together? You might motivate someone around you and partner up and join you! Start sharing your workout history with your friends on Facebook.Currently, REPACE is only equipped with the Facebook Friends system. More extra features and upgrades will be carried out based on our backers' feedback. Our lab will take a step further in our journey from our backers' growing love and interest in REPACE.REPACE measured the user's muscle oxygen saturation levels through functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS). By tightening the device onto the user's thighs it can calculate the oxygen saturation levels (SmO2) and calculationREPACE automatically calculates the adequate workout duration and intensity through its application. Suppose REPACE is attached at a certain spot on your thighs. In that case, it can more accurately measure the exhaustion levels of your muscles. Check your fluctuating muscle oxygen saturation levels yourself.* When using REPACE outdoors, the users can check their running routes via a cellphone GPS. Users can also work out however they want, not following the workout solutions, and REPACE will check their SmO2 in real-time. ** REPACE is also pairable with an Apple Watch heart rate tracker and can check the users' heart rates in real-time as well. For accurate testing and a steady fixation, you would need to use the appropriate thigh bands. After the campaign successfully comes to a close, we will send out a survey for backers to receive the correctly-sized bands.Sit yourself down, place your legs on a chair, and measure the circumference of your thighs located 5 inches above your knee cap. This would be the adequate thigh band size to order when filling out the survey.We will provide an extra band for our backers! (Total of 2/ size mix & match available ⭕)OBELAB is a company initially started in the science lab of KAIST. NIRSIT is a portable device that could measure our brain's oxygen saturation levels with our very on fNIRS technology. Our expertise in our self-developed technology has been verified by the relative academia and industry. With our own technologies like these, we developed REPACE to upgrade our users' physical capacities. So, we would like to offer our backers the world's first hands-on experience on our device.After our Kickstarter campaign, we are planning to develop an algorithm to calculate the ratio of how many carbs/ fats are burnt while working out, based on our backers' feedback. (est. 2nd half of 2022). We genuinely hope to find the path to develop alongside our backers.OBELAB has developed and manufactured healthcare devices since 2013 and has been safety-approved with different certifications. Our self-developed technology has been developed by cooperating with the nation's top medical schools' algorithms and clinical trials to fully develop a complete device.The tests were carried out with the nation's expert medical school in sports medicine. They cooperated in academic and scientific certification and collaboration. REPACE is the first device for individual use (not for labs or hospitals). It will be the case where brain science technology has been applied to sports science. We are delighted to present REPACE to our backers, developed with our most extraordinary expertise and efforts. And we will try our best not to leave our backers to stay disappointed.This project is boosted by BackerCrew

record.Creator: Moritz Lönne
record.Title: 3D-Printed Oxygen-ABS powered Rocket Engine
record.Text: First of all, I would like to mention that we are building a prototype that is not intended for sale.Hello, and welcome to our project.We are Moritz, Amelia and Vincent from Landshut in Germanyand are currently studying at the Hans-Leinberger-Gymnasium Landshut.The idea for our project started with a class competition in our school: The task was to build a small car. The others in the class spent a lot of money on mini car kits on the internet, but we had an idea.Why not 3D print a drive? It's cheaper, smaller, and stronger. So we made a 3D model and printed it ... After we printed the rocket, the first test phase started:We fixed the rocket on a vice and connected it to a bag with pure oxygen. we used a sparkler to light it, then we squeezed the bag with oxygen so that the oxygen flows through the rocket. We found that the exhaust did not come out with a lot of pressure and that most of the rocket's  ABS was not burned. So we printed a new model with a smaller opening and an interior with high combustion efficiency.Second test phase:After the second test phase was quite successful, we test the flammability of two ABS parts printed in different ways. The part on the left of the video is the outer skin of the rocket the part on the right is made of the same material, just printed differently in order to burn perfectly in the interior of our rocket.Third test phase:In the next step we exchanged the oxygen bag for an oxygen bottle with 10 bar air pressure to find out whether the pressure of the oxygen plays a role.Through the test, we learned that more pressure is more thrust. The next step is the exact force measurement. In order to remove the human factor from the equation, we have to be able to precisely control the oxygen supply and this cannot be implemented with an oxygen cylinder. So we developed a concept to release the oxygen in a controlled manner: A kind of press that compresses a bag of oxygen.The model is not yet equipped with technology because it is still a small pre-print. For the problem that comes up now, we need your support: In order to supply a test-ready amount of oxygen, a larger press is required, and we are not able to pay for the technology for this ourselves. We also need a larger and more precise 3D printer in order to develop more complex rockets and the press in the future. We will also make a metal shell for the rocket, which will enable us to exchange the rocket after use and to recycle it to make new rockets from it.Personal words:With our project we want to build a prototype. In addition, with this project we are taking part in a German youth research competition, which gives us better chances of getting a renumed university place if we get a good placement.We hope you like our project :)All the best,Moritz, Ameila and Vincent

record.Creator: Mihai Avram
record.Title: Back In Stock Item Tracker and Notifier
record.Text: Hi everyone! My name is Mihai and I am a software developer who wants to create useful things that add value to people's lives. In the past, I created Fakey (https://fakey.osome.iu.edu/) which is a media literacy fake-news game that has gotten some attention. I also built a lot of other creations in the goal-tracking and automation space which you can find on my website (https://mihaisplace.com)The problem?Earlier this year I wanted to buy a new gaming console, and to my chagrin, every time I saw releases being hyped in the news, I was always too late to buy it as it went out of stock very quickly. This was a major pain point for me and I had a vision that this process should be much simpler. A person should be texted as soon as an item is back in stock so that they can increase their chances of buying it. This is how the idea for the Item Tracker was born with the notion of creating a software tool that can ping us as soon as something we are seeking is back in stock. Why solve this problem now? With the onset of the global pandemic and international supply chains struggling, it has been difficult to get some items that we seek which have been out-of-stock or heavily backlogged. Some clear examples of this that always surface in the news involve the next-gen console shortages where it has been incredibly difficult to buy new PS5s, Xbox Series Xs, and GPUs. I also believe this situation will only get worse as supply chains will further get strained as we use up our planet's supply of raw materials.What have I built so far?Currently, the software I built involves sites where someone can subscribe to the new PS5 and Xbox Series S/X. If someone subscribes, they will get a text to the phone number they provide as soon as the console comes back in stock in any stores. With just a few small private and public launches in the last couple of months, these sites have seen hundreds of users, and dozens of subscribers. I can see that there is some value here and it is solving a problem, which is something I am very happy with.Here is how the sites look belowThe ask?Right now I am providing the service for free and it costs me about $100/mo. to upkeep the servers and technology that can enable the service to work. This will likely not be sustainable for me for long unless I have some funding to justify continuing the service. What's more is that in the future I would like to expand this service to include the new Nintendo OLED, different types of GPUs, trading cards, clothes, and any other supplies that will fall into this category of items that are highly sought after, for which there is very low supply. After building the basic functionality for these services, I would like to create a tool that can help broker a place in line for people who are wanting to buy something of low supply. This way, if someone wants to buy a new item, they can simply pre-fill a request to buy and it will be purchased automatically on their behalf - completely automating the process and removing the burden of having the person vying for a slot to purchase it themselves. Finally, I plan to create a wiki with tips on how people can boost their chances of buying various items they seek that are in low supply.Here is the timeline for the product- Tracker service for the Nintendo OLED and popular GPUs (1 - 2 months)- Item tracker tips wiki (1 - 2 months)- Tracker service for other sought after items coming from user interviews (3 - 6 months)- Fully automated item purchaser service (6 - 12 months)- Improving the services to be as quick, fair, and secure as possible (1 - 2 years)In conclusion,I hope you consider working alongside me on this product. You can see from the Rewards section that I plan to build alongside all of you and really help you drive the effort or features via 1 on 1 conversation and focus groups. I am simply here to serve and solve your problems in getting the items you seek. Finally, I will share all the details of the process and adopt a mindset of building in the open with transparency in mind. Thank you for reading this far if you have, hope you have a great day regardless of whether you fund this project!Warm regards,~ Mihai

record.Creator: Hercury Company
record.Title: Ligh up your day with the Sheels
record.Text: Hi, my name is Matteo Prasso, and here's my friend Haris Bashir. We always wanted to create something from scratch, so we met online during the 2021 Covid lockdown, and  started working on this project. We met then in real life and became good friends and co-workers.We are prototyping a pair of shoes with two electric motors and four wheels with detachable shafts. The product will include both the electronic/ tech part and the footwear, attached one on the top of the other.  Talking about tech things, we designed it with two electric motors that give high speed and high torque, in order to reach 12 kph or 7.5 mph. Each shoe will have a battery under the center of the foot, the transmission, and two detachable shafts that connect to the four wheels. You will be able to control the speed thanks to the pressure sensors put inside the sole.One of our goals is to make this product easy and comfy to wear everywhere, so we studied the detachable shafts that permit you to use the Sheels also indoors. For example, in many places like schools or offices, you can't wear rollers skates and you must have a pair of common shoes to use there, so you need a place to put the skates when you are not using them. With this product you will forget these problems; once you enter into a structure you can remove the wheels, and put them back when you leave. Another of our goals, that we will reach with experience of prototyping, is to make a foldable, but stable, sole that will help you in the step.On the aesthetic appearance, is our goal on the final product to make every pair unique. We are currently designing a lot of customizable parts that will integrate a basic model. You will be able to choose between different options of led lights designs, colors, the lateral bumpers, the designs of the wheels, and much more. We are doing this because we want the user to find an identity in this product and stand out. We want to share with the people our idea of freedom of spirit. Many times happens in the commuting life that the trip becomes just "necessary"; we start seeing it as a boring thing we have to do to reach our destination. We died of boredom from this for years,  so we asked ourselves what could change this everyday routine.  We wanted to create real emotions that could help people live better the day.  Something that was more than a simple pair of shoes; something that could give speed, fun, and excitement. Imagine a life where you can move around at a certain speed with just your feet,  feeling free from all the things that stress you, and reach your destination with a free spirit and ready to start. How would it be? We are currently designing our first prototype, and very soon we will 3d print it; this will help us to give a representative shape of the product and will become the display model. At the same time, we are building the first working prototype, with actual motors, battery, controls, and wheels. For this one, we are using a simple shoe bought in a shop and the case will be printed again in plastic.  For the component, we already invested money, and every time we want to develop we have to use more. As the project rises, also expenses do. To obtain the best result possible we need the best materials and the best components. We want to keep the product the lightest possible for perfect use, to do that we need a carbon fiber case for example, but also the electronics must take less space, and also the battery could be more powerful with less weight.  So we are doing a campaign on Kickstarter to make something unique, perfect and create a community with which we can connect and share our passion for this product.We want to pursue our dream and goal to create something good and fun for people. We can see the potential of this product to unite and make people share time together. Thanks to the speed, people will be able to race, make obstacle courses, and go downtown or to skateparks together. We imagine groups of friends sharing times to choose their perfect customization of a pair of Sheels, or also family members designing together their most liked style. We all know after Covid, how important and precious is the time spent with the people that make us feel good, so we want to give opportunities to have something to share with the people we love the most.Here's our Instagram to follow the progress: @hercurymotion For more infos please contact: hercury.company@gmail.com

record.Creator: SUNUO
record.Title: SUNUO, the World’s First Intelligent Water Flosser
record.Text: Now, you can say goodbye to blindly maintaining the cleanliness of your mouth. With the introduction of the SUNUO water flosser, you can clean each individual tooth with precision. Featuring a 5MP camera with a 360° field of view, no plaque, particles, or grime will escape your sight.Maintaining oral care is essential for your overall health and wellbeing. With the SUNUO, completing this task has never been easier. No matter where you are, SUNUO will take care of all your dental cleaning needs. With a 180 ml water tank, high pressure water flow, and dual 200-280nm wavelength UV sterilizers, you can be assured that your mouth will stay fresh and clean. Enter the SUNUO, the all-in-one water flosser. You can say goodbye to the difficulties of brushing your teeth and flossing. With this device, cleaning between your teeth has never been easier. No longer do you have to carry around floss in your bag, now, all you need is the SUNUO and some water and you are good to go.Whether it be at a party, on a date, or at work, due to the portable, compact nature of the SUNUO, you can always keep your teeth clean and healthy.The SUNUO is a big step up from traditional flossing and other modern water flossers. Equipped with a 5MP camera, 6 LED lights and a wifi connected app, we provide an experience like no other.As you are using the flosser, you will be able to clearly see every area that needs cleaning. With some smart technology and programming, none of your problem areas will be left untouched. Braces, for example, are no match for the pulsating water stream of the SUNUO.You can control the SUNUO Intelligent Visual Water Flosser in our App. 3 different camera modesWater flow pressure adjustmenChoose water flossing mode and turn the SUNUO onMoreover, you can choose to take pictures in black and white or color, as well as flip the images.You can download the proprietary app via QR code or the link on the instructions. Once you download it, choose your language and begin the best water flossing experience of your life.Featuring a water pressure which can reach around 140 PSI, SUNUO produces a thin, precise water stream. Unlike other water flossers, ours pulsates the water stream at around 1600 pulsations per minute. This helps to effectively remove any food particles that may be stuck, or dental plaque that’s usually difficult to clean.Driving the water flow is a frictionless pump. The settings of the water pressure can be adjusted to fit the needs of your individual mouth.For a tool that will touch the inside of your mouth, it is important to maintain cleanliness. The SUNUO uses UV sterilizers, one is for sanitizing and cleaning the nozzle, the other one is for sanitizing and preventing bacterial growth. Through this redundant system, there is no way for bacteria to remain, thus keeping your mouth safe and healthy.The SUNUO is equipped with 3 different nozzles, which aims for satisfying the needs of anyone who may use our product.Standard nozzle: For daily cleaning and oral carePeriodontal nozzle: For cleaning the gums. A soft and narrow nozzleOrthodontic nozzle: For those with braces. Since there are more gaps and dead angles around braces, it is hard to clean properly with a toothbrush. The orthodontics nozzle is professionally designed with narrow and tiny brushes.3 Pressure Modes: gentle, standard, and spa modes are supported, allowing you to choose a suitable water pressure.The design of the SUNUO brilliantly hides its nozzle. You only need to gently pull out the nozzle to use it. This keeps the nozzle tucked away for hygienic purposes, as well as for more compact storage.One of the main features of the SUNUO is the large 180 ml water tank. The reason we can make the capacity so large is due to the collapsible nature of it. When in storage mode, the water tank won’t take up any extra space in your purse or bag. When you need to rinse your teeth, just pull on the water tank, fill it up, and rinse away.We want to give you the freedom to choose how to clean your mouth, so we’ve also added the option to use mouthwash instead of water.The SUNUO comes with a 2000mAh battery. This amount of power is enough to use for 50 minutes at one time. No matter if it's a wall adapter, PC, laptop, or  power bank, you always have an option to keep your SUNUO fully charged.The waterproofing level is IPX7, so you can use it while washing your face or taking a shower. The SUNUO team is dedicated to improving oral hygiene and maintaining cleanliness. We believe and support healthy habits and lifestyles. We’ve turned our passion for cleaning products into cleaning of teeth and gums. This product turns out to be easy to use, comfortable and most important of all, an effective solution to maintain your oral hygiene. Therefore, in terms of product design, the inventing process, or the choices for accessories, we have maintained a very strict standard throughout the whole process. We’ve worked really hard to bring better products to our customers.Q1: What are the causes of itching or gum bleeding?A1: You might bleed because your gums are not used to this high water pressure, your gums are weak, or you have periodontal disease. However, if it hasn’t stopped after one week or you still feel pain, please consult your dentist.Q2: What is the suggested mode for a beginner?A2: We suggest you use the soft mode for the first time.Q3:After using the water flosser, do I still need to brush my teeth?A3: Our water flosser is not a substitute for a toothbrush. On one hand, a toothbrush can clean out most of the plaque on the surface. On the other hand, the water flosser is mainly used for cleaning the dead angles and blind sides where a toothbrush cannot properly reach. So, this product is complementary to the toothbrush.Q4:Will the water stream hurt my gums if the water pressure is strong?A4: The SUNUO Intelligent Visual Water Flosser uses pulsating pressure technology, which creates a soft water stream and ensures cleaning effectiveness. When used properly, it won’t hurt your gums.Q5:How can I replace the nozzle?A5: You can simply loosen it like a screw and it should come right off.Q6:Why can't I turn it off right away after usage?A6: The pump will activate sleep mode every 2 minutes while not in use. The light signals will be off. If there is no connection for Wi-Fi, the camera and Wi-Fi signal light will be turned off after 2 minutes.Q7:When I use it, does it make any noise?A7: When in use, some noise will be generated and will stay within the 70dB range.Q8:Should I only use cold water?A8: You should use water lower than 38°C (100°F).Q9:How can I properly operate the water flosser?A9: Hold the water flosser upright and extend the nozzle into your mouth, aiming for gaps or gums. Clean along the teeth, slowly and sequentially.

record.Creator: DEINDE DESIGN
record.Title: SECURE KEY
record.Text: The strongest system to protect your business or personal data.Thanks to Securekey you will only use strong and secure passwords to access your accounts and without the hassle of memorizing them.Create strong passwords from 12 to 128 characters in a few seconds.It does not store the passwords, but rather generates them when you need. For this reason you never lose any password even in the case of device destruction.When you compose a specific Key Pad sequence, you will obtain the same password every time.The masked password is Secure Key’s proprietary technology which allows you to protect your real password. How? It's simple.You simply type a short numeric sequence into the keypad (called a masked password) and Secure Key will generate the corresponding, unique complex password.For example, if the "masked password" for your Facebook account is "A12", your Secure Key will generate a complex password when you dial "A12". But this is where the magic happens! If someone steals your masked password and dials "A12" on his or her Secure Key, the password will be totally different, as each device generates a different password with the same "masked password". This means that you are still safe, even if someone has access to your masked password file."The best way to protect your passwords is to always have access to them without ever saving or storing them anywhere."That's exactly what SecureKey allows you to do.There are many cases of stolen passwords causing enormous trouble and damage.This happens often as we save online many important things online. Frequently we protect our entire online life with the same simple password for convenience.SecureKey helps you to avoid this mistake, providing a service that allows you to use strong and secure passwords in an easy and fast way. In a few seconds you will create your password without having to remember or store it anywhere.Protect your privacy and accounts including:Follow the Secure Key guidelines to avoid identity or data theft.You can use Secure Key in your daily job to:SecureKey uses the highest quality materials to ensure it can withstand the wear and tear of long trips or a typical day. Securekey's aluminum case makes it both robust and durable. It doesn't use batteries to operate and powers up at the moment you plug it into your device meaning it will never be out of power.Check the video to see how to access your pc in a safe and fast way with Secure Key.BOX:Material: Aluminum AnodizedDimension x,y,z: 77,5 mm x 84,6 mm x 16 mmWeight: 40 gr​USB:Type: Micro-USBInterface: MagneticLenght: 1 mt​KEYPAD:Material: PlasticType: MembraneFeedback: VibrationCOMPATIBILITY:PC and MAC with USA UK IT DE ESP Keyboard impostation.Devices (smartphone and tablet) only with OS Android with USB Type-C.

record.Creator: Gordon L Miles.
record.Title: Solar Powered Hot Cup Prototype 2 Virtual Concept
record.Text: Hi this is Gordon L. Miles aka Baba Yatahma.  I'm presenting a opportunity for you to donate through my Kickstarter Campaign to raise $40,000 to bring Solar Powered Hot Cup Prototype 2 Virtual Concept to fruition.  View the video and make your pledge.  I'm considering  converting donations into shares as one of the rewards for your support.  Become an innovative pilot ushering in a new era using the Warm-A-Matic heating system.   The cup has thermal insulation that keeps liquids cold or hot for 85 minutes before using the solar system.   When in use, the lithium battery generates energy transformed from the solar cells into electricity. The sun energizes the cells that charges the  battery which activates the Warm-A-Matic system heating up the liquids in the cup.  The sun energizes the cells so the cup can be  turned on during any outdoor activity.The present invention, in one embodiment has a double pole throw switch and can be used for hot or cold use.   Also, it has a automatic shutoff  thermostat that prevents the liquids from boiling over.  It can be charge while in use, to prevent the liquid from becoming cold.  The switch can be turn on to maintain the tempenture of the liquid in the cup.  The cup is designed to fit into a car cup holder.  Currently Innovative Licensing & Promotions, Inc. has been hired to present the concept of Solar Powered Hot Cup to companies that may be interested in productions and distributions of Solar Powered Hot Cup.

record.Creator: YOBYBO
record.Title: X-BOAT PRO : 1st Open-Casing TWS Earphones with LDAC
record.Text: TWS earphones. Familiar names, boxy looks, and the old-fashioned popping-hood design. It’s the golden formula of mediocrity. We are here to re-write the formula. You want all the features, we give them all, plus a design from the future.We are talking deep here. Earphones from the future aren’t just limited by the looks, but the open-casing that makes wearing the earphone in just 1 second; the half-in-ear design yet active noise cancellation; the LDAC codec that plays CD-level quality music into your ear and finally, the combination of space aluminum material and Anti-Glare glass that packs every wonder into small and streamline-shaped TWS  earphonesWe combine creative design, sublime comfort, and unparalleled audio performance together,  making X-BOAT PRO quite different from other TWS earphones. Popping the hood is normal for earphones. But why bother when you don’t have to?With an open-casing design, we eliminated the drop-top hood. Taking the headphone is just a slide away instead of case-opening and buds fumbling. Enjoying music is only one slide-to-unlock away.With a single-hand operation mechanism, you can wear earphones with ease in any busy-hand environment like taking the subway, working, shopping, phone calls. Easy to use does not mean easy to drop. With integrated magnets, the earphones stay light but firm in the case. Light tipping or 180° flipping, this pair is staying.With the open-casing design, you will never have to pop the hood to check that if you are bringing both earphones or not. Everything is in a glimpse.It's easy to find ANC earphones these days---when they were full-in-ear ones. There’s nothing wrong with such a design, except when you put them on for a long time, the shape starts to block the ear canal, adding unnecessary pressure. We took a harder yet different approach, the half-in-ear solution. X-BOAT PRO combines the most advanced ANC algorithm and large drivers to bring you a new listening experience from true wireless audio. This means you can hear less noise and more music playing.The earphones are ergonomically molded to precisely fit your ear.  It's just 3.9g each, offering a weightless way and more comfortable wearing experience even after long hours of use - Survivor of the fittest, winner of the quietest.Why X-BOAT PRO can deliver CD Audio quality. We know you can’t hear now. But data will tell youThe most common audio codec for earphones is the SBC codec, with which the maximum sample bit-rate is still lossy 320 Kbps.  With LDAC, your Bluetooth audio device can now transfer up to 3x the data consistently compared to SBC---in short, you can enjoy non-stop 100% CD audio quality on your X-BOAT PRO.The large 13 mm LCP dynamic driver inside each earphone delivers bass you can feel in your bone. lets you experience the soaring melodies and rich timbres of all your favorite tunes.Plus, the Integrated Class AB Hi-Fi amplifier can bring optimal audio performance and power efficiency. We built the charging case of X-BOAT PRO under the same material as a phone. The touch feeling is quite different from other TWS earphones.With CNC, we get to carve the shape out as one perfect piece of metal with zero gaps. The Anti-glare Glass processing adds one extra layer of texture that leaves no fingerprints but millions of colors under the sun. With a built-in Airoha 5.2 chip, X-BOAT PRO is able to adapt smarter power management during the playing process, achieving a stunning 40-hour playback time. You might forget to charge it quite often simply because you don't need to.     Plus, You can plug the X-BOAT PRO into your phone (Type-C port) for charging. Connect the headphones for just 20 minutes, and you can expect the X-BOAT PRO to run an additional 5 hours. With long battery life, you can keep X-BOAT PRO everywhere with you. Never worried run out of juice while on the go.Lotus awaiting for blossom is, in our eyes, the perfect combination of body curve and visual lightness. The design of XBOAT PRO chased our fantasy for such beauty with its unique earphone holster structure and 100% stream-lined shape. The charging bay of Xboat is largely covered in aluminum with meticulous machining of 5-axis CNC to mimic the shape of nature, while the ever-glowing color flying through your eyes. The design was a huge challenge. Not only did we have to get the shape right, but also we must adjust the sizing of earphones for both charging bay and ear fitting. In terms of sound quality, we managed to level up the game even higher: we chose LCP dynamic driver instead of titanium diaphragm driver for better sound quality and, later, we built a connection with SONY officials for a product review. They eventually gave permission to authorize the LDAC codecs to X-boat Pro for its overall performance. The outcome of all the efforts costs more to make the product but also gives a better user experience to customers. Our vision is to build a set of people’s earphones with supreme music performance while looking good when putting it on. With the front side representing the future, the back pays tribute to the past. The Anti-glare glass with PET filming cast a mist to create a mystical contrast between itself and the shining body, like a sexy creation from Hajime Sorayama in a modern mask, blending the sci-fi past of industrial design to a flattened, more simplified future. On top of visual language, we also tried very hard in making a perfect front chamber---like twenty times iteration hard---to achieve absolute comforts when you put the earphone on, and the smooth feeling when you slide the earphones in or out of the charging bay. As for the earphone, we chose vacuum plating + skin-like coating to make it feel elegant, look sharp, yet keep stealthy when in use. Xboat is our attempt to express technological beauty with nature language---metals are cold, but humanity isn’t.Spending years of time in the earphone business taught us a tough fact: from concept with exceptional design to production-ready stands a wall of sacrifice lists for higher efficiency and yield rate. By the time customers got their hands on the actual product, what they see would become a bland, mediocre product lacking beauty or basic user experience. YOBYBO wasn’t born to be this way. Our goal is to give birth to a design that follows our hearts from the very beginning. Instead of simplifying the process for the industry, we chose to keep the precious creative design as it intended to be, no matter how much harder it would be to build. The product we built is the mirror of our vision.The higher our guidelines would be, the more procedures we had to go through. We set up more product inspections for a more reliable industrial renovation to make sure our products meet the global standard for a good one. If we had to choose between the cost and quality, we would definitely go to the latter one.We were the creators of the world’s thinnest TWS earphones---CARD20, which won the Reddot and iF design award of 2020. Our push-to-unlock NOTE20 won the Reddot design award as well.We reviewed our entire streamline of the production of these two products: from concept to engineering, development, till the final manufacturing. All the problems were put under the telescope for improvements of our next-gen product.Now here we are with X-boat Pro. A better statement for a better time.This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: MODZI
record.Title: MODZI - Sanitizing Wristband With Pre-Filled Pods
record.Text: MODZI came about because my brother is a germaphobe and I wanted to help him. All throughout childhood, and into the present, he refuses to touch doorknobs, elevator buttons, etc. You name it, he won’t touch it, and if he does, he’s looking for the nearest sink to wash his hands. That may not be everybody’s life, but lately we’ve all become very hygiene-conscious--and that’s a good thing.We never anticipated inventing an actual product for market, but when I saw my crude prototype excited my brother, I decided we needed to share it with the world. Our line of MODZI hand sanitizing products are convenient and unique - NO messy refilling! Just swap out an empty Pod for a fresh, pre-filled sanitizer Pod when you need it. We also use LIQUID hand sanitizer vs. gel, so no sticky hands! Make hand sanitizing an afterthought, meet MODZI.The MODZI Band is a wrist wearable for easy hand sanitizing access. You can easily swap out an empty sanitizer Pod for a fresh, pre-filled Pod. All Pods are filled with FDA approved, liquid sanitizer made in the US and spray directly into your palm. The MODZI Band features similar, compact dimensions of most smart watches.The idea for MODZI began four years ago with a brother and sister team, BJ and Sunnye, one of which is a lifelong germaphobe. Along the way, as the idea developed, our team grew as well - all with a like-minded vision. We feel fortunate to have partnered with a group of experienced engineers, manufacturers and creatives to bring our vision to life.Let’s face it though, startups are never cheap. As a brother and sister duo, we’re a true grassroots team - all we had was an idea and a living room to work in...oh and about 8 months of mandatory lockdown and plenty of free time on our hands. We definitely learned a lot along the way!If we’re fortunate enough to fund our Kickstarter with your help, a large amount of campaign funds will go towards the initial molds needed to produce MODZI Bands & MODZI Pods at the minimum order quantities required by our manufacturers. As well, we feel it’s important to have a surplus of product so our backers, and beyond, can access pre-filled replacement Pods in the future.Every Pod we ship is pre-filled with FDA approved, liquid sanitizer fulfilled in the US. Click button below to pick a tier and start backing MODZI! Have no fear, you can always ADD ON Pod Refill Packs or extra Starter Packs to your pledge.The beauty of the MODZI Band are the MODZI Pods - small, pre-filled, spray Pods that fit perfectly in the band. Each Pod delivers over 100 ample sprays of liquid sanitizer. The MODZI Pods can be used without the band if that’s more your style. Utilizing our convenient clip hole, attach a Pod to your keychain, lanyard, backpack, etc. or simply put ‘em in your pocket, purse or glove box if you choose and spray directly into the palm of your hand when you need!The MODZI Band was made with people and convenience in mind. It’s a discreet and stylish way to sanitize your hands while you go about your day - wherever you are, whatever you’re doing. The wristband is reusable, durable and quite comfortable if we do say so ourselves. It fits on most wrists and features similar, compact dimensions of most smart watches.No more messy refilling, figuring out where to put your used sanitizer wipes or hunting for that pump bottle that somehow disappeared or is always empty. When your MODZI Pod runs low, no problem. Just remove it from the Band, pop in a new Pod and you’ve got over 100 fresh, new sprays all on your wrist or in your pocket.Whether you’re right or left handed, our MODZI Band is your friend. With a team of engineers, we spent quite a bit of time during the design stage crafting the band and micro tooling the Pod to make it ergonomically perfect. Simply press the button on your Pod and a full spray is delivered right into your palm. Our Pods were designed to use almost every drop of sanitizer inside & also engineered to spray a full stream from any angle.Another goal was to make it multi-functional. Who doesn’t like that? MODZI Pods can be used independently of the band as well, just pop a couple in your purse, pocket, stroller or laptop bag and use as needed. You can even attach MODZI Pods to your car keys, lanyards, backpacks and so on utilizing the engineered clip hole.Everyone really - all ages, lifestyles and occupations could benefit from our MODZI products. Our MODZI products are the perfect way to sanitize on-the-go simply and discreetly.Everywhere! Especially after you touch a slimy door handle in public or a greasy elevator button.Click button below to pick a tier and start backing MODZI! Have no fear, you can always ADD ON Pod Refill Packs or extra Starter Packs to your pledge.THE TODD (aka Todd Munson) - Don’t let the autographed CHiPs photo or the steely gaze of Patrick Swayze distract you, Todd Munson handles all MODZI social media and is always at the ready when we need a fresh idea fast. Todd has worked in social media since its earliest days and has a long, but distinguished track record of managing major social accounts in Film and Television and leading consumer brands.Erica Duff - Erica is a powerhouse professional with many years of experience as a small business owner and project manager. Currently, Erica is the owner/creator of her own wine brand (Girl Cru) and clothing line (Generic Clothing). She is also a partner and project manager for I AM Music Group Inc., a music and podcast production company in Los Angeles. With her project management and start-up experience, Erica has been an invaluable part of our MODZI team!John Kasha - CEO of KAI Engineering. A proven product development and engineering executive excelling in bringing cutting edge concepts into reality and ensuring successful product launches. John has held executive leadership position at Ascend Communications, Lucent Technology, Wind River, Intel, and several successful startups throughout his career.  With the current fluctuation in shipping rates, all shipping fees will be collected after the campaign ends. This will allow us to offer the most accurate prices to our all-important backers. A few weeks prior to the shipping of your reward, you will receive a survey via email from our Pledge Manager. In that survey, you will be able to provide the most up-to-date address for our MODZI team to ship your product to and then process your shipping fee payment via BackerKit's secure system.PLEASE NOTE: This table reflects our best estimates based on the weights / dimensions of our Starter Packs / Pod Refill Packs and shipping rates at the time of launch. As our MODZI Pods contain isopropyl alcohol, all shipping will be via a ground service at this time. Currently, we are only able to ship to the 48 contiguous states and are unable to ship internationally. We hope to in the future though!While a prototype has been developed for proof of concept, the funds raised will help us to:Our goal at MODZI is not only to deliver what we promise, but to improve upon what we’re providing to our backers and future customers. Not only do we have some ideas for future MODZI model R&D, we’re also passionate about the environment. R&D into this will allow us to make our product line more environmentally-friendly.We intend to do R&D on the following:Thank you all for checking out MODZI! My brother and I put a lot of love into this venture over the years, and we’re excited to share it with the world. Whether you backed us, shared our campaign on social media or told a friend, we appreciate you! We’re a startup, and it’s a challenging process, but it doesn't happen without you all.Thank you so much! Much Love, Sunnye & BJAsk away! Shoot us a message or post a comment, and we'll do our best to get back to you with an answer.Got a creative idea you think we should implement at MODZI? Don't hesitate - let us know! MODZI is being made possible by you, and we want you to be a part of the creative process as well. While we strongly believe in the many benefits of the MODZI Band and MODZI Pods, we aren't claiming to cure any illness or condition. MODZI does not replace the effectiveness of hand washing. Our goal is style and convenience while on-the-go or in situations where immediate hand washing is not an option.

record.Creator: Hunter Humeston
record.Title: The Practical Batsuit: A DIY Prototype
record.Text: This world, now more than ever, needs heroes. People who are willing to fight injustice no matter its source, people who are willing to put the lives of others above their own. This world needs its Batman. There are many out there who have gotten close to truly emulating the look of the Dark Knight, but we want to be the first to create a Batsuit prototype that not only looks and feels authentic, but one that offers the functionality and protection of the real-deal. It should be able to stand up to bladed attacks, have fire and chemical resistance, provide protection from most melee-based attacks, and maybe, just maybe, even limited bullet resistance. We are simply college students looking for funding to complete an educational, fun, and challenging design project and we need your help. Eventually, maybe a non-Batman themed version of this suit-design could be used for first responders and/or soldiers as protective suits in their dangerous fields.

record.Creator: Keck Jones
record.Title: Fuel Bus
record.Text: Fuel Bus is the most convenient way to fill up your tank. Whether you are at work and need gas in your vehicle, or are in bed and realized that you don't want to wake up early to go fill up. We will be there to fill up your tank. We can be used in a variety of ways. Its not just vehicles that we solely fill up. Its everything from a boat to a push mower. Not only do we offer the ability to purchase gas, but also to receive a snack from the convenient store. Just select your desired product and the delivery driver will bring it to you.What makes us different from our competitors is the ability for our employees to work Whenever they want. You may compare us to apps like Uber. Our employees must obtain  a certain can that can be placed in their car to be filled and delivered to the desired destination. When I mean anyone can work for us, I mean it. Its a simple process of signing up putting your gas can in your car, then turning on the app to see who needs gas.
