record.Creator: Alejandro esquivel
record.Title: Injection machine Make plastic parts cheaper, easier, faster
record.Text: 7 generation of our injection molding machines. We have learned of our previous mistakes, our machines always have worked, but always there is room for improvements. In this generation we develop our machines to be more durable, with more pressure, increasing the speed of the process, making them easier to use. Use your free time, you can generate an extra income, identify a necessity develop something for that necessity, use our machine to manufacture it, and build a very lucrative business around plastic.Extended version.A 3D printer is mostly used to make prototypes. A manual plastic injection machine is made to make the parts in series. Don’t waste your money with failed 3D prints, expensive and delicate materials.A lot of people have the idea that a 3D printer is autonomous, but it is not, you have to make the file and send it to the printer (for each piece or set), you have to take off the pieces once they are ready if they have supports you have to trim them, you have to change the filament, and there are some common issues, jams, gaps, everything is delicate. If nothing goes wrong for example at the end of the day, you will have 10 pieces… with our machines 10 pieces is a matter of minutes, the same time you spend on the setup. Don’t use your 3D printer to do parts in series there is a better solution for that (our machines).Our machines are more than 40 times faster on average than a traditional 3D printer. The materials on average for our machines are 25 times cheaper. With a bigger variety. Lower power consumption. Power consumption is almost the same, but with our injection machines at the same time, you can make a lot more pieces, so the power consumption per piece is less with our machines.Better quality and presentation, less extra prosses. If for some reason one piece is damaged or without the quality or any error, you can easily recycle it, with our machines there is no waste.A 3D printer is by far noisier than our machines.What can I inject with these machines?Our injection machines are ideal to inject small plastic parts for many industries. Some products that you can inject are toys, kitchen accessories, pet toys, bathroom accessories, gears and mechanisms, accessories for phones, ornaments, make prototypes, mixing colors, and do plastic-color tests, self-defense products, sex toys, dental prosthesis, spare parts, automotive spares, complements for furniture, bicycle spares – parts, motorcycle spare – parts, fantasy jewelry, construction complements and more. What kinds of plastic can I use?You can use any plastic with a melting index above 12. You can find that index, in the datasheet of the plastic. You can use mainly: Polyethylene (LD - HD), Polypropylene, TPU, SBS, ABS, TR, Impact PS, crystal PS, PVC flexible, nylon, polyamides, compounds with fiberglass, and more. You can use almost every recycled plastic from injection parts, always do your tests first.What colors can I use?You can make any color you want. You can use masterbatch or dust pigment, each has advantages and disadvantages, masterbatch is slower but cleaner, dust pigments are faster to use but they are dirtier. when you change the color, the plastic will be mixed, so you have to waste some plastic, inject parts until the color is uniform. There are specialized purges to help to clean the machine, purges are useful to change color or the type of plastic.MoldsMolds are not included with any perk.The molds for a manual injection machine are by far cheaper than the molds for a hydraulic machine. Because the molds weigh less than a traditional mold, is easier to work with a small piece of metal. Molds can be easily done in a CNC machine, if you don’t have access to a CNC machine, we will implement a service for you, where you can send the file and we make the mold for you, and if you have a CNC machine we will sell blanks, pieces of metal that you can mill, to make your mold. How many pieces am I going to inject a day?Well first is a manual injection machine, it doesn’t work by itself, you can work 1 hour or 10 for example. Also, depending on the practice you have and the kind of plastic that you use. But the thing that influences the most is the size of the plastic part that you are going to inject. You can make 30,000 a day or 300.For example, in the video we inject 4 pieces every 3.5 minutes, more or less, without considering the first 15 minutes, to make it easier let’s say 4 minutes. If you work 8 hours and maintain that rhythm of injections, you can make 480 pieces, with a 3d printer that work will take you 320 hours or 40 days considering 8 hours a day (making one by one, if you make the maximum of the size of the bed it will take more time because the nozzle has to travel more) imagine that in the bed of the 3D printer can fit 10 pieces like the one that we injected on the video. Imagine that you are at ¾ of the work and it fails…you will lose a lot of time, and money. So, choose wisely, if you need to make plastic parts in series, with that number we can say that injecting a part is 40 times faster than 3d printing a part. Mold blanks.Is a piece of metal, with one face milled, in the other face you can mill the cavity that you want to make a useful mold. Mold blanks are made of a special alloy, zinc-based. This alloy is very used in the mold industry because leaves a metal without pores, and allows milling the mold easily (metal chips won’t stick to the endmill), with the necessary resistance, with a good cavity finish, and is easy to polish. we have many sizes available. With these blanks you forget the foundry process, you just place the blank in your CNC and mill the cavities of the mold.Test mold available as a complementIt’s a mold with 4 cavities, with this mold you can test different kinds of plastic, different temperatures and learn how to use the machine. The piece is a “padlock” for bags. You can add this complement to your existing pledge. One solution for your needs and budget. Our machines are ideal for: developers, engineers, Hobbyists, a plastic laboratory, small manufacturers, small workshops, entrepreneurs.Basic – Ideal for the ones how wants to have the first contact, with manual injection, great for small productions.Professional – Ideal for the ones how need more production and faster, bigger screen.Premium – Ideal for the ones how need bigger productions. More capacity. Tactile screen with different setups.Industrial - Ideal for the ones how wants to, the biggest capacity for an injection manual machine 180 cm3, reenforced materials, for harder work. Bigger mold holder. For bigger plastic parts that consume more plastic, with thicker walls more than 2.5mm.For years we have used the previous models of our machines, to make our products or more of our machines. With that base that we have from previous years… the mission was clear: better quality, make them more durable, improve the time that takes to inject a piece. It was a complicated mission but I guess it was accomplished. Everything was planned, tested, and modified until it works as planned. With time it may not look as new but it will still work fine.Machine Will be shipped disassembled, but you just have to plug the base and few screws... And it will be ready to inject. Shipping costs are for registered international mail. If you need FedEx, DHL, UPS, or faster service, please contact us. Machine package weights 9kg to 12kg.

record.Creator: Nataliya Bilous
record.Title: The Free Mind application
record.Text: Hi, my name is Nataliya. As a person who spent a lot of time on social media (better to say, wasted time), it’s about 4 hours a day, I noticed that I was not productive anymore. I spent money on stuff that I bought from Instagram, and I do not even need all of them, but marketing algorithms in social media works so well, so they can control our life and action. To avoid this impact, I want to create a unique mobile application that helps us reduce the time we spend on social media.The application will have the name The Free Mind. (The name came from a feeling I got after not using social media for a while). Also, The Free Mind will have a beneficial things such as bonuses.Open the app, enter your name and last name, and connect your existing social media to your The Free Mind account. Then choose from the left side which social media you would like to block. Once you have at least one account blocked, the time will be counted when you are offline but your cell phone is active. Then it is easy to convert offline hours to credits(It is its currency in The Free Mind).  You can spend Credits as you want. You can take a coffee, book, dinner, etc., just using Credits. This app will help people be less addicted to social media and get bonuses.

record.Creator: David Niermann
record.Title: YouFlaker [by W. Mock]: Make your oat flakes the German way
record.Text: [ 🇩🇪 ↓ Für die deutsche Version bitte weiter nach unten scrollen ↓ 🇩🇪 ]Do-It-Yourself: Making your own organic oat flakes and muesli with the innovative electrical grain flaker from renewable resourcesThat is: 100% fresh and with all the valuable nutrients of the whole grain. With our new, stylish grain flaker, the electrical YouFlaker.the ingenious grain mill builder with 40 years of experience has developed the YouFlaker for us, together with designers from the Darmstadt University of Applied Sciences and the team that, years ago, developed the legendary Hawo's mills and most recently the Mockmill grain mills.offer various raw organic muesli base mixes and delicious toppings - and now finally a stylish flaker (grain flaker) for making a really healthy, fresh muesli breakfast yourself. It's quick and easy, at the push of a button!In order to be able to go into series production with the YouFlaker, we need your support. So far, there has been a fully functional, tried-and-tested model with all technical components in a 3D-printed housing. The next step is the transfer to series production, which incurs costs for the creation of the casting tools (for casting the housing from renewable raw materials, see below) and for setting up and scaling series production. With your contribution you help us pre-finance these costs.Note: The prototype is a bit top-heavy. This will be solved in the final version by adding two weights at the bottom.First, an analogy that most people will get immediately:Anyone who wants to drink good coffee rightly expects the coffee beans to be freshly ground, as the fresh processing simply makes the coffee taste better. The flavors come into their own. That is why coffee is freshly ground in every good café, and more and more people are grinding their own coffee at home as well.Exactly the same applies to muesli and cereals that are processed into flakes. The fresh aromas of the grain are retained in the best quality when prepared right before consumption. The flakes are significantly more absorbent when fresh and soften more quickly in liquid. In addition to the aromas - and this is in what it differs from coffee - when fresh oat flakes are squeezed, important nutrients are retained in the best quality as well. More on that now...So why squeeze oats into oatmeal yourself when you can buy oatmeal in any supermarket?! Hardly anyone knows: Industrially produced oat flakes are heated up to 100°C. First, the oats are treated with hot steam, then rolled and then dried again over high heat. This conserves the oat flakes for a very long time, but it also damages many nutrients, especially enzymes and B vitamins. We had this examined in the laboratory using the enzyme lipase. The lipase breaks down fats into their constituent parts. It is only thanks to this that the body can digest the fats contained in food and use its own fat reserves for energy production (source: NetDoktor.de). Enzymes are very sensitive to heat and are irreversibly destroyed at approx. 50°C. Fresh processing is therefore all the more important - without prior heating to preserve it. This is only possible with the YouFlaker!Enzyme activity of the enzyme lipase in nkat/gSome of the B vitamins are similarly sensitive to heat. We looked at vitamins B3 (niacin) and B6 (pyridoxine). Vitamin B3 is an important component of the coenzymes NAD and NADH, which help the body generate energy for metabolism. It is found in all living cells in the human body, especially in central organs such as the liver and kidneys and in fatty tissue. Vitamin B6 also plays a central role in metabolism. It is required by the body to convert and incorporate proteins, it contributes to the formation of neurotransmitters (messenger substances in the nerve cells) and has an effect on the immune system.B vitamins B3 and B6 in µgThese are the differences in quality that have been investigated so far. There are probably more, because oats contain numerous other enzymes and essential nutrients in addition to lipase. The point is: the freshness simply pays off! You notice this in the nutrients and, above all, in the taste. Many of our customers tell us that after having made their own flakes for the first time, they no longer want to eat the pre-processed oat flakes from the supermarket!This applies not only to oats, but of course to other types of grain such as spelt or rye, too. Fresh flakes simply taste better!The innovative material Arboblend® created by the Swabian company Tecnaro is used for the housing. It is a sustainable material made from 100% renewable raw materials, but it can be cast into a mold just as easily as a plastic. This means that large quantities can be produced cheaply and sustainably at the same time. Arboblend® is not only particularly sustainable, but is also has a significantly better visual and haptic appearance compared to conventional plastic. Lignins made from vegetable fibers are used to manufacture Arboblend®. These cause the plant cells to harden and thus ensure the strength of wood. Lignin is a "waste product" in the paper industry. Therefore, it is widely available in large quantities at low cost. The housing is basically made of wood, just poured into shape and without using additional wood. Innovative and resource-saving!You can easily remove the squeezing mechanism (with the two rollers) by removing the top cover and then pulling the squeezing mechanism out towards the front. Then you can dry clean it with either a paint brush or some other small brush (such as a toothbrush). The squeezing mechanism can also be cleaned under running water and with a drop of dishwashing detergent for thicker deposits.The electric DC motor has more than sufficient power to easily squeeze all types of grain (except corn - too big and too hard) as well as oil seeds such as flaxseed, sunflower seeds, hemp seeds or sesame. In this way, all muesli ingredients are freshly squeezed in no time.The squeezing process is relatively quiet. The two stainless steel rollers squeeze grain and seeds with playful ease. The engine hums quietly and pleasantly. Audible, but you can still chat comfortably next to it. For the techies among us: When squeezing, the volume is around 60 dB. That corresponds roughly to the volume when talking at low volume.With the YouFlaker you can produce 100 grams of fresh flakes per minute at the push of a button. It only takes half a minute for a 50 gram serving to turn whole oats (as well as other grains and seeds) into fresh oat flakes. Next, add one of our toppings and, if you like, fresh fruits and berries as well as (plant) milk - and the incomparably fresh muesli is ready!Before the prototype from the 3D printer and the finished series product came the design drafts on paper and on the computer...All photos are taken from the 3D printed prototype. In this case, the housing is still made of "normal" plastic, as only certain plastics can be used in 3D printing. The visual and haptic impression of the device will therefore change slightly. Arboblend looks a little less smooth than most other plastics, makes a high-quality impression and is pleasant to the touch.We will update you with photos of the finished series product once they are available...(only available for European customers due to import restrictions)We have developed our muesli base with raw organic grain to match the fresh processing with the YouFlaker. You can also add these as a sample package (size M or size L). In combination with the YouFlaker, you can get our sample kit at a particularly affordable price - with a discount of around 10 euros. So you can start flaking right away! It's worth it!For our organic muesli base, we only use raw and organic cereals (naked oats, spelt, buckwheat) and seeds (linseed, sunflower seeds, sesame), which must be squeezed with a grain flaker before consumption in order to produce cereal flakes and to squeeze the seeds (particularly important with flaxseed!).We only use organic naked oats as oats, as they are particularly rich in nutrients. In contrast to ordinary (husk) oats, they do not need to be heated in order to remove the husk, which saves the enzymes, vitamins and fiber it contains. By the way, because of the naked oats, we also do all these silly word games with Nackte Tatsachen (The Bare Facts) and Naked Brunch...Nackte Tatsachen (The Bare Facts)Content: 500 gIngredients: naked oats*, flax seeds*, sunflower seeds** From organic farmingDE-ÖKO-039 Naked BrunchContent M: 500 gIngredients: naked oats*, spelt*, flax seeds*, sesame** From organic farmingDE-ÖKO-039Buch ohne Weizen (Buck-no-wheat)Content M: 500 gIngredients: buckwheat*, flax seeds*, sunflower seeds** From organic farmingDE-ÖKO-039Average nutritional values per 100 gWe have developed three toppings with freeze-dried fruits and berries and a few other ingredients, such as raw cocoa nibs, with which the muesli can be easily garnished. The topping gives our muesli that extra flavor and is made from 100% organic ingredients.3BeerenBiss (3BerryBite)Contents M / L: 21 / 105 gIngredients: Freeze-dried strawberries*, raspberries*, blueberries** From organic farmingDE-ÖKO-039Cherry Berry ChocoladyContents M / L: 50 / 250 gIngredients: raw cocoa nibs*, freeze-dried sour cherries*, blueberries** From organic farmingDE-ÖKO-039Solar Flower Power ProteinContents M / L: 44 / 220 gIngredients: organic sunflower rice crisps* (sunflower protein*, rice flour*, sugar*, cocoa powder*, sea salt, natural vanilla flavor), freeze-dried sour cherries*, raspberries** From organic farmingDE-ÖKO-039Average nutritional values ​​per 100 gWith your contribution you support our project by helping us to pre-finance the production. In return, you will be the first to receive the brand new YouFlaker - for the best and healthiest muesli every morning!And pretty soon your kitchen will look something like this every morning...Do-It-Yourself: Bio Haferflocken und Bio Müsli selber machen mit der innovativen elektrischen Flockenquetsche aus nachwachsenden RohstoffenNämlich ganz frisch und mit allen wertvollen Inhaltsstoffen des ganzen Getreidekorns. Mit der neuen stylischen Flockenquetsche, dem elektrischen YouFlaker.der geniale Getreidemühlenbauer mit 40 Jahren Erfahrung, hat für uns den YouFlaker entwickelt, zusammen mit Designern der Fachhochschule Darmstadt und dem Team, das vor vielen Jahren schon die legendären Hawo's Mühlen und zuletzt die Mockmill Getreidemühlen entwickelt hat.bieten verschiedene Müsli-Basis-Mischungen und leckere Toppings an – und jetzt endlich auch einen stylischen Flocker (Flockenquetsche) zum Selbermachen eines wirklich gesunden, frischen Müsli-Frühstücks. Es geht schnell und ganz einfach, auf Knopfdruck!Um mit dem YouFlaker in Serie gehen zu können, brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung. Bisher gibt es ein voll funktionsfähiges, erprobtes Modell mit allen technischen Komponenten, in einem Gehäuse aus dem 3D-Drucker. Der nächste Schritt ist die Überführung in die Serienproduktion, bei der Kosten für die Erstellung der Gusswerkzeuge (zum Gießen des Gehäuses aus nachwachsenden Rohstoffen, siehe unten) und den Aufbau und die Skalierung der Serienproduktion anfallen. Du hilfst uns mit deinem Beitrag, diese Kosten vorzufinanzieren.Anmerkung: Der Prototyp ist noch etwas kopflastig. Dies wird im Serienprodukt behoben sein durch zwei Gewichte im Fuß.Zuerst eine Analogie, die den meisten direkt einleuchtet:Wer guten Kaffee trinken will, erwartet zu Recht, dass die Kaffeebohnen frisch gemahlen werden, da die frische Verarbeitung den Kaffee einfach besser schmecken lässt. Die Aromen kommen besser zur Geltung. Daher wird Kaffee in jedem guten Café frisch gemahlen und auch privat mahlen immer mehr Menschen ihren Kaffee selber.Genau das Gleiche gilt bei Müsli und bei Getreide, die zu Flocken verarbeitet werden. Die Frischearomen des Getreides bleiben bei Zubereitung direkt vor dem Verzehr in bester Qualität erhalten. Die Flocken sind im frischen Zustand deutlich saugfähiger und werden in Flüssigkeit schneller weich. Zusätzlich zu den Geschmacksaromen - und hier liegt ein Unterschied zum Kaffee - bleiben beim frischen Quetschen von Haferflocken außerdem wichtige Nährstoffe in bester Qualität erhalten. Dazu nun mehr...Wieso also überhaupt Hafer selber zu Haferflocken quetschen, wenn man doch auch Haferflocken in jedem Supermarkt kaufen kann?! Was kaum jemand weiß: Industriell hergestellte Haferflocken werden auf  bis zu 100°C erhitzt. Zuerst wird der Hafer mit heißem Wasserdampf  behandelt, dann gewalzt und anschließend bei starker Hitze wieder  getrocknet (gedarrt). Das macht die Haferflocken zwar sehr lange haltbar, aber beschädigt eben auch viele Nährstoffe, vor allem Enzyme und B-Vitamine. Wir haben das anhand des Enzyms Lipase im Labor untersuchen lassen. Die Lipase zerlegt Fette in Ihre Bestandteile. Nur dank ihr kann der Körper in der Nahrung erhaltene Fette verdauen sowie eigene Fettreserven zur Energiegewinnung verwenden (Quelle: NetDoktor.de). Enzyme sind sehr hitzeempfindlich und werden schon ab ca. 50°C irreversibel zerstört. Umso wichtiger ist also die frische Verarbeitung - ohne Erhitzung zur Haltbarmachung. Das gelingt nur mit dem YouFlaker!Enzymaktivität des Enzyms Lipase in nkat/gÄhnlich hitzeempfindlich sind einige der B-Vitamine. Angeschaut haben wir uns die Vitamine B3 (Niacin) und B6 (Pyridoxin). Vitamin B3 ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil der Co-Enzyme NAD und NADH, die dem Körper helfen, Energie für den Stoffwechsel zu gewinnen. Es findet sich in sämtlichen lebenden Zellen des menschlichen Körpers, vor allem in zentralen Organen wie Leber und Nieren und im Fettgewebe. Vitamin B6 spielt ebenfalls eine zentrale Rolle im Stoffwechsel. Es wird vom Körper benötigt, um Eiweiße umzuwandeln und einzubauen, trägt zur Bildung von Neurotransmittern (Botenstoffen in den Nervenzellen) bei und wirkt sich auf das Immunsystem aus.B-Vitamine B3 und B6 in µgDas sind die Qualitätsunterschiede, die bereits untersucht worden sind. Vermutlich gibt es noch weitere, denn im Hafer sind neben der Lipase zahlreiche andere Enzyme und Vitalstoffe enthalten. Der Punkt ist: Die Frische macht sich einfach bezahlt! Das merkt man bei den Nährstoffen und vor allem aber auch beim Geschmack. Viele unserer Kunden berichten uns, dass sie nach dem ersten Mal Selberflocken die fertigen Haferflocken aus dem Supermarkt gar nicht mehr essen möchten!Das betrifft außerdem nicht nur Hafer, sondern natürlich auch andere Getreidearten wie etwa Dinkel oder Roggen. Frische Flocken schmecken einfach besser!Für das Gehäuse wird das innovative Material Arboblend® der schwäbischen Firma Tecnaro genutzt. Es handelt sich dabei um ein nachhaltiges Material aus 100% nachwachsenden Rohstoffen, das jedoch genauso einfach wie ein Kunststoff in Form gegossen werden kann. Dadurch können günstig und trotzdem nachhaltig auch große Mengen produziert werden. Arboblend® ist nicht nur besonders nachhaltig, sondern ist auch von der optischen wie haptischen Anmutung deutlich hochwertiger als Kunststoff. Zur Herstellung von Arboblend® werden die Lignine aus Pflanzenfasern verwendet. Diese bewirken die Verholzung (Lignifizierung) der Pflanzenzellen, sorgen also für die Festigkeit von Holz. Lignin fällt in der Papierindustrie als "Abfallprodukt" an. Daher steht es ohne weiteren Aufwand kostengünstig in großer Menge zur Verfügung. Das Gehäuse besteht also aus Holz, nur eben in Form gegossen und ohne dass dafür zusätzliches Holz verbraucht wird. Innovativ und ressourcenschonend!Du kannst das Quetschwerk (mit den beiden Walzen) einfach entnehmen, indem du die obere Abdeckung mit einem Handgriff entfernst und das Quetschwerk anschließend nach vorne herausziehst. Dann kannst du es entweder mit einem Pinsel oder einer kleinen Bürste (zum Beispiel einer Zahnbürste) trocken reinigen. Bei stärkeren Ablagerungen lässt sich das Quetschwerk auch nass unter fließendem Wasser und mit Spülmittel reinigen.Der Elektromotor hat mehr als genügend Power um spielerisch sämtliche Getreidearten (außer Mais - zu groß und zu hart) und Ölsaaten wie etwa Leinsamen, Sonnenblumenkernen, Hanfsamen oder Sesam zu quetschen. So werden alle Müslizutaten im Nu frisch gequetscht.Das Quetschen geschieht relativ leise. Mit spielerischer Leichtigkeit quetschen die beiden Edelstahlwalzen Getreide und Saaten. Der Motor summt leise und angenehm. Hörbar, aber man kann sich daneben bequem unterhalten. Für die Kenner: Beim Quetschen liegt die Lautstärke in etwa bei 60 dB. Das entspricht in etwa der Lautstärke beim normalen Sprechen in Zimmerlautstärke.Mit dem YouFlaker stellst du auf Knopfdruck 100 Gramm frische Flocken pro Minute her. Pro Portion mit 50 Gramm dauert es also nur eine halbe Minute bis aus dem ganzen Haferkorn frische Haferflocken geworden sind. Dann noch eines unserer Toppings und je nach Belieben frische Früchte und Beeren sowie (Pflanzen)milch dazugeben - fertig ist das unvergleichlich frische Müsli.Vor dem Prototypen aus dem 3D-Drucker und dem fertigen Serienprodukt standen natürlich die Design-Entwürfe auf Papier und am Computer...Alle Fotos sind vom 3D-gedruckten Prototypen gemacht worden. Bei diesem besteht das Gehäuse noch aus "normalem" Kunststoff, da nur bestimmte Kunststoffe beim 3D-Druck genutzt werden können. Der optische wie haptische Eindruck des Geräts wird sich also nochmal geringfügig verändern. Arboblend wirkt etwas weniger glatt als die meisten anderen Kunststoffe, macht einen hochwertigen Eindruck und hat eine angenehme Haptik.Wir werden Bilder vom fertigen Serienprodukt hinzufügen, sobald diese verfügbar sind...(wegen Importrestriktionen nur für europäische Kunden erhältlich)Passend zur frischen Verarbeitung mit dem YouFlaker haben wir unsere Müsli Basis mit naturbelassenem Bio Getreide entwickelt. Diese können von dir zusätzlich als Probierpaket (Größe M oder Größe L) hinzugefügt werden. In Kombination mit dem YouFlaker bekommst du unser Probierpaket natürlich besonders günstig - mit rund 10 Euro Preisnachlass. So kannst du direkt losflocken! Es lohnt sich!Wir verwenden für unsere Bio Müsli Basis ausschließlich rohe und biologische Getreide (Nackthafer, Dinkel, Buchweizen) und Saaten (Leinsamen, Sonnenblumenkerne, Sesam), die vor dem Verzehr mit einer Flockenquetsche gequetscht werden müssen, um daraus Getreideflocken herzustellen bzw. die Saaten zu quetschen und somit aufzuschließen (ganz wichtig bei Leinsamen!).NackthaferWir verwenden als Hafer ausschließlich Bio Nackthafer, da dieser besonders nährstoffreich ist. Im Gegensatz zu gewöhnlichem (Spelz)hafer muss dieser nicht erhitzt werden um den Spelz zu entfernen, was enthaltene Enzyme, Vitamine und Ballaststoffe schont. Wegen des Nackthafers machen wir übrigens auch die ganzen Wortspiele mit Nackte Tatsachen und Naked Brunch...Nackte TatsachenInhalt: 500 gZutaten: Nackthafer*, Leinsamen*, Sonnenblumenkerne** Aus biologischer Landwirtschaft.DE-ÖKO-039Naked BrunchInhalt M: 500 gZutaten: Nackthafer*, Dinkel*, Leinsamen*, Sesam** Aus biologischer Landwirtschaft.DE-ÖKO-039Buch ohne WeizenInhalt M: 500 gZutaten: Buchweizen*, Leinsamen*, Sonnenblumenkerne** Aus biologischer Landwirtschaft.DE-ÖKO-039Durchschnittliche Nährwerte je 100 gDazu haben wir drei Toppings mit gefriergetrockneten Früchten und Beeren und einigen anderen Zutaten wie etwa Roh-Kakaonibs entwickelt, mit denen das Müsli ganz einfach garniert werden kann. Das Topping gibt dem Müsli den extra Geschmack und ist ebenfalls weitgehend naturbelassen sowie aus 100% biologischen Zutaten.3BeerenBissInhalt M / L: 21 / 105 gZutaten: Gefriergetrocknete Erdbeeren*, Himbeeren*, Heidelbeeren** Aus biologischer Landwirtschaft.DE-ÖKO-039Cherry Berry ChocoladyInhalt M / L: 50 / 250 gZutaten: Roh-Kakaonibs*, gefriergetrocknete Sauerkirschen*, Heidelbeeren** Aus biologischer Landwirtschaft.DE-ÖKO-039Solar Flower Power ProteinInhalt M / L: 44 / 220 gZutaten: Bio Sonnenblumen-Reis-Crisps* (Sonnenblumenprotein*, Reismehl*, Zucker*, Kakaopulver*, Meersalz, natürliches Vanillearoma), gefriergetrocknete Sauerkirschen*, Himbeeren** Aus biologischer Landwirtschaft.DE-ÖKO-039Durchschnittliche Nährwerte je 100 gMit deinem Beitrag unterstützt du unser Projekt, indem du uns hilfst, die Produktion vorzufinanzieren. Im Gegenzug erhältst du als Erste(r) den brandneuen YouFlaker - für das beste und gesündeste Müsli jeden Morgen!Und schon bald schaut es bei dir jeden Morgen ungefähr so aus...

record.Creator: Finn
record.Title: GitDeploy: Hosting made easy
record.Text: I'm a passionate developer and I needed a place to host my own applications, a mail server, my website and so on. I wanted full control, so I decided to rent a server, where I could just do all I wanted.However, in my time managing my own server I came across a few recurring problems:Now, this was some time ago, and I decided to switch to another server provider. This opens another problem, as there is no way to simply copy and paste my configuration of one server to another. I definitely am not the only one, so if you're experiencing any of the problems above, I have the solution for you.Yes, nothing of this is groundbreaking new technology, however it's about combining it all together into an actually useful and most importantly easy to use tool.The solution is to use a combination of git and Docker. Most people reading this far probably know of at least the basic concept of both, but for the remaining ones, here's a little explanation.Git is simply a way of saving all changes ever made to files in a directory (called a repository in this case). It's basically like taking snapshots of all the files, and later being able to view or restore any snapshot. Furthermore, it's possible to sync those snapshots to a server, where they can be read from again with any other computer. If we now can compress all configuration of the entire server in one directory we already have two of the problems taken care of: #1 Remembering old settings and #4 Simple transfer of configuration.Docker offers a great way to run applications completely independently of each other, solving problem #2 Compatibility between applications. The core concept is similar to a virtual machine, however Docker comes with far less overhead and more performance. And, to complement the first point, there is a way of specifying which applications to run in a text-based form.This only leaves problem #3 Quick and easy updates. The basic concept is to store the entire configuration of your server in an online git repository, like GitHub. To set up your server, all you'd have to do is manually run one single command, that would boot up a docker container setting up everything. The container would pull the configuration form the repository and launch all specified applications. Those should contain at the very minimum a service that can be used to replicate updates from the repository.GitHub offers a useful feature called Webhooks; when an updated "snapshot" is pushed to the repository, it will send a request out to a specified URL. This URL would then be handled by said  "update"-service, pulling the updated configuration and deploying it.Open-Source:I'm planning to have every aspect of this project Open Source and available under the GPL v3.0 license, which basically grants everyone the right to use the code for whatever purpose, as long as they keep the source open, use the same license and show a copyright notice.Modular:Every part of the software that I can reasonably publish as an individual package, I will. This will enable enable anyone to build on which ever part I develop.Isolated:My personal aim for this project is not only to solve the above mentioned problems, but also to not touch or rely on the host-system at all. Ideally everything is running in containers and no modifications to the server itself are needed, except for installing Docker. Uninstalling Docker would result in a clean slate, with no relics at all.Progress:You can find all progress, as it happens on my GitHub-Account. More detailed information on the progress and technical details can also be found down below.The basic project will very likely come together, whether this project is successfully funded or not, just because I personally want to use it.The Kickstarter has the main purpose of gauging the interest in this project and by this potentially funding additional goals:1. Improving the quality:Funds will be used to further the development, testing, documentation, etc. of the project, to turn it from a niche-hobby project into more of a fully fledged solution.2. Add-ons:I have some ideas for potential add-ons, that I'd develop only, if there is enough interest. Anyone can suggest add-ons; I will all consider all input I get. As a thank you to higher-pledging supporters, their suggestions will be considered first and might have a lot more influence on the final shape of the project.3. My own hosting service:Should there be that much interest, that it seems like a feasible option, I will actually take this from a hobby to a professional level, register a company, do whatever is necessary, to create my very own server provider, providing not only servers for rent, with this software pre-installed, but also host a custom repository server, so that all necessary infrastructure would come from one hand. You still would be able to just install the software on any other server, it's just less convenient.If you want to see this happen, please share this Kickstarter with anyone that might be interested. I can't afford ads or paying an agency for this project, so it really is up to you to get the stone rolling.This list is neither final, nor exhaustive, nor guaranteed. It serves as inspiration, which features could be implemented with enough funding.The barebones for this project have already been implemented:As of the writing of this, already a basic system has been created, that can be updated only by pushing to a GitHub repository. It features nginx in the form of openresty as a proxy and supports forwarding subdomains to individual Docker containers.To see the exact current state of development, see the GitHub repositories.The core config can be found here.To see an up-to-date example of a repository used to configure the deployment, see this  GitHub repository. This I me using GitDeploy for my own server.Also, a simple monitoring dashboard for Docker is in the works:Basic research for the hosting service has begun:A list of all the small packages that were developed in the context of this project, but can be used on their own. This list will be updated as soon as something new is available.Node.jsDocker

record.Creator: Léo Giroud
record.Title: Electropins: wear luminescent circuit boards!
record.Text: All of the objects around us are filled with Printed Circuit Boards (PCB). But you mostly never seen them, since they are boxed inside the device.But why, though? When you look at them closely, you can fall in love with their beauty: structured, complex, stuffed with components... For many of us, as children, they looked like small futuristic city models!Of course, their purpose is not to be pretty. Yet, when you take the time to design one, you can easily add drawings and, if you are creative enough, make it a piece of art!That was the clever idea of Léo Giroud, Master student in physics. He likes to prototype and play with PCBs, and wants to bring them in your keychain, on your bags and clothes! Our goal is to create an online shop to sell our PCBs. They are decorative gadgets, to be used as pins, keychains, necklace, etc. They exists in two flavours:For this campain, we've made a dozen of early designs. A very small quantity is already available in our Etsy shop. This campain will allow us to fund a first stock of these PCB and to develop our online shop. So that we would be able to work on new designs freely!After sketching the PCB, we make the PCB design out of it on a special computer software. This process is technical and requires basic knowledge in electronics.When the PCB is ready, we order all of them to our manufacturer that will create the PCB for us. This process can be long as two weeks, depending on the amount and colors of the PCBs. When we receive them, we have to prepare them: soldering all the components for the luminescents ones mostly. After this, they are ready to be shipped to you!The project is held by a single person: Léo G. (it's me!)I am 22, currently a master student in physics. But it seems that I have lots of other interests, such as DIY crafts, electronics, and -of course- PCBs!I am in charge of the realisation of the designs, the creation of the PCB and all of the soldering stuff. I will most likely remain the only working individual in this project!In a close future I hope to be helped for graphish and communication by my friend, Gabriela P. This project would not have existed without her.Our estimation is currently at 2500€ for three main things:If we reach our goal, the leftovers will be used for the creation of an official business!You just have to order the first counterpart and choose the PCB that you would like to have in the add-ons. Also, for counterparts higher than 15€, you will receive a "thank you" special campain PCB where your nickname will be displayed on it (if you want to)!Feel free to check out our Etsy shop! before the campain end, to see all the designs available in details. Also check our Instagram, our  Facebook or our  Twitter!Your support for our project is vital and we thank you from the bottom of our hearts. Your help is the key to make this project reality. We are eager to see you wear our pins!

record.Creator: OpenIOT
record.Title: lumi.art: Light Patterns Personalized to Your Mood & Space
record.Text: Have you ever felt bored or tired looking at string lights? This is because normal string lights have a simple and systemic pattern that splits the bulbs into two groups that flash alternatively.Can you feel the difference between the two videos below?Both show trees decorated with string lights of 200 light bulbs. Conventional string lights splits up the flicker of its lights so that 100 turn on when the other 100 are off. Then they just interchange the state of being on and off.lumi.art, on the other hand, is a state-of-the-art string lights that embeds a semiconductor chip in each LED, allowing move independently and control the mood to your liking through mobile app. If you take a moment, you’ll see that none of them blink at the same time.Users can even create their own patterns and sequences in the app. See them appear on lumi.art in real time.The smartphone app supports both iOS and Android and can be downloaded for free from the App Store or Play Store.Using the app, you can not only edit real-time patterns, but also edit, save, and share sequences, and schedule operation times.Use lumi.art in various moods and places or as part of your own arts and craft. We leave it up to you to get creative!None of the lights blink the same way. They flicker independently and randomly. Then by editing the frequency and brightness through the app, users can create their own patterns and sequences. It’s almost like you can create your own set of beautiful stars in the night sky. How is this twinkling possible?By embedding semiconductor chips in all LEDs, it creates a twinkle pattern that make each of them blink individually. This simply cannot be imitated by string lights out there today. It’s a patented technology that we’re proud to hold.We provide 8 pre-set light patterns for a variety of moods with lumi.art. You can also create your own patterns with your smartphone app.The example video below show a combination of 400 steady lights and 200 LEDs lumi.art on a Christmas tree.Example pattern - 1 : Energetic nightThis pattern resembles a dynamic atmosphere that matches the energetic music of the club with quick-blinking LEDs.Example pattern - 2 : Pouring starsThis pattern resembles twinkling stars in a quiet night sky with select LEDs that fade out while most stay on.Example pattern - 3 : Mellow fogThis pattern embodies the image of emerging water mist by dimming up and down the LEDs one at a time.Example pattern - 4 : Roaring bonfireThis pattern creates the feeling of a crackling bonfire by having the LEDs flicker off very quickly and turn back on.Example pattern - 5 : Hopeful waitingThis pattern gives a comfortable yet slightly urgent feeling by gently turning the LED on and off, so we named it "Hopeful waiting".Example pattern - 6 : Nostalgic loveThe slow frequency at which the LEDs fade in and out conveys reminiscent feelings of a long-past lover.Example pattern - 7 : Flourishing desireThis pattern is named "flourishing desire" because like our aspirations in life, the LEDs are quick to grow and spread.Example pattern - 8 : Fading memoriesUnlike the pattern right before, LEDs in "Fading memories" turn on slowly and turn off quickly, reminding us that even the fondest of memories don't last forever.A natural tendency of the human brain is to find patterns and stability in everything we do. This is instinctive because we require natural regularities like knowing that the sun will rise every day and lions going out to hunt in order to survive. Predictability is great but it requires our brain to process a heavy amount of visual information, often causing overload and burn-out.On the other hand, when you see random movements of nature, such as sparks fluttering in the fireplace, leaves swaying in the wind, or waves glistening in the sunlight, you feel at peace and relaxed.This is because the brain gives up trying to find regularity in such movements and accepts the beauty of nature. lumi.art has 8 blinking patterns built-in, so the default patterns are automatically operated at default intervals without connecting to the app.  Also, the USB type transmitter has a button, which can be pressed to manually switch the pattern.If you connect with the app and send a pattern or sequence edited in the app, it will work with that thereafter.In addition to reinventing the versatility and beauty of string lights, lumi.art is challenging many other aspects of the existing string lights.Believe it or not, the idea behind lumi.art goes back 30 years. Looking at the string lights I always see around Christmas season, I kept thinking that the blinking pattern was too monotonous and mechanical. I thought, “how amazing would it be to have all the bulbs twinkle individually?” And that’s how lumi.art was born.The problem was that when the idea was implemented, the product was too expensive. However, due to the rapid progress of semiconductor technology in recent years, the price has come down to a level that can be commercialized. With more affordable semiconductors, we were able to apply for a patent five years ago and refine our technology ever since.As for next steps, I want lumi.art to completely change the way we see and use string lights. The twinkle pattern of string lights has stayed the same for the past 100 years. I think it’s finally time to challenge that – from mechanical and monotonous light patterns to a true source of art.As the most trusted product launch company in the world, Enventys Partners has helped launch over 2,000 innovations with global sales of over $1 Billion dollars for our clients.By utilizing 20 years of experience in:Got an idea? We would love to help you launch it.

record.Creator: Sabina Iman
record.Title: An app that connects people at venues in real time
record.Text: I am Sabina Iman, the founder of Blink. I was born and raised in Azerbaijan where I have started my career in marketing communications at Omnicom media group. I moved to Spain to pursue my MBA together with my 3 years old daughter, and after graduation, I joined a company in Madrid and have been consulting tech startups for 2 years. During that time I was actively using dating apps. That's when I started to notice how dating apps made me feel. First, of all, they consumed my time, I had to swipe and talk to several people at once for getting one date. And then once I went on a date I found out that people either don't look or behave the same way. And my time was wasted, my self-confidence was weakening with every date. I have met some nice people who later became my friends, but I could not meet anyone with whom I could be aligned. And I realized that the only dating app that I would use is the one that can help me to meet with real people around in a live mode, while I do what I enjoy, without going on pre-arranged dates or spending hours looking on my screen. That's how Blink was born. Blink allows users to present in the same venue to match, chat, play games, and meet instantly. With a special feature, you can select the place to go or tag yourself in your favorite spot and see who is around. If you find your perfect match, agree to meet instantly and have a chat. We want to eliminate time and energy wasted on dating apps and give our users an opportunity to experience live encounters. our app is not niche, it's inclusive as it does not depend on your sexual preferences, which you can easily filter, it depends on your lifestyle and places you like to attend. And our goal is to offer a completely new experience, not engage users with the app. We will be happy if users leave the app for a good reason. We have already finalized the MVP and we want to develop app further, add new features and have a marketing budget to promote the app. Even if you can't contribute to the funding, we would be happy to see you on our waiting list.

record.Creator: Robert Mandel
record.Title: Team Before Self
record.Text: **** We appreciate any amount of donation from $1 on up.  Any and all support for our mission to bring Veterans and Veteran allies together in the pursuit of a healthier lifestyle is what keeps us pushing forward. ****Team Before Self is a Veteran owned start-up born out of the desire to inspire healthier lifestyles through camaraderie and accountability.  We believe that our platform offers our users the opportunity to stay connected through collective purpose and self improvement in all facets of life.  Through our platform, we are trying to give the everyday Joe and Jane a new and enticing incentive to make healthier choices.  As Veterans ourselves, we know that when we are part of a team who rely on us to do our part, we are more driven and likely to choose the harder right over the easier wrong.  Health and wellness decision making in our lives often feels purely individual and at times, it can even feel selfish.  The Team Before Self platform is aiming to give our users a different reason to work toward their goals in all facets of life because we know when we put team before the self, we are capable of so much more.  By joining our community you will be driven to better yourself, push others to do the same and help build our supportive and connected community in the process.  We are building Team Before Self for Veterans because we understand the Veteran mental health epidemic both statically and personally.  We also understand that many non-Veterans deal with similar challenges in life so we want to welcome anyone to join us, either to better yourself or to support those who need it.        We have run through several beta versions of the competition in order to refine the competition format and understand what works best. How the competition works: You have a role/rank as part of a 5 person team.  Your team chooses from different sets of activities (run 100 miles, meditate for 3 hours, read 15 chapters etc) and once the activity set is chosen, your team collaborates on how best to accomplish the set of tasks.  Once complete, your team reaches your first "Check Point" and chooses another set of activities.  You compete against other teams and the first team to reach the "Objective" wins.   *** For even more detail about the platform and our company please visit https://teambeforeself.com***Please consider the different rewards we have created for this kickstarter.  If the Team Before Self platform sounds like something you would enjoy, please help us turn it into a reality.

record.Creator: Octopus Technology Team
record.Title: OCTOPUS - Smart Grow LED System for Indoor Garden
record.Text: What is Octopus?Octopus is a sun-like light source for indoor plants, thanks to its full-spectrum LEDs.  These LEDs stimulate plant growth and give you the opportunity to achieve better growth at home. You just need to put your plant under Octopus and turn it on. Thanks to the Wi-Fi connectivity, you can set up your Octopus very quickly and easily. With the help of an integrated camera and e-mail application, you can observe your plants from wherever you are located. Thus, your plants will never wilt and the progress will always be under your control. Features of OctopusFeatures you can find only in OctopusOctopus is a smart Grow Led System  (GLS) that has many new features that are being introduced to the grow-led industry by the Octopus Team. What you can grow with OctopusWith Octopus, you can grow various plants at home.  Below are a few examples:   How you can grow with OctopusWith Octopus, you can grow almost any plant in your home, from seed to full harvest. In this section, you will find a brief introduction to how you can do this. A more detailed guide will be provided with the product.Main Components of OctopusDevelopment of OctopusThe spectrum of the light that is needed by plants is called Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR) and the shape of this spectrum is of great importance for the grow light design. The design of Octopus is based on studies to understand the Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR) spectrum. With the design of  Octopus, we have made several simulations to test and determine the optimum LED arrangement for the generation of the PAR. The Octopus Technology Team has designed hardware and firmware/software components to maximize the user-friendliness functions. Integration of these components has developed two prototypes of Octopus. Design IterationsEven though many iterations have been tried at the components level during the design of Octopus,  Octopus has only two prototypes. The necessary modifications have been done on the first prototype to improve the power supply and the Wi-Fi module of Octopus. Moreover, a cover has also been designed and integrated into Octopus to enhance its appearance. The below pictures show the prototypes and modifications.LED Board DesignThe LED board is one of the main components of the Octopus. It is supporting and feeding the LEDs, which produce light for the plants. Below you can see the prototypes of the LED board on which the Octopus Team has conducted some tests and made modifications.Tests of OctopusVarious tests have been conducted on Octopus. Some of the performed tests are explained under the following topics.Illumination Performance TestOctopus can generate up to  70000 lux at a distance of 30 cm at 110 watts of input power. This value is twice the amount that direct sunlight gives and seven times the amount of full daylight (not direct sunlight). Please see the table below for illuminance from various sources.The video shows the maximum illuminance from Octopus at a distance of 30 cm at steady-state. Light meter showing the illuminance in Lux - the actual value is 100 times the displayed value for the selected range. The test box is covered by Mylar reflective film.Light Stability TestThe stability of light is very important for the plants to grow undisturbed under Octopus. The video shows the stability of Octopus is stabile even if  the input power is fluctuating.Wattmeter showing the instantaneous AC input power in Watts to the Octopus.Manual Dimming TestThis video shows how Octopus adjusts the input power and in turn, the level of light by the “Dimming” button.  Automatic Dimming and Energy Saving TestAutomatic dimming is a new feature introduced by Octopus to grow light technology. The feature will help to save energy while eliminating any disturbance to the growing plants.In the video below, you will see a 1500 Lux external light source that is used to test the automatic dimming feature of Octopus.  The sensor threshold is set to 1000 Lux. Octopus dims the light automatically as the external light source approaches the sensor.Maximum PowerOctopus can go up to a maximum of 110 watts.User Safety We have also tested the safety of Octopus. The below video and image show the output voltage of Octopus stays below 50 V. This is accepted as an extra-low voltage and low-risk source by the safety authorities (src: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Low_voltage).  Octopus has also many other safety functions to protect the user and device itself. This is provided in the Fact Sheet below. Music by bensound.com Fact Sheet of OctopusREWARDS

record.Creator: Buru-buru
record.Title: Buru-buru: The Bubble Soap Dispenser
record.Text: Buru-buru turns ordinary handsoap into magical clouds of bubbles! We believe that hand washing can be made fun, and bring joy to our young ones every single day. Kids refusing to wash their hands? We believe that hand washing shouldn't be a chore; and it definitely shouldn't be something that we have to keep nagging about.Handwashing is extremely important for our young ones. As they play and explore our world by touch, they collect a significant amount of dirt and germs on their hands everyday. Well, we asked ourselves: What if parents did not have to constantly nag and remind their children to wash their hands? What if hand washing was so fun they could clean up after themselves, every day, and have a great time doing so?Buru-buru is a motion activated dispenser that instantly converts any foaming handsoap into a cloud of bubbles. With buru-buru, every handwash becomes a fun, engaging experience.Buru-buru's ample bubble clouds offer much better coverage over palms and backs of hands - approximately about 3x more surface area coverage than your average soap dispenser.Based on testing estimates, Buru-buru uses only about half the soap required per effective hand wash as compared to conventional soap dispensers!To refill, simply pop off the lid, remove the screw cap, and pour in your favourite foaming handsoap!Buru-buru is compatible with most foaming hand soaps, and has been tested with soaps from the sample brands above. Non-foaming hand soaps also work with a 1:1 water to soap dilution ratio!  Buru-buru’s pledges do not include shipping costs. We will be using Easyship's post-campaign backer management platform to manage and charge shipping before sending out the Buru-buru orders. We will strive to offer the best, optimised shipping costs for each country based on our shipping partner estimates.Hello there! Buru-buru is run by a team of 3 passionate industrial designers. It is a labour of love and toil - and countless hours of playing with bubbles. Our adventure began in August 2021, when the three of us sat down to talk about a possible Kickstarter project. We found that we had something truly special in the idea of applying bubbles - otherwise novel, ethereal, fun playthings - to practical contexts and use cases. Buru-buru was born - a dream to create a soap dispenser that could turn any ordinary handsoap into bubbles instantly. After hundreds of hours of design work, one too many cups of coffee, and approximately 98430 popped bubbles later (we didn't actually count), we are on the cusp of launching buru-buru on Kickstarter!​Help us make Buru-buru a reality, and make hand washing something magical that kids can look forward to. ✨​❤️ Follow us on Instagram! ❤️ Check out our cool website! With love, and lots of bubbles,-- Team buru-buru

record.Creator: Axis Prime
record.Title: AxisPrime - first modular pants for photographers.
record.Text: Tired of constantly taking off your backpack? Neck pain from the camera strap? The back is overloaded by the harness?We have the perfect solution for you.*Note that the campaign has many gifs. Wait for them to load fully.*We present the first modular pants available on the market, designed for people working with the camera in the field. Our product replaces a standard photographic backpack, thanks to which it increases the mobility and comfort of the photographer and relieves the back during work.You can adapt the pants to your requirements. You can mount only a camera on them, but also a camera, a second lens, and a bag for filters and batteries.Are you left-handed? No problem, both sides are symmetrical, the camera can rest on the left or right hip.Have a problem with your left ankle? Take the pressure off your leg and buckle all heavy items on your right hip. When you recover, replace the mounts in the previous place.The load capacity is 2.5 kg (tested in off-road running). Plate can handle both a small compact camera and a SLR with a long lens.The regural/slim fit can be worn both in the city and in the field. Pants go well with the outdoor sweatshirt, but also with an elegant shirt or everyday clothes.The men's and women's versions are adapted to the body shape, and the legs are tapered downwards, which ensures comfort and a good lookPants designed especially for photographers to fulfill their modular task and at the same time be minimalist and imperceptible. As a model we used the best solutions from the military industry and motocross clothing,The top of the pants is the most important for us. It is equipped with wide belt loops up to 50 mm wide and a 50 mm elastic and reinforced belt. On the inside, at the height of the fasteners, carrying straps are sewn in, which evenly distribute the weight.Pants are made of elastic fabric with a special weave • Nylon / Cotton RipstopThe material is waterproof and breathable at the same time, so you stay comfortable in the worst conditions.• Material: 50% Polyester, 22% Cotton, 22% Nylon, 6% ElastaneThe most important element "the mount", was made of two elements: a military buckle and a special Velcro that holds the camera in place. In addition, you can attach special foams underneath, which will protect you from abrasions and injuries, and will evenly distribute the weight of the camera on the leg.Our rail meets classic standards and can be used interchangeably with manfrotto plates (577). It additionally includes protection against accidental unplugging.The mounting strength has been field tested.The mount can withstand running, jumping, cycling and all outdoor activities.and even this ...Photographer: Hey, I wanna check something out, can I?us: Yeah, no problem.Also us: ...

record.Creator: Cake it
record.Title: Torty tut
record.Text: Our mission is to create an online world just a little bit more comfortable. All the niche that suffered from the COVID-19 conduct on the Internet.We’ve created the marketplace  https://tortytut.com/goods/kyiv   for the confectioners,who are able to create their own online store in 15-20 minutes without any help of developers while customers can find a cake faster .That will shorten their care during the preparation to the holiday.In March last year when the pandemic has started the founder of our project Victoriia Trifan wanted to order a cake for her son birthday.It turned out to be quite challenging .In this way,she came up with this idea..Two teams of developers have been working for 16 months.The process was very difficult and all planned expenses were wasted on that.We need money for the promotion. Radio,TV,SEO promotion,context advertisement and target.Also,we wrote a song on our own. Moreover, we shot a video which we are going to spread in You Tube .In this wat every child can sing the song about the cakes🎂The project is already 90% working, 1300 confectioners are registered on the platform, 1422 products are published, 70 cities of Ukraine are presented, 92 orders are realized using the "order in one click" button 99193 views and 1179 clicks to open the phone.The goal is that 90% of cakes will be found and bought on a simple dessert search service.

record.Creator: Latiff
record.Title: Loolla Learning Network
record.Text: At Loolla, we believe that learning is not just about collecting scrolls, certificates or badges.  And whilst there are skills and knowledge to be learnt from the accomplished masters, experts and academia, there is much to be learned as well from the have-beens, the experienced, the explorer, hobbyist, the doers and even learners. Fundamentally, the real value of learning is the direct, relevant and positive impact on one's life - beyond who delivers it.  Please click on the link to get the slide deck on About Loolla.Loolla started out as a project by a dad wanting to better help the learning of his young school-going children.  Whilst social messaging platforms are now commonly used these days to aid in learning, they can be disruptive, disorganised and inadvertently divert the focus away from the learning process itself.   He simply wanted to create a better option - beyond the disruptive messaging platforms - for his young schooling children to safely connect with the online learning community; to learn from those who know or have-been there and to share their knowledge and abilities with the world when they are ready for it.Online learning is more than just watching fancy videos, consuming interactive content or obtaining online badges and certificates.  Be it about solving a maths problem from school, working on a group assignment, performing a task, picking up a new hobby or building a skillset; many of us - young and old -  inevitably depend on a network of people who provide useful guidance and wisdom that support our learning and discovery. Without this network, it can be difficult sometimes to locate, reach, sieve through and understand the information, answers and guidance we seek. Your learning network is the multiplier that amplifies your learning.  Whilst there are many messaging platforms out there for communication and exchanges, and a multitude of online learning courses, one is hard press to find a tool that can easily build and grow an individual's personal learning network to support learning and discovery over time. A personal learning network (or PLN, in short) is a dedicated space, where one can easily initiate, participate in and spread learning of ideas, knowledge, skills, wisdom, experience, tools and tips.With Loolla, you can easily build, grow and develop your personal learning network - with relevant people, on different subject matters, at your own time and in your own pace.  Loolla brings together the useful features of communication technologies that allow online group formation, interactions and sharing, with the power of learning management systems that allow you to create, publish and sell online courses.  With Loolla you can :Carry your personal learning network with you, always.  Accessible via desktop and mobile devices, you carry your personal learning network all the time with Loolla. You can chat with your group members or create your own course whilst on-the-go. Explore the groups and forums that interest you and join the discussion anytime convenient for you.Ever encounter having difficulty tracking or finding the "thread of conversations" or "shared content" over social messaging platforms. More often than not, you have to spend some time scrolling through the list of messages and conversation's threads to find the message or thread that you are looking for. With Loolla, you can easily go to the relevant groups and discussion forums or courses to get to it. Social messaging platforms are good for quick communication, but they are not meant to be your repository of learning resources and to grow your learning network. Loolla helps you achieve both.Loolla does not seek to replace the spectrum of online courses or online forums that are already out there designed for structured and formal learning.Loolla embraces the fact that learning is a social process.  Loolla accepts learning for what it is  - a social process.  We give recognition to the fact that in this digital age, Everybody Can Learn From Everyone and Anybody Can Teach Anyone.TEACHERS. TUTORS. INSTRUCTORS. COACHES. MENTORS  Teach and guide on-the-go  GROUP ASSIGNMENTS. PROJECT TEAMS. LEARNING CIRCLES. INTEREST GROUPS  Amplify your learning with groups  STUDENTS. LEARNERS. CURIOUS MINDS  Grow your personal learning network

record.Creator: Alexander Bridgeforth
record.Title: COOL PEOPLE NETWORK
record.Text: As a kid, coming from the community I was raised in we are only taught to do a few things in life to be successful. Sports and music were the only level of success those around me knew of that seemed realistically achievable. It's like adversity was a part of the lease agreement in most of our neighborhoods.  Despite the disadvantages I managed to pick up the one thing I felt to be a quick fix to distract me from all of life struggles. Although I"m convinced it was nothing more than a distraction.This addiction led me to play middle, high school, and college basketball. Throughout my college journey I've always had the idea of doing something big. I wanted to showcase my creativity, but also set the tone thinking outside the box. I fell in love with technology as I became obsessed with reaching my goal. I planned to write a book but I said to myself, how valuable would I be if I gave people something they could start and finish? So I decided to deliver who I am as a creator in a way that could live forever. It may seem complicated but overall I'm just a kid from a small town Kinston, NC. The youngest of 6 siblings and always felt the coolest no matter who I was around or where I was at. For some odd reason I began networking in college expanding the idea of who I wanted to become. Today I am presenting everyone with Cool People Network. My Blog was designed to present education over entertainment because I wanted to change the narrative. Anything is possible if you surround yourself with right people and change your mindset when it comes to success. If this campaign isn't backed 100 % I still wanted to say I appreciate the opportunity to even share my story and idea amongst so of the worlds coolest creators and supporters.

record.Creator: Soulsfeng
