It is carbon fiber heating, apart from  resistor heating which will cause partially overheating, carbon fiber heating is far infrared heating, and will make the whole shoe warm averagely.Function and Details:

record.Creator: Charles Davi
record.Title: Black Tree Automatic Machine Learning
record.Text: I've created an incredibly powerful library of A.I. software that allows cheap consumer devices to solve complex problems in a small fraction of the amount of time traditional deep learning techniques, like neural networks, typically require. The accuracy is comparable, and at times better than traditional methods, and because it's AutoML (i.e., automatic machine learning), you don't need a data scientist to run it -Anyone can use it, since it's point-and-click software, that runs on its own.This will save companies enormous sums of money, as they no longer need to spend hundreds of thousands of dollars per year paying data scientists to solve routine problems in deep learning, since they can instead have relatively untrained employees use my software, which will in some cases cost just a few dollars per month.The reason this pricing works is because I already wrote the software, and stand to profit more from making my software cheap, and widely used, rather than expensive, and limited to enterprise clients.In addition to saving enterprise clients money, it would also allow anyone with demand for deep learning, from restaurants and hospitals to entrepreneurs, to make use of what would otherwise be prohibitively expensive software. The goal now is to create two versions of the software for sale on the Apple App Store, which will require rewriting the software in Mac's Swift Language.I've already started this process, and a very basic version of the prediction software is already complete in Swift, with more obviously to come.Funding is needed to cover the costs of registering with the app store, creating a professional website, a professional email account, and personal daily expenses until the software is commercially available.

record.Creator: Briananthony' Beasley
record.Title: unSHAKEable: Personal Style Coloring Software Mobile App
record.Text: This is a color software application.  This application scans the user's face, hair, and hands.  Then gives users every color by style and contrast that works not only with their image but home and office.  This can help the user: ATTRACT LOVE, ENHANCE INNER POWER, RESTORE ENERGY, MAKE FRIENDS, MAKE LASTING IMPRESSIONS, and SHOW THE WORLD WHO YOU ARE THROUGH unSHAKEable expert guidance! unSHKEable is not about changing your physical appearance to fit what we think.  We aim to bring out the best version of you.  Our team wants you to stay the same but with more CONFIDENCE.  We do this by helping you choose your unique coloring.  This coloring helps you choose clothes, colors, even objects to reveal your authentic self.  Why Choose unSHAKEable Mobile App  Now that we've given you more details about the unSHAKEable App let's now explain why we need the money! We have hired a team of software developers to ensure the best user-friendly experience.  Also, to bring special effects to this software like sounds and habitats that make the app stand out!

record.Creator: Thorsten Koerner
record.Title: ScamScan FREE Travel App
record.Text: Scamscan is your personal smart travel assistant. Be it navigating concrete jungles or conquering remote islands. Scamscan checks the area for dangers or scams and helps to reach your destination – safely. Receive current updates or warnings per location. Benefit from reports shared by hundreds of other travellers. Share your experience with others in coming versions.Stay safe, go far!ScamScan is an app for travellers by travellers, designed to help you to reaching your destination – safely. No matter if its a business-, honeymoon or adventure trip.We want to make travelling a little safer for adventurous people like you. Our app is designed to warn you about nasty surprises and provides useful tips.Based on your current location you receive all necessary information to stay safe and avoid any scam.About this projectWe travel to experience the wonders and secrets of our world. To marvel at places where the sky somehow shows a beautiful set of colors, where the air smells differently somehow. We leave our comfort zones to seek adventures, small ones or bigger ones. No matter why we travel, wanderlust, recreation or a business need – there should be no doubts about for safety concerns. But it´s proven to be difficult from time to time.Protection against Scam Theft /ViolenceScamScan helps to avoid fraud and tourist traps. This app can become your travel companion, a guide to avoid any hazards in the area.We want to supply a multi-language support to make ScamScan user friendly for everyone around the world. For the initial version English and German will be supported.And the best: it will be FREE.Inform yourself about popular methods of fraud against tourists and business travelers. Don’t be an easy cash grab for scammers.“I would`ve never thought this could happen to ME!” – predators might try to lure anyone with little to none local knowledge into dangerous situations. Avoid falling victim of theft or violent crimes. Experience voluntary adventures only ;). ScamScan informs you about reported situations from reliable sources via GPS-localization. If you prefer to deactivate GPS or can´t connect to the internet, the latest updates are available offline. Currently our database includes more than 600 reports from 112 countries.CommunityHowever, the best is yet to come: Due to the experience of the ScamScan community the database will be constantly updated and growing. Therefore, every user can share their experiences and make contributions to the protection of other travelers. After Go-Live, ScamScan will begin to develop its full potential, by recording, verifying and providing messages of the community. Thus, all valid experience reports, whether experienced by themselves or received from a reliable source, can be collected in one place.ScamScan grows with the community. Tell us what is going on during your travels, don't leave us in the dark. At the end of the day we need the COMMUNITY support from you. With your feedback we will be able to improve the app that we love constantly.Updates?We are already developing content for our first major update. The “Save Places Marker” will provide you with the following updates to your ScamScan map::- Show police stations- Highlight safe zones- Show Tourist Information points- Setup Community functionAlso the idea for a live scam warning function is in our mind…About us and TeamWe are a small team of globetrotters. We love to travel and would like to avoid some stumbling blocks and any unpleasant surprises in the future. Those can really spoil the pleasure and can also become expensive. The idea of a location-based app came up during our trip through Barcelona .Together we are better:Thorsten Körner FounderJulia Design & IllustrationPhil Creative Text SupportRolf and Kyung Jae Text Editor German and KoreanRemarks on the searching methodsThe project has been in progress for almost two years. Initially we have collected a huge amount of information to compile our offline database of 800 entries so far. Our project is build on this base of data. We collect data worldwide, our sources are news and newspapers secondary – primary is our own experiences also from all the travelers around the world.Timeline and project planTransparency is crucial for ScamScan user. Therefore we share our high level project plan with you. A valid project plan is significant for the success of our application. Our project is divided into four work packages for 2021 and 2022. CostsWhere does our baker’s money go? We have developed a cost plan with our programmers. We would like to share it with you because transparency is significantly important for us. There are costs per work package. Here you can see clearly how they are spread. Thank you!

record.Creator: Mei Chi Lo
record.Title: Booka Local Language and Pro Bono Services App
record.Text: Booka Local Language barrier app between foreigners and Native German speakers and Pro Bono Services to international visitors who are sexually assaulted in Germany.Hi, I'm Mei Chi Lo, the creator of the Booka Local app, knows all too well the challenges non-German speakers face when navigating various processes. I was sexually assaulted in Germany and found it difficult to file a report due to language barriers. I got the support needed through the help of my German fiancé that bridges the language barrier.  I also faced other daily challenges as a non-native German speaker living in the country, such as speaking to customer service representatives. Thus, I got a challenging spirit to put these traumatic and frustrating experiences to work for a positive cause—creating a service that connects people looking for help navigating language barriers with local helpers who speak the language and understand German bureaucracy.Booka Local website was launched in November 2020 in Germany. Via the site, international visitors and immigrants who may not speak German proficiently can request assistance with various tasks that may require translation. Some services that helpers can provide are making phone calls with utility companies, scheduling appointments, and filling out bureaucratic paperwork such as visa applications. The site has gained traction and overwhelmingly positive reviews since its launch nearly a year ago. Because of Booka Local’s popularity, the team is now focusing on launching and marketing its app, giving users access to local language helpers at the tip of their fingers.Completing tasks that require communication can be difficult and frustrating for millions of people living in and visiting countries where they may not speak the local language proficiently. Booka Local, a new translation services app available in Germany, is looking to give non-native German speakers a way to break through language barriers by connecting them with locals who speak German. Once connected to a language helper, the user can get the translation assistance needed to complete a wide variety of tasks that otherwise may be difficult due to limited language skills.Booka Local users pay an hourly fee to their helpers for assistance via the platform. But one selling point of the app is that the rates offered by Booka Local helpers are far less than those of professional translators. The Booka Local team also takes great care to ensure the safety of their customers by screening the local helpers carefully before making their services available on the platform. And for those looking to be helpers, the team also takes utmost care in ensuring their personal safety and that their feedback is heard and taken into consideration. All the local helpers are insured by Booka Local.“In creating Booka Local, I wanted to deliver something impactful that would ensure that international visitors or immigrants with limited German language skills could avoid the frustrations and embarrassments I experienced in trying to navigate everyday life and government bureaucracies.I wanted to be sure that no other sexual assault survivors have to experience roadblocks with navigating bureaucratic and legal processes because of language barriers. That’s why Booka Local offers pro-bono services to international visitors who are sexually assaulted in Germany. They can now secure the needed translation support to file the appropriate reports. We help the victims navigate the language-related procedures such as filing a police report, for free.As it takes time to learn a foreign language, we step in and provide those having troubles with the German language by providing language-related services like attending appointments, phone calls, or even document checking.One of our main goals is to help internationals integrate within German society. That is why we have also been working on producing an ebook with questions we asked the locals. We plan to distribute these to the internationals for free so that they have a better idea of how the locals think or what they would normally do in certain situations. We want to break the stereotypes internationals might have about the Germans and the German culture.My team has dedicated our services to a good cause in bridging the language barriers but we need to improve this app usage because, what is worth doing, is worth doing well. Help us achieve the best version of Booka local and Pro-bono services.Thank you

record.Creator: Juan Gutiérrez
record.Title: Nade
record.Text: Nade nació por un sentimiento que todos hemos sentido e algún momento de nuestras vidas... La soledad.Mi nombre es Juan y soy de Cantabria, España. Hace dos años, tras pasar por un momento complicado en mi vida, y con ese sentimiento de soledad a flor de piel, surgió una idea que se apoderó de mí: La soledad es algo que todos hemos sufrido alguna vez de una forma o de otra, y con todos los medios de los que hoy en día disponemos, el sentimiento de soledad es cada vez mayor en la sociedad actual.Por ello me aventuré a crear Nade, una red social en la que los usuarios pueden hablar sobre sus inquietudas, sus problemas, sus experiencias... Un lugar donde encontrar a gente que les entienda y que les pueda ayudar, al igual que ellos podrán ayudar a otros.El lema de Nade es "Todos tenemos algo que contar", y es precísamente porque todos tenemos nuestras experiencias, vivencias, conocimientos... Y por eso cada uno de nosotros puede aportar algo a alguien en un momento dado, como también le puede aportar algo otra persona en otro momento. Y gracias a la tecnología, esa persona puede estar en tu misma calle, en tu misma ciudad, o al otro lado del océano.El objetivo de Nade es crear una comunidad en la que los usuarios sientan que no están solos, que los problemas que ellos tienen, los tienen otras personas o los han tenido en algún momento de sus vidas. Que tengan la tranquilidad de saber que hay un lugar donde se pueden desahogar, donde pueden preguntar esas cosas que a veces no se atreven, y donde pueden ayudar a otras personas, porque la sensación que te da haber ayudado a alguien es de completa plenitud, y es algo que muchas veces olvidamos y que nos llena por completo.Por otra parte, el proyecto ya está lanzado desde hace unos 4 meses. Hay más de 4.000 usuarios entre España y los países hispanohablantes, y el feedback que recibimos es en su gran mayoría muy positivo. Mucha gente afirma que es una App necesaria.El proyecto ha supuesto cerca de 100.000€ de inversión, todo ello ha sido abordado con presupuesto personal, que fue invertido en el desarrollo de la App y de la web, y en la elaboración de planes de marketing y ventas.Los fondos recaudados serán empleados en algunas ampliaciones en el desarrollo (20% de los fondos aprox.) con el fin de mejorar la App, en un plan de marketing y ventas (60% de los fondos aprox.) con el fin de dar a conocer Nade y comenzar con la facturación, y en gastos generales (20% de los fondos aprox.) como pueden ser el mantenimiento del servidor, las tarifas mensuales, los gastos en material, personal...Esta es nuestra página web: www.nadeapp.com , en ella presentamos Nade, explicamos su funcionamiento, y desde ella se puede acceder a descargar la App en diferentes plataformas, o a acceder a la versión web de la App.

record.Creator: Jamaal Johnson
record.Title: Dog Training Made Easy
record.Text: WHATA unique and accessible dog training app for owners with video library and written handouts to train your dog.  Proven methods developed by one of the USA top training centers on your smartphone. We are expert trainers with various training backgrounds, from service dogs, shelter dogs, to dealing with severe behavior challenges. The community is also full of fellow dog lovers who enjoy learning from one another. The community is meant to be inclusive, fun, friendly and smart. Through sharing real stories of the training process and life challenges of the life of your dog. We are here to walk this journey together sharing “what works,” and build a healthy relationships between you and your dog.WHY?Consider how convenient it would be to have your own personal dog trainer available whenever and wherever you require assistance.Every year, around 2 million dogs enter shelters in the United States due to behavioral disorders, with approximately 355,000 of them being euthanized. Those dogs were formerly loved, but some of their owners didn't know how to keep them from developing behavioral problems that made life difficult for both of them. Despite the fact that training is critical for having a happy pet-owning family, many owners do not have the time or resources to provide their dogs with the training they require.That is why we created the dog training app to assist in the creation of a beloved companion rather than a statistic. You get clear instructions and specialized training help directly on your phone.With video instruction and troubleshooting tips, this is a unique and accessible dog training program for owners. On your smartphone, you can use tried-and-true methods created by one of the leading training centers in USATHE APPIt necessitates extensive video production, photography, and local resources, as well as intricate back-end development. Self-publishing such a large project is a significant undertaking.The money we raise will be used for a marketing effort to promote the app to users all over the world, in addition to covering the cost of the app's development. Any additional cash raised will be utilized to create videos for our own YouTube channel and to develop future app bolt-on modules.Our goal is to create a community of dog lovers who believe that the most important aspect of ethical dog ownership is educating your dog, which is a lifetime journey. We want to build a platform on which owners can benefit from our experience, but also share their own ideas and tips to one another.   HOW IT WORKS Expert Certified Trainers and pet parents come together to share the wonderful training process and life long journey with our dogs.  1 Check out your News Activity, participate and be active in the community and use all the resources available to you including dog trainers.  2 Join the groups and forums that you are interested in to ask questions, post pics, videos, and share your love of your dog with the world. In these Channels there is expert advice, step by step training guides and handouts and more importantly real life experiences.  3 Share with the community about you and your dog We encourage you to introduce yourself and your pet or pets. Share and be active by posting photos or videos, your goals, challenges, and especially let’s celebrate any progress and achievements together.

record.Creator: Tribus Elementis
record.Title: Wireless campervan electric system
record.Text: ADCOUT is a wireless 12/24V switch that includes advanced features. This is developed for the control of electronic devices in campervans and 4x4s. With a simple Android application, you can control up to eight devices, monitor the current consumed by each of them and check the battery voltage.ADCOUT stands for Adjustable DC OUTputs.It was designed to be quick and easy to install. The system is ready to operate, no configuration is necessary.ADCOUT can be supplied with a voltage ranging from 10 to 30 V, so you can use either a 12V or 24V battery. Each of the eight outputs can be controlled and monitored individually. Using the app, you can ajust the output power and check current consumption. Here is an example simulating a LED light connected to one output of the board : Here is a more precise description of the application :The device includes two USB chargers. Each USB power supply is generated by a high efficiency 5V converter.Security is an integral part of the system. It will be used in a vehicle, then it is essential to avoid any risk of fire or even overheating. This is why there are nine fuses to avoid overcurrent: The system has a temperature sensor to detect any overheating.You will receive you ADCOUT ready to work. Altough it is very easy to use, we will provide a complete user manual and a guide to help you comply with the standards.You have the choice of three options :ADCOUT datasheet can be donwloaded here.If you have any question, feel free to join the facebook group by clicking here.Credits :

record.Creator: Jacob
record.Title: SCHOOLED℠
record.Text: SCHOOLED℠ is a digital service which seeks to reinvent learning for the next generation students by offering videos created by teachers and creators from across the nation. We believe that the ability for students to pair themselves with a myriad of teaching styles grants them a greater opportunity to understand material and be more confident in their coursework.Using SCHOOLED℠, teachers can post short videos about important components of a topic to a subject-specific feed that is viewed by students who are looking for assistance. Students may search for a topic they don't understand, or simply have videos related to that weeks coursework recommended to them, and scroll through a feed of videos to find one that suits them best. Students can rate videos for others, leave feedback on the content for the teacher, and even ask questions for clarification. We also hope teachers will view posts by other teachers for fresh inspiration in their own classroom. Every user in our community has the ability to network with each other one on one or in groups to discuss topics using our chat feature.We wish to use the campaign money to support our upcoming pilot program, as we will be launching our service in local New England High School to understand its effectiveness across a variety of measures and increase our attractiveness to investors and schools. This money will be specifically used to pay the content creators on the platform to reward them for aiding not only us, but the next generation of learners, through our service. If you want to learn more about us, our website is https://schooled.info/We are a team of 5 students currently attending Northeastern University in Boston with varying backgrounds with one common goal: work for the betterment of education. The money raised from our campaign will be used to compensate educators financially for their hard work, as well as launch and maintain our software for our upcoming pilot program in January.

record.Creator: Sniffy Labs Inc.
record.Title: Sniffy App: A Personal Dog Trainer in Your Pocket
record.Text:
Create a loving companion not a statistic.In the U.S., about 1.5 million dogs enter shelters each year because of behavioral issues, and about 350,000 of them end up being euthanized. Those dogs were loved once, but some of their owners didn’t know how to prevent the behavioral issues that made life unbearable for both of them. Even though training is essential for having a happy pet-owning family, many owners cannot find the time or support for the training their dog needs.That’s why we made the Sniffy App: to help create a loving companion not a statistic. You get clear guidance and personalized support you need in training, right on your phone.A Revolution in Dog TrainingThe Sniffy app puts a professional dog trainer in your pocket. Build a better lifetime bond with your furry buddy and tackle the most common issues with the help of structured, personalized, positive reinforcement training. Now, you don’t have to add to your hectic day by scheduling training classes or searching through endless videos online. You can create a customizable training plan for you and your dog’s specific needs, and get all the guidance and personalized support you need in each training session, right on your phone.* For more details about our planed training content for Sniffy 2.0, check out the Training Topics section on this page 👇👇👇Each dog learns differently and each owner has different training goals. That’s why Sniffy lets you create a customizable plan where you choose the training topics that fit your dog and interest you most instead of forcing you into one general training plan.Dogs are smart and can learn more than one thing at a time. You can help your dog become a happy and polite pup with our core training topics including “Basic Manners,” “Polite Walking,” “Reliable Recall,” etc. We also have content for basic management of behaviors like barking and jumping. Sniffy includes special topics such as “Puppy's First Lessons” for new puppy owners and “Enrichment” for owners who have energetic dogs that need more exercise as well. We provide you with the essentials no matter where your new buddy comes from and what age they are.Not sure what skills to learn and practice in your training session? Wondering how often and how long you should practice to achieve your goals? Do you know what to do if your dog doesn’t learn as fast as the dog in the video? Sniffy has got you covered.Training definitely takes time, and you need to be consistent for the best results. With Sniffy, you can easily plan your daily training session based on our suggestions, your dog’s performance and progress, or your interest and time. We help you establish a routine and achieve your end goal progressively. When things don’t work out right away, you can always refer to the "Not Working?" section in the app.Your training session is made up of watching video tutorials and practicing with your dog. Each tutorial includes a video as well as written instructions. Each of them is designed to teach you how to take baby steps toward success. Nothing more, nothing less. Our trainers and dogs will guide you through your plan and keep you motivated with their energy and demonstrated accomplishments. You will see the science behind positive reinforcement training instead of punishment, and learn how to apply these techniques yourself. You’ll even be able to use them to create your own tricks!You are not alone in your training. We know training can be tough, but we're here to help you out! We have certified trainers like Greg here, standing by to reach via the app and email.
     Sniffy Labs' Co-founders, Howard and Ting, are best friends and have worked together for 5 years since their graduate program of Human-Computer Interaction at Rochester Institute of Technology. Howard majored in Computer Science at National Tsing Hua University, and worked as a Research Assistant at its Large-scale System Architecture Laboratory and published 2 papers on IEEE with other authors. Ting majored in Software Engineering at Sichuan University and worked as a web designer for startups in China before coming to the U.S..Erica Wang focuses on Business Development and was top sales at AcBel with over 10 years of experience. Our developer Larry has a Ph.D. in Bioinformatics and is a lecturer at Taiwan Institute for Information Industry, with 8-year experience as full stack developer. The other engineer, Jim, has 6-year experience as a back-end developer. We also have 3 great certified dog trainers with years of training experience and are super passionate about this project.At Sniffy, we all currently have our own pets and grew up with pets. Most importantly, we share a love for animals and acumen for technology. We believe that we can help pawrents build a lifetime bond with their pets through technology.Our Training ExpertsGreg FieteBecky ReneRebecca GiannavolaYou'll be able to activate your Sniffy App Membership within three months after the official launch of Sniffy 2.0. You won't be able to pause the membership once activated. You'll get full access to all current and future content and membership features if you choose one of the lifetime membership packages. We have several participating shelters, and we'll send you a photo proof of delivery of the free memberships given to shelter dogs. Thank you for your support! For the portrait, we'll be in touch soon after our campaign ends successfully. Depending on the number of portrait orders we receive, the delivery time may not be guaranteed to be January 2022. We'll work hard to try to get you the portrait as soon as we can.Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you are an organization and are interested in big packages.Get your unique referral link here:  https://forms.gle/oEQr23o4mhdFdjE18 Want to help us spread the word on social media? We'd really appreciate it!It started with one stray catOne day in December of 2014, what started as an average day for me, was horrible for ZaiZai. The first time I laid eyes on my cat, he had just been run over by a car. Seeing him struggle to the median with his front paws dragging his bloody back legs behind him, I stood shocked by the fight in him. I decided I would take care of him until his last day.As much as I saved ZaiZai that day, over time he saved me by shining a light on my future. After years of not knowing my purpose, taking care of him made me realize what I wanted was simply to help create better relationships between humans and animals. I wanted all animals, not just humans, to live with dignity and receive better care. ZaiZai inspired me to leverage the power of technology to improve pet care.With this goal in mind, I came to the U.S. to pursue a master’s degree in Human-Computer Interaction at Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT). There I met my best friend, Ting. We worked together well on school projects and got good grades, but my heavy workload of school projects never got in the way of my ultimate dream.My first idea of serving pets through technology was to build an app to make dog walking more fun. I knew that while at least two dog walks a day are important for dogs, many owners don’t make the time simply because of boredom. So I asked Ting to join me in developing an app that would motivate owners to walk their dogs. We named it Sniffy.After interviewing 100 dog owners we learned that people would rather focus on their dog than an app while going for a walk together, and many of them mentioned behavioral issues that got in the way of enjoying that time and others. We pivoted our idea of a dog walking app into a dog training app. To turn the idea into a real product so it could benefit the most dogs and their families, we took programming and business classes, participated in student accelerators, and interviewed another 300 dog owners and trainers to investigate the current issues with dog training. We found that although many owners know their dogs need training, professional dog training resources are not easy to get. We knew an app could be the answer.We found certified trainers who were passionate about this project and willing to collaborate with us. We made some training videos teaching dogs basic manners, built the beta app, and tested with 50 owners. 39 of them paid for our future product.Our videos were highly applauded for helping dogs learn basic skills. Nearly 60% of testers had tried group training before but found they didn’t work because of distraction in class and both them and their dogs forgetting what to practice afterward. This is where Sniffy shines. Video tutorials show owners exactly what to do anytime and anywhere, and helpful reminders make training more consistent. Our testers saw their dogs’ progress and were very satisfied with the beta app.Sniffy is Proven and Will Get Even BetterPositive feedback from early customers shows that Sniffy has the potential to shape more dogs into adored family members and enrich more owners' lives at the same time. Now our ultimate goal is to provide a platform that integrates training, pet care services, healthcare, nutrition, and other offerings into one streamlined service. We believe a system like this can reduce behavioral issues and pet abandonment and create happier pet-owning families. This is what drives us.You can learn more about us at https://www.sniffy-app.com/about

record.Creator: Angelo
record.Title: PARADIGMA: fight against CLIMATE CHANGE easy way!
record.Text:
It all started when, after a trivial purchase, we wondered if our choice had really been the most sustainable for the climate.  We tried to find an answer but we realized that it is practically impossible in a reasonable time.Therefore PARADIGMA #Pcool was born, the climate sustainability indicator that translates complex information into a visual message of immediate understanding.HOW IT WORKSThe Paradigma indicator is based on the method of calculating greenhouse gas emissions recognized by the international scientific community:GHG ProtocolIt makes it possible to quantify the greenhouse gases emitted by them throughout their value chain.This method identifies 3  emission areas:Scope 1: Direct emissions from sources owned or controlled by it (use of fuels);Scope 2: Indirect emissions from the purchase of electricity, steam, heat;Scope 3: All remaining indirect emissions in the value chain (extraction and production of purchased materials and fuels, emissions from business travel, transport of products and material, waste disposal).This data is made public by companies that have implemented a monitoring system of their greenhouse gas emissions. They are usually found in the annual sustainability reports that companies share with their stakeholders.Sharing all this information is NOT MANDATORY.But even if these data are made public, it is not always easy to compare them.Following the principle of the International Standard, the GRI 305 PARADIGMA makes the comparison simple and understandable to everyone!For more details visit the official website  on the site you can also see a demonstration page of the operation.ROAD MAPStep 1: from idea to product! 
 In this phase we intend to collect the resources to develop the service and consolidate the partnerships. The phase will be closed at the end of 2021. 
Step 2:  Pre launch! 
 At this stage we intend to launch the beta version of the service to all those who have supported us scheduled for June 2022. 
Step 3:  Launch! 
 At this stage it is intended to launch the service to consumers scheduled for November 1, 2022.Tutto è iniziato quando, dopo un banalissimo acquisto, ci siamo chiesti se la nostra scelta fosse stata veramente la più sostenibile per il clima.  Abbiamo provato a trovare una risposta ma ci siamo accorti che è praticamente impossibile in tempi ragionevoli.Ecco dunque che nasce PARADIGMA #Pcool l'indicatore di sostenibilità climatica che traduce informazioni complesse in un messaggio visivo di immediata comprensione.COME FUNZIONA L'INDICATOREL'indicatore Paradigma si basa sul metodo di calcolo delle emissioni di gas serra riconosciuto dalla comunità scientifica internazionale:GHG ProtocolEsso consente di quantificare i gas serra emessi dalle stesse lungo tutta la loro catena del valore.Tale metodo individua 3 ambiti di emissione:Scope 1: Emissioni dirette da sorgenti di proprietà o controllate dalla stessa (utilizzo di combustibili);Scope 2: Emissioni indirette derivanti  dall'acquisto di energia elettrica, vapore, calore;Scope 3: Tutte le restanti emissioni indirette nella catena del valore (estrazione e produzione dei materiali e combustibili acquistati, emissioni dei viaggi di affari, trasporto di prodotti e materiale, smaltimento di rifiuti).Questi dati sono resi pubblici dalle aziende che hanno implementato un sistema di monitoraggio delle proprie emissioni di gas serra. Solitamente si trovano nei report annuali di sostenibilità che le aziende condividono con i propri stakeholder. La condivisione di tutte queste informazioni NON è OBBLIGATORIA. Ma anche se questi dati sono resi pubblici non è sempre semplice il loro confronto.Seguendo il principio dello Standard internazionale il GRI 305 PARADIGMA rende il confronto semplice e comprensibile a tutti!Per maggiori dettagli visita il sito ufficiale sul sito potrai anche vedere una pagina dimostrativa del funzionamento.ROAD MAPFase 1:da idea a prodotto!
      In questa fase si intende raccogliere le risorse per sviluppare il servizio e consolidare le partnership. La fase verrà chiusa a fine 2021.
Fase 2:Pre lancio!
      In questa fase si intende lanciare la versione beta del servizio a tutti quelli che ci hanno sostenuto  previsto per giugno 2022. 
Fase 3:Lancio!
      In questa fase si intende lanciare il servizio ai consumatori previsto per il primo novembre 2022.

record.Creator: TR Life Style
record.Title: M-9: World’s First Dome-Shaped Ergonomic Nose Hair Trimmer
record.Text: Over 85 million Americans use electric/battery-powered razors, and the US market size for razors is up to 4 billion dollars. These numbers are reflected as people started to gain interest in taking care of their outer looks, accelerating the growth of the men's grooming market. This phenomenon will grow the demands for shaving products and the whole men's grooming market in general. And the beauty industry, like these, will focus more on the detailing section of men's beauty. Amongst all the possible products, nose hair trimming is one of them.People seldomly use nose hair trimmers instead of using their hands, scissors, or wax to take care of their nose hair. But they do not seem to satisfy the user's expectations most of the time. Instead of actually trimming your nose hair, plucking is not going to fill your needs anymore. And nonetheless, plucking your nose hair is very dangerous.There may be times where the sharp blades might poke and scratch the inside of your nose. Experts warn the public that nose hair plucking is quite dangerous. The assistant professor for ENT at the Columbia University Medical Center, Jason A Moche, stated that since the human nose sucks in dust every day in a vacuum, plucking one's nose hair might put the individual at risk of infection.An individual might look very appealing Just by keeping yourself clean and calm. With M-9's light, portable, simple, and curvy dome-shaped design, users are free from the threat of hurting themselves due to the absence of a mirror. The world's first ergonomically designed dome-shaped design will keep you safe and slick. Meet the innovative nose hair trimmer M-9 that will make you the gentlemen you dream of.ㅤ ㅤWe all have hurt the inside of our nose trying to pluck out our nose hair with sharp scissors or tweezers.  But they do not really get the job done and hurt our nose badly.The M-9 was designed with ergonomics and safety in mind with its dome-shaped structure, making the blades invisible externally. With its soft curved line finish, the users will not feel uncomfortable, and they will also be free from the threats of a sharp blade. Also, by coating the dome-shaped nets with nickel, it is upgraded to ensure our user's safety and sanitation.The dome-shaped structure brings another level of safety by preventing the blades from making direct contact with any parts of our body. Also, since it was designed with a dome shape, it prevents the users from accidentally sticking the device deeply inside their noses. (Providing a more comfortable shaving/trimming experience)The dome-shaped heads and their blades provide a super high precision cutting, drastically decreasing the chances of pinching or scratching the skin. Also, since it is made with stainless steel, the M-9 is extraordinarily durable and economical, with no need for frequent replacements to be made.When removing nose hair, the highest priority is how fast and precisely you can remove them.The M-9 is upgraded with the 8700 RPM motor from the 7100 RPM Motor from M-7(our previous model). With this upgrade, the M-9 is equipped with the most powerful motor, providing a more delicate and precise trimming with a high-speed centrifugal cut.M-9 is only 12.5X2.5X2.5cm and 54g big. Due to its lightweight and size that would perfectly fit in our palms, the M-9 is way lighter than other electric shavers. The M-9 also comes with its own carrying case, enabling users to carry it around to keep their fresh looks.Also, there is no need for extra charging. A AA battery is good enough to provide power for prolong usage. It will take care of your hair with just a touch of a buttonGrooming is needed for every part of your body. The M-9's usage is not only limited to nose hair but, it can also be used for ears, mustache, eyebrows, and sideburns. If you have that cool mustache then, design it with more precision. They can all be done without expert help if you have M-9.As this is a product that is inserted in our nose, we took extra precautions on sanitation. The M-9 is splash-proof, and it can be cleaned by just rinsing it with water. After shaving, just simply insert the head of the device, and it will clean automatically.If you would like to really deep clean your M-9, use the cleaning brush provided with the package. Now, you are ready to keep your blades clean and sanitary, 24/7.Unlike other ordinary nose hair trimmers that are just round in shape, the M-9 is round with straight and edged lines. These were done to provide a better grip with an ergonomic design. With this unique design, the M-9 will not roll over your countertop. (Or it can even be kept standing up)By selecting non-glare black plastic, the M-9 has a modern and minimalistic look. The M-9 is the ultimately designed shaver for you.* Warning: When rinsing the device after disassembling the dome-head, be cautious as the blade might slip out.With our experience and technology in developing beauty appliances, we developed our own nose hair trimmer. We did not settle on just a single development, but we came up with a much safer and sanitary nose hair trimmer based on our customer's feedback and technological improvements.TR lifestyle. Inc is a beauty appliance brand with 60 years of experience and technology. To provide our products with more safety and bring them up to perfection, we are only manufacturing our products by hand. Our patented dome-shaped structure, cutting-edge technology, and sophisticated designs have opened up a new paradigm for nose hair trimmers. And will present the world with innovative products.All products will be sent out after thorough inspections are carried out by our Q&A advisor. But even if there were malfunctions found on the device, please do not hesitate to contact customer support. Please submit your request/ concern to contact.trlifestyle@gmail.comPlease check 2 things before contacting customer service. The device might not be functioning due to a dead battery. Please replace the battery and recheck if the device would turn on. Also, try running the device without the dome-shaped nets. If the dome-shaped net is damaged, the blades might get stuck on the net and stop running. In this case, the dome-shaped nets can be replaced separately, and the device will be good to go.

record.Creator: Chichi the magic door opener.
record.Title: Chichi:Technology helping Pet’s and their Owners!
record.Text: Chichi the magic door opener.LONG DAYS AT THE OFFICE CAN BE TOUGH ON YOUR FOUR-LEGGED BEST FRIEND, WHO HAVE NO ONE THERE TO LET THEM OUTSIDE FOR A POTTY BREAK OR A CHANCE TO RUN AROUND THE BALCONY OR THE BACKYARD. THAT'S WHERE CHICHI THE MAGIC DOOR OPENER COMES IN. DON'T GET UP TO LET YOUR PETS OUT.The CHICHI magic door opener,a product targeted at pet owners,can be controlled by a mobile app,smart speakers,and integrations with smart camera and sensors.LONG DAYS AT THE OFFICE CAN BE TOUGH ON YOUR FOUR-LEGGED BEST FRIEND, WHO HAVE NO ONE THERE TO LET THEM OUTSIDE FOR A POTTY BREAK OR A CHANCE TO RUN AROUND THE BALCONY OR THE BACKYARD. THAT'S WHERE CHICHI THE MAGIC DOOR OPENER COMES IN.We have now reached the stage of a complete functional prototype. The next step is to move to mass production, being capable of producing many units, with all the same level of quality. This requires important investment, to create molds, prepare assembly, and secure components which usually have large MOQ (Minimum Order Quantities). The pre-orders secured here will help us go through this first stage, but that's not all.By pledging on kickstarter, you are showing us that you share our vision and enthousiasm for saving animals from separation Anxiety and help pets and pets owner stay connected. You will participate in the development of this product, give your feedback and suggestions on this version.We invite you to take-off with us as cabin crew for this fantastic journey, building the future of Chichi the magic door opener.Thank you.Luis Garcia Santuntun.Product Developer.

record.Creator: HeliEngadin
record.Title: Regenerated TB47 and TB48 batteries
record.Text: Back when released in 2014, the Inspire 1 was the first professional drone that allowed many more people to enter the UAV world for aerial photography and video shooting, without requiring high level skills on electronics and informatics that were the key for professional aircrafts at the time: it did just work.Countless camera operators and directors based their fleet on this powerful machinery, leveraging the ecosystem of gimbaled cameras, lenses and accessories that offered great versatility at a reasonable cost.In our company we still use and fly the Inspire 1 regularly as today, and we believe that’s still one of the most utilised drone worldwide; the reliability of this platform compared to its successor is drastically higher, and in a world of continuos, poorly-tested software updates, the fact that for years there were no more firmware upgrades is almost reassuring. Funny, isn't it?Unfortunately, DJI decided to forget this entire platform in favour of it's successor, the inspire 2, and with this, discontinue essential spare parts as the TB47 and TB48 batteries.This leds to the grounding of thousands of perfectly working drones, and all the money invested in this ecosystems by many businesses around the globe is flushed down the toilet with themAlso, in this era of environmental awareness, where everything needs to be rethinked to cope with sustainability needs, it is not acceptable to throw in the trash such good electronic parts, generating more unnecessary e-waste.Hating this unbelievable situation, we decided to research and work on regenerating the precious batteries on our own.As designers and manufacturers of electronic devices for a while, we went throught the rabbit hole of figuring out what is rotting badly in old batteries, why they stop working, perform poorely or even swell up.Inside a TB47, TB48 and in general any other smart lithium battery you see around you, there is a big pack of lithium cells, and an electronic BMS that manages charging, discharging, balancing, temperature control and charge level.The part that usually wears out with time and use is the cell pack; just replace it and... well, no.First of all, the cells used in drones are very high performance, as they need to pack an enormous amount of energy in a very confined space, and operate over a very wide temperature window.Then they are not in standard sizes, in fact standards don't even apply to lithium packs; we would need a custom made cell pack, assembled with custom made cells. Costly.And finally, when this is sorted out, you need to please the small little brain that is inside the BMS, as he remembers the old, worn out cells; you need to introduce him his new partner, the new pack that is now as powerful as the original one he was shipped out with.You'd reckon all of this requires a non-trivial amount of research and development, some guesswork and a crazy amount of testing, in order to ensure everything is working and the various parts are playing nicely together.And don't forget, even opening up these batteries is not a simple job, unless you want to end up with broken clips or warped plastics.... we did it!We figured out the BMS.We designed the cells to fit into the casing.We streamlined the production workflow.And we are starting to manufacture the cells! And this is also where the fun ends.We do need to set up a production run for several hundreds of batteries, as we now manufacture the cells manually, which costs us a lot in terms of labour and materials.TB47 line is already up and running, and it costed A LOT. But at least, we can regenerate your batteries right now!We also managed to gather a decent amount of old TB47 and regenerate them, so if you want to purchase them, we have them in stock!But for TB48, we cannot sustain the hand-crafting of cells anymore; the other parts of the regeneration process, which include opening, disassembly, cleaning, testing and reassembly, are still necessarily performed by our skilled operators, but at least the cell production needs to be automated.Ours is a small company, but the KopterMax brand is quite well known in the drone industry; we've been the first manufacturing carbon fiber folding propellers for the Inspire 1 and 2, and the production is still active, with requests from customers happening regularly.When we started regenerating the first batteries, the news run fast, and we have been contacted from all over the world.Of course this has spurred us to create a product with an aesthetic appearance that lives up to expectations, but most importantly, with a very high reliability; we decided to offer a warranty of 6 months or 200 charging cycles, exactly the same as the original manufacturer provided.We are taking care of the entire regeneration process here at the KopterMax HQ in Sankt Mortiz, Switzerland, to ensure that such a delicate and dangerous product is assembled in the safest and most accurate way.Your help will ensure we can start a full production run for the cells, optimising cost and material waste, and guaranteeing a still long life to the Inspire 1 drone family!For each battery you will send in for regeneration, we will discount 20€ (TB47) or 30€(TB48) from the listing price; you can also directly buy regenerated TB47, as we have plenty of stock; TB48 will need to wait for the new cells production run, but every purchase of TB47 will also contribute to the funding!Shipping is calculated separately, but we encourage combining inbound and outbound shipments with your friends or colleagues to save on the cost.Contact us at battery@heliengadin.com for more information about shipping and handling.

record.Creator: Wesmart
record.Title: Wesmart, World’s First 3s Heat Up Jacket W/ Graphene Infused
record.Text: We have been thinking what kind of jacket can be a day to day clothes but with whole bunch of coolest features？We have been thinking what kind of jacket can be a day to day clothes but with whole bunch of coolest features.It can keep you cool in summer and provide you with warmth in winter, just like a flow of air with your skin. It has waterproof, anti-fouling, wind-proof, anti-knife cut, storage bag, face mask, luminous, and good-design as well.Wesmart is the world's first All-Weather Smart jacket. You can wear it to ski in the cold Alps, enjoy the sunshine in Hawaii, get out and explore the Amazon jungle, or as a daily streetwear.                                                                  TravelLiquid nitrogen, at -196℃, can instantly cause frostbite on the skin. With its outstanding cryogenic insulation performance and internal heating system, Wesmart passes the liquid nitrogen insulation test, making it a suitable layer for protection from the most extreme cold.In the past, if you were in the weather of -100°F, you needed to wear something as thick as a bear.Other heated garments leave you feeling too hot or too cold with non-adjustable temperatures. Wesmart adjusts accurately with the App to the perfect temperature that suits any situation.Open the app and preheat your jacket to make it warm before you wear it.100℉-150℉ intelligent heating, support manual and APP two modes.Wesmart is equipped with 4 built-in carbon fiber heating panels. Within 3 seconds, the heaters will begin to warm the jacket and its integrated graphene system will distribute the heat to your body instantly.Graphene is an excellent conductor of heat. It moves heat through its latticed structure, evenly distributing it around your body. In warm weather, it expels heat and wicks away moisture to keep you cool.Wesmart uses a combination of 3 layers of technical fabrics, the first layer is a durable Polyester Fiberc, and the middle layer is a nano-film. Its density is smaller than water molecules and larger than air. It is waterproof and can achieve good breathability. The third layer is graphene, which provides extreme durability and heat conductivity.Wesmart is powered by an external power pack via a USB cable located inside the side pocket. We use the fast-charging battery for the power bank with 6.5V output, it increases 60% of the heating speed when it's under -10°C.Wesmart perfectly combines technology and fashion to create the most futuristic high-performance clothing, providing users with an unprecedented new experience. The essence of science and technology is to serve people. Wesmart follows this principle and explores the relationship between clothing and body to establish a brand-new balance-sensory technology that is applied to all-weather travel, skin sensation, and sports experiences. Our designs create a new layer of intelligent technology for human beings.

record.Creator: Gaia Rovetti
record.Title: Decastream
record.Text: Imagine how nice it would be to experience shopping in shops you want independently from the time and place where you are!With Decastream it will be possible...!- Thanks to our app, online shopping will be improved through a simple, secure and effective service based on face-to-face video calls with store vendors.With Decastream you can go from the shops of your city to most beautiful and famous shops around the world, thus going to feel the same feelings as if you were physically there thanks to an immersive shopping experience, which will be able to involve you to such an extent that you believe that you really are inside the store you selected!Nowadays, as time goes by, we are moving more and more towards a digitalised world, where, however, man is not placed at the centre of this phenomenon, and about 40% of Europeans agree on this; we of the team in fact, with our app we expect to offer people who want it the possibility to live a simpler and better life, where innovation goes according the needs and characteristics of people, progressing more and more towards an anthropocentric direction.... but how? All this is based on the creation of a human relationship during the online shopping, satisfying so the human needs and putting every people at the center of the purchasing process, regardless of the time and place where they are thus offering a long series of benefits. #Comfort   With us you can live the shopping experience in the stores you want independently of the time and place where you are; moreover we will simplify the life of the people with disabilities making them live the shopping experience as if they were in stores physically.#Goodbyedoubts   Thanks to the presence of an expert during the video call, you will have an overview of the products at 360º compared to the "classic" e-commerce whose information about the products can sometimes be limited and not exhaustive.#Wlocaleconomy   With our platform you can decide to buy remotely in the shops of your city and surroundings, thus being able to support the local economy that is put more and more to the test by multinationals, without sacrificing the pleasure of online shopping.#Timesaving   With Decastream you can save a lot of time, for example avoiding the queues at the checkout or the journey by car.#Fakedistance   You will be able to take a tour of the various shops around the world, test and buy products that are not present in your country, just as if you were physically there.While with a minimum donation of 49€ you can decide to get the beautiful "Basic" t-shirt in limited edition; otherwise you have the possibility to exploit about the amazing offer of 249€, to obtain the incredible and inimitable "Premium" shirt also in limited edition signed by all the team members, but not only that...  in fact you will have also the opportunity to participate in an exclusive live event with all team members, where you can talk with us and ask us questions!And as if that weren't enough, at the same time we will also give you the opportunity to get the limited edition "Gold Pass" with a minimum donation of 110€, which will allow you to have the account recognized as a gold level supporter, but not only, in fact you will have the access at the same time to many additional benefits and features on the app!Or if you want to get the best, with a minimum donation of 220€ we will give you the occasion to get the "Platinum Pass" also in limited edition, which will allow you to have the account recognized as a platinum level supporter and guaranteeing you all the benefits and features of who has the "Gold Pass"; but not only that ... in fact you will have also the opportunity to participate in an exclusive live event with all team members, where you can talk with us and ask us questions! Keep in mind that once this campaign is over, you will never have the opportunity to buy our passes again; we made this decision because the passes are for us, mainly a symbol of recognition, for the people who have allowed the creation of this platform and who consequently will receive in future, in addition to the additional features on the app also a special treatment from us!Also by supporting this project you will help to create a platform that will go to the aid of people with disabilities giving them the opportunity to have a better life even when we talk about shopping... This campaign contains a development plan of over 3 years where we will face different phases, in particular the following ones;–  Pre Launch (expected duration, 2 months): this phase starts as soon as finished the campaign and represents the part before the launch. Mainly in this phase we will solve the bureaucratic aspects, we will look for 2 programmers to complete the team, we will realize an advertising campaign and we will finish the application. –  2022, 2023, 2024: during these 3 years we will release updates to make the application more efficient and functional, also bringing additional features that will further improve the user experience; we will also follow a precise and wasteful advertising strategy, to bring on our platform the best stores around the world.Clearly as every project also ours presents risks, but the good news is that the hardest part of the work has already been done, we are also very confident that our team will be able to manage every problem that will arise in the future. The team is young, it has a lot of experience, a lot of will to do and moreover it has already collaborated together in the creation of another application.

record.Creator: Mammoth Interactive
record.Title: The Complete 2022 Web Development + Machine Learning Bundle
record.Text: Do you want to be ahead of the curve?Do you want your business to have the best looking and best functioning website possible?Do you want to expand your programming knowledge to levels you hadn't even considered before?More Importantly, do you want your most desired web development job in the near future?With this brand new 135+ hour course, we will teach you all the essential and advanced skills and abilities that you WILL need to get further in the Web Development and overall technology Industry!This 45+ course bundle is suitable from complete beginners to more advanced developers seeking for more and ranges from small projects to large complex apps that you will create!All the way from Website Development to Database Creation and Management, and even learn some 3D game development using JavaScript!Start off with simple but in-depth steps with a multitude of courses and projects made for you!Learn more complex programming concepts with WordPress for website and app development.The App Development courses in Level 3 require a Mac computer running macOS 10.15+ or a PC running a macOS Virtual Machine to use Xcode.And don't forget our Legacy Content:We'll walk you through, step-by-step how to get all the software installed and set up.Welcome to The Complete 2022 Web Development Bootcamp. Our Brand new course that you need to learn Website creation and development. With over 50,000 reviews, our courses are some of the HIGHEST RATED courses online!This masterclass is without a doubt the most comprehensive course available anywhere online. Even if you have zero experience, this course will take you from beginner to professional.We'll take you step-by-step through engaging video tutorials and teach you everything you need to know to  succeed as a data analyst, machine learning specialist or similar.The course includes 1080p HD video tutorials and builds your knowledge while making real-world projects.How do I obtain a certificate?Each certificate in this bundle is only awarded after you have completed every lecture of the course.Many of our students post their Mammoth Interactive certifications on LinkedIn. Not only that, but you will have projects to show employers  on top of the certification.Is this an eBook or videos?The majority of this course bundle will be video tutorials (screencasts of practical coding projects step by step.) We will also have source code, PDFs and PowerPoints.Can't I just learn via Google or YouTube?This course is much more streamlined and efficient than learning via  Google or YouTube. We have curated a massive 5-course curriculum to take you from absolute beginner to starting a high-paying career in Web Developing.How will I practice to ensure I'm learning?With each section there will be a project, so if you can build the  project along with us you are succeeding. There is also a challenge  at the end of each section that you can take on to add more features to the project and advance the project in your own time.Read more FAQs in the FAQ tab.Mammoth Interactive's mission is to close the tech skills gap by providing affordable and accessible courses primarily targeting beginners. Our instructors make video tutorials that are practical  and to the point. Learning at Mammoth Interactive will be the next  step to improving your career and your life.Upon completing each course in this bundle, you'll receive a Completion Certificate. You can feature this certificate on  your resume and LinkedIn.

record.Creator: NES+
record.Title: RED SOCIAL PARA PERSONAS CON VIH
record.Text: Nes+ será La primera Red Social  pensada por personas con VIH para personas con VIH. Hacer planes con nuevos amigos, ayudar a la comunidad, encontrar el amor, viajar o incluso contactos profesionales, son algunas de las infinidades de cosas que los usuarios podrán experimentar en la nueva red social.La idea surgió al ver la necesidad que tenemos para relacionarnos, crear nuevos amigos que nos entiendan y compartan las mismas preocupaciones. record.Creator: X-ONE
record.Title: X-ONE - Meet the World’s First 3D-Print Razor
record.Text: The X-ONE 3D-Print Razor is the first and only of its kind in the world at the moment. With a 3D-printed resin lightweight handle that feels like it was made to be held by you, meanwhile, the handles look elegant and can be customized by yourself with your own 3D printer. X-ONE puts the power of every shave into your hands – with a DIY razor that you can assemble yourself and make your own.Most conventional razors on the market today are built using aluminum alloy, and one of the biggest problems with that is that it’s exceptionally uncomfortable to use in winter. It’s heavy, it’s cold, it’s simply unpleasant. And you deserve better.We’re boldly steppe into your bathroom and transforming your shaving routine once and for all, with an advanced shaving innovation built from photosensitive resin. A hollow design is light in your hands, empowering you to groom and pamper in innovative style.We know we said it already, but we can’t reiterate it enough. You cannot truly comprehend the comfort and power of a photosensitive resin razor (built using the latest HALS polymer technology, which has peculiarity of high toughness and hardness) until you’ve put it to the test yourself. And once you have, you’ll never go back.While most conventional razors are heavy and leave you with itchy, unsightly razor burn, X-ONE features a ground-breaking 6-layer precision blade, leveraging advanced Sandvik technology produced in the heart of sweden. In fact, men just like you have confirmed with this razor can and will last 3 times longer than regular blades. A worthy investment? We think so!Each tri-blade set contains two blades a piece, with a fine 0.85 mm distance between each blade and 1.4 mm distance between each set – guaranteeing the most efficient and effective shave of your life.Every sweep of this bad boy feels like it was designed for your face. Everyone is unique, which is why we’ve designed X-ONE’s head to be 30°+10°. In other words: while the handle is fixed to 30°,the ergonomic head can be adjusted by 10° depending on the shape and different parts of your face. This promises a unique and cleanest shaving experience you will not find anywhere else.X-ONE packs in one hell of a punch for such a light razor. Its hollow design is based on humankind’s natural grippe style, making it more comfortable and natural to use without feeling heavy in your hands.X-ONE will never slip and slide around when smothered in shaving foam. A comfortable yet firm grip keeps your razor right where it’s supposed to be – firmly in your grasp.Don’t know where to store your razor in-between shaves? Neither did we. Conquer the chaos in your bathroom with a magnetic handle and stand that keeps your X-ONE safely stored for next time while ensuring efficient water drainage that prevents bacterial growth. With advanced magnetic storage like this, you’ll never be fumbling around to find your razor again. Perfect for those busy mornings when you need to clean up – fast. Moreover, any steel shelves can also be used to store the X-ONE, no matter standing or simply hang on it. In this way, the head will be even more hygiene.Cleaning X-ONE takes only a few seconds, so you can get on with your day. A quick rinse will remove any stains and germs in a flash, all thanks to its special array of blades.There’s no need to buy a whole new razor if your current head is worse for wear. Simply pop it out in a snap with one single press, and replace it in moments. We recommend doing so every two month.X-ONE puts you in control of every shave. With a 3D-printed handle and all the data included, you can customize your style, color, and look and feel if you have your own 3D printer. We share all data for the head and connector so you can do your thing, and the material is compatible with most other materials on the market – from liquid photosensitive resin to ABS resin and beyond.(After the project is over, users who purchase X-ONE will contact us to provide the tracking number to obtain the print data of the X-ONE handle. You can also contact us by email: jiapeng.yu@ubunnys.com, we will provide you with after-sales and answers)X-ONE’s data is compatible with 99% of FDM 3D printers out there – including creality  3D, Aurora 3D, and Raise 3D.X-one 3D printing razor uses the innovative new material plasto 1000, a resin with high elongation and excellent flexibility, and has special treatment on the surface. Therefore, x-one 3D printing razor has good corrosion resistance, impact resistance and other properties.Ubunnys is an innovative health appliance company dedicated to redefining health and pursuing a better future.Ubunnys is funded by employees of the world's top 500 companies. In the last a few years, it has won an IF award and many other domestic and foreign awards. We focus on health appliances and the comprehensive solutions assisted by Internet of Things and Artificial Intelligence.We integrate new manufacturing methods, combine hardware and software to form a new ecosystem of health science and technology.Ubunnys has released the U-ONE series of massage products, and in 2020, we, with the joint scientific and technological innovation company scrat, create mass-produced 3D-print razors, 3D-print massage pillows and other innovative products.Share this link to social platforms and get 10% cash back.

record.Creator: ADDPLUS
record.Title: HiiTCHECK: Hospital-Grade Thermometer & Temperature Analysis
record.Text:
The current pandemic has taught us that something as simple as measuring our body temperature can tell us a lot about what condition our body is in. Even the slightest changes in our temperature can allow us to make informed choices such as whether we have to socially distance.  Although we may not need a thermometer everywhere we go, do you readily have access to one when you need it?  With the HIITCHECK, you only need 1 second. We understand that speed may not be a priority for most cases, but if an emergency arises, HIITCHECK will be there to give you the information you need as fast as possible. HiiTCHECK focused on development for two years to resolve consumers' distrust of existing non-contact thermometers especially when it comes to temperature measurement accuracy.Research and development was carried out to obtain a high-accuracy body temperature value by blocking the product's own heat and readings of non-relevant external temperature. Finally, after three rounds of product development, we were able to create the perfect infrared sensor that drastically minimized the margin of error. Now, we would like to present this technology to our Kickstarter backers before we fully release this to the general public. Most consumer-grade thermometers have large margins of error because they do not take into consideration the specific emissivity value of human skin. Therefore, accuracy of results will vary when using a single generic device to measure the temperature of variety of things.   HIITCHECK has maximized its accuracy and minimized the margin of error by developing a measurement algorithm that specifically takes human skin emissivity into account while measuring body temperature.The blackbody is  high-precision calibrator for the calibration of infrared thermometers. For the verification of medical thermometers, the temperature must be verified by a blackbody. ADDPLUS has received certification for the HIITCHECK through this method. Time of Flight Distance Sensor – The high-precision laser distance sensor will begin measuring the body temperature of a person once it is positioned within 3~5cms (1.2 ~ 1.9 inches) away from the skin. When the temperature sensor is out of range, HIITCHECK will send an alarm via vibration to notify the user to move closer or further away.THE FDA recommends when using non-contact infrared thermometers to measure either the forehead, temples, or behind the ears. HIITCHECK should not be used to measure body temperature via wrist readings, but if necessary, should be used on blood-flowing arteries.HiiTCHECK APP INCLUDED Did you know that everyone has a different average body temperature?With the HiiTCHECK thermometer, you can check the trend of your body temperature, and analyze the patterns to proactively maintain a healthy condition.Up to 5 guardians can automatically receive and share the records of one HiiTCHECK user. The HiiTCHECK app can also connect to Google Maps so that you can find the nearest hospitals and pharmacies.*All information stored through the HiiTCHECK app is available only to you.  Temperature management’ is the due diligence that we must all take when it comes to basic self care. The HiiTCHECK thermometer & app provides services that can be valuable to many different types of people. You can select and use the functions that are most convenient and suitable to your needs. Ex: Men who want a feature that automatically records their body temperature. Women who want to check their ovulation cycle. Young adults in their 20s and 30s who are active in staying up to date about their health condition during global health crises
 HIITCHECK is about the size of an Apple Air pods case and has been intentionally designed to be small so that you can take it on the go or place it in areas that will make it readily accessible to you at any point in time.HIITCHECK can be extremely handy on trips that may put a lot of stress on your body. We recommend taking the HIITCHECK with you when traveling, camping, or going on overnight business trips.Simply attach it to the back of your smartphone and use it as a cradle or carry it with you in case your condition happens to deteriorate while you’re away from home. HIITCHECK can be plugged in to your smartphone via a USB-C. Your phone will act as the power supply and automatically turn on the thermometer for immediate use.Since the HIITCHECK uses a USB-C, our thermometer may not work with certain Apple devices since they may use a lightning cable. Apple devices also require a separate (Made For iPhone) certification which we currently do not have.1. HiiT CHECK Thermometer Body2. Ring-type Holder & Case3. Sticker For Smartphone Attachment x24. User Manual & Product Warranty Card *The LCD screen will turn off 10 seconds after the temperature values are displayed on the screen**Caution: Do not use excessive force to adjust the angle of the ring or case. Although the case can be attached to the back of the smartphone, there is still a possibility that it may fall off. We are a company that develops health care products that can be beneficial to an individual’s daily life. Established in 2018, we developed a biosignal monitoring service through joint research and development with KEPCO KDN and K-Bio Health, and performed various government-supported R&D tasks. Our first product, HIITCHECK, was certified as a non-contact thermometer medical device in Korea and was first presented at the Korea International Medical & Hospital Equipment Show (KIMES). We attended Bio Korea 2021, and we plan to showcase our products at MEDICA2021.

record.Creator: Annabel
record.Title: Wisdom Applied
record.Text: Hello,We are Wisdom Applied and we are passionate about people becoming their best version of themselves in all areas of  their lives. So we decided to create an app the allows people to share and receive knowledge on a platform that is both free to use and free to voice your thoughts.We are living in a day and age where people are reflecting on their lives and questioning should they be do more (especially as we see the 'Great Resignation taking place) and we would love to assist in your journey to becoming your best self whether that is in your finances, health, spiritual life, relationship and more.The platform does this by allowing users to view content in their desired area, watch live events on timely topics, gives you access to a plethora of related books & resources and allows you to connect with people on the same journey so you can watch your life improve.There are platforms out there but few are dedicated to personal improvement and knowledge sharing and this is our passion at Wisdom Applied.

record.Creator: Brandon Darnall
record.Title: Pool Rides
record.Text: Welcome to the Pool Rides Kickstarter! We're a new branch of carpooling devoted to expanding reliable transportation and making it safe and secure with a free-to-download mobile platform. Our platform is built on my co-founders' and my vision to make ridesharing accessible and enjoyable for users in all U.S. municipalities. Ridesharing in its current state is virtually featureless for enhancing the safety or enjoyability of a user's trip experience. Unfortunately, it has prevented many from reaching their destination peacefully. We want to eliminate awkward interactions among drivers and riders and bring users together based on what they have in common. Each trip on our platform is conducted by matching users by the compatibility of their profiles made up of their  interests and trip preferences. That's only scratching the surface of what we offer though. We've also created a model that maximizes the earnings for drivers and eliminates excessive fees and price surges for riders. We can also guarantee the safety of our rides will be far superior to our competitors by using groundbreaking technology to provide live route monitoring, user authentication, and immediate emergency service access. Check out our website www.poolrides.com to learn more. If you're interested, but don't want to pay anything (yet), that's okay! You can still apply for our waitlist on our "Sign Up" page to receive updates and be notified of when our app releases!

record.Creator: Christian López
record.Title: TuAyudaXpress
record.Text: Imagina que tienes una fuga de agua en tu casa o una falla eléctrica, a quien vas a llamar?, en quien le puedes dar la confianza de entrar en tu hogar?Existe una gran cantidad de trabajadores independientes que ofrecen sus servicios y también una gran cantidad de personas que buscan de ellos, TuAyudaXpress®, es un enlace entre el Cliente y la persona adecuada a tus necesidades.TuAyudaXpress®, muestra una valoración del Trabajador Independiente que fue calificada posteriormente por cada Cliente de acuerdo a la calidad de sus servicios. De esta forma cada vez que tú busques un servicio puedas encontrar a la persona que cumpla con tus expectativas.TuAyudaXpress®, se crea a partir de la idea de dar un servicio a la sociedad para ayudar a generar mayores fuentes de empleo  con trabajadores independientes y capacitados.TuAyudaXpress®, fomenta la iniciativa de los trabajadores  independientes que desean aprender y capacitarse en nuevas áreas, acercándolos a instituciones públicas y privadas encargadas de la formación y certificación de las personas, ayudándolos a mejorar su servicio logrando ser tu mejor opción.Por otro lado, el problema que enfrentan los ofrecedores independientes de servicios (mecánicos, plomeros, jardineros, electricistas, etc.) en la mayoría de las ocasiones carecen de seguridad social, lo que los hace más vulnerable al momento de un accidente, entonces se vuelve imprescindible contar tanto con un seguro de invalidez, un seguro que cubra gastos funerarios entre otras cosas, también necesitan apoyo para poder aprender nuevas profesiones o escuelas que certifique sus conocimientos, por esto TuAyudaXpress® apoyara a los trabajadores a desarrollarse profesionalmente ayudándolos a certificarse y a adquirir nuevos conocimientos en  convenio con empresas externas, al mismo tiempo se les dará una tarjeta medica que los protege con un seguro de invalidez, seguro por fallecimiento accidental, gastos funerarios y también servicio médico telefónico las 24/7, de esta forma, el trabajador podrá estar mas tranquilo y seguro al momento de enfrentar una enfermedad o un accidente

record.Creator: Peterest
record.Title: Peterest: The World's 1st No-Power Scoop-Free Cat Litter Box
record.Text: Love your cat, but hate the unpleasant routine - scooping? If you use a traditional cat litter box, you need to scoop at least once a day, and probably replace the plastic litter box itself at least once a year or wash the box thoroughly with detergent. And then on top of that there’s the unavoidable dust, litter scattered everywhere, and smelly odor all the time.You could go for a fully-automatic cat litter box, but those have to be placed close to the power supply, the noise of the machine may frighten your cat, and what’s worse, you’d be surprised at how many cats are actually die from mechanical failure of those fully-automatic litter boxes.
