Are you growing mushrooms in your closet? How about herbs in your basement? Perhaps you've got flowers in a greenhouse, or some tomatoes in the garden? Whatever it is you're growing, we want to help. After almost 2 years of prototyping, we've decided to launch a Kickstarter campaign to fund and pre-sell the mass-production of Oasis-Grow, our first line of environmental monitoring tools and automated container growing systems for hobbyists gardeners, underground cultivators, and small farmers.  Oasis-Grow, developed by Oasis-X, is our first fleet of products consisting of camera, remote sensing, and environmental control modules aimed to help smaller and medium-sized growers save time, measure what matters, and produce more with less. This lineup of growing automation products includes hardware and software modules for computer vision, environmental sensing, and AC equipment control as well as a few ready to grow container farming systems. Oasis-Grow is a modular, easy-to-use set of tools for growing more with less. It is designed to enable controlled environment agriculture but can be applied to other areas as well. Deploy a simple camera to track harvest-readiness of fruit, add sensors to diagnose problems in your environment, plug in a controller to create the perfect conditions, or skip all of this with a ready-to-grow system. Our products collect images & data over time, actively regulating temperature, relative humidity, airflow, light, oxygen, and water cycles. Sensors, cameras, and programmatic alerts can monitor your growing system, allowing you to catch and prevent problems before they occur.  Users can set variable targets for feedback response and tune the system's built in PID controllers to create more desirable environments. With the ability to deploy plug-and-play containers or hook up 3rd party AC appliances in a chosen space, growers can more easily create the perfect environment for their application. Our system can be used offline and is secure with data encrypted at rest and in-transit. NorthSpore Vertical Farm DailyMagPi: Official Raspberry Pi MagazineGet started using a ready-to-grow container farming system, or outfit your existing grow with one of our environmental helper modules.We wouldn't sell a product we wouldn't use, which is why our prototypes are tested extensively on our demo farm installation. Our technology has been used to build real systems that grow real crops, which we encourage you to check out on our website and instagram!Our open-source control software can take pictures, sense environmental factors, and command a variety of appliances to regulate your system. This means that you can modify core, extend with 3rd party electronics, and contribute new integrations + ideas! If you've ever used a Raspberry Pi or programmed a microcontroller, you'll be right at home accessing oasis-grow modules using the command line. Visit our GitHub to deploy your own configuration of our firmware. Build from scratch or add powerful new capabilities to an existing Pi setup. On-device buttons & an LED status ring light interface can be used to start/stop the control cycle, connect to wifi, or run the drainage pump. This is in addition to the dashboard, where you can view images and data sent from a unit, adjust settings, update firmware, and run other tasks.  Adding a new device to your network is as easy as pressing a button, waiting a bit, connecting to the hotspot, and entering your credentials:Our cloud dashboard (for which we will release an open-source version soon) aggregates visual & sensor data to generate actionable media & analysis. Assemble time-lapses to share, save data for traceability, and learn from the past to improve future harvests. We plan to implement even more sensor options and integrate some of our community-contributed AI projects into the core remote image monitoring system.Oasis-X was founded by two engineers and long-time gardeners in response to food shortages during the COVID-19 pandemic. We have backgrounds in computer science, hobby electronics, business management, product design, ecology, and biotechnology. Our team is passionate about making the future of farming accessible in every neighborhood!We have have been iterating on designs for this idea since the beginning of 2020. It has been incredibly rewarding to see our hardware go from concept drawings, to functioning proof of concept prototypes, to rugged hand-assembled beta units. Next steps will be to smooth out the edges and update our existing prototype designs to optimize manufacturability.   The rapidly increasing consolidation of farmland over the past century has resulted in a centralized food system that pushes out small farmers and is fragile, wasteful, and damaging to our environment. To feed a growing global population, we’ll have to intensify these traditional farming and distribution methods which intensely pollute our atmosphere, soil, and water.We believe that buying and selling local is the solution for many problems which plague our food system. We have the opportunity to embrace an alternative which allows us to eat healthier, use fewer resources, connect with our food, and cultivate confidence in where our products come from.

    In pursuit of this, our goal is to equip every cultivator with unprecedented control and visibility into their harvest. We aim to unlock the kind of productivity & resource-efficiency previously only achievable by those with capital to invest or deep technical expertise.

record.Creator: Tierranova, LLC
record.Title: The Move Alert APP
record.Text: The Move Alert APP identifies the Crime Statistic, Covid Cases and Critical Communications around your immediate location so that you can make informed decisions about your safety. Using GPS technology the APP moves with you and updates you on the surrounding safety conditions as you move from around your city, your country or around the world. Currently, We have identified and captured crime data within the U.S. and Covid-19 data within 180 countries world-wide, however we are seeking funding to expand our data collection efforts so that we can offer this app to all nations.Imagine travelling to a new City in which you have never been and trying to navigate the streets not knowing if it is safe, not knowing the crime rate, what is the Covid rate, where is the nearest police or hospital, how do I contact emergency services if I need them, and if in a foreign country, where is the nearest embassy? The Move Alert APP answers all of those questions by simply pressing the appropriate button and seeing the information you need. Further, you will be connected to local law enforcement and receive voice, data and video alerts informing you of adverse activities in your area. With your help we can provide this information not just to citizens who travel within their own countries but as individuals travel to all parts of the world the APP will immediately sync with the crime and Covid data in those regions.We are seeking a community of supporters that can provide feedback to us over the lifetime of this project as we seek to put this APP in the hands of over 1 Billion People World-Wide. Whether your donation is $1 or $10,000, you will join our flagship supporters program and will be given periodic updates about our APP as it expands from country to country.The Basic Move Alert APP will be provided FREE to every Citizen world-wide and includes all of the health and safety functionality. The Premium Move Alert APP will include all Basic features and additional communication features with expanded data for foreign travels.Another exciting feature of the Move Alert APP is that Schools, Communities, Cities, Law Enforcement Agencies and Governments can use a secure web based Communications Portal Page to direct message its Citizens using voice, data and video messaging. Created by Tierranova, LLC based in the United States with the support of  a local University and a local Technology Funding Group, the company worked with an India based Company to develop this APP for the past 24 Months. It is worth noting that the US and India are among the top 3 countries in the world with the highest cases of Covid outbreaks, which intensified the relationship of our two companies.The inventor, Ron Daniels, is a technology professional with over 30 years holds a Masters Degree in Engineering and is an expert in database technology and analytics. He initially created the APP to address the growing crime rates within the US in particular mass shootings. In 2020, the APP was upgraded to include Covid data as this pandemic affected the health and safety of all humans world-wide. He is passionate about getting the APP to all corners of the world because his life has been touched by both aspects of Crime and Covid, having lost a brother to violent crime at a young age and most recently losing his Father to Covid in 2020.

record.Creator: Oladance
record.Title: Oladance Wearable Stereo: Epic Sound. Open Earbuds
record.Text: Feel the music, not your earbuds.This is the promise of the Oladance Wearable Stereos, the comfort-focused earbuds that deliver high-quality sound without ever going inside your ear.Unlike traditional earbuds, Oladance features a completely Open-Ear design that rests gently and securely on top of your ear. There are no tips, so they’ll never go into your ear. That’s how they deliver superior sound in a natural, comfortable way. While many brands race to improve the noise-canceling and premium sound quality, designers have forgotten the most important part of any wearable technology - comfort & health. Check out this article from Whittier Hospital Medical Center about how traditional earbuds may damage your hearing and casue ear infection.What good are earbuds if you can only wear them for 1 hour before they make your ears sore - or worse, cause hearing damage and inner-ear problems?To change all of the pain points of traditional in-ear headphones, other open earbuds, or bone conduction earbuds. First, we believe the product should be a truly open earphone to achieve the best level of comfort, hearing protection, and transparent experience.At the same time, using your ears’ natural curves, a pair of powerful 16.2 mm drivers channel epic sound exactly where you need it —  leaving your ears open and never plugged. Let alone the unrivaled continuous playtime of up to 94.4 hours.Epic sound. True comfort. Together in an earbud at last.We did random street interviews at Toronto, Ontario in Canada. Let’s check out how people are reacting with our Oladance Wearable Stereo!We’ve sent out prototypes to experts in the fields of audio devices, technology, outdoor or sporting equipment, etc to give their professional and unbiased opinion on the features of our Oladance Wearable Stereo. Do stay tuned for more unboxing and review videos!Many reports have emerged about the risks of earbuds that go inside your ear – everything from skin irritation, to tinnitus, to long-term hearing damage. The Wearable Stereos avoid all these because they never actually enter your ear. There is no pinching of the auricle, no blockage of the ear canal, no pain or damage to hearing. So you can enjoy precision audio without worrying about ear discomfort.Chat with your running buddy while listening to Beethoven’s 5th symphony. Who says you can’t have both? Oladance keeps your ears open, so you’ll never lose track of what’s happening around you — whether you’re running down a city block, cycling on the road, or waiting for the airline attendant to call your row. Keeping you safe, while keeping you in the moment.The right fit, for all your moves. Molded to fit the natural curve of your ear, Oladance has a multi-point support system that spreads the weight of the buds evenly across your ear, eliminating sore spots. So you can wear them all day without discomfort. It also offers a stable fit that offers reassurance whatever the day brings.  The Oladance Wearable Stereos move when you do, and where you do.  So jump, skip, flip… Or just relax. And they are made with soft, skin-friendly silicone, easy to keep on even during your longest workouts. Your earbuds aren’t going anywhere. Plus, the Oladance features an extra-strong memory titanium wireframe, which has a certain degree of elasticity and can return to its original shape after bending. This means you won't have to worry about the inconvenience to put on your ear, or dropping one while you’re on the move. There’s a reason we call them the Wearable Stereos, not just earbuds - wearing them is like having a home stereo wherever you go. Oladance lets you feel that the sound is coming from everywhere outside in a natural way, a totally different listening experience with nothing blocking the ear. It's also a stereo that only you can hear. Oladance channels rich, full sound towards you and away from others. Two powerful 16.2mm drivers combine to bring you acoustic brilliance. With drivers three times the size of Apple’s Airpods, they create an audio experience that’s more like an intimate concert setting, and less like a pair of earphones. And the top bio-diaphragm technology offers a rich, consistent listening experience at any volume, from crisp and clear highs to excitingly powerful lows. Keep your bass tuned with Oladance’s virtual bass and dynamic EQ technology. Using automatic hearing compensation, they deliver even sound at different frequencies. Indoor and outdoor, providing a stronger sound quality experience at any time.Most bone conduction and other open earbuds place their sound unit at the top of the ear, resulting in a distance from the ear holes. We improved the structure to make sure the earbuds accurately cover the ear holes without going into them, cutting down on sound leakage effectively, maximizing the sound you hear, while minimizing what everyone else does.  You hear it all, while they hear nothing at all. Better conversations start here. The Oladance’s microphone system is designed to lift and amplify your voice while putting a lid on other ambient noise in the background. The patented environmental noise canceling (ENC) algorithm rebuilds the sound of your voice even when external noise threatens to stifle it. And with nothing stuck in your ear, your conversations feel natural, as though the person is right there next to you…Even when you wish they weren’t. Is that your boss calling?With the 160mAh large capacity battery, plus the breakthrough low-consumption algorithms patents, we optimize the battery life of the stereo to provide up to 16 hours of continuous play per charge for unbearably long flights or workouts that go all night.While the Oladance comes with a non-charging carry case, you can also grab an add-on charging case to extend the performance. With this large battery capacity case (2550mAh), the total playtime is extended to 94.4 hours! No need to recharge the case in 2 months if you use it for 1.5 hours a day. With the unbeatable battery performance and comfortable design, the Oladance is made to stay in place all day – even during those jump-rope sessions and backcountry cycling trips. Play and pause your music, skip tracks, adjust volume, and take calls — all with only a tap. The Oladance Wearable Stereos feature a touch control glass panel that puts you in control, so you never miss or press the wrong button even when you’re on the move. That means that whether you’re chatting with Siri or browsing your newest playlist, you can control everything simply by tapping your Oladances with one finger.As the product is such a unique innovation in every detail, we find it quite difficult to succinctly explain its advantages.  We hope this comparison table is helpful for our early supporters. Say what you want to say - without speaking a word. With four dynamic colors to choose from, including Interstellar Blue, Space Silver, Martian Orange and Cloud White, there’s a color for every character. We will collect your color preference for each unit after the campaign ends through the Kickstarter survey. Please note that the Oladance Wearable Stereos have a non-charging carry case in the box. We have included a Type-C cable for you to charge the Wearable Stereo with that carrying case. Otherwise, you can purchase the extra charging case as add-on.We will collect your specific color preference for each unit after the campaign ends through the Kickstarter survey. For most of the main countries and regions, we offer free shipping and cover all the customs fees, including the US, UK, CA, AU, most countries and relations in EU and Asia. For other countries and regions, due to the pandemic, there has been a large increase in shipping costs. We will be covering a significant proportion of the logistics fees and charge an additional part for each parcel. Your tracking number will be provided at the time of shipment. For the shipping details, please check the link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EjTlCNnHCQqpGzWNHcbpj1dfKbxUwyPlvhn91hNIsCc/edit?usp=sharing*Please note that the add-on charging case will be shipped out separately in January, as we decided to develop it just a month ago based on valuable feedback from our early supporters. But don't worry, you will receive your Oladance Wearable Stereo before Christmas!*Choose the reward you want, than you will have the option to purchase the add-ons of extra wearable stereo and charging case on the next page before you check out.If you would like to purchase more than two units, please feel free to contact us via the Kickstarter comments, inbox or our customer service email at global@oladance.com.Please note that the Oladance has a non-charging carry case in the box. You can choose the combo reward to add-on reward to grab an extra charging case to get 94 hours battery life in total. After you choose the reward tier of the Wearable Stereo, you will have the option to buy the add-ons on the next page.This is the unedited demo video that demonstrates the full range of our product's functionality without any post-production editing. We are Oladance, a group of enthusiasts who strive to create wearable audio products that are truly transformative. Our top talents came from BOSE and other high-end brands with more than a decade of experience in the audio industry. We get together with a common goal - to bring high-quality audio and comfort-focused designs together in an earbud. At Oladance, we believe that product design and quality determine your experience.We believe that product design and build quality will determine your experience and went ahead to design the Oladance Wearable Stereo Open Earbuds, a healthier option for music lovers who enjoy using earbuds. It combines beneficial designs from traditional TWS earbuds, open earbuds, and bone conduction earbuds, and takes ear pain and hearing loss away from the music. We are now in the small-trial production stage, and we will soon enter the mass production stage after the campaign goes live.  We've also sent out some sample products to Youtubers to do review tests. Also, we plan to start shipping in November. All the backers' shipping information will only be collected through the Kickstarter survey after the end of the project. We will keep you updated about the shipping status in the project update section.We stand behind our products & services with confidence. The Oladance Wearable Stereo is covered under a 1-year limited warranty and free replacement of the Oladance if any defects are due to faulty materials or workmanship, performance for a period of 12 months from the date of delivery. Please note that the warranty period complies with the applicable consumer laws in the consumer’s country of purchase. Please email us at global@oladance.com  if you would like to know more about the warranty details.*According to Oladance's laboratory test results, the Stereos provide up to 16 hours of continuous playtime at 30% loudness.*Experts recommend keeping sound levels at somewhere between 65 and 85 decibels to minimize the damage your ears are exposed to. According to Oladance's laboratory test results, sound leakage could not be found at 74dB of loudness in the quiet indoor environment, and the decibels could be adjusted to higher levels in the outdoor environment, which is significantly better than other products on the market. Note that actual performance may vary depending on environmental conditions and music types.

record.Creator: Nadia Hibri
record.Title: Carpooling App
record.Text: I'm making an app that is for carpooling, or for people to share rides with people that are going in the same direction as them. In a way, it's kind of like hitchhiking, but much more safe because people have actual verified profiles with reviews. As a driver, input the location you are driving to, and you will see riders who are looking to go somewhere along the way. As a rider, input the location you want to go to, and you will see drivers in your location that have that route on their way. You can save common routes on your phone (like your house to the grocery store). This will be under the favorites setting. This app works on a points based basis. Everyone starts out with twenty free points. One point equals one minute of driving/riding time. For every minute you drive someone, you gain one point. For every minute someone drives you, you lose one point.Help people out by driving them to places that are already on your way, and people will do the same for you when you are in need of a ride. I am hoping that this app will encourage people to share rides and carpool more. They can meet people in a new place, or become closer to their own community by doing this. Also, there will be less traffic, and roads will be more safe. Less cars also means less C02 emissions, which means less air pollution.

record.Creator: Evolution Bikes inc.
record.Title: An electric bike suitable for seniors! (E-Bike Seniors Ed.).
record.Text: STARTING NOW: EVERY COMMUTER AND FOLDING E-BIKE WILL INCLUDE THESE NEW AND UNIQUE UPGRADE FEATURES IN THE BASE MODEL:STANDARD BASE MODEL FEATURES:Any contributions received in excess of our base funding goal will be used to purchase e-bike inventory to be offered to seniors at a lower cost.We believe all micro-mobility projects should be supported for a better the future.. (2 min 58 s)(3 min 26 s) "SADDLE ROYAL" has a reputation as the best saddle in the world. This Italian saddle is included on each of our bikes as one step to ergonomic comfort while riding. It’s a must!

record.Creator: Enhanced Robotics
record.Title: World’s FIRST Exoskeleton for Consumers | SPORTSMATE5
record.Text: Introducing SPORTSMATE 5, the world’s first and lightest portable wearable robotic exoskeleton made for consumers. It’s form-fitting functionality makes every stride comfortable with controllable resistance and assistance to achieve your fitness goals. From distance to strength-training, SPORTSMATE 5 covers it all.     SPORTSMATE 5 entirely transforms the notion of wearable robotics. Exoskeletons of this nature have existed for decades for military, industrial, and rehabilitation fields. Those designs are bulky, heavy, expensive, and designed for singular use cases. We’re applying exoskeletons to daily life, altering the way you interact with the world！Major tech media MUO highly appreciated the fitness mode of SPORTSMATE 5It’s easy. There are two powerful actuators at your hips on the exoskeleton. These provide assistance when you need to save energy and aim to go physically further, or resistance when your goal is training muscle. Two modes are designed for quick usage.         Outdoor Mode: Get easier for a long-distance walkingAssistance from the 2 actuators lift your legs and push them forward to make every step light as air. You will feel much easier while walking, going upstairs and uphill. Get rid of gulping air, sweating all over, and slow walking. Resistance in outdoor mode increases your stability by holding your body and absorbing the shaking while going downstairs or downhill. In a word, outdoor mode of SPORTSMATE 5 helps decrease strain & increase distance and lets you enjoy the fun of outdoor activities, like hiking, trekking, backpacking, even mountaineering!Fitness Mode: Burn More, Gain MoreHere is where our resistance actuators shine. Fitness Mode focuses on burning more calories and gaining more muscle strength in less time than a traditional workout routine. Resistance comes from different forms for our exoskeleton: extension and flexion. You are free to choose the resistance that fits your routine best for incredible results, for example, choose extension resistance while doing half-squats to train your gluteal muscle or use flexion resistance on leg raising training to strengthen the hamstring tendon.More applications with customized SPORTSMATE 5 accessoriesThe accessories can be quickly assembled to Sportsmate 5. After that, you can put on the device as usual and fasten the shoulder strap of the weight-lifting accessory. Then, the device can assist you in straightening your back up during weight lifting so that you can feel more accessible and decrease the risks of back injury.  While you are holding the weight and walking with that, our device will continually assist you based on our innovative algorithm of "Holding condition" & "Walking Condition."  No weird feelings, and you can walk as usual.SPORTSMATE 5 has three subsystems: the gait controller system (central controller), the actuator system, and the energy system. In outdoor mode, your gait behavior will be detected by sensors and processed by our AI algorithm. Then the controller will send signals to the drivers so that motors can deliver appropriate assistance to you.In fitness mode, motors can provide different levels of resistance for burning more calories. Meanwhile, our intelligent energy system can harvest the energy from your movement and recharge the battery to achieve a longer duration.We've developed our innovative torque-based AI algorithm to adapt to complex environments compared to traditional exoskeletons, which used trajectory algorithms for medical rehabilitation purposes. More agile and flexible.   AI algorithm analyzes data from the motor encoder to detect the wearer’s gait behavior, providing precise torque support with every stride. Depending on the gait pattern, SPORTSMATE 5 can detect the user’s activity (e.g., hiking, jogging) and intuitively adjust the upper-level algorithm. The lower-level controller receives that reference and sends the proper signal to the motor drivers.Unlike traditional exoskeletons using high ratio transmission systems for patient stability, we implemented our quasi-direct actuator system, consisting of high torque density motors with low ratio transmission systems. Users can have more participation while in use without the traditional result of high mechanical impendence.     In terms of assistance, our actuator system can provide 50% of torque required by hip joints during a gait cycle for normal males.Our consumer wearable robotic exoskeleton uses adaptable rigid elements along the waistbelt to perfectly adapt to a wider range of body shapes.    To further fit the belt around your waist, an electric inflatable airbag fills the gap between your waist and the exoskeleton, providing better stability and more comfort.Single air pump inflation lasts for 10 seconds. Weighing in at just 2.5kg, the SPORTSMATE 5 is ultralight wearable robotics made for consumers. It’s composed of multiple high-strength composite materials including carbon fiber reinforced plastic and aerospace aluminum alloy.It’s compact form factor makes it easy to pack up and carry just as easy as it is to wear, taking about 1 minute to put on.In hiking mode, the battery provides steady and sufficient power output for different use-case scenarios. With our QDD actuation, less energy is wasted by the inconformity between use and device, thus achieving better sustainability.Depending on user movement, our smart energy system can harvest energy while in use. Going downstairs, training, hiking, and more can recharge the battery making SPORTSMATE 5 last even longer. We believe the future of consumer-friendly wearable exoskeletons is just breaching the surface. There’s so much more potential. To help further the application and development of wearable robotic tech, we’re providing a developer box with an extended interface with 2 UARTs, 8 DIOs, and 4 AIOs. You’re free to develop any application and run your own experiments. Welcome to the EXOSKELETON WORLD. We expect great things from you! Choose the size that fits your body most closely to get the best experience out of SPORTSMATE 5.We’re a startup that focuses on the research and development of exoskeleton robotics. We seek to improve the quality of life by providing people with accessible, user-friendly robotics that enhances mobility. After 4 years of research and clinical verification, we are launching our first exoskeleton, SPORTSMATE 5, dedicated to outdoor and fitness enthusiasts.  Leon Zhu, CEO of Enhanced Robotics, shows us how ER has improved the prototypes of SPORTSMATE in the past four years.We offer global shipping to anywhere in the world, and we've cooperated with carriers like FedEx, UPS, DHL, and USPS. Please note that the price doesn't include shipping costs, taxes, or additional duty. COVID-19 is still delaying international shipping in many places, but things are better now, and we hope that by the time we start shipping, the delivery time can be back to normal. We will update you with the whole shipping process continuously.

record.Creator: Wen Luo
record.Title: Learn Business Analyst - A hands-on and interactive course
record.Text: Hello, I'm Wen. I started my career as a developer, then QA and then BA. I've been a BA for more than ten years now. I am through many different industries, like education, Real estate, construction and retail, etc. I get a deep understanding of what kind of BA is highly demanded in the market. And what kind of skillset BAs needs to have to accelerate their career.I'm also passionate about sharing my knowledge to help people transforming their career to BA and mentoring junior BA to dive deep into this role. I helped lots of my students to find their dream job. Nice to meet you, and wish I can help you as well.I designed this course step by step,The first part is the basic knowledge for you to master BA core skillsets. I separate them into small sessions, so you can buy the ones you are not confident in. For the units you've already learnt, you do not need to buy them, but if you are not sure, you are welcome to renew your knowledge.In the second step, you can use what you learnt to try for small feature analysis.  80 dollars for each practice, including,In the third step, you will experience the analysis of a significant feature. If you want to accelerate your career to mid-level or senior-level BA, you can have a try. 280 dollars for each practice, Including,In the fourth step, you will learn how to design a discovery/inception workshop. This capability is very hot in the market now, especially for start-up companies or companies with lots of initiatives. You will be able to find more creative jobs if you can gain this skill set. This part costs 1200 dollars, including,Finally, the most interesting part is for you to join a real team to work with Product Managers, Developers and UX designers for 2 months to gain a real internship.The goals is shown as belowThanks for all your support.

record.Creator: Tina Johnson
record.Title: Accountability Buddy App
record.Text: Good DayI have been in an extensive knowledge base training for the last five months under Dean Graziosi and Tony Robbins. I recently became a life coach, and I am developing a Course at Mastermind.com to assist young adults who aged out of the foster care system, secured housing and employment but still need guidance to strengthen their confidence and independence to build a fulfilling life through simple mindset techniques, basic life skills and career mentorship. As I build this Four Week Course, I realize one of the most important factors to getting through this course is having an accountability buddy. I too have an accountably buddy as I continue my training and I know I could not have gotten this far without the accountability partner. So, this is where the idea of creating an app for finding an accountability buddy came about. Since I use this technique and the young adults, I will be coaching will also be using this technique I feel it’s a need for many. This app will help you determine what it is you are looking for accountability on and match you with another person looking for the same kind of accountability. The partners will decide how often they will need to meet virtually to go over what they accomplished thus far and what they intend to be accountable for next. The app will be used for goal settings, showing progress and reward system for completing tasks.Studies found that people who commit to their goal in front of another person are 65 percent more likely to achieve it, as reported by Entrepreneur.com. Likelihood of success rises to 95 percent when those same people commit to ongoing meetings with those accountability partners, to check in on their progress.I truly feel this is a necessity for the many who are trying to set goals and accomplish them. I think having a user friendly app to help with the process of finding and keeping an accountability buddy will help this technique thrive.

record.Creator: Diego
record.Title: MyPetCare | La revolución de las mascotas perdidas
record.Text: Una de cada tres mascotas se pierden en algún momento de su vida. En España, se pierden cada año 200.000 mascotas. Mientras que el 70% de los perros consiguen volver a casa, esta cifra se reduce, desgraciadamente, hasta el 5% en caso de los gatos. MyPetCare ayuda a aumentar la probabilidad de que tu querida mascota pueda regresar a casa.La mayoría de mascotas disponen de un chip identificador para encontrar a su dueño. Este chip solo puede leerse mediante una herramienta de la que habitualmente sólo disponen los veterinarios.¿NO SERÍA MARAVILLOSO QUE TODOS PUDIERAMOS LOCALIZAR MASCOTAS CON NUESTRO SMARTPHONE?Añade al collar de tu mascota un CareTAG, una placa de metal que tiene grabado un código QR mediante láser.Si tu mascota se pierde, podrás avisar mediante la app de MyPetCare, indicando la zona dónde se ha perdido. Automáticamente, MyPetCare enviará una notificación a todos los usuarios cercanos y se publicará en nuestras redes sociales.Si alguien encuentra una mascota, escanerá su CareTAG, inmediatemente el dueño recibirá un notificción. Muy pronto la mascota estará en casa.Si encuentras o pierdes una mascota que todavía no tuviera un CareTAG, añade a la sección mascotas perdidas  los datos de las mascota (raza, color, tamaño ... y una foto. Se realizará el mismo proceso que si lo tuviera.

record.Creator: Bitstream Audio
record.Title: Pulse Trio - Music Collaboration Audio Interface
record.Text: PULSETRIO is the world’s first collaboration audio interface – delivering true production collaboration workflow, a digital audio mixer with three independent USB-C inputs, and the ability to synchronize production software across all connected devices, in real time. The most advanced audio interface devoted to improving collaboration and workflow between music producers.Designed as a compact 3in-1out audio interface with stereo analog output. Combined with a  software utility application for full control over hardware properties and synchronization settings.With 3 USB-C inputs, PULSETRIO also functions as a true digital audio mixer allowing for simultaneous listening of up to audio sources.  A  3 x 1/8 Headphone and 2 x 1/4inch main output connections give maximum audition versatility  whether working in the studio or collaborating on the road.This means you can use PULSETRIO as a standard audio interface with the ability listen to audio from all connected USB sources at the same time! PULSETRIO's patented technology consists of a single audio interface device with multiple USB-C inputs and a utility software application that interacts with the connected users' DAW application. Capable of connecting several computers with any of the supported DAW platforms and synchronizing them to each other, allowing real-time simultaneous collaboration.  As a result, all the users will be able to listen to their combined audio, and individual collaboration parts, while also being in sync with each other. This results in smoother collaboration with less time spent rendering files. Every modern producer has experienced the difficulties of collaboration in its current form. Its un organized, cumbersome and repeated rendering of files takes up valuable time that could be used for creating. As a result, its apparent a major challenge in modern music collaboration is the diversity of software [DAW] applications music producers use to create.  The PULSE utility control application allows for smooth integration of the hardware and DAW. Synchronizing with the controls on the hardware the utility application is a complete collaboration control center designed to synchronize music production workflow.PULSETRIO works natively with the latest version of FL Studio for OSX. Additionally, the device is compatible with many DAW programs that support MIDI external sync.Supported DAWs include: *Early bird units will be upgraded at no cost.PULSETRIO can be used in multiple configurations. Each port can connect up to 3 FL studio, 3 MIDI compatible DAWs, or a combination there of and efficiently synchronize their workflow. We have produced 30 working Early Adopter units that are ready to ship. However, due to worldwide chip shortages, availability and minimums, we need backers like you to be able to source enough components to produce our product in volume. We also want to give the opportunity for early backers to get their hands on a unit as soon as possible, as they help us shape the experience going forward.  We have ambitious goals to integrate not only OSX but windows computers into a universal workflow. With backer support we can  focus on windows development. We are also in preparation to begin development to natively integrate Ableton Live, another milestone in our roadmap. This and many other great upgrades and features are top of mind. We are a team of developers, software engineers and designers who have a passion for music.  Founded by Mario "Wizzo" Fernandez, Grammy nominated producer engineer and Co-Founded by Mark Seel, a firmware and software engineer [musician] with over 25yrs of experience in software architecture ranging from multi-threaded PC applications to low-power wireless communications firmware.*these updates will be provided to early backers at no additional cost. This product represents a long devoted journey to improve the way musicians create in a modern environment.  The good news is we've done most of the hard work. All that's left to do is the final production, and your funding helps us with this process. Funds will help us purchase components in bulk, keep cost down and will also help improve the software and hardware's compatibility with more DAW manufacturers and operating systems.With your support, we'll be able to start production and get PULSETRIO out to you quickly. Your contribution will help to fund:Traditional music sessions often involve live instruments, in which the brand, or manufacturer of the instrument is a non-factor to the instrument's ability to produce a tone in a group setting.  In current digital music production, laptops and computers have become instruments modern musicians use to create. Since there is no one-size-fits-all DAW, or Digital Work Station, music producers have a variety of choices when selecting a platform. Current DAW platforms all have a unique workflow, file structure and often completely different computer operating system compatibility . These differences in DAW platform, result and manifest themselves as digital barriers in the creative musical process.  Modern music producers are often handy capped when collaborating due to the difference in their music production software.  Contrary for example, a traditional musician would not worry about a Fender guitar not being compatible with a Pearl drum set when in a jam session.   Nowadays, music producers have to be resourceful to collaborate efficiently. Often having to use multiple audio interfaces,  audio mixers  and other clever ways to synchronize their workflow. More often turning into a situation where producers are detached, yet all somehow still working together. This workflow is counter productive to a free flowing synchronized collaboration session, where each user is collaborating from their own workstation.The concept for PULSETRIO was born in a real life studio session. Bitstream Audio founder and Grammy nominated producer engineer, "wizzo" collaborated along side multi-platinum producers, 'Mike Free' and 'LilJon'. All three participants had different DAW platforms: Ableton, Reason and MPC2 software. By a combination of  synchronized start button pressing, wireless transfer of files, multiple aux connections into multi-channel analog audio mixers, they achieved that which now you can do with one PULSETRIO.  The inefficiencies in music production collaboration and issues experienced that day, and many other sessions occurring all the time, paved the foundation that would become PULSETRIO. Conclusively, the need for a more efficient workflow was born from necessity to collaborate more efficiently. Thank you for your support!   We would be forever grateful if you would share PULSETRIO with your audience to help this project come to life!Multi-Input Digital Audio MixerDAW synchronization technologyPulse Utility ApplicationDAW Sync CompatibilityFL Studio – Native IntegrationAbleton - Native Integration in developmentReasonCubaseReaperNI MaschineMPC SoftwareIn the BoxPULSETRIOTravel CaseUSB-C CablesWe stand behind our products & services with confidence. PULSETRIO is covered under a 1-year limited warranty and free replacement if any defects are due to faulty materials or workmanship, performance for a period of 12 months from the date of delivery.Please note that the warranty period complies with the applicable consumer laws in the consumer’s country of purchase. Please email us at support@bitstreamaudio.com if you would like to know more about the warranty details.System RequirementsOS: OSX 10.0 ;  Windows [Available Q2Y22]Recommended: OSX 10.14CPU: Intel or M1;  Recommended: 2.8 GHz or faster processorDisk Storage: 4 GB of free disk spaceInternet: Internet connection required for software upgradePorts: USB-CDevice SpecificationsForm Factor: DesktopInput: 3 x USB-CD/A Resolution: 32bit/384 khz audio conversion*Analog Output: 2 x 1/4”  Balanced Stereo OutputHeadphone: 3 x 1/8thPower Supply: USB Bus PoweredHeight: 1.2″Width: 4.25″Depth: 4.25″

record.Creator: Sam Motevasselian
record.Title: Web 3.0 - DWeb, DSM & DGames
record.Text: Before anything, I would like to mention that you have the option to follow on by reading the texts or watching the videos. I have tried my best to explain everything about Web 3.0, from its components to how it functions. Every topic has a headline, video and text, diving deep into the subject. I would recommend watching all the videos from start to end if you want to have a complete understanding of Web 3.0 and DWeb. Otherwise, the why section will explain the main reason behind this project. Thank you.In the early 2000s, with the introduction of Web 2.0, we began communicating with each other and sharing information through centralised services provided by large organisations such as Google and Facebook. We are always relying on these third-party giants to connect us. They are in control of our data in ways that many will not consider ethical. We must have the choice to control our data in sovereignty.With the introduction of Web 3.0, we look forward to an environment where no central authority, censorship and downtime exist. We will be able to log in anonymously and interact with each other using cryptographic (hack-resistant) methods.All of this can become true by introducing DWeb. A Decentralized Web will allow us to finally integrate Web 3.0 into our lives.Before explaining decentralization, we need to understand what centralization is. When a user wants to connect to another user or website, they will need to first connect to a server. A server is just a huge computer that manages clients' requests. The main issue here is that these servers may record every data sent or received. Another issue is that we are relying on this one server to manage everything. If the server were to stop working, the whole system will halt. A recent example could be Facebook's 6 hours downtime. In addition, these servers are the main reason we are not the sole owner of our data.Decentralization, on the other hand, does not depend on servers to operate. The network is known as a p2p network where users are connected directly and every user is also a server. As a result, instead of one huge server, the network has many small servers. Smart contracts will be used to achieve a p2p network structure. Smart contracts are simply programs stored on a blockchain that run when predetermined conditions are met. They typically are used to automate the execution of an agreement so that all participants can be immediately certain of the outcome, without an intermediary's involvement or time loss. ~https://www.ibm.com/topics/smart-contractsDWeb is the technical term used to describe Web 3.0. Decentralized Web (DWeb) is the infrastructure needed to gain from all the aforementioned benefits and build a DWeb browser, DWebsites, DSM and DGames.As already mentioned, DWeb will not be relying on servers/hosts to run.DWeb browser is the medium through which users will be able to access the DWeb and DWebsites.DWebsites or Decentralized Websites are websites that do not rely on a single server/host.After developing the DWeb, we will concentrate on building a platform for all users to upload their webpages and run a DWebsite as well. Users who run a DWebsite are called an administrator. They will be able to control their DWebsite through the DWeb browser. As a result, any person will have the chance to own a DWebsite by simply uploading files to the network, with a click of a button.With the development of DWeb, DSM will not be so far fetched. A social media with no downtime or censorship. A social media where you, as the user, are in full control of your data. With the use of smart contracts, users will be able to connect directly with no third-party interference. Imagine being able to share videos, pictures and messages in a decentralized network. For this section, we are planning on developing a page for content creators to share their videos, a page for sharing pictures and another page for sending messages (literally direct messages).Lastly, I should mention that DSM is going to be more global than the social media we are using today. I explained this in full in the Why section.Decentralization has many benefits but one of the most important ones for this section would be speed. Online games are usually slow and laggy because one server is responsible for many users' requests. In the case of DGames, with every user that joins the network, a server is also added. This will increase speed but we want to go a step further. We want to make sure that users do not face any lags at all, whilst playing. Users or in this case DGamers will download a huge chunk of the DGame onto their localhost/device and the rest will be streamed to play online. Instead of streaming large files such as pictures and sceneries, users will access them through their devices.  The difference in speed would be the same as the difference in downloading a video and streaming it. Therefore, the result should ensure a fast and smooth experience.We are planning on developing a DGame called Psur, which is briefly explained in the video above. Note: To develop the DGame, DWeb browser, DSM and Smart contracts, we will need to hit our stretch goals. More on this in the stretch goals section. Decentralization does come with risks as well. One of the most important risks is a lack of control over users' data. Although it is a benefit for users as it provides privacy, security and ownership, it may be misused in a way that puts other users in danger. Some users may see this as an opportunity to sell illegal products such as weapons. Meanwhile, they can stay anonymous and never get tracked. What's worse is that their data is immutable as well. To overcome such problems, we came up with a concept called DC or Decentralized Centralization! A group of people known as voters will be responsible for making the DWeb safe and secure. Any user who wishes to become a voter will have to be verified through a KYC verification. We will be responsible for verifying users, to ensure genuine voters. Hence the term DC. Nevertheless, what do voters do? Voters have the power to hide data or even a user. As mentioned, data or users are immutable, so voters can only hide content. The process is simple as well. Any user, not necessarily a voter, can report another user or his/her data. We as voters get notified of this report and choose between hiding, not doing anything and changing. When the majority of voters vote for the same option, then the change occurs. Otherwise, the reported content is considered safe. Note that, voters cannot change data/content but rather tags.DWeb ought to be global, so some may consider content to be ethical whilst others think otherwise. To address this problem as well, we will be using tags. Every content on the DWeb must have at least one tag attached to it, which summarizes the content. The tag can be a word or an emoji (you may watch the video for a better demonstration). These tags will then be used to separate wanted and unwanted contents. For example, some may consider alcohol as inappropriate content, so they will choose to filter out any content that has an alcohol tag attached to it. What if a tag is inaccurate? Voters will ensure that all tags used are as accurate as they can be. Voters can change the tag of any content. Only in this case do voters have the power to change data on the DWeb.  Click here.  Please watch the video above for a complete explanation of the rewards and what rewards to expect later. ~ The Golden circle Don't forget to follow us on Instagram, where we will be the most active.

record.Creator: BangProof helmet hats
record.Title: BangProof - water sports helmet hats
record.Text: The story is simple: BangProof was created out of need. There was no safety headgear for riders that wanted to keep their street credits. Basically, riders had to choose between feeling comfortable or protecting their heads properly with a bulky helmet. Not anymore! We packed technology into awesome streetwear designs, so the BangProof acts like a helmet, but feels and looks like the coolest hat ever! The most reliable, action-sports-level head protection is ensured by anti-stab panels and high end technology materials that absorbs up to 95% of multi-impact energy!Because, let’s be honest, tricks just look better in a street style, low profile cap! You gotta stay on fleek when flexing your skills!BangProof gives you UV protection, stays on your head even after a duck dive, and if you somehow manage to lose it, it floats. We’ve got you covered, water-sports freaks! Bang-able, washable, unbreakable… A lot of „-ables” in BangProof’s repertoire to make your life easier. When designing BangProof, we reached for state-of-the-art technologies  used by the military. Each layer of our cap was engineered to maximize its protective abilities, while not compromising with the fit and the feel.BangProof is designed as a snap back or  bucket and available in different sizes to fit your head perfectly! At the end of the campaign, we will send you a survey via email.  From there, you will be able to choose your: model, size, colour and some add-ons we might release throughout the campaign. Colour The beauty of choosing your colours at the end of the campaign, is that you will be able to choose from all the new colours that we release at each stage of the campaign. Note: Many of the colours we are making for the Kickstarter will NOT be available for retail. If you see a colour combination you really like, now might be the ONLY time to get it. A water sports passionate and the current Polish wake-skating champion, undefeated for 3 years. Intelligent Decision Support Systems graduate, CEO of postproduction studio LocoMotive.pl, co-owner of GoMega and VRplanet. In BangProof, he’s responsible mainly for marketing activities, design, and technical solutions. Jan Olszewski is a snowboarder with over 20 years experience, lately fascinated with wakesurfing and splitboarding. He’s been into project management for 10 years and had founded 3 successful start-ups. Currently, the CEO of winter tour-operator Snowee.pl. His responsibility is finances, i.e. budget establishing and execution. Michal is from almost 3 decades on the snow, from skiing to snowboarding, still with the same joy. Has been dealing with Business Development and Commercial services for more than 10 years. With this experience and a law background, he manages the brand formalities, intellectual capital, and product development. Shipping will be charged via our pledge manager after the campaign ends. You will receive an email when our campaign is successful with your exact delivery date and postal tracking number. The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when making a pledge for this campaign. Shipping rates change frequently nowadays however we expect that we can fulfil all orders with an estimate as shown below: We will know more about shipping charges once the campaign is completed. You will receive a fair shipping price, we promise. If you purchase more than one hat or cap we will dispatch your entire order in the same box. * Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country. ** We use customs friendly shipping and we ship worldwide.

record.Creator: Mixware 3D Printer
record.Title: Mixware, The Most Affordable Hi-temp 3D Printer For Everyone
record.Text:
The best way to teach your kids about 3D modelingMixware is a high-tech enterprise focusing on the R & D, manufacturing, and sales of innovative 3D printers. Today, we’re very excited to introduce the Mixware Hyper-S, A Desktop High-temperature FDM 3D Printer. Suitable for various types of filaments, Nylon glass fiber, Hi-temp Nylon, Nylon carbon fiber, PLA, ABS, TPU. Hyper-S provides you a more powerful, faster, larger and better printing experience.Hyper-S is a desktop 3D printer for HI-TEMP & Flexible and Nylon filaments, the maximum printing temperature can reach 350℃, you are able to print with more advanced, engineering-grade materials that require higher temperatures. Making gears, hinges, or other plastic parts with superior resistance.With a specially designed double gear deceleration extruder, printing flexible filaments like a pro. Smooth and stable, make successful prints at first use.The intelligent auto-leveling system and non-blocking nozzles provide superior accuracy and detailed 3D printing. No more wasting time fiddling with the bed and Z height. Furthermore, non-blocking nozzles will reduce the waste of filaments, making Hyper-S more eco-friendly and economical.The ability to print bigger is a boon for your creativity. The build volume of Hyper-S is 300*300*400 mm. It’s perfect for the needs of the whole family, from hobbies to professional products, you can unleash your creativity and enjoy some quality family time. Get Hyper-S for premium 3D printing at an affordable price – you will be amazed at what it can do for you.
 For a better user experience, Mixware Hyper-S comes with an intuitive UI design touchscreen. You can control the XYZ three-axis easily with a few taps. Spend less time on setup and more time printing.If the power is interrupted or shut down in the middle of the printing, you can recover your printing anytime the power is back on. Get perfect printing anytime, anywhere with Mixware Hyper- S.No confusion, no professional skills needed. Hyper-S is ready to use out-of-the-box. With an all-in-one structure, you can assemble it easily within minutes and then start your creation at the touch of a button.With only three buttons, it’s easy to use with the one-click. No need to assemble, use it directly out-of-the-box. It is the easiest way to start 3D printing with your family. Mixware Wand is suitable for all people who are interested in 3D printing, no matter if you’re a professional or a beginner. It is simple to use - just click the start button and wait for your 3D prints to finish.
  Easy to carryAt only 5KG in weight, you can take it to work, school or anywhere you need. Ultra-quiet and safeThe whole printer is a closed-structure design with Trinamic’s chopper. The safety lock ensures that the printing process is safe and silent. Fun times with WandDry your filament in a smarter wayA filament dryer is necessary for Nylon or Nylon composite filaments, it can effectively improve the appearance of printing and enhance the intensity of prints. Two ports are provided so that KD1 can be compatible with more 3D printers. Internal circulation of hot air with dual air ducts, effectively ensures that the internal heat is evenly distributed. Heating and humidity are two independently controlled systems, and users can freely choose.
  Refit your 3D prints easily
              After the 3D printed model is completed, the size needs to be polished and other post-processing, just put in the filament dryer, and heat to a specific temperature. The model can be evenly baked, so that it is easier to assemble after the model is softened, with no polished trace. Mixware Exclusive Filaments, click here to see specificationsMixware Exclusive Filaments, click here to see specificationsAs the most trusted product launch company in the world, Enventys Partners has helped launch over 2,000 innovations with global sales of over $1 Billion dollars for our clients.
By utilizing 20 years of experience in:Got an idea? We would love to help you launch it.

record.Creator: Helix Motors
record.Title: Helix Vehicle Awareness T-shirt Campaign
record.Text: This everyday favorite soft tee is made of durable cotton fabric and has a double-stitched bottom hem and sleeves.  Solid colors are 100% ring-spun cotton. We offer Recycled T-Shirts that are soft, comfortable, and environmentally friendly—these T-shirts are a must-have for all eco-conscious buyers! Our stylish long-sleeved T-shirts are perfect for the cooler weather. It'll look great on its own or layered under a jacket. Everyone needs a hoodie! Helix hoodies are a must-have for the winter! We believe in doing good and your support in our campaign helps us take a step towards a more sustainable world. Helix custom-designed advanced fabric is super smooth and provides a comfortable cotton feel and an advanced fabric that provides a 4-way stretch. Our advanced fabric T-Shirt will be your new favorite!Helix is a new class of vehicles that combines the DNA of a car and motorcycle! We are passionate to bring on the fun, efficient Helix on the road.  At this time, we need to promote Helix project awareness for consumer interest data to move the Helix vehicle project forward. Your pledge to support Helix's awareness campaign is much appreciated.  We are sincerely grateful for your support in taking part in this journey with us!  Our goal is to complete our online store and proceed with T-shirt Inventory. Gifting and wearing our Helix T-shirts will help promote Helix awareness, the data that we need to move the Helix vehicle project forward!Stretch Goal 1:  $10K This stretch goal level would help us create more merchandise for Helix online store and to promote Helix Awareness in social media including ads. Our goal is to reach more people to learn about consumer interest in the Helix efficient vehicle project. We need data from interested consumers to signup via www.HelixMotors.com.  Stretch Goal 2:  $15k  This stretch goal would help us expand our company, hire more help for the above goal and create exciting video content with some behind-the-scene looks at Helix.November 2021:December 2021: Holiday Special! Makes great Holiday gifts. These colors are must-haves! Red is perfect to wear for happy occasions including Christmas, Valentine's Day, Chinese New Year, and the Green is also great for Christmas as well as Saint Patricks Day! Shipping Note: Due to pandemic challenges, customers delays, overseas postal issues, COVID restrictions, and or postal shipping deadlines in different countries, shipping time may be affected beyond our control. We will communicate all updates with you via the Kickstarter updates system. Thank you.ReturnsYour pledge is to help support our goal and we sincerely appreciated it. For any unusual circumstances, such as shipment being damaged, please do not hesitate to contact us at help@helixmotors.com and we will be happy to assist you. Item return or exchange claims must be made within 15 days of receipt. Thank you for your understanding.

record.Creator: Anton Ooms
record.Title: Ketaiki: Wooden wireless phone chargers
record.Text: Hi hi everyone! And welcome to my first kickstarter!I am so happy to present my venture into kickstarter to make a self-designed useful item a reality.My initial idea with designing these chargers started from a simple starting point. I did not particularly like any of the designs I saw. So I set out to design and make my own!Design philosophy:I went into designing this with a few core design choices in mind    - It needed to fit into a bedroom or office environment   -  It needed to have a form factor which neatly holds your phone in place  -   It needed to be useable without much hassleFrom these choices came about 3 designs!Each design is manufactured using computer-controlled machining to maintain the single piece aesthetic. This also allows the freedom to design shapes which would be more complicated to achieve using more conventional manufacturing methods.Another conscious choice was that the user's phone is not supposed to lie on top of the platform, but in the device.And finally, the decision to use wood has allowed it to fit most interiors and rooms.The results are the ones you see below!The Standard type chargerThis design is the largest of the three.It has a recessed centre area in which you can place your phone. The gently sloping sides prevent it from sliding out, yet allow you to easily retrieve your phone out whenever so desired. The outer dimensions are approximately 28 by 18 cm (11" by 7") and will comfortably seat a 6.2" size phone (my own) however I have made sure it will fit a up to a size 6.9" phone without issue!The Angled type chargerThe next type came from the idea of having a design where the charging surface has a small angle, as to allow you to see your phone's screen from a sitting position.The charger also holds the phone in place with the raised edges, which eventually level out at the top of the charger.I was especially pleased when I received this make, because the wood gives such an unexpectedly interesting pattern!The outer dimensions of this type are approximately 19 by 9 cm (7.5" by 3.5") and will also comfortably seat a 6.2" size phone however you can again fit a 6.9" size phone without trouble.The compact type chargerThis final design came about after I was suggested to make a smaller version of my first design. I came up with the same phone platform size, however the edges are smaller in size, yet do not hinder phone accessibility.In terms of a smaller more space saving size, I was quite pleased to see how it turned out!The outer dimensions of this type are approximately 20 by 11 cm (8" by 4") and will, quite a shocker I know, also comfortably seat a  6.2" size phone. It may not look like it, but I have verified that it will also seat phones up to a 6.9" too! The circuitry and specsIt is of course good to know what to expect for performance of any device you have. Without it these would be more akin to bowls and less like chargers.As the charger is made of wood, a concern could be that wood does not mix with electricity. However, wood is an electrical insulator and will not conduct electricity. Also the charger is in use it may heat up due to use. However as the circuit board has a thermal cutoff, much like a computer does, and will power down for a while to make sure it does not damage itself in case it ever gets too hot!Dutch designThe idea of Dutch Design is to design something reflecting the Dutch spirit of innovation and creative thinking. The wood, parts, machining, packaging and components will be sourced from the Netherlands, allowing me to hold myself and my manufacturers to a high standard of quality. I always aim to make something I would want to use and see and by doing it this way I try to maintain this standard.The wood used for this project is multiplex, which resulted in the awesome pattern when machined across it's layers. I hope to eventually try other types of wood and get just as good results as these turned out! The USB port installed will be a USB-C port, as this standard will be the most commonly used in the forseeable future, and will be located on the short end of the charger.The arrows in the image below indicate on what side the USB port will be placed.And finally, I will have every charger marked with a serial number SPECIFICALLY for this kickstarter, so these will be distuinguishable from any subsequent follow ups!The nameTo embody the project I wanted to come up with a name which would be able to describe what it was, without being too on the nose. I came up with combining two pieces of Japanese to form the name. "Ketai" means cell- or mobile phone, and "Ki" can be written with the characters for tree, device or spirit. And when combining the former and latter part I had found my name!A little backstoryI went into this project with the intention of designing a charger which I felt would be a better result than the ones I've seen. After having scribbled a bit in borders and scraps filled with other work, I got onto using one of the most useful tools in my designing arsenal. The access to CAD software. The result of my first attempt into making a charger which would fit my phone, and hold it there with a recessed area might look very familiar!Now after the 3D model satisfied me, I got to translating this information to paper to make my first prototype!The first prototype I made started life as a stack of wooden slats. I cut those into smaller segments, glued them together and then cut and sanded the whole into a workable piece. (I was hoping the irregularities in the wood would create a nice pattern!). After that I went to work with my trusty dremel tool to cut out the shape of the segments to match the drawings. And while I wasn't fast nor totally accurate, it did actually work. You can see the actual circuitry for the prototype used in one of the pictures, which was later fitted inside. Also my first attempt at treating the wood was with a varnish. However I wasn't satisfied with that and have decided to use staining as a result!In this picture, you can see the result of the first attempt (Which was mostly proving that the charger would work fine through wood). And while it's not the prettiest, and the varnishing attempt didn't work out too well, I'm still quite happy I made it, as it was one of my first steps in this undertaking.The next prototype was much closer to the eventual design I decided upon. It is handmade too, but like the first prototype very much functional. The body is made from angled segments of wood with a flat top for the center area. It also has a small window which lights up blue when a phone is charging on it! However this may still change in the final design. It has the dimensions of the normal sized charger.Having handcrafted two functional prototypes, I felt so energized I tried my hand at making a few more designs. And as you can see below I've had quite some fun doing so! You can recognize which ones I've picked for this campaign, however maybe there is some future design I can work out too.After having made these extra designs I went searching for the possibility to machine the chargers from a single piece. And as it turned out I could! The resulting prototypes you can see here are the results from having them machined at a CNC shop, and I must say I was extremely excited to see the results. It was also really cool to see how the layers of multiplex revealed themselves because of the machining. This was the chargers when I got them from the shop, before the finishing and staining.I couldn't pass up the chance to line up a set of tries to show some of the evolution!And the look of the wood once it has been sanded and stained multiple times! Image and styleNow with the chargers so far along, I still needed something of a logo. Having thought of the name, I was given a few suggestions. Which I eventually narrowed down to two choices. And to find which one would best suit the chargers, had them engraved into wood, in a similar fashion as the serial numbers will eventually be! And for making this project look good, some nice pictures! The results should be recognizable in the various shots used in the presentation itself. Shipping and taxesSadly even over here we aren't exempt from the increased cost of shipping things across the globe. I've tried to find the most reasonable shipping I could find. As the constraint here for a small package is 2 kg, multiple chargers will not increase the cost up to this point. An extra heavy package will sadly jump the cost.I will ensure that every package has a track & trace code when shipped. As this in included in the pledge.Please do note that I take no responsbility for any import duties or fees which may occur in your country. Thank you all so much for reading up to this point and I hope I've had the chance to show you what this project is all about. Either which way, thank you so much for your time and I wish everyone a lovely time!

record.Creator: Bill Smith
record.Title: Picture Jesus with Us
record.Text: Picture Jesus with Us is a mobile app with a mission to help you share your faith and the gospel in a new and creative way.  The App allows you to add a Bible verse and Christian graphics (with  a personal note) to any photo.  With over 100 graphic images to choose from, you can edit and style your new Picture Jesus with Us image any way you’d like and share it with friends, family and co-workers. Our goal is to help you provide Hope, Encouragement, and Inspiration to all those you care about in your life, knowing you may have an eternal impact on them. The Picture Jesus with Us App was launched in 2017 and has since grown to 1500+ app users and followers on Instagram and Facebook.  Below are just a few examples of what you can do with the Picture Jesus with Us App.Unfortunately, our App must now be re-written from scratch to meet recent changes in the App Store and Google Play store requirements.  We're also going to lay a better foundation from which to build upon so we can provide you with more new and creative ways for you to share your faith and the gospel with those you care about.In addition to the complete code rewrite,  we are developing and will release a large version enhancement that will have the following new features:Please visit our website to learn more, see more samples, and read our blog:Picture Jesus with Us View Background Video:Bill's StoryPrayer: Your prayers for the success of this project and ministry are welcome and very much appreciated. "Your prayers and your alms have ascended as a memorial before God." Acts 10:4 ESVShare: Please share this project page with others you feel may benefit from this ministry and it's mission."Everyone will share the story of your wonderful goodness" Psalm 145:7 NLTCare: Download the App and register with us to stay connected.  Break the Ice & Share your Faith and the Gospel with those you care about in your life, using the PJWU App. App Store  Google Play

record.Creator: Hamza Khan
record.Title: Choreable
record.Text: Hi, firstly I want to thank you for taking the time to check out our Kickstarter.  We are raising funds to develop Choreable, a platform that we think is still very undeveloped in our new digital age. I am a young entrepreneur inspired by promoting technology and employment at the same time.  Our mission is to connect everyday people to a marketplace of skilled freelancers to help consumers with odd-jobs and errands.Choreable is the easy way to take care of all your chores from cleaning, handyman work, moving, lawn care, deliveries of groceries, and dinner from your favourite restaurant!We want to create an easy to use platform that you can instantly book services with freelancers that are verified. You can choose the individual by reviews, skills, and price. You can schedule when it works best for you and you can chat, pay, tip, and review all through one platform.We want to be a marketplace providing opportunities to people around the world to earn a living by connecting with others in their community. We are working to generate change and we are committed to playing a role in increasing underrepresented populations in the tech industry.Everyday work is important, but it also is time consuming. Get more done in less time with Choreable.HOW WILL FUNDING BE USED:We are currently asking for a pledge total of $2883 CDN to support Phase 1 of our project's development. All the funds collected will be used in their entirety to carry out the necessary platform, marketing and acquire equipment to be able to carry out the work and hire employees to work with this great project.
