record.Creator: Anthony McShea
record.Title: Electronic Receipts
record.Text: Why do we still get paper receipts?When you purchase merchandise at retailers such as Target, CVS, Best Buy, Walmart, etc. you always leave with a paper receipt longer than a trip to the moon which more often than not you immediately throw away or lose. Did you ever think to yourself why in the digital age we are in today do we still use paper receipts to keep track of our purchases and for returns. Not only is it inconvenient when we try and return an item we purchased but it is also bad for the environment. Every year it is estimated that the United States ALONE consumes 3.3 million trees and 9 billion gallons of water, while emitting 4.6 billion pounds of CO2 in the process of paper receipt production. These chemicals don't just stay on the paper, but can make their way into our bodies as a result of simply handling receipt paper. My idea to change it all!What I would like to build here is an app that will allow generate and allow you to scan a barcode on your phone and get your receipt sent to it digitally to that app. Then from there be able to organize it by either store name, dollar amount, date, etc. within the app itself. I am not looking to create receipts within the app I want them to be digitally sent to the app just like how they are sent to your email at times. Your email gets too clogged this way and not every retailer provides that option. In the future I wish to have app features such as retailer coupons which can be claimed and clipped within the app. Many of these features will streamline your checkout process saving you time and money and helping the environment by cutting down on paper, ink and water waste.  My Goal!My hope and idea is to partner with the major box store retailers and credit card companies to gain access to the stores transaction detail and allow it to be uploaded right to the app and skip the paper receipt.Why Receipts are TerribleReceipts come from the lowest quality paper, and the ink may begin to fade few hours after printing in some cases. In many instances, the thermal ink will start falling off with time, and you will be left with a blank paper, so again why are receipts not digital?Thermal paper uses heat from a printer head to make letters and numbers appear; no ink is used. This process requires the addition of bisphenol A (BPA) or bisphenol S (BPS) in their "free form", which means that the chemicals are not bound to the paper or polymerized. The chemicals can easily transfer to anything a receipt touches your hand, the money in your wallet, or even the groceries in your shopping bag.BPA and BPS are known hormone disruptors that can affect brain development, heart, lung and prostate health, mammary glands, and reproductive abilities. They can be transferred from fingers to the mouth via food, or absorbed directly through the skin when held.Worst part about these receipts is you can't even recycle them they must be throw away in the garbage!!Apps and retailer with the right ideasSure a few retailers allow you to have your receipt sent via email such as CVS but this clogs your inbox making it difficult to filter and sort through all the junk you may have. All the apps currently available on the app store do not offer this service I wish and hope to bring to our society. The only services these apps provide are for you to take a picture and upload it after you've gotten your receipts or create a new receipt to give to a customer in exchange for goods or service. All these apps have very low star reviews and are old and outdated. I want to digitalize the receipt process for every single cash register there is at all businesses across America and then the world! Please help by donating today, if you aren't able to donate don't worry because the 2nd best thing is to share this! If you have any helpful insightful ideas then contact me as well.

record.Creator: Dean Anderson
record.Title: Titan Micro Freight App
record.Text: Current projections show that the US and Global Supply Chain will not be back to normal until late 2023 or early 2024.  Additionally the truck driver shortage in the supply chain is also creating challenges for businesses trying to ship freight and keep shelves stocked. During this critical time we believe we have the answer; Micro Freight.  Micro Freight is the process of taking a trailer of freight and breaking it down into smaller loads that can be carried by anyone with a vehicle and a valid drivers license.  To begin the process a shipper uses the App to indicate they have a Micro Freight Shipment that they would like moved either to a store, different warehouse or another location.  This load will be put onto the apps job board and anyone in the area that can complete the shipment within the shipper's  time frame can accept the load.  The load will have all the necessary details such as weight, size and much money the load will pay.  Once a driver chooses the load they would like to complete they reserve the load on the job board and arrive at the designated time.  Once the driver arrives they will need to scan in a QR code on the app to show they have taken possession of the Micro Freight Shipment.  After the driver delivers the Micro Freight Shipment to the designated location the driver will scan another QR code showing the load has been verified delivered.  Once all information has been updated into the system the driver will be paid within 24 to 48 hours.

record.Creator: Edward hodge
record.Title: Wireless fuel automation system
record.Text: After being in the tanker industry for 11 years, I have seen multiple spills resulting in EPA fines & hazardous cleanup The system I have developed will prevent spills when the driver is unloading into a above ground storage tank The pump will stop automatically if the driver hits the overfill probe, once the pump  stop the flow stops preventing a spill If the driver never hits the probe the pump will continue to runThe system is powered by 12 volts through the trucks electrical system No batteries are needed for the wired version Batteries are needed for the wireless system which can last up to 9 months Optional feature would be a solar panel attached to the battery pack, the batteries would never have to be replaced The wireless system also has a handheld remote up to 600 ft range The wired system has (2) emergency stops One placed at the truck One placed at the fill line for the above ground storage tank In the future,  this system will be universal for all pumps & fluids

record.Creator: Sheldon Goodheart
record.Title: ClickTrim will change the way you look at interior finishing
record.Text: ClickTrim eliminates the hassles associated with conventional interior trim products through a superior design, premium look and finish, while taking less time and money. Builders and the Do-it-yourself (“DIY”) individuals often juggle tight deadlines, budgets while balancing a professional finish. Our patented/pending ClickTrim solution can solve this problem with our ready to go 3-step solution while saving you time. We estimate that you can eliminate up to 70% of labour costs from utilizing ClickTrim.Anyone can utilize ClickTrim to easily transform rooms, windows, in less time than traditional installation, and lower costs in comparison to other ‘complete’ trim solutions on the market. ClickTrim achieves this by completely eliminating:     ● Nailing through the face of the trim     ● Filling/hide nail holes or joints with putty     ● Cutting mitres     ● Paint preparation and clean-up     ● Painting trim 2 – 3 times to achieve the professional lookWe have a solution that is as easy as clicking on a reward package below.Our introductory line currently offers the current industry standard profile and the necessary complimentary specialty parts. With your help, we will work to develop our manufacturing processes to bring additional profiles and products to the market.ClickTrim started out with a few guys with big ideas to revolutionize the trim industry. Major industry suppliers have tried (and do) offer ‘pre-finished’ products, however, these products still require effort cover up nails / miter cuts resulting in additional time and money. Our product is constructed in a way that allows an individual to avoid any nails in the prefinished product by using our two-part base track & finished trim.The design transformed from paper sketches to various 3D designs, ultimately working with MDF to test the designs until the solution was redesigned and perfected. The product is now ready to be shared with the world as we have the internal capabilities to scale up production and patents(or pending) & trademarks in place.The founder has over 20 years in plumbing, electrical and building experience, he has worked in both the commercial and residential space. His entrepreneurial drive has built up companies, employed up to 60 employees and has made his mark in every community that he has called home.The co-owner has both construction and managerial experience. With over 10 years of construction experience and 15 years of CPA, CA experience in strategic, management and governance experience.At ClickTrim, we understand that teamwork is essential for every successful business and we have established a network of partners in marketing, legal, business mentoring and distribution to ensure that the company is ready to achieve the goals outlined below.Short -termAs a small manufacturing company, ClickTrim believes that the best way to achieve our goals is through crowd funding support to ensure a successful launch and be able to compete in the market. While we can produce trim in small volumes currently, we are looking to the crowd to gain interest and support, executing our production scalability plan and generate momentum to be able to deliver our innovative product into your hands.Our initial goal is to raise $200,000. Achieving this goal will allow us to:     ● Achieve economies of scale on raw material purchases to ensure competitive price points     ● Purchase more sophisticated manufacturing equipment to improve automation efficiencies and prototype lines such has additional CNC machines     ● Progress software enhancement     ● Progress further R&D for expanding our product offeringsThus all contribution will be utilized in executing our business plan to achieve what we believe is a revolutionary product and a new step forward in the trim industry.Long-termOur manufacturing patent allows for endless possibilities of product applications and offerings. We will look to maximize the innovative solutions capabilities.     ● Further enhance automation     ● Increase product line offerings     ●Launch software application

record.Creator: Morgann Gicquel
record.Title: Play by Jellynote | The musician's karaoke
record.Text:
Play by Jellynote is a web-based application, meaning that you can access it from any web browser like Chrome, Firefox or Safari. It could become a mobile app if we reach our 400% stretch goal (€88,000). Think of Play as a recording and production studio, with a large library of pre-arranged songs to choose from. Pick your song, record your part then match with other musicians from around the world. Create a Play together: a split-screen music video with the full song.As images speak louder than words here's a cool infographic for you to get a feel that we know what we're talking about... somewhat.And the good news is: Play is not limited to musicians. We wrote special arrangements with cups, rubber bands, hand-claps, voice and so on. Anyone is welcome to step onto the stage and share their love of music. You can create a Play with your friends, familly, pets... even if they don't play an instrument.Pick your mood.Pick your song.Pick your instrument. Or use your hands, rubber bands or anything you can find.Follow the notes and record yourself. Re-record yourself because the mic wasn't on. Re-re-record yourself because your dog barked. Re-re-re... Actually no, keep the one with the dog: it's cute!And voilà... Now other musicians can join your session and complete your band, you can also join other incomplete bands if you want.Go watch other Plays or share yours with the world on your favorite social media platforms.If we hit 100% we'll be able to offer 50 songs on Day 1.They’ve been carefully selected, ranging from modern hits by pop artists such as Taylor Swift or Sia to timeless classics like Queen’s Bohemian Rhapsody. Each of them have been arranged for at least six instruments, including guitar, piano, bass, drums, violin, a lead instrument (clarinet, voice, flute…) and some non-instruments (plastic cups, rubber bands, hand clapping…). This instantly makes any Play sound very orchestral and gives our users the freedom to Play any way they like.If we hit our 200% stretch goal (€44,000) we'll be able to add another 50 songs, and the best part is that you get to choose them! If we hit 300% (€66,000), we'll add another 50 songs and offer a total of 150 songs for you to play with musicians around the world.Jellynote is a Paris-based startup made of passionate people who believe that playing music is as important as taking care of ourselves.Our motto: The more of us that Play, the better we all get. This is why we are building a space where everyone can practice, play songs and create music videos together.The creativity that flourished during the trying times that were *gestures at everything that has happened in the past two years* was also a big inspiration. Many "stay at home" concerts required video editing skills and musicianship way above the general knowledge possessed by mere mortals. We wanted to create tools that anyone could use without needing a master’s degree in film editing or a national orchestra at the ready.We’ve intimately witnessed how introducing more music has made our lives so much richer. You could compare it to a team sport: depending on where you live, finding a team to play with can be difficult, if not downright impossible.Play was created to address that by bringing musicians from all over the world together.To make Play by Jellynote a reality, we're offering you various rewards.On top of our everlasting gratitude, we're giving everyone pledging Player or above access to the app - before anyone else. You'll get to access our closed beta, but also enjoy the app's Pro features for free once it's released to the public.Each tier includes some limited-edition collector items, on top of the Player rewards.Conductors will receive a Play-designed conductor baton, as well as their favorite song in sheet music from the Play catalog, printed on a 40x60cm poster. Composers will be rewarded with their favorite song performed by professional musicians on a Play, in addition to the custom sheet music poster.Influencers will receive one of the most recognizable instruments in the gaming world - the ocarina - on top of the custom sheet music poster.We've got some digital rewards too:
Composers will have the pleasure to attend our CPO's Masterclass "Music is everywhere". This masterclass will teach you how to find your music inspiration in the least suspected places, start making sounds with your coffee machine, or analyse the harmonies coming out of your teeth-brushing.Influencers will have the rare opportunity to ask Foolish Frankie (@foolishfrankie on Tiktok) for advice on how to become an influencer in today's world. The famous - yet lovely - musician (who plays all instruments at once in the trailer) could also teach you how to carve a pumpkin with saxophone reeds. But you might be more interested in how he manages to answer all the fan mail he receives and still finds time to play!For the most adventurous musicians amongst you (Influencers & Rock Stars), we are inviting you to our Parisian headquarters for the launch party planned in Spring 2022. But fear not, the composer pledge will give you access to the said launch party from the comfort of your home.We are a multi-cultural team united by our passion for music.

record.Creator: Chanda Lowrance
record.Title: Bredcrums Antisocial Media Platform
record.Text: We live in a day and age where 'Googling' your name or phone number can bring up a lot of personal information about an individual including addresses, siblings, etc. Not only that, a person's internet history can be damaging to their reputation. We need a way to secure and even erase our internet footprint to provide security. Breadcrumbs is a new social networking platform that allows a user to privately and securely input their personal information and obtain daily generated reports on where their data is located across the web. Machine learning and data scraping will be used to accomplish this task. Even better, your data will not be sold to data firms!

record.Creator: ARXTEC
record.Title: HCK4R: All Season Graphene Heated Jacket With 21 Features
record.Text: Introducing HCK4R™, the pinnacle all-season graphene heated jacket. HCK4R™ is ultra-fast heating (2X faster than other heated jackets), lightweight and built to last. Fusing everyday functionality and minimalist style, HCK4R™ is your ultimate adventure, sport, travel and work companion, designed to keep you comfortable in any climate. Designed for the everyday explorer, HCK4R™ will keep you warm, dry and cozy whether you are snowboarding or skiing, hiking the mountains or commuting in the rain to work.  HCK4R™ features the fastest Graphene based heating system called Graphenecore™. Feel the heat in seconds 🔥 . Back our campaign today and see why HCK4R™ is the only jacket you'll ever need for your next hiking adventure, ski trip or journey across the world.    HCK4R™ features Graphenecore™ technology: An ultra-fast Graphene based jacket heating system that produces therapeutic far infrared heat 🔥 Graphenecore™ heating elements move infrared heat through its latticed structure, evenly distributing it around your body. Graphenecore™ is not only faster than traditional heating methods (within 1 min), it also has a high conversion efficiency of more than 80% better than traditional heating methods and is capable of producing heat 2X faster than other heated jackets that utilize carbon fiber heating elements. We use Graphenecore™ in our jackets not only to ensure rapid warmth, comfort, and evenly distributed heat, but also because of the outstanding benefits of therapeutic far infrared heat such as muscle relaxation, stress relief and more.    Graphene has many beneficial properties – it conducts electrical and thermal energy extremely well, it is highly efficient, lightweight, flexible and is chemically inert. That, in combination with the fact that it's sustainable, makes Graphene the perfect material to heat HCK4R™. Ok, so down and synthetic jackets are the norm. While they are OK at producing warmth, they don't even come close to what Graphene is capable of. HCK4R™ is capable of generating warmth that any standard down or synthetic jacket just isn't capable of and 2X faster than heated jackets that use carbon fiber elements. And best of all, this warmth is generated from therapeutic infrared heat. It's like being in a warm infrared sauna on a sub zero winter day when you fire up this bad boy 💀🔥 No need for bulky layers underneath, HCK4R™ will always keep you comfortable whether you are visiting the park, hiking the forest, or hitting the slopes. HCK4R's Graphenecore™ heating system will keep you feeling warm and relaxed even in the coldest environments. Forget the layering, even in those sub zero climates. HCK4R™ can be powered with any power bank. Plug it into the USB-A input in the inner chest pocket and hold the ARXTEC power button for 3 seconds to fire it up. 🔥 Our standard ARXTEC 10,000mAh power bank can power HCK4R™ and simultaneously charge your devices. 🔋If you want a custom ARXTEC 10,000mAh power bank w/charger please see our list of power bank options (10,000mAh and upgraded 20,000mAh) in the ADD ON's section when ordering a jacket. 🧥 HCK4R™ has 3 adjustable temperature settings for a variety of climates. Stay comfortable and warm at your command, all with the push of a button 🔥Because of the intelligent thermoregulating properties of graphene inside the Graphenecore™ heating system, HCK4R™ will never overheat or ignite.HCK4R™ is 100% machine washable. The Graphenecore™ heating elements are lightweight and fit seamlessly into the jacket without the need for removal when it's time to give it a nice clean. HCK4R™ has no electrical components or batteries built in, so you can machine wash it without risking any damage. Just unplug the power bank and your good to go👍HCK4R™ has a carefully designed portfolio of 8 Smart pockets that can accommodate your next adventure, commute or night out.   Whether you're outdoors, headed to the office or the airport, you can securely stash all your belonging with HCK4R's 8 smart pockets. Each HCK4R™ comes with a standard 2 Year Warranty. If anything on the jacket is defective or you need a size exchange we will replace or exchange it NO QUESTIONS ASKED. We love and appreciate our backers, they are family to us and we want them to feel taken care of. This is our guarantee to you, our ARXTEC backers. We will collect your sizing information when the campaign closes. We will offer both Men's and Women's sizing in XXS, S, M, L, XL, XXL and XXXL.  We started working on HCK4R™ in early 2021. We wanted to make HCK4R™ the most functional, fastest heating and durable jacket out there, and I feel we definitely achieved just that. Our manufacturing partner has been absolutely phenomenal providing us with optimal timelines and keeping us on track. We have definitely made some early improvements and plan to keep raising the bar with upgrades and exceptional quality control.

record.Creator: Microbyota
record.Title: Microbyota Veggie: Fertilizer With Stress Reducing Microbes

record.Creator: Piotr
record.Title: OpenBike - DIY foldable electric micro scooter
record.Text: Open bike is a small, foldable electric micro scooter. I created it for myself but I'd love to share it with you, because we all have right to clean, safe, cheap and sustainable transport.You can use it to move from place to place or just for fun.Thanks to it's shape it is safe and comfortable.Simple construction allows you to built it by yourself with cost below 300 Euro (final price depends on your configuration and component prices in your country).Experience the freedom of mobility with a scooter built by you and customizied to your needs thanks to Open Architecture. Open Architecture means that you can adapt it to your needs and use the components that best meet your requirements.Can't find anything on the market that suits your needs? No chance to buy anything due to pandemic period? No problem - do it yourself!The goal of this campaign is to create video tutorials that will allow you to build it yourself. You will receive all documentation, all knowledge and all necessary CAD files to build it.You will learn a lot and you will be proud of your vehicle. You will see how simple it is.You can modify and apply your changes according to your needs - different wheels sizes, different battery capacity, you can use different motor type or even change frame shape. The mounting of the saddle is adapted to standard spacing, so you can easily use any model.You can decide how much you will spent on this scooter. You can significantly reduce costs if you already have some parts - you can use them with ease.You can achieve up to 40km on single charge - depends on how many battery cells you will use. The battery is easily removable.Maximum speed depends on you final configuration (motor power and wheel size). Currently it is up to 30km/hThe entire frame is easily adaptable to any changes that come to your mind.Note that in this type of project, the key is to adjust the proportions of the vehicle so that it is neither too big nor too small, and the position we take behind the wheel is as comfortable as possible. So if you would like to refine these sizes yourself, you have to spend a lot of time on it and make a lot of tests.So if you want to cut corners - I've already done it for you.Now anyone can take advantage of my work and build their vehicle based on the documentation provided.Vehicle can be constructed without any special tools, such as welders, migomats, etc.It is important, because not everyone has such devices and not everyone is able to use them. Moreover, these operations are rather time-consuming and this generates costs. Therefore, only bolted connections were used in this construction.It does not even require welding to the battery. Thanks to my special design you can built battery with ease.Non-standard parts, for example all connecting elements, folding mechanism, etc. can be done with 3D printing and laser cutting.You can easily order elements from 3D printing everywhere for very little money and probably some of you also have such printers at home.Laser cutting is also affordable and the services are easy available.You can also completely abandon laser cutting and cut each sheet and drill yourself.Even if you feel that construction is not for you, you can still support this project. With your support I will provide better documentation and then you can ask someone else to build it for you. Current specification:- weight: 11,4kg- top speed 30km/h- electric motor: BLDC 250W - front wheel 12 inch - rear wheel 8 inch with hub motorWhen recording tutorial, the scooter will be built from scratch based on new parts to show that all parts fits together perfectly. All parts will be 3D printed and laser cut. You will get 10 to 15 video tutorials and  more than 50 CAD files, all dimensions and a list of parts to buy.If it there is over funding - some new options will be also tested and recorded - different motors and wheels, different controllers etc.This license is for personal and non-commercial use only. If you want to sell this product, ask for a separate license - it's very cheap.

record.Creator: NurseLifeApp
record.Title: NurseLife app
record.Text: This project was already in our pipelines in 2019 thanks to our working and academic experience but, only after the COVID-19 pandemic global outburst, we decided to create our dream from zero and to share it with all our friends and colleagues.Why this? Because the pandemic put in front of our eyes not only the professionalism of every healthcare staff but, first and foremost, that we are not only nurses but also human beings with the goal to guarantee the health and wellness of everyone.The pandemic has brought under a new light the role of nurses placing in the public eyes of our communities the existing criticality of this profession. In fact they are the first getting in contact with anyone in need of health care and they are the first encounters in the hospitals.Nurselife is a team of nurses with a keen to grow this profession.Our mission is to facilitate the learning curve, studying and preparing for the exams by contributing to improve the quality of health care. Within the app, you can find everything you need in regards to nursing. The topics covered are:- Basic and advanced nursing.- Critical care.- Maternal and Infant care.- Surgical care.- Management.The objectives of Nurselife are:1. Make available all sort of informative material for all the Italian nurses and not only, by translating to English, French and Spanish;2. Provide a positive change in the nurse role also from a social and cultural point of view;3. Simplify clinical care practice via an easy-to-use tool and clarity of contents;4. Help in review or preparation for university exams or for work.Nurselife, therefore, looks to the future with the respect and the teachings of a noble past which, across all its history, has shown the ability to shape the healthcare assistance, to manage it and to point it towards perspectives and solutions which they have been recognized only after years and years from their enunciations.And, as Florence Nightingale used to say, a nurse who, in the past, was already living in the future: “Caring is an art; and, if it is considered as such, requires a total devotion and a hard preparation, as per any work from a painter or sculptor; with the only difference being as to work not on a canvas or on icy marbles but on the human body.”.Do you study nursing? Are you freshly graduated? Or do you simply need a quick review while working? Nurselife is the app for you!! Help us growing and spreading all our knowledge not only for Italy but for the entire world.The app is already available in Italian:

record.Creator: Michael Madi
record.Title: Ravelights - Digital Glowsticks
record.Text: Introducing Ravelights - Ravelights are wearable LED's that use state of the art beat detection to actively listen to live music and dance with you. They are flexible and wearable, USB C chargeable and go with you everywhere. Party hopping, raving or taking the dog out at night,  Ravelights have a mode for it- Become part of the performance - Ravelights activley listen to your surroundings and use an advanced FFT algorithm to pick out the base notes in live music and beat to the performance.  Dance mode also works in every enviroment, from Huge Parties to Bluetooth Speakers.Solid Mode shines as bright as you, Ravelights shine bold and bright. A great mode for being seen whether you're walking around at night, cosplaying, using as stage decor or just want to be seen.  Ravelights do what they want with random patterns, waves and flickers, they have a mind of their own. Quick and Dirty Demo of Dance ModeRavelights have multiple clip on points to attatch them to things like belts, gear, jackets and you ❤️.Note, We Don't Actually Recommend Swinging Ravelights ;)Ravelights are Easy to UseOne button to rule them all. Hold to turn on, Hold to turn off, press once to change modes. In addition to this, we've added special functions. With a button command you can enable Night Mode and check Battery Percentage.Night Mode lowers the brightness of Ravelights in all modes. Keep the vibrant punch while saving battery power and the eyeballs around you. In dark environments in normal mode, Ravelights are really intense!Shipping Expectations And Where Are We Now?The engineering of Ravelights are done and we have already started manufacturing units. We are beginning shipping as many units as we can as soon as the campaign is done.Our current hurdle is manufacturing. We will be shipping early cases using additive manufacturing AKA 3d printing. The problem is output, this is slow and putting units together takes a lot of man hours. We anticipate on using funding to increase output and streamline the process. We'd like to move circuit board production elsewhere as well as move to injection moulded cases, but this is expensive! Once we overcome manufacturability, we can output significantly more units and then focus on new innovations like adding fully addressable RGB's and a few other incredibly cool feature's we aren't prepared to announce yet ;)We want to ship Ravelights ASAP! Our goal is to start shipping by ASAP and we are doing everything in our power to do so, although we have set our deadline to Feb 2022, we hope everyone's order is shipped WAY before this but hurdles may occur. If you're in urgent need because of an upcoming event, send us an email and we'll do our best to try and expedite your order. ❤️ Thanks for reading to the bottom

record.Creator: Jure Šunić
record.Title: FixIT - find a handyman in your area and fix a house problem
record.Text: Description: The application should be able to connect users with workers and help them find needed help with the occurred problem.Opportunity: A major problem in-home repairs and construction services is the lack of effectiveness of the system and the non-transparency of workers.Currently, there is a wait of up to three months for certain works, which is the problem for anyone in a living or a business place, which leads to high opportunity costs.The goal is to simplify and make home repairs and construction services more accessible.Solution: Imagine a person who has damage in a household or business facility. In the digital and modern world of service availability, we solve the problem that the user finds the desired handyman at a given moment through the application and solves a problem as quickly as possible. Here comes our application, which through geolocation at a given moment gives available workers and reviews of the same, history of their completed works and the reactions of the users of the application. The customers have the opportunity to choose the most suitable ones. The deal is settled within the same day, compared to the current long-term wait for repairs. FixIT offers a better relationship between the supply and demand of consumers and workers through an online system, as well as price competitiveness (wider choice of service).Secret Sauce: It currently takes a very long time to find a worker. Thus, the possibility of repair is extended and the user is in an uncomfortable situation of wasting their precious time and money. Here comes our application with the code used by various other applications that contain the geolocation and user database. It gives us a quick and easy way to choose the best and most affordable worker, while on the other side it gives the worker the choice to accept or reject the job application. This process improves the entire supply/demand relationship, speeds up the process and saves everyone time and care in finding handymen and consumers. Our main goal is to connect and save time for both parties.Users: Since repairs cover a wide range of jobs, our customers can be anyone who needs a specific home repair or construction service. The application is based on the smooth connection between consumers and handymen, where a quality and sustainable business model would be provided through a quality service fee model (advertising, monthly subscription or low fee when charging for the service provided). The goal is to cover a larger international market and become a global application for mediation between handyman and consumer. The target group is any person who needs repair.Thank you for your support! We hope you love FixIT as much as we do!  We would be forever in your debt if you would share FixIT with your audience to help this project come to life!Share FixIT on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and TikTok.https://fixitapp.medium.com/https://www.instagram.com/fixitapp.co/https://twitter.com/fixitapp_co

record.Creator: Ahmed Elsokary
record.Title: 8bottle: Your Next Generation Smart Water Bottle
record.Text: Say hello to the 8bottle, a smart water bottle designed and proposed to help keep track of your hydration in one durable, eco-friendly package. 8bottle plans to help improve your water intake by tracking your water consumption and displaying useful information on its LED display.8bottle will have features to allow a seamless transition from a regular water bottle to a smart bottle.  8bottle considers form, functionality and future technology in its easy to carry and convenient bottle design. 8bottle will be equipped with an advanced range of smart features such as our personalized dynamic hydration tracking, sipping verification, LED display and wireless charging capability. It will be your perfect companion on any adventure. Just drink and we’ll do the rest. Convenience in your hands, designed smartly.Our patent-pending sipping verification technology is designed and planned to detect your lips, enabling truly accurate tracking of hydration levels. 8bottle is designed and planned to be equipped with advanced human lip detection sensors that work in three simple steps. Sip, verify, count.  The LED display will be on your 8bottle showing your daily goal target % and battery life. Want to check how far along your daily goal you are? Just tap the LED display to see your completed percentage. Tap again to check on battery life.Designed and planned to be made with 18/8 pro-grade stainless steel to ensure pure taste and no flavor transfer, our durable construction stands up to whatever life brings.The hydration must go on. 8bottle is designed and planned to last for up to 15 days on a single charge. When you need to power it up, just sit it down on the wireless charger included in the box. Our 8bottle app is designed and planned to help you track your water consumption throughout the day with all the metrics to keep your body firing on all cylinders. 8bottle plans to also allows you to compare with friends and view the positive impact you’ll have on the global water crisis.Choose from Matte Black, Pearl White or Thirst Blue, for a smart and sophisticated look, find a finish that's perfect for you. Take control of your hydration, it's in your hands. Get planned customized hydration goal and tips when syncing with health apps. Planned to sync with Fitbit, Apple Health, Google Fit and Samsung Health.In the U.S. alone, 38 BILLION water bottles end up in landfills each year. Bottles take over 1000 years to decompose and 80% of them are never recycled. 8bottle not only keeps you healthy but by choosing to reuse, you can help preserve the environment.8bottle and Water Project have joined forces to end the global water crisis. By raising awareness, we can build freshwater projects to areas that need it most. We care about making the world a better place and by galvanizing the support of our army of world changers, we can make a major impact together.You will also be able to track your impact on the world through our 8bottle app.The designed and planned IIP68 waterproof rating means 8bottle is protected inside and out. It’s not afraid of a little coffee, tea or a run in the rain. And dust? No worries. 8bottle is designed to be waterproof and water resistant. Need to hand wash it, go ahead. Want to take it out on a hike in a rainy day, be our guest. We thought of your convenience and designed for it.The perfect blend between comfort and durability. Designed to be carried easily everywhere and anywhere you go. Have form and function. Designed and planned to be built with 18/8 pro-grade stainless steel the durable construction stands up to whatever life brings.Our proprietary technology is planned to provide precise hydration measurement methods. The bottle is designed and planned to smartly detects your lips and measures hydration seamlessly. The app is planned to dynamically program your hydration goal based on presets settings and situations. 8bottle is designed and planned to be equipped with advanced technology and sensors that measure your daily water intake. No need to worry about incorrect tracking, our patent pending technology verifies human consumption of water. Available in three beautiful colors that look just right. with a soft touch finish that feels amazing to the touch.8bottle is currently in the final prototype phase. After finalising the design of the mold opening, 8bottle will go into mass production and be ready to deliver to backers next year.Every 8bottle plans to be shipped with a wireless charging dock, USB-C and a user manual. With a choice of three beautiful colors, you can have a bottle to match every style.8bottle founders, Ahmed and Mamoon share a lifelong passion for fitness and a desire to help provide clean accessible water to all. 8bottle is the first step on a journey to use technology for large scale benefit and real application.8bottle was originally born out of a need to track hydration accurately without compromising convenience. The name was inspired by the recommended hydration goal; 8 cups. Once we started testing pre-existing methods of hydration track we noticed accuracy and convenience had not been given enough thought. This is when we set to work on designing 8bottle.After going through a rigorous testing period we found a combination of features that made a great smart bottle. This meant designing sipping verification technology that detects human lips for accuracy, LED display and wireless charging for everyday convenience as well as a rugged waterproof exterior so this was the only water bottle you would ever need.We want to thank you for considering backing our project!

record.Creator: Jeremy Cook
record.Title: JC Pro Macro 2 Mechanical Keypad
record.Text: The JC Pro Macro 2 is a USB keyboard device that emulates keystrokes and mouse movements, saving you precious computer interface time. A swappable Arduino-programmable ATMega32U4 Pro Micro (clone) powers it, and the board provides GPIO/I2C breakout pins for unlimited tinkering and customization.The keyboard/mouse combination is a fantastic general purpose tool for interfacing with a computer, which has nominally done the job for decades. But it wasn't made just for you and the way you work with a computer. The JC Pro Macro 2 adds an extra input device that can be customized to your liking for a huge productivity boost!Using the JC Pro Macro 2, without any add-ons, one could implement:...but you'll find many of those features in other macro pads. What's unique to the JC Pro Macro 2 is that it's:The JC Pro Macro 2 features a number of unique hackable features, including:Notably, the device is an enhanced-features sequel to the original JCPM, which has been successfully built and sold here.I made the first JC Pro Macro, as well as other experimental devices that came before, in a large part because I wanted a rotary controller for my computer. After many iterations, and inspiration from others, I finally have something that I'm willing to put up on Kickstarter. But why do I like mine? Why will you find yours indispensable? First off, being able to literally crank up tunes with an encoder knob and play/pause/skip songs with dedicated hotkeys is much better than mouse-based alternatives.I also personally love using this for editing video in Final Cut Pro X. The customizable shortcuts let me make quick work cutting clips free of sub-par content, and the encoder allows me to advance clips frame-by-frame. In fact, I produced this project's Kickstarter video using the JCPM 2. How recursive!Finally, being able to control the 5V PC-style cooling fan at the touch of a button is much fun. I can start, stop, or adjust a cooling breeze with a simple keystroke!Of course, you could use it for just about anything else: gaming, robotics control, home automation, video production, music production, CAD modeling, EDA, EDM (whether dance music, or discharge machining), video conferencing... In the above video, friend and prototype tester Pat Regan shows off some amazing Linux functionality: changing its lighting based on the program in focus, modifying external lighting, and working on video in DaVinci Resolve. Below, he's even shows off another JCPM set up as a CNC pendant! Much of what he's showing in the first video is beyond my Linux/home automation know-how–and will require user setup–but it demonstrates just what is possible with this hardware, specialized for tinkering and experimentation. Example firmware will be available, and the current (standard) version is found on GitHub. The device's functionality is still under development, and a nascent community is developing around this little board that you can be a part of!My background slants towards mechanical design and electronics, and I've put a large amount of time into developing what I consider a great looking and flexible platform:Hackable Electronics:Structural Elements Include:The knob comes in two formats: This isn't my first try at a macro keyboard. In fact, as seen here, a simple volume control knob eventually morphed into a 3D-printed device. This became a PCB-based original JCPM device that I have successfully used and sold, before settling on the JCPM2 design. Since deciding on this 8-button form factor, it has gone through multiple revisions.As of this writing, the device has been tested to work with Windows, Macintosh, Linux, and Raspberry Pi systems in a variety of situations.Of course, this is really just scratching the surface of what's possible with it. I'm looking forward to seeing what people do with it!Programming and customization are via the Arduino IDE, and it can theoretically run QMK firmware for custom layouts without Arduino knowledge. Preliminary testing with QMK has been successful, and full functionality can hopefully be developed further.I'm Jeremy Cook–The "JC" in "JC Pro Macro," an engineer who simply can't help making new contraptions. After several auxiliary input devices, I'm proud to present this one for crowdfunding. You can see more of what I make and do on:Also, a big thanks to those that helped make this possible:While this is my first Kickstarter, this is not my first time selling custom electronics online. I've delivered well over 200 items from my highly rated Tindie store.Additionally, I spent a decade in manufacturing automation, making me intimately familiar with the processes needed to create many copies of one device. When in charge of manufacturing lines, failure is not an option, and I hope to bring that experience and attitude to bear here. If and when help is needed, I have a wide range of contacts that I can call upon, especially if funding and demand becomes abundant! To that end, I hope you will support this project's goal, and that I can ultimately provide you with an awesome computer input device.After testing the JC Pro Macro Original, along with a JCPM2 prototype for several months, I've had a chance to work with it, and morph it into something that works really well.PCBWay was used to manufacture the various prototype iterations of the device's main board, and has even agreed to a discount on the final product in exchange for mentioning them here. They've always delivered in a timely manner, so I'm quite confident in this aspect of the project. I also plan to use their matte black finish on the boards, which I think looks awesome.More info on the JC Pro Macro Original can be found here on GitHub, and code etc that can be used with the JC Pro Macro 2 will be stored in this repository as it develops. While the prototype device is currently functional, its final form may change from what is shown here. To be clear, what is shown in the videos here is possible with the device, but much of that functionality will take external hardware and/or software to set up. You currently need to use the Arduino IDE to change key functionality around. If you enjoy that sort of thing, I think you'll love it!Project by Jeremy Cook Consulting LLC
