record.Creator: NextScent Inc. Team
record.Title: Ventus Home & Ion: The First Scent Diffuser & Air Purifier
record.Text:
Wouldn’t you love to experience a pleasant and wonderful aroma throughout your home? We certainly do, but candles, plug-ins, wax melts, diffusers, and room sprays only cover a small area and most contribute to indoor air pollution. 
 That’s why we created the Ventus® Home & Ion - patent-pending air care solutions for your entire home. These revolutionary solutions purify the air and distribute natural fragrances with unmatched performance and safety. Unlike conventional scent products that are expensive, use flame, heat, or messy oils and wax, the Ventus solutions are safe, smart, affordable, and eco-friendly.The Ventus Home and Ventus Ion systems are the world's first and only home systems that purify the air and distribute natural fragrances throughout your home!For about the cost of a large candle, each scent-filter cartridge can safely scent your home up to 1,500 ft² for up to 3 months.Our proprietary technology ensures consistent performance for the life of each specific scent-filter cartridge.The Ventus systems use dry-evaporative technology to release natural fragrance into a filtered air stream, just like mother nature does on a breezy day. The systems are safe for use around kids and pets, and there’s no messy oil or wax residue that can damage furniture.Plus, NextScent is the first company to offer over a dozen fragrances that are certified allergen and CMR-free!The Ventus systems’ scent-filter cartridge is 99.7% effective at removing most airborne pollutants to purify the air in your home.The Ventus Ion system also includes a digital air quality sensor and a high-output plasma ionizer for enhanced purification.Scent your home when you want and how you want – from anywhere!The Ventus systems are easily controlled with the free NextScent smartphone app as well as  Alexa or Google Home.You can set schedules, adjust the intensity and elect to receive alerts of changes in air quality, cartridge depletion, or lost connectivity. Test our app now!The Ventus scent-filter cartridges are made with plant-based, biodegradable materials.Plus, NextScent is a proud member of the US Green Building Council and a sponsor of OneTreePlanted.org, which funds reforestation projects around the world so we can all breathe cleaner air.The Ventus devices can easily be placed anywhere in your home, including a table or shelf, installed over a wall outlet, or mounted under a shelf. With the optional Battery Holder Kit, your Ventus system becomes portable for up to 20 hours. * Please note, we're able to confidently estimate shipping to the U.S. and Canada during this campaign. Due to fluctuating international shipping costs, we will charge international shipping and VAT (where required) fees after the campaign ends. International shipping is via DHL at approximately 50% off list rates and will cost approximately $24 - $54 for most destinations.👋 Hi, I’m David, founder and CEO of NextScent! The idea for Ventus Home and Ventus Ion all started when I was living in Hong Kong. I realized the poor indoor air quality was affecting my 7-year-old son, so I began to research the contributing factors of indoor air pollution. I learned that in addition to outside air pollution, home scent products are a major contributor!Since I had expertise in developing commercial scent systems, I realized that I could combine air purification and scent diffusion to provide a better way for people to enjoy fresh air and clean scents.I assembled a team of scent industry experts, put pen to paper, and started working on developing Ventus Home and Ventus Ion along with safer fragrances. We came up with the world's first and only hi-performance home systems that purify the air and distribute natural fragrances throughout the home. It’s smarter, eco-friendly, and affordable to use.We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Ventus Home and Ventus Ion a reality.We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a Ventus Home or Ventus Ion, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

record.Creator: Adam
record.Title: Neural network to detect useful plants or trees in your live
record.Text:
Hello,
 Imagine that you are in the middle of nature while camping, or you are walking with your family in the woods, or you live in the countryside,

 For you, we offer three applications for smartphone and PC that allows you with your smartphone or a simple camera or camcorder to identify in real time trees or plants.
 These applications will help your teenagers who spend their day on their smartphone to love nature!

 These three applications have one thing in common: there is no need to have a network so if you plan to move to a cabin in Alaska these applications will be very useful,
 These apps all have the same goal: to learn more about nature and appreciate its benefits, to show you why to preserve it.

 Whether you live in the city, in the country, by the sea or isolated without civilization more than a hundred milles away, the first application is made for you, it can save your life or help you to treat your little boo-boo.
 This application allows you to identify in real time medicinal plants and to give you their usefulness. Like the chelidonia which treats warts with its sap, the wild thyme or the plantain which helps to relieve respiratory problems,...

 Whether you are an amateur or professional gardener, the second application is for you, it identifies the diseases that can be found in a vegetable garden and gives you a solution to eradicate it. For example, mildew can be treated with horsetail manure or a mixture of baking soda and black soap...

 The third application is for anyone who wants to know a little more about trees, those who want to know about edible fruits or berries and also for forestry professionals
 Whether it is fruit trees or trees of our beautiful forests.
 It allows to identify trees from their leaves, their fruits or their trunk,
 For example the oak with its leaves and acorns, the hazelnut tree with its delicious nuts...

 These applications are compatible with Android smartphones, IOS smartphones and PCs or tablets under Windows,

 It will be possible to record the GPS position, this feature will be very useful to find a plant to treat you from one year to another,

 The names of the plants/trees will be given in English and French, but it will be possible to give your own names according to your language or customary name, via a configuration file,

 Garonix is a startup created in 2017 with the objective of making a revolutionary machine for the production of electronic boards with real-time recognition of the position of electronic components in vac. The project was stopped because it was too far ahead of existing technologies and in particular because of the slow learning of neural networks.
 The creator of Garonix has 20 years of experience in industry, he is an electronic engineer at the base, but has skills in mechanics, electricity, low and high level computing, so technical above all.
 We are not a big team, we could have taken a picture of a meeting of friends by giving them a jersey with the same logo as some do on this site ...

 If you want some particular plants/trees to appear in the first release, you can send us your request with at least 50 pictures (leaves, flower, fruit, trunk, general appearance, small, medium and large size and if there are plants/trees that look like but are not the ones you want) per plant you want

 Why we ask for money in Kickstarter:
 -To validate the development of the applications by asking your interest, a kind of market survey.
 -To buy a big computer to make the learning of the neural network which is very greedy in resources and time.
 The experts could tell us to use the Google servers which propose in rent by the hour of the servers to make the training, but as everyone knows Google is a trader before all, the confidentiality for Google does not mean anything, it is placed above the states and the laws...

  Please note that the designer is not responsible for the use of these applications.
 The data provided will be extracted from the internet or provided by an amateur, they are given as an indication, the user is the only one responsible for the possible consequences of their uses.

record.Creator: Uber Houses LLC
record.Title: FORSALEBYDRIVER.COM
record.Text: About FOR SALE BY DRIVER was created in first instance, based on the Uber Houses model www.uberhouses.com, as our unrequested proposal to Uber.Nevertheless, we are to launch our real-time real estate software in coordination with real estate associations around the world, prior to enter the U.S. market, rebranded as FOR SALE BY DRIVER. Introducing For Sale By Driver. A challenge to traditional real estate franchises. A new opportunity for drivers, bikers and anybody to generate income. This time, from real-time real estate services.No previous contact, just request a free pick up now and a Driver or Agent Driver will take you to showings immediately.NEW Investors: Low-cost investment model in real estate services avail. to public.NEW Drivers: App drivers and agent drivers providing rides to showings.NEW Finders: Bikes and vehicles finding properties for Agents. Can join without a vehicle.NEW Agents: Confirm real-time showings. Accept new properties to upload. Set today’s properties online.NEW Agent Drivers: Accept Pick me up Now requests and new properties to upload. Drive for real estate referrals.NEW Rewards: Bitcoins, Prepaid Miles for Rides, Refunds -up to a 100% of the amount of the final sale price-. Customer .Select online properties in map .Select the Pick Up and Drop Off locations..Send a Pick Me Up Now Request. -Appointments can be scheduled for Later, including properties that are offline-. .Enjoy.The commission amounts are paid based on the percentages previously selected by the agents when uploading the listings.Agent (Listing Agent)Go online. Set listings online -Agent must be located near the property when set up as online-."Accept or Reject" showings to properties in real-time.Report sold or rented properties. Confirm properties tagged as SOLD or RENTED.Agent Driver (Selling Agent)Go online. "Accept or Reject" Pick Me Up Now requests. Take customers to real-time showings.Agent sessions can Accept new pre uploaded properties, located and sent by Finders or Drivers. Generate many referrals per month.FSBO Driver (Owner)Drive for your own listings only. Monthly fees apply. FSBO Drivers can choose among driving for their own properties or to assign these to accredited agents.Anybody can earn. Quick Referrals and Listing Requests.Generate Service Referrals by pre uploading properties not available at FOR SALE BY DRIVER. Send property information to online Agents. Follow up. Earn Service Commissions when these are tagged and confirmed by the Agents as SOLD or RENTED.FinderGo online. Accept Listing Requests. Find properties.Locate in map. Take a photo of sign. Send to agents. Keep the largest real-time real estate database up-to-date. Earn when properties are SOLD.  Driver Accept pick up requests and drive buyers to showings. Can find properties too.Earn as in usual ride-share companies or per commission when properties are SOLD. Rides are Free but, Who will assume the cost the rides?1. The accredited real estate AGENTS who drive, the Agent Drivers. Agents do not get paid for the ride itself. This is the best way for agents to generate referrals massively. 2. The DRIVERS who are looking for more profitable options. Drivers can earn either per service commission or per fraction of time and distance, as in usual ride-sharing.3. The INVESTORS pay for the cost of the rides of drivers who select not to earn per commission but per cost of the ride. Investor Invest in FREE rides for real estate showings. Select properties. Upload credit for the rides. Earn when matching ridden buyers with SOLD properties. Now, people can invest in real estate services. It can be understood as the largest non-traditional real estate international brokerage model –new configuration and structure-. In other words, many low-profile Investors assume the cost of the Lead generation –the buyers or sellers- for the Listing Agents.Agents increase probabilities to sell a higher quantity of listings faster, compared to traditional actual methods. Agents show properties to positive customers everyday. It is more profitable than sending emails or making phone calls from the office.Become a daily closer at FOR SALE BY DRIVER. Save time, compared to the old Lead generation methods - contact or showing set up procedures-.Investor Session Screens Finder Session Screens Agent Driver Session Screens  Listing Agent Session Screens Driver Session Screens  The DecentralizationFor Sale By Driver is going for the decentralization of the traditional real estate business profit generation, by offering the fastest in real-time services. Our estimation shows a larger distribution of the earnings, based on new populations' inclusion in the real estate scene.Best Customer RewardsDid you just buy a property? Tag the property as SOLD/RENTED and get refunded for *up to a 100% of the final closing price –or up to first month on rentals-. *Restrictions apply. Most importantPartner populations are limited. The system operates with less than a 1% of the actual ride-share driver fleet. Thus, every single partner account will keep highly profitable. Uber Houses is a United States registered LLC. Website www.uberhouses.com shows our intellectual property, a sample demo created -without their request- for Uber. It has not been possible for us to deliver it properly... for certain reasons. U.S. and/or international implementation(s) might be launched thru other partners, domains and/or trademarks. Neither For Sale By Driver, the Uber Houses model nor Uber Houses LLC, are related to Uber. A few proposals are being set up for other international ride-share companies as well, looking for more local business options:Sample for DiDi: DiDi Homes, China.Sample for Curb: Curb Homes, U.S.Sample for Gett: Gett Homes, Israel, UK, Russia.Sample for 99 App: 99 Homes, Brazil.Sample for Careem: Careem Homes, Middle East, South Asia, Africa. Next, a sample of configuration for real estate associations, a slightly different model:Sug. for Asociación Mexicana de Profesionales Inmobiliarios, AMPI, Mexico. 1.Budget to determine if launching the most basic or robust version.2.NAR's approval to integrate the U.S. Nationwide MLS (Mixed Listing Service or nationwide listing property database). 3.Determination of best Partnerships available after crowdfunded. In all scenarios, Agent, Finder and Driver Partner sessions will be launched.Partner Session Matrix Also, For Sale By Driver, including its non-traditional organizational business structure, methods, procedures and service fees paid to Sellers and Partners are not against U.S. real estate laws, regulations, nor the real estate associations' interests. U.S. and international real estate associations, organizations, brokerages and others as individuals are being offered to become operators in their territories. Check our extended version -explanatory- video:Become part of the restructuration of the traditional real estate business methods. For Sale By Driver TM is the future of the real-time real estate services -based on the Uber Houses model-. Join now.

record.Creator: Connor McLean
record.Title: OpenXCT
record.Text: Our goal for OpenXCT is to create the most accessible and customizable X-ray computed tomography machine on the market.During development, we reached out to the research and engineering community to fully understand the XCT users' needs. We quickly realized that users face challenges with the cost and practicality of available hardware systems and access to the underlying software. OpenXCT uses swappable mechanical components and open software so our users can take full control of their devices. To date, OpenXCT is a working prototype, constructed from 8020 extrusions and aluminum plate.Even with the prototype system, we have completed several high-resolution scans that match the quality and resolution of other industrial machines. However, the device needs improvement in consumer aesthetics and mass production practices before a full product release. With that in mind, we are moving towards the production of our final device, we have already designed our aesthetic and production improvements, and are moving closer towards our inaugural product launch! With the help of our Kickstarter backers, after carefully considering cost, availability, and practicality, we are seeking to launch the next iteration of OpenXCT.OpenXCT is compact enough to fit on your desktop and flexible enough to fit a range of needs, thanks to modular features and open-architecture software.We designed OpenXCT with price in mind, using durable, replaceable, and interchangeable hardware.This means:Mechanical SpecsOpenXCT’s modular hardware and open architecture software combine to form a system capable of scanning any subject while maintaining a reasonable price.Other compact XCT machines are much bulkier, with most around the size of large kitchen appliances. Here’s how OpenXCT can fit into your space:How it works:1. Subject   →   2. OpenXCT Device   →   3. Reconstruction1. SubjectsSubjects constructed from various materials and ranging in geometric shape, size, and complexity can be selected for nondestructive inspection of both internal and external features.2. OpenXCT DeviceOnce placed into the OpenXCT device, 360 degree X-ray projections of the subject are acquired. OpenXCT adapts to any subject or imaging needs by allowing adjustable X-ray power, max scan size, and imaging resolution.3. Reconstruction AlgorithmsOnce the scan is complete, built-in reconstruction algorithms (such as FDK and 3D SIRT) or custom user-scripted algorithms process the 360-degree scan data. The subject reconstruction can then be analyzed using the OpenXCT web-based data visualization tool.Computed tomography has been available since the mid-1900s and is proven as an essential technology for inspection and research and development.With its long-time history in numerous industries, why is the technology still so expensive?OpenXCT’s starting price is many times lower than the competition, including other compact CT devices as well as industrial CT machines.OpenXCT uses more widely available technology to decrease unit price while still maintaining the features and functionality found in more expensive offerings. At its revolutionary price point, OpenXCT makes XCT technology significantly more affordable and accessible to an unprecedented range of users.There are many types - or modalities - of X-ray imaging procedures, each of which uses different technologies and techniques. OpenXCT incorporates several X-ray inspection techniques into a single device1. 2D Radiography: An imaging technique used to view the internal form, and materials, that make up an object. 2. Internal Inspection & 3D Tomography: OpenXCT obtains 2D radiographic images 360 degrees around a subject, then combines and reconstructs them to produce cross-sections at any angle through the subject.3. 3D Reconstruction & Surface Metrology: In addition to viewing 2D slices of a subject, OpenXCT is also capable of combining the slices to create a 3D representation of the scanned subject. This produces a 3D representation of all external and internal subject features.X-ray source:Our swappable X-ray sources optimize X-ray voltage and amperage for use with various subject materials and thicknesses:4-50kV:polymers, wood, and lightweight bone60-90kV:composite, electronics, and medium-density bone100-120kV:concrete, ceramics, and dense boneProjection Imaging and Resolution:Standard 5.1 Megapixel resolution and 1x optical zoom can be upgraded to increase imaging resolution and the smallest detectable feature sizesDetector Size:Available detector sizes range from 8″x8″ to 24″x24″Environmental Commitments:OpenXCT uses long-lasting design and replaceable parts, encouraging the replacement of individual parts instead of still-in-use equipment. This way, the user can scale and swap parts of their device to suit their needs while preventing unnecessary waste.We began OpenXCT as a small project in July with the goal of making XCT more accessible. We have since brought on a team of engineers, designers, and other industry professionals to help further develop and expand OpenXCT. With your additional help and funding, we look forward to continuing the goal of creating an affordable, open-source XCT machine.

record.Creator: LuckyBot
record.Title: LuckyBot – An Affordable Food Extruder for FDM 3D Printer
record.Text: Printing food is an interesting idea, but the food 3D printers on the market are too expensive. What we want is a flexible solution for food 3D printing, so we create LuckyBot - a replaceable 3D printer extruder. You can easily install it on your original 3D FDM printer, and print food in the shape you want in a flexible & affordable way.Not everyone could cook like a Michelin star chef, but what if we bring the 3D print technology to your kitchen? You can print all the exquisite desserts with your 3D printer, easy same as you use it to print filament.That's why we create LuckyBot. It is compatible with most of the FDM 3D printers on the market. Just take a few minutes to install, then you can have a food 3D printer at a small cost.LuckyBot is designed with a perfect size that is enough to fit most of FDM 3D printers on the market and utilize the printing size of the original 3D printer to allow you to print bigger size models.Only 675g weight makes it fit your FDM 3D printer and not exceeding the limits of the motor's capacity.1.  Remove the original extruder2.  Replace with LuckyBot3.  Connect LuckyBot and original 3D PrinterLuckyBot Installation Video Based On Creality Ender-3 3D Printer:Three buttons to handle temperature control, lead screw adjustment with ease, no matter you are a professional or newbie, it only needs few minutes to get started.As for the software part, you can follow the same procedures as you print filament to operate LuckyBot.LuckyBot supports the printing of a variety of ingredients for any model you create, so you have more choices and more creativity. Whether it's an expensive ingredient like chocolate, or a widely available ingredients like jam, cream, mashed potato, salad sauce, etc.We've tested various major brands' 3D printers to make sure that LuckyBot could be installed on most of FDM 3D printers.LuckyBot can be installed on:What makes LuckyBot unique is the technology inside. With our years of development, it has better temperature system, motion control system, and advanced circuit control system. You can print more complex and precise objects than using other food printers.The temperature is the most important factor when we print food. With the advanced temperature control algorithm, we have improved the temperature control accuracy within ±0.5℃.Food is different from filament in many physical properties. We will need a better motor control system to print food with the same accuracy.LuckyBot is designed for food printing. Safety is the priority when we design LuckyBot, and all the materials are food grade. However, to make it could be used by everyone, we have enhanced the safety in power supply and temperature control. We ensure all ingredients completely sealed and do not touch the outside world during the whole printing process.LuckyBot will automatically stop heating when open the door.Unlike the normal FDM 3D printers, which use filament as materials, needing a higher temperature to print, LuckyBot works under a much lower temperature (≤40℃ ).Founded in 2014, with the focus on education, food, scientific research, and manufacturing, Wiiboox has been always committed to be a global leading supplier for 3D printing integrated solutions. We are a professional team integrating the department of design, R&D, manufacture. Our purpose is to provide affordable, high-quality 3D printers to different kinds of customers. So here we are, present our latest creation – LuckyBot, an affordable food extruder for FDM 3D printer.

record.Creator: Joseph Issa
record.Title: CREATE A FUNCTIONAL 3D PRINTER WITH BUILDING BRICKS
record.Text: ULIO 3D Brix ™  is truly an awesome fun project for everyone to enjoy playing with and learn from. We merged our childhood passion of brick-building and modern era 3D printing into a functional model 3D printer that you build brick by brick. Our step by step instructions will guide you through the entire assembly process just like any brick kit you've assembled when you were a kid.Our brickset contains over 850 parts of different shapes and sizes which are entirely compatible with all major brands (age is 14+).No need to assemble any mechanical parts of the 3D printer. We've done all the heavy lifting for you so you can enjoy a hassle free assembly process that snaps together.No need for wiring or soldering. Everything has been prewired. Once your 3D printer is assembled you only have to plug seven (7) terminals.We meticulously designed every piece of this Brick-built 3D printer to make it high quality and easy to use at a reasonable price point. Even though it's made out of bricks, it still delivers exceptionally high quality prints.                                     We use Trinamic stepper drivers in order to enjoy a very quiet 3D printing experience.Music by BensoundYou'll be surprised by the print quality of this brick-built 3D printer. The layer resolution can be as low as 50 microns. (PRUSA mini on the Left, ULIO 3D Brix ™ on the Right)We've included several safety features into the printer such as thermal runaway protection, steel baseplate printbed, Heat shield on the hotend, enclosed rack and pinion as well as fan guards.You can use non-proprietary 1.75mm PLA filament which you load and unload automatically into the 3D printer. ULIO 3D Brix ™ is designed and manufactured in Canada. Our capable team has experience in building and delivering 3D printer kits.We sincerely hope you'll enjoy ULIO 3D Brix ™ as much as we loved creating and building it for you!

record.Creator: Sequent Microsystems
record.Title: Raspberry Pi Learning Kit with a Complete Node-RED Tutorial
record.Text: Although the variety of sensors and actuators is almost unlimited, they can all be grouped in three categories, based on their electrical interfaces:1. Serial communication - RS-485 is the dominant choice, due to its ability to support multiple devices with excellent noise immunity at long distances.2. Digital inputs and outputs - From find simple switches, contacts and pushbuttons, to any circuit which can be powered by a relay.3. Analog inputs and outputs - Temperature, pressure, humidity, level, position, light and other sensors. Motors, linear and rotary actuators, and many many other devices have analog inputs and outputs. The industry standards are 0-10V and 4-20mA current loops.Raspberry Pi is a powerful and inexpensive programming platform, but it cannot connect to the physical world without additional hardware. This project brings to Raspberry Pi all the common interfaces needed to connect to the automation world:Node-RED is a programming tool for wiring together hardware devices, APIs and online services in new and interesting ways. It provides a browser-based editor that makes it easy to design flows using nodes from a large library covering a wide range of automation tasks.Learning Kit native Node-RED nodes included in the repository make it easy to interface with the hardware.The Learning Kit Card needs 5V/50mA to operate with the relays off, or 200mA with both relays on. It is powered from the Raspberry Pi through the GPIO connector.  A Raspberry Pi power supply able to provide minimum 3A is recommended.The Card contains a standard RS485 transceiver which can be accessed by the serial port of the Raspberry Pi. MODBUS protocol can be run on Raspberry Pi to access industry standard sensors and actuators.Pluggable connectors ease connecting the card to external devices.  All the connector plugs are included in your kit.Nine LEDs on the bottom edge of the card show you the status of the inputs and outputs. The leftmost LED shows when the power is connected to the board.The next two LEDs, labeled IN1 and IN3, show the status of the corresponding opto-isolated digital inputs.The middle four LEDs are general purpose. They can be connected in software to show the status of any input or output. They can also be programmed to light at a certain input or output level. For example, you can learn how to turn on a LED when a temperature reaches a threshold. You can also blink a led slower when a temperature is relatively low, and faster as it approaches a preset limit.The two rightmost LEDs are routed to the corresponding relays and show when the relay coil is activated.Zero to 10V Input can be used to sense voltage levels from devices such as thermistors, humidity sensors, or photoresistors. Zero to 10V output can be used for actuating industry standard devices such as lighting controller.Widely used industry standard 4-20mA current loops can be used to control remote devices over long distances with high noise immunity.A pushbutton is provided to be able to add manual input to any system. The button can also be used by Node-RED or other Raspberry Pi programming in an arbitrary manner.  The first Tutorial lesson gives some examples from saying "Hello World" to sending SMS or email messages.The Motor port can drive a 5V/100mA DC Motor. You can learn how to control the speed and the direction of the motor from the command line, Python or Node-Red graphical user interface.See Update #21. Raspberry Pi Learning Card 2. Connector Plugs 3. Brass standoffs, screws and nuts 4. Self Test Loopback Cable1. Command Line Interface2. Python Interface3. Hardware Schematics4. User's Guide5. Node-RED TutorialThe optional Add-on kit contains six cable assemblies which let you experiment with the I/O interfaces of the Learning Kit. The Node-RED tutorial will have ample description of each interface, teaching you how to interact with it without writing a single line of code. Command line and Python drivers will also be available for each assembly.  Simply plug in the accessory plug into the corresponding port and run the software1. ON-OFF-ON Switch. The switch can be used to read the contact closure inputs.  2. Thermistor.  The thermistor can be used to measure ambient temperature using the 0-10V input.  3. Photoresistor. The photoresistor will let you measure light. You can use it to turn lights on at dark, to see when somebody enters a room, or for any application which needs light. It can be read also with the 0-10V input. 4. Potentiometer.  Used also with the 0-10V input, the potentiometer will let you simulate the analog output of a sensor which you can display in Node-RED.5. RS485 Temperature and Humidity Sensor.  Plug it into the RS485 port for data, and the 4-20mA port for power, and use Node-RED to interface to it.6. Micromotor. Plug it into the MOTOR port and control the speed and direction from Node-RED.In addition to the I/O Learning Kit, you will need the following:1. Raspberry Pi. The Learning Card will work with any Raspberry Pi version 3 or 4, but we recommend using the latest (4). Make sure you get a power supply and an SD Card. If you have never programmed the SD Card, you should get it pre-programmed for the Raspberry Pi of your choice.2. USB keyboard and mouse.3. Monitor or TV with an HDMI port.4. DVM multimeter.5. Optional IO Accessory Add-on KitThe I/O Learning Card can be self tested with the loopback cable included in your kit. The Loopback Cable can be plugged into corresponding connectors on the opposite sides of the card. After inserting the Test Cable in one of the four possible positions, you need to run the Self Test command  from the command line, or from Node-RED.1. Test digital inputs IN1 and IN2 using RELAY-1.2. Test digital inputs iN2 and IN4 using RELAY-23. Test 0-10V-IN port using 0-10V-OUT4. Test 4-20mA-IN port using 4-20mA-OUTAll the analog inputs and outputs are calibrated at the factory, but firmware commands permit the user to re-calibrate the board, or to calibrate it to better precision. See the User's Guide for calibration details.The Tutorial will help you use the Learning Kit with Node-RED without writing a single line of code. It will show you how to use Node-RED to control each of the interfaces of the Learning Kit. It will start by building simple flows using the pushbuttons and the LEDs and advance to the point where you can control devices over the internet. You can start learning Node-RED today without waiting for the Learning Kit. You will start by sending "Hello World" greetings to your screen or your speakers, and advance to sending emails and SMS messages to your smart phone.CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THE FIRST THREE CHAPTERSRaspberry Pi add-on teaches Node-RED I/O programming

record.Creator: Bubl
record.Title: Bubl Music
record.Text: Available in 2022 for Android and iOS devices, Bubl combines intelligent discovery, next generation music content streaming and social features designed to bring fans, artists, labels and (in the future) venues from around the world together over their love of music. Think Spotify x Facebook x Patreon x Tinder (for music, not love!). Bubl's design means that music tracks / videos, photos, videos, events, tickets, merchandise, live streams, group chats, fan content and more are all under one 'roof'. No more switching between different applications to find that song you wanted to share with your friends, no more missing those important releases or announcements. For artists, there's a free platform for exposure to global audiences, versatility in how you make your music available and new ways to engage with your fans. On top of that, we pledge to put more in your pocket with unique, innovative revenue opportunities. It's time music fans really had something to sing about!Let's start with our mission statement:In early 2021, Bubl was born; largely out of frustration. Frustration at the lack of a centralised app for all your music needs, and frustration with music streaming and social media platforms. Regardless of what tech companies developed, finding new music, supporting your favourite artists, and connecting with fans of the same kind of music we love wasn't easy and meant switching constantly between several apps. Meanwhile, artists are seeing their revenues cut, promotion only seems to go to the top 1% and social platforms have become hotbeds for hate and vitriol. And the owners of these existing platforms? Well, they seemed to be getting richer off the very artists (and rights holders) who are often struggling to make ends meet.At Bubl, we believe it's time for change; time to better look-after the music we love and cherish so much. None of us at Bubl want to be billionaires and we aren't looking to exploit artists in the pursuit of wealth. Our business model reflects this, and has been designed and created to ensure as much of the money from sales and streams goes straight back to the artist. Discovery mode generates NO revenue for Bubl; we don't charge artists or listeners, nor will you find adverts. It is simply a product born out of desire - the desire to make connecting artists and new fan bases less challenging. We have spent the past 6 months designing, specifying, and planning this project meticulously. It's hugely ambitious. But so are we.Headquartered in London, and with remote offices in Brighton and Serbia, Bubl was founded by music lovers and technology industry 'veterans' who are passionate about creating better opportunities for music fans and artists alike. With backgrounds in social gaming (EA, Warner Bros, Microsoft, Zynga), artist management, TV / broadcast and development of live music streaming platforms (one of our team built the Apple iTunes Festival streaming service) and dating / community tools, we have the tools, skills and know-how to deliver what we believe will revolutionise music streaming and social media. For more information about the leadership team, please visit our LinkedIn Page: Bubl on LinkedIn At Bubl, we chose to launch on the Kickstarter platform for two main reasons: 1) The Kickstarter platform gives us access to a global, engaged audience of early-adopter consumers looking for the next big thing. Our team and our supporters believe Bubl can change how we consume, share and support music for the better, and we think the Kickstarter platform is a good place to find like-minded folks.2) By raising funds via Kickstarter, we are able to retain our independence and engage in a meaningful way with our backers. This seems particularly relevant in the context of music, but we want to only answer to the community we pledge to serve and support; no external bias from investors or those with an interest beyond supporting ALL artists. The money raised through this campaign will be used to pay for the following:Beyond our £350,000 goal, we have stretch goals which will expedite the development and release of future 'modules'. For more on this see below (Timings & Release Plan) Bubl is built around three core features: discovery, streaming and social engagementFor ListenersBubl’s takes music fans on a journey to unearth new artists and tracks - for free.Enter your search criteria and let Bubl’s intelligent Discovery Mode find new tracks and artists to fall in love with.Create different Discovery ‘journeys’ and discover a variety of new music. As time passes, Bubl will update your journeys with new tracks, ensuring there’s always new music to enjoy.For ArtistsBubl gives artists the opportunity to be heard on what is the world's first free music discovery platform. Reach new audiences and showcase up to five songs to a global audience whilst providing background information, lyrics and meaning to songs.Discovery Mode is optional, ad-free, and Bubl will NEVER charge artists to be heard, nor charge listeners to enjoy new music in Discovery Mode. Note: Listeners will only be able to listen to tracks once in Discovery mode, and no royalty payments are paid for plays in this feature. For listenersMusic lovers can listen to songs, watch music videos, create and share playlists with friends and groups, and enjoy other artist-exclusive content. On top of enjoying music for free in Discovery Mode, Bubl offers music made freely available by artists for a limited time or number of plays. We understand that not everyone wants, or is able to purchase a recurring subscription, which is why we have created Bubl’s unique pay-per-play ‘Jukebox’ system. This allows music fans to purchase Bubl Credits from the app store and enjoy all premium content. Last but not least, fans can now get even closer to the artists they love with Artist VIP Passes. Gain access to exclusive content as well as early access to new music, gig tickets, merchandise, live streams and more. For Artists Bubl gives artists and rights holders multiple ways of hosting music, as well as the opportunity to earn industry leading royalties. This flexibility gives less-established artists further opportunities to grow their audience easily and for free. VIP Pass brings a new revenue opportunity and genuine ways to reward your most loyal fans. Give VIPs early access to music, merchandise and tickets, access to your exclusive content such as tracks, interviews, music videos, rehearsals, live streams, Q&As and more. YOU are the artist, YOU are in control.   *Subscription launch TBC** Access to artist catalogue via VIP Pass dependent on rights holders permission. Built for the global music community, Bubl is designed to bring like-minded music lovers, artists, fans, labels, venues, music instructors and more together to discover and share new music, to support musicians, and to help better plan events.Bubl makes the sharing and celebration of music safe and easy, while providing artists a meaningful way of growing and engaging with a global fanbase.Bubl provides new, unique revenue streams for artists and increased royalty payments for rights holders.JukeBox (Pay per play)Rights holders will earn a penny per stream* via Jukebox mode. Founding artists will benefit from an existing 'economy' from day one, with Bubl Credits being awarded with listener and artist tiers.*UK penny (£0.01) / US $0.014¢ (at time of press)VIP Pass (£3.99* / month per artist)For the most loyal fans, VIP Passes grant access to all Exclusive content, and in many cases, access to the artist's entire catalogue. Artists will earn £2.50 / VIP Pass holder per month, with £0.44 going to Bubl, and the rest going to the taxman / payment provider. Think of this a bit like Patreon, but alongside your music and social content.*US $5.49 / month per artistFor Labels / Rights HoldersQuite simply, Bubl pays more per stream than other established platforms. Add unlimited free uploads for 12 months / life, meaningful social interactions with label followers, the support for physical sales in the future, and you've got a platform designed to fully support you and the artists you represent. For more information please visit our artist page.Nov 30th 2021 - Kickstarter Campaign endsApril 2022 - Beta Live - access for those with a Backstage passMay 2022 - Music content upload opens for day one Artists / LabelsJune 2022 - Day One release to all day one Listeners / Artists and LabelsJuly 2022 - Remaining backers (non-day one) invited in & Bubl available globally August 2022+ - Further features added based on Bubl community feedback* FullTimings TBC & subject to changeMinimum Viable Product (MVP)Reaching the funding goal will enable the completion and release of Bubl's MVP, consisting of the following features:Beyond the MVP / Feature VotingBeyond this initial funding goal, we will commit to developing additional features post-launch including: Each of the above features is roughly the same in terms of integration / development, so Bubl can commit to building and supporting one of these for every £100,000 we raise beyond our campaign target. Example - Kickstarter campaign raises £650,000, we commit to delivering the MVP in August 2022, and three further features, as chosen via a vote by the Bubl community. The order they will release in will be up to the global Bubl community, and how members choose to exercise their vote, which will take place in-app. (Bubl members must have Voting right in order to vote) Why are we doing this? Well, we are confident we are building a beautiful, easy to use app, but we are also conscious that the Bubl community will have their own ideas and needs - so we want to make sure that we are addressing those needs and supporting the very community we are building in every way possible.*Subscriptions will go live when Bubl has a set volume of content on the platform vs as a result of a vote.Back Stage - Limited access to pre-release, Beta versions of Bubl. Help our developers ensure a stable, premium experience by providing feedback and reporting issues.Jam Session - You're invited to a video meeting (or two) with the founder of Bubl. We will give you the chance to learn more about the platform, to share your thoughts and ask any questions you may have. Guitars optional. Gold Circle Ticket - Download and experience Bubl from day one as a listener. Make friends and discover new music before the rest of the world is let in.Main Stage Slot - As an artist, this gives you day one access and the chance to be one of the first to be heard on the Bubl*. Day 1 Label Status - We're not just another DSP, and you're not going to want to miss the chance of being on Bubl from day one.* General Admission - Once all day one members have been granted access, those with General Admission permitted to log in and use Bubl.VIP Pass (1 Month) - A month's access to any artist's VIP content. For those purchasing tiers with multiple VIP Passes, you can choose to support one artist for several months, or several artists at once - the choice is yours.Jukebox Plays - Bubl Credits allow you to listen to Premium content on the platform, without the need for a subscription. 1 Credit = One play. Like a digital Jukebox.Distribution Deal - For artists, labels and rights-holders, we are offering fee-free uploads for 12 months and for life. Quite simply, it won’t cost you any money to upload your music tracks - whether that’s an EP or a host of compilation albums.Voting @ Band Meeting - As described above (Beyond the MVP / Feature Voting) we will ask the Bubl community to make decisions around the design and development of the app. If you have a vote, you are invited to help decide how Bubl grows. Name(s) on the List - Bit like a nightclub, but without the scary bouncers. If you have this, you will have your name / artist name / label name in the credits. Forever. It’s a small thing, but we want to ensure the world is aware that you helped bring Bubl to life.Ticket for a Friend - What would a social platform be without your friends? With an extra invite you can introduce your friends to Bubl and get them discovering great new music in no time. All invited friends will have day one access, but NOT voting rights.Exclusive Merchandise - Unique, digital items to adorn your listener, artist and label profiles. Show the world that you were one of the first on the platform. Badges and their designs will vary by tier. The designs are still TBD, but these launch badges will not be available once the Kickstarter campaign ends. Bubl Fanzine - Our music newsletter to keep up to date with all the goings on at Bubl with band features, development updates, offers and news.*Labels and Artists will be invited to upload content 1 month prior day one.

record.Creator: Christian Gentile
record.Title: Psykoboard
record.Text:
Psykoboard is an innovative multifunctional electric skateboard/scooter that respects the environment, built by hand by means of the AUTOCLAVE processing, it is entirely in Carbon fiber (material that can be reused indefinitely, light and performing) the powerful electric motors are placed in the wheels and the battery it is easily replaceable and recharges in a short time. The Design is Made in Italy, the peculiarity also lies in the design that allows it to be used also as a wake skate or snow skate, moreover from this year Psykoboard has an added value: we have created the stick / handlebar, to transform it into a perfect scooter.It can also be used when it rains and with puddles, as its peculiarity is that it is the first electric skateboard in the world with integrated splash guard, that is, you do not get wet when riding in the wet.
 It is a perfect SMART MOBILITY.
 The electronic system and electric motors are completely waterproofed since the motor is housed inside the wheels, with a cooling system and self-regenerative braking, to recharge the Li-Poly battery.
 A comparison with the internal electric brushless wheel motors, and the brushless motors of other existing electric skateboards, Psykoboard's motors generate less heat, are protected from dust and water (waterproof level IP65), with better performance, efficiency and reliability, therefore safety. at the top.
 The two brushless wheel motors guarantee an acceleration of starting torque and formidable climbing performance (climbing grade 25%) and the drive wheel tires are replaceable.
 The lightweight battery can be quickly replaced without any problems.
 Psykoboard skateboard is controlled by a remote control with excellent ergonomic design of modest size, it has multiple functions, such as two speeds, including normal and sport. The remote control directs forward or reverse gear equally. Due to this peculiarity Psykoboard can be used to drive with front or rear wheel drive depending on the needs being a "Twin Tip".
 The Psykoboard skate comes with a replacement tire for the drive wheels, battery charger, battery, rechargeable remote control and key to adjust the trucks.Last year we had the honor of participating in a small appearance of the wonderful film "La Vita davanti a sè" by Eduardo Ponti with the great Sofia Loren who had an Oscar, golden globe and David di Donatello nomination.
 PSYKOBOARD has all safety certifications such as: CE, FCC, RoHs, MSDS, UN, 38.3.

record.Creator: Ben Izen
record.Title: Samurai 120 CNC Machine
record.Text: We are back! After our last 2 Kickstarters failed over a year ago we went away and grew our Instagram page and continued to work on improving the machine.We currently have a few generous people who have decided to spend over double the normal price on a machine just to help get us started. Thanks to their efforts we have already raised a total of £35,000! We decided to do a kickstarter because there may be other people who want to join in on the initial funding and any more sales will help us reduce the cost to manufacture and increase our chances of success.If you would like to pay extra for an early machine please contact us first.For a long time Tormach and Taig have been the well know providers of small hobby cnc machines. We think its time for change.While these two companies aim to provide beginner friendly, high quality, hobby machines, and do a great job at it, we want to sell a low cost, mini vmc.Also lots of people are wasting time and money on their 'DIY CNC' or 'CNC Conversion' and we want to stop that. It sounds exciting at first but halfway through you realise that its going to take much more time and money than you expect and the result won't be as good as you expect.We want to make a machine so affordable and desirable, that there is no reason to attempt a DIY CNC anymore.Its basically a manual milling machine that you can convert to CNC by adding steppers and electronics. It can be shipped as a kit or mostly assembled so you can still get to experience the fun part of making your own machine. Assembling the machine yourself has the added benefit of teaching you how it works so if something needs to be replaced later, you will know exactly what to do.The idea for the CNC Conversion kit actually came from a YouTube comment on our video. We think its a good place for us to start because there are few things to go wrong compared to making a complete vmc. It will also be the cheapest option and we want everyone to be able to experience this machines capability.This machine will cut practically any material a large VMC will cut, its just a question of how fast.Below shows a production run I did of 100 airsoft gun parts in 7075T6 aluminium. This kind of job is normally left for the big VMC's to handle but this machine did it.It took 7 minutes to rough out each of these parts, the final weight reduction was 80%.We have tested this machine with hundreds of parts over the years, check out @izenengineering and @samurai_machine_tools to see just some of the parts we have made.There have been stressful times where I was late with an order and had to rough twice as fast to get it delivered the next day and this machine always just gets the job done. You can count on this machine for when it matters. Its earned its VMC title for that.CNC machining has the potential to make you a lot of money. Whether you offer a service where you machine other peoples parts or you manufacture your own products at a fraction of the price, you could make a living with a machine like this. Now I'm not gonna pretend that you could pay for this machine in a day, or a week or even a few months, especially if you are new to this, but if you are willing to put in the work it will be possible.Unlike most DIY CNC's, you can be confident that the Samurai 120 will perform exceptionally, and will not suddenly stop working, which is crucial when using a machine to make money.We know the struggles of using stepper motors so all our machines that include motors use JMC servos. They are tuned to optimise performance and improve crash safety.Servos don't ever lose steps, and if they lose position (due to a crash) they send an alarm signal to the controller which e-stops the machine. They are also silent.Protecting the motion components is one of the most important aspect of any metal cutting machine. Leaving ballscrews exposed to metal chips will very quickly destroy them and give you low quality parts.The prototype machine has accordion way covers on the Y axis and they work ok but its a bit annoying having to clean them constantly. For me it is not acceptable to sell a product that has an inherently annoying aspect so we are using covers with stainless steel shields.We will be using Mach 4 on all our CNC machines because it is the best software that runs on Windows in our experience. Mach 4 gives us the option to write our own scripts and design custom UI without having to spend thousands developing our own software.Newfangled solutions also offer great support which is crucial to selling a CNC machine.We spent years looking for a motion controller for this machine and couldn't find one that was good enough so we are developing our own with the help of PoLabs. This machine has been through hundreds of iterations over the years. I used this machine for a job shop business so any time there was something I didn't like, I would change it. I repeated that cycle for years and thats how we have ended up with an exceptional machine.Apologies in advance for the poor quality images and messy workshop but when I was making this machine I had no intention of selling it so I didn't bother with fancy photos. I was also 18.I should also note I built this entire thing by hand and with a £100 drill press. All the machined components (excluding spindle) were made by a crappier version of this machine.Do Not try this at home... it was not fun. All the next machines will be made on a large VMC. This thing is cool nglThe initial batch price is double the normal price and for that you get a more rigid machine with servos and it should arrive much sooner, especially if you live in the UK. It won't be the best value for money, so only choose this option if you really want to support us and be a part of something new. This will be done separately to kickstarter.Please contact us for more details.samurai.machine.tools@gmail.comThe hardest part of making a DIY CNC is the spindle. The market is currently full of large spindles from China, so if you need a small BT30 spindle for your machine look no further.Don't want to pay full price for a machine? Pledging for just 1 axis at a time might be the best option for you.The idea is that you buy the Y axis (base) for example and only pay £800. You can then assemble it and assess the quality and if you are happy you can order the rest of the machine. This is great for people who understandably don't want to risk all their money on kickstarter. Alternatively you could use it as a way to slowly upgrade your current DIY CNC. You could buy the spindle and attach it to your machine, then when you have saved up you could buy the Z axis (column) then base e.c.t.This is the first version of the machine we will be making because it is the cheapest and there's fewer things to go wrong. When you receive this machine you will have to assemble everything apart from the spindle. Then to get it working as a CNC machine you will need to add your own electronics. We will support you through this process.What's included:Standard CNC features:This is the full package. ATC, enclosure, flood coolant, touchscreen, lights, chip management, stand. Basically everything you would find in a typical VMC, just much smaller and much cheaper.We are currently not making this version of the machine, but it will be available Q3 2022. However if you pledge for a cnc or conversion kit you will later have the option to upgrade to the VMC.Standard VMC Features (coming later):ATC - £1500The ATC is something we are currently developing and it is in the early prototype stage. When complete it should be capable of tool to tool in 6 seconds and hold 14 tools.You will be able to attach it to any of our cnc machines.Servos - £4002x 100w JMC integrated servos1x 180w JMC integrated servo with brakeFirst part kit - £500Includes everything needed to make a part, which is a tool tightening fixture.1x Precision Vice1x BT30 tool holder5x Vertex ER Collets5x High quality end mills appropriate for the job5x Aluminium billets1x Small air compressorSupport through the process and instruction videos.We think customers should have the right to repair any product they own. Also with a CNC machine it is much easier to find faults and fix them with new parts unlike a smartphone or any other device.This machine has been designed to make assembly and disassembly relatively easy, but more importantly, the most expensive component on this machine costs just £200. That means if there is ever an issue with anything, its likely that you will only be set back £200 at most, and thats something completely new to the industry.Also the total cost of all the bearings is £200, that means in a few years when the machine is near the end of its life you can replace all bearing components for £200 and the machine will be as good as new.Unlike most companies, we charge less money for replacement parts than they cost us. That way if you need to buy a replacement part, we lose money, and therefore there is no conflict of interest. Many other companies charge way too much on replacement parts, essentially making money from that, therefore they have no interest to make a more reliable product since they make money when something goes wrong.We are past the prototyping stage, and the final CAD models are mostly completed, but there is still some work to do to ensure the models are perfect. The next thing to do is order the components from china, give the go ahead to our UK manufacturers, and make some of the aluminium parts ourselves. The only thing we haven't decided on yet is the material for the sheet metal. Its likely to be 5051 but we are considering SS304 or Aluminized steel for increased durability.A production prototype will be made and tested to ensure all the improvements from the prototype don't have any negative effects and if all is good the rest of the machines will be made.We all know Kickstarter is notorious for having failed projects and we don't want to follow that trend. With the initial batch, we can actually guarantee your machine will be made, and if not, you will get a full refund.For the Kickstarter machines to be made, we will need to make a total of 40 sales by September 2022. Previously it would have been difficult for us to guarantee that but we are very quickly growing our Instagram page and are finding new potential buyers every week. Also when the Initial batch machines are delivered that will convince a lot more people to buy.Kickstarter payments are done through bank transactions and there is not the option for PayPal. You will only be charged at the end of the campaign so please make sure your card has sufficient funds by that time (1st December).Payment for the initial batch will be done via PayPal invoice and there will be the option for financing. While we do offer worldwide shipping, there is currently a huge supply chain issue in the global economy and that will slow things down. As a result, we are not including the shipping price in the pledge amount so you will have to pay for that after the campaign. The price may range from £400-1000 and lead time is not guaranteed right now. If you need a machine urgently you may be able to pay extra for faster delivery.What we can guarantee however is that the machines will be made in just a few months so if the situation does improve you may receive a machine much sooner than you expect.You will get one year warranty on your Samurai for parts that unexpectedly fail. However it is expected that ballscrews and other bearings will wear down according to how you use the machine.All parts to the machine will be available on our website and installation instructions will also be available.

record.Creator: Reika
record.Title: The Travel Pack: The Ultimate Travel & Photography Backpack
record.Text: The Travel Pack is the Ultimate Sustainable Carry-on backpack, designed for one-bag travel and photography whilst on the move. The Travel Pack allows you to do more and go further than you ever thought you could. Get out there, life won't wait.We designed the travel pack as the solution to two problems; curbing fast consumerism by ethically and sustainably crafting products from recovered ocean waste fabrics, whilst seamlessly enhancing the experiences of travelers worldwide.First time backing a Kickstarter project? We figured you could use some help! Try talking to our friendly chatbot, Sebastian:Whilst we’re believers in one-bag travel, we get that sometimes you need that extra roller bag. We added luggage pass-through to the travel pack so that when your shoulders need a rest, simply slide your bag over the handle of your roller.The Travel Pack features a 6-point harness system for maximum comfort and stability when carrying heavy loads. Travel backpacks are generally designed for short A-Z trips. Instead, we designed with the borderless journey in mind, because often travel isn’t one-dimensional and your bag shouldn’t be either.Designed with travelers in mind, we made conscious design decisions that ease and enhance your experience on the go. We added a fully adjustable and removable magnetic sternum strap, for one-handed adjustment on the move.We’ve integrated four Hypalon Lash Points into the Travel Pack which work seamlessly with our accessory straps to give you the option of carrying an extra jacket, tripod, or towel on the outside of the pack. THE PERFECT PACK REVIEW HERE:WANDERING DOTS REVIEW HERE: Fully stowable straps allow you to stay agile on the move. Whether you need to stow your bag in the hold or switch to duffel carry mode.Aluminium clip hooks allow you to seamlessly switch between backpack and duffel mode in a matter of seconds.Our seam-sealed Rain Cover is designed to keep your gear dry in the harshest of conditions. From torrential downpours in Costa Rica to the daily commute to the ofﬁce. This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Benjamin Enrique Alvarado
record.Title: Chronicle - Keep Track of Your Chronic
record.Text: Chronicle is a quick, simple approach to logging and rating your favorite strains of cannabis. Keep track of what you like, weed out what you don’t.What we are building:A digital journal that keeps track of your chronic, Chronicle simplifies the cannabis rating and logging process. It’s easy to access your favorite products and strains, so you are prepared for your next dispensary visit.As the cannabis industry evolves, there has been an increased understanding of cannabinoids and their effects. Simply put, cannabis affects everyone differently. The typical sativa, indica and hybrid indicators generally aren't enough to help you figure out if you’ll enjoy a particular strain. Two common responses from people who have tried cannabis are that they’ve felt sleepy or paranoid. Keeping track of strains they’d rather avoid would make many people’s cannabis journeys much smoother.Some Features Include:More Features To Come:Why we are building Chronicle:Twenty years ago, cannabis was illegal in all 50 states. Two decades later, we are inching our way closer to federal legalization, with more than a third of U.S. states legalizing both medicinal and recreational adult use. What does that mean? An influx of cannabis information, products, strains and terminology have made their way into everyday conversation and consumption.When I moved to Colorado, I experienced this firsthand; I was completely overwhelmed by the amount of products available. I thought, how can one keep track of every product they consume? How can you remember to not purchase a strain that once made you feel paranoid? I wanted a quick and easy tool to keep track of what I like, and with the incorporation of a rating system, weed out what I don’t.My partner Travis's late father attempted to learn more about medical marijuana but found it uncomfortable to walk into a modern dispensary with no cannabis knowledge. He was overwhelmed by all of the products. The information given to him by budtenders did not match his personal experience with cannabis strains and products, and he began journaling his cannabis journey to discover his preferences himself.Together, Travis and I felt Chronicle was a product that could benefit all types of cannabis consumers — even the experienced cannabis user. We've been running the cannabis design agency Resin Refinery together for three years, with the goal of reducing the stigma surrounding cannabis brands. We have helped dispensaries and brands appeal to the modern cannabis consumer and now feel that we can make a larger impact directly helping cannabis consumers. Our design and development skills allowed us to create Chronicle with no starting capital.At this point, 75% of the base functionality is in the Chronicle app, with just minor backend work remaining. We have our app flow finished and now just need to clean up the design and experience.Our budget will primarily be used for marketing purposes. Because cannabis isn't federally legal, social media platforms have yet to update their content policies to reflect legalization in large portions of the country — making it difficult for cannabis-related companies to effectively market their products. Therefore our efforts will be accomplished by partnering with the right influencers and promoting posts.Early Bird Supporter:Early Bird Super Fan:Tier 1 Rewards:Tier 2 Rewards:Tier 3 Rewards:Tier 4 Rewards:Tier 5 Rewards:Tier 6 Rewards:

record.Creator: Letusavail, LLC
record.Title: Letusavail: The new way to connect
record.Text: My name is Isaiah Washington. I am an entrepreneur from Brooklyn, New York. I had an idea in 2017 to help entrepreneurs and creatives alike to get the exposure they deserve. Entrepreneurship is at an all time high. People are understanding that true freedom is doing what you love for a living.  Some people may like their 9-5, but if you're like me, you want more out of life. I believe everyone should have a chance to make their dreams a reality. Unfortunately, many people  lack the resources necessary to give them the platform needed to live out their dreams. Not anymore. Letusavail helps connect artists, musicians, DJs, make up artists, stylists, public speakers, photographers and more, connect with the right consumers. Simply download the app. Create a profile. Post what you service and or talent and get discovered. That is our goal. We want you to leave your 9-5 because your band posted on Letusavail and now you have a gig filled calendar. It's time for change. It's time to get discovered. It's time to AVAIL.

record.Creator: Step2Gold
record.Title: Ta-Da Chair | Smart Folding Chair That Keeps Pace With You
record.Text: When it comes to outdoor activities, we all know how much we appreciate gears that are efficient, lightweight and versatile to save us from hassle.Whether you want to take a short break during the hike, stay put to capture the perfect shot or wait patiently while fishing, it is when quick and comfortable seating comes in handy. Ta-Da Chair Series 2 is the ideal essential for those who seek portability and functionality. When stashed, It serves as a hiking stick with a comfortable grip; and to make it a chair, it takes only a second to set up. Let us show you how fast and easy it is to set it up!Ta-Da Chair Series 2 is perfect for all kinds of outdoor activities: camping, hiking, beach trips, picnics, festivals and concerts - you name it!It folds slim into a hiking stick that boasts extra mobility and won’t occupy any precious space in your backpack when you’re out there venturing. Grab a chair and enjoy the moment. Wherever, whenever!A simple design is not equal to compromising on the details. In order to be comfortable from sitting down to getting up, the seating height is 50cm off the ground, while most camping chairs and stools sit low, so no need to overly bend your knees and scrunch your legs to get up!When sitting down, your legs are in a natural position with sufficient space to keep yourself comfortable.Most foldable camping chairs come with fabric seats that allow you to sink into it, it is difficult to get out of and could be uncomfortable for your legs and knees, or it gets saggy after some time of use. When you sit down, The solid texture seat provides a firm seating; and it is also a breeze to get up when you need to act fast on the move.With its special design, setting up is easier than ever, just like opening and closing an umbrella. Simply release the seat lock, push the switch grip down and secure it. It takes only a second, and you’ve got yourself a comfy seat!To take down and stow it, pull the seat up and lock it back into a slim stick.Ta-Da Chair Series 2 is a compact yet heavy duty chair. The aviation-grade aluminum alloy structure allows the chair to hold its position and prevents it from collapsing easily. Combining the reinforced stainless steel rim and the safety buckle, it weighs only 1 kg (2 lbs) yet supports weight up to 130kg (286 lbs). The anti-slip and anti-sink rubber feet with a spiral pattern that provides more stability, allowing the chair to be placed anywhere from pebble path to smooth surface.The seat and the plastic components are UV resistant, and the frame is made of top quality aviation-grade aluminum alloy, making it not only strong, but also corrosion resistant, waterproof and easy to clean. No matter the weather condition or the terrain, this is the perfect essential for all your outdoor activities!Aiming to provide great portability and extra mobility, it is light in weight and comes with an ergonomic handle that is made easy for taking it on the go and serves as a hiking stick, taking no space in your backpack or luggage.With every Ta-Da Chair Series 2, we offer a free storage bag. The bag is made of nylon and it is laundry machine washable and strong. You can toss it in the back of the trunk or carry it another way using the strap to bring it over the shoulders. There are lots of foldable chairs on the market, but we noticed that many of them or the camping gears require taking more time and several steps to put together. If less time is spent on set up, the more time is saved for enjoying.Another seemingly inevitable issue with most foldable chairs is that no matter what kind of chair you bring along to the outdoors, even the lightest ones take up space in your backpack, it's still the burden for space-conscious people, so we wondered if we could give the chair another purpose when it’s folded. Therefore, we came up with the idea of combining these functions and Ta-Da Chair was born.We made operating the chair super fast and easy, just like opening and closing an umbrella - absolutely effortless, perfect for users of all ages. However, it’s not easy to make a simple and one-piece design that is as steady and durable. From the structure to the material, we spared no detail and worked hard to overcome the challenges. After months of tests and adjustments, we managed to create the folding chair that met our standards, and we sincerely hope you will find it amazing, too!We call this project Ta-Da Chair "Series 2" as this is the upgraded version of our previous design. In hope of bringing convenience and comfort, but without sacrificing on the experience, we have created the 1st generation of Ta-Da Chair earlier. We valued the feedback from every user and we knew that this product had the potential to be even better.Here are some major upgrades and improvements that we made for Ta-Da Chair Series 2:The structure of Series 2 is simpler but it provides more sturdiness and durability than the 1st generation. After the hard work on research and tests, we designed a reinforced stainless steel rim to hold the structure better and provide more stability. With this new design, the weight capacity has been increased: Series 2 can support up to 130kg, which is 30kg more than the 1st generation (around 100kg capacity load).The area of the seat surface of Series 2 is larger and wider by 15% than the 1st generation for extra comfort.In the 1st generation, the lock has to be twisted to unlock and expand the chair. For Series 2, we made a refinement of the lock and changed the way from twisting to clipping, and the new switch grip is made for easy operation: push it to unfold, and pull it to pack up - saving you force and time, with much smoother movement. The handle of Series 2 is shaped into a closed loop for a comfortable grip, and you can also hang it for easy storage.After one year of numerous brainstorming, refinements and tests, we’re proud to present Ta-Da Chair Series 2 with the enhanced features that allow you to venture out with ease and flexibility, and we’re sure that you’ll be satisfied with it!Here in Step2Gold, we have accumulated years of solid experience and techniques, all products are made with precision down to every detail; and with our own factory in our homeland, every process during the manufacturing is carefully planned and monitored to hold the best control of production and quality. It is our goal to develop innovative and top quality products to improve outdoor experience and make everyday life more convenient and joyful.We’re proud to be recognized by several international design awards: Good Design, International Design Excellence Awards, Concours Lépine International Paris, Geneva International Inventions etc.

record.Creator: Jay Prab
record.Title: HandyDandy
record.Text: HandyDandy is a device that quickly and simply attaches to a faucet, much like one of those water filters.HandyDandy solves three problems that are inherent in the way people are cleansing their hands.People have been told they need to wash their hands frequently due to the pandemic. The guideline is to wash for 20 seconds.Well, humans are very bad at estimating time and what they think is 20 seconds, is really about 5 seconds!In addition, while they scrub their hands with soap, the water is usually running, which is very wasteful. Now, I'm a person who cares deeply about saving water and even have a product that helps reduce water waste! You can check it out at  https://SensiTap.com and watch the brief video on the home page.Lastly, I watch children do a half-hearted job of scrubbing, given their short attention spans.I decided that I would make a product that would help solve all three problems:We plan to make the device transparent, so folks can see how HandyDandy works! They will be able to see the valve moving back and forth, lights go on and off. They will see a turbine spin when the water goes past the vanes.The result of all this, is HandyDandy!We have a very advanced prototype running (you can see it in the demo video).What we need to do now is to make it into a marketable product.We need your help to do that.The money you pledge will go towards:Our proven track record of products should give you, the Kick Starter Patron, a sense of confidence that we have an above-average chance of succeeding.I am a dyed-in-the-wool engineer, with over 40 years of experience, almost 30 of those as a consultant. I have always been thinking of how things work and how to make them better. I have 5 patents to my name and am named on a few others. I even teach a, "tinkering lab", for a university in India!My colleague and partner in this venture is Gerry Friedman and he is also a multi-talented mechanical engineer with vast experience. Gerry is also a gifted sculptor, specializing in, "found object art". You can see some of his work at  https://www.torchandpalette.com/ As a matter of fact, we are offering some of his one-of-a-kind works as a reward for a certain level of pledge!

record.Text: HOLA, MI NOMBRE ES FREYJA PEREZ, SOY CRIMINOLOGO, TENGO 45 AÑOS VIVO EN ESPAÑA!!  SE ME OCURRIO ESTE PROYECTO, PORQUE SUELO CORRER CADA DIA (NO SOY ATLETA PROFESIONAL ... MAS BIEN SOY ATLETA NORMAL, VOY MUY LENTA! PUES NO HAGO NADA MAS!!!! Y ASI NACIO SNAILSTEP, CON EL OBJETIVO DE APOYAR A LAS PERSONAS A EVITAR EL SEDENTARISMO Y QUE SEAN ACTIVAS CADA DIA, NO IMPORTA QUE CAMINES MUCHO O CAMINES POCO, LO IMPORTANTE ES QUE ESTES ACTIVO!!  Y  ESE ESFUERZO EXTRA QUE HACES POR ESTAR ACTIVO Y ELEGIR CAMINAR CADA DIA SEA RECOMPENSADO!!!EN SNAILSTEP  PODRAS UTILIZAR TUS PASOS  PARA DISFRUTAR CON TU FAMILIA, TU MASCOTA, TUS AMIGOS O COMPÀÑEROS DE TRABAJO Y LO MAS IMPORTANTE: SNAILSTEP ES UNA APLICACION MOVIL GRATUITA  QUE NO TE PEDIRA NI SUSCRIBIRTE NI SER NIVEL PREMUM!! LO RECAUDADO EN ESTA CAMPAÑA, SERA UTILIZADO  PARA HACER EL DESARROLLO Y PROGRAMACION DE LA APLICACION. record.Creator: Domus Bonus
record.Title: Copy.Cab - your uniquely smart, error-free card/drive Backup
record.Text: Work files or vacation pics. Now you have a card or a drive full of files. You need to back them up, quickly and error-free....But then problems start popping up. Have you already backed up this particular card or not?? One card gets backed up twice but the others never get copied… Individual files and time-lapse sequences get mixed up or corrupted… Same-name files overwrite the older ones you still needed... Drives disconnect; copy never resumes... Stress. Stress. Stress!Please. Stop doing it manually. ...Yes, but the dedicated backup devices are rather expensive! - you might say.Yup. And rather limited in features, too - by design. But Copy.Cab has no issues like these.Copy.Cab intelligently inspects your files and automatically processes them - the way you want it.Delegate all the tedious stuff to Copy.Cab, and keep your data safe and sound - without the $500 expense!Copy.Cab is an advanced, yet easy-to-use and robust software that copies your files and folders intelligently. The goal here is to prevent any data loss.Copy.Cab checks for all kinds of gotchas before they even happen. Not enough space? Duplicate files? External drive disconnected during offload? Copy.Cab alerts you to all that and offers one-click solutions.Copy.Cab actually can work as a dedicated backup device, too (without the high price tag) - just install it on your mobile or a "stick" PC. Turn it on; Copy.Cab starts automatically, ready to back up your cards. Awesome!How is Copy.Cab different from just copying your data manually?Copy.Cab:- Automates operations, remembers the last drives and folders you worked with- Perfectly copies your card, drive, or a single folder by checking on possible errors BEFORE they happen!- Pre-flights your backup with visual snapshot, alerts you beforehand with exact issues, offers good solutions. Just press the button - the worry is ours, the choice is yours.- Fast! As fast as your OS!- Backs up any digital files: photos, videos, documents, anything.- Backs up (offloads) any card or drive.- Synchronizes any folder to any other folder.- Makes an Exact copy, OR Incremental copy - whichever you like.- A full copy of your card/drive structure, with all its files and folder tree, is a default. But you can also choose what files to include in (or exclude from) the backup.
