(see LEVELS)You see, sometimes you need the perfect mirror of your directories and files, including service/sidecar files… while another time you don’t!- Copy.cab can intelligently process your files. Missing time/date stamps? Missing Geolocation? (see LEVELS) Files with the same names but different content that would normally just overwrite your older ones, leading to lost data? No worries. Copy.Cab can handle and fix all that!- Detects and organizes time-lapse image sequences automatically (see LEVELS)- Remembers what went where, and can instantly remind you- Shows you Previews of your content, plus lists your file data, for better assurance that you are, in fact, working with the right files- Uniquely renames files to prevent name clashes, or leaves everything untouched - your choice, just click on settings- Very stable. Does not crash, leak memory, or do other bad things. This is a result of our quality design.- Completely private: never spies on you, never sends your files or activity reports anywhere - Copy.Cab does NOT talk to the outside servers!- Ready for future enhancements and added features. Like AI image auto-tagging for ease of finding your files! (Privacy first: all the new features will be under your control.)- Sustainable operations: if our servers go down, your Copy.Cab continues working. If our business disappears, your Copy.Cab continues working. You are safe.- Based on decades of digital file wrangling experience by our developers.  Just like you, we know what needs to be done, and here we give you the complete solution based on our vast experience. - Use Copy.Cab in the field, professional environment, or home.Why is it called Copy.Cab?Cab stands for both file cabinet in Windows, and for a fast vehicle that professionally transports you from one point to another. Seems like a fit for this software!Oh, and we were lucky to get a domain name Copy.Cab as well, for our upcoming website! (see LEVELS)Is Copy.Cab suitable for home use? Say, if I wanted to back up my camera memory cards with vacation photos and videos??Yes!Is Copy.Cab suitable for professional use? For example, by a data wrangler on a photo or film set?Yes!Can Copy.Cab be installed on a tablet, desktop, notebook, Windows phone?Yes, yes, and yes!What are the requirements?- Windows 7/8/10/11 (or a virtual environment if you are on iOS or other operating systems)Think of Copy.Cab as your perfectly attentive, fast assistant that never makes a mistake in handling your files. It will:- Show you the contents of the card visually so you'd instantly know whether this is the intended one or not- Allow you to choose Full backup (a new copy of all the contents) or Incremental backup (just the difference from the last time you copied your data from this source.)- Check whether there's enough space on the destination drive to complete the operation.- Detect whether there are any file name clashes and offer to apply an automatic fix. So you won't lose your older data by simply writing it over if it's actually different!- Detect if there are any time-lapse sequences and offer to put them into a separate folder; as well as make a draft video preview for you. What a time saver!- Alert you if either the source or destination drives disconnected during the transfer- Actually continue writing long files from where it left off (after the transfer resume or on drive re-connect) - instead of just starting anew! A huge time saver.- Use multi-threading to complete the job ASAP for you- Verify the backup...and more!There are so many things you'd have to manually do, each being an opportunity for human error to creep in, and some taking an extremely long time.  Why do it the hard way?Copy.Cab just does it all for you natively, quickly, and error-free every time!UNLOCK the Levels!- $1,300: you get your Copy.Cab v1.1 download- $1,900: the website is designed and maintained with the Versioning, Support, and Download zones- $2,400: a feature to fix the missing Geolocation and Time-Date stamp is added- $2,900: a feature to include/exclude certain file types from the backup- $3,500: the automatic time-lapse processing feature is added!- $4,700: a certified Installation package is obtainedPlease support this project and get your Copy.Cab soon - or give it as a gift to someone you know may need it!Thank you very much.

record.Creator: EDGENITY Inc.
record.Title: FIT CYCLE -The World's Best Indoor Cycling Experience-
record.Text: The FIT CYCLE is a next-generation fitness machine with built-in multi-functional sensors that is fully compatible with multiple virtual cycling apps, allowing you to ride the world's most spectacular courses from the comfort of your own home.It is recommended for those who are interested in the latest technology and the most advanced and fulfilling "home training".Virtual Shift to maximize your training effect.The first launch of our amazing Virtual Shift. You can incorporate shifting gears from major manufacturers such as Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo with virtual shifting. By selecting the exact number of sprockets and gear ratios, you can maximize your training effect.  What is the popular Virtual Cycling App?The Virtual Cycling App is a cutting-edge home training program that allows you to enjoy cycling indoors. You can experience the virtual cycling world as if you were riding there yourself.Participants from all over the world can train and compete in the virtual world. Participants from around the world train, compete and ride in friendly competitions with their friends. Recently, the world's premier road bike race, the Tour de France, was held in a virtual space and generated a great deal of excitement.Tour de France // First Steps - Watopia Hillery Rivers YouTubeAutomatically applies a constant load determined by the algorithm according to the difficulty of the workout set by the player. The cadence sensor and torque sensor allow for accurate FTP measurement.FTP mode is a program used by professional athletes for high-intensity training.The FTP training mode allows you to train quickly and efficiently according to the level you choose. You can also measure your own FTP.FIT CYCLE is compatible with a variety of virtual apps, allowing you to play apps right away without the need for complicated settings. Virtual apps can be broadly divided into two types: those that ride on real, live-action scenery and those that ride on 3DCG scenery.The appeal of virtual cycling lies in its realism. The system automatically changes the load by interfacing sensors with the app, and the load reflects the slope of the hill, air resistance, and other details of the surrounding environment, making it very close to the actual ride.You can ride on real roads around the world in the comfort of your own home with your smart bike, and the high-resolution 4K live-action scenery will make you feel as if you are really there.KinomapKinomap is an app that allows you to ride real courses taken by cyclists around the world. The number of courses is over 100,000! Of course, there are also Japanese courses taken by Japanese cyclists.ROUVYThis is an app that allows you to ride with live-action scenery from around the world + your own 3DCG avatar. It also supports parameters such as automatic load, cadence, and heart rate, making it the perfect app for training.FULGAZThis is an app that allows you to run in real-life scenery that supports the highest 4K quality. The picture quality is so beautiful that you can experience the seaside of Los Angeles or the Hawaiian Islands as if you were there. It also supports various sensors, making it ideal for training.Apps that support 3DCG sceneryONELAPYou and your friends can run together in a 3DCG world. There are many game elements such as various missions and avatar customization, so you can gamify your training to avoid boredom!ZwiftZwift is said to be the best virtual bike app. It has a whopping 3 million members worldwide and 100,000 players in Japan! Zwift was also used by Corona to stage the Tour de France. Not only can you train with professional riders, but you can also customize your avatar, road bike, and more.I want to try it! But... the hurdle to play is too high.Currently, there are two major combinations of equipment needed to play with Zwift.In this case, the cost of the smart trainer alone is $900 to $1,800USD, and you also need to prepare a road bike to attach to the trainer.In the second case, the cost is lower than in the first, but you need more equipment and more time to set up. In addition, both of them require a road bike as a prerequisite, making it difficult to get started. All you need is your smartphone and FIT CYCLEIn the midst of all this, a spin bike-type trainer called "Smart Bike" has appeared overseas this year. Smart bikes, which can be optimized to your own position without the need to set up a bike, have been attracting attention, but they are very expensive, costing around $4,500USD, and are only for professional use.Because of this, we have set an affordable price so that everyone can enjoy Virtual Cycling at their homes. We have developed Japan's first integrated fitness machine with various built-in sensors.Furthermore, it is possible to experience virtual cycling indoors at a low cost!Virtual training for everyone! As people spend more and more time at home, why don't you enjoy exercising with FIT CYCLE?This is a record of the weight loss of a customer at a gym that installed this product. This is the result of comprehensive guidance by the trainer.Virtual training lifestyle with FIT CYCLE.As explained earlier, the sensors and control CPU necessary for virtual training are integrated, so you can start immediately as long as you have a device such as a smartphone and the main unit.Virtual training apps such as Rouvy and Bkool, provide the experience of riding in the real world. Kinomap, lets you ride through videos taken and posted by other cyclists, and TrainerRoad, which specializes in upping your game. Choose the app that best fits your goals and motivation, and enjoy cutting-edge training!ROUVY offers a real-world riding experienceMulti-functional sensors are compatible with virtual training apps.FIT CYCLE is equipped with the following advanced sensors and CPU. This allows you to take full advantage of the app's features for an enhanced virtual ride.Automatic load function (power meter) that realistically reproduces gradients on hills and other slopesAutomatically adjusts the load on the virtual ride to match the course. The trainer automatically adjusts the load according to the course on the virtual ride. When the course on the app goes up a hill, the load on the trainer automatically changes to match the slope of the hill, giving you a realistic ride. The load is applied by changing the voltage on the electromagnetic magnet. This happens by moving the electromagnet closer or further away from the flywheel. Since it is a non-contact system, the unit is very quiet.It can apply a stronger load than ordinary magnet load systems and allows a wide range of load adjustments.Equipped with a sensor that measures the cadence (number of revolutions of the crank per minute) of the bicycle.When you ride, be aware of keeping the cadence constant and choose a gear that does not strain your legs, which will reduce the burden and make your cycling more comfortable.Finding the right cadence for you is an important point when riding, and depends on the individual's physical strength and build, the type of bicycle, length of the crank, situation, and more.Manage your exercise record with smartwatch and healthcare integrationAlthough the heart rate sensor on the handlebars can be used, using a smartwatch will allow you more freedom, accuracy, and integration with your health care system (*specifications may vary depending on the app). Keep track of your exercise records along with a variety of other biometric data to keep track of your overall health status in life.We designed FIT CYCLE to become a fitness partner in your daily life.  "no noise" is a point that cannot be overlooked.The FIT CYCLE is so quiet that it can be compared to a whisper or a late night in the suburbs. This means you don't have to worry about disturbing your neighbors.As explained in the beginning, you will need a device such as a smartphone to run the virtual training app.Depending on the situation, you can choose the best way to use the device according to the size of the room and the device you have, such as using a computer, projecting on a TV screen, or using a projector. Can be used as a standalone machine.Even if you don't use the virtual cycling app, you can use the FIT CYCLE app to set the load that suits you best and checks your calorie consumption.You can also update the machine’s software through the app.The FIT CYCLE app will be available for download from the App Store and Google Play Store.Please note that the design is in the development stage and is subject to change.The saddle can be adjusted from 81cm to 98cm, and the handlebars from 97cm to 108cm. (The saddle can also be moved forward and backward by 0-5.5 cm)The height range is 145-190cm, so it can be adjusted to fit various body sizes for comfortable use.The legs in front of the main unit are equipped with wheels for easy movement. This makes it easy for a single person to move it around, such as when redecorating or rearranging the room.There is no need for complicated setups required in conventional virtual training. The minimal number of parts eliminates the need for complicated assembly.Please note that the design is still in the development stage and is subject to change.SpecificationsPedals For Barefoot UseThe included pedals have an uneven tread for better grip and are designed to be used with shoes. Therefore, you cannot pedal barefoot or with socks. To use it barefoot, you will need the optional barefoot pedals.Anti-vibration and soundproof mat to reduce vibrationAs mentioned above, the main unit alone is quite enough, but for those who are concerned about the burden on the floor or want to reduce vibration, even more, we have prepared a custom-designed anti-vibration soundproofing mat as an option!Be considerate of your surroundings and the environment, and enjoy your virtual ride to the fullest!Virtual Shift to maximize your training effect.You can incorporate shifting gears from major manufacturers such as Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo with virtual shifting. By selecting the exact number of sprockets and gear ratios, you can maximize your training effect.We can not keep count of how many meetings we have held during the process of creating the FIT CYCLE.We have had many sleepless nights and have put hundreds of hours into planning, designing, and programming. It truly is our blood sweat and tears. But one thing we can say for sure is that we enjoyed every second of it!We are continuously holding meetings always working to improve so we can deliver the FIT CYCLE  to your home at the highest quality possible.After many trials and errors, we are now confident to present the FIT CYCLE to the world.  We have displayed the FIT CYCLE in exhibitions overseas, and the customers who had the chance to experience the FIT CYCLE truly enjoyed the ride!Q: Do I need to assemble the product after it arrives?A: This product will be delivered to you approximately 90% complete.You will need to install the handlebars, pedals, saddle, and other parts, but anyone can easily assemble it in about 30 minutes or less.Q: Can I use the product late at night in my apartment or condominium?A: The noise level of this product is less than 30dB, which is equivalent to the sound of falling leaves or a whisper, so it can be used safely in any residential environment.Q: Do I need to do any maintenance?A: Since this product is a frictionless type with electromagnetic load, there are no consumables and it is maintenance-free.Q: How much electricity does it consume?A: The rated power consumption will be 10W. If you use it for 30 minutes every day, your monthly electricity bill will be only about 4 yen. (30cents USD) (*Calculated at the unit price of electricity, 27 yen/kwh)Q: Is there a manufacturer's warranty in case of failure?A: The product will be repaired free of charge under the manufacturer's warranty for one year after arrival. However, there are some items that are not covered by the warranty, so please refer to the warranty card that will be sent with the product for details.Q: Is it necessary to use a floor mat when using the product in an apartment or condominium?A: The product is virtually silent, so there is no need to use floor mats for soundproofing, but a waterproof floor mat is a good idea in case of sweat or water spills from the bottle. It also helps to protect the floor surface.Q: Can I pedal barefoot or only in socks?A: The included pedals have an uneven tread for better grip and are designed to be used with shoes. Therefore, you cannot pedal barefoot or with socks. To use it barefoot, you will need the optional barefoot pedals.Q: The unit has a built-in heart rate sensor, but do I need the optional armband?A： The heart rate sensor is built into the handlebar, but for more accurate monitoring of the heart rate, the armband is required.Q: Is there a Technical Regulations Compliance Mark (Technical Regulations Conformity Certification) or PSE Mark?A: In accordance with Japanese laws and regulations, the technical conformity mark and PSE mark are attached.*This product contains a sensor that is compatible with the virtual training applications but does not include the service itself. You will need to sign up separately for the services of the various applications.*All logos and play screens belong to the corresponding KINOMAP, ZWIFT, ROUVY, FUGAZ, and ONELAP.Proper nouns are product names that appear in, for example, KINOMAP, ZWIFT, ROUVY, FUGAZ, and ONELAP, and are registered trademarks or trademarks of their respective companies.

record.Creator: Sébastien GRENIER
record.Title: Animation controler for O and I scale train models
record.Text: Ultimate Models was launched in April 2021, when Laurent ROEKENS & Sébastien GRENIER met each others and discovered they had the same passion : model trains.We design animation systems allowing you to add motion, sound or light  in any model. Our first product, named Perfect Coach Lighting, is an animation controler for HO/OO scale passenger  coaches. It provides realistic animations & effects in each part of the coach, bringing the appropriate light in each compartment, corridor,  rest room, and so on...you can then fully control the lights trough the DCC command system.Provided animations include : night fall, conductor passing through the coaches to check tickets, passengers going to the rest room at some moments, van switching on during a station stop and turning off when the train left the station, and many more other features.A short while after we started to sale these animation controlers, we've been called by some customers willing to have the same product for greater O and I scales.It took some time to design a specific product that would meet all requirements for such a product : more power was required for each light as the coaches are at least 8x bigger. Customers also wanted to be able to use our devices on live steam trains, which have neither any DCC command system nor any corresponding power source.Finally, we've made a prototype and validated all electronical aspects.Now we have to find funds to both build the required software and produce the first parts.Follwing videos demonstrate some of the animations of the HO scale animation controlers... This new product is designed in a different way than the HO scale one. Small models are really hard to patch by customers : not so much space, small pieces easy to break....that's why we deliver ready to use HO scale ramps.This is not the same with O and I scale models : customers often patch their products to perfectly meet their will.That's why we decided to build a universal controler that will fit in any coach, instead of a wide range of dedicated products. The result is a small circuit of no more than 54 x 29 mm providing ready to solder power outputs but with no embedded LEDs.Each output can drive several LEDs for up to 20 mA. All outputs are protected against overload by an internal current limitation. LEDs voltage can be of up to 3.2 Volts, the power source providing 3.3 Volts.Both + and - of each LED wires can be soldered on the back side of the decoder.The 2 pad power input labeled DCC can receive any power source, either AC or DC, between 6 and 24 volts. When a DCC command signal is present, it is decoded and used to drive the circuit.Usual power sources includes regular "through the track" DCC power and usual batteries placed under the coach. No matter which power source you use, the circuit can be driven with the free mobile App from any Apple or Android compatible device. The app allows you to setup every channel settings such as the emulated light type and associated power. It also allows you to switch on and off every channel and every animation.Animations are managed at several levels : for a single coach only, for a full set of coaches (train), of for any known coach from your collection. This allows you, for instance, to switch all your coaches to the "night mode" in a single command.In fact, every existing function from our HO-scale ramp also exists in the XL universal decoder and can be managed from both the DCC commands and the mobile app !Power failure is a common issue when using DCC : crossing a switch or running along a dirty track often produce bad power continuity, leading to decoder unwanted resets.Power Packs are the solution for those issues, and most of the customers consider Power Packs as a "must have" for any DCC system.Our Perfect Coach Lighting XL decoder is power-pack ready. 3 connection pads can be used to connect our optional dedicated power-pack which will provide at least 5 seconds of power sustain under full load. But Power Packs are not required when using battery powered system together with Live Steam, that's why they can be purchased as an option.

record.Creator: Dimitris Eleftheriadis
record.Title: Dog Assistant
record.Text:
Three years ago a member of our team became a dog dad. Like most people when they become a pet parent, for the first time, he had almost no idea what to do. In order to find answers to his questions he surfed the internet and asked around (mostly veterinarians). But he realized that he had to visit multiple websites to find simple solutions and he couldn't ask a vet all the time. That's when the idea was born.
 What if there was an application that would have all of these answers and more, in one place? And that was the turning point.  The answer to these questions and doubts summarized through our application. At this point, in the state that the whole project is in, we need your assistance in order for it to be implemented in perfection.Below, there are some features that the app contains :Networking:Future stuff (with your assistance):As mentioned above, your assistance will help the app expand beyond its current state. We are just a team of 3 members and we are looking forward to getting bigger, becoming a company that will be able to hire people to work with us in order to bring you a great experience and services. So what are you waiting for?Help us today, so we can assist you tomorrow!

record.Creator: Rodney Zimmerman
record.Title: Assessdo: Keeping You Connected To Thoughts That Matter
record.Text: Because human behavior is so unpredictable, clever, creative and incredibly brilliant, understanding outliers of behavior can be challenging. When humans behave irrationally, with anger, through deception, or other jarring actions that many times may cause harm the origin/intention of the behavior sparks curiosity. Inspired by the intention of various forms of human behavior, I wanted to create a platform that embraces the process of understanding behavior without bias, judgement or stereotypes. I wanted to see if there was a way to disrupt the classroom to prison pipeline, clean up policing in underserved communities, change behavior modification of youth in schools, and help organizations improve performance in the workplace.As a graduate of UCLA and a former NBA athlete, my collective experiences, skill sets, and visions to create behavioral solutions have evolved and allowed me to create cutting-edge solutions that shape the body, mind and behavior of student-athletes. My new software Assessdo, created by Barin Technologies, not only offers the opportunity to support student athletes, but ideally become an interface for entities such as: educational institutions, law enforcement agencies, justice systems, healthcare providers, human resources and youth programs. Assessdo uses proprietary AI technology to predict, interpret, observe and ideally transform behavior. It can be a gateway to facilitate honest discussions with groups of any size and create a turnkey breakthrough of powerful dialogue.According to our research, there are two major challenges that interrupt behavior: 1) confirmation bias and 2) stereotype threats. Understanding why implicit bias exists and how to tackle the problem was one inspiration for creating this software. Other inspirations for creating Assessdo was: 1) noticing the influx of young people becoming incarcerated at an early age, 2) learning about the correlation of prison reform with mental health, 3) how police training is affecting rates of incarceration, wrongful deaths, and the unnecessary mistreatment of civilians, and 4) how the relationships between teachers, faculty, students, communities, and districts negatively affect school systems. We invite you to learn about our platform, as we believe there is power in understanding the whole of every person, not just parts. Our users will experience fair equity while having the ability to think and feel freely. Contact Rodney Zimmerman - rodneyzimmerman14@gmail.com

record.Creator: Adam B
record.Title: Swingers and roundabouts - A swingers dating website
record.Text: Thank you for looking at our project.Swingers and roundabouts is a UK website for the swingers community and people who share similar interests.The site was created by two friends,one of whom who has been part of the community for over 5 years now who feels there are a lack of sites out there that are committed to the community.With this in mind,swingers and roundabouts was created.Our belief is that a website for this scene should be interactive,safe and fun. Our intention through kickstarter is to carry on developing key features to the site to make it more interactive. With your donations we will add the following:-News feeds for posts and -Forums -Video calling -Group chats -Blind erotic chat,match online members looking to talk live.-A daily,weekly,monthly hot list that will win prizes.We believe all members should be able to interact in an environment where there is a committed moderation team that isn't run by site volunteers or run partially throughout the day meaning that reports are not dealt with immediately or without lack of action.Thats why the site will be ran by the creators to ensure everything is at it should be.No harassment,no abuse and certainly no time wasters. We hope this is something you want to donate to as we believe with our commitment and determination for continued development we could be the number one site and hopefully expand outside of the UK over time.Thanks for reading.

record.Creator: Paul
record.Title: Go with the Flow: a Portable Laminar Flow Hood
record.Text: The Fungaia Laminar Flow Hood opens new horizons in biology, making the benefits of sterile culture technique more accessible than ever before. At a fraction of the size and cost of comparable units, this compact, efficient, affordable design serves two important roles:First, a simple desktop model makes an economical entry-level flow hood for students, hobbyists and other aspiring biologists, helping overcome the biggest stumbling block of newcomers to the field: contamination. Second, a rugged, handheld, fully battery-powered model allows biologists to carry the lab into the field instead of the other way around, enabling research techniques that were never possible before.Both of these functions promise a revolution in our relationship with our living world. We dream of a new generation of self-appointed scientists, globally connected and locally focused, equipped with the tools and knowledge to make new strides toward understanding, preserving and rejuvenating the Earth’s precious, vulnerable ecologies.A laminar flow hood is an air filtration device, widely used throughout the biological sciences, healthcare, pharmaceuticals, nuclear technology and manufacturing. Flow hoods create a sterile working environment for sensitive tasks, such as the isolation and propagation of fungi, plants, bacteria and other microorganisms.The microbial realm is wildly complex. Living things pervade every breath of air we breathe. When creating an ideal environment for a given organism to grow, there are many others that thrive in the same conditions, and not all of them are friendly. This is why biologists rely on sterile culture technique.For example, when gathering biological samples from the wild for analysis, preservation or breeding purposes, the interval between collection and isolation is critical. Such samples are often highly perishable and susceptible to rapid parasitization and decomposition, which leads to insurmountable experimental error. A portable flow hood greatly improves the extent and success of field work.To use another example relevant to us here at Fungaia, sterile culture technique is an important part of mushroom cultivation. Like most organisms, a mushroom-producing fungus is delicate and vulnerable during the early stages of its growth, easily overtaken by more rapid reproducers. Until it has a chance to “grow up,” the trick is less about cultivating what is wanted and more about avoiding what isn’t.Another one of the beautiful things about sterile technique is that it allows a small laboratory to maintain a vast biodiversity of different organisms which would not be able to coexist otherwise.But for most of us in the industry, the real benefit of a laminar flow hood is that it reduces the chances of failure, from heartbreakingly likely to reliably rare. As anyone who has dabbled in mushroom cultivation will tell you, nothing can sap a passionate enthusiasm faster than disappointment.Until now, access to this technology has been limited to institutions, professionals and a few intrepid do-it-yourself-ers. By making it available to everyone, we hope to engender a growing movement of citizen scientists. A handful of specialists from a handful of universities can only accomplish so much. But with a flow hood in every home, there is no limit to the possibilities our collective curiosity might uncover. Who knows? Together we might even save the world.The Fungaia Flow Hood is a powerful tool with a simple design. It measures just 12 inches square by 10 inches deep, large enough to perform almost any sensitive laboratory task while still small enough to comfortably carry in one hand or place in the corner of a desk.The standard housing is water-resistant plywood, box-jointed for strength, with an attractive hardwood veneer available in a variety of stains and finishes. It can be upgraded to rugged aluminum body for durability.The “GrowHood” is our desktop model, optimized for a minimal footprint and cost, with a simple acrylic tunnel to offer greater protection from cross-drafts and the Venturi effect.The “GoHood” is our portable fieldwork unit, featuring airtight stainless steel closures on both openings to protect the filters and maintain sterility during transport. The forward face folds down to double as a stable work surface, and it sports a collapsable silicone tunnel.A removable aluminum rear cover provides access to the MERV-13 pre-filter and pulse-width signal generator for selecting the desired air velocity. A slim, watertight on/off switch and DC power port keep the narrow profile.Each model can be run on wall power (the most economical option) or configured with one, two or four battery packs, balancing weight, cost and capacity for up to 4, 8 or 16 hours of continuous runtime at full power on a single charge.Meet the Molicel: the beating heart of the GoHood. Truly the state-of-the-art in lithium ion cells, these batteries boast unparalleled energy density, rapid charging, and a great lifespan. Assembled into packs in-house, each cell is of trusted origin, thoroughly tested and independently protected. Up to four packs can be connected in parallel and fit neatly inside the unit without obstructing airflow.The blower fan, which was designed for high-pressure cryptocurrency mining servers, is equipped with an internal pulse-width modulator that allows complete velocity control with no detriment to its lifespan. It is quiet, powerful and remarkably efficient, drawing just 0.9 amps at full power while delivering an impressive 170 cfm.The most important piece of all, the filter pack uses a top-of-the-line HEPA Mini-pleat® filter, delivering the same performance as standard filter media at half the size and lower static resistance, also improving overall efficiency. Custom manufactured by the industry leader, these packs are scanned and tested to a minimum 99.997% filtration efficiency at 0.3µ. We test them again following assembly to verify their efficacy.By using only the highest quality components, assembling and testing each flow hood carefully by hand in-house, and providing complete parts and service, customer support and educational resources, we seek to exemplify integrity, ingenuity and dedication to our craft, all while making every effort to keep this technology as accessible as possible to everyone.Read on to learn more about how we intend to put our business ethics into practice.On November 15th, we are launching a Kickstarter campaign to raise the funding to begin full-scale production.If (when!) we get funded, it will allow us to make a sizable bulk order of the fans, filters, batteries and other components to build and maintain an inventory. This will enable us to produce custom-order flow hoods on demand in the future.The fundraising campaign will run through the holiday season, and we will begin fulfillment as soon as the project gets funded. Due to ongoing supply chain disruptions and unusually long manufacturing lead times, we have set a conservative target fulfillment date of June 2022, though we hope to deliver much sooner. Orders will be shipped first-come, first-served, based on the initial funding pledge date.The central goal of this project is to make laminar flow hood technology accessible to everyone. Here are some of the ways we intend to honor that commitment:First, this project is born from a DIY ethic. Staying true to that ideal, we will create a series of detailed plans and instructions, along with straight-forward how-to videos, to share with anyone who wishes to embark on a flow hood project of their own. Like all of Fungaia’s other products, these will be available by donation, with no minimum.Second, we will also stock all of the necessary components at competitive prices, serving as a one-stop-shop for our fellow DIY-ers, and offer fully customized kits alongside our finished products, so each person can forego as much or as little of the actual assembly as they wish, depending on their skills, resources and budget.Third, we are committed to ensuring the longevity and sustainability of our products. All of our flow hoods will be warrantied and fully serviceable. We will offer self-service tutorials as well as full technical support and maintenance services. We scoff at planned obsolescence and want to make sure you can keep your Fungaia Flow Hood running for as long as possible.Last, and most exciting of all, we are delighted to announce that we will offer a scholarship program. Homegrown with slender means, Fungaia is a manifestation of the spirit of the cash-poor but can-do, and we believe wholeheartedly that everyone deserves access to groundbreaking technology, regardless of personal means. Applications will be accepted on a rolling basis, evaluated for both need and merit, and we will give away as many flow hoods to deserving candidates as we can afford to!By keeping production in-house, we can create new jobs and continue to ensure the integrity of our products. Depending on the success of the Kickstarter campaign, the flow hood project, and the business in general, we hope to soon hire additional employees and restructure Fungaia as an employee-owned cooperative.Ultimately, all of this is in service of yet a greater goal: education. A heart-centered, donation-based business, Fungaia was founded with the hope that it would eventually become the economic engine to support a Free School: an experimental, experiential, residential, educational, intentional community of like-minded teacher-students of all walks of life.By supporting and sharing this project, you are instrumental in fostering a vision of prosperity—both our own and that of the living planet we call home.Homegrown in Walla Walla, Washington, Fungaia is a heart-centered, donation-based mushroom company, driven by deep passion and a vision for sustainable symbiosis. Firmly rooted in a do-it-yourself ethos, we endeavor to demystify fungi and make mushroom cultivation accessible to newcomers and lifelong mycophiles alike. We believe that fungi are the finest teachers, and can help guide us on a path toward greater personal and environmental health, food security, education, social responsibility, and joy.Read more at https://www.fungaia.life/ethos.Hi, my name is Paul. I’m the Lead Critter here at Fungaia, and delighted to share a little backstory with you.When this project began, my goal was to create a small laminar flow hood I could mount in my homemade truckbed camper and run off a small solar system, allowing me keep up with lab work and clone wild mushrooms while I was on the road. I had little money to seriously entertain such frivolous fantasies, so it went to the back burner like so many other fiendish schemes.With a few successful attempts at cloning wild mushrooms—and quite a few unsuccessful ones—it quickly became clear to me that the chances of salvaging a foraged specimen precipitously decline the longer it takes to get it to the lab. Some species, like the formidable Lawyer’s Wig (Coprinus comatus) seem to deliberately defy such attempts, mischievously deliquescing into black ooze and leaking out of the bag in the car.As time went on, I was wholly engulfed in the many challenges of running a small mushroom company. I was waiting tables in the evenings and devoting every spare moment and dollar to my fledgling Fungaia. The portable flow hood fantasy gained greater appeal. I could envision weeks-long excursions in exotic locales, punctuated by periodic tailgate lab work, and a whole new horizon for my aspirations to vagabondery. I dreamed of becoming a traveling mycologist.I began testing my theories and experimenting with some basic designs. Eventually, inevitably, my research led me down the rabbit hole of the do-it-yourself lithium ion battery pack. With the unparalleled energy density of these remarkable new batteries, could I build a flow hood small and light enough to carry by hand? My mind was aflame with the possibilities.Despite my better judgment, I had committed to the idea. When I really should have been buying fresh undies or perhaps saving up to move out of the backyard and into an apartment like a normal adult, instead I was buying top-of-the-line HEPA filters and lithium cells and pouring over spec sheets of low voltage, high-pressure fans.There is a phenomenon I call the “cascade of risk,” which is perhaps not unlike what mothers of fear of “gateway drugs,” and no doubt related to the fallacy of sunken value: when you get comfortable taking one risk, the next seems less threatening, and the next, until you’re gambling your last dollar on some hair-brained scheme and sloppily soldering dangerous components in your threadbare underwear in someone else’s garage at 3 o’clock in the morning.Nonetheless, I cobbled together my first prototype using some scrap wood and angle iron and, to my surprise, it worked flawlessly. I should have been delighted, but instead I began to feel nervous. It was no longer a plaything of my whimsy, it was a real-life thing in the world. I felt I had an obligation to it, like a parent, to protect and foster it to maturity.There is solace in destitution; to quote the Bard, “when y’ain’t got nothin’, you got nothin’ to lose.” Success, on the other hand, carries with it the burden of failure. The more I realized I may have stumbled across something of consequence, the more the possible consequences became apparent.My vivid imagination began conjuring all of the ways this contraption could get me in trouble. I’ll reach a bare hand into fire without hesitation, but when it comes to litigation I’ll flee faster than a housefly. To make matters worse, everyone I solicited for advice said the same thing: talk to a lawyer.I called around and found the most reputable IP law firm in the region and scheduled a consultation with one of the partners. I wanted to be as prepared as possible, so I wrote an extensively researched, detailed patent specification, complete with my own technical drawings, draft claims and a witnessed, notarized invention disclosure and sent it to the attorney for review.I think I he really didn’t know what to do with me. In the end, I paid a lot more than I could afford for some pretty second-rate advice, but at least I got a second pair of eyes and a professional patent search out of the deal: no one has made anything quite like it… at least not yet.Meanwhile, I was pouring over the new prototype. I wanted it to be sexy, not just functional. I envisioned the eMac of microbiology. Like any good first iteration, it was fabulously overwrought, with a steel frame that could withstand a tornado, a sleek, gasketed aluminum and stainless steel housing and enough lithium batteries and fans to blow Odysseus all the way back to Ithaca.It’s a worthy prototype, especially considering I made it using stock components and a 50-year-old spotty MIG welder. It has worked wonderfully and served me well on a number of field expeditions, but it’s bulky, it weighs a ton, it’s comically overpowered and the assembly was needlessly complex and more than a little frustrating.In the months since, I filed the patent application, solicited custom orders to my specifications from the manufacturers of the primary components, and began building a facility where I can assemble, test and ship the flow hoods. The latter has been the most involved task of all, especially as I’ve financed construction myself by the slender means of my small, donation-based business.Up until a few weeks ago, I have exclusively run my business out of a 350-square-foot former coal chute adjacent to the boiler room of a WWII-era Army hangar. I knew I would need more space, but I never want to be caught holding a lease I can’t afford. So I took the next logical step and tracked down a good deal on a second-hand insulated semi trailer and retrofitted it with doors, windows, and all the trimmings of civility. I installed new electrical service, an off-grid water system and a shop that will be sufficient for full-scale production.I’ve been working with the machine shop down the street, who’ve been good to me throughout the years, to fabricate the pieces that will be impractical for me to make in-house. Using the new, custom fan and filter components, I’ve begun assembling four new production-level prototypes to demonstrate the different configurations I’ll be offering on Kickstarter.These prototypes are smaller, lighter, quieter and more efficient than I ever thought possible. The first one, the desktop model featured in the product launch announcement video, is the simplest and most affordable. The next models will feature latching covers with gaskets and an optional aluminum housing for better protection from inclement field conditions.Optionally, each model can be configured with one or more battery packs for up to 4, 8 or 16 hours of continuous runtime on a single charge. The fan, which was designed for high-pressure cryptocurrency mining servers, is equipped with an internal pulse-width modulator that allows complete velocity control with no detriment to its lifespan. The filter pack uses a state-of-the-art HEPA Mini-pleat® filter which offers the same performance as the first prototype at half the size.I have been working with the new prototype for several weeks and have been thrilled with the results. While I’ve grown accustomed to the much larger flow hood I built for my business, to my surprise this small device has been quite comfortable to use for every process I can imagine needing it for. I can’t wait for you to try it.

record.Creator: Steven Alderete
record.Title: The H₂OBO™ System: Our Hydration System Dryer!
record.Text: We call it the "H₂OBO™ System" - short for Water Bladder Obliviator - think about it! When used properly, the H₂OBO™ can accelerate the drying process of your hydration system by circulating ambient air throughout the bladder, drink tube and mouthpiece.Using the H₂OBO™ can reduce moisture content in the hydration system, lessen the chance of mold & bacteria growth, and help extend the life of your hydration system. This process takes approximately 30 minutes, depending on the size of the bladder, and will leave your hydration system ready for storage without the possibility of mold and that funky smell.Get ready to use your hydration system even more while you enjoy your outdoor activities. Afterwards, don’t worry about drying out your hydration system thanks to the new H₂OBO™ system. The H₂OBO™ System:1.    H₂OBO™ System2.    A/C wall adapterEach H₂OBO™ System comes with a full one-year guarantee.Email: Steven.Alderete@Trail9Outdoors.com

record.Creator: blip energy
record.Title: blipOne: Reliable Smart Battery for Any Apartment or Home
record.Text: blipOne is a backup power station for every home. It's designed to help in emergencies and save money. It intelligently charges up when energy is cheapest. In the event of an outage, the 2.2kWh battery saves the day, powering a fridge for 1-2 days, or keeping the WiFi up for weeks.This is the first home battery truly designed for portable apartment use and living. With no permanent installation you can take it wherever you live, and it can easily be used throughout your home.After a quick account setup, plug blipOne into any standard outlet to immediately begin storing energy. It’s that simple: no landlords or electricians necessary. Set it and forget it.  Using advanced algorithms and the free app, blipOne connects to your utility rate system. It reviews your rate plan and  takes advantage of electricity prices that change throughout the day.By storing energy overnight or when the price is low, and using it to power your devices during the day when the price is highest, blip saves you money without having to turn anything off.This can save you money when energy is expensive. Don’t pay for high cost electricity when you could be using cheap, stored power.Don’t be caught unprepared when blackouts or emergencies happen. Power your priority devices, some for days on end. * Listed hours are an approximation from standard device energy ratings and based on continuous use. Exact runtime for your devices will depend on the efficiency of your device.Keep yourself, your home, and your family safe with easily accessible backup power during rolling blackouts or severe weather. blip energy has worked tirelessly to ensure blipOne exceeds all safety and environmental standards. It’s undergone 40 reliability and safety tests and meets all required certifications.AC equivalent pure sine wave provides safe, quality AC power to protect your devices and electronics. We've built multiple layers of safety into the power electronics of blipOne, to go above and beyond industry safety protocols. Keep an eye on your energy usage and savings while controlling blipOne, all through the app. Check out the blip algorithm yourself--head here and calculate the potential and projected  savings you could experience. This calculator uses the same technology as the blipOne app.By storing power, and using it during peak hours, you'll reduce your reliance on dirty energy from peaker plants, the source of most daytime power and stressors on our environment. Using blipOne will help reduce your carbon footprint without disrupting your daily routine. Each blipOne unit can eliminate 100kg of CO2 emissions per year on average. If we each help a little, together we can accomplish a lot. At blip energy, we believe everyone deserves access to energy storage. Energy storage is a powerful tool for controlling your energy usage and building outage resilience for your home - and it should be widely available, not a luxury. We've been working on blip energy since January 2020, and in that time have won the Clean Energy prize from ASUio, filed patents and mapped out a path to certification and scale manufacturing for our first product blipOne. We've built our functional proof of concept, and are now working to lock down the final bill of materials, send out for product certification testing, and manufacture our first run of product.The team has technical and business backgrounds in hardware development and energy. Our CEO Sophia was a Mechanical Engineer at iRobot building Roomba before receiving her MBA and MSDI from Northwestern. Chance our COO has a background in Federal Policy at GE, and has worked in real estate, energy consulting, and more. Our cofounders and advisors Dennis and Thibaut both have experience in energy consulting at Bain and BCG respectively, and Thibaut holds a masters in Electrical Engineering.Where We ShipWe are able to ship to the United States, Canada, and Mexico.  VAT, taxes, duties, and GST not included. When We ShipWe plan to ship starting in July 2022.* We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.Why Order NowBy backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first blip batteries at the lowest price we're offering.In order to ensure you receive the lowest possible shipping costs, our team is withholding shipping prices until after the campaign ends. Right now, because we don't know all our shipping destinations, oil prices are fluctuating, and the global shopping crises, we can't give you an accurate number. You will be sent a link to pay for shipping costs net year, right before your product ships. As of November 2021, shipping prices are expected to be close to the following for single units: $US: $73; Canada: $35; and Mexico: $225. Please note that these prices may change, but we will be transparent when and if this happens. Want to help? Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

record.Creator: IFITDO
record.Title: IFITDO : We connect service seekers with service providers
record.Text: pitch deckimagine visiting a country, not knowing anyone, and needing services immediately...Or Imagine traveling back to your home country and expecting services to be readily available all the time since you are now used to that...or imagine living in a country where it is sometimes difficult to find services quickly when you need them.This idea started during dinner with my five brothers and my mom. My mom said her kitchen cabinet was broken and couldn’t find a good carpenter…That night it looked like destiny was beckoning us to think outside the box; because all of sudden the broken kitchen cabinet also had a broken leaking pipe. Our dining room was flooding…We tried to reach a plumber we knew but we could not get hold of him. So we called an aunt, who called a friend, and the friend called a cousin, who called a neighbor…When they finally got the plumber, they asked him, can you fix this issue tonight...his response in pidgin was, "I Fit DO" That was the eureka moment.So we decided to create an app called IFITDO (pidgin English) which means "I can do it". :We are solving a problem which was previously unsolvable. For many foreigners who visit Ghana, and also Ghanaians living abroad, and at those at home it is a problem finding certain services easily, quickly, and efficiently. 1. Difficulty in quickly finding a service provider when you need one:Ghanaians at home and abroad, and foreigners need some service when visiting the country.  However, it is not easy to quickly find someone to provide a service.  2. Quickly finding someone within a 3-mile radius:Most people find it difficult to get someone quickly when they need service in an immediate area in a 3mile radius 3. Service Providers not targeted to Service Seekers:Service providers in most cases find service seekers by chance or through word of mouth referral which often limits provider's chances of getting a job. or providing a service.1. Quickly and efficiently help people find services :A quick and efficient way to get services is by connecting service seekers with service providers. 2. providing opportunity where there is none:An easy way for students, professionals, and the unemployed to make some cash is by readily connecting them with service seekers. 3. Community aspect:The community focus on where locals are doing work for locals.Our app is bi-dimensional. Meaning we are developing it in such a way that you can be both a service seeker and service provider and experience the same exceptional experience. There is so much more to do in order to successfully bring the app to users on both ios and android, and we need your help to make this happen. Thank you in advance.

record.Creator: Linkface
record.Title: DearBuds: Say Goodbye To Stuffy, Uncomfy, & Moist Ear Canals
record.Text: 'DearBuds' is an ear-care device that intelligently manages the humidity levels in your ears.It monitors the temperature and humidity information inside the ear in real-time. Based on this information, DearBuds will adjust the humidity levels in your ears to the optimal levels so that your ears stay fresh all day and night long!It’s easy to find the distinction between normal humidity and high humidity levels in the ear simply by looking at a picture. When the ear canals stay at high humidity levels for an extended period of time, it becomes an ideal environment for bacteria to grow. Over time, you can end up experiencing itchiness, stuffiness, or even pain in your ears.People tend to use cotton swabs or their fingers to excess humidity from their ears. Some people even bang the sides of their heads to force the water out. If you've done this yourself then you probably noticed that these methods are not very effective and can just end up being painful with little to no benefits.DearBuds is the best way for you to take preventative measures against itchiness, irritation, or even pain caused by excess amounts of humidity stuck in your ear.No need to spend your precious time pouring over an instruction manual. Simply place the DearBuds in your ears and press the button to activate. It doesn’t get any simpler than that!DearBuds’ technology may seem complex, but it’s actually really simple.DearBuds promotes ventilation through proper airflow.Up to 3 liters of air is circulated per minute to effectively discharge any excess humidity inside the ear. Since one session lasts for 3 minutes, up to 10 liters of air is circulated in and out of the ear canal through the airflow channels.Real-time multi-sensors map out the structure of the inner ear and measure the temperature as well as the humidity levels.Based on this information, the DearBuds will automatically use the appropriate levels of light, heat, and airflow to quickly expel humidity trapped inside the ear in just 3 short minutes! LED light is used to deliver heat all throughout the ear canal. The fans then send the warm air into your ears to dry out the sweat and moisture in your ears. The remaining humidity is then circulated out of the air so leave it feeling fresh.Our ears, like a vial, are in the shape of a long and narrow passage.As shown in the experiment conducted above, humidity does not disappear when a long, clogged glass tubing is left in a wet state.DearBuds's air path design quickly dries your ears to get them to the right humidity levels in 3 minutes tops.Whether you're a student, work-from-home employee, or just an avid lover of music and YouTube, earphones have become a necessity in our daily life now more than ever. However, nearly all earphone users are unaware of the potential negative impact that they could have on our bodies over time.When wearing most of the commercially available wireless earphones and headphones for more than 20 minutes, the humidity in the ear increases by an average of 30-40%. If this environment persists for a long time, the growth rate of bacterial and mold that can potentially invade your ear increases exponentially. We discovered that people who wear earphones from leading brands such as Apple and Samsung for an extended period of time take longer to reach homeostasis for both temperature and humidity levels in the ears.On the other hand, DearBuds users were able to reach normal temperature and humidity levels in just under 3 minutes. All functions can be operated at the touch of one button. You can easily check the humidity information at any point in the day.Modes can easily be switched using the button located inside the case.** Each mode has a different intensity of light, heat, and airflow. All modes operate for up to 3 minutes and automatically shut down when the comfort humidity level is reached.We used ultra-low noise magnetic levitation fans, optimized the design of the air vents, and applied a noise reduction filter to minimize the noise produced by the DearBuds.Even on the strongest mode, the fans in the DearBuds won't be louder than a normal conversation you'll have on an average day.**NoticeThe noise level of the DearBuds is relatively quiet, but it may seem loud to those who are extremely sensitive to sound since the device is placed close to the ear.Premium grade non-toxic silicone 365 days of comfortable use.DearBuds is made from the same premium grade non-toxic silicone that is used in medical devices that are meant to come into contact with human skin.DearBuds gently uses wind to dry your ears without irritating them. Instead of blowing air straight into the ear canal, DearBuds creates a microscopic airflow channel to safely remove and dispel trapped humidity from the ear. The wind speed is so gentle that it barely moves the flame on a candle.High humidity levels can be a problem, but so can low humidity levels for ear health. DearBuds hits the sweet spot and then automatically turns off when the proper humidity level is reached.We’ve tested multiple designs and ended up with a final design that can be worn by people with most ear shapes and sizes.  We also offer silicone eartips of different sizes so that you can customize your fit.The DearBuds are similar in size and weight to the earphones you probably wear. Each set of DearBuds also comes with a case designed for easy storage and portability.DearBuds Body (left/right), Charging Case,  Silicone Tips (small/medium/large), USB-C Charging Cable, Instruction Manual** Specifications for the prototype and may differ from the final product. ** Please note **DearBuds is not an audio device. It is a product that manages the humidity levels in the ear. Although the shape is similar to that of earbuds, they do not play any audio so please keep that in mind when selecting your rewards!Linkface is a company that develops biosignal sensors and wearable devices. As a spin-off company from Samsung Electronics in 2017, our company is made up of engineers who have developed technologies at Samsung Electronics for a very long time.Jack Lim (CEO) and Chris Kang (CTO), who both have worked at Samsung Electronics for more than 10 years respectively in various fields such as planning, design, and development of smartphones and wireless earphones, are the founders. Our team also consists of other talented developers and designers who have contributed so much to the creation of Linkface products!The company has received the CES Innovation Award in excellent design and technology for three consecutive years for three different products: Safe Listening for Kids “Dear” in 2020, Breathing and heart activity Monitoring Wearable “BioNectband” in 2021, and Humidity Control Ear-Care Solution “DearBuds” in 2022.

record.Creator: Piotr Daniszewski
record.Title: Giveit4free - mobile application for giving unwanted things
record.Text: If You do not have enough space in your home, garage or attic, maybe You should think about getting rid of some of them? These things still can be used by other people to help protect the environment. Perhaps something that You have already got bored of is the dream of many people who would like to accept these items.Some people tend to cumulate things at home that they no longer need. If you are not planning to sell them, maybe You should think about giving these things to someone?We create an application that allows You to easily and quickly donate items that You no longer need. The interested person will be able to come for them himself and pick them up at any time suitable for You. You will arrange the way of passing things to him.We create an application that will save You not only time, but also Your privacy which becomes more important nowadays.  The application will only be used to transfer things to other people, so this information will not appear in any social media. You will also be able to view the list of people interested in receiving these items and see the audience scoring and comments about them, so you can choose to whom You want to donate Your item.

record.Creator: Dejan Obradovic
record.Title: Turn your Apple Watch into a clock
record.Text: UPDATED: Design was updated to work perfectly with Apple Watch series 7Our huge, patented touch screen was designed exclusively for Apple Watch NightStand mode.With multiple global patents pending, the screen magnifies the Apple Watch and provides a large touch screen to tap on the watch display at night.Patented tap display lets you wake the watch face with just a touchIntegrated sound channels amplify your alarm so you'll never miss a wake up call againNightWatch's heavy base and beautiful design is created from a single-piece, solid lucite that's hand polished to a mirror finish.The Apple Watch charger fits perfectly into NightWatch. The cord chamber enables left and right positions on your desktop or bedside table. Once installed, just drop in your watch into the chamber to charge it and the face will instantly convert to NightStand mode displaying a full clock face.Fits perfectly with Apple Watch Charging cord and organises your space.*This product does not come with the Apple Watch displayed or the Apple Watch charger displayed with the product. NightWatch uses the charger included with your Apple Watch to charge it inside the NightWatch docking station.

record.Creator: Smart-Women-Business
record.Title: Smart-Women. Let's break the Glass Ceiling!
record.Text: Are we crazy?We just want to make Argentina and LATAM the FIRST region where Women will be earning EQUALLY or even earn more than Men.NO WAY!!!Our CEO, Marta Monacci, has more than 25 years of Audit and M&A  Management experience in corporations in Latin America and the European community.And, she knows very well what it is like to hit the glass ceiling over and over again.And how much it hurts things like; to see that colleague who has less experience and qualifications than her, become her boss, just for going to play soccer with those who make the decisions.Many brilliant females Legal, Compliance,  IT and design professionals, face the "glass ceiling" in their jobs, as well as difficulties balancing work and family.These years we have seen the paradigm of work CHANGE completely.Nowadays, remote and global working is fully accepted,And the gig economy or human cloud is growing very fast.And in this unique time, there are new and better opportunities to change definitively women's life. Many companies are relying on TECHNOLOGY and the demand for specialized freelance professionals is higher than ever.Recruiting great talents in STEM, Design, Compliance, Legal-Tech, Finance and, high demand roles like big data,  software development,  for small businesses or startups, seems to be almost impossible and very expensive.And I'd like to share with you a best-kept secret Latin America has one of the Most Talented and Fastest Growing Tech workforce in the world.And Argentina Is Taking a New Lead in Cutting-Edge Tech Fields, Including Blockchain, FinTech, and More.In 2020/21, the income of the gig economy, the "human cloud," and, in particular, freelancer platforms grew at an unprecedented rate.Nonetheless, many companies looking for gender opportunities ARGUE that finding highly skilled female professionals is difficult...So let's come up with a BETTER solution: We need YOUR help to make REAL the U.N. SDGs as "Gender Equality", "Reduced Inequalities", "Good Health and Well Being", "No Poverty", "Partnerships for the Goals".YOU can HELP US to build The Best Freelancers Smart-Women platform, fundamentally different: an intelligent, reliable and easy-to-use platform that integrates UX and artificial intelligence and allows you to generate statistics and make improvements in real-time. We have an international pool of professionals who are recruited, selected, and highly qualified. We are developing tools for continuous training & improving techniques, to monitor, and manage remote teams and improve efficiency.Their services can allow entrepreneurs and professionals to have the team they need, for the time or project they need, and to reduce costs and time. We also want Companies as real "Partnerships for the Goals" that have as GOALS the United Nations SDGs to develop together a NEW, GREAT and more sustainable society. Let's create new opportunities for women and a vision of a great future for girls!  Our Vision is to export talent from Latin America around the world.And, Our mission is to develop the first female global platform that connects talented professionals with world-class companies and startups who know that no one should have to choose between family and career.Because we believe that promoting and developing opportunities for diversity in companies, and the financial independence of women, are essential to improving the quality of life of all women, their elders and their CHILDREN.Join in to create diverse smart opportunities and the future new jobs! Let´s break together with the glass ceiling! Let's Create together a new present and a better future for women.Ref: "The World Economic Forum's 2020 Global Gender Gap report found that at the current rate, it will take another 100 years to close the overall gender gap and 257 years to bring about parity in the workplace"    (https://www.businesscalltoaction.org)

record.Creator: RENCOLOR
record.Title: Rencolor DM-10: Reinvented color-mixed FDM 3D Printer
record.Text: RENCOLOR DM-10 was created for you, the creative entrepreneurial spirit who keeps moving every project forward and bringing it to life. That’s why its structure has been designed to stay simple, easy to carry, and easy to assemble.  If you’re making anything with your new 3D printing sidekick, then keeping the filament running in any direction is extremely important. RENCOLOR DM-10 lets you automatically load and unload the filament of the printer in a simple click of a button. No complex instructions, no lengthy start/stop processes—just straightforward convenience!Forget about limited monochrome 3D prints that don’t offer you other options, forcing you to only create boring monochromatic designs. Rencolor DM-10 FDM Color 3D Printer allows you to explore the following different 3D printing modes that will literally power and brighten your creativity: Print different layers, gradient colors, mix colors at any proportions, or go monochromatic — unlike other 3D printers, Rencolor lets you print more, better, and in more diversified ways!  No project is the same. Some require finer details while others not so much. That’s why Rencolor DM-10 doesn’t force you to use only one precision level. You can instead choose from 3 precision modes of 0.1mm/0.15mm/0.2mm, adjusting the precision according to the specific requirements of your project.  Rencolor DM-10 features Dual Z-Axis rods and motors that dramatically improve the performance and stability of the printing process, making every movement extremely smooth and accurate.You won’t need to read lengthy user guides or watch hours of tutorials to operate your Rencolor DM-10. Equipped with a clear UI touch screen interface, this sweet 3D printer is a sophisticated device that anyone can seamlessly use. Your Rencolor DM-10 doesn’t need to be online in order to print your creations since it supports offline printing.Also, if your suddenly face a power outage, your work and materials won’t be lost. Rencolor DM-10 will stop when the power goes out but will conveniently resume printing precisely where the project was interrupted, re-starting the printing process as if no unexpected interruption had happened. The simplicity of metal and the unique features of aluminum alloy frame are given a special charisma by the striking artistic design of Rencolor DM-10. The exterior of the remote extruder is marked by an iconic red: the red color card board printing surface. The black tones of the actual machine will appeal to your aesthetical sensitivity as the contrast between two colors will support a fertile creative horizon while you use your Rencolor for spectacular creations!  While portable and easy to assemble and use, Rencolor DM-10 is robustly built to last. This printer offers you something truly unique: a lifetime warranty. There’s no better offer than that, so we hope you’ll take us up on our offer!Shenzhen Ren Cai Tech Co., Ltd. has been a key research and development player in the 3D printing industry since 2016. The company's research has made great progress in 3D printing technologies such as FDM hot melt, light curing, and metal powder printing, among other technologies. We have proudly improved the FDM-3D full-color printing technology, we solved the high-precision FDM 3D printing challenges, and we made seriously important improvements to the FDM-3D printer extruder. All that work is now reflected on what we can offer you with Rencolor DM-10.This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Fortuna
record.Title: Fortuna
record.Text: Why we are here:Hi there, Kickstarter community, hope you're all well and achieving the goals you set out when joining this online community of thinkers, creators and innovators.The reason why I am here is to change an idea and a beta app into a new solution for the ever-changing business world.A short story:A couple of months ago two colleagues and I began our journey working on a market innovation for the bricks and mortar retail market; we call this little innovation Fortuna.We plan to use Fortuna as a means to foster a greater sense of community between consumers and their local enterprises, both from their local and nearby markets. This will be done by providing an inexpensive service that reduces the barriers to engagement, giving the little guys a chance to thrive in an ever more competitive and centralised environment.The Idea:The concept is simple and best said in a paraphrase of Steve Jobs' announcement of the iPod. Whereas the iPod "fit a thousand songs in your pocket", we want to give local small brick and mortar stores the ability to "promote their products in a thousand pockets in an inexpensive way." Sounds boastful, I know. :)All the above probably sounds great, but at the same time very much like a sales pitch. I guess your team is more interested in knowing where we currently stand and our understanding of the market.The Business:Fortuna is an application that is intended to provide an enhanced consumer purchasing power by locating, pricing and discovering local businesses while assisting them in increasing their sales without a substantial increase to their marketing budget.The Market:Fortuna's target market consists of two key consumer groups: 1) the paying clients, which would be enterprises classed as micro to medium, employing anywhere from 1-49 staff, of which there are currently 256,000; and 2) Ireland's digital citizens aged 18 and above, which amounts to 2.9 million people and growing. (This is our initial market; we have eye on global opportunities).Progress/Proof:Fortuna is currently progressing through the late stages of bug fixing and application tune-up with a market release capacity within 2-3 months.Fortuna is looking to expand the existing digital services for local enterprises nationwide, to facilitate a competitive market at a low cost. Examples of this could be your local takeaway or barber, spending hundreds of Euro a month on Google and Facebook marketing to get leads marketing to people which may or may not want their service, while with Fortuna it would be €10-20, with customers looking for their service based on the criteria stated above.Objectives/Future:Fortuna's objectives are simply to provide local businesses such as corner shops, independent grocers and sole traders the same opportunities to market and promote their goods and services to their local community in a cost-effective way, giving them a level footing with the big guys.Within 18 months of our launch, we plan to have a domestic consumer base of 450,000 app users with 4,000+ businesses on our platform, with further expansion globally with an end goal of 160 million users and 1,400,000+ businesses using the platform by the end of the 5th year of operation.Positive steps:- MVP undergoing debugging, with market release capacity within 2-3 months.- Due to external market conditions the market we are entering is growing.- Experienced team with 15 years of working in Software Development.- Our team has a combined experience of 5 years of working in direct sales, marketing, customer support and problem solving (not software related issues).- We have a vision that goes beyond just Fortuna, but a vision for a better, more competitive market, where the business currently left behind will actual get a chance to be the best they can be.

record.Creator: Nicholas J. Hott
record.Title: The Instant Hot Towel
record.Text: My name is Nicholas Hott and I came up with the idea of an instant hot towel that you could have just about anywhere in April 2020.I started experimenting with different types of containers, heating elements, and towels which took about a year come up with a working prototype. I then contacted a patent attorney and in July 2021.In September 2021, I received a The idea is simple and revolutionary: Imagine camping or hiking out in the middle of the woods, it's cold and rainy and there's no hot water nearby. However, you do have water and a towel, with this product, you could have a steaming hot towel within five minutes.Instant hot towel is perfect for anybody that might be outdoors or in a situation where they need to quickly wash up with no access to bathroom facilities. Hunting, camping, hiking, fishing, playing golf, at the beach, stuck in traffic. The Instant Hot Towel will provide a warm refreshing way to rejuvenate yourself after a long and arduous adventure.The Instant Hot Towel comes with detergent and tongs already included and comes in a variety of colors, fragrances and sizes. The container is made of  vacuum sealed double insulated clear plastic and a unique pop-up lid that prevents accidental spills.

record.Creator: Kyle Krantz
record.Title: Autastic Education
record.Text: https://www.autasticeducation.com/homeLook, I don't know you, and yet I can pretty much guarantee that you know someone with autism. That’s because roughly 1 in 60 people will be on the autism spectrum. It might be a family member, a friend, a classmate.  Almost universally, these people and their families have to fight tooth and nail to get basic access to resources like mental healthcare and education. Unfortunately, this is especially true for children with autism.  Children on the autism spectrum need a lot of therapy.  A lot!  On average they are recommended 36 hours of ABA therapy per week but at $120 per hour that would cost $225,000 per year.  No one can afford that, so these kids miss out. When they get that therapy at an early age, they make more friends, they are more likely to get a job, and they live longer. But it's a full-time job, and most insurance companies aren't going to cover those costs. Virtually all of the cognitive skills a behavioral therapist teaches can be taught through software. Memory,  language, and  attention, contrary to our collective intuition, are the easiest tasks to teach at an early age. I worked with kids on the spectrum from 3 -23 years old, and with them in mind, designed a curriculum that can teach kids regardless of severity and regardless of age. With Autastic Education, we can give children all the therapeutic lessons they need, for $20 a month. Don't get me wrong, in-person therapy is the best option, but for most kids on the spectrum, they just aren't getting what they need. Talk to the parents, they will tell you how stressed they are, how short on time they are, and how hard they have to work to get their kids fairly basic access to healthcare. Our team consists of Jack Seagle who has helped design and scaffold much of the core curriculum within Autastic Education, he put together our Kickstarter, and he is the co-founder of Autastic. Katie Clark is the Regional Behavior Analyst for Northeastern Utah Educational Services. With a decade of experience and several degrees and certificates behind her name, she oversees 9 school districts and 4 charter schools. In the clinic, she would be checking to make sure I am doing my job right, with our app, it's pretty much the same thing.  We go to her for data analytics and to make sure our algorithms are on point. The curriculum needs to be very precise in order to work with all kinds of different folks. With Katie and Jack, it couldn't be more precise. Finally,  me. I'm Kyle Krantz and I’m a Board Certified Behavioral Technician, I work directly with the kids in the clinic. After a few years of working with kids on the spectrum, I started working on this project to help close the gap that all my clients were experiencing.I know the numbers can be confusing but try to stick with me here. We are asking for $30,000, Kickstarter is an all or nothing platform, and if we dont get all of that than we get nothing and your money is given back. With $30,000 we can cover the remaining costs of our minimum viable product(MVP).
