Our MVP would be roughly $60,000, for 6 lessons and several minigames, this may not sound like much but this could be roughly 1000 hours of therapy (that would normally cost $120,000) But we need much more financial backing to build all the lessons we have planned. Each lesson averages roughly $8,000. We have the algorithms, and lesson designs worked out for 25 lessons taught through a process called discrete trial training.  All of these lessons will be provided at $20 a month.  With Kickstarter funding, we can help get this ball rolling. A good app needs to be fun, so we have lots of minigames designed and ready. A good app needs to be evidence-based, so running peer-reviewed research will be integral to our process (I'll be doing this initially but we will need to outsource later on). Our app is designed with low functioning autism in mind, but high functioning people with autism at a young age will benefit greatly.We prioritize the lessons we build based on their utility. The first ten lessons we will build focus on attention and memory. These lessons increase how well kiddos can learn in the future, and research metrics for these lessons are more accurate. We then begin to focus on verbal and emotional understanding. If we can get enough funding, after those 25 lessons we start working on more sophisticated approaches involving echoics, facial and voice recognition, virtual reality and much more. Much of this will require a fairly extensive amount of research and is planned for the mid to long-term. If you would like to learn more about some of the technical details, check out our website at  https://www.autasticeducation.com/home

record.Creator: Simon Nicolas
record.Title: SYT - THE KARAOKE SINGING BATTLE APP
record.Text: OVERVIEWSYT is a karaoke app that you can sing along with that plays music. Aside from the common functions of karaoke, this app has special effects that can enhance your visual and audio experience. The main feature of this app is for you to invite and challenge other singers. This is where you can earn points from the voters and whoever wins the challenge. The main concept of this is app is to sing, invite, challenge, and let other voters decide on the winner to earn points. Another way of gaining points while using this app, is when other people can request for you to sing their favorite songs. People can buy a virtual gift card where they can donate or put it in the challenge pot for the singers to earn points. Upon reaching certain points, the singers can exchange the points for cash for minimal fee. Mission & Vision⦁	 Our Mission is to help young and old people to show their  talent and to even challenge their friends or family to a music competition. ⦁	To eradicate loneliness and depression, we help people work past their barriers, goals and insecurities.⦁	Our Mission is to create an enjoyable and challenging app for fun.   IMPACTSocial media have taken an insurmountable impact in people's lives, and here comes SYT which provides people with the tools to overcome their Goal, insecurities and barriers so as to show their  talents, and ultimately to make more money and have fun.                                                  HOW IT WORK                            SING, RELEASE AND LET THE AUDIENCE VOTE.Users selects their favorite songs from the song lists. Once its uploaded to the database and the user decides if they would like to keep the performance private or share it with the community. Once uploaded, users then can release to the feed for a challenge. Set how much is the wager and how many days is the challenge will be. Invite family and friends so they can VOTE and add coins to the pot money. CAMPAIGN OBJECTIVE What we need Right now, we are turning to you for helping to raise the funds to get our movement of the ground to operationalize our business to help inspire change, continue a movement in our world and perhaps go viral in our approach, we need $5000 for IOS and Android development and getting music license collection, be apart of this and help us spread the love.Our goal through this campaign is to raise $5,000. What we are asking from you today is an open heart, open donation, and helping hands. Even the smallest of contributions will make a big difference for us - for every pledge, above $5 we will send a Personal Thank you email to you as a token of appreciation along with other rewards given for the donation.     ABOUT MEHi i am Simon Nicolas The CEO and Founder of Karaoke Battle App, Former  Electrical Engineering student in University of Nevada, Las Vegas. Currently, I am a skycap for American Airlines. and I am committed to offer my knowledge to improve the experience of lovers of karaoke.                                      RISKS & CHALLENGESWe strategically partnered with vender's that will help us achieve our movement to inspire change and meet all product deadlines happen.                                            Things can happen outside out of control that may delay shipments but we will do everything in our power to ensure products are delivered in a timely manner. Our commitment is to be fully transparent.     IF YOU LOVE TO SING AND UP FOR A CHALLENGE, SYT IS JUST FOR YOU. OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPIn addition to supporting this project with your donation, you can also show your support by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success. We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

record.Creator: Cristian Davidsohn
record.Title: The @ App
record.Text: Powered by Books: PheN & Phen of New EdenA revolutionary type of Reddit where users get together, discuss, and elevate standards of their world, for others, and of themselves and get paid by doing so at the same time. Projected official User Subscriptions:Monthly Subscriptions vary; beginners vs developers.  12$ vs 299$ / MonthPhenicsim Consultations of thoughts and expectations realized in literary works. Any new mental entry for whatever pondered philosophy is a philosophy pondered as philosophy itself.TL;DR: This book is about the progression of mankind's state of mind - focusing more on our future's than it has anything to do with our past's.Part I.Introduction to ProphenI. Realising Prophenism; Definition of a Person; Relationship between “People” and “Pupil”; Fear and personalism; Personalism as an expected temporary evolutionary disorder; Definition of a Prophen; Dissection of term; Relationship between Prophen, Person, Prophet, Professor and Prophecy; What separates Prophen from People; Why People aren’t idiots,; Fear and mass-populations; Why People think in a different, more inconvenient way due to their upbringing.; Why Prophen intrinsically fear not of death (in a Phenic society of course).II. Denying Prophenism; Why questioning the non-existence of mass Prophenism is expected.; Why the concept hasn’t yet already been recognized.; Prophenism/ Phenism’s stance on evolution or pre-evolution of human thought?; Prophen; Why Prophenism can and can’t be considered as more advanced than Personalism; But why Personalism is obsolete to ProphenismII. How Prophenism Came to and is More Natural than Personalism-Prophen of the Past-From Jesus, to Ghandi, to Hippies, to George Carlin-Prophen of the Present-From Obama to Russell Brand to Bill Maher; Why Obama hasn’t turned Earth into…Yes… New Eden.-Why Prophen are more likely than People to have power.; Why Prophen are more likely to commit suicide.|Make the section 10 pages long with each word having its own page“They are the only smart people amongst a swam ofZu Tang Idiocy in Denial Bats they on the swarm”-Why Prophen are more likely, scratch that; why Prophen enjoy life more than People.-Why Prophen are more intelligent than People.; What is our definition of intelligence?; What defines academics and how exactly does it stunt human potential.All through the years I've developed a kind of compassion for humans who've achieved high degrees - whatever their established feats if you will, men/ women that inspire ones to take an internal look, and asses the way ones act today - how they act vs how they compare now to their present selves - how they compare to others that aren't in similar domains - whether that be in whatever field. Whether they be of our origins or of those in the present,  we have the ability of being aware of our individual person-hood as the difference between events that exist using our more important ability we have as being aware of lives we lead. Destiny leads to wealth, glory or whatever; depends on whatever one sow's to constantly changing environments.PHeN &The Phen of  New Eden is a brief look at the world and how we live today; the way our lives currently live.When a boat's sail is made, it's been made to be guided. It is intern in need of being guided by the wind in order to go forward; the sail needs wind in order to sail.Desire vs Intent vs whatever required SatisfactionSailing as DesireWind as being required the same as to gain whatever in order for Intent and acts as Effort itselfSatisfaction as Acts that enact whatever it is that allows Moving ForwardDesire vs Effort vs Satisfaction.This book is about everything you've wanted to know about the world in conjunction with whatever you have in mind with whatsoever it is that makes you want.To live by as while you read each sentence you and spoken to you page by page.Phenicism is taught equally through two books.PhenPhen of New Eden'Adult Youth (3-14 years)Phen is a mental philosophy that allows eternal internal independence - the sure-shot act, the maintaining of  one's (financial) independence in conjunction with living in a freer realized world. To be free of social/economic difficulty all you needs is to read less than 75 pages.

record.Creator: Felix Scherf
record.Title: SoundDemocrat
record.Text: I think everybody knows the problem at houseparties or in clubs that everybody wants to make the music or has song suggestions and that ends often in a total sound clash.We develop a platform where users can vote on the listing of songs in the queue and the the song with the best voting comes next or - when a DJ is there - the DJ can select the song and mix it up.The session participants can directly give the DJ a tip when he mixes the music good. Sound.Democrat App.Sound.Democrat

record.Text: The Goal here is to Design a Platform for Developers to Learn and Share Ideas and Knowledge.We allready Worked on the Platform and it has allot of Planning allready build in.Its a Enterprice Solution build with the Invission Community Forum Software.We Plan to Deploy a Server Cluster to Install the Forum Software so we can use the Downloads Section and Open it up to the Community. It allready has a Marketplace for Asset Sharing for Unreal Engine, Unity and the Hazel Engine. It will also be the Main Platform to Download our own Engine that is Currently under Development.The Forum also allows you to create your own "Clubs". a Club is basicly a Page that you as the user can Set up to Publish your own Projects or Advertise your Development Team/Studio.Features of the Club Option,Paid Club Membershipsthis allows you to create a Club and set a Join Fee for users that want to Join the Club.this allows you to create a Club for example a Game Project you are Working on and Only users that Subscribe to the Club can See the Project and Interact with the Club ( Such as the Library, Discussions and more.The Join Fee is optional and if you deside to use it the Price to Join is up to you.User-Created CommunitiesThe Club is basicly a Community inside a Community. it has all the Features you would have on the Forum but just Managed by your and your Moderators. thats Perfect for Development Projects to Advertise them to others and share Screenshots and Files.You will have your own Discussion Board, galleries, Download Section for Files and Programms, calendars and more.Member ApprovalYou have Full Controll over who is able to Join the Club. you can Select your own Staff that  Moderates Content inside your Club.It will allow you to get a Join Request from Members that want to Join the Club. thats the Perfect way to Create a Platform to share Informations with your Dev Team without anyone else to know what you are up to.Thats Pretty Much everything about the Club Function we want to Introduce here.MarketplaceYou have the Option to Sell your own Projects on the Platform such as Asset Packs, Textures, Sound and Music and much more for the Software we have on our Platform such as UE4, Unity, Blender and more.you also have the Option to sell diferent Items on your Club Page to your Community if you want. Game PublishingWe also want to Support Small Indie Developers with there Projects to get on the Market. and the Platform will be the Central Spot wehre we would Communicate with Studios to get there Games on the Market and take Care about Marketing, Consulting and more. This is a Idea we are still working on but will be on the Platform as soon as PossibleSupportThe Platform has a Inbuild Support Department. If you have specific questions about an Engine you cant find on the Internet and the Forum does not have the right answer for you, you can allways ask the Support Department. they will work closly together with you to get you to the Solution. We allways Recommend that you Post your Question first and then create a Support Request.StoreThe Store is still under Development but this is a way for us to Finance the Platform in the feature. We will Provide different Items such as Merchandise or Game Keys for people that have Interest in those kind of things.ForumThe Forum is the Core Part of the Platform. this is the place wehre you can as questions. seek feedback for your projects and chat in general. The Forum is currently available in German and English. French and Russian is following in mid 2022 early 2023.The Platform currently has following Categories,more categories can be created on Request.For the FeatureWe want to Build a Platform that Last for a long time. We gonna Improve the Platform and the Staff over that time and want to give you a great User Experience. We are greatfull for feedback from the Community and would love to Implement your Ideas into the Project.The Platform can be used for free and is for everyone that is interested in Game Development or people that are just interested on how games are made. we try to build the Platform for the Community but its all about what you wanna do with it.What we gonna do with the Fundings raise on Kickstarter ?We gonna Pay the Provider with that for the most part, but it is also used for Marketing to get the Platform Advertised so more People get to know it. We also pay Licensing Fees for assets that will be Sold on the Platform.

record.Creator: Shaperoo
record.Title: SHAPEROO 2025
record.Text:
The prototype of CNC Shaperoo 2025 was created as a successor to the Chinese CNC 3018 platform. The design was based on the assumption that the machine would have a similar workspace, but with significantly better rigidity, machining speed performance, and adjustable power of the AC-powered spindle. In short, the enormous power of a real milling machine was enclosed in a compact housing that fits on a workbench.BEGINNERS If you are new to milling, it is not a problem because the assembly of the machine is easy and you will be assisted by our instructional videos. They will guide you from folding, through setup, to running the machine and processing material.ADVANCEDShaperoo is also designed for users who require precision machining. This is ensured by a rigid frame, refined and dedicated electronics, and years of our experience in designing and building CNC machines. CNC machines, as well as 3D printers, provide many possibilities for creation. Compared to similarly priced machines, Shaperoo is extremely powerful and precise. For this reason, the CNC is the ideal machine for the do-it-yourselfer and the person who likes DIY. You can see examples of very simple DIY works in our videos.Engraving and cutting aluminium is also no problem for our machine.More advanced DIY and electronics enthusiasts may be interested in creating PCBs, for which our machine is also very well suited.CNC system board based on Arduino nano 328, compatible with GRBL 1.1 and Estlcam.

   The board allows to control CNC machines using GRBL, Estlcam, or Chilipeppr firmware. Optically isolated inputs and outputs provide overvoltage protection on Arduino module ports while ensuring stable operation.In addition to the typical leads for the GRBL, the laser, air assist, and PWM 0-10V connectors were also brought out. All three axes operate with backlash-canceling trapezoidal screws, allowing precise milling of even such complex tasks as circuit boards. Yes, it is possible! Thanks to a dedicated speed controller designed and manufactured by us, it is possible to adjust the spindle speed in the range of 10 000 - 20 000 RPM directly from control software (GRBL Candle, Estlcam).Thanks to the measuring functions built into the software, it is possible to measure the surface and angular displacement of the workpiece.This functionality is particularly useful when milling PCBs, providing a constant cavity, eliminating surface irregularities.The Estlcam software allows you to control the machine from a PC. Using its full potential, we have added a remote control to the machine to facilitate precise guidance of the spindle to the start position.Years of experience in working with CNC machines allowed us to design a device that is easy to assembly, affordable but still very accurate. The base of the construction is made of L-type aluminum profiles, which provide rigidity to the whole machine. . Structural elements are made in 3D printing technology, with gyroid filling no less than 50%. As a result, we deliver high-quality and durability elements.Unlike most CNC's, the Shaperoo has a shielded work area so 95% of the chips stay inside, this allows for a safer and cleaner work area. In case of an emergency there is an emergency stop button on the front of the machine.It's been a while since we started working on our machine. Shaperoo 2025 is still a prototype, but the progress that has been made since the first version is enormous. The biggest achievements of this work are the development of our own controller boards, spindle PWM, tool length measurement and table mapping. In the future we plan to develop an attachable laser and we are open to suggestions.  Working area is: 250x200mm On Shaperoo you will be able to process:Here are sample processing parameters on our machine:We ship Shaperoo 2025 kits worldwide, but please note that the machine is designed to be plugged into 230V 50Hz mains. US version is planned for the future.Shipping to Poland is 20€, rest of the world 30€.You can find us on Facebook, Instagram, and Youtube! We have also a website: https://shaperoo.comTomasz Matuszewski – project founder and lead designer  Julia Matuszewska - photographer
Sara Matuszewska – lead assembly
Sylwia Matuszewska – logistician
Piotr Pawlik – lead electrician
Marek Kornaś – lead PCB designer
Paweł Cyrankowski - marketing strategist

record.Creator: Joel Arzu
record.Title: CoVoice : The Uber of Getting a Translator
record.Text: CoVoice is the product of my brother, Regis Arzu, and me, Joel Arzu, first generation Americans and the son of immigrant parents who left Honduras for a better life in America. Growing up, our parents only spoke Spanish in this great land of opportunity; and as parents ourselves, we can only imagine the struggles they went through trying to give us the world, but being held back because they didn’t speak English. That’s why we came up with CoVoice, an app that connects people who need help understanding what someone is saying, with someone who can help translate. We like to say it’s the Uber of getting a translator.So, whether you’re a parent who wants to understand what your child's teacher is saying at their parent teacher conference, have car issues and need to communicate to the mechanic so they can better diagnose what’s wrong with your car, at the pharmacist and need clarity on the amount of pills you need to be taking and how often, or maybe you’re a home chef walking through ChinaTown exploring different ingredients to try at home and would like to learn more about them.  CoVoice will connect you with someone who could help.Minimum Viable Product / There are over 16 million Spanish speakers in America who don’t understand English (A population called LEP - Limited English Proficient), so to launch our MPV we’ll start with English/Spanish to keep our App development costs down. That being said, all rewards with CoVoice credit applies to Spanish/English translation.Covoice es una idea de aplicación de mi hermano, Regis Arzu, y yo, Joel Arzu, estadounidenses de primera generación e hijo de padres inmigrantes que dejaron Honduras por una vida mejor en Estados Unidos. Al crecer, nuestros padres solo hablaban español en esta gran tierra de oportunidades; y como padres, solo podemos imaginar las luchas por las que atravesaron tratando de darnos el mundo, pero se vieron reprimidos porque no hablaban inglés. Es por eso que creamos CoVoice, una aplicación que conecta a las personas que necesitan ayuda para comprender lo que alguien está diciendo, con alguien que puede ayudar a traducir. Nos gusta decir que es el Uber de conseguir un traductor.Entonces, si usted es un padre que quiere entender lo que el maestro de su hijo está diciendo en la conferencia de padres y maestros, o tal vez está en el farmacéutico y necesita claridad sobre la cantidad de píldoras que debe tomar y con qué frecuencia. CoVoice lo conectará con alguien que pueda ayudarlo.Producto Mínimo Viable / Hay más de 16 millones de hispanohablantes en Estados Unidos que no entienden inglés (una población llamada LEP - Dominio limitado del inglés), por lo que para lanzar nuestro MPV comenzaremos con inglés / español para mantener bajos los costos de desarrollo de nuestra aplicación. Dicho esto, todas las recompensas con crédito de CoVoice se aplican a la traducción al español / inglés.

record.Creator: Wild Streets
record.Title: Wild Streets - Green Your City With Augmented Reality
record.Text: Wild Streets is a free augmented reality app that combines scientific data and high-quality 3D models of trees and plants to allow people to co-create the green, inclusive cities of tomorrow. More than ever, we need cities that offer green, healthy, usable spaces from micro parks sprinkled across neighbourhoods to green high-streets and super bicycle pathways connecting every corner of a city - and they ought to be shaped by the people they are intended for. Wild Streets is a tool that will help people reimagine their cities. It celebrates people’s differences and enables place-makers in creating spaces that unify and incorporates the needs and wishes of all. The app takes public engagement and awareness building on the benefits of urban nature to a whole new level.At the same time, Wild Streets harnesses the power of aggregated social data to inform decision-makers and planners about locals' preferences for green infrastructure - putting citizens at the centre of urban development. Limits to funding, awareness, and time are interrelated factors that compromise the quality of urban greening as they impede the decision-making of everyone involved. Wild Streets offers a cost- and time-effective tool that enables municipalities, organisations, and companies of all budgets to meet citizens at street level.   It's an ambitious project. That's why we've teamed up with two award-winning companies, Norgram and Set Snail, who have the expertise needed to bring the Wild Streets vision to life. We're also proud to be joining forces with i-Tree and Treeconomics, both drivers in the UK and internationally of the study of the multi-dimensional benefits of urban trees. To ensure that the app and our services are designed in a way that enables us to meet our objectives, we've assembled three incredible subject-focused advisory boards. A supervisory board will help us grow our geographical reach and scope in an organic and sustainable manWild Streets is a not-for-profit association registered in Denmark (CVR no. 39872595). Imagine if you could adapt your city right here and now; if those dull, grey streets could be your canvas. The work commute could be as pleasant as a walk in the park. Your surroundings could be tailored to suit your everyday needs for places to take a break, eat that lunch, let the kids roam around safely, and exercise in a calm setting with cleaner, healthier air. Those familiar spaces could look and feel like they never have before.Using Apple's augmented reality technology, the Wild Streets app will blur the line between how our cities are and what could be. We're inviting you to green your streets, squares, bike paths, back alleys, rooftops, and every other little opportune corner of your city, with lush, beautiful 3D vector trees and plants. The app will be compatible with iOS and Android devices.Besides having fun creating the city of your dreams, we want you to share it with the world. Wild Streets allows other people to step into your ideas by letting them reload your green creation at the same location, comment on it, iterate on the design, and share it with even more people including those in a position to make it happen. By including users' social data, we are also bridging the gap between locals, those who design our public spaces, and those who have the final say about their development. No more publicly displayed still images showing picture-perfect renders of urban landscapes nobody had a say on: planners will be able to see what people really want - across genders, ages, ethnicity - and people will be able to take official proposals to the test in the real-time world.Welcome to the green, inclusive cities of tomorrow!If we can harness our collective imagination and show it to the world, we don't need to accept the way things are, or even tweak the details. It's high time for a step-change into the future we want to live in. How green could your city be, how would it feel to think of streets as parks, how would it change the way you and your family live now and into a climate uncertain future?In 2020, the world as we know it changed for most of us. It got a lot smaller in many ways, and we have been forced to interact differently with our surroundings. The quality of our neighborhoods, access to nature, and the feeling of a space have all proven to be critical factors to people's mental and physical health in a time where lockdowns have mainly kept us at home or in our immediate surroundings.As we gradually adapt to new normals and return to old ones, these factors are likely to play a big role in how we perceive and make use of our cities. It has become clear that (nearby) access to green space for exercise, social gathering, and quiet self-reflection is scarce at best. And the design of such spaces is narrow and not accommodating the needs of everyone. People's awareness of the quality of the air they breathe has also come into focus, or there is at least ample opportunity to instill it.Allowing locals to shape their neighbourhoods and the places they work and play according to their needs is perhaps more than ever a timely opportunity to shape inclusive, considered cities. With the significant loss of power that people have experienced over their everyday life in 2020, there is a new willingness to take part in the reshaping of urban spaces - co-creation has the potential to empower people to take control of this process.The current crisis has amplified the reasons why the design of our cities is not fit to deal with what remains one of the greatest challenges of our time. Climate change has a visible impact on our lives, with urban temperatures fluctuating between extremes and nature in an unprecedented decline. Many cities are hotspots of biodiversity and use natural solutions to keep cool, prevent floods, deflect pollution, and calm winds. Today, nine in ten people worldwide live in places where air pollution levels exceed guideline limits by the World Health Organization, causing more than 7 million deaths every year. With the world’s urban population continuing its rapid climb to 68 percent by 2050, the transformation towards green, low-carbon cities is critical.Urban forests and nature in general, play a pivotal role in this, but current planting efforts in many cities are not happening at the rate they could. Wherever people have been given a voice in planning their city through measures such as participatory budgeting, there has been a clear call for greener surroundings. These can't be only top-down decisions either, the people who live in and use the streets every day need to have a say, and have a sense of ownership over what for some is their garden. There is an urgent need for solutions that enable the co-creation of tomorrow’s sustainable, green cities in the image of the people that inhabits them and that supports the rising willingness and activism among citizens to help bring about this transition. To that willingness, we offer Wild Streets.Utilising the revolutionary possibilities of AR (augmented reality), Wild Streets will enable users to green any location in real-time with simple drag’n’drop of true-to-scale 3D plants, trees, and street fixtures to whatever surroundings they view through their mobile device. Just like other AR apps, Wild Streets will measure relative heights, depths, and distances, presenting users with realistic limitations to where items can be placed. Ultimately, Wild Streets will allow users to experience their own and others' green designs, take selfies of themselves in it and share it with the world on social media.  The functionalities of Wild Streets are straightforward! The following mock-ups are concept sketches of the app's design that help us communicate the project with knowledge partners, advisory board members, and our B2B network. The final UI and UX designs will be developed by our talented development team and will look very different from these sketches, in terms of both visuals and wording, but this is how the concept works:We have made a prototype that demonstrates a simplified, raw version of the tree-placing functionality, how detailed the 3D vector trees are, and how easily one can reimagine any space. However, it is but a proof-of-principle prototype, and the full version of the app will look and feel completely different both in terms of design and the resolution and detailing of the trees, and feature many additional functionalities.To give users the most realistic experience, we'll be working with the award-winning vegetation software of Speedtree to create 3D trees and plants vectors. Think Avatar and Star Wars and their incredible landscapes, those are the quality of Speedtree's vector models! Using their software, we can model stunning, lifelike trees and plants as it taps into substantive databases of textures, enables the configuration of species-specific characteristics such as leaves, flowers, seeds, height, spread, branch length, branching angles, and bark texture. It is also possible to change the season, add wind effects as well as directional lighting on leaves and the tree surface. Believe us, it's immersive - you'll find yourself trying to touch the trees! Taking a stroll in a green space is lovely, but placing a bench amongst it would open up loads of new ways to spend time there. It's not surprising that greenery and street fixtures are closely related design parameters for urban planning. The selection of greenery for a location may very well depend on its intended purpose and hence any placed furniture and fixtures.In general, preferences to street fixtures vary substantially across demographic groups and life situations; elderly are likely to need more comfortable seating compared to children who generally want something fun to play on! Including street furniture in the app enables considered placemaking - and will help planners understand what people need and want and from their city.This is why we'll be continuously collaborating with environmentally conscious producers of seriously smart (and stylish!) solutions for outdoor benches, cycle parking, street separators, playground- and sports facilities, and other elements that just make a city work better. We will have the same high requirements for the visual quality of the 3D models of these products as we do for our tree and plant vectors.  The more we speak to people about Wild Streets, the more potential opportunities come up for things it makes possible. Organisations representing a wide range of urban interests, along with councils and companies in the business of placemaking are keen to use Wild Streets to create awareness about their work and to help them achieve their goals. Here're just a few examples of uses of the app:What makes Wild Streets so powerful - and ambitious! - is its usage of high-quality, and to the extent possible, real-time data. The app uses locally sourced data to make geo-specific recommendations for greenery that will thrive based on climate and ecology. Why does that matter? While it's clear that mango trees won't be too happy in the cold Scandinavian winter, it may surprise you to know to what extent choosing the right tree for the right place can have huge beneficial impacts on your neighbourhood. Research shows that trees have the ability to significantly reduce the risk of flooding, improve air quality, bring back wildlife, grow food, increase the amenity value, reduce temperature extremes and help people cope with stress - just to mention a few amazing features. Our demands to the data we use are critical for the overall usability of the app, for making it a trustworthy source for councils and place makers, and what distinguishes it from gimmicky AR apps. At launch, the algorithm powering the Wild Streets app will feature a selection of carefully considered indicators from well renowned and trusted data sources to suggest the right trees for the right place. We have prioritised these indicators based on in-depth conversations with foresters and researchers. Over time, we aspire to expand our algorithm with indicators expressive of more structurally complicated site-specific conditions as well as estimated benefits from tree planting.Creating awarenessOur algorithm will be hard at work in the background, processing thousands of data entries, while leaving you to play and have fun designing your city. We know from experience that communicating knowledge on sustainability is an incredibly hard task; the issues are complex and their implications are difficult to cope with. If we were to present people with technical information on all of the specific challenges and conditions of a location that they're thinking about greening, we'd lose 95 percent of them. And we want to get everybody excited and involved in greening up their cities! Key to the development of the Wild Streets app has therefore been to understand what tickles people when it comes to urban placemaking, and to partner up with the best strategic design team out there. With a laser focus on engagement, Wild Streets will seamlessly navigate users through the human and ecological benefits of their amazing designs. Of course, there will also be opt-in options for more detailed information for users who are interested. Managing expectationsThrough our many conversations with people in the urban planning field, it has become clear that an integrated in-app measure is needed to cope with people's expectations of a design created with Wild Streets. Because the reality is that the app and its data do not offer a blueprint for what is actually possible without the consideration of an experienced forester, and no matter how wonderful a design turns out and how many likes it gets on social media, no one is obligated to make it happen. That said, seeing is believing, and Wild Streets brings ideas so much closer to reality.Wild Streets uses the best available data to present users with flora that are likely to suit local site conditions and help tackle local challenges. We are developing a 'Confidence Index' that will give a transparent picture of the availability and quality of data for any given location. Through this index, we are also hoping to encourage more data collection and entrepreneurship. Design campaigns are tailored, in-app areas made for design surveys of specific geographical locations, and with respect to special social and/or environmental concerns. In a nutshell, design campaigns invite the public to have a direct say in current/ongoing greening projects. They feature tailored pop-up messages, surveys, and optimised tree/plant bundles for a specific theme. Actually, there will be many more available features and we'll keep adding more as we go!This feature of the app has been designed with councils, architects, and developers in mind to do good public engagement for local greening and building projects from the hyper-local level to master-planning. Users will be able to have a say on what they would like to have featured in an area, and respond to and iterate upon design proposals right at the beginning of the process.A campaign can have multiple rounds of engagement! For example, citizens can be asked to provide general ideas for a place or give feedback on pre-commissioned landscape design, then once all that feedback has been digested by planners, citizens can have another go on an optimised design. In this way, you increase people's sense of ownership of a place and the quality of the result. People are likely to be more committed to the process, and in using and looking after the place which is created as a result.  Expect a lot of augmented reality fun with app-wide global campaigns as well, where we will focus on international awareness days celebrating nature, climate, biodiversity, urbanism, sports as well as physical and mental health. You will never know what surprises we might let loose when placing a tree!As important and powerful as the engagement and awareness experience is from just using the app, the true value of Wild Streets is in the data it collects and the output it generates. We want people's beautiful designs and ideas for their cities to go somewhere where change can happen. Based on the conversations we've had with many future users, we're launching the app with different outputs tailored to citizens and to clients (municipalities, organisations, companies). Visual outputsCitizensThe visual output available to people will be fairly simple as their interest mainly is in experiencing their own and other users' designs in real-time and in formats commonly shared on social media. By enabling people to share high-quality videos or photos ('selfie' or not), it inspires others to have a say. This raises the bar of ambition for decision-makers, and having seen what people need and want, there is a public accountability to use that knowledge and make ideas come to life. It changes the conversation between citizens and councils from opposition to proposition, to help make supporting voices as loud as protesting ones are today. ClientsClients as a group have more differing needs in the formats they access and review users' design submissions in, depending on their profession. How clients can explore the app's output matters a great deal to the potential societal impact of Wild Streets. The diagram below illustrates the various types of visual output formats that future users have expressed interest in. Clients also get access to a dashboard through which they can receive your designs, showing what green space the people want and where, and how much value all the ideas would bring if they were made. Shared designs and some basic aggregated info about the characteristics of the people who made them give organisations and councils everywhere a really useful database to make better decisions about green spaces for a particular community. So that even if there are few designs shared in a particular place or project, designers might know, for example, that people of a certain sort of age, ethnicity, and gender tend to prefer spaces that feel safe, smell and look beautiful, have playgrounds, and have amazing green pathways for sports.Data output Citizens & clientsThe data output presented to the users is carefully chosen to be engaging but not to overwhelm and risk that they don't complete a design or delete the app. The app will suggest other local designs for the user to explore based not only on geographic location but also on shared social characteristics, building a local awareness of what the community wants. For awareness-raising and engagement, the app will feature estimated values of the ecosystem services delivered by the design.ClientsAlongside the visual design recommendations from users, Wild Streets will also generate data useful to clients. These include the ecosystem services of a user's designs and the cumulative effect of these for a defined geographic area.The app collects demographic data on age, gender, nationality, ethnicity, location, and whether people have children or live with handicaps. By cross-referencing preferences for greenery; such as formality, naturalism, species choice, or functionality with information about the types of users that preferred them, a designer/planner can better cater to the needs of different communities or types of individuals.Such data will be available in aggregated form to allow clients to see whether a survey campaign has been inclusive or reached the desired demographic groups. Naturally, data protection and privacy are key, and users' personal information will be protected.It's gonna be a learning curve, for sure, as to what kind of output people need to make Wild Streets serve them best. Luckily, the app collects plenty of data behind the scenes that we can use to continuously create new exiting outputs to accommodate people's wishesIrrespective of your motivations for using the app, we will do everything we can to help make citizens' visions come true. Not only does anyone working in not-for-profit placemaking have free, unlimited access to citizens' designs, but the real magic is unlocked when they can see what sort of people make what sort of designs (free as well!). That's the foundation for inclusive placemaking. A lot of effort will be put into distributing these insights and visuals to our growing international network of councils and organisations enabling them to make considered decisions. And don't worry, we take privacy very seriously.   It is thanks to in-depth conversations with placemakers from councils, interested organisations, and companies - the people who work on the ground and directly with citizens on greening our cities - that Wild Streets looks the way it does today. Going forward, it makes sense to us that those who are going to apply the app also should have a strong say on what it has to offer. We are inviting our community of placemakers to co-create the app and the complementing services, be part of beta-testing, and have a real impact on the product development process. We believe this will increase the chances for citizens' designs to be realised.Wild Streets will be globally available from its release day. However, it is planned to officially launch in the UK where the concept was born with the most complete data, most tree species, the highest confidence index and many partnerships for data, grassroots engagement, and professional deployment. A soft launch will follow shortly after in a select city in the US. These locations will have the highest 'Confidence Index' (data coverage and quality) and hence see a higher accuracy of the app's tree-selection tool and ecosystem benefit calculations. As one example: while the app is powered with global air quality data from Plume Labs, a recognised global data provider, UK/US data authorities will provide more precise local information.The implications for the app's usability elsewhere straight after launch depend on whether or not a country belongs to the same 'world climate region' as the UK - the light green area in the map below. These areas stand a good chance of being hospitable to the initial set of trees, though those species might not be the most obvious choices for the local ecology.While our global data providers feed the app with location-specific information, certain assumptions will be made for countries belonging to the UK's 'cool temperate moist' region. We may also be able to make certain assumptions for other regions with similar hardiness characteristics. This will be decided following advice from our Scientific Advisory Board and Knowledge Partners.Any country belonging to the other world climate regions will see a lower Confidence Index and will still be able to access a selection of tree species that are known to those regions. However, the selection tool will not be 'active' as data coverage is simply too low to make an informed recommendation. For these countries, Wild Streets will, nevertheless, still be a powerful engagement and placemaking tool.We have defined 1 year from funding being secured until the fully tested app is ready for release. In the testing stages, councils, companies, and organizations in our network will get the chance to apply Wild Streets in real life and help us perfect the app. Do you want to get your hands on the beta-version too? Sign up for our newsletter here. Wild Streets is an ambitious project using some of the best people in their fields - as you might have suspected by now, it is not possible to develop a full-scale version of the app for just €50.000. In fact, the whole project is estimated to cost €1.628.000. These numbers have been subject to countless revisions as we have optimized our MVP (minimum viable product), giving enough space for our team of developers to work with Apple and our knowledge/data providers to get the app working flawlessly. Here's how we'll spend the money: With your help, we can get the work started and get the funding ball rolling. Once you pledge, you'll be invited to join a Substack space, where we'll share exclusive behind-the-scenes videos from the developers' desk, live streams with the Wild Streets team, and other goodies including future features that we're currently keeping under wraps. You'll also get a real say in the development of the app from day 1 through polls and demos. This is a tool for co-design, and we'll be co-designing the app itself too.For every stretch goal we reach, we'll make additional features available or enhance existing ones - available at launch or within 1 year thereof.  Once we've reached Goal 10, we'll announce additional goals and the exciting features they come with.  In addition to Kickstarter, we're also pursuing large sponsors to meet the full funding we need to create and launch. We will keep you updated on our funding progress outside Kickstarter, so you can how close we are to our goals.What if we collect more than we need? The more funding we get, the more we have to develop additional features and services to kick Wild Streets off with and to plan amazing launch events with. Wild Streets is a not-for-profit organization and everything we earn will be funneled into enhancing the user experience, our offerings to placemakers, and launching full data versions of the app in other countries.      When pledging to Wild Streets, you are pledging towards your future. Our Kickstarter rewards are all connected to the Wild Streets app, meaning by default that no rewards become available before the full app is fully financed and developed. But when it is ready, there will be a treasure chest of rewards. Below you will see the rewards available - once you make a pledge, we invite you to become a lifetime member of our community, meaning that you will get early access to new releases, pre-sets, fun filters and animated hidden surprises, green-screen persona appearances (oh yes!), and many more engaging surprises. We will also share exclusive behind-the-scenes and making-of videos during the development of the app. Head to our website at www.wildstreets.org if you're interested in a personalised reward or already have an idea for a green commissioned project.We are currently a small team of two but it feels like we are many more because of our committed network and advisors with huge collective experience and wisdom between them. Once our budget is secured, our team will grow to five as we will need an innovative developer who can continue the product development, a data-wizard, and a social media/PR whirlwind fluent in engagement.Something that does not make sense? Or simply curious to know more? Maybe you (and your neighborhood) want to be part of the beta-testing community, or you're sitting on data that could benefit the app? Or maybe you have a specific idea for collaboration.Feel free to reach out to us with any inquiry - big or small - by writing us at founder@wildstreets.org or calling us at +45 31 20 74 90.

record.Creator: Spiridon Sapouridis
record.Title: ServiceAtHome: Die App welche Dienstleistungen digitslisiert
record.Text: Hello people, wir wollen den gesamten dritten Wirtschaftssektor digitalisieren. Was bedeutet das? Nun, Deutschland ist ein Land, welches von Dienstleistungen geprägt ist; beim Friseurbesuch, im Nagelstudio, in einer Therme, in einer Sauna oder beim Handwerker, alles sind Dienstleistungen.  Um diese Dienstleistungen und viele mehr in Anspruch zu nehmen, wird oft ein Termin benötigt, welcher nach wie vor noch überwiegend am Telefon vereinbart wird und dieses Vorgehen kostet Zeit, Geld und kann die Qualität der Dienstleistung mindern. Mit unserer App soll sich das ändern!Laut einer Umfrage, welche von der Forsa durchgeführt wurde, warten viele Menschen in Deutschland nur darauf, Dienstleistungen im Internet zu buchen. Wir haben dafür eine Marktplatz-Lösung entwickelt, welche dies ermöglichen soll und auf vollständiger Transparenz basiert. Der Kunde kann sich jedes Angebot, von jedem Dienstleister und mit allen Extras anschauen und vergleichen, bis er das richtige Angebot gefunden hat. Der Dienstleister hingegen hat nur einen monatlichen Festpreis zu zahlen und braucht somit keine Angst vor versteckten Mehrkosten haben und kann die Preise im Internet genau so anbieten wie vor Ort. Hinzu kommt, dass wir die wichtigsten drei Aspekte, welche sich die befragten gewünscht umgesetzt haben, diese sind: 1.  Die Kunden wünschen sich eine hohe Überschaubarkeit: ServiceAtHome bietet durch seinen Aufbau eine fast intuitive Nutzung sodass unser Marktplatz für Dienstleistungen einem Marktplatz für Produkte gleicht.2. An zweiter Stelle ist die durchgängige Erreichbarkeit des Marktplatzes und die 24/7-Möglichkeit der Terminbuchung gefordert. ServiceAtHome ist durch seine online Präsenz immer erreichbar und selbst bei Störungen oder anbahnenden Störungen sind bereits Alternativen vorbereitet und werden für eine gute Erreichbarkeit der Seite eingesetzt.3. Die drittstärkste Forderung von Kunden ist, dass eine Terminbuchung online Zeit spart im Vergleich zu den üblichen oft genutzten Telefonen. ServiceAtHome ermöglicht einen Termin zu buchen in nur wenigen Klicks. Die Terminbestätigung erhält sowohl der Kunde als auch der Dienstleister direkt nach der Bezahlung.Mit der neuen App können wir alle Aspekte und noch vieles mehr noch besser umsetzen. So wird auch eine Integrierung des Termins in einem digitalen Kalender eines Drittanbieters, von Kunden als Pluspunkt gesehen, was ebenfalls eingebaut werden soll.Der nächste positive Effekt, welcher entsteht, ist der, dass bei vielen kleineren Dienstleistern der Arbeitsprozess durch ein Telefonklingeln gestört wird. Mit unserer App kann man sich voll und ganz auf den Kunden konzentrieren und die höchste Qualität erbringen. Abschließend wollen wir auch die Werbung und das Marketing der Dienstleister übernehmen und das "zusammen" machen. So wollen wir verschiedene Dienstleister in Marketing-Kampagnen von ServiceAtHome integrieren und z.B. mit den Dienstleistern auf Social Media auftreten oder Plakatwerbung betreiben.

record.Creator: Elena Pozzi
record.Title: Where? CatchApp - Let's meet here!
record.Text: Where? CatchApp, is an APP designed to solve the problem of the "optimal point to meet".It is able to find the optimal point between an unlimited number of people, the ideal meeting point for companies of friends, associations, or colleagues (organize company meetings, bring together scout groups, biker groups, camper friends, etc.).It helps to decide the choice of activities closest to the meeting place (restaurants, pizzerias, bars, discos, museums, cinemas, but also soccer fields, camping areas or other) and, if you want, make a reservation.Made for the Android and iOs version.  Available in Italian and English and 8 different languages.

record.Creator: dwayne@2DKits.com
record.Title: LED Cube 4x4x4 and Tower 8x4x4 kit.
record.Text: We created the original cube kit back in 2012. We are taking what we learned in the original design and shifting to a 32 bit processor, adding WiFi and Internet of Things functions. Our goal is to achieve the volume needed to make the target pricing.The kits have all the parts except solder, power supply and tools.Both the cube and tower have:Tower kit hasCube kit hasDale and Dwayne started creating kits and running learn-to-solder workshops 16 years ago. We noticed it was getting harder and harder to do home projects. The kits and parts market we used in our youth was gone. At some point the general public’s view of soldering shifted to something too dangerous. Kids can bicycle, ski , or toboggan, but don’t use that soldering iron. It’s too dangerous. The era of build and repair it your self was dying and companies like Heathkit and Radio Shack have faded into the sunset. Even today with the new emphasis on STEM education, we still hit multiple obstacles. Many events have to clear our appearance with the fire marshals, lawyers, building inspectors, etc. We are working to prove soldering is easy, and not a deadly activity.

record.Creator: Marine Infinite Sailing Spirit
record.Title: AquaX10 - Water Filtration for Sailing Boats
record.Text: Imagine sailing without thinking about the management of your water supply. Imagine being totally independent because you have a system on your boat that up-cycles your used water and returns clean water.Imagine the freedom of sailing wherever you want with an AquaX10 on your boat.  Being free to sail wherever you want, whenever you want, while protecting the local resources is our definition of freedom. As we are sailors ourselves, we permanently think about improving the sailing experience and the ecological impact of our beloved passion.Making your sailing experience more exciting, smooth and sustainable is the goal that we're dedicated to. Using the shower on a boat can be a challenging experince. As water is scarce you have to shower as quick as possible.  And even by shortening the timespan of this beloved luxury, you will run out of water as your crew also has to wash the salt out of their hair and skin. It's always a limiting factor.For us and our sailor friends it always saddened us when, we had to leave a beautiful sunset in a bay to sail to a crammed, expensive Marina, just because we've run out of fresh water.  So, our idea was: Let's start to improve the largest water consumer unit on a boat. And this is your shower.What if we could multiply the amount of  water on our boat? Maybe by up to 10x ? We can reach this goal by adjusting the way your shower works!Our concept states:If we don't want to dumb precious water in the sea we need to close the water cycle in your boat. This will be done with our system.Finally, this concept will give us way more options in terms of flexibility and sailing destinations.So we developed the AquaX10 . Your solution to multiply the amount of clean and fresh water on your boat. With the AquaX10 you extend the freedom of your sailing trips.  No longer will you have to leave a bay or that magic spot where you want to stay. Multiply your fresh water and be free. This is our take on sustainable sailing. We offer an environmentally-friendly product which recycles sweet water that would otherwise be pumped into the sea and therefore be lost to the salt water.The AquaX10 is our contribution to saving precious sweet water whilst sailing. Giving you the freedom of having a big topic off your To-Do list. How to get fresh and clean water. The AquaX10 takes care of that for you. For a long time electricity and water have been the major resources that limited our sailing experience. In the last years, the electricity issue has been widely solved with solar panels and wind generators. Now we will solve the last limiting factor on your boat. Water!Backing this campaign and supporting the AquaX10 will give you the opportunity to contribute to a better personal sailing experience and a cleaner environment. Using our advanced filtration techniques will give you fresh and pure water on your boat for an entire trip. And the best is yet to come. Prototypes of the AquaX10 are already installed on sailing boats.Now we're in the process of testing, improving and adjusting them on our sailing boat and the boats of our families and friends. This means, we're going through the final R&D process.  Our system produces fresh water and the Prototype is working as planned. If we achieve our funding goal on Kickstarter, we can start to develop this system into a  smarter and automatized version for you. We will develop a system that is more comfortable and includes an easy to use Touch-Display System.We'll finish the process of testing and adjusting the Prototypes, finetuning  of the filters and development of our controller in the end of winter 2021.Our confidence in the projected timeline is strong, With your backing, we'll be on track to start shipping products to backers during Q2/2022. We are excited to see Kickstarter backers with our AquaX10 in harbours around the world soon!With the AquaX10 we focus on the water cycle e.g. in the shower of your boat. We make sure that every drop of water is used.  The setup provides you with a specialized system which includes active coal filtration techniques to clean your water to the size of 0,01 µm. This is even smaller than the size of bacteria or, in times of COVID, the size of a virus spore.  Our system and its single components are designed and optimized for boats.We tested many setups considering major factors of the marine environment like energy, water flow, internal pressure, outside temperature, humidity and many more.This iteration process brought us to the setup we're now using in the AquaX10.All the substances in your waste water have to go through multiple filtration and cleaning sequences in the AquaX10. The waste water will be filtered and the clean result goes back to your fresh water tank. Through this internal cycle, we make sure that the system will be clean and you get up to 10 x the amount of water from your tank.With the integration of the AquaX10 you create a water circuit within your boat which will provide fresh water for you and your Crew. Wherever you are. Whenever you want. The filters can clean up to 10.000 litres of sweet water before they have to be changed. You can be sure to have clean water on your boat that can be used to shower, etc.First things first: Our shipping guarantee to youWe've already negotiated resources for production facilities and we work with an experienced partner from the industry. As we've mentioned above: We'll finish the process of testing and adjusting the Prototypes, fine tuning of the filters and development of our controller in the end of winter 2021. With your support we'll be able start the production of the AquaX10 systems.The revolutionary size and positioning of the AquaX10 systemWe all know one thing for sure.Size matters.Especially on a boat. Ca. zum Gewicht und den Abmessungen schreibenThe AquaX10 system is designed in accordance with the space limitations on sailing yachts. We took great care in making sure that we develop a system that is as small and flexible as possible. Using the limited space you have on your boat to its best possible use.But we didn't stop there. We constructed the inner life of the AquaX10 as solid as possible. The AquaX10 is as flexible as you need it to be.To make life easy for you, the AquaX10 is a fully deployable solution.  With our package you will be able to set up a functioning system on your boat.  If you want to, you can do this by yourself. We provide the following components in the Starter Packs offered here.The complete projected package in one picture Our goal with this Kickstrater Campaign is to get enough funding for the next step in the development of the AquaX10.  Through your support we will go further to make the system smarter and easier to use. As a part of the kIckstarter campaign your package will include the next evolutionary step of the AquaX10. The components listed below will be additionally realized through the funding of this campaign.All the components you need to set up the whole system, like tubes, fittings, connectors, technical equipment etc. will be in the package that we deliver to you.All parts have generously been calculated to make sure that you don't run out of tubes, connectors, etc. Backups are included.All our backers will receive a packing list, installation guide and installation assistance and services. If you face an obstacle we'll be there for you. In the unlikely case that something is missing or too short, send us an E-Mail and we will send whatever is missing.Water Analysis Certificates (Prototype)Waste, pollution and microsplastics have become a massively increasing problem in the ocean.   Making sure that sailing will be as sustainable as possible, it is our mission to create solutions that protect the environment and benefit you - our sailor friends.The AquaX10 is one big piece of the puzzle to make your sailing experience sustainable and comfortable. But we don't stop there.Our company supports water protection NGOs like Viva con Agua on a monthly basis.We see it as our obligation to contribute to the change that is necessary to protect the environment.The AquaX10 is only the start of our journey. We believe that sailing and everything that accompanies this experience should be as smooth and easy as possible.  Therefore, we launch the AquaX10 as the building brick of the Marine Infinite Platform. On our Website you will find selected products that have been chosen and tested by us and our sailor friends.We believe in the beauty of simplicity and clarity. So we will only offer what we believe will make your life happier and your sailing experience more beautiful.Giving you the security to know that you've chosen a great product instead of wasting precious hours of your life researching endless Websites.Watch out for more products in the next months on our Website. If you want to stay in contact with us, just subscribe to our Newsletter. As we hate Spam ourselves, you can be sure we will get in contact with you on a monthly basis. Addendum: Taxes & Custom TariffsPlease note:The European VAT is included in the Kickstarter price. If you order outside of the EU, it is likely possible that there are higher VATs &  custom tariffs in  your country. These higher VATs and tariffs are not part of the Kickstarter price that we offer. They have to be paid separately by the customer.Do you have questions?If yes, drop us a line to info@marine-infinite.com

record.Creator: Alex Eastick
record.Title: Test In Your City: Find and book a COVID-19 test
record.Text:
We're are doing great in the fight against COVID-19 so far, but the battle may have just begun. In order to stop further outbreaks and save lives, testing must continue for the foreseeable future. And experts recommend COVID-19 testing becomes routine. “As more contagious coronavirus variants emerge and lockdown measures are relaxed, the nation needs to intensify, not scale back, nationwide testing efforts.” - Dr Jennifer B. Nuzzo, Emily N. Pond, epidemiologists, Johns Hopkins Coronavirus Resource Center (https://www.nytimes.com/2021/03/12/opinion/need-covid-tests.html)“If someone’s at an increased risk for severe illness or has close contact with someone who’s at an increased risk for severe illness, I think getting tested regularly is smart,” - Suzanne Pham, MD, medical director of the COVID-19 response team at Weiss Memorial Hospital, Chicago  (https://www.health.com/condition/infectious-diseases/coronavirus/covid-testing)
 "Eventually, testing will be normalized" (https://www.health.com/condition/infectious-diseases/coronavirus/covid-testing)
 It is still possible to contract and spread COVID-19 when you are double vaccinated, and the Delta variant of the infection is more likely than other variants to spread through unvaccinated people (https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-021-02187-1)*If you are uninsured, it is also significantly more complicated to locate and book a COVID-19 test, because some healthcare providers will not allow patients to book without insurance*(App prototype. The team of expert developers we'll be working with will finalize designs)Your backing will go towards having Test In Your City developed, marketing, and HIPAA approval. The majority of the $80,000 will be spent on HIPAA compliance. HIPPA compliance is important to keep your details safe and secure -- this is a priority.I understand that you're not always near a computer, or own a computer. I understand that you may not have insurance or may prefer to attend a drive-thru testing site. And I definitely understand it's important to be tested regularly for COVID-19. Most importantly, I understand that time is important, and you don't want to waste it searching for an available COVID-19 test, filling in forms to book the test, and traveling out of your way to the test location.

 Test In Your City will be completely free and will not contain ads.Let's make the future of COVID-19 testing as easy as possible, for everyone.Your backing will go towards having Test In Your City developed and available to everyone, ready to make going forward with the 'new normal' a little simpler. 
I'd love to show you the timeline for having the app built and its projected costs, so please contact me directly on Kickstarter or at alex@testinyourcity.com if you would like to see these.If funding is successful, I'll keep you up to date on the development of Test In Your City in the 'Updates' section here.And even if you can't back the project here on Kickstarter, you can still help by sharing with your friends, family, and colleagues!Please feel free to reach out with any questions or comments using the 'contact me' link at the top of this page -- this is our project. 
 Stay safe,Alex

record.Creator: Quantum Robotic Systems
record.Title: QBii: The Multi-Function Service Robot
record.Text: What if everyone could have a robot that was actually many robots in one?This exciting idea led us to create QBii, an affordable, multi-functional and expandable service robot. While most other robots are limited to only one function, QBii performs a host of useful tasks to make your life easier.Carry: For such a small robot, QBii can carry surprisingly heavy items (up to 50lb). This allows QBii to help you move things like groceries, boxes, laundry, bins and furniture.Clean: Like many service robots, QBii can clean your floors. The difference is, QBii will let you use the brooms, mops and dusters you already own. QBii is able to clean floors in workplaces as well. You will need the Broom Adapter Kit add-on to attach cleaning tools to QBii. QBii has been tested with vacuum cleaners as well. A separate adapter for wand-style vacuum cleaners is planned (not part of this campaign) and will become available in the near future.Cart: Amazingly, this 9-pound robot can tow up to 200 lb. This lets you convert almost any utility cart (like this one) into a robotic cart.You will need the Cart Hitch Kit add-on to attach utility carts to QBii. Climb: QBii is expandable, allowing you to use it as a platform to develop your own projects. In fact, this expansion capability has allowed us to develop ROSA, the Robotic Stairclimbing Assistant.ROSA is under development and is expected to be available by mid-2022. ROSA is not part of this campaign.QBii's optional Expansion Port allows you to connect external electronic devices (e.g., sensors), an auxiliary third motor, and an external power port. Mounting holes (1/4-20) let you mount auxiliary hardware, such as an action camera (not included) for teleoperation or inspections tasks.A Lidar Sensor Array allows QBii to locate itself in its environment in order to improve path following performance. These sensors also enable advanced capabilities like Simultaneous Location and Mapping (SLAM).The Expansion Port (including third motor controller) and Lidar Sensor Array are part of the Expansion Kit add-on.OverviewTo operate QBii, you will use the QRS Control App, which runs on smartphones and tablets (not included). The Control App allows you to run QBii in teleoperation mode ('joystick' mode) or in autonomous mode ('path following'). You can use the built-in Path Editor to create and run customized paths.No lines on the floor! No embedded cables! QBii can operate autonomously without any infrastructure changes to your home or workplace.Current FunctionalityThe current functionality of the Control App and how it relates to QBii's various capabilities is illustrated in the series of videos below:Accessing the App: The App can be installed on a smartphone or tablet. Connecting to the Robot: The App and robot interact using a Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) client/server protocol. You will need to connect the App to your robot in order to operate it.Joystick Mode: In teleoperation (or 'joystick') mode, you can use the App to drive the robot directly.Joystick Mode in Cart (or Any) Configuration: Joystick Mode works regardless of how the robot is configured, i.e., by itself, carrying a load, cleaning the floor, or towing a cart. Joystick Mode lets you operate the robot directly in any of these configurations. To illustrate this point, this video shows Joystick while in 'cart' configuration.Creating a Path: The most powerful feature of the Control App is that it lets you create, save, and run robot paths. Using the Path Editor, these paths are built up as a series of from simple segments (e.g., "Drive", "Turn"). You can name and save your paths to be reused later. In this video we create a simple path called "Zig" to illustrate the process.Running a Path: Using its Path Running ('Map') screen, the Control App provides a graphical representation of a saved path. You can then "press play" and have the robot run this path. The App shows you a real-time update of the robot's actual position as it executes the path.  This video shows the robot running the simple 'Zig' path.Using a Path to Carry a Bin: As with Joystick Mode, Path Following Mode is independent of how the robot is configured. To illustrate this point, this video shows how the simple 'Zig' path we created in an earlier video can be used to direct QBii to deliver a bin to a specific location.  Using a Path to Clean the Floor: In this example we've equipped QBii with a floor sweeper. We then ran the 'Zig' test path to show how reusable paths can be used for any purpose, including cleaning the floor. In an actual application, more complex floor sweeping patterns can be constructed. Different patterns can be used for different parts of your house or building.   Using a Path to Tow A Cart: In this final example we've attached QBii to a cart. Again, the 'Zig' test path is used to show how a robotic cart can be sent on a specific route from A to B.    Planned Improvements to the Control AppThe functionality of the Control App (Rev 2), as shown in our project videos above, exists and has been tested. However, we are in the process of making improvements. Plans for Rev 3 include the following:Our goal is to have Rev 3 of the Control App coincide with delivery of Rev 3 QBii units as part of this campaign.Since QBii is uniquely multi-functional, it is ideal for both home or work, and is a versatile tool for educators and hobbyists alike.To offer you the best possible value, we are providing the option of selecting the QBii Robot Kit as your pledge reward.  The Kit includes all the components needed for a complete, fully functional QBii robot, which you can assemble yourself. The Kit comes together using simple hand tools and no soldering is required. This option is ideal for hobbyists, DIYers, STEM educators/students, or anyone who enjoys hands-on projects.But don't worry. If assembly isn't your thing, we'll do it for you (see Assembly Add-on). *Important note* Battery charger AC plug is compatible with North American electrical outlets. Adapters for non-North American outlets are not included.Most of our junior engineers and developers have participated on high school robotics teams. Our founder, Dr. Frank Naccarato, was also a robotics mentor for many years. We have benefitted from STEM-based curriculum. This campaign is an opportunity to give back. That's why we've added a reward tier that allows backers to contribute towards our donation of QBii Robot Kits to schools. For every 10 backers at this level, we will build a Kit for the express purpose of donating it to an academic institution.For the past year and a half, we have designed, fabricated and tested two prior generations of prototypes: Rev 1 (proof-of-concept) and Rev 2 (fully functional). In fact, all the photos and videos you see here are of Rev 2 prototypes.A successful campaign will allow us to reach the following development milestones:Tasks involving lifting, pushing and carrying (e.g., lifting laundry, carrying groceries, cleaning the floor) are often challenging, especially for seniors and people with limited mobility. On stairs, performing these tasks becomes laborious at best and dangerous at worst, potentially leading to serious injury (falls, back strain, etc.).Quantum Robotic Systems Inc. (QRS) is a Toronto-based company that addresses this problem by making unique mobile autonomous robots. QRS has developed and patented a novel stair-climbing technology that allows users to carry heavy, bulky loads up and down stairs in an easier, faster and safer way. The company has incorporated this technology into its Robotic Stairclimbing Assistant (ROSA), a service robot that can carry things while climbing up and down stairs. QRS was founded by Dr. Frank Naccarato. Frank is an inventor, entrepreneur, consultant and professor with over 30 years’ experience in R&D and product development. After completing his doctorate in robotics at the University of Toronto’s Institute for Aerospace Studies, Dr. Naccarato worked as a research engineer, designer, project manager and director of R&D. His past projects include a control algorithm developed for the International Space Station and a robotic testing machine for medical laboratories. One of the toughest challenges for a small technology start-up is finding a way to get early products out there, into the hands of real users, in a cost-feasible way. A successful campaign for QBii will give QRS just that opportunity. Kickstarter will allow us to realize our production ready design (Rev 3) and introduce it to the world on a large scale.We will also be able to demonstrate early market traction, which will allow us to leverage the sales realized through Kickstarter into further outside investment and additional government support for R&D.We will also be able to start negotiating volume rates for parts and materials, which will bring our manufacturing costs down.So, your support will have a major impact on our future success. It's a big deal! Thank you!

record.Creator: Airshield solar power car fresher
record.Title: A solar-powered aroma diffuser for your car!
record.Text:
No Batteries! A solar-powered aroma diffuser for your car!Are you looking for car aromatherapy so that you can enjoy a pleasant smell while driving? Our Solar power car Aromatherapy Air Freshener quickly and effectively replaces aromas such as cigarettes, food, and other odors with a fresh, long-lasting smellA fully solar-powered aroma diffuser that uses a Galaxy planet ball top to help spread aroma quickly and widely!Only need 30 pcs can make your own logo on the aroma diffuser

 3. Innovative products that guarantee the uniqueness of the gift

 Welcome to visit our website airshield.life for further informationAn Eco-friendly aroma diffuser that runs solely on solar power no batteries required!!A large part behind the design of the  Airshiled X3 Galaxy solar power car Aroma, and the use of no batteries was in order to fit with the UN Sustainable Development Goals. By using solar power, we can help to reduce the waste that occurs from usingmultiple batteries with devices and allows us to harness the natural resource of the Sun. We want to go forward with all our projects with these SDGs in mind, trying to help change the world one product at a time.Product Parameter· 【Compact Size】：Airshield Car Diffuser: 5.5x Ø 6 cm, 0.125kg【Solar      Powered】：This air freshener auto rotates anywhere with the      sun, no batteries needed, so you can make it a great decoration of home or      your car· 【High quality & Environmentally Friendly】：The aromatherapy tablets directly extracted from plants, not harmless to children and pregnant women;·  All parts are made of high-quality material Aviation AL alloy【Illusory galaxy】 Blue-green auroral planet put the universe in your car easily【Anti-focusing design】Sphere anti-focusing design, You don’t have to worry about the fire caused by the focus of the sphere. You can rest assured【Whole connection】The anti-falling structure make sure the product is stable on rough roads【Variable posture】The halo can swing up and down and the angel can be changed at will【High conversion and long shelf life】As long as there is enough light and heat,it can rotate automatically, Aeronautical light-sensitive energy concentrating board, No need to recharge【Pure copper-bearing motor】Bulit-in low-voltage brushless motor, Strong power, Durable【washing runs as usual】It is made of aerospace-grade aluminum alloy and is not afraid of high-temperature exposure. Aerospace aluminum alloy, cold and warm, Water resistance【Zero friction】 avoid rattling noise when goes on bumpy roads and also shaking on off-road【Environmental protection incense ring】French original incense is available for pregnant babiesThe car aroma is made from plant-derived essential oils with an elegant and long-lasting fragrance【Easy to Operate】： unscrew the cover, put the perfume pad in, and screw the cover, tear the tape to fix the air freshenerMy name is Wu QunThe horror that gripped the entire society during the SARS period is still vivid in our minds. There were 8,422 cases of SARS worldwide, and the disease death rate was nearly 11%.
