It took the lives of 919 people and caused irreparable pain to the families concerned for the rest of their lives.After marriage, I welcomed the birth of my children, and whenever there was an infectious epidemic, a sneeze, a cough, I was touched by how many times I went in and out of the hospital, queues of people...Bird flu; influenza; Ebola, each time more motivated to research and development to achieve...One of the things that we wanted to make sure of was that we could use solar energy to make it work. One of the big reasons is that by doing so we can make a portable compact base that doesn’t rely on batteries. Not relying on batteries means that wherever you are you can use them, as well as being kind to the environment.【Illusory galaxy】 Blue-green auroral planet, but the universe in your car easily, As well as this, we wanted to Stimulate children's interest in exploring the universe so we use a Galaxy crystal ball, As some car fresher, the ball is separate, so it is very easy to fall at the rough roads, And We use the whole connection anti-falling structure make sure Product is stable in rough roads

record.Creator: Tim
record.Title: Magic Message Box
record.Text: Due to the pandemic, many couples, friends and relatives have had to separate from each other. So I came up with an idea to build something to alleviate this situation. And I call this the "Magic Message Box", which should simply receive a text message and present it on an OLED display after you open its lid. Yeah, it practically does a simple function that even the oldest cellphone could do. But it is a small box with an attractive appearance and because it's a box, you may keep some tiny meaningful things in it. You may stick an old photo to the inner side of the lid to remind you of who sends you this box or the precious moments of your life.The message sender could be anyone who knows the serial no. of the box and is able to use the internet. Actually the sender would usually be the one who gives the receiver this box as a gift. After all these thoughts floated in my head, I started to draft the sketch and all its relevant components. Then I started to buy things. I was thinking, there might be some existing attractive boxes being sold in the market and I didn't have to design a new one which would consume unnecessary resources and wouldn't be environmentally friendly. So I purchased the box, display, power module, Wi-Fi module...everything online.Upon receipt of those components, I started working on the programming of the website and the control module respectively.  Finally, I started to build the prototype.   Then, fortunately, it worked!I would like to share this prototype with everyone, so I decided to launch this project on Kickstarter, and hopefully, with the support from you guys, I would be able to commercialise this product. And I definitely know, from prototype to mass production, there is still a long way to go.And I also want to improve the design by adding other functions & modules.Lastly, it would be much appreciated that Magic Message Box could be on your list when you are considering sending a gift to someone you care about most.You may also scan the QR code or click on the link to take a glance at the website: https://qrgo.page.link/KMGsb  The videos below illustrate how to upload a message to Magic Message Box.

record.Creator: Kernom
record.Title: RIDGE: the first Augmented Analog overdrive pedal.
record.Text: WE INVENTED AUGMENTED ANALOGAnalog Morphing Core is the name of a new and unique patented approach to electronic clipping circuits developed by Kernom. An Analog Morphing Core equipped device, like the RIDGE, controls the nonlinear elements of the clipping stage (traditionally diodes) by changing in real time their threshold, making them behave like a new kind of diode.It allows musicians to have access to a virtually infinite number of clipping options: symmetric, asymmetric, high headroom, very compressed, etc. in a single analog circuit, controlled by the unique Mood knob. Completely different from approaches such as modeling and switches between different diodes.The result is an extremely versatile and unique analog circuit. Analog, Augmented.Use the mood knob to select from the ultimate clean boost to a fully compressed overdriven sound. Ever dreamed of a heavily distorted sound, that would still react to your playing?Symmetric, asymmetric, high headroom, compressed … you decide.A never-ending journey through overdrive sound flavors.Choose between ultimate transparency at any grit level with the three EQ knobs at noon, or colour your sound using the powerful EQ section.Change the way the pedal reacts to your guitar with the PRE knob, how it interacts with your amp with the POST knob, how you cut through or blend in the mix with the MID knob. Punish the front end of your amp like never before thanks to the 30V maximum output voltage of the RIDGE and experience extreme dynamics.Here are some samples of how the RIDGE sounds. Just to make you wait until you get yours.Connect the RIDGE to your expression pedal and explore new possibilities. Adjust drive level, boost your mids, or blend two completely different tones together. The possibilities are endless.The RIDGE features an internal preset that can be used without the need to use an external device, accessible via the Preset footswitch. Rhythm and lead tone, clean and dirty, or any other combination: you have access to two sounds at any time. Simply hold the Preset footswitch for 2 seconds and save the current position of the knobs for later use.The RIDGE is entirely MIDI compatible. You can plug an external MIDI switcher to the RIDGE via mini jack to save and recall up to 128 different presets and cover all your overdrive needs. You can also connect the RIDGE to a third party controller (like the incredible Erae Touch from our friends at EMBODME) and change in real time its internal parameters to explore new ways to interact with overdrive.You can use all your instruments with The RIDGE: guitar, but also bass, synths and vocals. This is made possible thanks to the pedal’s adaptive input gain. You can choose between instrument level or line level at any time to use the RIDGE on all your tracks.We showed the RIDGE to professional musicians. Here is what they had to say about it!"Want endless overdrive flavours from an analog circuit? This new pedal from the French startup aims to provide just that""…the Kernom products are being made in a state-of-the-art factory in France that works on medical projects, so I’m expecting great build quality." " ...this control could give you access to symmetric, asymmetric, high headroom, and compressed drive tones. That’s a lot of useful overdrive tones in one pedal.""Kernom nous propose avec la RIDGE une nouvelle approche grâce à sa technologie brevetée Analog Morphing Core. Il s'agit pour faire simple d'un circuit d'écrêtage du signal qui reste 100% analogique et sur lequel Kernom a ajouté un variateur d'intensité numérique sur les éléments non-linéaires.""RIDGE can provide unlimited clipping options and operate within 30V to obtain greater headroom." "The circuitry includes their new Analog Morphing Core that is a new approach to clipping circuits.""Le nom de cette très, très jeune entreprise innovante française pourrait vite entrer au panthéon d'une foule de musiciens à l’affût de solutions et matériels susceptibles de leur ouvrir de nouveaux champs de créativité.""La marque française Kernom fait une entrée en fanfare dans le monde des effets avec la Ridge, une pédale d'overdrive augmentée.""Unlimited clipping options in one analogue circuit"The RIDGE comes in a vibrant and iconic color called Summit White. White is the sum of all colors, just like the RIDGE can deliver all the flavors of overdrive we all know and love.To celebrate the launch of the RIDGE on Kickstarter we also created an exclusive dark red finish that reacts beautifully to different lighting setups, going from a beautiful brown to a deep blood red. We called it Blood Rust. The Blood Rust RIDGE will only be available to Kickstarter backers. Grab one while you can!The casing was inspired by the architectural design language of modernism. It has a strong personality, but remains easy to operate. Every detail on the Ridge was a conscious decision. We started from a blank page to design an iconic product that would withstand the hardships of the road and decades of abuse.Kernom aims at providing musicians with the most reliable and performant products possible. Kernom products are manufactured in a state of the art factory in France that works on medical projects, a field where precision and reliability are of paramount importance.

record.Creator: Kehinde Fasehun
record.Title: PLATFORM
record.Text:
Hi, my name is Kehinde Fasehun and I am a junior and Entrepreneurship and Innovation major at Clarkson University where I am working on a project called Platform. Platform is a freemium service aimed at being a creative and collaborative social networking application aimed at connecting individuals with projects and ideas to individuals that have the skill/monetary-based resources needed to make those projects and ideas a reality. It's a centralized virtual space for project collaborators (ex.  Artists, Designers, creators, and Visionaries). It's almost like Kickstarter as well, except people cannot only support projects financially, but they can also contribute to them with their skills.In a sense, Platform is a mix of Reddit's communal section, Instagram's interesting content, Tinder's matchmaking algorithm, and LinkedIn's job recruitment section; combined in hopes of creating a relaxed or perhaps creative community for people to diffuse and collaborate on projects big and small.Our team is comprised of 4 co-founders, 3 of which are recent Clarkson University graduates and one undergraduate. We started Platform because of a common issue all 4 of us faced from prior projects. The issue of finding project collaborators. Because of that shared issue we faced, we quickly realized that in a broader sense, other people also shared similar pains in finding people with shared interests who are passionate enough to join them on the adventure of creative collaboration.Upon the completion of the first iteration of our mobile app, we intend on generating revenues through access fees. access fees will be charged to Patent Attorneys, Studios,  Engineers and etc. These firms and occupations will be charged an access fee to provide their services to collaborators on Platform.Why service fees? So let's say a user has an idea for a book then connects with another user to write the book. What will they need? A publisher. So publishers could pay to have access to Platform collaborators who may need their services.  Patent attorneys and a variety of other people who will need access to Platform users. 

 My team and I have been working on Platform for the past 2 years, but due to a variety of factors such as being underskilled and lacking access to financial resources we simply have no option other than to turn to the Kickstarter community for financial aid. We are currently looking to raise $262,780 in funding to kickstart our development and deployment of Platform for the duration of a year. Below is a list of our projected expenses:Upon reaching our funding goal, we will be hiring two full-stack developers within two weeks of reaching our goal.  Upon the success of our beta test, depending on how many users and connections are made on Platform, we'll start reaching out to Venture Capital firms for more funding to scale up development, marketing, and formally become a legal entity.We intend on giving out T-shirts with the Platform logo on them as a reward for your donations.

record.Creator: SIKAKEYB
record.Title: SIKAKEYB SK3-Ultra-Compact Customizable Mechanical Keyboard
record.Text: If your mechanical keyboard doesn’t create an addictive typing experience, you haven’t been using the right one. Built for quality, comfort, and satisfying key presses, the SK3 is the world’s most compact wireless mechanical keyboard and laptop companion. It can be placed directly onto the keyboard of any laptop under 14.9 inches without interacting with the original keyboard, increasing speed and accuracy, saving desk space, and keeping your screen closer to you.Its 65% layout makes allows you to position your hands more naturally with less movement, and with bluetooth, 2.4G, and wired connectivity, it can be connected to a maximum of 5 different devices at the same time. Switch between devices with a single key press for a more efficient multi-device workflow.  SK3s also include high-quality Gateron hot-swappable switches, so you can customize whether you hear a click, how smooth your key presses are, and how much force needs to be applied to activate a key.At 65% the size of a typical keyboard with 68 of the most common keys, the SK3 has minimized size while maximizing functionality. Where other laptop-compatible mechanical keyboards require desk placement, remove touch pad functionality, or insert the wrong characters at the slightest shift, SIKAKEYB SK3 fully enhances your current typing experience, so there’s no need to compromise.In addition to maintaining touch pad functionality, the SK3 allows the area beside the touch pad to be used as a wrist rest.The SIKAKEYB SK3’s main body is made from durable yet lightweight aluminum that has gone through CNC machining and a careful anode oxidation process. With its translucent black ABS bottom, out of the box, the SK3 is an instant classic, merging that fun, retro feel with elegant, clear-cut design choices.SK3 has wired and wireless modes that allow you to connect with up to five devices at the same time and switch between them with the press of a key. At full capacity, it can interface with  (1) Type-C device,  (3) Bluetooth devices, and  (1) 2.4G device.Wireless connectivity. Connect to one 2.4G and three bluetooth 5.0 devices. Use FN+Q/W /E to bluetooth 5.0 devices，FN+R to 2.4G devices.SK3 is compatible with Mac, Windows, iOS, and Android system, so you can switch between your phones, laptops, and tablets. When using a Mac and Windows device, press FN+A/S to switch between modes.SK3’s compact design takes up 65% of the space of a traditional keyboard and includes the 68 most common keys.SK3 uses Gateron hot-swappable switches and plate-mounted stabilizers so you can DIY a typing experience you’ll love.The SK3 is compatible with most switches on the market, including plate-mounted and PCB. Mix and match. The possibilities are endless. The default plate-mounted style costar stabilizer offers a great touch experience right out of the box, and creates minimal noise so your typing won’t be intrusive. Replacement with a screw-in stabilizer is simple and straightforward.SK3’s double-color keycap design is both sleek and functional. Your fingers will sit comfortably on each keycap as you type, and the cherry height sitting will allow you to transition smoothly from key to key without accidental touches. This was achieved via a special over-molding technique using PBT material.The 5 Gateron switches available with your SK3 include the Blue PRO,Brown PRO, Silver PRO, Yellow PRO and White PRO. The SK3 comes with 3 default configuration settings, but allows you to customize your keys any way you like using your computer. You can also use the quick-switch function (FN+Z/FN+X/FN+C) to switch between the different configurations and maintain your optimal workflow at all times.One of the best features of mechanical keyboards is their customization, and each SK3 offers full-color RGB background lighting to fit your aesthetic. Choose from 18 different preset light effects, or take things a step further and customize your light effects using the software and driver. Sound-activated light effects are available as well.SIKAKEYB is an innovative application team composed of senior engineers in the keyboard and mouse industry. The team engineers have more than 10 years of experience in keyboard, mouse and computer peripheral products. They are a peripheral brand that integrates product development and design, program and software development, and brand operation. , The operating headquarters is located in Dongguan, Guangdong.The founder of SIKAKEYB has extensive experience in industrial design, product development and manufacturing, and has more than 16 years of field experience in keyboard, mouse and computer peripheral products.SIKAKEYB adheres to the concept of combining software and hardware products and complementing each other, combining with high-quality manufacturing supply chain resources to provide end consumers with high-quality products, while striving to provide players with better hardware, software and service experience in the future. The direction of the integrated ecosystem continues to work hard.Share this link to social platforms and get 5% cash back.

record.Creator: CYFantasy3dp
record.Title: CyFantasy Light-Curing LCD 3D Printer
record.Text: If you have ever thought that LCD 3D printers should support large-scale industrial precision printing, with extraordinary user-centric smart functions, then we built a CyFantasy LCD 3D printer especially for you!We call it Cyfantasy LCD 3D Printer for good reasons. So far, the general LCD 3D printers on the market do not support large format requirements and usually sacrifice quality and precision to save costs. This is why we spent years developing prototypes and testing them until we came up with a tested and perfect final success formula: CyFantasy3D CY-OS01 is a light-curing LCD 3D printer for large format projects. Provides industrial precision and high-end smart functions at unprecedented speeds.Printing Videos(Keep Updated)#1#2It’s not just the speed, large format printing or the industrial precision performance. Those are definitely features that make the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer unique. However, we’ve gone beyond that, adding five intelligent functions to a 3D Printer like no other.When the box of materials of the CyFantasy LCD 3D printer is running short of whichever material you’re using (it supports common resin, strong toughness resin and elastic resin, among other possible materials), the printer will automatically detect this shortage and it will also automatically refill it. What does this mean to you? You’ll save time and, more importantly, the consistency of the printing process and the integrity of the printing results are not affected by a sudden interruption and a disruptive refilling process.Removing the box of materials from a 3D printer to replace them is so old school. With the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer’s world's first flash material replacement program, you can literally replace the material you’re using with a single click on the operation panel. Yes, really!3D printing should be a clean and precise process, leading to a pristine result. However, most 3D printers are not stable enough to do that—but the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer is! The connecting rod of the printer's forming platform adopts an exclusive ball screw design that provides a steady printing experience, dramatically reducing vibration while printing, and extraordinarily improving the quality and detail of printed objects.  It looks like a scene from a futuristic science fiction movie, but it is actually another user-centric feature of this excellent printer. The cover of the CyFantasy LCD 3D printer is flipped in a smart way, with no need to manually open and close, so you can enjoy it more easily, and at the same time feel that you are using cutting-edge technology from the future to help your creative projects come to life!Technical features and functions make CyFantasy LCD 3D printers very smart and efficient. However, we also believe that the printer you use should be outstanding and amazing in every respect, which is very important. Therefore, unlike the typical and rigid rectangular box structure of ordinary 3D printers, we designed the printer as a high-end cyberpunk helmet. The point is: no matter how you look at it, there is no 3D printer like CyFantasy LCD 3D printer!You shouldn’t have to run a large manufacturing operation to enjoy industrial-grade precision. In our view, that’s not a luxury—it’s a requirement that any 3D printer should have. That’s why we tested the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer for three months in dental clinics. We had to create a superb printer that could deliver superb results. We can now proudly say that the surface smoothness of what you create with our printer comfortably meets industrial-grade standards that can cater to different business needs.On the other hand, the LCD light-curing printer platform is also extremely sturdy and compact, offering industrial-grade durability and reliability, strengthening the printer’s capacity to meet the requirements you have for your creative project of business.CyFantasy LCD 3D printer allows you to monitor and modify the printing process during the printing process: from the printing time to the remaining time, you can view the data displayed on the screen at any time, and you can change to adjust the items. Real-time display through the operation panel.We’ve spent a few years looking into the challenges of 3D printing until we came to our presently successful formula. We no longer see extremely high prices for printers and consumables, and we’ve been seeing FDM technology and SLA machines and consumables becoming increasingly accessible and affordable. Still, we knew that low-cost technologies such as the new LCD sacrificed accuracy and size to generate savings for the buyer. That was not satisfactory, so we decided to develop a large-size, high-precision, low-price LCD 3D printer.It sounded great, but we hit a technical wall when we realized that 3D printing LCD moulding technology is extremely layered, namely when the moulding area becomes larger. The bond with the bottom layer is so strong that, when we separate layer by layer, model separation is problematic and may even lead to model deformation. This explains why there are so many LCD machines on the market—but none in the large-size field. We decided to solve this problem by running a lot of tests until we finally got our CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer. It now includes intelligent functions such as one-key automatic flip, one-key refuelling, and automatic feeding, and it’s tried and tested to deliver spectacular large-format results, even being in the LCD camp. In other words, problem solved! Now we need your support to manufacture this large-size industrial-grade precision 3D printer!This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Maria from TrooIDs.
record.Title: The Sovernty - Cookies solution
record.Text: We are TrooIDs, and our mission is to make the internet safer and more accessible to everyone.That is why we are happy to announce our latest innovation - the SOVERNTY software, which are we currently working on - to help you protect your privacy.The Sovernty is a cookies manager software, which could be used as a plug-in for the internet browserThe application will allow the internet user to customize his web experience by reading the cookies notifications for the user and making them not appear on the websites anymore.While you are experiencing faster and less irritating internet browsing, the software works in the background. You will not see any cookies notifications.But does it mean that the cookies are ‘gone’ or that your privacy is in danger?No, it does not.The software will do all the most annoying job for you!The application will accept or deny the processing of the cookies, depending on the chosen settings/preferences.The application does this by giving users the possibility to independently choose cookie settings, to compile them and then to make them known to websites, applications, and other digital services in a fully automated way.Tired of reading cookie - policies?Currently, the Internet users must indicate their will separately for each website or application, usually in the form of reading and accepting (or not) abysmal cookie-policies.This makes web browsing less convenient, as those policies vary, and are written in a complex language. The lack of time or desire to read the cookie settings makes them often being unseen.The current situation limits the freedom of movement, freedom of choice, affects exercising the active right to the protection of personal data and puts people in a dependent position.With the Sovernty - cookies manager there will be:✓  Lack of the long cookie policies✓  Leaving the software to read them✓  Lack of complicated, hard to understand terms✓ No more fear of being a product without a permissionIt can be so much easierInterested HOW? See the video below.No more being a product ?The titans like Google, Amazon, Apple, Facebook, or Microsoft are unstoppable.Their profits are surging.Thanks to the processing of more and more data, the Internet user has become not only a consumer, but also a product.By employing more and more new technologies, but also clever tricks, users are sacrificing their privacy without getting much in return.The legal regulations introduced by the European Union, such as ePrivacy, or the GDPR, are intended to limit this practice, giving users more rights.These regulations, however, do not contain simple, ready-to-use tools.Without appropriate applications, despite extensive protection enshrined in legislation, we are not able to enforce our rights. This is putting us on an equal footing with companies that are making profits by using our data.To balance this position, it is necessary to introduce solutions that will easily help the Internet user gain control over what data he is going to transfer and to whom.5,000 - Basic version of cookies manager scheduled on time within 6 months after the successful campaign 10,000 – Improving and caring for the product with ongoing marketingGratis download to all Kickstarter Backers. HELP US – We need your help! So we can help internet users regain control over their cookies and data.- Please, donate.- Don’t want to donate? It would be great if you could share this page!We are a start-up, located in Amsterdam, that develops activities in the field of flexibilization, facilitation, and optimization of transparency, partly for more efficient market forces, as well as the development, stimulation, and provision of online tools and services.The team consist of members with different experience and has an international character, connecting people from different backgrounds.A part of the tasks is done by students from a variety of disciplines (such as legal, marketing, or science) which makes it possible to collaborate and exchange ideas between people with different interests and expertise.Our mission is to make the internet safer, and more accessible to everyone.Our main goal is to give the internet user more control.

record.Creator: Uniarch
record.Title: Uniarch Unear A30: AI meeting camera with 360° speaker
record.Text:
How will you prepare for an online meeting? Turn on the camera, test microphone, volume up the speaker and blah blah blah…That’s too much work. We want to make virtual meetings as easy as ABC. So, we have Unear A30 here. It is an all-in-one device that covers all functions of the camera, mic and speakers.With the most advanced AI technology in the capture and analysis of sound, Unear A30 aims to make its professional debut by providing the best acoustic experience. That notwithstanding, it enhances image performance and clarity through specialized features. Unear A30 is easy-to-use and compatible with online meeting platforms.In addition to meetings, Unear A30 can greatly improve video conferencing quality under different scenarios.Unear A30 is safe and user-friendly. With Unear A30 you can say goodbye to freezing or choppy video calls. A direct USB connection focuses on mitigating unstable signals.Privacy is our top priority with Unear A30. A simple and secure Plug-and-Play connection via USB with no third-party data processor removes a point of weakness for potential security threats.Forget about constantly shifting the camera to keep everyone in the room in frame. With an ultra-wide angle camera, Unear A30 makes it easy to host a meeting with multiple people in the same room. Each of the two Unear models feature ultra-wide viewing angles. Unear A30T, which is in pearl white, is equipped with a 100º ultra-wide-angle camera, while the more advanced Unear A30 is equipped with a 115º. Each ensures that everyone is captured by the Unear A30 / A30T panoramic view during the meeting.With a 4-element omnidirectional microphone array, no details are missed.Scanning for all voices in a 5-meter range, Unear A30 is able to detect and pick up the details that matter most in a meeting.360° wideband speaker ensures clear and precise human voice output. This full-range speaker will ensure that the speaker is heard well, and the meeting can move along smoothly.Embedded in Unear A30 is an enhanced AI, making it possible to intelligently process sound by suppressing common environmental noises in a meeting such as air conditioning and typing clatter.Expert echo cancellation can be necessary in large meeting spaces. With higher echo return loss enhancement (ERLE), Unear A30 minimizes these common meeting interruptions that can waste time and participant’s mental energy.Providing a headache-free experience, Unear A30 is compatible with most mainstream online meeting platforms such as Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Skype and others. Unear A30 supports mainstream operating systems like Windows, Mac OS and Linux without the need for an adaptor.Unear A30 utilizes a 4MP high-definition camera. Equipped with a suite of image corrective functions, Unear A30 ensure users have a great online meeting experience.Instant mute, camera on/off toggle, and volume adjustment can all be achieved by Unear A30’s sophisticatedly designed touch panel, saving you time to effectively manage online conversations and video calls.Easy to understand colored lights on the circular status indicator on the top of the Unear A30 provide clear indications of device status.Unear A30 supports full-duplex communication mode, which allows for more natural simultaneous communication with others. The comfort afforded by this allows for more communication efficiency that boost productivity in bidirectional communication. Unear A30 is narrow at the top and wide at the bottom. It is tip over resistant by design with its rubber base. The elegant black and pearl white bodies of Unear A30 and A30T are coated to make them fingerprint and stain resistant as well.About UniarchUniarch is a sub-brand of Uniview, the company that commits itself to video monitoring research and development, bearing the mission of making smart life easier through reliable video technology, one-stop smart products and friendly services for the customers. The core values of Uniarch are beliefs in openness and integrity, which are incentives for them to refine their product design and manufacture. Uniarch builds business with the support and trust of others and accumulates reputation step by step. The brand has a strong awareness of protecting the environment. It is certified by ISO14000 and RoHS. The team insists on being eco-friendly during production and manufacturing. About Uniview
         Uniview is a leading global manufacturer of professional video surveillance devices and solutions. As the first to invent the network camera in China, Uniview has continued to bring cutting-edge technologies to the industry. Uniview provides complete product lines including network camera, network video recorder, storage, transmission, and display devices. With integrated solutions for various industries including retail, healthcare, finance, transportation, industrial park, and more, we are committed to bringing better security to the marketplace for building a better world.

record.Creator: Sascha Müller
record.Title: Software gegen Betrug
record.Text: Hallo Zusammen!Ich möchte eine Software entwickeln die Betrügerische Absichten im Alltäglichen Online-Shopping erkennt.Die Software soll (aktuelle Idee) mit Bildschirmerkennung sobald eine Shopping App oder Website geöffnet wird starten und Chatverläufe mit Käufer & Verkäufer sowie die Anzeige des Artikels "scannen".Um dies umzusetzen werden Verdächtige Wortlaute, Texte, Sätze etc. in die Softwareeingelernt.Bei erkennung einer Betrügerischen Absicht soll das Programm (wenn es Datenschutzrechtlich genehmigt wird) die Daten des "Verdächtigen" wie zb.-IP Adresse-Nutzername-Chatverläufe etc.auf einer Datenbank speichern um evtl. Ermittlungen für die Polizei bei einem "erfolgten Betrug" zu erleichtern.Dazu soll es aber natürlich nicht kommen.Bei einem erkannten Betrug wird vorher eine Warnung abgegeben und der Nutzer gesperrt.Ihr wollt so wie ich SICHER im Web Surfen?Unterstützt mich!Mit freundlichen GrüßenSascha Müller

record.Creator: NEPUS
record.Title: Trudego: We revolutionize traveling and deliveries.
record.Text: Haz click aquí para ver la campaña en español. I’ve always liked buying online, for me, it’s the most comfortable and simple way to do it. I find annoying the process of going to a physical store to buy whatever I need, sadly delivery hasn’t changed or improved in the last couple of years, outside of the united states getting a package delivered can take up from a couple of weeks to months, and let's not even talk about the ridiculous fees than cant rack up to 200% of what you are trying to buy, When I lived in Bolivia I became frustrated because every time I wanted to buy my favorites item from platforms like amazon I realized that the price of the delivery surpassed the price of the product, which is ridiculous. So I did a little research and found out that these companies had a monopoly on the global market, and they didn’t give a real price to their customers. So inspired by business models like those from Airbnb and Uber I thought of a solution for international deliveries. It took me many days of researching models and many hypotheses so that my idea could work, and I came to realize that a model of the shared and collaborative economy in the world of international deliveries was the perfect one. Having that information I began the real work of trying to put everything together. I began designing the app, trying to think of all the functionalities that it could have and everything that took to make the idea of Trudego a great tool for travelers of the world. This process took me about 2 months which I spent programming what would be the start of the platform. Then I started validating my idea, asking my relatives and friends if they would like to receive their packages way faster and cheaper, they even told me they would buy much more if something like this existed, so 16 years old me decided to go and make this project a reality, 2 years later I’m launching this crowdfunding campaign to show everybody that a model like Airbnb or Uber can be applied to international deliveries.Trudego is a platform that aims to become a community of people that want their products to be delivered in hours rather than weeks or months, meanwhile, we also want to become a way for people to make money out of their travels.The concept is quite simple. Do you want to make money while traveling? have some free space in your luggage? use Trudego and make some money without doing much. We live in a world where people are constantly searching for ways to generate income, and many times our community will prefer to give money to an individual rather than a company, thus creating a sharing economy.The soul of the project is much deeper than the objective, and it’s split in half, The first from the traveler's side. The concept is that by taking a couple of other people's packages you can pay for a good part of your trip. the more you deliver the more money you earn, that way we want to make sure that many Trudego fans would be able to travel the world for free. In the second part, we side with the buyer. A person who is in some part of the world and who is buying a product online from another part of the world, it doesn’t even have to be something you bought, it could be a gift from your grandma, that she wanted to arrive on a certain date and international shipping couldn’t deliver. The idea is that the moment you make your purchase you can connect with a traveler who is in the city of purchase and who has a destination to your city, thus achieving something no intercontinental shipping can do at a decent price, getting your package in under 5 days.To summarize, our sole objective is to build a community that loves using Trudego and uses it to finance their journeys through the world. On the other hand, we got people a control panel Trudego to get their products worldwide, becoming one of the fastest shipping methods. The more people use it, the more we can change the world.Nowadays the market of international deliveries has become lazy, and companies like Trudego could move the foundations of the current market, sending a wake-up call to these companies that lost their ambition for innovation, and disrupting their ridiculous business practices.The fact that people could win money traveling is utopic and sounds fake, but with Trudego, something as simple as taking a package with you to the airport could become an opportunity to make money, is a concept that allows people to enjoy traveling more often, and with better quality of trips. One of our greatest innovations is the fact that we are going to create a tool designed for the consumer. In other words, the main problem that we solve is not that people need new sources of income, since that is only a consequence of our creation. The main problem is the time it takes to get the package and the security of that package. At Trudego we are really about your experience and wish that Trudego is your number 1 option when it comes to delivery.I am not looking for Trudego to be a small platform that competes at a minuscule level in the market. But on the contrary, a very interesting alternative to traditional shipping options.The platform has two types of functions: Trudego integrates into  Ecommerce and the sending of packages from person to person.Let's put ourselves in the place of a customer, the customer enters an online store and buys the products, then the store itself tells the customer that they use Trudego, then if the store doesn’t cover the delivery, the client pays for it through the store, and the store pays Trudego, from a customer's point of view they will only make 1 payment when the total to pay is shown, and the store will make the arrangement with Trudego, the same applies when the store offers free shipping.The client then receives a mail from Trudego that notifies him that our platform will manage the delivery, and the mail will tell the client the approximate day and time the package will be delivered, according to the store and the traveler that will be making the delivery; Once that’s done they will receive a link with the current status of the package and the route of said package. Then the agreed day the traveler will arrive at the door of the buyer with the packages.The traveler must register, filling in some important questions that will be shown to anyone on the platform, this information will help us notify the traveler of packages from stores or people,  that the traveler might like to deliver, the information of each package will be shown, information like the weight or dimensions of each package, the exact pick-up location and any photos there are; if everything is correct the traveler will make an offer and negotiate the fee and the time it will take to deliver the traveler could work with a suggested fee or they can negotiate the fee themselves. assuring the traveler that he/she can benefit from their travels. Trudego’s commission will be 15%.If the offer is accepted, a customer’s communication tab will open where the traveler and the store/ person will be able to communicate better and arrange the details of the pick-up. This communication is optional because stores can give the information beforehand to expedite the shipping process. Once everything is sorted the traveler picks up the package and travels to the destination, the day it is arranged the package will be delivered and the status of the package will be updated.To ensure the safety of the package and its safe delivery the traveler must leave a warranty and make a 2-step verification, The first step is that the travelers have some money as a warranty, and in case of the package not being delivered Trudego will cover all the damages, the next safety step is, in case the package is of high value the traveler must give and extra monetary warranty, all the money will be returned to the traveler when the package is delivered, thus giving the customer and the store and extra layer of protection against any problem, even in cases of fortuitous events, the company will cover any damage through insurance.The travelers will also have many tools at their disposal like maps and information about the packages that will help them plan their journeys. Something important to emphasize is that Trudego won’t cap the number of packages a traveler can deliver,  as long as all the safety regulations are met with their airline of preference.Let’s imagine that we want a package delivered from Barcelona to Miami, said package is a laptop that we sold through our eCommerce website, and at the moment of the purchase the customer added the shipping address, automatically a petition is generated to deliver the package, the petition is then sent to every traveler with a scheduled trip from Barcelona to Miami, a suggested price will generate automatically, and the only thing that changes is who will deliver the package, then the travelers will try to negotiate the conditions of the delivery. Trudego also offers an automatic mode that can be set according to our preferences, maybe we want the cheapest delivery, maybe we want the fastest or the traveler with the best score available, once that’s done a chat will open, giving us direct communication between us and the traveler, there we can coordinate everything, to the date and time of the pickup to more specific details that might make a better experience.The advantage Trudego offers is that if you need an express delivery you could contact someone that travels the next day, making an intercontinental delivery in just 2 days!The store could choose to only work with Trudego or offer Trudego and other traditional shipping companies. The store will have a control panel showing every order, payment, pending travelers, delivery offers, and many more tools at their disposal.So maybe two people want to use Trudego? let’s assign them, person A and person B.Person A wants to send a package from California to Paris, Person A enters Trudego and makes a new offer detailing everything about the package, this way an order is placed the many travelers available can interact with a said offer, then Person A chooses which traveler wants to work with; then Person A decides if they want to pay for the delivery or Person B could be in charge of paying, then the traveler picks the package up and, everything is set in motion, and every aspect of the process is identical to the rest.Tiers:- Raise your hand! If you want to make this project a reality, back how you can! $1- A special Mention! A thank you digital letter from the Trudego team! A mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 5$Client-oriented:- Client’s plan: Get 25% off on the delivery fees of your first 10 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 35$- Silver client’s plan: Get 50% off on the delivery fees of your first 15 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 60$- Gold client’s plan: Get 75% off on the delivery fees of your first 15 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 120$- Diamond client’s plan: Get 100% off on the delivery fees of your first 25 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 500$Traveler oriented.- Premium Partner traveler plan: Win more money with Trudego and free yourself from our fees for 10 deliveries! 50$- Gold Partner traveler plan: Win more money with Trudego and free yourself from our fees for 20 deliveries! 130$- Diamond Partner traveler plan: Win more money with Trudego and free yourself from our fees for 30 deliveries! 200$EARLY BIRD- Premium EARLY BIRD Client’s plan: Get 100% off on the delivery fees of your deliveries for life! Also, get a Special mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 1000$ 5 spaces available- Premium EARLY BIRD Traveler’s plan: Free yourself from our commission for life, use Trudego as a way to travel around the world. Also, get a Special mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 700$ 10 spaces available.I'm Amir Lima, I'm 18 years old from a middle-class family, I was born in La Paz- Bolivia. Since I was a little kid I was interested in all things about business. I was involved in the business. I used to put a price on things that most kids would not even consider, for example, I didn't sell you candy, in school, I sold you the thrill of eating candy in class and laughing with your friend from the little mischief.The way I was, wasn't formed naturally, it was due to the way that I was raised, many things that I considered unfair, like helping my family business while the other kids played. are the things that made me who I am today.I know I'm the right person to make this project a reality. I have the experience and the passion to do everything that's in my power to make Trudego successful entrepreneurship. I've funded Nepus, a crowdfunding advisory agency. Nepus gave me the experience I needed and made me come into contact with experienced people that have given me a lot of knowledge.

record.Creator: Fingoti
record.Title: Pebl - the complete IoT package for makers and hobbyists!
record.Text: …and we're even stronger than before!You may remember the Pebl from 2019? Despite not meeting our target funding goal, we were overwhelmed with the support from our original pledgers! Thank you!We wanted to show our appreciation by giving a 10% discount to be used in our Store for all previous supporters that re-pledge, if the campaign is successfully funded. This will last for a full month and can be redeemed by signing up to our Portal. Don't worry, we'll let you know when you can do that!When you boil it down,  we're just a bunch of enthusiastic nerdy guys, working long hours in a converted dentistry lab, in the southwest of England. We're trying our absolute hardest to make the IoT a place that allows anyone with an idea, no matter how big, to make a go of it and hit the ground running! Your trust in us and your generous pledges will give us the chance to make that a reality :)We're all mostly excited to see your creations and wonderful ideas, spawned from the ability to implement IoT into your project, overnight. So get that imagination flowing and read on...If you're not familiar with Pebl, you may want to skip to the "What is a Pebl?" section!We were being asked left, right and center if we'd be offering the Pebl for sale on our website despite not meeting our goal. Unfortunately, the answer was no as we just couldn't afford to do so :(However, immediately after our last Kickstarter campaign, we managed to secure funding which enabled us to further develop the Pebl product and supporting infrastructure to a point where it is now firing on all cylinders and waiting to be used by you!After learning so much from the last campaign, this time around, we're going to try our hardest to provide more information about HOW the Pebl can be used to enable your products to become part of the IoT!Scroll down, take a look and please get in touch if you have any questions!With the feedback we've received over the last couple of years, we have been able to improve and develop our offering further, and we now believe it is far better than before and overall, a more complete and well rounded solution.The Pebl hardware has been completely redesigned to cater for new features, better reliability and higher performance.We have redesigned the power management system to allow for a wider range of input voltages whilst consuming lower power and generating less heat. We have also optimised the WiFi antenna location to provide a longer range and better performance. A fully featured UART serial bus was squeezed in for even more flexibility. The RGB led control now has more stability, allowing improved visual performance by fixing a known flickering issue.An exciting new addition for our pledgers is an easy to use and handy Evaluation Board for the Pebl, so straight out of the box, you can get to grips with the way that it works and what it's capable of!Find out more information below and take a look at our Virtual Pebl Evaluation Board to get a taster of how it works!We have worked extremely hard to build the user front end to the point where it is now useable for everyday management and control of all your devices. This was something that was not readily available before, but is now raring to go!We're really pleased with it and hope you get an opportunity to use it! We have built in multi tenancy for our commercial users and a full account management system, which is further explained, later on.We're most proud of this achievement, being the backbone of device control and usage. The final outcome is awesome! The newly reworked API allows for no fuss usage, with no tiresome hoops to jump through, no manufacturer lockdowns and best of all, it's completely documented! All this whilst of course being fully authenticated.The Fingoti back end has full multi tenancy support allowing users to not only create multiple organisations for their devices but also for a partner/tenant relationship with customers. More about that later... At Fingoti we are striving to provide a simple, out-of-the-box gateway solution to the Internet of Things (IoT). We wanted all the research and development to be done for you and encapsulated it in a smart, secure, flexible and reliable package as standard.And so the Pebl was born.Pebl can connect with and control electrical equipment, from making sure the kettle is boiled for that first cup of coffee in the morning, to collecting analytics to track production efficiency for your business. The possibilities are endless.The IoT is a place where everyday physical items are quickly becoming part of the virtual world that is the internet. These items can be controlled and monitored from a distance to, for example, improve your life at home, increase productivity in the workplace or improve performance and reliability in industrial equipment.The IoT is already a very big and daunting place, especially if you are just starting out. Trying to manufacture and provide an IoT solution can be an expensive and drawn out process, requiring technical and specialist expertise. We believe it should be intuitive and simple, so we've done all the hard work for you. Our product can be used by everyone and anyone. Pebl provides an end-to-end solution for enthusiasts, business owners, education, home automation projects and... well, anything!The Pebl is a standalone IoT device that requires no assembly and no programming.  Following a simple two minute setup procedure, your Pebl is ready to be incorporated into your project providing IoT functionality that will bridge the gap between the virtual and physical world, from and to anywhere in the world!We really are providing the complete IoT solution.  We offer the hardware, software and back-end infrastructure,  supporting all that you will ever want to do. All you have to do is provide the power of imagination!Now that we've looked at what the Pebl is and how it works, now let us explain what it can be used for and why we think it's such an incredible little tool that unlocks so much potential...The Pebl is designed to be used as a component within custom hardware. You can think of it as a secure IoT bolt-on for your existing and exciting new projects. You can simply implement the Pebl into your project or solution by modifying existing or creating new circuitry to meet the demand of your application.We believe that by implementing the Pebl into your existing or new development project or product, you will see fast and large returns. This is due to the lack of upfront setup costs, as we provide the entire solution.Preventative maintenance, remote monitoring and assistance, data processing and management packages are all contracts that you can provide to your customers, at the price of a single device, the size of a sugar cube!Pebl is designed to remove any requirement for central control hubs, is completely self-reliant and requires almost no technical knowledge to set up. Simply download our app, enter your WiFi credentials and that's it. You are connected to the IoT and ready to begin making your own ripples in the internet.Every Pebl can be set-up wirelessly, using our USB Adapter or pre-configured at time of manufacture. Once the Pebl is configured, you can let your imagination run wild and build the next big thing, streamline your factory, teach your STEM pupils or monitor your heating from work.So why use a Pebl and not an Arduino or Raspberry Pi instead?First and foremost, security. The Pebl, unlike other similar devices on the market, comes with enterprise grade security as standard.Additionally, the Pebl is pre-programmed.  One of the challenges with the Arduino, Raspberry Pi and similar devices, is creating the code you need to achieve your application's goal. More often than not, this rarely proves easy or reliable. The Pebl simply responds to predetermined commands.Furthermore, as the Pebl is a fully encapsulated device, you don't have to worry about electrostatic discharge (ESD) or moisture damage as you would with bare board devices like the Arduino and Raspberry Pi. The watertight housing provides a barrier for use in almost any scenario, protecting against harsh environments.Four GPIO pins and a data bus for communication with I²C and UART sensors and accessories is made available. This allows makers to produce and market their own IoT peripherals that the Pebl can simply plug into. The Pebl device can be used for multiple applications by easily removing and reinserting into another product.For enthusiasts and inventors, we provide a breadboard breakout adaptor,  to enable you to easily implement a Pebl into your projects for quick and easy development and testing.We are offering a wide range of rewards that we hope will spark your imagination and get your ideas flowing!Good question. I suppose it's not much use just sitting there looking pretty!The Pebl will accept, execute and respond to a predetermined set of commands from various methods of communication. There's something for everyone here and regardless of the method you choose,  the requests and responses are identical.Please visit the Developer section of our website to learn more about and try out the Pebl commands for yourself.We designed the Pebl to be as flexible and versatile as possible so that it could be used in most environments...IndustryHobbyistEducationDomesticSecurityMarineMedicalAgricultureThe Fingoti Portal is a secure place to manage, monitor, control and interacts with your and your customer's Pebl devices.The Pebl can be used with or without our Portal. The vast majority of customers will use the Portal for its convenience and ease of use. However, the Pebl can be used in many other different ways, which of course, are free of charge, as explained previously.We've designed the Portal to cater for everyone from enthusiasts to small business owners and even large commercial applications. We have implemented our own infrastructure on the Microsoft Azure platform, resulting in a user experience that is intuitive, concise and rewarding.If you decide to use the Portal, we charge for the use of communications called 'Ripples'. A single Ripple is a full device request and response cycle. Ripple usage is either based on a pay-as-you-go or subscription basis.You'll get 1,000 free Ripples with every new account, but if you require more for your application, then you can choose to pay from just £1.00 for 5,000 additional Ripples. This essentially means you can query your device every 10 mins for an entire month, for just the price of a cheeseburger!If you are using our API as a commercial customer or as a third party developer, the charge is issued in the same manner, however, high usage of the Portal can result in a cheaper monthly contract if desired.Our payment terms are completely transparent and you can pay for as much or as little as you want to use, with or without a subscription.From our Portal, users can claim devices using just the serial number. Once the Pebl is linked to an account, the owner can monitor activity, manage settings and connect with other Pebl devices, including virtual devices.The back end infrastructure is centred around an organisation. Users can be members of multiple organisations by either creating a new one or being invited to an existing one, through a very simple email invitation process.  Every organisation has its own set of roles that can be assigned to a user, in order to grant access to certain areas. Either make use of the system roles provided or create custom roles.Your devices are then claimed by the organisation. That way, users can be added and removed without affecting the use of any device. All of this can be easily managed on our Portal or via the API.You can also apply to become a partner which gives you the ability to create organisations as tenants. This allows you to set up organisations for your customers whilst maintaining the ability to manage everything for them, from their devices to their subscriptions.Please take a look at our Usage Calculator above to get a clear idea of our pricing, should you wish to use the Portal.We're really excited about this :)We hope that you'll support us and pledge for one of these boards, as they are an excellent way to discover and explore the Pebl's capabilities and how it can easily be implemented into your application. Your pledges will also fund further Portal development and help to boost our product's market introduction.The Evaluation Board allows you to try out all the following features:Take a look for yourself...Or, if you'd rather have a play, check out the Virtual Evaluation Board we put together!Now it's even easier to set up your Pebl! You can simply use the USB Adapter to connect the Pebl to your laptop or computer and send the commands to get your credentials loaded onto the Pebl.Not only that, but the USB Adapter can be used for testing and debugging, with built in GPIO indicators for easy trouble shooting. In addition to being able to send requests and receive responses, you can also stream raw serial data across the internet using the UART bus mode!Wow! If you've got this far, you must be keen (or just really nerdy?!)There is a lot of exciting stuff packed into such a small little gadget. Here are few amazing things that the Pebl is capable of, with a bit more detail to explain...The Pebl's onboard 160MHz 32-bit processor is used in conjunction with a WiFi engine as its primary network connection method. The WiFi connection has a range of up to 50 metres.The 2.4GHz WiFi engine uses the standard 802.11 b/g/n protocol and provides an extremely reliable connection to a router or access point. WiFi connections are WPA, WPA2 and WEP compatible as standard and incorporate a variety of TKIP and AES encryption, as required.In simple terms, the Pebl's WiFi provides secure, powerful and reliable performance, resulting in a lightning fast response to user requests.The biggest risk for IoT devices is the lack of security. The Pebl provides peace of mind where this is concerned. Its WiFi is fully capable of end-to-end encryption when using our Fingoti Portal.We use Microsoft's Azure platform to provide a robust and proven method of transmitting data over the internet, securely. Using a SHA256 encrypted SAS key, communication to the Portal from the device is protected while in transit and at rest by Microsoft's firewalled servers.With the IoT world requiring clever, reliable and varied sources of power, we didn't want to limit the device to a particular voltage.  Instead, we've made the Pebl tolerant to a wide range of voltage inputs. This allows you to power the Pebl with a USB output, solar panel or even a car battery, just to name a few.With a built in voltage pump, the Pebl will operate on a wide input voltage range of anywhere between 3v and 16v. The onboard voltage smoothing ensures that the GPIO outputs aren't electrically noisy and provide a steady 5v output regardless of the input voltage. The voltage regulation does generate a small amount of heat, but this is properly dissipated, with efficient built-in heat sinking.Simply, the Pebl can be used with many different power sources, allowing a wide range of applications.The 4 user-configurable GPIO pins on the Pebl act as inputs or outputs as required in your application. They each provide an output of 5v with up to 25mA of current which is more than enough to power logic, LEDs or relays, amongst other things.These GPIO pins can detect a change in GPIO state every second, instantly reporting back the information to the user.The Pebl acts like a secure, remote middleman in serial communication, simply passing bytes onward via the bus and handling incoming data to be relayed back to the user. Making use of the serial bus, allows users to communicate with external processors and modules in two different ways...Using the Pebl's serial bus as a master for high-speed I²C data bus applications, serving over 100 slave modules is an extremely useful feature. The data bus is 5v tolerant and incorporates the necessary pull-up resistors.I²C is a globally recognised communications protocol that uses just two wires for data transfer. This allows for a vast range of sensors and devices, such as an RTC (real time clock) above, to be monitored, read and written to, from anywhere in the world.There is an abundance of I²C modules and devices on the internet at extremely low prices, that are very well documented for easy implementation.The Pebl's serial bus can also be configured to be used as a fully featured UART serial bus for your application. This is useful for applications that require external communications to GPRS or GMS modules.The UART serial mode allows the user to send and receive serial data instantaneously! All standard serial communication settings are exposed, for example, baudrate, parity and flow control, for use with many different UART applications.The Pebl includes a 16 million colour RGB LED that can be changed to any colour using a single command, visually communicating with users for many different purposes.The device also incorporates a 'blink' feature that allows you to adjust the flashing speed, duration and colour. This provides additional flexibility and uses for the Pebl device.Pretty cool, eh?Want to use the Pebl outdoors? No problem.  The device is immune to dust, dirt, rain, moisture and extreme weather. The Pebl is designed to be IP67 rated,  which certifies that it's waterproof and we're working on getting this officially assessed as soon as possible after our campaign.Ask the Pebl to do the heavy lifting for you to perform tasks automatically. Set a timer to read the temperature every hour, or turn a heater on at 5:00pm ready for when you get home from work, using the scheduler!Okay, okay, we know it doesn't have a battery,  but believe it or not, that was a conscious decision. A battery limits you to use devices and peripherals that are low powered which can limit your IoT application - not what we want to see!We believe that for an IoT device to be truly reliable and ensure that its data reporting is as accurate as can be, then it should be continuously powered. We have an environmental responsibility to provide the best performance we can, so, we made the Pebl as power efficient as possible. It consumes approximately 350mW on average.Isn't it irritating when new software gets released and you have to individually update every device you have? Not with the Pebl, it's actively checking for updates.We release software updates after passing an extensive customer acceptance testing process, so we're confident they won't interrupt your IoT application and cause any hiccups. You can opt for scheduled automatic updates when they are available or if your application is mission critical, update manually via the Fingoti Portal at a time that suits you.If your Pebl is connected to our Portal, you'll never miss an update, forever.Using the Pebl via the Fingoti Portal is easy and seamless. The Pebl can connect itself to our Portal (if you wish) which allows you to access,  monitor, change and update it using our friendly Portal user interface.But, don't worry, that's not the only way to use your Pebl...The ways in which the Pebl can communicate with the outside world are extensive.For those budding entrepreneur and/or nerds amongst you who are looking for a more commercial, industrial or custom solution or you'd consider yourself an advanced user then the Pebl will respond to other methods of communication.Our API can also be utilised for direct communication, securely, via our Portal, but implementing your own user interface and back-end. This solution can be useful for third-party developers and custom applications that require high security and minimal fuss/cost setup.Please take a look at our API Reference Documentation and Device CommandsYes, we get that a lot, it really is that small!Requirements for the size of the Pebl were defined early on to be as 'small as possible' but remaining 'beautifully tactile' - not an easy one.It was important that the Pebl was both minimal and self-contained.  This compares to the IoT hardware that is currently available, often being bare-board with exposed electrical components. Every cubic millimetre of the device has been utilised. All components are internal and self-contained with a chemical and water resistant resin, which acts as a heat sink as well as protection from environmental factors.

record.Creator: Miraskar
record.Title: REINVENTING THE RIDE EXPERIENCE
record.Text: Imagine having a one taxi app which is connected to your local taxi services and brands such as Uber, Bolt and others?How would you feel about it? Anywhere you go, you can find a cheapest and quickest ride without the need of using multiple apps and owning multiple accounts or looking around for billboards in a small town as there are no Uber or Bolt, with Gett Me Taxi app you will find a ride in any part of the world, with your help and support we can achieve the unity of rides.Below you will find a more info :) GETT ME IS THE RIDE MARKETPLACE TO UNIFY & COMPARE & BOOK FROM LOCAL AND BRAND TAXI PROVIDERS IN REAL-TIME, IN ONE APP,WHY GETT ME EXIST?Nowadays it is very difficult to find a right service for your needs, there are so many taxi apps and taxi-ride services, from the local providers in the small towns to the brands operating in big cities. Separate apps to use luxury services, standard rides, chauffeurs, disable services, electric cars and moreThe environmental impact of transport is significant, transport is a major user of energy, and burns most of the world's petroleum. This creates an pollution, including nitrous oxides and particulates.WHY GETT ME ADDS VALUE?83% No. of users with 3+ taxi apps85% No. of users want to compare taxi prices,99% No. of users unaware of taxi aggregator apps99% No. of taxi providers don't care about nature or pollution92% No. of users don’t know local provider and struggle to find a taxi GETT ME OFFERS AN INNOVATIVE AND INTEGRATED HIRING EXPERIENCE LOADED INTO ONE SINGLE APP WITH GREATER ATTENTION TO THE SIMPLICITY, EASE AND SUSTAINABILITYEvery journey is an opportunity for us to create positive change in nature, and improve people’s mental and emotional wellbeing. We plan one tree for the each new user, referral and for each ride, by 02.12.2022, we put a goal to plant 1.782.379 trees 🌳🌳🌳One Ride - One Tree with Gett Me. Let’s drive the change together. WHAT HAVE YOU ACHIEVED BY YOURSELF?Launched our Waiting List App: 1069+ people on our waiting list, (launched IOS/Android: https://gettme.taxi/use-app)Did a survey across UK: 1560+ on our survey, 98% need verified: https://forms.gle/6sRdNCo91axnrgP59All marketing materials, brand books, launch champaign, growth hacking plans and identified and more...Product development roadmap, features, stages and timelines are documented, the UI/UX completed by our designer  Legals are completed too, SEIS/EIS, Contracts, EMI, Option Pool, In daily basis we are achieving more milestones to reach our dream. WHAT IS YOUR GOAL?Our Goal is to offer a solution where we can link local & private taxi services and global brands such as Uber, Bolt and as a user, you can choose fast & affordable rides or select a ride from variety options that we are adding: Standard, Electric, Disable, Female Only, Protected, or VIP’s such as Rolls Royce, Ferrari, Bentley and other luxury & high end cars. Gett Me will find a car in any occasion, in a big city or small town, a perfect ride at the best price.We have 4 industries which we want to disrupt in the next 5 years within the travel industry and aggregate more than 480 apps into 4 different solutions and expand our brand globally starting with UK & EU.We love nature and planting trees, and all our products will be sign up to ESG and Tree Planting.Gett Me Taxi is just to start of our journey within the Gett Me brand, Join our Revolution.If you have any questions, feel free to contact us anytime.

record.Creator: Apollo Audio
record.Title: Eclipse: Audio visualizing ferrofluid speaker
record.Text: The Eclipse speaker is the first of its kind ferrofluid audio visualizing Bluetooth speaker. With the power of electromagnets, the Eclipse translates your audio into magnetic pulses that push the ferrofluid creating a stunning display of real fluid animations.*The version shown is a prototype and the final version will be refined and upgraded.This is our demo video for our current working prototype of the Eclipse. Please note on the final version the LED strips will be hidden, the glass bottom will be removed and perfectly round, LED strips will be brighter, and the speaker drivers will be tuned. Additionally, the ferrofluid animation and coding are still being optimized.This is basically our rough draft speaker and as RND continues the Eclipse speaker on release will be refined and perfected.  We are still sourcing materials and parts to guarantee the Eclipse speaker has incredible build quality.Sixty-one years ago, NASA engineers created the first magnetic fluid called the ferrofluid. This invention made it the world's first truly magnetic liquid. Inspired by this feat, we formed a team and created the Eclipse speaker. The Eclipse is a first-of-its-kind speaker that uses a ferrofluid and an electromagnet to create a stunning audio visualizer.For ferrofluid to even be visible in a glass bottle, just like traditional ferrofluid containers, the glass has to be specially treated to prevent staining. The manufacturing process for a ferrofluid bottle can be time-consuming and costly to ensure the glass is properly treated.Your device > audio analyzer > electromagnet > ferrofluid movementThe Eclipse speaker works by taking audio transmitted from your device and converting that audio into digital signals. Those signals are then sent to the electromagnet where it pulses those signals as magnetic forces. The magnetic forces meet the ferrofluid causing a magnetic reaction and thus the ferrofluid movement.We've fine-tuned and refined our firmware through countless hours of testing and coding all in a pursuit to add features to prevent dead spaces, obtain the best visuals possible, and regulate the electromagnet's sensitivity. Utilizing the ferrofluids magnetic property the Eclipse’s audio is enhanced with our Fluid Mass Bass boost system.Fluid Mass Bass Boost takes advantage of the mass of the ferromagnetic fluid by exactly matching the speaker output phasing to the movement of the fluid.This results in a physical alteration to the center of mass of the speaker cabinet and allows for a more solid and realistic bass sound than would typically be achieved with a speaker of this size and specification.tl;dr the ferrofluid makes the bass sound good.Capacitive touch controls: At the top of the Eclipse is our control module for the speaker. Flat and touch-sensitive controls similar to a touch screen to control volume, Bluetooth, pause, and many more features.LED lighting: Inside the Eclipse's main chamber is LED lighting for the ferrofluid bottle. The LED is RGB+W allowing you to display just about any color imaginable including pure white. LED is controllable via our smartphone app included with your purchase.Electromagnet: Inside the Eclipse is a 500N electromagnet synced with the audio analyzer chip. Music sent to the Eclipse is converted into electromagnetic pulses rhythmically moving the ferrofluid.Removable panel: On the bottom of the Eclipse is a removable panel for swapping out ferrofluid bottles. We plan on offering additional ferrofluid colors in identical glass bottles you can switch into your eclipse.Bluetooth: No wires needed the Eclipse is 100% Bluetooth allowing you to play your music wirelessly.Fluid Mass Bass Boost: Upgrade your bass with the power of ferrofluid. Our custom-designed system utilizes ferrofluid unlike any other speaker to create a sensational bass quality.Speaker Colorway stretch goals: With a variety of colorways; you can choose a speaker that is truly yours.Front panel customization: The ellipse also has a removable front panel creating opportunities for different colors and possible artists collaborations for the most personal product possible.Colored ferrofluid stretch goal: By achieving the colored ferrofluid stretch goal we can deliver a fairly wide range of colored fluid for greater product personalization.Style is personal and the Eclipse speaker was created with the purpose to give users a better way to express themselves and create memorable experiences. Our mission is to make the Eclipse's customization seemingly endless leaving nearly nothing to be unattainable. Lighting settings: Adjust your LED lighting with full-spectrum controls to change the color and brightness.  Plus, there are tons of color-changing lighting modes for you to choose from.Genre selector: Optimize ferrofluid animation by matching your music with a genre. Our presets are custom made to enhance ferrofluid animation for the specific genre.Sound equalizer: Customize your audio to your liking with our built-in sound equalizer. Take control of your settings and fine-tune your audio down to the finest details. Animation presets: Experiment with your ferrofluid's movement with our animation presets. Preset animation modes that change how your music is translated to ferrofluid movement. Ferrofluid control: Control your ferrofluid with no audio required from the power of your smart device. In-app controls for you to activate the electromagnet and move the ferrofluid.…And plenty of bonus features!Located at the top of the Eclipse speaker is the capacitive touch control panel. Capacitive controls are like touchscreens where you don't have to click a button to use a feature. Simply tap the icons and you can use any of the features on the panel. Features currently include volume up, volume down, Bluetooth, and power on/off.The capacitive controls are easy to use without having to worry about analog buttons breaking down or getting stuck.We didn't just stop at making a ferrofluid visualizing speaker, we made sure it sounds phenomenal too.With a max volume output of 86db, the eclipse can get as loud as a lawnmower (90db) or a vacuum (80db) at peak volume. With dual premium speaker drivers tuned to perfection, an acoustically engineered casing, and our custom Fluid Mass Bass Boost system, we can promise you the audio quality is out of this world.Designing a ferrofluid speaker isn't really something that has been done before. Unlike conventional speakers, we have numerous extra bells and whistles that need to fit inside. Not only do we have an electromagnet on the inside but speakers drivers are naturally magnetic. Forcing us to get creative and keep the ferrofluid from being drawn in by the drivers. Coding the firmware for the speaker was the next obstacle to overcome. Translating audio to magnetic pulses was another obstacle in the pursuit of perfection building this beautiful machine. We were able to generate code that synchronized pulses whenever audio hit a certain volume threshold. Then we had to refine our code to adjust for pauses in music and varying levels of volume. We didn't stop there and continued coding to make sure any song could be visualized perfectly.The code listens to and samples the music many times per second and isolates peaks in the audio at different frequencies. Then, using a self-optimizing logic, it decides which frequencies will then trigger the electromagnet.In a nutshell, our code sets a threshold for each frequency band from the audio playing. These thresholds automatically adjust and modify pulses for the audio being played. Once a threshold is broken that triggers a pulse from the electromagnet.
