The hold time for the pulse is determined by the audio playing.  Hold time is the length of the magnetic pulse or how long the magnet is actively holding the ferrofluid.The settings are also adjustable and customizable inside of the Apollo Eclipse app.After tons of testing and prototyping, we finally settled on a design that met our strict standards of quality and runs effortlessly.Power type: Wired (Due to the electromagnet power requirements this is NOT a portable speaker)Weight: TBD (We are still finalizing inside components)# of speakers: 2x speaker driversConnectivity Tech: Bluetooth & WIFI Electromagnet strength: 500N Front panel material: Acoustic fabric  Controls: Capacitive touch controls LEDs: RGB+W LED strips with Bluetooth connectivity for control via Apollo app  (all spectrum colors and full white)Ferrofluid bottle: 250ml anti-stain solution and 20ml ferrofluid Since its inception, a combined amount of well over 2,000+ man-hours have been put into this project. Our team has been responsible for designing, prototyping, engineering, sourcing, and funding the project. This isn't our first rodeo in the eCommerce and product development space. Our small executive has a track record of developing eCommerce brands into 7-figure giants in as little as a year. Our proven strategies for digital marketing, product dev, social media, and customer support enable us to turn customers into super fans.  With over $3,000,000 in revenue and over 200,000,000+ organic social media views to show.We've found it's much easier to sell to existing customers so our secret sauce is to create the best possible customer experience.  Fast and accurate shipping times with quality so good you rarely need customer support. We don't need any business secrets to scale just simple customer satisfaction.The Eclipse is more than just a Kickstarter for us; we're looking to turn this into a community of Apollo fanatics. We've learned a lot from developing the Eclipse and have tons of ideas stored in the bank for our product roadmap.  We can promise you there are even bigger projects to come from the Apollo team. As well as biweekly updates we will additionally be making frequent posts on our social media platforms to keep our community updated. Posts will include prototype photos, manufacturing updates, concepts, and tons of other content. Additionally, our team of customer support agents will be replying to comments and questions on Kickstarter and social media. As well as updating our FAQ page and Kickstarter with relevant information regarding the Eclipse.We're committed to staying transparent with our process and allowing customers to be informed about their products.    Pledges may vary (these are the items included in the 1st tier pledge)

record.Creator: Maggie Sullivan
record.Title: SkiAvec: A new invention for Nordic skiers!
record.Text: I'm not sure where the concept came from--perhaps while mowing the lawn. Regardless, it originally took shape as a solar-powered machine. However, sun power turned out not to be a viable energy source. Hence the evolution to e-Bike technology with the expertise of a mechanical engineer.

record.Creator: KB Devices
record.Title: open·control
record.Text: After successfully launching State Of The Loop in 2018, I am excited to present you my new creation, a more flexible and powerful MIDI controller. ➜ HARDWARE DESIGN :As a successor to State Of The Loop, I wanted to create a controller with a brighter and clearer display, that could properly show Looper names, Scene names, Arrangement Markers names, and more. I also wanted that the user could decide how many foot pedals he could use. Sometimes 5 is too much, sometimes 2 is not enough. After making the first prototypes, I found it so cool and useful, that I decided to make a version that could be controlled by pressing buttons instead of pedals.So open·control was born.➜ SOFTWARE DESIGN :After designing the hardware, I had to choose which actions each control should perform. But again,  it was hard to decide which functions would benefit the majority of users.  So I decided to let the user decide what's best for him as easily as possible.Right now open·control is optimized for Ableton Live, with its own Script and Editor.But being Open Source, it could evolve and encompass software like Logic, Bitwig, who knows ?The Pocket version has 6 Buttons with visual feedback and 2 Endless Knobs with Push buttons, bringing it to a total of 8 buttons. It comes in the most simple yet elegant form of a printed circuit. It is the perfect companion to your mouse and keyboard to control Live and provides easy shortcuts to your favorite actions. A 3D printed cover is available if you want to protect it.With its 8 Jack inputs, the Boxed version allows to plug up to 6 Foot Switches and 2 Expression Pedals. But if you only need half, that's not a problem, you will still enjoy its bright display and solid built. If none of the models above suit you, and you have the skills for it, you can always build your own enclosure. The Maker version has all the features of its brothers (6 buttons with visual feedback, 2 "sliders" and 2 endless encoders with push buttons), it is up to you to imagine the best box for your own use.open·control is fully customizable through an easy to use Web interface (also available offline).You can decide what each button will perform (long and short press), and what the  LEDs and main Display will show.Here is a list of some of the actions already available (the list will grow with User Requests) : You can also use the buttons to do "standard" MIDI mapping. Recently added actions : Here are a few examples of possible set ups :You can find more details on the open·control website opencontrol.me, or see the Web editor for yourself.Of course, open·control, like its predecessor, is capable of controlling Live's Looper, except that it is now much easier: Watch a little demo of open·control :In order to make it ready for the stage, and not be limited to the USB cable length, open·control has mini-jack MIDI In and Out ports. The USB cable will then only be used to provide power to the unit.  open·control can also be controled by your favorite Pedal or Pad controller (for instance Behringer's FCB1010, Roland's SPD-SX, KMI's Softstep,...). If you have a controller with MIDI Out that can send temporary CC or Note messages, just plug it in and let open·control know which Note/CC to listen to.A 3D-printed cover is available for the Pocket version.It was designed by Bruno Tognin and is made out of recycled plastic bottles. Display:     • Bright 6x32 LED Matrix     • 6 RGB LEDs both have adjustable brightness  Inputs / Outputs:     • 6 Switches (Buttons or Pedals)     • 2 Sliders (Knobs or Faders)      • Mini-Jack  MIDI In and Out       • USBopen·control is based on a Raspberry Pi Pico (RP2040) chip.  It is programmed in C/C++ using Arduino, but can be programmed in CircuitPython / MicroPython.Each of the components (LEDs, buttons, matrix, Analog Inputs) can be accessed through the I/O pins.open·control already has a long story, at least in the lab...Watch it evolve from a Teensy-based "State Of The Loop Mk2" to a fully original and integrated device.The box itself has mutated from the first prototype of "KBD Multifootswitch" to the final enclosure.You can also be part of this story by supporting open·control !

record.Creator: Echelon
record.Title: ZVE : Zero Vulnerability Electronics
record.Text: Welcome To The Digital Age.The age where we fear Have you ever heard of something like this?The NSA simply warns the public to prepare for cyber attacks and without a solution - why? Because they're exploiting your devices weakness to build a dossier about you."Big Tech" will always sell you "terms & conditions" that allow them to legally spy on you to sell you junk you don't need.No one want's their neighbor spying on their phone, No one wants their ex to know the way they talk to their new lover,No one wants big companies using the data they collect on you - "for free" - using your data for "research" or profit.Where your electronics are built to be insecure, the software is engineered to be insecure so that strangers can exploit you and your home life.Have you ever wanted to secure your electronics for work or business purposes?What if we want to share with you a way to ensure that you're secure?Have you ever wished there was a way to know for certain that you're not being spied on?What if we knew of a way to know for certain?Have you ever wanted to hide something from someone important?Do you need a certain level of professional discretion and privacy when you're using your electronics?Did you know that your local law enforcement can splice into your camera, microphone and location on your phone and watch you or someone you love change their clothes?Did you know that private organizations can splice into your camera and microphone easily today?They have so much money- and it's easy anyway- We'll tell you why - Did you know that your boss or your coworker can upload spyware to your phone without your consent and without you knowing?That's right, they can tune in at night to see your sensitive photos- they can even do the same to your family because they have access to your contacts!That passwords and lock screens are just a false sense of security? And that because of "big tech" companies and their terms and conditions, you're subject to "research" and development projects- Everything you do online is being tracked.And it's especially scary and overwhelming when you don't have a clue about how software works!A good friend of ours tells us all the time that And we always respond with the same,Hundreds of millions of people have the same concerns about their "smart" phone.They want and need The fact of the matter is that- All it takes is one leaked electronic document and suddenly your privacy is public.Imagine an imaginary window in front of you where any number of people can watch or listen to you through 24 hours a day - seven days a week, where strangers could see the inside of your bedroom, the inside of your life, the inside of your mind, the inside of all of your relationships for free, stealing it to make money of their own...Anybody with the appropriate software can come along and take control of your microphone and camera- they can snoop and see everything that you don't want them to see...All major brand "devices" are built to be insecure so that people like "big tech" can exploit you for advertising, so that the government can exploit you for spying, so that organizations can see inside without you ever knowing.We saw a problem with that- All it takes is for your neighbor to meet a software engineer expert and before you  know it- your neighbor is smirking because they know what you and your spouse look like naked.Where your average joe programmer has access to software like the infamous Pegasus SpywarePegasus gives strangers access to all of your contacts, call logs, messages, photos, web browsing history, settings including apps like imessage, gmail, instagram, snapchat, facebook, whatsapp, telegram, and many more. The spyware Pegasus and others can be installed on your device with the push of a key on a keyboard remotely. All they need is your phone number- The spyware can be installed on the latest versions of Apple and AndroidAnd with the push of a button.Every Apple, Samsung, and other major brand phone is 100% vulnerable!And software is certainly a part of your life whether you think about it or not. The infamous Pegasus exploits what's known as a zero-click vulnerability.Which means your neighbor can upload spyware to your phone without any interaction from  you!Doesn't matter if you click anything - Once they send it to your device by email, sms, phone call, whatsapp, facebook, or any other way, your device is programmed to automatically pre-download the malware- because it's a pre-downloadable file. They call it Pegasus because these viruses are like a Trojan Horse! Nothing you can do!Software like the infamous Pegasus Spyware is extremely dangerous and more common than you think- In fact- you might already have it on your phone and you would never know that strangers are on the other side of your cell phone- judging you, watching you, and financially making a killing because you agreed to their terms and conditions of their application or software.Welcome To The Digital Age- where someone you care to impress can look through everything you've ever done with your phone- - Where someone you once knew can look up your phone number and then cyber assault your electronics with spyware- Where local law enforcement can look at your wife's sexy photos- or your families sensitive photos - or even worse, they can get a free look at your daughters photos!One of our good friends said this was happening to them for months, and once we directed them to one of our trusted cyber security experts- they busted them and got revenge!Welcome to the digital age where the fact of the matter is that all "major brand" technology is completely insecure, all of your favorite technology is totally and completely vulnerable to cyber assault.Are you worried or afraid that someone might be monitoring you through your electronics but you don't know what to do?Our very good friends have said the same and that's why we created Zero Vulnerability Electronics.ZVE is exactly what you think it is- The only solution on the market that makes it impossible for anyone to spy on your electronics. ZVE is a smart phone that has very smart terms and conditions, and functionality that allows for everything on your device to encrypt automatically!Meaning no on can spy on your text's, no one can log your calls, and no one can splice into your phones camera and microphone!We believe you have a right to:We're working on technology that:1.) Industry Leading Encryption 2.) Completely Private, Even from Us 3.) Authorized Access OnlySecurely share and privately communicateThe moment anyone tries to spy on you- your ZVE phone will wipe the bug out immediately. ZVE phones are perfect if you need ZVE is exactly what's needed to finally secure your privacy and feel good knowing it's done.You also have the capability to back your phone up to a 100% encrypted cloud service - where absolutely nothing is used for "research" - nothing is ever looked at by strangers- and where it's impossible to spy on you!ZVE smart phones are set to hit retail stores in 2027.Because you like Zero Vulnerability Electronics - Go ahead and join our community by pledging as much as you can today, only as fast as you're ready to feel relieved that your smartphone is completely and totally secure. To Be Noted:(Developing new products and hardware can be especially complex for creators and rewarding to backers. Please understand that this project is in its prototype development. We plan to manufacture and distribute a complex smart phone. This is a Kickstarter campaign focused around the creation and development of a prototype. In this case, we cannot offer the product that is under development as a reward, and it must be clearly understood that the focus of the project is to create a prototype.)

record.Creator: Giovanni Marquez
record.Title: FreshLedge
record.Text: With online ordering and deliveries increasingly common, people may lack proper space near their front door to receive a delivery. Items may be placed in a disorganized manner near a front door and be at risk for blowing away due to inclement weather, being stolen, and the like. Placing items on the ground leaves the item at risk for dirt, debris, insect infestations, etc. which can be especially unfortunate when it comes to food deliveries.FreshLedge is delivery shelf system capable of being placed near a front door or window on a home, office, or other building. The system is comprised of a shelf with a hinged mechanism near its rear edge used to firmly secure the shelf to the building exterior. The hinge allows the shelf to be placed in a vertical position for storage when not in use and a horizontal, deployed position when a package is ready to be received.Delivery personnel can pull down the shelf when he or she is delivering a box or other package to a building. The shelf accommodates the item(s) and keeps them elevated, safe from dirt, debris, insects, etc. There can be extensions or attachments to support different sizes of items ranging from boxes, beverage containers, food containers, and more. Optional smart home features could also be integrated in which the shelf can automatically deploy to a specific length when a package delivery is nearby.The system can be constructed using metal, plastic, and other suitable materials. The shelf and other components may feature custom colors or designs to accommodate all user needs and preferences. Exact size, measurement, construction, and design specifications may vary upon further development and manufacturing. I currently hold a provisional patent on "FreshLedge" and will obtain a non-provisional patent by early next year.Here is my current prototype at my home. I made it out of wood, hinges, magnets and chains. We use ours by noting it in the comment section of our deliveries. For example: We order fresh baked cookies to take to work sometimes and they deliver them fresh as soon as 8am in the morning. When we place the order the night before on the app, we note in the comments, "Please do not place on floor, please pull down FreshLedge on wall by front door and place there, thank you."What has happened in the past is,  they place the box on the floor and leave (contactless delivery) and we don't notice the "delivered" notification on the app, since we are either in the shower or getting ready. By the time we notice, even if it's just a few minutes after, a trail of ants has made its way into the box and you know the rest lol. The future of  FreshLedge could be very cool, ESPECIALLY when it becomes a SmartLedge and can be something that could be a touchscreen/camera/doorbell/ledge all in one. Pretty much your own concierge, it even holds your bags. Thank you for taking the time to read about my idea, have an amazing life and continue to be great!

record.Creator: ADV.SOUND
record.Title: ADV. Eartune Fidelity – Custom-fit Ear Tips for AirPods Pro
record.Text: We are a team of passionate creators revolutionizing the sound and hearing technologies using the power of 3D-printing, AI, and decades of ear-related experience in pro-audio, hearing aid technology, and consumer electronics. Alongside six successfully delivered crowdfunded campaigns, with years of experience in development, manufacture, and mass shipment/fulfillment, we are confident in delivering the rewards to our backers.To pre-order your Eartune Fidelity and bring to life our vision of an affordable, high quality custom ear tip adapter, click Back This Project, or scroll on.SPEK stands for "Self Precision Ear-impression Kit" and it's a patented system co-developed by ADV. and SPEK Research Inc.  It's a system that allows you to create an accurate, physical ear impression safely at home without needing to visit an audiologist.  Once we receive your ear impression, we'll be able to make any custom-fit ear pieces you want in addition to the Eartune Fidelity custom ear tips. Check out a full list of available custom tips and earplugs here.Justin met Giuseppe (Joe) and Peter at an audiophile trade show in 2018 as professionals coming from different industries.  With sound and hearables as a common denominator, they quickly found their visions aligned to develop a solution that democratizes custom-fit ear pieces for the masses.  Relentless development ensued and resulted in the revolutionary Eartune series custom ear pieces that utilize the patented SPEK system  (Self Precision Ear-impression Kit) which allows users to create their own, accurate physical ear impression safely at home.It was the respect for all musicians of the past, present and future.  It was for the struggling instrumental buried under the heavy bass  line. It was for the audiophiles craving that crystal clear and  mind-blowing detail.ADV. began as a small Kickstarter campaign in 2015 and naturally grew into a bigger body that  thrives on the enthusiasm and passion for music. We design, develop and  produce ground-breaking audio products that span widely from earphones,  headphones, DAC / amp to musical instruments. We are focusing on staying  in the forefront with the latest proprietary audio technology, while continuing to explore creative ways to allow everyone to experience the  audiophile-grade sound.As our core principle, there is respect for all musicians as creators and facilitators of content so deeply rooted in human emotion.  We recognize the importance of music and the impact it has in our lives.  We actively collaborate with and support those who practice, create, and perform around the globe.

record.Creator: Luv Agrawal
record.Title: Healthier Social Media
record.Text:
We are raising funds to develop a Healthier Social Media App that is more user centric, does not use their information or show them advertisements, and gives them a courteous and positive space to interact with each other. 

We care about it because we believe current social media options are contributing to world problems like Mass Narcissism, Polarisation, Misinformation, Information Overload and Addictive Use. 

Our platform aims to solve these problems by abandoning current social media's advertising based business model, that prioritizes maximising engagement for serving business interests, in favour of a membership based business model designed to serve people well. We plan to use the money from kickstarter to complete it's development and then invite users for beta testing. 

We are entrepreneurs in humane technology belonging from America and India.

record.Creator: Vladimir Kulyukin
record.Title: BeePi: Honeybees Meet AI: Stage 3
record.Text: Hello,Our BeePi Project is back with Stage 3! We are a research team in Logan, UT, USA working on electronic beehive monitoring (EBM). EBM integrates hardware and software methods to monitor honeybee (Apis Mellifera) colonies with various sensors in and around the hive. We're enhancing EBM with AI.Why EBM? Because the bees are dying and the climate is changing, and EBM provides continuous monitoring of bee colonies without invasive hive inspections that disrupt natural bee cycles. EBM also supports environment/climate studies, because the behavior and health of bee colonies tell us a great deal about the environment and the climate.BeePi is an open design EBM platform we've been developing since 2014. BeePi is unique, because it 1) does video analysis to measure bee traffic in the vicinity of a hive and to generate hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly traffic graphs; 2) does ambient audio analysis to separate bee buzzing from noise and to correlate ambient audio with traffic and weather data; 3) respects the sacredness of bee space -- no sensors are placed on the bee or inside the hive.Our goals for Stage 3 are: 1) to port all our video/audio algorithms to the raspberry pi platform so that all data processing is done on a single pi with zero computation/storage in the cloud; 2) to continue and enhance the curation of large video, image, audio, and weather datasets from over half a terrabyte of raw data accumulated in Stages 1 and 2 of the BeePi Project; 3) to make BeePi hardware and software available to researchers, practitioners, citizen scientists, and enthusiasts through project rewards in order to make BeePi  a global EBM platform.If you're not a techie, there are rewards for you to show your passion for pollinator health/sustainability/Open Science with limited edition seed packages, cool bumper stickers, and slick T-shirts.By backing BeePi you support Open Science -- the practice of science that aims to increase transparency and impact of scientific research beyond the peer reviewed article. Open scientists engage communities worldwide in grassroots collaboration and discussion of scientific research through direct participation.Don't confuse Open Science with Open Source (free software). Open Science is not free! BeePi requires funding for hardware, data curation, algorithm design, bee hives, and field experiments.DISCLAIMER: Any opinions, views, and positions, expressed or implied, in this crowdfunder do not reflect any opinions, views, positions, or policies of Utah State University or any unit thereof in whole or in part. This crowdfunder has not been endorsed, supported, or promoted by Utah State University or any unit thereof in whole or in part.

record.Creator: My Shared Studio
record.Title: My Shared Studio, the collaborative audio creation platform
record.Text:
At My Shared Studio, we are convinced that the two words "musical collaboration" are not only a technical thing, but a philosophy of openness to the world allowing sharing and intercultural exchange between all musicians. Our goal is to remove borders and make possible collaborations between artists all over the world.Many creators, often remotely, contribute to the production of a musical recording: singers, musicians, producers, artistic directors, sound engineers ...Communication here is essential and physical distance is a real brake on productivity!Remote collaborations are still very archaic: Many exchanges of huge audio files are necessary and just as many emails to complete a project!30% of your production time is spent on these cumbersome, time-wasting exchanges ...So, how can we improve your remote collaborative music production experience?My Shared Studio (MSS) is an online collaborative digital audio workstation (DAW), directly accessible from your web browser.It’s a real-time collaborative audio sequencer so that you can create your music together, everywhere, instantly! My Shared Studio presentation (ENG) Now you can use My Shared Studio with your favorite DAW Pro Tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio® etc... , by dragging and dropping your audio files from your DAW into MSS.But soon, thanks to your contributions, My Shared Studio will be fully integrated into your favorite sequencer with My Shared Studio plugins!Pro tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio ®, and their logos are respectively registered trademarks of Avid Inc., Ableton Inc., Apple Inc. , Image Line Software NV, in the US and other countries.My Shared Studio is a shared environment allowing real-time audio creation and collaboration. Users have access to all of the necessary tools to collaborate:My Shared Studio allows musical collaborators to intuitively, efficiently, remotely compose, in real time!The goal of this campaign is to develop a plugin allowing any audio player to make the link between your usual audio editing environment and My Shared Studio.As an audio creator working within your own editing environment, My Shared Studio will create a direct link between your favorite sequencer and My Shared Studio.Two types of plugins will be developed and soon be available depending on the subscription chosen :MSS-Sync (PREMIUM subscription)This plugin will send, with a single click, the audio content of a track from your usual sequencer to your collaborative MSS project. You will thus preserve your working environment, while using the collaborative features of MSS.My Shared Studio Premium subscription will be available from December 15, 2021. The MSS-Sync plugin will be delivered in June 2022. 
MSS-Connect (PRO subscription)
   With this plugin, it will become possible to access all My Shared Studio features within your usual sequencer.All the advanced collaborative functions offered by My Shared Studio will be integrated directly and accessible via a window in the most widely used audio sequencers on the market: Pro tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio®.Pro tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio®, and their logos are respectively registered trademarks of Avid Inc., Ableton Inc., Apple Inc. , Image Line Software NV, in the US and other countries.My Shared Studio PRO subscription will be available from December 15, 2021. The MSS-Connect plugin will be delivered in December 2022.The team is made up of four enthusiasts of sound in all its forms. Edouard Lauret and Baptiste Janvore, the two co-founders, are longtime musician friends and both grew up in a very rich musical and cultural context on Reunion Island.At My Shared Studio, we are lucky to have been able to bring together an amazing artistic collective for this Kickstarter campaign!For certain contributions, talented musicians from the MSS collective have generously agreed to offer you a collaboration with one of them for a composition, an arrangement or a mixing session via MSS. We are very proud to present them to you, and extend a big thank you to all of them for joining us for this campaign:Bastien PicotSongwriter-composer originally from Le Tampon, Bastien Picot now lives between Paris and Reunion Island and has multiple collaboration credits; many artists have already called upon him as lead singer or as backing vocalist: Fabrice Legros, Cunnie Williams, Roger Biwandu but even more recently Stevie Wonder for whom he sang backing vocals for three concerts during his summer tour in France. Bastien has already opened for artists such as Nneka, Grace, and LokO.Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aurusmusicMaya KamatyCradled by African and Indian sounds, Reunionese Maya Kamaty has chosen to take her time to talk about herself and her island. This young artist has ended up forging her path between traditional maloya and more personal flavors. She plays an inhabited music, mixed between Maloya and modern folk, carried by her crystalline voice and assertive guitar playing.Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MayaKamatyMathéo TecherMathéo Techer grew up in a family of musicians, rocked by local and international music. He entered the CRR at age seven and then, with a Diploma in Musical Studies and a Bachelor's degree in hand, he moved to Boston, where he continued his musical training at Berklee College of Music. Mathéo surrounded himself with musician friends to present a project consisting entirely of original compositions, which blends modern jazz with the world of pop and electronic music.Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/matheotechermusic/Edouard LauretEdouard Lauret grew up in a family of musicians from Reunion Island. Guitarist and drummer in several bands (Maya Kamaty, Andemya ...), he started to work with various production studios as an arranger and a composer in Montpellier, France. He specialized in world and electronic music. He works now for My Shared Studio and wants to share his audio skills with you.Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/larlikSurprise! Another famous musician will join the MSS collective. It will feature a musical collaboration for the Black Diamond and Champagne Diamond rewards. He / she will be announced during the campaign!Big thanks to the musicians who contributed to the production of this Kickstarter video! In order of appearance in the video:Edouard Lauret: KalimbaJulien Rivière: Guitar Emy Potonié: SaxophonesGermain Lebot: PercussionsBastien Picot: VocalsJulien Didier: BassCo-composers: Baptiste Janvore and all the musicians.Composition powered by My Shared StudioAll the tracks have been recorded in collaboration remotely with My Shared Studio!Other thanks: - Fabrice Lau, for the shots in Réunion Island.- Morgan Dufour, Gaëtan Theyssier, Audio Workshop Montpellier recording studio.

record.Creator: Lattepanda
record.Title: LattePanda 3 Delta - Faster than Ever, Still Pocket-sized
record.Text: LattePanda 3 Delta features the latest Intel 11th generation mobile quad-core processor N5105 with up to 2.9GHz burst frequency. Compared to its previous generation, the CPU speeds up to 2x faster, and the GPU speeds up to 3x faster. With so excellent performance, you can use it to watch 4K HDR videos smoothly and even play some heavy games.In addition, we make every effort to keep almost the same connectors and layout , which will simplify your projects’ making, migrating and upgrading.More memory means more efficient multitasking. LattePanda 3 Delta uses 2933MHz high-frequency LPDDR4 RAM — up to 8GB, 2x larger than the previous generation — for a superfast, smooth performance whether you’re loading a large amount of web pages in Chrome, or running multiple virtual machines.We also double the storage — up to 64GB — for more software and data can be installed without any external storage.LattePanda 3 Delta is compatible with both Windows 10 and Linux OS.Windows 10 has a perfect peripheral driver, software compatibility and development ecosystem, making it the most suitable to develop GUI applications, while Linux is better for microservice applications. It is worth mentioning that Windows 11 can also be run on LattePanda 3 Delta. You can select various OS freely based on your project.LattePanda 3 Delta uses WIFI 6 whose transfer speed is 2.7 times faster than WIFI5. It is also equipped with a USB 3.2 gen2 x1 port that has an ultra-high bandwidth, delivering up to 10Gb/s of throughput which is twice faster than USB3.2 gen1 x1 (previously known as USB3.0).Besides, LattePanda 3 Delta has a Gigabit Ethernet port onboard, which can connect to the Internet at extremely high speed.LattePanda 3 Delta uses M.2 B Key instead of M.2 E Key, and can connect to 4G or 5G module.  You can access to the Internet anywhere, anytime.The improvement of both wire and wireless transfer will bring you extremely fast transfer speed experience.No matter what operating system you use, the blue screen or crash is inevitable. To make the system recover itself without any human intervention, we add a “Watchdog Timer”. When some problems occur, LattePanda 3 Delta will restart automatically and go back to work normally.We also add the auto power-on function. When the power goes off , no matter in emergency or under normal conditions, the system will boot up automatically once the power is back on.We call these two functions "unattended operation", and hope you can use the board with ease.For those applications relying on battery, independent control of the power of all the USB ports and other power connectors are essential.  Now LattePanda 3 Delta has made it possible. You can control the USB power and 5V power ON or OFF based on your project.The cooling fan of LattePanda 3 Delta has been redesigned, featuring 50% larger cooling area.  The resulting gain in cooling capacity ensures LattePanda 3 Delta best performance all the time. LattePanda Delta 3 has 2-channel audio output with 2W amplifier. Now you can directly connect two speakers to hear the wonderful sound.We developed a variety of expansion board, such as UPS, RS232, RS485, etc. All of them are carefully designed and tested, allowing you to quickly build projects.We’ve also customized a variety of enclosures, cameras, and touch screens, making it possible for you to focus on stunning ideas.This UPS hat is an uninterruptable power supply expansion board  specially designed for LattePanda 3 Delta. It would provide steady power supply when a sudden power outage happened,  to avoid system damage and data loss and improve your project's security level. This IPS touch display has 1024 x 600 resolution and high color saturation, which provide excellent picture for you. It adopts eDP interface, capacitive touch pannel, and is perfectly compatible with LattePanda 3 delta.Due to the extremely thin thickness, it can be easily embedded in your device, which will be your best chocie for the GUI and portable projects.This IPS touch display has 3840 * 2160 ultra high resolution and HDR feature, which can present you all the details with extremely vivid colors and delicate pictures, present the real world to the utmost extent on a 12.5” screen. It supports up to 10 touch-points, bringing you an extremely touch experience!This display provide two USB Type C and one mini HDMI port, which ensure the best compatibility with LattePanda 3 Delta and other devices.We have a strong supportive commucity, where makers, developers, companies and other enthusiastic users share their ideas, projects, problems and tutorials. With these combined strength, no project is out of reach!Our forum is daily updated with new posts, threads, while our blog share LattePanda projects and news in time. In addition, our wiki docs provide detailed  guides and documentations. Besides, on our github, You can also find all the resources you need, such as 3D files, BIOS files, drivers and etc. Our social world is abundant as well, you can interactive with us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram.

record.Creator: Alex
record.Title: Lying Down Desk
record.Text: I have chronic back issues and have dreamed of lying down while using a computer for years. Yet the only option I could find to buy cost a few grand. Last year, I designed my own, got a prototype made, and have been using it for six months. Now, I want others to be able to have a Lying Down Desk too.I've had problems with my back since I was a teenager, which included surgery. Thankfully, I am still quite physically able, but sitting or standing for more than a short period of time are a big problem for me. I can run, climb, do backflips, etc, but chairs are painful.For years I've been trying to find a way to use a computer lying down, yet all I could find that already existed were some expensive models based on reclining dentist chairs with extendable apertures.Then, I had an idea: put a monitor under a table, facing the floor. It's simple, but I couldn't find it already done or available online. I tried it out using my tablet, a cardboard box with a hole in it, and a couple of chairs:I sketched a design for a desk, asked a friend to make it, and have been using it for half a year. It’s been as good as I imagined it might be, and I’m in much less pain than before. And I’ve only come close to falling asleep in a meeting once!Now, I want to make it available to as many people as possible, and thought Kickstarter would be the best way to get the first set of orders. The Lying Down Desk is primarily aimed at anyone with physical impairments which affect sitting, such as upper and lower back issues. That said, I suspect there will also be a few unimpaired chair users who would also find lying down more comfortable.Most tables are about 80cm high, so to get the monitor to be at the right height, there is a hole in the table and a shelf-like unit placed on top of a table which has the monitor installed beneath it. This top unit allows the monitor to be about 95cm from the floor so that it is about 75cm from the user’s eyes. The user has a keyboard either on their lap or on the floor, my recommendation is a split keyboard with half on either side of the hips on the floor. This does mean that the user has to be able to type without seeing the keyboard – or they have to set up a periscope or video feed to see their hands!I do not yet have a finalised design with an agreed person to make it -- I am in discussions with a couple of potential makers. So you will receive a desk which matches the design specification, but will probably be a different colour, style, etc, than the CAD image or my prototype.If you see this and think "oh, I'll just make my own" -- well that's great, and I'm going to make a PDF document with design, guide to making it, accessories, etc. My main aim is to get desks into the world, not be filthy rich. With the PDF, you can DIY or hire someone to make it bespoke for you.I do have a patent pending on this design, so it would be an infringement for someone else to make and sell this design at a profit. 1 licence would come with the PDF so that someone can lawfully make it for you. If you are someone who makes desks and you want to make and sell the Lying Down Desk, please get in touch and we can explore working together!I already have a finished design and a complete prototype, so am ready to go to potential makers to get quotes and discuss designs, materials and timelines.  Timeline: I've planned for three months to find and finalise a manufacturer(s), three months for manufacture and delivery, and three months safety time.If it turns out that the tables cost less to make than I am budgeting for, then I will use the surplus to give away some desks for free to people who couldn't afford to buy one.With the Desk will come a PDF that includes:Typing is obviously a big deal for using a computer. You have to be able to generally type without looking to use it while lying down. If you can already do this, then it will just take a couple of days to get used to it. The only problem is when you first lie down, or when you move your hand between mouse and keyboard, you have to find your place again. Most of the time it's alright, but sometimes I hit the wrong key and have to figure out where my fingers are and re-place them. It's pretty alright though -- maybe sometime I will do a demo video showing me typing and swapping in realtime!Each desk will be adjusted to the height of the user for the standing surface.  A standing desk surface should be at or just below elbow height, so that the elbow is at 90-95 degrees.  After the Kickstarter is completed, I will contact backers to get everyone's details. You can either measure your elbow height yourself or plug your height into this size guide for an estimate: https://www.ergotron.com/tools/workspace-plannerIf this Kickstarter gets completed, then I'll be really happy that I designed something that other people use!Hopefully, I will also continue to make and sell more Lying Down Desks and set up as a small business. This initial set of orders will allow me to establish a relationship with one or more cabinet makers who can continue to make them as orders come in. If it goes well, I will also expand to be able to sell just the top unit, so that someone can use a desk they already have or buy a second-hand one, and the 2-in-1 Model, which is just for standing and lying, which I expect some people might want because it takes up less space and they already have a table. If it goes well, I'll incorporate as a B Corporation, a type of social enterprise which is about positive social impact and not just profit. I care about disability justice and will be glad to make a project that can help people be in less pain. Anything we do to reduce chronic pain, impairments and disabilities and make people's lives better is a win.I care about poverty and economic inequality, and do not like the fact that in our current economic system, people without money have to go without. Nobody should live without their basic needs being met, and if that means needing a Lying Down Desk to be able to use a computer, then these should be available! I will make sure that some Lying Down Desks will be available for free for people or organisations who cannot afford them.I care about the natural world. As well as political efforts I am involved in to reduce ecological destruction caused by human activity, when making desks I will investigate how this can be done with as little ecological impact as possible. This will include either reclaimed wood or sustainably sourced wood, and in the future I might also look into using existing or second-hand tables. FAQs- What exactly will it look like? Don't know exactly. It will be the same 3-in-1 design as shown in the CAD images and photos of the prototype, but it may be a different colour, have different legs, etc. If there are colour choices, I will ask everyone for their preferred colour. - I can just make it myself? Quite! I support this, I like the idea of people making something I designed or modifying the design. If you want to just copy it, nothing stopping you and I don't mind. To make it easy for you, I've prepared a PDF which has drawings of the design, a guide for making it, and a list of all the accessories, and my tips on using the desk, which I think is fair to sell for a small amount.- What else would I need? As well as the desk (and a computer!), you would need a monitor to have in the desk and a keyboard and mouse to use while below the desk. If people want, I can buy those in bulk and bundle them together with delivery of the desk to save you the effort (which everyone would have to pay for!).If you are going to swap between lying and standing/sitting a lot, I would recommend having a keyboard and mouse set that stays on the floor, and a keyboard and mouse set that stays on top of the desk. That way you don't have to keep picking and moving a keyboard and mouse! I have the split keyboard on the floor and an easy bluetooth keyboard on top of the desk.- Bit expensive? I think it's a fair price. It's a higher price than a standard desk because it is two components, almost like a shelf or coffee table on top of a regular desk. The price is comparable to an electric motor desk that swaps between sitting and standing.  That being said, I would love for there to be a cheaper version in the future.- I'm not in GB? Get the PDF Design download to either make it yourself (either DIY or take the design to someone to make it bespoke). Or if enough people are interested, then we could try finding someone who would make a set of them to make it easier. - What about accessories etc? Buy: monitor plus keyboard, these may be a bundle if people want it to see if we can get them cheaper. Additional things, USB extenders, mouse, etc, I have suggestions which will be in the PDF.- Won't it look a bit weird in the office? lol.- What about using a webcam? If you're happy to be on video lying down, then you could get a webcam to use face-down by the monitor. - What's in the PDF? The PDF which comes with the desk includes: a full list of accessories, eg keyboard, mouse, cables and tips about how to use the desk. The DIY PDF Download also includes design images and a guide for how to make it.- The 2-in-1 Lying/Standing Design? This isn't available at the moment, though in the future I hope to be able to sell it. However it is included in the DIY PDF Download if you want to make it yourself!- how is the monitor attached? Using a standard mount. They are pretty solid and you can always give it a tug and a wiggle to check it is solid.

record.Creator: Vassilissa Gugia
record.Title: Building a Prototype for the Roll&Glow Roller Set
record.Text: It's no secret that women spend hours doing their hair. Washing, brushing, styling, and hopefully maintaining their hair, just to do it over again. The cycle of rinse and repeat. The Roll&Glow will cut the time it takes to style your hair and give you the ability to move around while your hair is getting styled. Almost every time you do your hair you have to stand or sit in one area for a long period of time. With the Roll&Glow that will be the problem of yesterday. Everyone wants an easier way to style their hair with minimal hassle, the Roll&Glow does that. I've watched countless videos of women doing their hair and I know this would benefit all of us. My own experience as a child and my mother doing my hair, or even as an adult dealing with my natural hair sparked my interest in improving the tools we were given. I want women and children around the world to enjoy doing their hair. Meet the Rollers The funding will go into assembling prototypes. The mechanical and electrical engineers focusing on the wireless aspect of the Roll&Glow. They will be looking for the best material to make it lightweight so it doesn't weigh down on you and a way to create it with minimal noise. The rollers will distribute room temperature air, so you don't have to worry about your hair getting caught on fire. There will also be a screen/fan guard in the middle to prevent your hair from getting caught in the fan. There will be different size rollers, so the styles you can create are limitless.The rollers will focus on the section of the, hair unlike the hooded and handheld dryers, while working from the inside and pushing out air, giving you the assurance that the inside part will be dry, so the style can come out how it was meant to be. With your support, we can make this a reality improving the hair process one head at a time.                       It can all be so simple, just Roll&Glow! Meet the creator I was born in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, I came to the states with my mother and brother when I was 6 years old in the year 2004. Back at home, my hair experience was something out of a horror movie, and it didn't help that God made me tender-headed. I still remember the first perm I got, I think I was four years old, and everyone in the compound came to see me cry out my eyes while I was getting my hair done. My mother will tell you she hated doing my hair because I would fight and fuss and she just didn't have time for that. The perm was used to help "manage" my hair and make it easier. The road to false beauty was paved by perms, and my mother and I fell victim to it. The perm didn't help my tender-headedness but it made my hair straight and society loved that. Fast-forward to spring break of 2015 one of my friends convinced me to go natural and I declined several times until I gave in and said "why not". This was the best decision of my life not only did it connect me to other young black women it connected me back to my roots! That same day, I did my big chop I convinced my mother and little sister, who had no say, to chop their hair off also. I've been natural ever since with my ups and downs and I have learned a lot. My experience has led me to where I am now with the Roll&Glow. I see how things can be improved. I want to take on the challenges of making those changes. Hair is a big way that a lot of people express themselves and with a handy tool and the right products we can create endless styles.

record.Creator: TOPWORK TEAM
record.Title: BEATDROP: Place-N-Play Induction Wireless Speaker for Phones
record.Text: Sometimes the speaker on your phone just isn't loud enough if you're in a large meeting or people are sitting at a distance.And what about when you're cooking with the hood fan on or other kitchen appliances making so much noise.  How can you hear your cooking tutorial on your ipad?Test Video:Meet BeatDrop, the best induction speaker/sound amplifier out there!  It uses a groundbreaking technology that instantly plays music, videos, or calls from your smartphone at a louder volume and higher quality, while keeping all your devices charged wirelessly at the same time - with no Bluetooth, Wi-Fi or any other kind of connection. Simply lay and play, and you can immediately hear songs, news, or calls loud and clear without draining your phone’s battery.No more troublesome syncing, pairing or wiring. Yes, we’re welcoming you to a new world where music no longer has borders! It also doubles as a power bank, an alarm clock, and a Bluetooth speaker when you need it.Instantly and automatically amplify the sound of any phone on the sensor contact. BeatDrop is a clever application of electromagnetic induction that applies Faraday’s Law, which is also known as “Near Field Audio”. The speaker contains a piece of transducer that creates a magnetic field and converts energy into electrical signals. When you place your phone on two sensor contacts of the speaker, the sound from your device will be immediately amplified.Whether you’re chatting on Facetime, watching a cooking tutorial in the kitchen, or watching TV on your phone, the phone is charging at an ergonomic viewing angle, giving you a more comfortable experience.Keeps powering up your phone, so you don't have to worry about your battery dying while you are chatting, watching videos or enjoying music. It's phone case friendly!BeatDrop utilizes two overlapping charging coils to maximize the charging area to ensure the phone will charge at full speed in both vertical and horizontal positions.BeatDrop works with all Qi-compatible phones.  It's easy to place your phone down with one hand and charge it fully within 2.5 hours.The tilted surface makes BeatDrop a perfect stand to prop up your phone.Another HUGE benefit of BeatDrop is that it holds phones and tablets of any size, even the ones that are much larger than it. Whether it's iPhone, Samsung, LG or iPad, everything fits.Keep all of your electronics charged in one easy place. BeatDrop charges other devices or accessories through its USB charging port.BeatDrop is equipped with a 5W 5V/1A Type-A output port, and can quickly charge devices with wires like a power bank. It will charge your iPhone 13 from zero to 100% in approximately 3 hours. Get the play time you want with a 2500mAh rechargeable battery. You can enjoy about 20 hours of music at 50% volume.You can use the default music of the speaker to wake you up.You can also use the music from your phone instead and keep the phone charging wirelessly at the same time.Upgrade your old bedside companion, leave stress and your phone behind, manage your life much easier.Another benefit of the BeatDrop is that you can switch to Bluetooth mode and amplify your video or audio. Whether you’re listening to music, watching videos, or making speakerphone calls, it lets you crank up the volume.This all-terrain speaker provides rich bass without distortion, even at the highest volume. It’s built to emit an extremely high sound quality that sounds just like high-quality speakers.BeatDrop has been tested and is proven to deliver stunning sound with enhanced bass, tight mids, and crystal clear highs without distortion at any volume.We built BeatDrop to look sleek and cool so it goes great with your modern décor and fits in anywhere.  Put it in the kitchen, by your bed, or on your desk, in your office, and it will look incredible and sound amazing!We come back again, The first product Topwork workstation won people's back. 2276 backers pledged $272,239 to help bring this project to life. Creation and innovation are what we pursue. People will never give up on discovering and trying new technological stuff. Our designers put so much effort into the development and innovation of electronic devices and their accessories to satisfy the great demand for new technologies. We will always go before people find out what they need. We’d like to invite you to join us again and create new changes to our lives. Test Video

record.Creator: SciLynk
record.Title: SciLynk: A New Era for Science
record.Text: “The hardest problems of pure and applied science can only be solved by the open collaboration of the worldwide scientific community.” (Kenneth G. Wilson, Nobel Laureate in Physics). Dr. Wilson was without a doubt on to something. However, even with the creation of the internet, a global collaborative research community has never been created before. Sure, there are online databases of scientists and papers out there, but there’s no global vibrant community for ALL science-lovers to communicate, interact and share research.And that’s where SciLynk comes in - it is YOUR complete science academia, whether you’re a student, professor, scientist, or casual science enthusiast. We believe by building a bridge between industry professionals and prospective future researchers, we can create a bright future for the world of science. If you are a student seeking to connect with industry professionals, SciLynk can do it. If you are a researcher looking to track research metrics and papers, SciLynk can do it. SciLynk can truly do it all - and we are extremely proud that our network was built meticulously around the feedback of dozens of researchers and students. The feedback we have gotten from them has taken months to develop, and finally, create the best possible platform tailored to their needs. We sincerely hope you can join us in this journey of building the most extensive science network out there!Our goal is to create an open-access network where the physical barriers of institutions no longer separate the most brilliant minds in the world. Imagine a world where the research departments of Stanford, Harvard, MIT, Oxford, and more, are all connected; where they can share research and find the discoveries of tomorrow. Where students worldwide can share their ideas, ask questions, and further their scientific knowledge.Not just a network, but a hub that embodies the purest values of research, collaboration, education, and connection.Imagine John, a curious student looking to get involved with the world of science. He goes to a massive site full of researchers and papers. He tries to create an account, only to see that he cannot access the network without being affiliated with a research institution. He is unable to verify that he is a researcher, and isn’t even able to access the site content - all because he was just a student ☹️Luckily for John, Scilynk, unlike other science networks, won’t be restricted by your level of education or research. We believe the best way to spark students’ interest is through interactions with professionals in their fields. Everyone should be able to access open research papers, and viewing research profiles shouldn’t be disallowed just because you are not a Ph.D.Open research means EVERYONE should be able to read and learn from papers, not just researchers, which unfortunately isn’t implemented today. SciLynk will fix that through our free-to-use science platform.One of our personal favorite features on the site is the gamification system. It combines an element of fun with profound research and collaboration and has been custom-developed using feedback from scientists and professors. In essence, the system uses a well thought-out list of triggers to award different types of points, scores, badges, ranks, and more! The system counts several different points, points for legitimate research and indices for industry professionals, and credits for STEM beginners using the site and collaborating with one another. Points can be used to buy perks and badges on the site. We believe that combining our science platform with a gamification system will allow our users to legitimately enjoy using our site, versus it being a dull hub of articles!Although we want this platform to be available to everyone, we want to ensure our researchers have the best user experience possible on SciLynk. After surveying several professors and scientists, we noticed an overall trend about their dissatisfaction with research tracking methods. Large databases use aggressive web scraping and often upload duplicate papers, wrong citation counts, and sometimes even upload the wrong paper to the wrong author. When we asked one of these researchers how many papers they’ve published, they gave us a number in the low 100s. However, their ResearchGate and Google Scholar profiles yielded 400-500 more results. That’s pretty damn inaccurate!How can we possibly fix a problem that companies as large as Google aren’t able to fix? The answer lies in using non-commercial databases that do not profit from the data they collect and use more accurate tracking methods. SciLynk plans to change this - Cambia, the creator of Lens.org, our official Partner, is one of the world’s largest and most accurate scholarly databases!Remember our good friend John? Now that he’s gotten a bit more familiarized with the science community, he thinks it's time to level up his game - internship time! Finding a lab internship wasn’t as easy as he thought.  It meant scouring the internet for contact information and applications, sending hundreds of emails, and then hoping for a couple of replies. Not efficient.With SciLynk, these prehistoric methods are going to be a thing of the past. With simple searches and mutual connections, you will be able to quickly contact professors and researchers and send over your information/resume after introducing yourself! Almost all your relevant information will already be saved to your profile, so you don’t need to worry about copy-pasting and editing dozens of messages to different people.SciLynk is built off the uber-important human medium: Connection. Online networking has shown tremendous potential, and with that, we have innovated, thought, and put countless hours into the development of our features. On SciLynk, users will be able to join domain-specific groups, ask and answer questions with our advanced discussion forums, share research papers and track important research metrics, message individuals, and/or participate in group threads, view their activity feeds to see the content that matters to them, and so much more! In addition, we already have plans for podcasts, workspaces, and in a sense, anything the community wants. Science lovers should have a platform where the possibility for collaborative scientific discovery and exploration is customizable and unique.With SciLynk, connecting is as simple as a click:We hope to enable meaningful connections between students and researchers to expand their knowledge, and researchers can pass down their knowledge. We also hope to see researchers worldwide collaborating to further progress in science and students working together with others, creating long-lasting bonds.SciLynk features several science-specific groups and subgroups known as IntraLynks, in which users can join and share updates, media, documents, and more. Users can also create groups, which act as communities of their own with several components to help users communicate with one another!SciLynk also features discussion forums, where users can ask, answer, subscribe to, save, and create meaningful discussions. This system features a nested reply system to organize answers and help users individually reply to specific topics. SciLynk’s forums are a great way for users to effectively support each other, whether it is a topic you are struggling to learn in college or an advanced research question pertaining to a paper.SciLynk was co-founded by high-school students Arnav Chakravarthy & Arvind Kumar. Two close friends and science enthusiasts, both co-founders are driven to scale SciLynk to be the standard of open research and the go-to platform for anything science. We (Arnav and Arvind) have worked with several researchers and students to get the platform to where it is today, and give our heartfelt thanks to everyone who was with us for the journey.Arnav, the CEO, is a 15 year old sophomore at Homestead High School. He wants to pursue a career in Biotechnology/Bioengineering and loves reading about general Biology and Chemistry. He manages all aspects of the company, specifically the development and outreach. He spends his free time reading, developing, playing basketball, and watching too much TV. Arnav also happens to be the much cooler co-founder ;)Arvind, the COO, is a 16 year old Junior at Lynbrook High School. He honestly doesn’t know what he wants to do yet, but he knows it will pertain to tech and medicine or law. He loves playing soccer and reading science fiction books, his favorite being ender's game. He manages the business side of SciLynk including, revenue management, advertising, partnerships, and general operations.

record.Creator: Craig A. Brice
record.Title: The Web Wallet
record.Text: Hi, I'm Craig and welcome to my Kickstarter! This is the official launch of my new company - Tessellation Studio - and my first product - the Web Wallet.My profession and my passion is additive manufacturing - you might know it as 3D printing. Currently I am a professor teaching additive manufacturing to the next generation of engineers. My students frequently express interest in starting their own companies and launching their products through Kickstarter. As much as I wanted to help, I didn't have the experience to guide them. So I decided I would run a Kickstarter myself so I could learn the process and pass on the knowledge I gained along the way. How did I come up with the Web Wallet? Well, quite simply, I wanted to put an additively manufactured product in everyone's pocket. What better way to do that than to create a stylish, one-of-a-kind wallet that everyone wants in their pocket? In the manufacturing world we talk about "form, fit, and function." Throughout most of my career I have focused on function - performance is king, especially in the aerospace world (and rightly so). For my product, however, I wanted "form" to be front and center. First and foremost, it had to be visually appealing. I spent a few months sketching my idea on paper, erasing it, re-sketching, erasing again, and on and on until I landed on the design that a) appealed to my asthetic and b) was both additively manufacturable and economically viable. Meeting both requirements was more challenging than I thought it would be. The result is the Web Wallet.I then had to turn my pencil sketch into a 3D model using computer aided design software. Next, I had to turn my model into a solid titanium part using a metal powder 3D printer. Of course that was just one piece of the wallet - I also had to design the two carbon fiber parts that hold the cards, the clip that provides tension and the pieces that fasten it all together.Additive manufacturing was born out of the world of prototyping. So I prototyped my initial design and pieced together an 80% solution with machined aerospace-grade carbon fiber, off-the-shelf high-strength steel fasteners, and spring steel. The result is shown in the video below. The wallet holds about four credit cards, one driver's license or ID card, and one insurance card. This was designed around how much I typically carry in my wallet. You can carry less, though you need about 4 cards minimum to hold tension on the spring. You cannot put more than about 6 cards in the wallet, as there is a set distance between the front titanium piece and the back carbon fiber piece. There is still some engineering to do for the final production item - a few modifications to the carbon fiber pieces, custom steel fasteners for the front, and a few other minor design tweaks. The prototype is good - the final design will be even better.I have tested some finishing options like iso-polishing and anodized tinting. Some people prefer the as-printed finish that clearly shows the layer lines. Others like the polished or tinted options where the layer lines are smoothed out.  And because we are using 3D printing, we can do fun things like customize the front panel with your name, initials, or other design of your choosing.The Web Wallet is only the beginning. I have other high-end consumer products in the works that will follow. The proceeds from this Kickstarter will help establish my business and grow my product line. In addition to carrying around the Web Wallet, you can wear our company swag to show your support. Check us out on tessellation-studio.com and follow us on Twitter so you are kept up to date on new product offerings.Oh, and in case you were wondering, the standard 3D printing computer file is  ".stl" - which stands for standard tessellation language. A solid model is converted into an .stl file by covering the surface of the object with a tessellation of triangles. Hence the name and the logo. And now you know!

record.Creator: Remie Mayfallia
record.Title: Securmo: An On Demand Security Guard Hiring Tech Application
record.Text: Click To Access Securmo Interactive Prototype  We believe it's essential to implement and maintain security measures by hiring private guards to protect yourself, your family, and your assets and avoid criminal attacks.It’s highly significant to implement and maintain security measures by hiring private guards for protecting yourself, your family, and your assets to avoid criminal attacks.Every day while skimming through the newspaper, we find headlines of robbing, mass shooting, and female harassment cases. These are just some of the reasons why we need private security services. There’s a lot more.These heart-throbbing headlines could have been completely different if proper security measures were taken. We cannot alter our past actions, but we can surely make our future safer and better.We aim to build a secure community by providing a security guard app, Securmo. It’s a platform where every person can hire one of our guards for a wedding, birthday party, business events, and for their home or family’s security. This app has been designed out of a strong desire to establish a safe environment where people can freely enjoy peace of mind knowing that their hard-earned money and loved ones are protected.We are dedicated to offering people a reliable and easy-to-use security application that will provide them protection for everyday life.“I am Remie Mayfallia, the CEO & Founder of Securmo. The story begins with my strong desire to establish a secure society for everyone where we don’t have to worry about our business, property, and family all the time. A lot of negative thoughts come up every day because we live in a society and age where we don’t feel protected. Therefore, I feel the necessity to take security services for my son and family if they’re traveling somewhere. But then a thought crosses my mind that this issue is not limited to a single house and as I have a family, I can sense the pain a person experiences if something happens to his/her loved ones. That was the moment when I decided to provide people with an easily accessible security guard app so that not only big corporations but every common individual can get security services whenever they need them for a very reasonable and fair price.“Saba, Lead Designer of Securmo“Hey, I‘m Saba! I am the UI UX designer & working as a lead Graphic designer for Securmo. Here my role was to turn this amazing and unique idea of Securmo into a reality. I enjoy seeing this project comming together from start to this point and working on all type of UI assets for Securmo: Wireframes, Prototypes, Social media posts —whatever designs we have needed, I have done it!I revel in the opportunity to work creatively every day, and I enjoy working on a team of vibrant, motivated and talented people who give  all of their %100 best working on their part for Securmo and desire to establish a secure society where nobody has to worry about his/her security. We hope to bring Securmo to you guys soon. Much more to come!”George Mico, the Director of Marketing “Hi, I’m George Mico, the Director of Marketing at Securmo, where I oversee the development of the existing client base and manage our marketing communication strategy. I also create content on our website, blog, social media, press releases, and email campaigns.I've previously worked as a digital marketer for various companies, where I developed my skills in digital marketing strategy and execution. My area of specialization is in strategic planning, brand communication, product marketing, and social media marketing. I am a highly motivated and results-driven marketer with a proven track record of successfully implementing marketing campaigns.Securmo is one of the fastest-growing mobile security companies, and I am delighted to be part of this team. We sure have an exciting future ahead of us!”We all want to be safe and at ease!Securmo is here to help you with that. We want to create a safe and inclusive community where everyone can experience world-class security and protection, designed for them - and this starts with an understanding of their everyday issues.Your safety is our priority. We are determined to examine and verify the background documents of every guard to provide reliable and secure services. We will give proper training to the guards regarding the safest and effective ways to safeguard you and your family.Securmo helps you pick qualified candidates based on their qualifications and reviews from other customers in a transparent feedback system. We strive to build a trustworthy model, where the customers have control of everything during the hiring process of security guards.It’s a user-friendly app where you can instantly request a security guard for any occasion or everyday travel. You can enjoy life to its fullest with no gravest threat to life.Using Securmo app is a piece of cake.Let's take a quick look at its steps.Begin by creating an account.You can then see a list of nearby guards on your screen.Select the one around you and view the guard's profile as well as reviews.Confirm your request and pay for it.You can then track him or chat with your selected guard until he reaches your location.That's all. Every individual can easily access the app and request the services of a security guard in a few minutes.Anyone can hire our high-quality security guards instantly.There is no need to wait in person for an interview with a security company, nor do you need to meet criteria or undergo background checks. It’s safe and easy. Use the app to connect with the guards, view their work history and skills, then decide who will receive the job.We are looking to raise $500,000 that will cover the cost of tools used to educate our team of security guards about the professional and effective ways of protection. We will promote this platform at the international level through marketing and launching strategies with the extra money. The raised funds will also go directly into finishing the development and management team of the application software.With your funding, we will be able to better train and educate our guards and provide you with exceptional and long-term security services as we bring Securmo to market.We are offering some exciting prizes for the backers to express our gratitude.● Pledge $10Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first month.● Pledge $50Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first month.Also, you will receive a 50% discount for the second month.● Pledge $100Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first 2 months.● Pledge $200Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first 2 months. Also, you will get access to our premium guard services, where you can begin as a five-star user.● Pledge $300Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first 2 months. Also, you will get access to our premium guard services, where you can begin as a five-star user. In addition, you'll be allowed to set up premium accounts for two of your family members for free for the first 2 months of app usage.We want to ensure that we are taking every possible step for the complete security of your family.Share our app with your friends to help us protect every ordinary human as every life is worth defending.With your funding, we will be able to better train and educate our guards as well as provide you with exceptional and long-term security services.  C L I C K T O F O L L O W I N S T G R A M  C L I C K T O F O L L O W T W I T T E R  V I S I T O U R W E B S I T E

record.Creator: Kimmie Schiffel
record.Title: Bottled & Blended
record.Text: Having used essential oils for several years and surrounding myself with a community of like minded individuals who have countless recipes and stories to share, I've found myself with an ever-growing collection of blends captured in screenshots, post-it notes, reference materials, and Pinterest pins. As a software Product Manger by day, I've found myself dreaming up the perfect digital solution for saving, searching, and, most importantly, sharing my favorite recipes and blends. For over a year it was merely a dreamy "what if" conversation amongst friends that gained enough traction and support for me to go all in. I've spent the last several months writing requirements, interviewing development teams, and finalizing the design of an app that I cannot wait to give back to the essential oil community. It's a beautiful thing when two worlds collide. Save all of your favorite blends and recipes in a single place. No more scrolling through screenshots, searching Pinterest boards, or digging through post-it notes stashed in a drawer.Bottled & Blended allows you to create a recipe box with your favorite blends by capturing photos, sources, ingredients, and notes for every recipe that supports you and your family. We want to make it quick and easy to find the blend you're looking for. Robust search options not only allow you to search and filter by ingredients and categories, but also by keywords within your custom notes section. Your recipes are YOURS to save and share. We only surface search results for recipes you have created or saved into your own box, ensuring you have the freedom to notate exactly what each blend supports, uncensored.Think of this as your family recipe box handed down from generation to generation.Arguably the most important feature of the app for us is the ability to share. The foundation of the natural wellness community is the passion to share experience and knowledge. How many times have you been asked "what oils do you use for this?" or "what was that amazing blend you were telling me about for that?" We've designed this app so that you can quickly share your blends and recipes with anyone - even if they do not have the app - via standard text, email, and copy/paste functionality. We also make it seamless for the recipient to save recipes that are shared with them directly into their own app for future reference. Click on any oil or ingredient within a recipe to add it to your wishlist. Pull up your list when shopping so you never forget an oil again.When you grab that missing oil add it to your inventory with a single tap so you know what you've already purchased and have on hand. We mean it when we say we couldn't make this app a reality without you and we want to thank you for your generosity and belief in our dream.We worked hard to create rewards that would maximize funds raised while giving back to this amazing community. I'd be lying if I said I didn't have an absolute blast working on these designs and hope you love them as much as I do.Rewards will be fulfilled as soon as our project is fully funded. We accounted for unknown shipping delays in our delivery estimate, but plan to deliver as soon as we possibly can!Be sure to follow us on Instagram as we have lots of surprises and giveaways up our sleeves to thank you for sharing our story. We really couldn't do this without you!

record.Creator: Warmee
record.Title: Warmee - App-Enabled Blanket
record.Text: Maybe you’re used to piling on blankets, layering on clothes, or cranking up your heater, but with Warmee, staying warm has never been easier. Tuck into Warmee’s cushy smart throws, blankets, and mattress pads, all fitted with our ultra-thin Invisiwire heating technology. Coupled with temperature control from our mobile app, Warmee brings comfort and convenience to your home in one snuggly bundle.We believe that when you’re comfortable, you can do anything. Or nothing. Sometimes that’s just as fun.Our patented Invisiwire technology is a game changer. All Warmee products are outfitted with this technology, the first to use spiderweb-thin heating wires that are crimp-free and can hardly be felt. Compare our Invisiwire fibers to other competitors' and you won't feel pins or needles with Warmee. Made from stainless steel and insulated with a Teflon-like material called MFA, they're even resistant to moisture and oxidation. Inconvenience shouldn’t get in the way of rest and relaxation. That’s why Warmee products aren’t just cozy, they’re also made to be as convenient as possible. The blankets are reversible and machine washable, so you won’t break a sweat getting rid of stains.
