Even struggling to snuggle with your nearest and dearest becomes a thing of the past when the throws are made much larger than those on the market. All in all, Warmee has got you covered.You can rest easy knowing that Warmee is better for the environment and for your wallet. Warmee offers up to ten heat settings, so you can turn down the thermostat and curl up under your Warmee blanket or on your mattress pad while reducing your carbon footprint and lowering heating costs.We’re very determined to help lower emissions that we’re partnering with SeaTrees (https://sea-trees.org/), a non-profit that’s helping reforest the planet’s oceans. When you think about it, turning down the thermostat and snuggling under a Warmee blanket really is a smart way to keep warm and help the planet.Say goodbye to that bulky controller on your bedside. With Warmee, we want to give every customer the power to control their comfort effortlessly. That’s why we powered our products with Wi-Fi technology and a sleek, easy-to-use app, which can be downloaded through the App Store and Google Play. Now, setting your alarm and your Warmee product can all be done through your phone. The Internet makes it infinitely easier to do a lot of things, so shouldn’t relaxing be one of them? Create a more connected home with Warmee’s app where you can control all your Warmee products with just a few taps.Once your Warmee products are set up on the app, you can control the temperature however you like. The app allows you to control the level of heat and its duration. When it comes to a king or queen sized blanket or mattress pad, you can control where the heat will come from, on the left or right side of your bed.All you have to do is to secure the connector and plug it into an outlet while pressing the power button. With the app, you can set up the temperature and time! For ultimate convenience, the app is also compatible with Google Assistant or Alexa, so you can use voice commands to control your products. And with safety features like auto shut-off, you’ll never need to worry about turning your Warmee product off.When you’re all set up on the app, you can keep it out of sight and out of mind. After all, you deserve a break.Temperature is one of the most important factors that impact sleep. Regulation of temperature has been scientifically proven to improve sleep results, increase blood circulation and muscular flexibility. These make Warmee blankets are a great natural solution for certain types of pain relief, to boost your mood, or to simply kick back and relax. Warmee products, developed with the intention of truly innovating the warming experience and the marketplace, were four years in the making. We took our most challenging and creative ideas to our awesome engineering team who spent many hours developing our Invisiwire technology, removing the annoying feel of wires while retaining the same great warmth. The engineering team also designed the control system that gives us state-of-the-art options for the control and safety of the Warmee products. Then we worked with a solid factory team to complete the process and put it all together to build the present, great Warmee experience.Warmee is composed of professionals in Home Textiles, Tech, and Engineering with a combined experience of 75 years in the industry.We are driven to develop products that encourage sustainability and assist in helping people relax. To put it simply, we want our customers to feel more at home, in their homes.With the exciting innovations in home goods now, we felt compelled to develop an all-new, modern collection of heated products that appeals to a new consumer and will change the way they think of electric blankets forever.  And by creating Invisiwire technology, we believe we have accomplished our goal. We can’t wait for you to see (and experience) our products!Partners

record.Creator: David Alexandre
record.Title: SDoky, Knowledge Management and Personal development tool
record.Text:
Throughout the course of our lives, we develop the knowledge necessary to ensure our success. We may see it as the product of chance, but most of the time, that is simply not the case. Our chance for success often depends on various skills that we unconsciously develop, either as a result of our upbringing or our determination to achieve our dreams.

The goal of SDoky – the knowledge management and personal development software – is to help you to gain the necessary skills for professional and personal success. This is what you can achieve with SDoky :HOW TO MANAGE YOUR LIFE PROJECTSHOW TO MANAGE YOUR SKILLS TO BE EFFECTIVE IN WHAT YOU DOHOW TO INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF SUCCESS HOW TO INCREASE YOUR SOCIAL CAPITAL AND USE IT FOR SOCIO-ECONOMIC PRUPOSE  HOW TO AWAKEN YOUR INNER LEADER  HOW IT WORKS ?  1) Download SDoky from the App Store or Google Play, depending on your phone. 2) Open the application and select your language. (Please note that you will receive  the free SDoky e-book in your chosen language.3) Create your account and subscribe.4) Read your e-book and do the exercises regularly to get the most out of them.Short-term benefits:Long-term benefits:This book discusses the process of evaluating and formulating a strategy for success in your life. It invites you to follow step by step the different stages that make up its development process. Thanks to the Knowledge Management and Personal Development software that accompanies it, setting up your life project has never been so easy and accessible.A real operational manual for those who decide to start a business, it is also a reference for all those who wish to succeed in their life project. It explains the procedural logic that will allow you to understand how you can do business without risk and guides you step by step to implement simple practices that will change your life.WHAT DO WE OFFER TO KICKSTARTER MEMBERS WHO SUBSCRIBE TO OUR SERVICES TO SUPPORT OUR PROJECT

record.Creator: mag.consulting
record.Title: AdriBatHic: salt to revive adriatic senses in home bath
record.Text: Have you ever been to Adriatic? Felt the peace of sea, smells, sounds? Loved the summer vibe?Can you imagine taking part of that feeling to your home bath?We created the almost perfect solution for it.AdriBatHic bath salts with local ingredient aromas with origin in 4 different flavours with a limited edition series of sea-fennel, a remarkable plant that is incredible to your skin.Salt is collected in the most northern salt pans in Mediterranean, inside a natural proteced reserve Natura 2000 park Seča Salina with 700 years of salt collecting tradition.The Sečovlje salt pans are the northernmost still functioning salt pans in the Mediterranean area and one of the few salt pans in the world where salt is produced after several centuries-old processes originating from at least the 14th century. Their speciality is that the salt pan workers cultivate petola at the bottom of the crystallization ponds. This is a biosediment which prevents the sea mud merging with the salt and gives the salt numerous microelements and minerals necessary for the human organism. It is cultivated completely through natural crystallization using their bare hands, and the tools and procedures of their ancestors. We use a mix of Salt and Salt flower that is enriched with selected unique local ingredients: olive oil, honey and aromas as sea fennel, lavander, citruses and more. We ad some sparkles with use of sodium.Shubatsu, a cleansing ritual performed by sprinkling salt, is an integral part of the Shinto religion. A significant and visible form of this ritual is when sumo wrestlers sprinkle salt around the fighting ring before a match, to purify the area.All the ingredients are mixed for a prefect balance of enjoyment, enriched with selected music playlists available in the app. Tender to your skin, soothing to your mind, fulfilling for your senses. You can memorize the feelings in memories in your mindfulness journal.Production is environment friendly with respect for tradition and latest science learnings. Packaging is sustainable - paper bags made of residual olive mass, fully recyclabe and FSC certified.This is also an excellent gift or an opportunity to enrich your store. We offer several branding options, cobranding included. Learn full story on www.adribathic.com, fulfillment supported by aprinti.net and cangura.com.

record.Creator: Diego
record.Title: Homesharing
record.Text:
Imagine being in the middle of a big foreign city, having eaten a lot in a good restaurant and being very sleepy. Homesharing is here for you: on this app you can search for other people who will want to make their bed available for you for a short time (half an hour, one hour maximum) !!

Imagine now that you are alone on a Saturday night and want to see a movie in a home, in a family context, with someone else. Homesharing will also allow you to share a seat on the sofa so you can spend a pleasant evening together and maybe find a new friend.

Homesharing is this and much more: dirty public toilets will no longer be a problem, because there will always be someone ready to help you in times of need by opening the bathroom door to you.

Homesharing: because shared is better!!

record.Creator: Peacock Audio
record.Title: PeacockFlight: Professional Monitoring True Wireless Earbuds
record.Text: Unlike other tech manufacturers that put out wireless earbuds as just another product, we at Peacock Audio have dedicated ourselves only to the business of professional Hi-Fi earphones. We don’t make portable batteries or smartwatches. Just amazing sounding audio products. This dedication and experience have allowed us to explore the depths of driver technologies that allow the most efficient and resonant sound outputs.Two years of transducer R&D work has culminated in our new, proprietary biosynthetic diaphragm horn and ultra-powerful 6mm dynamic coil. Our new driver utilizes a next-generation compound diaphragm manufacturing process combined with the strongest ever magnetic system within a nano-dynamic driver housing. The extremely responsive nature of our driver means the overall sound is full and detailed, unparalleled in definition with any other commercial wireless earbud. Our tuning process has ensured a balanced sound that emphasizes strong sub-bass impact, a natural mid-range, and clear treble. These features unite to deliver a design that immerses you in your music, the way it was meant to sound.To achieve the most coherent connection and user experience, the FLIGHT features the latest Qualcomm QCC3040 Bluetooth chipset. The latest iteration of its class, the QCC3040 can bring a more stable connection, support higher-quality music transmission, and improve sound quality performance - all while providing efficient battery management. With Bluetooth 5.2 capability, your phone calls can stay more stable, your games and videos are completely in sync with the audio, and you can enjoy a minimum latency experience.Having worked with numerous professional musicians and sound engineers, we understand that the perfect fit for an earbud is just as crucial as its sound. To guarantee a secure, comfortable fit for every user, we scanned and analyzed hundreds of ears and utilized algorithmic modeling to create a shell shape that best suits the average ear. Medical-grade resin is utilized for each shell for a comfortable and lightweight fit that can be worn for hours on end. Each unit is hand-molded, painted, and polished for the ultimate bespoke experience.FLIGHT is equipped with a 30mAh battery that can provide up to 6 hours of active listening per charge. Furthermore, each FLIGHT comes with a charging case equipped with a 200mAh battery that can extend the usage to 24 hours of active listening or 200 hours of standby time.The FLIGHT is also equipped with Qualcomm’s latest Clear Voice Capture (CVC) 8.0. CVC 8.0 is a noise reduction algorithm that effectively filters out background noise to reduce up to 30dB of unwanted ambient sounds during your phone calls. By accurately calculating the position of the caller in relation to ambient sounds, CVC 8.0 allows a pure sound transmission for cleaner and more audible calls.When FLIGHT is taken out of the charging box, it automatically turns on and connects to the last device used instantly. The super quick and efficient connection mode means less fiddling around on your phone to connect, and more direct listening time to your favorite music. To change or add a new device, simply touch the FLIGHT to easily pair.Capable of fast charge, just 30 minutes of charging can allow up to 24 hours of listening! To maximize the lifespan of FLIGHT, the device features a new overcharge protection battery cell, which means you won’t have to worry about your chargers growing shorter and shorter. And plan to not use the FLIGHT for some period of time? The FLIGHT can fully power off to minimize battery drainage and pick up right where you left off.The FLIGHT is IPX4 water-resistant, meaning it is safe to be used during exercises and light rain and splashes. Whether you are sweating away at the gym or commuting on an outcast day, the FLIGHT is ready to pump you up with your favorite music.Additionally, the Peacock Flight comes with three specifically designed ear tips for use with strenuous exercise - made with medical-grade silicone, these ear tips are ultra-light and safe on the skin. Combined with the custom ergonomic form factor of the shell, the Flight is snug and secure in your ears.  On top of that, we have also designed super-soft anti-irritant ear tips as the campaign add-ons that disperse inner ear pressures to allow long-duration uses without any discomfort to the ear canal.The new upgraded chip is widely compatible with mainstream Bluetooth-enabled mobile phones, computers, and tablet devices. You can easily and quickly pair and connect with any IOS, Android, or Windows device simply by taking the FLIGHT out of its case. It’s the immediate connection you’ve been waiting for!The FLIGHT is equipped with Qualcomm aptX™ capable to provide you with High-resolution sound. The aptX™ is one of the best Bluetooth audio codecs for a low-latency transmission. With one of the best latency and transfer rates (up to 24-bit 96kHz music quality wirelessly), aptX™ allows you to experience high audio quality with more efficient power management, lower delays, and better fault tolerances.We are proud of our beautiful and unique shell designs, which are only made possible by meticulously hand-painting each piece to create true one-of-a-kind artwork. The engineering and tuning process necessitates hand soldering and testing of each driver component to ensure the greatest precision and quality control. In 2018, Linsoul worked in conjunction with  Peacock to release Peacock P1. Continued with the success of Peacock P1, Peacock Flight lands on Kickstarter.We maintain a strong connection with Chinese HiFi brands in order to offer a curated selection of the very best that Chi-Fi has to offer. We also go a step further in providing customization services so you can acquire a uniquely styled or custom-molded IEM.The founder of Linsoul realized that Hifi music listening should be inspirational and modernly stylish. It can be combined with sound quality and stylish to express your music style.Linsoul is a company with over 5 years of experience in HiFi Audio providing the best products from China to the rest of the world and has an outstanding reputation with customers worldwide.  The Peacock FLIGHT comes with a 12 Month Warranty*. Please read the FAQ to learn more about our warranty policy.Enjoy music with unlimited possibilitiesEvery sound originates from the human heart, the human heart moves, the object makes it happen, and the object moves, so the shape is in the sound, the sound is corresponding, and the result is changed; we give music unlimited possibilities.

record.Creator: Graptors
record.Title: Graptors Studs - Winter Lawn Protection, Made Easy
record.Text: Our mission is to offer a secure and simple anchoring solution, to protect your lawn and your lawn covers. Made in Canada, by Canadians.  We, somewhat, have a love/hate relationship with Winter.Graptors Studs are basically pliers, with teeth, on a stud. Like pliers, you press down on the handles to open up the jaw, which is held under tension from the C-shaped fulcrum. When you release it, it bites down on the material you’ve inserted, without piercing and/or tearing it apart. Keep your lawn covers safe and sound. Stop using heavy bricks and damaging nails, which tear it apart and mess up everything. You won't need to buy new lawn covers every year, Graptors Studs anchor them safely and easily. By Fall 2022, we will have the Graptors Studs available everywhere in Canada & America, to protect lawns like yours from Winter. Hi, I'm Etienne, from Quebec, Canada, founder at Graptors. I will be honest ; installing lawn covers used to sucks.In 2019, I was helping my mother install her lawn covers.And like every Fall season, we bought new ones, because the old ones were all torn up. They had so many holes that they weren't going to protect anything. We, then, put heavy bricks on them, and nails through them to try to anchor them to the ground, before the snow rolls in.Though, the wind would most probably mess it all up. We were going through that whole process knowing very well that next fall, we will start all over again, costing hundreds of dollars. It's a very wasteful cycle that only lawn covers manufacturers profits from.Last fall, I was wondering : is there a way for my mom to install lawn covers securily, without tearing them apart, that wouldn't require heavy bricks and damaging nails ? As it turns out, no. So I created Graptors.Wants more Graptors content ? Here's other videos that we got in store for you ! Do you still have questions and/or inquiries ? Send us an email and we will get back to you swiftly :support@graptors.comVisit our website at https://graptors.com/Check out our Facebook Page : https://www.facebook.com/Graptorsdotcom

record.Creator: Manuel Di Censo
record.Title: Your next budget app
record.Text: For a long time I have been looking for an app to track my expenses, an app that could tell me how much to spend and help me save.I never found it.Other alternatives offer too many unnecessary features, are either bloated or incomplete. So I decided to design my own, based on my needs, which hopefully are also everyone’s.But for a designer, creating an app isn't easy. I care a lot about quality and I know that without a team of developers it could not be up to my standards, so I ask you for help, to support this idea and this project.The app will be native, developed in Swift, and it will support widgets, light and dark mode, as well as an Apple Watch app with various complications.You can add your expenses divided into 3 macro categories: Necessities (for example rent or insurance), Extras (a movie or a dinner with friends) and Savings (money set aside for a longer project).Each expense can be single or recurring, a dedicated page will collect all the recurring expenses so you know what the monthly / weekly / annual fixed expenses are.Your remaining budget is automatically calculated based on your income, helping you never spend more than you've earned. Obviously, recurring income and expenses are included in the total calculation. All you need is to enter the expenses you make.All this for just 10€/year.

record.Creator: Jack Daly
record.Title: 8BitCADE Level Up - Learn how to Make Your Own Games
record.Text:
Wireframe for learn platform!Stage 1 of the learning platform focuses on software development. This is aimed to release by the end of December (Christmas time). This will consist of the:
               • Online IDE & Emulator
               • Daily Challenges
               • Coding coursesStage 2 of the learning platform focuses on hardware development. This is aimed to release mid 2022 and will aim to deliver a whole variety of online video courses for you to learn more about hardware development!

This could be further improvements on the learning platform through additional game making tools such as a pixel art editor/chiptune maker or it could be the release of new DIY kits!We prepared 500 units ready for the Christmas release! If we exceed this goal, they will be sent out after Christmas! More info is updated throughout the campaign.Hi! I’m Jack Daly and I am a student & founder of 8BitCADE. Ever since I was young I’ve had a keen interest in anything electronic. I have a passion for design, programming, electronics – but also for retro games and consoles.

                The 8BitCADE is my retro passion packaged in a compact, fun and exciting console – providing endless hours of entertainment. I love that I can play games from all over the world, and learn from one of the greatest gaming communities – Arduboy!Music composed and performed by Marco Parisi  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6SCug5kUsBs

record.Creator: Eric Lim
record.Title: Quizlarm: Productivity Booster For the Better Future
record.Text: Hello, I am 18 year old high school senior seeking to launch my first app. Because of my age, I realize that backers may, rightfully so, be doubtful and consider it a huge risk, so I would like to start by telling my story before introducing Quizlarm.I have always been an ambitious person with unique goals and dreams. In middle school, I was into classical guitar. I remember playing for hours and hours every day to become what my school called a guitar legend. It was an award given to a student who finished all courses of classical guitar and performed 20 minute recital in front of the school. After 3 years of hard work, I made it. Then, during my Freshman year of high school, I invested tens of hours each week in my school's robotics club. This time, my goal was to make it the world's competition and compete in the international event. Working in hallways by the vending machine everyday, my team and I, for the first time in school history, made it. Then, in my Junior year, after robotics stopped due to the pandemic, I had my first part-time job. Making money for the first time, I studied economy from day to night. This time my goal was to create a sustainable financial asset portfolio composed of growth stocks, dividend stocks, and U.S. government bonds. Finally, in my senior year, I started a community recycling project with group of friends. We dedicated our time to make recycling easy for a community that did not recycle. We distributed 1000 advertisement flyers, trash bags to houses participating, collected the trash bags, sorted aluminums and plastics, removed all labels, and recycled every single items we collected. This time, my goal was to help my community to be more sustainable. I did not list my journey's to just brag and assure you that I am capable. Throughout these experiences, I've learned, what I believe, to be a valuable skills that can guide me through my journey with a Quizlarm project. Guitar journey taught me that diligence and hard work pays off motivating me to always work hard. Robotics taught me to be more efficient and attempt to calculate all the variables that can become risks in the future. Economic studies taught me to manage risks to reduce the chances of failure. Finally, the recycling project taught me execution skills. There will most certainly be hurdles, but I believe I am ready for the challenge.Have you ever had those mornings where you could not wake up? Did you ever miss alarms or used the snooze button too much? Have you ever felt that waking up is just a waste of time? It feels terrible waking up hours after your desired wake-up time, and it feels even worse to feel like you are wasting your time hitting snooze buttons after snooze buttons. I've had similar problems, so I am in process of creating Quizlarm, an alarm app that will guarantee that you wake up with productivity in mind. How?Quizlarm is an alarm app, and the app will give you a quiz each morning. The user will have to solve the question(s) correctly to turn off the alarm. In other words, the user will have to wake up and solve a quiz to turn off the alarm ensuring that the user wakes up. No more snoozes and no more waking up hours after your desired wake up time. Productivity?The app will most certainly wake you up, but how will it provide productivity users seek? Most of the quizzes given to the users will be pre-made simple questions that attempts to make the user think. For example, the app will ask users to spell certain words, copy certain motivational quotes, solve medium difficulty math problems, and etc. However, the user will have an option to create his/her own questions. I believe users are the ones that know themselves the best, and they are the only ones who knows exactly what questions to ask them. For example, if Eric has an important English test in a week, Eric can make questions that he needs to remember for the exam, or if Sarah has an important interview that she can not forget in few days, she can make a question to reminder herself of such an event. However, if the user does not have any important events, the app will simply provide the users with its questions. Alarm apps are something people use on daily basis, and if the app reminds you or teaches you an information every single morning, then I believe the user can greatly benefit. Not only will the user wake up on time, the user will start each day productively paving each morning to be the foundation of their success.Today, the app's initial UI and significant portion of development is done. However,  because the app is not aesthetically pleasing as of today, contracts with external UI designer will be underway in few weeks to improve the apps overall look. Further, because the app needs to connect to a server, I am planning to contact a developer to help me with the finishing touches of the app. According to current plans, the app will be ready to launch in late December or early January. I've included some screenshots from the app for your reference. According to the Harvard online resources in the science of learnings section, there is a quote, "[information] is only kept [in the memory system] through constant repetition" emphasizing the importance of repetitive learning. Further, according to the article "Repetition and the brain: neural models of stimulus-specific effects" written by departments in Stanford University, Cambridge, and National Institute of Mental Health, explains why and how repetition allows the brain to  stimulate a faster response with greater accuracy.  As such, it has been proven that repetition improves learning, and I believe repetitive learnings each morning can be an even greater catalyst than simple repetition. The first thing the user sees and experiences in the morning is what the user desires to memorize or learn. We are living in a world where the value of the financial assets are rising faster than the value of labor.  Also, the world's wealth gap is only increasing. The wealth gap between the highly educated and the non-educated population is reaching all time highs.  So, I think my app can attempt to help solve such a societal problem. I believe my app can help our society take one of thousands of step closer to solving our societal problems by providing repetitive learning each morning prompting the users to be more productive and wake up on time. Changes I bring may be small, but I still believe utilizing the wasteful time people spend waking up each morning can be a change in the right direction for our society.Receiving money should be followed by responsibility, so I will lay out how the funds will be used including how much I am investing in my project. Further, to ensure transparency, for some backers of my project, financial report will be sent that includes where and why each penny was spent.As the chart below shows, most of the money raised through Kickstarter will go to pay for external developer who specializes in server side development and UI designer to make the app more aesthetically more appealing. You may wonder if $2000 raised will be enough to fund such a project, but I will be also investing money that I've saved during my part-time job, this additional capital information will be included in the financial report. * The above budget is an estimation and it leaves room for error and taxes.I do not know how much money will be raised, but the exact dollar amount will be recorded and some backers will receive financial report to know that the funds were used to kickstart my project. Thank you for reading my story. Please email me at 0329ericlim@gmail.com or reach out in the comment section.

record.Creator: Cudi
record.Title: Cudi
record.Text:

record.Creator: Wojciech Miler
record.Title: Handheld charger with PowerBank
record.Text: Manual charger with PowerBankManually powered generator. A charger that powers the built-in powerbank and electrical devices attached to it.With one hand you can charge the phone, an iPad, a camera, a speaker or other portable electrical devices.With GiBank you will never be surprised by a dead phone again. You can charge your phone and build-in power bank at the same time. Or you can just charge the built-in power bank so it is always ready for charging other devices. And all this without a need for electricity access.With GiBank you don't have to look for an electrical outlet to charge the battery of your phone or other device anymore.GiBank is always ready to recharge your dead battery.Manual charger with power bank.Easy to use.Every child can use it.Far away from electricity supplies.Pocket size.Quick and easy to use.Safe to use.Enjoy the moment and good times.Price for "Early Birds"Regular priceDevelopment of GiBank project: Everything has started from a single thought. From a need of finding a solution to a problem (how to charge a dead phone battery without an access to a electricity outlet).... the idea came to create a device which could solve the problem of a dead battery in mobile devices once and for all...Creators:Then came the willingness to make this idea a reality. Sketches of the device:Presenting the idea to friends (and friends' of friends) met with a great interest. We started to seriously think about a large scale production... So that everyone could use our device and enjoy having it.We started designing a functional, ergonomical and aesthetic device.The next step was a 3D design.  The first visualisations in Solid Edge program.interior designProduction of the prototype and 3D printing thanks to support of Diagnostic, Research and Analysis Centre at University of Economics and Innovation in Lublin, Poland.Materialisation of the idea... the first elements of the prototypePrototype of the interior of the deviceCleaned and polished partsCompleted devicePresentation of the deviceAnd finally...- The whole world can see and buy our device.

record.Creator: MyHealth Sentinel Holdings Pte Ltd
record.Title: TM+ Remote Wellness Monitoring of Your Loved Ones
record.Text: Monitor the wellness of your family membersTM+ Demonstration - FM: Family Manager aka Family Caregiver, M: Family Member. Why TM+ is for Family Caregivers to monitor the wellness of your loved ones?mHS has been serving the Singapore hospitals and the public with its monitoring services for the past 10 years. mHS's services is the most widely use wellness monitoring service in Singapore with thousands of users being monitored since 2011.A tool is in need to monitor the wellness of our loved ones remotely while we minimize physical contact with each other. mHS is leveraging on its 10 years of wellness monitoring service to offer a new monitoring tool for Family Caregivers to monitor the wellness of the loved ones remotely.We have been working on this idea (monitor the wellness of our loved ones remotely while we minimize physical contact with each other) for over 12 months, it is ready to be deployed, instead of limiting it to just Singapore, we want it to benefit all the people, and Kickstarter is the right platform to do this. You may not be physically next to your loved ones, but you can watch over their wellness with TM+ service anytime anywhere.TM+ is unique. TM+ allows you to monitor 6 family members remotely. It supports a range of wireless devices to measure: Blood Oxygen, Blood Pressure, Heart Rate, Blood Glucose, Body Temperature, Body Weight & BMI.        TM+ is specially created for Family Caregivers.  Disclaimer: Any content accessed through TM+ is for informational purposes only, and is not intended to be representative of any informed medical advice, nor to cover all possible uses, directions, precautions, drug interactions, or adverse effects. Users should consult their doctor if they have any questions about any of their biometric data shown on the TM+. Users must not ignore or delay obtaining professional medical advice because of information accessed through TM+.

record.Creator: Ming-Jack Lin
record.Title: HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount
record.Text: (Turned RGB Screen Mount!)In the current world of IoT (Internet of Things), one can say that working and gaming have been almost inseparable from computers in our day-to-day lives, but most people have yet to think about how this affects eye care. As we are spending more and more time on screen, a light that is either too bright or too dim will directly strain your eyes, causing adverse and irreversible effects on eyesight in the long-term. As such, HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount was created to focus on eliminating screen glare with its unique light positioning module, providing only the best flicker-free soft lights to protect your eyes from fatigue and allow you to view your screen clearly and comfortably.We did not just just HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount to provide a more innovative way to light up computer desktops via Display Space Light Source Technology. We also aimed at improving atmospheric lighting in and around your screen at the same time, allowing for a more exceptional gaming experience like nothing you’ve ever experienced before! It’s the best addition to serious RGB pc gaming setups!HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount can be mounted on any PC monitor or laptop screen without problem. It’s space-saving design was thought up to avoid occupying any space on your work and/or gaming desk to help keep everything clean and efficient. With HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount, you also have the option to have it automatically turn off after a 40-minute use, reminding you that it’s time to rest your eyes. This special function may be disabled if you have no need for it though. The LightSaber Screen Mount also has the ability to either manually or automatically help you find the best lighting option for your room setting, as well as being a smart device, remembers the brightness and color temperature you used the last time, bringing a more user-friendly experience to the table compared to others.HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount works with any DC 5V/1A power adapter and outputs power at 4.5W. With a color temperature ranging from 2700-6500K, it has over 68 High Quality Light Beads inside its sharp LED design. It can also be used for up to 30,000 hours straight!Entertainment has always had a cost but working too hard costs practically the same thing nowadays when we’re all spending so much time on screen. Even now in the post-pandemic era where online classes have been the norm, our children are being affected by the same problems we adults face as they are now also on the screen most of the time, either while learning or gaming afterwards. Don’t let yourself or your family get strained or damaged eyes any further. Let HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount care for your eyes for you.HealthCare Family is dedicated to developing new and innovative ways of improving healthcare for all, and is now focusing on bringing a better lighting experience to screens worldwide with a unique asymmetrically optical design and elegant high quality light beads, scientific counterweight via dual-damping brackets, and super high color matching of up to 6500K! Make both gaming and office life more enjoyable with HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount. The one and only RGB LED Light Screen Mount that cares for your eyes. Great for work, best for gaming!

record.Creator: Colin Renaud
record.Title: //Phrism, a pocketable laptop computer alternative
record.Text: Since 2017 I have been wondering how to improve a product that we all know, the laptop, the latter tends to be big and quite heavy, why wouldn't it be light, thin and small enough to put it in your pocket ? that's why I came up with the idea for //Phrism, a futuristic pocketable computer that uses projectors for the screen and keyboard.I remember my first laptop and how much I loved it.It was thin, fast, beautiful, had a great battery, it was cool.It was a macbook 2007, and it was amazingThings evolve and like everything my awesome macbook became old.At the time it was my main machine. But now, my main machine is my smartphone, a Galaxy note 10 plusI never find myself a laptop computer that give me the same feeling I had before with my old mac.I now use my phone, samsung DeX and a screen for doing my "computer stuff"But what if I can do these things on the go, my phone will be the only computer I'll ever need!Introducing Phrism, the first glimpse of the future of computersPhrism is a pocketable alternative to a laptop how does it works?Just watchFirst, we need to detach the two sides and connect it with the strong magnetic connection.Phrism uses high resolution projector with DLP technology for the screen and a laser keyboard, so you can have the screen size you want.The colors are vibrant and the screen is luminous enough to be seen all dayAfter using it, we reattach the solid slide connection and we can slide it in a pants' pocketPhrism is made with a great looking true wood and high-quality biodegradable plastic.It is compatible with Samsung DeX Huwawei EMUI, Windows PC sticks, nintendo switch and so on.Conectics are usb 3.0, usb C, hdmi and, believe it or not, headphone jackPhrism starts at the cost of 449$ but with this kickstarter campaign you can holdthe future in your hand for only 249$Now I can finaly say I have a thin, fast, beautiful and pocketable computer with a great battery. It is cool.My Phrism is amazing,maybe you will say it too!

record.Creator: Powerward
record.Title: Powerward- The Most Versatile Ultra-Capacity Power Station
record.Text: Electricity is one of the most useful inventions that science has given us. It plays a pivotal role in the modern world and we surely can’t live without it. However, life is unpredictable and full of uncertainties and we have to keep ourselves powered up 24/7. With the goal of bringing you constant energy and vitality, Powerward arrives with versatility, reliability, and ultimate power.Powerward, featuring 2000Wh high capacity, 3×2000W AC outputs, Car Power output, and 800W Solar Charging with the AC adapter, is a solid backup power station for your domestic appliances, small home devices, and electric cars. Meet Powerward, your ever ready power station for modern life!When it comes to charging devices, Powerward has established itself as a chief in the industry. With an unparalleled 2000Wh capacity, Powerward is capable of persistently powering up all types of home appliances. With Powerward as your companion, worries about power outages are eliminated forever!Not only does Powerward supply power, but it can provide endless entertainment with its built-in Bluetooth Speaker. This special individual feature empowers Powerward to serve you with catchy music while chilling and partying outdoors. Powerward does it all…and more!Most people don’t know that Thomas Edison, the inventor of the light bulb, was afraid of the dark. Light is super essential for daily lives. Featuring a liftable 360° rotating Light, Powerward can light up your life!Summer is the perfect season for overnight camping. However, the high temperature can make it hard to sleep. With an intelligent cooling fan, Powerward can conquer the summer heat in an easy-breezy way!Unlike some burdensome power stations, Powerward is compact and portable. Traveling around with Powerward is convenient and flexible. With an individual luggage-style design, you can take this powerful companion anywhere. Whether you are hosting a music festival, camping outdoors overnight, or charging cars for a journey, your circumstances will always be filled with electrical energy!Powerward is versatile and almighty beyond your imagination, featuring 10 different outputs including Car Power, USB-C, USB-A, DC, and 3×AC electrical outlets. The 3×2000W AC outputs are especially useful and are more efficient when increasing or decreasing the voltage using transformers, while minimizing power loss in electrical transmission. Powerward is proficient in powering large electrical appliances simultaneously, such as refrigerator, air conditioner, rice cooker, and more.As electric vehicles are becoming more widespread, the concern of running out of electricity on the road is an issue for many. In addition to powering devices, Powerward can also charge electric cars like Tesla. Instead of searching for a charger in hard to find areas, prepare ahead of time by taking Powerward along with you.There are many devices and equipment in the workshop that need to run 24/7. An unpredictable power outage can cause serious financial losses. Featuring multiple electrical outlets and a massive expandable capacity, Powerward ensures that your tools run continuously.A lot of medical devices for saving people’s lives such as breathing machines or home dialysis equipment require a long-lasting power supply. In order to guard against power outages, Powerward makes a reliable backup plan for emergency situations.The speed of recharging is unbelievably rapid. Powerward 1000 can be recharged in multiple ways in only 1.6 hours, the efficiency of the recharging speed is mind-blowing!Multiple options are available for recharging your Powerward - use the AC wall input for up to 1.6 hours or 10 hours through the car input. There is also a compatible solar panel that lets you recharge Powerward in 6-12 hours by simply soaking in the sun. What if you want Powerward to be full of energy again? Easy! After recharging it with multiple methods simultaneously, a vital Powerward will be standing in front of you!Powerward is designed with black PC-ABS materials for the shell which combines the superior strength and heat resistance of PC and the flexibility of ABS. With a durable 1500 cycle lifespan, Powerward is committed to being your lifetime partner and cheers you up with its crazy energy!The safety of users is always our priority. Powerward fully supports short circuit protection, high & low voltage protection, overload protection, etc, and has earned essential international qualifications including FCC, CE, ROHS, and PSE. Regardless of what country and region you are based in, you can power up with maximum confidence. We are a team dedicated to bringing energy to power all sorts of home appliances of the world. With the intention of bringing new fresh air to the power station industry, this premier product designed by us is powerful, durable, and customer-oriented. We are here looking forward to eliminating everyone’s worries about the power outage and stopping you from living off the grid!

record.Creator: Regonesi Giuliano
record.Title: Sublime Plus - Solutions for Healthcare
record.Text:
Did you know that doctors recommend cleaning or changing the mask after each use?
This is true. According to Johns Hopkins University, you must cleanse or change the mask after each use. But who actually does it? You simply do not have time to quit washing every day, or change your mask several times during the day. By changing the mask, we increase the amount of waste, but we not always carry a spare mask with us and during the day we take off our mask more than once and put or hang up somewhere, thereby accumulating microbes and viruses in the object that protects us. In the face of the current pandemic, we have drastically changed our hygiene practices. You will see that more and more people care about the cleanliness of the surrounding air and things. As a result, we tend to carry more cleaning devices with us than ever before, and until now we have not seen anyone make a product that can combine all of these functions and make it more convenient. Therefore, we would like to present our new invention - Subleme Plus.Subleme Plus is a highly portable solution to your contaminated mask woes: - Pop it in  your pocket - Keep it in your car -  Put it with your masks at home - In the foyer - At the office -  Anywhere where you might need a mask!With concern about our health and the health of loved ones and relatives, we came up with a new device Subleme Plus. With the Subleme Plus we can safely disinfect our everyday items that we use so often.Microorganisms multiply by replicating genetic material in the nucleus of living cells, and ultraviolet light can alter and rearrange the helical structure of DNA / RNA, stopping cell division. And because our LED is in the range where DNA / RNA is most sensitive, Subleme Plus can perform better in cleaning than other products. Today, all microorganisms, including viruses and bacteria that have become resistant to antibiotics, are vulnerable to UVC rays.With the UVC LEDs in the device that radiate in the wavelength range of 200-280 nm, it ensures the sterilization of items such as masks, pens, keys, jewelry in a brief time like 10-20 seconds. The inside of our device has UV-C rays and it provides a sterile environment for storing the mask when we need to take it off. It is very easy to use, all you have to do is place your belongings, close the lid and press the button. After the process is completed, the light on it will turn off.Subleme Plus offers various advantages over the traditionally used mercury lamps and UV lamps. It is the most effective, environmentally-friendly, and chemical-free way to keep your things clean.Subleme Plus is fully rechargeable. Thanks to new technologies, one charge will last from 15 to 30 days of operation. And the microprocessor itself, which generates UV-C rays, lasts for 90,000 hours of operation without stopping. Subleme Plus is completely portable and easy to carry, you can put it in your shoulder bag or in your pockets, always protecting it from harmful microorganisms.This is not just a disinfection device, it is our health, a person close to us. The disinfection process is very simple and absolutely safe.Subleme Plus is made from a high-strength aluminum alloy that does not harm human health or the surrounding nature.Every year, more than 10 million tons of garbage get into our oceans and surrounding nature. We believe that waste reduction must come together to cope with the global pollution of our planet.Subleme Plus will be made with high quality and durable materials to ensure a long lifetime and to be a reliable companion on all your adventures, indoors and outdoors.We are ensuring recyclable by only using suitable materials for Subleme Plus and its packaging (solely cardboard and no plastic).The materials mentioned above are not only recyclable, but are in combination with the long lifetime also a sustainable choice. Where possible (e.g. packaging) we are not only setting a focus on sustainable materials, but also on reducing the use of materials as much as possible.Factories that we will chose for mass production will be carefully evaluated regarding compliance with environmental regulations. Emphasis will also be put on social conditions as health and safety, working hours, minimum wages, labor practices and discrimination.

record.Creator: Energize Lab
record.Title: Eilik - A little Companion Bot with Endless Fun
record.Text: Alone, what Eilik can do is limited. Together, it has infinite possibilities. Sing, dance, play, laugh! Let the party begin!We created an extremely rich expression system for Eilik in order to make him more lifelike, including laughing, yelling, crying, depressed, speechless, disappointed, cute, funny, wronged, cursing, angry, and so on. In addition, Eilik can express himself vividly thanks to dynamic animations and a 25 fps OLED screen. Our in-house animation team is hard at work behind Eilik's real-life expression to make Eilik more vivid and fun. Every action necessitates the coordination and cooperation of screenwriters, storytellers, animation producers, and voice actors, before being shown to Eilik by the software engineer.Regular updates are available via Eilik's cross-platform software, so that he will be smarter, get more expressions, and download more plot content. Every update will make Eilik a better bot for you. In order to make Eilik's arm and body more flexible and dexterous, we have designed a new servo motor especially. EM3 is 100% self-developed, from the gear layout, circuit board, to the control algorithm. Compared with the traditional 9g servo, the torque of EM3 can reach up to 3kg.EM3 can efficiently protect gears and offset external force with its overload clutch protection function. Position, voltage, temperature, and current feedback are all supported by the EM3's comprehensive control protocol, which uses a universal serial communication interface. Basic current-loop control is also available. A specific control and debugging software is also included with the EM3. We've cooperated with international carriers like FedEx, UPS, DHL, and USPS. Kindly note that the price above doesn't include shipping costs, taxes, or additional duties. COVID-19 is still delaying international shipping in many places, but things are better now, and we hope that by the time we start shipping, the delivery time can be back to normal. We will update you with the whole shipping process continuously.Energize Lab is an innovative startup focusing on robotics technology and products, including robot joints, control systems, servo motor, BLDC motor, and consumer robot. With our own patented robot technology and experienced animation experts, our team is committed to creating a robot with soul and endless fun.Our team is formed by a group of experienced engineers, designers, animators, and developers. As robot passionists, we have been working hard to make Eilik come true in the past two years, and we are glad that we have finally made it here. We chose to launch Eilik first here as we believe that this awesome community can give us more inspiration and incredible ideas. We look forward to having you as our co-creator, and let's make Eilik a better bot for everyone.

record.Creator: Jackie
record.Title: Those Who Travel
record.Text: WE DESERVE BETTER! Back in the day, you went to a hostel, met new people, and went on epic adventures. Now, we stay in Airbnb’s and if you want to meet other locals, you have to download apps that don’t work OR Tinder, Yuck! Those Who Travel is an app to connect solo travelers. You can use it on journeys to meet other travelers and locals OR in your city to meet travelers passing through. We offer a unique safety precaution by requiring every potential user to go through a quick interview to make sure they are real and safe. If a user violates the user rules, they will be removed.🆗  SAFE: Every user must be verified and accepted via interview✅  Not a dating site, if romance blossoms, so be it but that is not the intention🔎  Search people based on interests: Food, art, culture, extreme (bungee jumping), nightlife🔒  Set privacy to only allow people you already liked to be able to message you- Exclusive deals from partners- Community Who knows how many more nights like these I missed out on because I didn't have Those Who Travel? Who Will Download and Use Those Who Travel?This is built by me, a solo traveler for other solo travelers. My goal is simple not easy-  creating a community by connecting travelers and locals. There are no requirements other than being who you say you are, and keeping the community safe. ✅  NAME SUBMITTED TO US PATENT AND TM OFFICE✅  LOGO IS SUBMITTED TO US PATENT AND TM OFFICE✅  BUSINESS PLAN✅  SOCIAL AND WEB ASSETS thosewhotravel.io✅  Prototype and functionalityWEB: thosewhotravel.io INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/thosewhotravelofficial/ SLACK CHANNEL: https://join.slack.com/t/thosewhotravel/shared_invite/zt-qzgf6vc6-juP_lRe2Tt9JxLSZI1XHcQFounder:Jacquelyn CliffordDesigner, Head of Marketing and PR, Customer SupportCTO, Lead DeveloperAwais AliPOST-DEV ROADMAPRoadmap: Once Dev is done, we will proceed with the below steps:1- Three weeks of Testing/Quality Assurance and bug fixing. (with sandbox details). Same time, while working on Testing/QA, we will set up the accounts on Google Play store & Apple store. So accounts can get approved on time.2- After that we just need one week to do the followings:a) Changing Sandbox details with Live detailsb) Deploying of apps on Google Play store & Apple store (as we have already approved accounts on Google store & Apple store)c) Waiting for Google store & Apple store to approve the apps.d) Apps get approved by Google store & Apple store
